# language_name:        Chin, Zyphe
# Closest ISO 639-3:    zyp
# year_short:           2010
# year_long:            Not available
# title:                Biahrai Tha, Zyphe rei<br>New Testament in Chin, Zyphe

40001001	Abraham pathlah , David pathlah a cangpaw Zisu Khri thokehnah cazing leco ,
40001002	Abraham cawh Isak a paw cang ka , Isak cawh Jakob a paw a cang . Jakob cawh Judah le a uny sahlo aa paw a cang .
40001003	Judah cawh Perez le Zera aa paw cang ka , aa no cawh Tama a cang . Perez cawh Hezron a paw cang ka , Hezron cawh Ram a paw a cang .
40001004	Ram cawh Aminada a paw cang ka , Aminada cawh Nashon a paw a cang . Nashon cawh Salmon a paw a cang ,
40001005	Salmon cawh Boaz a paw cang ka , a no cawh Rahab a cang . Boaz cawh Obed a paw cang ka , a no cawh Ruth a cang . Obed cawh Jesi a paw cang ka ,
40001006	Jesi cawh siangpahrang David a paw a cang . David cawh Solomon a paw cang ka , Solomon a no cawh Uria a nupui tawpaw khah a cang .
40001007	Solomon cawh Rehoboam a paw cang ka , Rehoboam cawh Abija a paw a cang . Abija cawh Asa a paw cang ka ,
40001008	Asa cawh Jehoshafat a paw a cang . Jehoshafat cawh Jehoram a paw cang ka , Jehoram cawh Uziah a paw a cang .
40001009	Uziah cawh Jotham a paw cang ka , Jotham cawh Ahas a paw a cang . Ahas cawh Hezekia a paw cang ka ,
40001010	Hezekia cawh Manaseh a paw a cang . Manaseh cawh Amon a paw cang ka , Amon cawh Josai a paw a cang .
40001011	Josai cawh Jekhonia le a uny sahlo aa paw cang ka , ma cai leco Babilon raang lang khah sae tah seikhui a cang he .
40001012	Babilon raang lang sae tah seikhui aa cang khy taiteipaw : Jekhonia cawh Shealtia a paw a cang . Shealtia cawh Zerubabel a paw cang ka ,
40001013	Zerubabel cawh Abiud a paw a cang . Abiud cawh Eliakim a paw cang ka , Eliakim cawh Azor a paw a cang .
40001014	Azor cawh Zadok a paw cang ka , Zadok cawh Akhim a paw a cang . Akhim cawh Eliud a paw cang ka ,
40001015	Eliud cawh Eleazar a paw a cang . Eleazar cawh Mathan a paw cang ka , Mathan cawh Jakob a paw a cang .
40001016	Jakob cawh Khri tatei aa tahpaw Zisu a no Mari a pasaepaw Josef a paw khah a cang .
40001017	Ma hrahei Abraham taitah David tai letah chaihraw hluipali , David taitah Babilon raang lang sae tah seikhui aa cangnah tai letah chaihraw hluipali , sae tah seikhui aa cangnah taitah Khri a pinah tai letah chaihraw hluipali a cang .
40001018	Zisu Khri a pinah konglang cawh ma hrahei a cang . A no Mari cawh Josef khatah a pahlawng pawtah pahapaw a cang . Canghrasala aa pahlawng hlai he tah Mari cawh Thlawpaw Pathai hmingtuakhynah thongtah sawtei a pho .
40001019	A pasae ruapaw Josef cawh mehding mehchaw a cangnah cawtah mingzawpui hme letah Mari a ningzawsah khah du be ca ka , kaa pahlawng peh aa tahpaw khah aparuh teitah bia ka pheh kaw a tatah a pacang .
40001020	Canghrasala , ma hratei a pacang khy taico , Abuipaw a vaiming pakheh cawh ama khatah a mang letah a za paly ka , a hai letah , “ David pathlah a cangpaw Josef , Mari cawh nupui rua tah chui pawtah lung ngerai lytah ung kheh . Zecawtamaw tatah punglong lytah a cangpaw khah Thlawpaw Pathai thongtah a cang .
40001021	Sawcapaw sah a ka , a ming tah Zisu na sá a . Zecawtamaw tatah Ama taco a cawngsaw sahlo khah aa suanah taitah a pachá he a , ” tatah a tah .
40001022	Ma hming vytei a va ungpaw heh Abuipaw tah Khazing khuavang hmang tei a reipaw :
40001023	“ Laisaw pathai tah sawtei pho ka , sawcapaw a sá a , Ama cawh Immanuel tatah aa y a , ” tatah a tah . Immanuel a silang cawh , “ Khazing kaaning khatah a ung , ” tahnah a cang .
40001024	Josef cawh a ka hraw tihtah Abuipaw a vaiming tei a chingpaw hrakhei tua ka , Mari cawh nupui ruapaw takhei ing lang cawh a chui .
40001025	Canghrasala sawcapaw a sah hlai vytei khah cawh ung hrui be . Taico sawcapaw a sahpaw cawh Zisu tatah ming a sah .
40002001	Zisu cawh Herod siangpahrang a cang chung tah Judia raang , Bethlehem khua letah a pi khy taitah nichualang taikhei mehsing sahlo cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang a vong he ka ,
40002002	“ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang rua pawtah a pipaw cawngsawpaw cawh zeletamaw a ung ? Nichualang letah a esi hmuh he peh ka , Ama beh rua pawtah kaa va chua hi , ” tatah aa hae he .
40002003	Ma bia cawh Herod tah a thui tihtah a thlawzawng ka , ma hraco Jerusalem khua cawngsaw vytei zong a cang hrah he .
40002004	Mataico , tlangbui macang vytei le phungbia cawngpahtu vytei khah hmingkheh tah y he ka , Khri a pinah cawh zeletamaw a cang a tatah a hae he .
40002005	Taico aaning taco , “ Judia raang , Bethlehem khua letah , ” tatah aa palei . “ Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing khuavang tah a ciapaw cawh :
40002006	‘ Nama , Bethlehem , Judah raang chung letei a ungpaw cawh Judah uhtu sahlo hrong letah chia cai bei ceh , zecawtamaw tatah nama taitah uhtu , ka cawngsaw Israel tuukingtu a cang ruapaw cawh a va chua a , ’ a tahpaw heh a cang , ” tatah aa tah .
40002007	Mataico , Herod tah mehsing sahlo cawh aparuh teitah y he ka , zetih cai letah maw esi a paly tahpaw khah hae pase he ka , a hni .
40002008	Aaning sahlo cawh Bethlehem khua lang khah taw he ka , aa hai letah , “ Va sei la , nysai cawh achaw teitah va hui my lo . Naa hmuh cangkawleh va pa thui sá la , kama zong va sei neh ka , ka beh hra a , ” tatah a tah he .
40002009	Abui Herod bia cawh aa nawthlia khy taitah seithlah he ka , nichualang letei aa hmuhpaw esi takhei langhme cawh chui he ka , nysai a ungnah dihdong lalei lekhei esi cawh a cali .
40002010	Esi cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa thaw a chah ngetei .
40002011	Ing chunglang cawh a za nae he ka , nysai cawh a no Mari khakhei aa hmuh he . Taico aa khuh panai he ka , nysai cawh aa beh . Mataico aa chosung cawh hong he ka , lahsong takhei sui le sathy ringthopaw le mura ringthopaw sahlo khah aa peh .
40002012	Taico , Herod khatah sei kaw ly rua pawtah aa mang letah ching aa cangnah cawtah aa raang lang cawh lang hringpaw lang khei aa tlung .
40002013	Aaning sahlo aa seithlah khy taico Abuipaw a vaiming pakheh cawh Josef khaco a mang letah a za paly ka , “ Tho tua , nysai le a no cawh thokhui la , Izipt raang lang saikhui o . Ka ca ching kaw hlai chung cawh ma leco va ung thlang my lo , zecawtamaw tatah Herod tah nysai heh thaw pawtah a hui a , ” tatah a tah .
40002014	Macawtaco tho ka , nysai le a no cawh zai taco , Izipt raang lang a saikhui he .
40002015	Ma leco Herod a thih hlai vytei aa va ung . Ma heh Abuipaw tah Khazing khuavang hmokaw tei , “ Ka Sawcapaw cawh Izipt raang taitah ka y chua a , ” a tahpaw bia a tlingnah cawtah khei a cang .
40002016	Herod taco mehsing sahlo tah aa pa dungkhei tahpaw khah a hni tihtah a thingae ka , mehsing tei aa chingpaw cai khei tuatang ka , Bethlehem khua le a kaekang khua sahlo letei kung hning taitah a rai lang capaw nyheh vytei khah thaw thlu pawtah khei bia a peh he .
40002017	Ma heh Khazing khuavang Jeremai hmokaw tei a reipaw :
40002018	“ Rama khua letah o thui neh ka , caw o le ysangnah o a cang . Rachel tah a sawtei leh cawkhui he ka , pangang khypaw cang be , zecawtamaw tatah a tangpaw ung bei he , ” tahpaw bia a tlingnah cawtah a cang .
40002019	Herod a thih khy taitah Abuipaw a vaiming cawh Izipt raang leco Josef khatah a mang leco a za paly ka ,
40002020	“ Tho la , nysai le a no khah law la , Israel raang lang sei myca o , zecawtamaw tatah nysai thaw a pachiapaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a thi thah he , ” tatah a tah .
40002021	Macawtaco tho ka , nysai le a no cawh Israel raang lang cawh a seikhui he .
40002022	Canghrasala Arkelau cawh a paw Herod dawhming letah Judia raang uhtu tah a va cang tahpaw khah a thui tihtah va sei rua pawtah khei a ci . A mang letah raeringnah peh a cangnah cawtah khei Galili raang lang tukhah a paleh ka ,
40002023	Nazaret aa tahpaw khua lang va sei ka , ma leco a va ung . Ma heh Khazing khuavang sahlo hmokaw tei aa reipaw , “ Ama cawh Nazaret cawngsaw tatah y a cang a , ” tahpaw bia tlingnah khah a cang .
40003001	Ma ningcai leco baptisma peitu Johan va chuh ka , Judia raang , raangcaa letah phung a rei .
40003002	“ Vaicung painah raang cawh a ne myca cawtah naa suanah a ngepachih myca law , ” tatah a tah .
40003003	Ama heh Khazing khuavang Isaiah hmokaw hmang tei reipaw , “ Raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o taco , ‘ Abuipaw cawtah langpui parai la , a cawtah langpui pading pah my lo , ’ a tah , ” tahpaw khah a cang .
40003004	Johan a chaichi cawh sahisy hming tah tawpaw cang ka , saving tesong a te letah a song . A batui cawh khybawh le akhui tui a cang .
40003005	Jerusalem cawngsaw sahlo le Judia raang chung vytei taitah cawngsaw sahlo le Jordan tuivaw hrong leteipaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh Johan khaco a vaw he .
40003006	Khazing letah aa suanah phy he ka , Jordan tuivaw letah baptisma a cangsah he .
40003007	Canghrasala baptisma a cangsahnah pawhe lang khah Farasi le Sadusi cawngsaw sahlo aa va chuapaw khah a hmuh tihtah aa hai leco , “ Naaning , pari cangmai pathlah sahlo , Khazing thingaenah a va chuh leimeipaw heh saisai rua pawtah aho tamaw a ca ching he ?
40003008	Na ngepachihnah he ceh cawh a thuipa tah palang my lo !
40003009	Taico , ‘ Abraham pathlah sahlo kaa cang peh , ’ tatah tah leimei khe o . Ka ca ching he hi , Khazing taco ma alung sahlo heh Abraham sawtei sahlo tah a tua khy thlang he hi .
40003010	Thingkung hrang maikaw letah ahrui aa chia thlu thah . Thui chaw a thui lypaw thingkung maikaw cawh hyhly tah me lang bo a cang he a .
40003011	Kama taco angepachihnah cawtah tui tah baptisma ka ca cangsah he . Canghrasala ka hninglang tei a va chuh lepaw cawh kama navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a cang . Kama cawh a phepakong a tlepah lai tlang hmai cang bei neh . Ama taco Thlawpaw Pathai le me tah baptisma a ca cangsá he a .
40003012	Saze zeinah cawh a kiá tah tle ka , phuhri letah saze cawh a zei a , achang khah apaang letah rai a ka , asi khah a thi thai lypaw me lang a bo a , ” tatah a tah he .
40003013	Mataico , Zisu cawh Galili raang taitah Jordan tuivaw lang khah Johan tah baptisma cangsah rua pawtah khei a vong .
40003014	Canghrasala , Johan takhei thly a zawng ka , a hai letah , “ Nama tutah baptisma pa cangsá bei ceh maw , kama kha na vong laky thlang ! ” tatah a tah .
40003015	Zisu taco , “ Atoheh cawh ma hrahei cang thlang seh . Dingnah vytei tling sá pawtah ma tua heh kaa cawtah a tlahpaw a cang , ” tatah a palei . Mataico Johan zong a naw a tlah .
40003016	Zisu cawh baptisma a cang . Tui taitah a ka pia cangkawleh avai a hong ka , Khazing Thlawpaw cawh thury hratah za cung katei a cung letah a cawngpaw khah a hmuh .
40003017	Taico avai taitah o za ring ka , “ Ma heh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw cawh a cang . Ama letah ka lung a lawng ngetei , ” tatah a tah .
40004001	Mataico , Zisu cawh Thlawpaw takhei Setan tah tuhso ná seh tah ka , raangcaa lang a seikhui .
40004002	Ning songli le zai songli batui cahe tah a ungnah cawtah a ngai a di ngetei .
40004003	Tuhsotu cawh Ama kha a vong ka , a hai letah , “ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco , ma alung sahlo heh very tah cang law tah ca , ” tatah a tah .
40004004	Zisu taco , “ Khazing bia letah ma hrahei ciapaw a cang , ‘ Cawngsaw heh very suipaw tah a hring tlung be , Khazing hmokaw taitah a chuhpaw bia maikaw tah a hring hri , ’ tah a cang , ” tatah a chai .
40004005	Mataico , Setan taco Zisu cawh khuapui pathai Jerusalem lang khah seikhui ka , behnah ing a sangcainah ing cung lekhei a dawsah ka ,
40004006	“ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco , ma taihei a zythlah tua . Zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Nama na kong lehei Khazing tah a vaiming sahlo khah naw pei a he ka , na phe cawh alung letah na khawng ly nápawtah aa kiá tah aa ca caling a , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
40004007	Zisu tah , “ Ma hrahei ciapaw a cang , ‘ Abuipaw na Khazing cawh hnehsah kheh , ’ tah a cang , ” tatah a chai .
40004008	Setan taco Zisu cawh tlaang saang ngeteipaw lang kekhui ka , khazaw painah raang vytei le aa rungnawnah vytei khah a ming sah .
40004009	“ Khuh panai tah na pa beh caco , ma vytei heh ka ca pae a , ” tatah a tah .
40004010	Zisu taco , “ Setan , seihly myca ! Zecawtamaw tatah Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Abuipaw na Khazing khah beh la , Ama a rai suipaw hre my lo , ’ tahpaw a cang , ” tatah a palei .
40004011	Mataico Setan taco seisai ka , vaiming sahlo cawh a vong he ka , Ama cawh aa mingkai .
40004012	Johan thong a tlah tahpaw khah Zisu tah a thui tihtah Galili raang lang a paleh kaw .
40004013	Nazaret khua khah piasai ka , sei ka , Zebulun le Naftali raang letei a ungpaw Galili rili kae khua a cangpaw Kapernaum lekhei a va ung .
40004014	Ma heh Khazing khuavang Isaiah hmokaw tei reipaw ,
40004015	“ Zebulun raang le Naftali raang , Jordan tuivaw hrong tei rili lang seinah , Gental cawngsaw sahlo ungnah Galili ,
40004016	a zingnah letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo tah , khainah rungnawpaw aa hmuh myca , thihnah raang ningpahlipaw letah a ungpaw sahlo cung letah , khainah khua a dui myca , ” tahpaw a tlingnah a cang .
40004017	Ma cai taico Zisu cawh phungrei patho ka , “ Vaicung painah raang a ne myca cawtah naa suanah a ngepachih tua o , ” tatah a tah .
40004018	Zisu cawh Galili rili ngaekang letah a khiakaly ning takhei uny pahning Piter aa tahpaw Simon le a unypaw Andru khah a hmuh he . Aaning cawh ngawtletu cang he ka , tuili letah aso aa va leimei .
40004019	Zisu taco , “ A vong la , va pa zui o , cawngsaw a tletu tah ka ca tua he a , ” tatah a tah he .
40004020	Ma cangkaw leco , aa so sahlo cawh seisai he ka , Zisu cawh aa zui .
40004021	Mataico va sei vy ka , ahringpaw uny pahning Zebedi a sawcapaw Jeims le a unypaw Johan khah a hmuh he . Aaning cawh aa paw Zebedi khakhei tuilawng chung letah ung thlang he ka , aa so sahlo khah aa thei leimei . Zisu taco y he ka ,
40004022	ma cangkaw leco , aa lawng le aa paw cawh seisai he ka , Zisu cawh aa zui .
40004023	Zisu cawh Galili raang chung lekhei a khia ka , synagog sahlo lekhei a cawngpah he . Vaicung painah raang kong thawngchawbia khah ching he ka , asawnah maikaw le danglynah maikaw taikhei aa sahpaw sahlo khah a dangsah he .
40004024	A thongpang cawh Siria raang pungpaluh lekhei a thang ka , asawnah a phingphing tei aa sahpaw sahlo , hmawchia aa ingpaw sahlo , khachia tei a tlepaw sahlo , hruihri aa hnuipaw sahlo le a songpaw sahlo khah cawngsaw taco Ama khatah va chuakhui he ka , a dangsah he .
40004025	Galili raang , Dekapoli raang , Jerusalem khuapui le Judia raang le Jordan tuivaw raechai lang raang tahpaw sahlo taikhei cawngsaw rungpui tah Zisu cawh aa zui .
40005001	Cawngsaw rungpui cawh a hmuh tih he tah tlaang cung lang cawh ke ka , a ty . A hningzuitu sahlo cawh Ama kha a vong he ka ,
40005002	a cawngpah he . A reipaw cawh ,
40005003	“ Thlawpaw letei a sisahpaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh aaning sahlo aa cawtah a cang .
40005004	Mangchia sá tah a ungpaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah pangang a cang tae he a .
40005005	A ningnaipaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah alui ry aa cy a .
40005006	Dingnah cawpaw tei a ngaidi katei , a tui a hraepaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah aa ri a vaw tae a .
40005007	Zaangsaw aa thaipaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah zaangsaw a cang tae he a .
40005008	A lungthing a pathaipaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing khah aa hmuh a .
40005009	Arainah a chuakhuipaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing sawtei sahlo tatah y a cang tae he a .
40005010	Dingnah rawng tei hrehnah a ingpaw sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh aaning sahlo aa cawtah a cang .
40005011	Kama ka rawng tah cawngsaw tah ahmang lypaw tah a phingphing tah aa ca reipachia tih he tah le aa ca hreh tih he tah le zerei lytah aa ca ung tih he tah bonghnang naa ting .
40005012	A lawng la , naa thaw chah thlang seh , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letah naa longmai rungnaw ngeteipaw a ung . Ma hrahei naaning hlai tei Khazing khuavang sahlo zong khah aa za hreh hrah he .
40005013	Naaning cawh alui paci na cang he ceh . Canghrasala paci cawh a aenah khah a ly tei a cang caco , zekhatamaw aesah kaw a cang thai khawh a ? Vathlang tei cawngsaw tah tlaichai ruapaw cawtah tah ly co ze cawtah hmai sangtlenah hnui khawh be .
40005014	Naaning cawh khazaw khainah na cang he ceh . Tlaang cung letei tlahpaw khua cawh no khypaw cang be .
40005015	Me-ing cawh vang he ka , tongbai rai letah chia bang bei he . Ing chung vytei khai náseh tatah me-ing tung letah aa chia hri tei .
40005016	Ma hraco naa khainah cawh cawngsaw hme letah khai seh la , ma pawsui co hmingchaw naa tuapaw khah hmuh a he ka , vaicung letei a ungpaw naa Paw cawh aa reithai a .
40005017	Phungbia a cang ly leh Khazing khuavang sahlo aa bia khah ro rua pawtah a vong tatah pa rawh khe lo . Ma sahlo ro ruapaw taco a vong bei neh , tlingsah ruapaw tutah ka vong hri hi .
40005018	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he . Alui le avai a ly hlai vytei cawh phungbia cabu chung letei a chia caipaw , casung tei deipaw tei hmai heh zezongpui a changnah aa phah hlai taco ly a be .
40005019	Ma biapeh sahlo letei a chia caipaw tei hmai heh rawh katei , ma hraco tua hrá pawtah male a cawngpah laipaw cawngsaw cawh vaicung painah raang letah a chia caipaw a cang a , canghrasala ma biapeh sahlo heh zui katei , male a cawngpah laipaw cawngsaw cawh vaicung painah raang letah mehlai a cang a .
40005020	Naa dingnah tah Farasi sahlo dingnah le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo dingnah khah a khung ly tei a cang caco , vaicung painah raang letah a nae khy hrahring bei ceh tah heh ka ca ching he .
40005021	‘ Lenong kheh , le a nawngpaw cawngsaw cawh biacenah letah chuakhui a cang a , ’ tatah khuahlai cawngsaw tei aa za tah teipaw khah naa thui thlang kho .
40005022	Canghrasala , a uny cung letei a thing a aepaw cawngsaw cawh biacenah letah chuakhui a cang a , taheh ka ca ching he . A uny khah , ‘ Zeruarang ly , ’ tatah a tahpaw cawngsaw cawh biacetu phu khatah chuakhui a cang a . Taico , a uny khah , ‘ Mehruh , ’ a tahpaw cawngsaw cawh hraihming me lang thlah a tlahpaw a cang tah heh ka ca ching vy he .
40005023	Macawtaco dangnah siasang letah na lahsong khah na hlai leimeining tah na unypaw tah na cung letah a lungtling be tah na hni caco ,
40005024	na lahsong khah dangnah siasang leco chiasi . Va sei la , na unypaw cawh a va rai taw , mataico a vong la , na lahsong cawh a hlai my lo .
40005025	Biacenah zung letah a ca chuakhuipaw na caraepaw khakhei rairang tah arainah tua a va zawng . Langpui letah naa sei chung takhei tua my lo , ma hratei na tua ly caco biacetu kih letah ca hlai sua ka , biacetupaw tah naw hnuitu kih letah ca hlai sua ka , thong letah thlah na cang sua a .
40005026	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , dangtahnah tangka na lia thlu hlai vytei cawh chuh khy khaw bei ceh .
40005027	‘ Male nupui pasae khatah a phei kheh , ’ tatah aa tah teipaw khah naa thui thlang kho .
40005028	Canghrasala , canu pakheh khah mehthi hmo tei a mingpaw cawngsaw taco a lungchung letah a phei thah , tahpaw heh ka ca ching he .
40005029	Na cacang lang meh tah a ca suasah caco , khyhly la , vathlang . Na pungpaluh tah hraihming lang tlah navy co , na pung cung letei sangkheh tling ly cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
40005030	Taico na cacang lang kih tah a ca suasah caco taichung la , vathlang . Na pungpaluh tah hraihming lang tlah navy co , na pung cung letei sangkheh tling ly cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
40005031	‘ A nupui a mahpaw cawngsaw taco a nupui cawh mahnah ca pei seh , ’ tatah aa za tah tei .
40005032	Canghrasala , a nupui tah capaw hringpaw khatah a suasai tah tlung lypaw tei a mahpaw cawngsaw cawh a nupui tah pasae hringpaw a hnui caco a pheisahtu cang ka , ma mah ciapaw canu a chuipaw cawngsaw cawh a pheipaw a cang tah heh ka ca ching he .
40005033	Khuahlai cawngsaw taco , ‘ Chia na sahpaw cawh rawh kheh . Abuipaw khatei na tuapaw chiasahnah cawh zui my lo , ’ tatah aa za tah teipaw khah naa thui thlang kho .
40005034	Canghrasala , vaicung tah chia a sah khe o , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawh Khazing a tynah a cang , tah heh ka ca ching he .
40005035	A cang ly leh alui tah chia a sah khe o , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawh Khazing phe chianah a cang , a cang ly leh Jerusalem khuapui ming tah chia a sah khe o , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawh Siangpahrang a khuapui a cang .
40005036	Taico na lu tah chia a sah kheh , zecawtamaw tatah na sangbu bukheh hmai khah rang sá tah vongsah khy bei ceh kho .
40005037	A cang caco , ‘ A cang , ’ tah la , a cang ly caco , ‘ Cang be , ’ tah my lo . Ma a khunglang tei hming cawh mehchaw lypaw taitah a va chuhpaw a cang .
40005038	‘ Meh cawtah meh , haw cawtah haw , ’ aa za tah teipaw khah naa thui thlang kho .
40005039	Canghrasala , mehchawly a cangpaw cawngsaw khah palei hri khe o , tah heh ka ca ching he . Pakheh kheh tah na cacang lang bai letah a ca cabai caco , a rakheh lang zong khah congpah vy .
40005040	Taico pakheh kheh tah na pai lah du tah taza a ca cui caco , na angkilai zong khah pei chi thlang .
40005041	Pakheh kheh tah hranghrang tah khangkheh a ca seisah caco , ama khaco khang hning va sei my lo .
40005042	A ca haepaw cawngsaw khah va pei la , nama khatah dycui a ca dupaw cawngsaw khah a huisai lai he kheh .
40005043	‘ Na ingpaw va do la , na carae a hua , ’ tatei aa za tah teipaw khah naa thui thlang kho .
40005044	Canghrasala , na carae sahlo cawh va do la , a ca hrehpaw cawngsaw sahlo caw takhei thlawchang my lo , tah heh ka ca ching he .
40005045	Ma pawsui co vaicung letei a ungpaw naa Paw a sawtei sahlo naa cang khy a . Ama taco ning khah mehchaw cung letah kha , mehchawly cung letah kha thasah ka , mehding cung letah kha , mehdingly cung letah kha khua khah a sosah .
40005046	Naaning a ca dopaw suipaw naa do caco he ze longmai maw naa hmuh a ? Ngungkhui kheitu sahlo tahmai tah ma cawh tua thlang bei he maw ?
40005047	Taico na uny sahlo suipaw bia na ching caco he zemaw ahringpaw sahlo navy tah na tua khy vy hlui ? Lawki cawngsaw sahlo zong tah ma cawh tua thlang bei he maw ?
40005048	Macawtaco vaicung letei a ungpaw naa paw a tlingpaw hratah tling hrah my lo .
40006001	A dingpaw rai naa hrepaw khah cawngsaw tah ma hmuh naa he seh tatah cawngsaw hme letah tua ly rua pawtah khei a raering my lo . Ma hraco naa tua caco , naa Paw vaicung leteipaw taitah longmai hmuh a bei he ceh .
40006002	Macawtaco a phahlahpaw cawngsaw naa pehlai tih he tah cungmai raipha sahlo tei cawngsaw tah ma cizaw naa he seh tatei synagog sahlo le langpui sahlo letah aa tualaipaw hratah naa tuapaw cawh hmoka tung tah y khui lai khe lo . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , aaning sahlo cawh aa longmai khah a tling teitah aa hmuh thah kho .
40006003	Canghrasala a phahlahpaw cawngsaw cawh naa pehlai tih he tah naa cacang lang kih tei a tuapaw cawh naa cavui lang kih khah hnisah khe la ,
40006004	ma pawsui co naa pehlainah cawh aparuh a cang a . Mataico naa Paw , a paruh teitah tuapaw a hmuhpaw taco longmai a ca pae he a .
40006005	Taico , thlaw naa chang tihtah cungmai raipha sahlo hratah chang khe lo . Zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh cawngsaw tah ma hmuh na he seh tatah synagog le langchai letah a daw lai tei thlawchang khah aa du kho . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , aaning sahlo cawh aa longmai khah a tling teitah aa hmuh thah .
40006006	Canghrasala , naaning cawh thlaw naa chang tihtah ing chunglang a nae la , ingkaw kha la , naa Paw hmuh khy lypaw khaco chang my lo . Mataico naa Paw , aparuh teitah tuapaw a hmuhpaw taco longmai a ca pae he a .
40006007	Taico thlaw naa chang tihtah lawki cawngsaw sahlo hratah naa rei ciapaw duitei rei cakhawng leimei thlang khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo taco bia hlupui kaa reinah cawtah hei thuipah kaa cang peh tatah aa rawh kho .
40006008	Aaning hratah cang khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah naa Paw taco naa hiapaw khah naa hae hlai taitah a hni thlang kho .
40006009	Macawtaco thlaw naa chang tihtah ma hrahei chang my lo , ‘ Kaa Paw vaicung leteipaw , Na ming cawh cizaw tah ung ky seh .
40006010	Na painah tlung ky seh . Vaicung letah na dupaw aa tuapaw hratah , alui lehei tua hrah he seh .
40006011	Ningting kaa hiapaw batui ma pei my lo ,
40006012	kaa cung letei chahlynah a tuapaw cawngsaw sahlo kaa ngethai pawhe hratah , kaa chahlynah ma ngethai hrah my lo .
40006013	Tuhsonah lang a ma chui kheh la , mehchaw lypaw taitah ma pachah hri my lo . ’
40006014	Naa cung letah chahlynah a tuapaw cawngsaw sahlo khah naa ngethai caco he , naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah a ca ngethai hra he a .
40006015	Canghrasala , cawngsaw aa suanah khah naa ngethai ly caco he , naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah naa suanah khah ca ngethai hrá bei he .
40006016	Batui naa cahe tihtah cungmai raipha sahlo tei mehmechiá tah a ung sahpaw he hratah ung khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh batui kaa cahepaw ma hnih naa he seh tatah aa mehme a chiasahpaw a cang he kho . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , aaning sahlo cawh aa longmai khah a tling teitah aa hmuh thah kho .
40006017	Canghrasala batui naa cahe tihtah naa lu letah sathy a thu la , naa hme a pahleh my lo ,
40006018	maco cawngsaw tah batui naa cahepaw ca bi be ca he ka , hmuh khy lypaw naa Paw suitei tah a ca bi he a , taico aparuh teitah tuapaw a hmuhpaw naa Paw taco longmai a ca pae he a .
40006019	Luichaw le carih tei aa e khynah le mehru tah aparuh teitah a nae tah aa ruh khynah hminghmaw a cangpaw alui lehei naa cho pacung khe o .
40006020	Luichaw le carih tei aa e khy lynah hming le mehru tah hawhthlah tei aa ruh khylynah hming vaicung letah naa chosung cawh pacung hri my lo .
40006021	Zecawtamaw tatah naa chosung a ungnah letah naa lungthing a ung hrá a .
40006022	Meh heh pung cawtah me-ing a cang . Na meh a chah caco , na pungpaluh cawh khainá tah a chih a .
40006023	Canghrasala na meh a chah ly caco , na pungpaluh cawh muiná tah a chih a . Mataico na chung letei khainah cawh a mui caco , na cawtah zetluh a zingkalupaw maw a cang a .
40006024	Aho tahmai abui pahning aa rai hre khy be . Pakheh a hua a ka , pakheh a do a , a cang ly leh pakheh cung letah zingchui tah ung a ka , pakheh khah zetah rei a be . Khazing rai kha , tangka rai kha , hre pakong khy bei ceh .
40006025	Macawtaco ka ca ching he , naa hringnah cawtah zemaw kaa e kaa ding a , a cang ly leh naa pung cawtah a buh a sai ruapaw kong letah naa lung reithui kheh seh . Hringnah heh e le ba navy tah sungnaw vy ka , pung heh chaichi navy tah sungnaw vy bei maw ?
40006026	Avai letei a zythipaw pavaw sahlo kheh mingtua hmai o . Thleci cing bei he , saze hre hrah bei he , apaang letah rai hrah bei he . Ma cawh naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah a cong thlang he . Naaning cawh pavaw navy tah a sungnaw vypaw cang bei he ceh maw ?
40006027	Naa hrong letah ahomaw a lung reithuinah rawng tah a hringnah cai suimehlang pakheh chang a chahchi khy ?
40006028	Taico zecawtamaw chaichi kong letah naa lung rei a thui ? Alui letei a cypaw lili pangpa sahlo kheh mingtua o . Rai hre bei he , chaichi a taw bei he .
40006029	Canghrasala ka ca ching he , siangpahrang Solomon hmai ma tluá khei a laisui thlang naná teitah ma pangpa sahlo letei kung kheh tlua khei hmai pasang cang be .
40006030	Vy naaning zingnah a cawngpaw sahlo , atoning ka cy katei , ningthlamong me lang aa bo thlangpaw araang hmai a pasangpaw Khazing taco naaning cawh pasang lytah maw a ca ung he a ?
40006031	Macawtaco , ‘ Zemaw kaa e a , zemaw kaa ding a , zemaw ka hrei he peh ? ’ tatah naa lung reithui kheh seh .
40006032	Zecawtamaw tatah ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh lawki cawngsaw sahlo zong tah aa hui teipaw cang hrah ka , naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah naa hiapaw khah a hni thlang .
40006033	Ma navy co a painah le a dingnah tukhah hui taw la , ma hming vytei zong heh peh na cang thlang a he ceh .
40006034	Macawtaco ningthlamong kong letah naa lung reithui kheh seh , zecawtamaw tatah ningthlamong taco , ama a kong letah ama teitah a lung rei a thui thlang hrá a . Ningkheh cy tahei azaw pawtah lung reithuinah aa chuakhui hrah .
40007001	Male bia na cepah caco he nama zong biace pah na cang hrá a .
40007002	Zecawtamaw tatah male bia na cepah pawtei he hrakhei nama zong biace pah cang a ceh ka , na hmangpaw nehnah pawtei khei aa ca neh pah kaw hrá a .
40007003	Nama na mehkho letei thingphae khah pacang taw lytah na unypaw a mehkho letei thingpatlaw khah zecawtamaw na mingpah ?
40007004	Nama na mehkho letah thingphae a hmuh tlung lytah zekhatamaw na unypaw cawh , ‘ Na mehbang khah ca tho pá neh , ’ na tah khy ?
40007005	Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naaning naa mehkho letei thingphae khah thohly taw la , taico naa unypaw a mehkho letei mehbang cawh tho pá pawtah a sepaw teitah naa hmuh khy a .
40007006	A pathaipaw hming cawh ui pei khe o . Naa lungva khah voh hmekaw letah va khe o . Ma hratei naa tua caco , aa phe tah tlaichai a he ka , naaning laky khah aa ca ty he a .
40007007	Hae la , peh na cang a he ceh , hui la , naa hmuh a , khong la , ingkaw hongpah na cang a he ceh .
40007008	Zemaw tahpaw co , ahohmai a haepaw maikaw cawh peh cang a he ka , a huipaw taco hmuh a ka , ingkaw a khawngpaw cawh hongpah a cang a .
40007009	A sawcapaw tah very hae seh la , alung a peipaw naa ung he ceh maw ?
40007010	A cang ly leh ngaw hae seh la , pari a peipaw a ung he maw ?
40007011	Naaning mehchawly tahmai tah naa sawtei leh khah hmingchaw peh zia naa hni caco , vaicung letei naa Paw tah Ama a haepaw sahlo cawh hming chawpaw khah zetlua tamaw a peh vy chichi he a !
40007012	Macawtaco zezongpui letah ming hringpaw tah na cung letah tua he seh tah na dupaw hrakhei male cung letah va tua my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ma heh phungbia le Khazing khuavang sahlo tei aa rei dupaw cawh a cang hi .
40007013	Hawkaw a bawpaw lang tah a nae my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah a kypaw hawkaw le a kypaw langpui cawh rorangnah lang a chuipaw cang ka , ming hlupui cawh ma lang co a nae tei he .
40007014	Canghrasala , a chiapaw hawkaw le a bawpaw langpui cawh hringnah lang a chuipaw cang ka , cawngsaw a cawngtei suipaw tah ma cawh aa hmuh .
40007015	Khuavang pakheipaw sahlo taikhei a raering my lo . Tu pho a buá tah naaning kha a vong he a , canghrasala aa chunglang co chahnia a hrang ngeteipaw a cang he kho .
40007016	Aa thuisu khei aaning sahlo cawh naa bi thlang he a . Cawngsaw tah misur thui khah ahling kung taitah le thuiku khah zara kung taitah aa lo tei maw ?
40007017	Ma hraco thingkung a chawpaw maikaw taco thuichaw thui he ka , canghrasala thingkung a chiapaw maikaw taco , thuichia a thui he .
40007018	Achawpaw thingkung taco thuichia thui khy be ca ka , a chiapaw thingkung zong tah thuichaw thui khy hrah be .
40007019	Thui chaw a thui lypaw thingkung maikaw cawh hyhly tah me lang bo a cang he a .
40007020	Ma hrahei aa thuisu tah aaning sahlo cawh naa bi thlang he a .
40007021	‘ Abuipaw , Abuipaw , ’ a pa tahpaw maikaw aa zongmingtei tah vaicung painah raang letah a nae a bei he , ka Paw vaicung leteipaw a dunah a tuapaw cawngsaw suipaw a nae a .
40007022	Ma ning leco ming hlupui tah , ‘ Abuipaw , Abuipaw , na ming tah biaphy he peh ka , na ming tah khachia papia he peh ka , ningang chuipaw hlupui tua bei peh maw ? ’ aa pa tah tae a .
40007023	Ma tih taco aaning sahlo cawh , ‘ Naaning hming chahly a tuapaw sahlo ca hnih bei he neh , ka kae taitah seihly o ! ’ tatah a sepaw tah ka tah he a .
40007024	Macawtaco ma ka reipaw bia sahlo heh thui katei , a zuipaw cawngsaw maikaw cawh alung cung letah a cy pui tah a ing a sahpaw mehsing khatah a lo he .
40007025	Khua va so , tui va lai , thli a va hrang ka , ma ing cawh a nang tihtah po khy be , zecawtamaw tatah alung cung letah a cy pui tah sahpaw a cangnah cawtah .
40007026	Canghrasala ma ka reipaw bia sahlo heh thui katei , a zui lypaw cawngsaw maikaw cawh sadi cung letah a ing a sahpaw mehruh khatah a lo he .
40007027	Khua va so , tui va lai , thli a va hrang ka , ma ing cawh a nang tihtah pohly ka , a rawh ceh ceh , ” a tah he .
40007028	Zisu tah ma hming sahlo heh a rei thlu tihtah mingzawpui cawh a cawngpahnah cawh aa khuarawh a haa thlang .
40007029	Zecawtamaw tatah phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo hratah cang lytah naw a hnuitu hratah a cawngpah caw he tah a cang .
40008001	Tlangpa lang khei a za cung tihtah cawngsaw rungpui takhei aa zui .
40008002	Thinghmuihri a ingpaw cawngsaw pakheh cawh a vong ka , a hme letah a khuh panai ka , “ Abuipaw , na du caco na pa dangsah khy thlang , ” tatah a tah .
40008003	Zisu taco a kiá tah pazah ka , ma cawngsawpaw cawh va tong ka , “ Na dang cawh du neh ka , dang myca , ” tatah a tah . Ma cangkaw leco , a thinghmuihri vytei cawh a pathai .
40008004	Taico Zisu tah , “ Ahohmai ching khe lo . Ma duitei cawh va sei la , tlangbui a va ming sá la , Moses phungbia hrakhei thuihlainah va tua , ma paw suico dangsah na cangpaw khah ming maikaw tah aa ca hni a , ” tatah a tah .
40008005	Zisu cawh Kapernaum khua a nae tihtah raekeh zakheh buipaw cawh Ama kha a vong ka , bawnah a va hae .
40008006	“ Abuipaw , ka saecapaw song ka , taithui ngetei tah ing letah a lia thlang , ” tatah a tah .
40008007	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ A vong neh ka , ka dang sá a , ” tatah a tah .
40008008	Raekeh zakheh buipaw taco , “ Abuipaw ka ing heh nama na naenah tlangpaw cang be . Canghrasala bia kawkheh teitah na rei caco , ka saecapaw cawh a dang thlang a .
40008009	Kama zong nawhnuinah rai letah a ungpaw cang neh ka , ka rai letah raekeh sahlo a ung hrah he . Pakheh cawh , ‘ Sei , ’ tah neh ka , sei ka , pakheh cawh , ‘ A vong , ’ tah neh ka , a vong . Ka saecapaw cawh , ‘ Ma heh tua , ’ tah neh ka , a tua thlang , ” tatah a palei .
40008010	Zisu tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a ningang ka , Ama a zuipaw sahlo aa hai leco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma hapaw zingnah alaipaw a hnuipaw cawngsaw heh Israel mingphing chung letah pakheh hmai hmuh bang bei neh .
40008011	Ka ca ching he hi , nichua nitlah taitah cawngsaw hlupui a vong a he ka , vaicung painah raang letei lawhdangnah cabuai leco Abraham , Isak le Jakob khatah a ty hrui he a .
40008012	Canghrasala vaicung painah raang letah a ung ruapaw sahlo tukhah alailang muinah chunglang , caw le hawria tah ungnah hminghmaw lekhei vathlang a cang tae he a , ” tatah a tah .
40008013	Mataico Zisu tah raekeh zakheh buipaw cawh , “ Va sei thlang ! A cang a , tatah na zingpaw hratah tua a cang thlang a , ” tatah a tah . Taico ma suimehlang cai lalei leco a saecapaw cawh a dang palang .
40008014	Zisu cawh Piter a ing chunglang a za nae tihtah asaw tah nang katei , lakhing letah a lia thlangpaw Piter a nupuino a no khah a hmuh .
40008015	A kih cawh va hre ka , asawnah taco a thlaw . Mataico ka tho ka , Zisu cawh a tangtui .
40008016	Zailang a va phah tihtah khachia tei a tlepaw he mehlupui cawh Ama khatah va chuakhui he ka , bia tah thlawpaw pialuipaw sahlo cawh tingchua he ka , a sahpaw vytei cawh a dangsah he .
40008017	Ma heh Khazing khuavang Isaiah hmokaw hmang tei reipaw , “ Ama tah kaa danglynah pho ka , ka sawnah he peh khah a seikhui , ” tahpaw bia a tlingnah a cang .
40008018	Zisu taco a kaekang letei mingzawpui sahlo khah a hmuh tih he tah a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ tuiping raechai lang sei he pei , ” tatah a tah he .
40008019	Mataico , phungbia cawngpahtu pakheh Ama khatah a vong ka , “ Cawngpahtu , na seinah maikaw lang ka ca zui a , ” tatah a tah .
40008020	Zisu taco , “ Sihatei sahlo tah kua hnui he ka , pavaw sahlo zong tah bu aa hnui , canghrasala Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tu cawh a lu pahnia nápaw hminghmaw hmai hnui be , ” tatah a palei .
40008021	A hningzuitu ahringpaw taco a hai letah , “ Abuipaw , va sei neh ka , ka paw ka va phung taw a , ” tatah a tah .
40008022	Canghrasala Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Va pa zui thlang , a thipaw cawh mehthi tah phung thlang he seh , ” tatah a ching .
40008023	Mataico tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a nae hrah he ka , a sei he .
40008024	Rawh ly pui tah thlichia cawh tuiping leco a hrang caimang ka , macawtaco tuilawng cawh tuileh tah a bakhu thlu . Canghrasala Zisu cawh a ihning thlang .
40008025	A hningzuitu sahlo taco Ama cawh va patho he ka , “ Abuipaw , ma pachah tua . Tui lang ka tlah thlu he peh hi ! ” tatah aa tah .
40008026	Zisu taco , “ Naaning zingnah a cawngpaw sahlo , zecawtamaw ma reiro co naa ci ? ” tatah a palei he . Mataico katho ka , thli le tuileh cawh a hrangso he ka , tui cawh a cali he .
40008027	Cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa ningang thlang ka , “ Ma heh zehapaw cawngsaw maw a cang ? Thli le tuileh tahmai a bia aa nge thlangpaw heh ! ” tatah aa tah he .
40008028	Zisu cawh tuiping raechai lang tei Gadarin raang khah a va phah tihtah khachia tei a tlepaw he capaw pahning khah thlaikung lang tah va sei he ka , a va tong he . Ma tlaw pahning cawh cichui ngetei he ka , ahohmai ma lang co sei ngang bei he .
40008029	“ Khazing Sawcapaw , kaaning khatah zemaw na dupaw a ung ? Cai thliapaw a tling hlai tahei kaaning hreh ruapaw tamaw ma lehei na va chua ? ” tatah aa y so .
40008030	Aaning taitah a hlah ky lypaw lekhei lawh a e leimeipaw voh rungpui a ung he .
40008031	Khachia sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Na ma papia caco , voh rung aa chunglang a ma naesah ky , ” tatah aa naw .
40008032	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Va sei ca o ! ” tatah a tah he . Macawtaco piathlah he ka , voh sahlo chunglang cawh a nae he . Voh rungpui cawh lungkang cung taitah tuiping lang cawh a zythlah he ka , tui leco a thi thlu he .
40008033	Voh a mingkaitu sahlo cawh va sai he ka , khuapui chunglang cawh a nae he ka , ma kong vytei cawh le khachia tei a tlepaw he pahning cung letah hming a tlungpaw khah aa va ching he .
40008034	Mataico aa zongmingtei co , Zisu a tong rua pawtah aa sei . Aa va hmuh tihtah aa raang taitah piathlah pawtah khei aa naw .
40009001	Zisu cawh tuilawng cung lang ke ka , tuiping raechai lang cawh sei kaw he ka , Ama a khua lang khah a va sei .
40009002	Mehthaikheh sahlo takhei a songbepaw cawngsaw khah iphaw letah a lia thlang hmo khei Ama khatah aa va chuakhui . Zisu tah aa zingnah khah a hmuh tihtah a songbepaw hai leco , “ Ka dua , na thlawlung seh , na suanah vytei cawh ngethai a cang , ” tatah a tah .
40009003	Ma tih taco phungbia cawngpahtu thaikhehpaw sahlo tah aaning le aaning cawh , “ Mapaw tahei Khazing a reipachia , ” tatah aa tah he .
40009004	Aa rawhnah khah a hni thah cawtah khei Zisu tah , “ Zecawtamaw naa lungchung tah rawhnah achaw lypaw cawh naa pacang ?
40009005	‘ Na suanah sahlo cawh ngethai a cang , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy ? ‘ Tho la , sei , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy ?
40009006	Canghrasala , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh aluicung letah sua ngethainah naw a hnui taheh ka ca hmuh sá he a , ” tah ka , taico a songbepaw hai leco , “ Tho , na phia a lah la , ing lang a dih , ” tatah a tah .
40009007	Taico cawngsawpaw cawh tho ka , ing lang cawh a dih .
40009008	Cawngsaw zawpui tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ningang ngetei ka , ma hapaw nawhnuinah cawngsaw sahlo khatah a peitu Khazing khah aa reithai .
40009009	Zisu cawh mataico seihly ka , ngungkhui kheinah hming letah a tythlangpaw cawngsaw Mathai aa tahpaw khah hmuh ka , “ Va pa zui , ” tatah tah ka , Mathai cawh tho ka , Ama cawh a zui .
40009010	Zisu cawh Mathai a ing letei zairia batui a e leimei ning takhei ngungkhui kheitu mehlupui le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo cawh a vong he ka , Ama le a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei aa va e hrah .
40009011	Farasi sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Zecawtamaw naa cawngpahtu heh mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo khatah batui a e hrui ? ” tatah aa hae he .
40009012	Zisu tah ma bia cawh thui ka , “ A dang thlangpaw taco Sibui aa hia tlung be , a dang lypaw tah pui aa hia .
40009013	Va sei la , ‘ Kama ka dupaw cawh athuihlainah cang lytah zawngenah a cang , ’ tahpaw a silang heh va cawng taw o . Zecawtamaw tatah Kama cawh mehding y rua pawtah ka vong tlung be , mehsua sahlo y rua pawtah ka vong hri hi , ” tatah a tah he .
40009014	Mataico , baptisma peitu Johan a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a vong he ka , Zisu khah , “ Kaaning sahlo le Farasi sahlo tah batui cahe he peh ka , nama na hningzuitu sahlo tahei zecawtamaw a cahe bei he ? ” tatah aa hae .
40009015	Zisu taco , “ Sawngpaw sahlo cawh nupui a chuipaw satlepaw khatah aa ung chung taco zecawtamaw ngechia tah aa ung a ? Nupui a chuipaw satlepaw cawh aaning sahlo taitah lahnah cai a va phah tae a . Mataico batui a cahe tae thlang he a .
40009016	Ahotahmai tah paithang a thapaw tah chaichi a paringpaw khah a beithlah bang bei he , zecawtamaw tatah aa thlahpaw paithang takhei angki khah hruipako a ka , a kychy vy tima a .
40009017	Misurhang a hringtui khah sapho tuithei a paringpaw letah rai bang hrah bei he . Aa rai caco , sapho tuithei khah tingchy a ka , misurhang cawh a zuh thlu a , sapho tuithei zong a rawh thlu a . Misurhang a hringtui cawh sapho tuithei a thapaw letah rai he ka , aa sanghning tah a bing he , ” tatah a tah .
40009018	Ma bia a rei chung taco uhtu bui pakheh a vong ka , a hme letah a khuh panai ka , “ Ka sawcanu cawh atotei khah a thi . Canghrasala a vong tei , a cung letah na kih na pahnia caco , a hring kaw thlang a , ” tatah a naw .
40009019	Zisu cawh a daw ka , Ama khaco sei he ka , a hningzuitu sahlo zong a sei hrah he .
40009020	Ma leco canu pakheh kung hrawhluihning chung a thi a chuh no cawh Zisu a hninglang tah a vong ka , a pai dong cawh a va tong .
40009021	Ama le ama cawh , “ A pai dong tei chang ka tong caco ka dang a , ” tatah a tah .
40009022	Zisu cawh a va paleh ka , ma canuno cawh a hmuh . “ Ka sawcanu na thlawlung seh . Na zingnah tah a ca dangsah , ” tatah a tah . Taico sungkheh teitah ma canuno cawh a dang .
40009023	Zisu cawh uhtubui a ing chunglang khah a nae ka , phipahli a tungpaw sahlo le naw a cheh thlangpaw he zawpuipaw khah a hmuh tih he tah ,
40009024	“ Piahly tua o . Nyheh no heh a thih tlung be , a ihning thlang hi ! ” tatah a tah he . Canghrasala , Ama cawh aa hnuiso .
40009025	Zawpuipaw cawh khunglai lang aa piahly khy taitah inahkhang chunglang cawh a nae ka , nyheh no cawh a kiá tah tle ka , a ka tho .
40009026	Ma thongpang cawh ma raang chung vytei lekhei a thang thlu .
40009027	Zisu cawh mataico piathlah ka , mehcopaw pahning takhei zuilai he ka , “ David Pathlah ning ma do ky law , ” tatah a y he .
40009028	Zisu cawh ing chunglang a za nae thlah tihtah mehcopaw pahning cawh Ama khaco a vong he . Zisu taco , “ Naa meh khua ka hmuhsah khy kaw a tatah naa zing maw ? ” tatah a hae he . “ Abuipaw , kaa zing , ” tatah aa palei .
40009029	Mataico aa mehkho cawh tongpah he ka , “ Naa zingnah hratah naa cung letah tlung ky seh , ” tah he ka ,
40009030	aa mehcawh khua a hmuh khy kaw . Zisu taco aaning cawh , “ Ahohmai hnisah khe lo , ” tatah cyky tah bia a patai he .
40009031	Canghrasala , seihly he ka , Zisu kong thongpang cawh ma raang chung vytei lekhei tlang aa zang lai .
40009032	Cawngsaw sahlo aa piahly chung takhei , khachia tah tle katei bia a rei khy lypaw cawngsaw pakheh khah Zisu khaco aa va chuakhui .
40009033	Taico , khachia cawh a papiapah tihtah a rei a thlaw thai lypaw cawngsaw cawh a rei a ka thlaw khy . Cawngsaw zawpui cawh aa ningang ka , “ Ma hapaw hming heh Israel mingphing chung letah hmuh bang bei peh , ” tatah aa tah .
40009034	Canghrasala , Farasi sahlo taco , “ Khachia sahlo buipaw thongtah khachia sahlo a papiapaw a cang , ” tatah aa tah .
40009035	Zisu cawh khuapui vytei le khuatei vytei khah cahrong lai ka , synagog lekhei a cawngpah lai he . Vaicung painah raang kong thawngchawbia khah reilai ka , asawnah le danglynah maikaw khah a dangsah lai he .
40009036	Cawngsaw zawpui khah a hmuh tih he tah ning a do ngetei he , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh lung reithui le vaisang pazá tah kingtu a hnui lypaw tuu hratah aa cangnah cawtah khei a cang .
40009037	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Saze hre ruapaw hlu ngetei ka , canghrasala , raihretu cawh a cawngtei he .
40009038	Macawtaco , saze lui a hnuitu Abuipaw cawh raihretu sahlo khah saze lui lang taw rua pawtah hae my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
40010001	Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah Ama khatah y he ka , thlawpaw pialuipaw papia khynah nawhnuinah le asawnah a phingphing le danglynah dangsah khynah nawhnuinah khah a peh he .
40010002	Ma sahlo heh apostol pahrawhluihning aa ming cawh a cang . A pakhehnah letah Simon ( Piter tatah aa y teipaw ) le a unypaw Andru , Zebedi a sawcapaw Jeims le a unypaw Johan ,
40010003	Filip le Barthalomeo , Thomas le ngungkhui kheitu Mathai , Alfas a sawcapaw Jeims le Thadia ,
40010004	ci le phing a dawkhuipaw Simon le Zisu a luitupaw Judas Iskariot a cang he .
40010005	Ma apostol pahrawhluihning heh Zisu tah bia patai he ka , a taw he . “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo hrong letah va sei khe la , Samaria cawngsaw aa khua lang a nae khe lo .
40010006	A lypaw tuu a cangpaw Israel mingphing khatah va sei hri my lo .
40010007	Naa seinah letah ma bia heh va ching my lo , ‘ Vaicung painah raang cawh a ne myca , ’ tahpaw heh .
40010008	A sahpaw dang sá la , mehthi va patho la , mehthinghmui va pathai sá la , khachia va papia my lo . Amai lytah naa hmuhpaw heh a mai lytah va pei hrah my lo .
40010009	Naa sahre letah sui maw , ngung maw , thihring maw a cakai khe lo ,
40010010	khuatlongnah cawtah sahre , a hluipaw chaichi , phepakong , cungcahrei tahpaw a cakai khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah raihretu cawh a e tlang a cang .
40010011	Khuapui maw , khuatei maw na naenah maikaw lehe ceh tah tlung tlang a cangpaw cawngsaw khah pakhia la , a ing leco naa seithlah kawnah tai va tlung my lo .
40010012	A ing lang na nae tih he ceh tah naa cung letah denah ung ky seh tatah tah my lo .
40010013	Ingtlung aa ca pa-awng caco he , naa bonghnang cawh ma ing leco ung my seh lo . Ma hratei a cang ly caco naa bonghnang cawh naaning khatah va kaw kaw my seh lo .
40010014	Pakheh kheh tah aa ca cyhlang du ly caco he le , a cang ly leh naa bia aa nge du ly caco , ma ing , a cang ly leh ma khua cawh naa piasai tihtah naa phe letei luipadih khah cathingthlah si my lo .
40010015	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , biacenah ning letah ma khua navy co Sodom le Gomora khuapui tai-ingnah hmai khah a zia a ung vy a .
40010016	Naaning sahlo cawh chahnia hrong letei tuu sahlo hratah ka ca taw he . Macawtaco pari sahlo hratah singvang la , thury sahlo hratah naa ningnai my seh lo .
40010017	A ca dypaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a va raering ngetei my lo . Aaning sahlo taco biacetu sahlo khatah ca chuakhui he ka , aa synagog letah aa ca chei he a .
40010018	Kama ka rawng tah naaning sahlo cawh uhtu bui sahlo hme le siangpahrang sahlo hme lekhei chuakhui cang a he ceh ka , aaning sahlo khatah le Gental mingphing sahlo khakhei biahnihtu naa cangnah khah naa rei a .
40010019	Canghrasala aa ca tle tih he tah zemaw kaa rei a , zekhatamaw kaa rei a tahpaw kong letah naa thlawzawng kheh seh . Ma cai leco rei ruapaw cawh peh na cang thlang he ceh .
40010020	Zecawtamaw tatah a reipaw cawh naaning cang bei ceh . Naa Paw a Thlawpaw tah naaning hmang tah a rei hri a .
40010021	Uny le uny , paw le saw sahlo cawh thihnah tai a luithae he a . Sawtei leh tah no le paw khah thihnah tai aa dy he a .
40010022	Kama ka rawng tah cawngsaw vytei tah aa ca hua he a , canghrasala zingnah letah a changnah tai cyky tah a dawpaw cawngsaw cawh pachah a cang a .
40010023	Hmingkheh letah hreh naa cang caco , ahringpaw hming lang sai my lo . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong hlai tahei Israel raang letei khua vytei naa tlawngpaw heh paling balang bei ceh .
40010024	Singnah a cawngpaw cawh a cawngpahtu navy tah a sang vy be ca ka , sae zong a buipaw cung letah ung hrah be .
40010025	A cawngpaw tah a cawngpahtu hratah a cang le sae tah a buipaw hratah a cang cawh a zaw thlang . Ing letei lu a cangpaw hmai Belzabub tatah y a cang caco , a ingchungkho cawngsaw sahlo cawh zetlua tamaw y aa cang chichi a !
40010026	Macawtaco aaning sahlo cawh ci khe lo . No thlangpaw hming maikaw palang cang a he ka , biaparuh zong phy a cang he a .
40010027	A muinah letah ka ca chingpaw he heh a khainah letah reipaw a cang , naa naw letei biaparuh reipaw khah ing tlungkhu taitah y khuipaw a cang .
40010028	Thlawpaw a theh khy lypaw , pung a theh khypaw sahlo khah ci khe lo . Ma navy co hraihming letah pung kha , thlawpaw kha a rawhrang khypaw Khazing tukhah ci hri my lo .
40010029	Baibaw pavaw punghning khah tangka phaesai phaekheh tah zua bei he maw ? Naa Paw a rei ly co , ma baibaw pavaw sahlo letei pungkheh hmai khah alui letah tlá be .
40010030	Taico naa lu cung letei sangbu sahlo hmai khah reithlu a cang he kho .
40010031	Macawtaco ci khe o , naaning cawh baibaw pavaw sahlo navy tah na sungnaw vy he ceh .
40010032	Cawngsaw hme letah Kama a pacang khuipaw cawh ka Paw vaicung leteipaw hme letah ka cang khui hrá a .
40010033	Canghrasala , cawngsaw hme letei Kama a pa paphah saipaw cawngsaw cawh ka Paw vaicung leteipaw hme letah ka paphah sai hrá a .
40010034	Alui letah denah chuasah rua pawtah a vong tatah parawh khe lo . Denah chuasah rua pawtah a vong bei neh , zyzi chuasah rua pawtah ka vong hri hi .
40010035	Ka vong hnohnangpaw cawh sawcapaw tah a paw , sawcanu tah a no , myno tah a pasaepaw a no , a dy sá pawtah cang ka ,
40010036	cawngsaw a carae cawh ama a ingchungkho cawngsaw lilaw khah a cang a .
40010037	Kama navy tah a paw maw , a no maw , a do vypaw cawh kama ka cawtah a tlah be , kama navy tah a sawcapaw maw , a sawcanu maw a do vypaw cawngsaw cawh kama ka cawtah a tlah be ca ka ,
40010038	taico ma leh khraws a puá tah a pa zui lypaw cawh kama ka cawtah a tlah be .
40010039	A hringnah pachah a dupaw cawngsaw taco a hringnah sung a ka , Kama ka caw tei a hringnah a sungpaw cawngsaw taco a hringnah a hmuh a .
40010040	Naaning a ca cyhlangpaw he cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw cang ka , kama a pa cyhlangpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang .
40010041	Khazing khuavang a cang rawng tei Khazing khuavang a cyhlangpaw taco Khazing khuavangpaw a longmai khah cy a ka , mehding a cang rawng tei mehdingpaw a cyhlangpaw cawngsaw taco mehdingpaw a longmai khah a cy a .
40010042	Taico ma nyhehtei sahlo letei pakheh hmai heh Kama ka hningzuitu a cang rawng tei pakheh kheh tah tui cakaw ny kheh tei hmai a peh caco , biahmuisui ka ca ching he , a longmai cawh hmuh lytah ung hrahring a be , ” tatah a tah he .
40011001	Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning bia a chingpaw he khah a pachang tihtah Galili khuapui sahlo lang khah cawngpah pawtah le phungrei laipaw tah a sei .
40011002	Khri a tuasenah khah Johan tah thong chung taitah a thui tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo khah taw he ka ,
40011003	“ Nama heh a vong lepaw cawh na cang maw , a cang ly leh ahringpaw maw kaa haw a ? ” tatah a va haesah he .
40011004	Zisu taco , “ Va sei kaw la , naa hmuhpaw le naa thuipaw heh Johan cawh va ching la ,
40011005	mehcopaw tah khua aa hmuh , a songbepaw zong lang a sei he , thinghmuihri a ingpaw sahlo zong dang he ka , a nawpangpaw sahlo tah khua aa thui . A thipaw zong tho kaw he ka , mehsisah zong tah thawngchawbia aa thui myca .
40011006	Kama ka kong letah lung langlo tah a ung lypaw cawngsaw cawh bonghnang a ting , ” tatah a palei he .
40011007	Johan a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa piahly tihtah Zisu tah zawpui hai leco Johan konglang khah a ching he . “ Ze ming ruapaw tamaw raangcaa lang naa sei ? Thli tei a taikalypaw tuiphi kung hapaw cawngsaw ming ruapaw tamaw ?
40011008	Ma hratei a cang ly caco ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei ? Chaichi chaw a tuapaw cawngsaw ming ruapaw tamaw ? Chaichi chaw a tuapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh siangpahrang ing sahlo letah pui aa ung ky caw !
40011009	Ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei ? Khazing khuavang ming ruapaw tamaw ? A cang , Khazing khuavang navy tah alai vypaw kong ka ca ching he .
40011010	Ma heh Khazing bia letei ciapaw Ama a kong cawh a cang , ‘ Ka tlang ypaw cawh na hmelang ka taw a , na hme letei na langpui a parai ruapaw tah ! ’
40011011	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , canu tei sahpaw saw leco baptisma peitu Johan navy tah alai vypaw ahohmai ung bei he , canghrasala vaicung painah raang letei a chia caipaw hmai heh Johan navy tah a lai vy .
40011012	Baptisma peitu Johan taitah ato tai lehei vaicung painah raang cawh thaw tah pakhang paduinah a tong ka , canghrasala a du hmuisuipaw taco a nae rary thlang he .
40011013	Khazing khuavang sahlo vytei le phungbia takhei baptisma peitu Johan taikhah aa za reihlangpaw a cang .
40011014	Taico ma bia heh cyhlang naa dupaw tei a cang caco , Johan cawh a vong a tatei tahpaw Elija khah a cang hi .
40011015	Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw tah ma bia heh thui he seh .
40011016	Atochai cawngsaw heh zekhatamaw ka tawching he a ? Aaning sahlo cawh chodo tlang letei a ty thlangpaw nyheh sahlo khatah a lo he ka ,
40011017	‘ Phipahli ca tungpah he peh ka , naa laang tlung be . Mehthi hlawsah he peh ka , naa caw tlung be , ’ tatei aaning leh aaning aa ypaw he nyheh sahlo hratah aa cang .
40011018	Zecawtamaw tatah baptisma peitu Johan cawh e ly ding lytah va chuh ka , ‘ Khachia a hrei , ’ tatah aa tah .
40011019	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong ka , e ka , ding ka , ‘ Ding le e suipaw a pacang , mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo vesaw , ’ tatah naa tah . Canghrasala singnah cawh a hming tuapaw sahlo takhei ahmang takhah a palang , ” a tah he .
40011020	Mataico , Zisu tah ningang chuipaw hming a hlu cai a tuanahpaw khuapui sahlo khah sua a phosah he , zecawtamaw tatah aa suanah a ngepachih lynah caw he tah a cang .
40011021	“ Vy Korazin khua , na cing a ping ! Vy Bethsaida khua , na cing a ping ! Naaning letei tuapaw ningang chuipaw hming khah Tair le Sidon khua letah tuapaw cang he seh la , buri pai a buh a tah mecang letah a ty a he ka , a ngepachih syly tha he a .
40011022	Canghrasala ka ca ching he , biacenah ning leco Tair khua le Sidon khua tei aa ingpaw cawh naaning navy tah a zia a ung vy tae a .
40011023	Taico nama Kapernaum khua , avai tai kheh calia na cang maw ? Cang bei ceh . Khothuhnah lang na tlahthlah a . Nama na chung letei tuapaw ningang chuipaw hming khah Sodom khua letah tuapaw cang my seh la , atoning tai heh a za bing thlang a .
40011024	Canghrasala ka ca ching he , biacenah ning leco nama navy tah Sodom khua cawh a zia a ung vy tae a , ” tatah a tah .
40011025	Ma ningcai leco Zisu tah , “ Ka Paw , alui le avai Buipaw , ka ca reithai , mehthai mehsing sahlo caw taco ma hming sahlo heh nawh ceh ka , nyheh sahlo hapaw khatah na palang .
40011026	A cang , ka Paw , ma cawh nama na lawngnah cawh a cang .
40011027	Hming vytei heh ka Paw tah a pa peh thlu thah he . Paw tah ly co Sawcapaw heh ahotahmai hnih bei he . Paw cawh Sawcapaw le Sawcapaw tei hnisah ruapaw tei a thingpaw he tah ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he .
40011028	Naaning hmingrih a phopaw le a thaw a bangpaw sahlo , kama kha a vong la , a hianah ka ca pae he a .
40011029	Ka suihnang heh law la , a phonah dang cawh kama khatah va cawng la , zecawtamaw tatah kama cawh mehningnai le meh lungthing chaw cang neh ka , naa thlawpaw cawtah a hianah naa hmuh a .
40011030	Zecawtamaw tatah ka suihnang cawh a pho neh ka , ka hming cawh a zang , ” tatah a tah .
40012001	Ma ningcai leco Zisu cawh Sabat ning tah saze lui cahrong ka a sei . A hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa ngai di ka , saangsu cawh pahrih he ka , aa e lai .
40012002	Farasi sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah a hai leco , “ Mingtua , na hningzuitu sahlo tah Sabat ning tah tua phung a cang lypaw aa tuapaw kheh , ” tatah aa tah .
40012003	Zisu taco , “ David tei a vesaw sahlo khatah aa ngai a dining tei a tuapaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
40012004	Khazing behnah ing lang a nae ka , a vesaw sahlo khatah aaning aa e phung a cang lypaw Khazing aa dangnah very khah aa e . Ma very cawh tlangbui a cangpaw longtei tah e phung a cang .
40012005	A cang ly leh behnah ing letei a ungpaw tlangbui sahlo tah Sabat ning aa papia aa palui tihtah sua phosah aa cang lypaw khah phungbia chung letah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
40012006	Behnah ing navy tah alai vypaw ma lehei a ung thlang hi , tahpaw ka ca ching he .
40012007	‘ Kama ka dupaw cawh athuihlainah cang lytah zawngenah a cang , ’ tahpaw bia a silang heh za hnih thah my la , a sua lypaw khah sua naa phosá lypaw he .
40012008	Zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Sabat Buipaw a cang , ” tatah a chai he .
40012009	Ma hming taico va sei vy ka , aa synagog chunglang a nae ka ,
40012010	ma leco a kih rakheh asongpaw cawngsawpaw a ung . Zisu sua pu nápawtah bia hui he ka , a hai letah , “ Sabat ning tei dangsah heh a phung a cang maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
40012011	Aa hai leco , “ Naaning lehei pakheh tah tuu hnui seh la , Sabat ning tah khobatlung lang tlah my seh la , la tah chuahly a bei maw ?
40012012	Cawngsaw cawh tuu navy tah sungnaw vy syly bei maw ! Macawtaco Sabat ning tei hmingchaw tua cawh a phung a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
40012013	Mataico cawngsawpaw cawh , “ Na kih pathlang , ” tah ka , macawtaco a kih cawh pathlang ka , a rakheh lang tei pawtei hrakhei a chah kaw thah .
40012014	Canghrasala Farasi sahlo cawh piahly he ka , Zisu cawh zekhatamaw kaa thaw khy a takhah aparuh teitah aa reisia .
40012015	Ma cawh a hni cawtah Zisu cawh ma hminghmaw taico a zuh thlah . Cawngsaw hlupui tah zui he ka , a sahpaw vytei khah a dangsah he .
40012016	Taico ahomaw ka cang tahpaw khah rei ly pawtah bia a patai he .
40012017	Ma heh Khazing khuavang Isaiah hmokaw hmang tei reipaw ,
40012018	“ Ma heh ka thingpaw ka sae , ka do ngeteipaw , ka lungtlingnah khah a cang . A cung letah ka Thlawpaw cawh chia neh ka , Ama tahei dingnah cawh mingphing sahlo hai letah a y khui a .
40012019	Ama cawh a hrychae be , a cang ly leh ysang be . Langpui sahlo letah a o cawh ahotahmai thui a bei he .
40012020	Dingnah khah tenah tah a cangsah hlai taco , a tleh-pakupaw ngaithli kung khah tlehchung a be ca ka , a kang leimeipaw me thingthu khah chaisé be .
40012021	Mingphing vytei cawh a ming letah hnabeisuinah aa hnui a , ” tahpaw tlingnah khah a cang .
40012022	Mataico khachia tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw , a meh co katei , a rei a thlaw thai lypaw khah Zisu khaco va chuakhui he ka , a dangsah cawtah a rei thlaw khy , khua hmuh khy a tah .
40012023	Cawngsaw vytei cawh aa ningang thlang ka , “ Ma cawngsaw heh David Pathlah a cang khy sua maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
40012024	Canghrasala , Farasi sahlo tah ma cawh aa thui tihtah , “ Khachia sahlo buipaw Belzabub thongtah ma cawngsawpaw tahei khachia sahlo a papia khy he , ” tatah aa tah .
40012025	Zisu tah aa rawhnah khah hnih ka , aa hai letah , “ Ze painah raang hmai , aaning le aaning aa dy caco he a rawh thlu he ka , khuapui maikaw , ingchungkho maikaw aaning leh aaning a rai ly tei , a chaichy caco he a daw khy a bei he .
40012026	Setan tah Setan a papia caco , ama le ama a dy tah a chaichypaw a cang a . Macawtaco a painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a daw khy a ?
40012027	Taico Belzabub thongtah Setan ka tingchua pawtei a cang caco , naaning naa cawngsaw sahlo takhei saw , aho thong tamaw aa tingchua he ? Macawtaco naa cawngsaw sahlo cawh naaning bia a ca cepahtu a cang tae he a .
40012028	Canghrasala khachia sahlo khah Khazing Thlawpaw chawngnah thongtah ka papia pawtei he a cang caco , Khazing painah raang cawh naaning khatah a tlung thah tahnah a cang .
40012029	Ma hlui co , mehthawtlungpaw khah tongchai taw lytah a ing chunglang a nae tah a hnuicho cawh ahomaw a lah pah khy a ? Aa tongchai khy taitah longlong a lah khy a .
40012030	Kama lang a ung lypaw cawh a pa caraepaw cang ka , kama a pa pahmo khui lypaw cawngsaw cawh a thecadapaw a cang .
40012031	Macawtaco ka ca ching he , suanah maikaw le Khazing reipachianah a tuapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh ngethai khy a cang thlang he a , canghrasala Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw sahlo cawh ngethai cang a bei he .
40012032	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a reipachiapaw cawh ngethai khy a cang thlang a . Canghrasala Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw duitei cawh ato cai lehei cang seh , a va chuh lepaw cai letah cang seh ngethai cang a bei he .
40012033	Thingkungpaw cawh a kung a chah caco , a thui cawh a chah thlang a , a cang ly leh a kung a chah ly caco , a thui cawh a chia thlang a , zecawtamaw tatah thingkungpaw cawh a thui tah hni khy a cang .
40012034	Naaning , pari cangmai pathlah sahlo , naaning mehchawly sahlo taco zekhatamaw biachaw cawh naa reithai a ? Lungchung letei a chih hluipaw khah kaw tah a reipaw a cang .
40012035	Mehchaw taco a lung chung letei a pacungpaw a chawpaw taikhei hmingchaw chuasah ka , mehchawly taco a lung chung letei achaw lypaw a pacungpaw taikhei hming chahly a chuasah .
40012036	Canghrasala ka ca ching he , biacenah ning leco mingting maikaw cawh aa rei suapaw bia maikaw khah aa rei pase kaw a .
40012037	Zecawtamaw tatah naa bia lilaw khei thai cang he ceh ka , naa bia lilaw khei sua phosah na cang tae he ceh , ” tatah a tah he .
40012038	Mataico , Farasi thaikhehpaw sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu thaikhehpaw sahlo tah Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu , ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah hmuh kaa du ngetei , ma tuapah tua , ” tatah aa tah .
40012039	Zisu taco , “ Mehchaw ly le a phei a hmangpaw ato chai cawngsaw tahei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah aa pa hae hi ! Canghrasala Khazing khuavang Jonah paching pakhanah tah cy ly co zehmai peh cang a bei he .
40012040	Zecawtamaw tatah , Khazing khuavang Jonah cawh ngapui richung letah ningthung le zaithung chung a ung . Ma hraco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh alui chung letah ningthung le zaithung a ung tae a .
40012041	Nineve khua cawngsaw sahlo cawh ma letei pathlah khahei biacenah letah a daw a he ka , sua aa phosá he a . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing khuavang a phungreinah thong khei , aa suanah a ngepachih thah he , taico atoheh Khazing khuavang Jonah navy tah alai vypaw cawngsaw cawh ma lehei a ung thlang .
40012042	Biacenah ning leco thuilang Abuino Shiba cawh a daw a ka , ato chai cawngsaw sahlo heh thaily a cang sá he a . Zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh Solomon a singnah bia nge rua pawtah alui a changnah taitah va sei a ka , canghrasala atoheh Solomon navy tah a lai vypaw ma lehei a ung thlang .
40012043	Thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh cawngsawpaw chung taitah a ka piathlah tihtah raangcaa raangro lekhei a hianah hminghmaw hui tah a khiakaly ka , hmuh be .
40012044	Mataico , ‘ Ka piasaipaw ing lang khah ka pange kaw thlang a , ’ tatah a tah . Ing cawh a va phah tihtah longkarong tah ung ka , pathai pahling teitah chiapaw a cangpaw khah a hmuh .
40012045	Mataico sei ka , ama navy tah a sua vypaw he ahringpaw thlawpaw a pialuipaw pasarih khah va chui he ka , ma ing cawh aa pahrang . Taico , ma cawngsawpaw cawh athoning tei navy khei a hning tei a daw hming cawh a pazua vy syly . Ma hraco atochai mehchawly pathlah sahlo heh aa cang tae a , ” tatah a chai he .
40012046	Zisu cawh zawpuipaw khatah bia a rei chung taco , a no le a uny sahlo cawh khunglai lang letah bia a ching du takhei a daw thlang he .
40012047	Cawngsaw pakheh tah , “ Na no le na uny sahlo tah bia a ching ca du he ka , khunglai lang letah a daw thlang he , ” tatah aa ching .
40012048	Zisu tah ma bia a va chingpaw cawh , “ Ka no cawh ahomaw ? Ka uny cawh aho sahlo he maw ? ” tatah a palei .
40012049	A hningzuitu sahlo khah a kihdong tah so he ka , “ Ma sahlo heh ka no le ka uny cawh a cang he hi .
40012050	Ka Paw vaicung leteipaw a dunah a tuapaw maikaw cawh ka uny , ka satei le ka no a cang he , ” tatah aa hai leco a tah .
40013001	Ma ning leco Zisu cawh ing taitah piathlah ka , tuiping kae letah a va ty .
40013002	Cawngsaw rungpui tah aa cadung thlangnah cawtah tuilawng chunglang a nae ka , cawngsaw vytei cawh tuiping ngaekang letah a daw thlang chung he takhei tuilawng chung leco a ty thlang .
40013003	Mataico , aaning sahlo cawh tawchingnah bia a hlupui khah ching he ka , a reipaw cawh , “ Ly a tuapaw pakheh cawh thleci va pawtah a ly lang a sei .
40013004	Thleci a va leimei ning takhei a chy cawh lang kae letah tlah ka , pavaw sahlo tah a va zy he ka , aa khi thlu thah he .
40013005	A chy cawh alui a pawnah lungda letah tlah he ka , alui apawnah cawtah sungkheh teitah a ka cy .
40013006	Canghrasala , ning va tha ka , a ai tih he tah aa thahrang aa thlah lynah cawtah a ro palang thah he .
40013007	A chy cawh ahling hrong letah tlah he ka , ahling cawh ka chang ka , a diseh thlu thah he .
40013008	A chy cawh alui a chahnah letah tlah he ka , a leh songthung , a leh songruh , a leh zakheh tah a vui he .
40013009	Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw taco ma bia heh thui he seh , ” tatah a tah .
40013010	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh Ama khatah a vong he ka , “ Zecawtamaw zawpuipaw cawh tawchingnah bia tah na ching he ? ” tatah aa hae .
40013011	Zisu taco , “ Naaning cawh vaicung painah biaparuh hnikhynah khah peh na cang thah he ceh , canghrasala aaning sahlo cawh peh cang bei he .
40013012	A hnuipaw cawh peh vy a cang a . A hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw hmai khah lah pah kaw a cang a .
40013013	Ma heh tawchingnah bia ka chinghnangnah pawhe cawh a cang , ‘ Aa ming thlang naná teitah hmuh bei he , aa thui thlang naná teitah hnih thai bei he . ’
40013014	Khazing khuavang Isaiah a za reihlangpaw bia tlingnah cawh aaning sahlo heh a cang he . ‘ Naa thui leimei thlang a , canghrasala naa lunghaa be . Naa ming leimei thlang a , canghrasala hnih a bei ceh .
40013015	Zecawtamaw tatah ma cawngsaw sahlo aa lungthing cawh a ku a chaw . Aa naw papang he ka , aa meh a paco he . Ma taco cang lytah ung my he seh la caw , aa me tah hmuh a he ka , aa naw tah thui ka , aa lungthing tah hnih a he ka , kama lang a va paleh he ka , ka dangsah thá he , ’ tatah a tah .
40013016	Canghrasala naaning naa meh le naa naw cawh bonghnang aa ting , zecawtamaw tatah khua hmuh he ka , khua aa thui .
40013017	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing khuavang a hlupui le mehding sahlo tah naa hmuhpaw heh hmuh aa du ngetei tei hrah naná teitah za hmuh be ca he ka , naa thuipaw heh thui aa du ngetei tei hrah naná teitah za thui bei he .
40013018	Thleci a vapaw tawchingnah bia a silang heh ngetua o :
40013019	Pakheh kheh tah vaicung painah raang kong thawngchaw khah thui ka , canghrasala a lunghaa be , mehchaw lypaw a vong ka , a lungchung letei vapaw thleci cawh a lah pah hly thlu . Ma heh langkae letei a tlahpaw thleci silang cawh a cang .
40013020	Lungda cung letei a tlahpaw thleci cawh Khazing bia a thui cangkawleh lunglawng teitah a cyhlangpaw cawngsaw khah a cang .
40013021	Canghrasala thahrang a thlah ly cawtah khua sy parui bei he . Khazing bia rawng taco ruhanah le hrehnah a chua tihtah a pohly palang .
40013022	Ahling hrong letei a tlahpaw thleci cawh Khazing bia cawh thui thlang ka , canghrasala ma khazaw lung reithuinah le hnuirung dunah takhei thawngchawbia khah pazai thah ka , a thui a thuisah khy lypaw cawngsaw khah a cang .
40013023	Canghrasala alui a chahnah letei a tlahpaw thleci cawh Khazing bia thui katei , a hnih thaipaw cawngsaw khah a cang . Thui hnui ka , a leh songthung , a leh songruh , a leh zakheh tah a vui , ” tatah a palei he .
40013024	Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh tawchingnah bia ahringpaw a ching vy he . “ Vaicung painah raang cawh a ly letei thleci chaw a vapaw cawngsawpaw khatah a lo .
40013025	Canghrasala ming vytei aa ihning kaa letah a caraepaw cawh a vong ka , changvuh hrong leco lybei cawh va ka , a seihly kaw .
40013026	Changvuh cawh ka cy ka , a hmo a pava tihtah lybei zong cawh a ka lang hrah .
40013027	Ly a hnuipaw a sae sahlo cawh a vong he ka , ‘ Abuipaw , na ly lekhei thleci chaw va bei ceh maw ? Zelang tamaw lybei aa va ung he ? ’ tatah aa tah .
40013028	‘ Caraepaw tah aa tuapaw a cang , ’ tatah a palei he . Sae sahlo taco , ‘ Va sei he peh ka , kaa phehly thlu he maw ? ’ tatah aa hae .
40013029	‘ A hy be , zecawtamaw tatah lybei naa phepai khei changvuh zong naa phepai sua he a .
40013030	Hre a zawnah tai cyhrui thlang he seh . Hre a zaw tihtah a hretu sahlo khah a hmetaw tah lybei khah pahmo la , me letah bo rua takhei tongchai taw o . Mataico , saze khah pahmo la , ka sachai lehei rai my lo , tatah ka ching tae he a , ’ tatah a chai he , ” tatah a tah .
40013031	Zisu tah ahringpaw tawchingnah bia a ching vy he , “ Vaicung painah raang cawh cawngsawpaw pakheh tah aihrang ci law katei , a ly letah a cingpaw khatah a lo .
40013032	Aihrang ci cawh naa thleci letah a chia caipaw a cang thlang naná teitah a ka cy tih taco buichung thleci hrong letah alai caipaw tah ka cang ka , thingkungpaw tah a katua . Macawtaco pavaw sahlo tah a va zy he ka , a cai sahlo letah a cawng tei he , ” tatah a tah he .
40013033	Mataico , ahringpaw tawchingnah bia a ching vy hui he , “ Vaicung painah raang cawh canuno tah vedi hongkheh lekhei a pahlawhpaw raangri khatah a lo . Ma raangri taco vedi cawh a tho sahpaw a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
40013034	Zisu tah ma hming vytei heh tawchingnah bia tah zawpuipaw khah a ching he . Aaning sahlo cawh tawchingnah bia hmang lytah zehmai cawngpah bang bei he .
40013035	Ma cawh Khazing khuavang hmokaw hmang tei reipaw , “ Tawchingnah bia khei ka kaw ka ang a , khazaw papining taitei nopaw hming khah ka rei a , ” tahpaw bia tlingnah khah a cang .
40013036	Mataico zawpuipaw cawh seisai he ka , ing chunglang a nae . A hningzuitu a vong he ka , a hai leco , “ Ly leteipaw lybei tawchingnah bia na reipaw khah ma pase tua , ” tatah aa tah .
40013037	Zisu taco , “ Thleci chaw a vapaw cawngsaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a cang .
40013038	Ly cawh khazaw heh cang ka , thleci chaw tahpaw cawh vaicung painah raang sawtei sahlo khah a cang he . Lybei tahpaw cawh mehchaw lypaw sawtei sahlo khah cang he ka ,
40013039	ma lybei khah ly letei a vatupaw caraepaw cawh Setan khah a cang . Saze hre cai cawh caichangnah khah cang ka , saze hretu sahlo cawh vaiming a cang he .
40013040	Lybei sahlo cawh phehly tei , me letah bo aa cangpaw hratah caichangnah leco a cang a .
40013041	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah a vaiming sahlo khah taw a he ka , aaning sahlo taco suanah a chua sahpaw hming maikaw le chahlynah a tuapaw vytei he khah phehly he ka , a painah cawh aa pathaisah a .
40013042	Aaning sahlo cawh caw le haw rianah hminghmaw a cangpaw ase hulupaw mepho lang khah aa thla he a .
40013043	Mataico , mehding sahlo cawh aa Paw painah raang chung lekhei ning hratah a khai he a . Nawkho a hnuipaw taco thui seh .
40013044	Vaicung painah raang cawh ly letei nopaw cho khatah a lo . Cawngsawpaw tah ma cawh a hmuh tihtah nawh kaw ka , lunglawng hmotah va sei ka , a hnuipaw vytei va zua ka , ma ly cawh a cawh .
40013045	Taico vaicung painah raang cawh lungnaw achawpaw a huilaipaw chohrawngpaw khatah a lo .
40013046	Amai a ru ngeteipaw sangkheh khah a hmuh tihtah va sei ka , a hnuipaw vytei khah va zua ka , ma cawh a cawh .
40013047	Ma hlui co vaicung painah raang cawh tuili letah thlah he katei , ngaw phing zakih khah a tle pahmopaw aso khatah a lo .
40013048	A chi tihtah ngawtletu sahlo takhei ngaekang lang aa hrui hly . Mataico a ty he ka , ngaw achawpaw cawh songpia chunglang sang he ka , achiapaw cawh aa vathlang .
40013049	Ma hrahei caichangnah letaco a cang a . Vaiming sahlo cawh a vong he ka , mehding taikhei mehchawly khah patlia he ka ,
40013050	aaning sahlo cawh caw le hawrianah hminghmaw a cangpaw a seh hulupaw mepho chunglang khah aa thla he a .
40013051	Ma hming vytei heh naa hnithai thah maw ? ” tatah a hae he . Aaning sahlo taco , “ Kaa hnithai thah , ” tatah aa palei .
40013052	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Macawtaco vaicung painah raang kong cawngpahtu a cang pawhe phungbia cawngpahtu a cangpaw maikaw cawh aa chochianah ing letei aa cho a thapaw kha , ahlungpaw kha a thothlah leimeipaw ing hnuitu khatah a lo he , ” tatah a tah he .
40013053	Zisu tah ma tawchingnah bia a reipaw sahlo heh a pachang tihtah ma hminghmaw cawh a seisai .
40013054	A pinah khua lang khah va sei ka , cawngsaw sahlo khah aa synagog lekhei cawngpah he ka , aa ning a ang ngetei . “ Ma cawngsawpaw tahei zeletamaw ma singnah le ningang chuipaw hmingtuakhynah sahlo heh a lah ?
40013055	Ama heh kih zung thaipaw a sawcapaw khah cang bei maw ? A no ming khah Mari cang bei maw ? A uny sahlo cawh Jeims , Josef , Simon le Judas cang bei he maw ?
40013056	A satei sahlo zong kaaning khatah ma lehei ung thlang hrah bei he maw ? Ma cawngsawpaw tahei zeletamaw ma hming vytei heh a lah he ? ” tatah aa tah he .
40013057	Taico a cung letah aa lungtling be . Canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Khazing khuavang cawh a pinah khua le ama a ingchungkho letah tah cy ly co kawkih letah pasungpanaw a cang , ” a tah he .
40013058	Taico zingnah aa hnui lynah cawtah khei ma leco ningang chuipaw a hlupui tua be .
40014001	Ma cai leco abui Herod taco Zisu kong khah thui ka ,
40014002	a kih rai leteipaw sahlo khah , “ Ma cawngsaw heh baptisma peitu Johan khah a cang , thihnah taitah a tho kaw thah hi ! Macawtaco , ningang chuipaw hmingtuakhynah a hnuipaw a cang hi , ” tatah a tah he .
40014003	Herod takhei a nyteipaw Filip a nupuino Herodi rawng tah baptisma peitu Johan cawh tlesah he ka , bahrairui a khisah he ka , thong letah a thlah .
40014004	Zecawtamaw tatah Johan tah Herod khah , “ Na nytei a nupui na chupaw heh a phung cang be , ” tatah a mochia cawtah a cang .
40014005	Herod taco Johan cawh thaw a du naná teitah zawpuipaw khah a ci he , zecawtamaw tatah zawpuipaw taco baptisma peitu Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tatah aa tah cawtah a cang .
40014006	Herod a chua ning letah Herodi a sawcanu takhei langpah he ka , Herod cawh a lung a lawngsah ngetei .
40014007	Macawtaco Herod takhei Herodi a sawcanu cawh na pa haepaw maikaw cawh ka ca pae a , tatah chia a sah hmo khei bia a kaang .
40014008	A no tei a pasypaw hrakhei , “ Baptisma peitu Johan a lu khah daabakho tah va pa pei law , ” tatah a tah .
40014009	Abui Herod cawh a lung rei a thui ngetei , canghrasala khuachai sahlo hme letah bia a kang thah cawtah khei nyno tei a haepaw khah pae pawtah naw pei he ka ,
40014010	baptisma peitu Johan cawh thong chung lekhei a lu a va taisah he .
40014011	A lu cawh dabakho khei va tle he ka , nyno cawh a peh , nyno taco a no khatah a seikhui .
40014012	Baptisma peitu Johan a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a vong he ka , a rawh cawh law he ka , aa phung . Mataico va sei he ka , Zisu cawh aa va ching .
40014013	Zisu tah ma thongpang cawh a thui tihtah Ama longtei khei tuilawng tah seihly ka , a kingdangnah lang khah a sei . Khuapui sahlo taitei ma thongpang a thuipaw zawpuipaw taco aa phe tah sei he ka , Zisu cawh aa zui .
40014014	Zisu cawh tuilawng taitah ka piathlah ka , cawngsaw zawpui khah a hmuh tih he tah ningdo he ka , a sahpaw maikaw khah a dangsah he .
40014015	Zailang ning a ne tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , “ Ma heh raang kingdang tah cang ka , ningkhua zong a tle ngetei myca . Zawpui heh thlaw la , khuatei sahlo lang va sei he seh la , aaning teitah e ruapaw batui a va cawh he seh , ” tatah aa tah .
40014016	Zisu taco , “ Aaning aa seihly a nge be . Naaning tah e ruapaw cawh pei o , ” a tah he .
40014017	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , “ Kaaning cawh very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning suipui kaa hnui ky caw ! ” tatah aa chai .
40014018	Zisu taco , “ Va tle tua o , ” tatah a tah he .
40014019	Mataico zawpui cawh araang cung lekhei a ty law tatah a tah he . Very tlang pangaw le ngaw sanghning cawh law ka , avai lang a y ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai . Taico very tlang sahlo cawh a kychy . Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh pei he ka , a hningzuitu sahlo taco zawpui cawh aa rai he .
40014020	Aa zongmingtei co e he ka , aa ri a vaw thlu . Taico a hningzuitu sahlo taco aa ebangpaw cawh pakhong he ka , bai hrawhluihning chih ky tah aa dui .
40014021	Very a epaw cawh canu le nyheh rei lytah capaw puitling 5000 a tah he .
40014022	Zawpui khah a disah chung he takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh rairang tah tuilawng chunglang a naesah he ka , raechai lang khah a seisah hlang he .
40014023	Zawpui khah a disah thlu khy tai he tah tlang cung lang khah thlawchang pawtah Ama teitah a sei . Ning a va zailang tihtah ma leco Ama teitah a ung thlang .
40014024	Canghrasala tuilawng cawh tuiping ngaekang taikhei langhlaw nong phah thah ka , tuileh takhei paleh hly neh a tah leimei , zecawtamaw tatah thli tah a rupui tah a nang he .
40014025	Monglang suimehlang papali hrong lekhei Zisu cawh tui cung co , aaning lang a va sei .
40014026	Tui cung tei a seipaw khah a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa hmuh tihtah a pahly ngetei he ka , “ Athlaw a cang , ” tah he ka , aa ci hmotah a ysang he .
40014027	Canghrasala ma cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah , “ Naa thlawzawng kheh seh . Kama ka cang hi . Ci khe o , ” a tah he .
40014028	Piter taco , “ Abuipaw , nama na cang caco , tui cung lehei nama kha va pa seisah tua hrah , ” tatah a tah .
40014029	Zisu taco , “ A vong , ” tatah a tah . Mataico , Piter cawh tuilawng chung taico cung thlah ka , tui cung leco sei ka , Zisu khaco a vaw .
40014030	Canghrasala , thli a rupaw a va hrangpaw khah a hmuh tihtah a thlawzawng ka , tui lang tlah a zaa cawtah khei , “ Abuipaw , pa pachah tei law ! ” tatah a ka y .
40014031	Ma cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah a kiá khei va pazah ka , a va tle . “ Nama zingnah a cawngpaw , zecawtamaw zing lynah na hnui ? ” tatah a tah .
40014032	Taico tuilawng chunglang aa nae cangkaw he leh thli cawh a de .
40014033	Mataico , tuilawng chung letei a ungpaw sahlo takhei beh he ka , “ Nama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw na cang hrahring thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
40014034	Raechai lang khah va cakah he ka , Genesaret raang khah aa va phah .
40014035	Taico ma hrawng leteipaw cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu a cang tahpaw khah aa hni tihtah ma raang kaekang leteipaw vytei khah bia aa caw he . Cawngsaw sahlo taco a sahpaw sahlo khah Ama khaco va chuakhui he ka ,
40014036	“ A sahpaw sahlo heh na pai dong tei chang tongsah ky he law , ” tatah naw he ka , Ama a tongpaw vytei cawh a dang he .
40015001	Mataico , Farasi thaikhehpaw le phungbia cawngpahtu thaikhehpaw sahlo khah Jerusalem khuapui taitah Zisu khatah a vong he ka ,
40015002	“ Zecawtamaw na hningzuitu sahlo tah pupaw phungbia aa ro zia ? Batui aa e hlai tah aa kih a si bei dei he ! ” tatah Zisu cawh aa tah .
40015003	Zisu taco , “ Zecawtamaw naaning zong tah naa phungbia rawng tah Khazing biapeh cawh naa ro ?
40015004	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah , ‘ Na no le na paw cizaw my lo , ’ taico , ‘ A no cang seh , a paw cang seh chia a sahpaw cawh thaw a cang a , ’ a tah .
40015005	Canghrasala , naaning taco , cawngsaw pakheh tah a no a cang ly leh a paw khatah , ‘ Kama taitah na hmuh khy a paw bawkhangnah cawh Khazing khatah tholong tah ka peh thah , ’ a tah caco ,
40015006	‘ ma cawngsawpaw cawh ma hming khei a no a cang ly leh a paw cawh a cizaw a hy khawh be , ’ naa tah . Ma hraco naaning na cawngpah chawngpaw he ceh phunglang cawtah Khazing bia cawh naa paleh naa pahnaw tei .
40015007	Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo ! Khazing khuavang Isaiah tei naa kong a reihlangpaw heh ahmang caimang .
40015008	‘ Ma cawngsaw sahlo tahei aa hmokaw tah aa pa cizaw , canghrasala aa lungthing cawh kama taitah a hlah ngetei .
40015009	Aa pa behpaw zong heh aa cawtah zehmai chahnai be . Aa cawngpahnah zong heh mehnung tah tuachawngpaw phungphe sahlo suipaw a cang he , ’ tatah a cia , ” tatah a tah .
40015010	Zisu tah mingzawpui khah Ama khatah y he ka , “ Ka bia heh nawthlia la , thuithai my lo .
40015011	Kaw lang tei a naepaw taco cawngsaw cawh papia palui bei hi , canghrasala kaw lang tah a ka piapaw tahei cawngsaw cawh a papia palui hi , ” tatah a tah he .
40015012	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a vong he ka , Zisu cawh , “ Ma bia na reipaw khah aa thui tihtah Farasi sahlo cawh aa thing a ae tahpaw na hni maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
40015013	Zisu taco , “ Ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tei a lingpaw a cang lypaw thingkungpaw maikaw cawh a hrang tah pheh hly a cang tae a .
40015014	Aaning sahlo cawh seisai thlang o , langchuitu mehco a cang he khi . Mehco tah mehco cawh langpui a chui caco , aa pahning tah khobatlung lang aa tla a , ” tatah a palei he .
40015015	Piter taco , “ Ma tawchingnah bia cawh ma pase tua , ” tatah a tah .
40015016	Zisu taco , “ Ma tlua co maw naa lung a co thlang ?
40015017	Kaw lang a naepaw cawh ri za phah ka , mataico alailang a piahly kaw tah hnih bei he ceh maw ?
40015018	Canghrasala kaw taitei a piapaw bia cawh lungthing taitah a ka chuhpaw cang ka , ma taco cawngsaw khah a papia a palui .
40015019	Zecawtamaw tatah lungthing taihei khuarawnah a chiahrupaw , lenongnah , a pheinah , canu capaw suanah , ruhnah , ahmang lypaw hnikhuitu cangnah le , male thai pachianah sahlo heh a chuh .
40015020	Ma sahlo heh cawngsaw a papia a paluipaw cawh a cang he , canghrasala kih si ly tei batui enah taco cawngsaw cawh papiapalui be , ” tatah a tah he .
40015021	Zisu cawh ma hming taico piathlah ka , Tair le Sidon raang lang khah a sei .
