40015022	Ma raang chung letei a ungpaw Kanaan cawngsawno pakheh cawh Zisu khaco a vong ka , “ David Pathlah , Abuipaw ning pa do ky law ! Ka sawcanu cawh khachia tah a tle cawtah a tai-ing tu thlang , ” tatah a ysang .
40015023	Zisu tah kaw kheh hmai chai be . Macawtaco , a hningzuitu sahlo a vong he ka , a hai leco , “ Seihly law tah thlang , kaa hninglang tah ma zuilai ka , a y leimei thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
40015024	Zisu taco , “ Kama cawh Israel mingphing taitei tuu a lypaw khatah suipui taw ka cang ! ” tatah a chai .
40015025	Cawngsawno cawh a vong ka , a hme letah a khuh panai ka , “ Abuipaw , pa baw ky law ! ” tatah a tah .
40015026	Zisu taco , “ Sawtei leh aa very cawh lá tah ui sahlo peh cawh a phung cang be , ” tatah a palei .
40015027	Canuno taco , “ A cang thlang , Abuipaw , canghrasala ui sahlo taco aa buipaw a cabuai taitei a tlahpaw didang cawh aa khi thlang hrah ! ” tatah a tah .
40015028	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Cawngsawno , nama cawh zingnah a pacypaw a hnuipaw na cang ! Na dupaw khah peh na cang a , ” tatah a chai . Taico a sawcanu cawh ma suimehlang cai lalei leco a dang kaw .
40015029	Zisu cawh mataico piathlah ka , Galili rili ngaekang hrong khei a sei . Mataico tlaang cung lang ke ka , a ty .
40015030	Cawngsaw rungpui cawh Ama khaco a vong he ka , a cabepaw , a mehcopaw , a songbepaw , a rei a thlaw thai lypaw le ahringpaw asawnah a ingpaw sahlo khah va chuakhui he ka , a phehrang leco chia he ka , a dangsah he .
40015031	A rei a thlaw thai lypaw tah bia rei , a songbepaw tah langsei , a cabepaw tah langsei , a mehcopaw tah khua hmuh tatei aa tahpaw khah aa hmuh tihtah cawngsaw rungpui cawh aa ning a ang thlang . Taico Israel Khazing khah aa reithai .
40015032	Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh y he ka , “ Ma cawngsaw sahlo heh kama khatah ningthung ung myca he ka , e ruapaw zehmai aa hnui ly cawtah ka ning aa pa do ngetei . Aa ngaidi hmo hei tlungsah my he neh seh la , langpui letah a baw he a , ” tatah a tah he .
40015033	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , “ Ma raang kingdang lehei ma vytei mehnung dang ruapaw lawh heh zeletamaw kaa la a ? ” tatah aa chai .
40015034	Zisu taco , “ Very tlang khazeh maw naa hnui ? ” tatah tah he ka , “ Tlangsarih le ngadih a cawngpe , ” tatah aa palei .
40015035	Zisu tah ming zawpui cawh alui letah a tysah he .
40015036	Mataico , very tlangsarih le ngadih cawh law ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka , a hningzuitu cawh pei he ka , zawpui khah aa rai he .
40015037	Aa zongmingtei co e he ka , aa ri a vaw ngetei . Taico a hningzuitu sahlo tah e bangpaw cawh pakhong he ka , baisarih chih ky tah aa dui .
40015038	Very aa epaw sahlo cawh canu le nyheh rei lytah capaw puitling 4000 a tah he .
40015039	Mingzawpui cawh a seisah hly khy tai he tah Zisu cawh tuilawng chunglang a nae ka , Magadan raang chung lang khei a sei .
40016001	Farasi sahlo le Sadusi sahlo cawh a vong he ka , Ama khah pase du takhei vaicung lang tei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah ma hmuhsah tua tatah aa tah .
40016002	Zisu taco , “ Zailang a va chua tihtah , ‘ Avai a lei sai ka , ningkhua a chah a , ’ tah he ceh ka ,
40016003	mongrang leco , ‘ Avai a lei sai ka , khua a paningnah cawtah atoning cawh ningkhua a chia a , ’ tatah naa tah . Avai ming he ceh ka , ningkhua zemaw a lo a tah cawh naa hni ngetei , canghrasala cai paching pakhanah cawh hnih khy bei he ceh .
40016004	Mehchaw ly le a phei a hmangpaw atochai cawngsaw tahei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah naa hui , canghrasala Khazing khuavang Jonah paching pakhanah tah cy ly co zehmai peh cang bei ceh , ” tatah a chai he . Mataico Zisu taco piasai he ka , a seihly .
40016005	Tuiping cawh aa cakah tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo taco very a pho aa monghly .
40016006	Zisu taco aaning sahlo cawh , “ A raering my lo . Farasi sahlo le Sadusi sahlo raangri lekhei a raering my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
40016007	Aaning le aaning cawh a cekanawh he ka , “ Very kaa pho ly cawtah a reipaw a cang hi , ” tatah aa tah he .
40016008	Zisu tah aa reipaw bia khah hnih ka , “ Naaning , zingnah a cawngpaw sahlo , zecawtamaw very naa hnui lypaw kong cawh naa rei leimei ?
40016009	Ato tingtai hnih thai ting bei he ceh maw ? Very tlang pangaw tah mehnung 5000 ka dangpaw he le a hluipaw bai khazeh maw chih ky tah naa dui tahpaw khah a thui khawh bei he ceh maw ?
40016010	A cang ly leh very tlangsarih tei mehnung 4000 ka dangpaw he le a hluipaw khah bai khazeh maw chih ky tah naa dui tahpaw khah saw ?
40016011	Naaning khahei very kong rei bei neh tahpaw heh zekhatah zia tamaw naa thui thai be ? Canghrasala Farasi sahlo le Sadusi sahlo aa raangri lekhei a raering my lo . ” tatah a tah .
40016012	Mataico , very letei hmangpaw raangri letah a raering rua pawtah ma ching be , Farasi sahlo le Sadusi sahlo cawngpahnah letah a singkang rua pawtah a ma chinghripaw a cang hi tahpaw khah aa thuithai .
40016013	Zisu cawh Sisaria Filipi pai a va phah tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw tah aho a cang aa tah maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
40016014	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Thaikhehpaw tah baptisma peitu Johan aa ca tah , thaikhehpaw tah Elija a cang ca tah he ka , ahringpaw taco Jeremai a cang ly leh Khazing khuavang pakheh kheh a cang aa ca tah , ” tatah aa palei .
40016015	“ Naaning tah saw aho a cang naa pa tah maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
40016016	Simon Piter taco , “ Nama cawh Khazing hring Sawcapaw Khri na cang , ” tatah a chai .
40016017	Zisu taco , “ Jonah a sawcapaw Simon , nama cawh bonghnang a tingpaw na cang , zecawtamaw tatah ma heh cawngsaw tah nama aa ca hnisahpaw cang be , ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tah a ca hnisahpaw a cang hri hi .
40016018	Taico nama cawh Piter na cang tahpaw ka ca ching , taico ma alung cung lehei ka khrisawbu padaw neh ka , hraihming hawkaw tah te khy be .
40016019	Vaicung painah raang cabi sahlo cawh nama ka ca pae a . Nama tei alui letah na tongchaipaw he cawh avai letah tongchai cang tae hrá he ka , nama tei alui letah na thlangpah pawhe cawh avai letah thlangpah a cang hrá he a , ” tatah a tah .
40016020	Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Khri a cangpaw khah ahohmai ching khe lo tatah raeringnah a peh he .
40016021	Ma cai taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo khah Jerusalem khuapui lang sei katei , macang sahlo , tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo kia tah taithuinah a hlupui ing a ka , aa thaw a , canghrasala a ningthungnah letah hringnah letah thosah a cang nápaw kong khah a ching pase he .
40016022	Piter taco a cakih lang seikhui ka , “ Abuipaw , Khazing tah arai tah a be , ma cawh na cung letah tlung by be ! ” tatah a ching .
40016023	Zisu taco Piter khah a huihno ka , “ Setan , kama taihei seihly . Nama cawh ka cawtah a pachihlynah na cang . Khazing lang hming khah pacang ly ceh tah cawngsaw lang hming na pacang hri hi ! ” tatah a tah .
40016024	Taico , Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Ahohmai zui a pa dupaw cawh ama a dunah khah seisai seh la , a khraws cawh a puh seh la , pa zui seh .
40016025	Zecawtamaw tatah a hringnah pachah a dupaw taco hly a ka , canghrasala Kama ka rawng tah a hringnah a hlypaw taco a hmuh a .
40016026	Cawngsaw pakheh tah khazaw heh a pungpaluh tah hnui seh la , a thlawpaw a sung caco , zemaw a cawtah a chahnai a ? Cawngsaw tah a thlary khah hmuh kaw a pawtah zemaw a peh khypaw a ung ?
40016027	Zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a Paw rungnawnah le a vaiming sahlo khatah a vong ka , mataico pakheh cy khah aa tuapaw naning tei hrakhei lahsong a pae he a .
40016028	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a painah raang letah a va chuapaw aa hmuh hlai taco , ma letei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei mehthaikheh cawh thi balang bei he , ” tatah a tah he .
40017001	Ningruh khy tah Zisu tah Piter , Jeims le a unypaw Johan khah y he ka , aaning teitah tlaang sangpaw cung lang a kekhui he .
40017002	Ma leco aa hmekaw letah a hmuisang cawh a thlai . A hme cawh ning hratah khai ka , a chaichi cawh lailaw hratah a khai .
40017003	Ma khy cangkaw leco , aa hmekaw letah Moses le Elija a va lang he ka , Zisu khatah bia aa reihrui leimei .
40017004	Piter taco Zisu cawh , “ Abuipaw , ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei . Na du caco , thlangda sangthung tah ka sah a , nama na cawtah sangkheh , Moses cawtah sangkheh , Elija cawtah sangkheh , ” tatah a tah .
40017005	Bia a rei leimei chung taco meding a khaipaw takhei aaning cawh pahlong he ka , meding chung taico , “ Ma heh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw a cang , a cung lehei ka lung a lawng ngetei . A bia nge my lo ! ” tatah o a za ring .
40017006	A hningzuitu tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah ci tu he ka , aa hme cawh alui lang a khuh he .
40017007	Canghrasala Zisu cawh a vong ka , tong he ka , “ Tho tua o , naa thlawzawng kheh seh , ” a tah he .
40017008	Aa ka ming tihtah Zisu tah cy lyco ahohmai hmuh bei he .
40017009	Tlaang cung taitah aa za cungthlah ning takhei Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh thihnah taitah patho kaw a cang hlai vytei cawh naa hmuhpaw khah ahohmai ching khe lo , ” tatah a tah he .
40017010	A hningzuitu sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Elija a vong taw hrahring a tatah aa tah ? ” tatah aa hae .
40017011	Zisu taco , “ Ahmangpaw a cang , Elija cawh a vong a ka , zezongpui khah a parai pacia a .
40017012	Canghrasala ka ca ching he , Elija cawh a vong thah ka , hnih bei he . Aa dudú khei ama cawh tua he ka , ma hraco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw zong heh aa kih letah taithuinah a ing hra a , ” tatah a palei he .
40017013	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo tah baptisma peitu Johan kong a ma ching hi tahpaw khah aa thui thai .
40017014	Zawpuipaw khah aa va chua tihtah pakhehpaw tah Zisu cawh a va ne ka , a hme letah a khuh a panai .
40017015	“ Abuipaw , ka sawcapaw heh hruihri hnui ka , a taithui tu thlang , ning pa do pah ky . Me lang a bo tei ka , tui lang a tlah tei .
40017016	Na hningzuitu sahlo khatah va chuakhui neh ka , canghrasala dangsah khy bei he , ” tatah a tah .
40017017	Zisu taco , “ Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw le meh paleh meh pathae cawngsaw sahlo , zetih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a ? Ze tih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a ? Nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui tua o , ” tatah a palei .
40017018	Zisu taco khachia cawh a hrangso ka , khachia cawh nyhehpaw chung taico ka pia ka , ma cangkaw leco , nyhehpaw cawh a dang palang .
40017019	Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning teitah Zisu khaco a vong he ka , “ Zecawtamaw kaaning tah kaa papia khy be ? ” tatah aa hae .
40017020	Zisu taco , “ Naa zingnah a cawng tu cawtah a cang . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , aihrang hmu tia tei chang zingnah naa hnui caco , ma tlaang heh , ‘ Ma taihei pawlang kheh a hnei , ’ tah la , a hnei thlang a . Naa cawtah a cang khy lypaw ung be .
40017021	Canghrasala ma hapaw hming heh cawh thlawchangnah le batui cahenah lypaw co papia khy cang bei he , ” tatah a palei he .
40017022	Galili raang lang hmokheh tah aa va sei tihtah aa hai letah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a .
40017023	Aaning sahlo taco thaw a he ka , taico ningthung khy letah hringnah letah thosah a cang a , ” tatah a tah he . Taico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa nge a chia ngetei .
40017024	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Kapernaum khua aa va phah khy taitah behnah ing ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo cawh Piter khatah a vong he ka , “ Naa cawngpahtu tah behnah ing ngungkhui cawh khei bei maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
40017025	Piter taco , “ A khei thlang , ” tatah a palei he . Piter ing chunglang a za nae tihtah Zisu taco bia ka chai ka , “ Simon , zekhatamaw na rawh ? Alui bui sahlo tah ngungkhui le luimai sahlo khah aho sahlo maw aa khei he ? Aaning aa sawtei leh maw a cang ly leh ahringpaw sahlo khah maw ? ” tatah a hae .
40017026	Piter taco , “ A hringpaw sahlo khah , ” tatah a chai . Zisu tah , “ Ma hratei a cang caco , sawtei sahlo cawh a eisah he a .
40017027	Canghrasala lungchah ly tei tua heh cawh chah be , tuiping lang va sei la , na kuipaw khah va thlah tua . Na tle tawpaw ngaw khah a kaw va ky la , tangka phaesai phaepali na hmuh a . Ma cawh va tle la , nama na caw le kama ka cawtah va khei my lo , ” tatah a tah .
40018001	Ma cai leco a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , “ Vaicung painah raang letah ahomaw a lai caipaw a cang a ? ” tatah aa hae .
40018002	Zisu taco nyhehpaw khah y ka , aa hrong letah a dawsah .
40018003	Taico , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he naa lung a thlai tah nyheh sahlo hratah naa cang ly caco , vaicung painah raang letah a nae by bei ceh .
40018004	Macawtaco ma nyhehtei hrahei ama le ama a panypaw cawngsaw cawh vaicung painah raang letah alaicaipaw a cang a .
40018005	Taico ka ming tah ma hrahei nyhehtei a cyhlangpaw cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw a cang .
40018006	Canghrasala pakheh kheh tah Kama a pa zingpaw nyhehtei pakheh khah a suasah caco , a hirong letah saang rianah lung pathle tah rili a thunah lang thlah he seh la , a cawtah a chah vy a .
40018007	Khazaw letei cawngsaw a sua sahpaw hming sahlo cawh aa cing a ping ! Ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh aa ung ruapaw a cang thlang . Canghrasala , ma a ung sahpaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping !
40018008	Na kih a cang ly leh na phe tah a ca suasah caco , taichung la vathlang . Kih rahning a cang ly leh phe rahning tei chaizaw me lang vathlang cang navy co , kih cung hmo a cang ly leh a cabe hmo tei chaizaw hringnah lang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
40018009	Mataico , na meh tah a ca suasah caco , khy hly la , vathlang thlang . Meh rahning chi tah hraihming me chung lang vathlang cang navy co , meh rahkheh khatah chaizaw hringnah letah a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
40018010	Ma nyheh sahlo letei pakheh hmai heh mingchuh ruapaw cang bei he , tah heh hnih my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letei a ungpaw aaning aa vaiming sahlo tah ka Paw vaicung leteipaw a hme aa hmuh leimei thlang tah heh ka ca ching he .
40018011	Ma hlui co , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lypaw sahlo khah pachah ruapaw tah a vongpaw a cang hi .
40018012	Zekhatamaw naa rawh ? Cawngsaw pakheh tah a hnuipaw tuu zakheh lekhei sangkheh ly seh la , songkua sangkuapaw cawh tlangpa letah seisai tah a lypaw sangkheh khah hui rua pawtah sei bei maw ?
40018013	Taico biahmuisui ka ca ching he , a lypaw cawh a hmuh kaw caco , a ly lypaw songkua sangkuapaw navy co , a hmuh kawpaw sangkheh cung lekhei a lawng vy syly a .
40018014	Ma hraco naa Paw vaicung leteipaw taco ma nyheh sahlo letei pakheh heh hmai aa ly rua pawtah sai bei he hi .
40018015	Na unypaw tah na cung letah a sua caco , a vaw la , naa pahning teitah naa ungning tah a panah khah va ching pase . Na rei a ca nge caco , na unypaw khah na pahnei kaw tahnah a cang .
40018016	Canghrasala na rei a ca nge ly caco , cawngsaw pakheh a cang ly leh pahning tah a chui la , ma hnikhuitu pahning a cang ly leh pathung taco hming a chuacangnah khah aa pacy sá a .
40018017	Aaning aa bia cawh a nge du lypaw tei a cang caco , khrisawbu khah ching la , khrisawbu bia hmai a nge du lypaw tei a cang caco , lawki cawngsaw a cang ly leh ngungkhui kheitu hrakhei va rawh thlang my lo .
40018018	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , alui letei naa tongchaipaw cawh vaicung letah tongchai cang hrá ka , alui letei naa thlangpahpaw cawh vaicung letah thlangpah a cang hrá a .
40018019	Ma hlui co , aluicung letei cawngsaw pahning tah hming sangkheh kheh hae rua pawtah naa naw a tlah caco , ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tah ma cawh a ca tua pah thlang he a .
40018020	Zecawtamaw tatah ka ming tah cawngsaw pahning pathung tah aa pahmonah pawhe leco aaning khatah ka ung hrah , ” tatah a tah .
40018021	Taico Piter cawh Zisu khatah a vaw ka , “ Abuipaw , ka unypaw tah ka cung letah a sua tihtah uikhazeh maw ka ngethai a ? Uisarih tai maw ? ” tatah a hae .
40018022	Zisu taco , “ Ka ca ching , uisarih cang be . Ui songsarih aleh sarih .
40018023	Macawtaco vaicung painah raang cawh a sae sahlo khatah luibah cazing pase a dupaw siangpahrang hratah a cang .
40018024	Ahrangtho leco tangka a nuai hlupui a bahpaw cawngsawpaw cawh aa va chuakhui .
40018025	Ama taco a chang khylynah cawtah chang khy ruapaw tah a siangpahrang tah ama kha , a nupui kha , a sawtei leh kha , a hnuipaw vytei kha va zua o , tatah bia a peh .
40018026	Saecapaw taco a hme leco a khuh panai ka , ‘ Pa ngethai cong ky la , a zongming teitah ka ca chang tae thlang a , ’ tatah a naw .
40018027	A siangpahrang taco ningdo ngetei ka , a dycui cawh ngethai ka , a thlaw .
40018028	Canghrasala ma saecapaw cawh va sei ka , saecapaw a cang hrahpaw pakheh ama tangka a cawngtei a bahpaw khah a tong . Tle ka , a rong khei dih ka , ‘ Dycui pachang myca , ’ tatah a haechai .
40018029	Sae a cang hrahpaw a vesawpaw taco a khuh panai ka , ‘ Pa ngethai cong la , ka ca peh tae thlang a , ’ tatah a naw .
40018030	Canghrasala du be . Va sei ka , cawngsawpaw cawh dycui a chang thlu hlai vytei khah thong letah a va thlah .
40018031	Ahringpaw sae sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ngechia ngetei ka , va sei he ka , aa siangpahrang cawh hming a chuacangnah vytei khah aa va ching .
40018032	Mataico siangpahrang taco ma saecapaw cawh a ysah he . ‘ Nama sae chawly , na pa naw leimeinah cawtah dycui na pa bahpaw vytei khah ka ca ngethai .
40018033	Na cung letah ningdonah ka hnuipaw hratah na vesaw a cangpaw saecapaw cung letah ningdonah hnui bei ceh maw ? ’ tatah a tah .
40018034	A siangpahrang cawh a thingae ngetei ka , a bahpaw a chang thlu hlai vytei khah thong-ing a vaitupaw letah hreh ruapaw tah a peh .
40018035	Naa uny khah naa lungthing tah naa ngethai ly he a cang caco , ka Paw vaicung leteipaw tah ma hrakhei a ca tua hrá he a , ” tatah a chai he .
40019001	Zisu cawh ma bia a reipaw a pachang taico Galili raang taikhei a tho ka , Jordan tuivaw raechai lang tei a ungpaw Judia raang lang khah a sei .
40019002	Cawngsaw rungpui taco zui he ka , ma leco a dang lypaw khah a dangsah he .
40019003	Farasi thaikheh sahlo cawh Ama pase rua paw takhei a vong he . “ Ze rawng a cang zong tah capaw tah a nupui mah heh a phung a cang maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
40019004	Zisu taco , “ Zezong a Tuatupaw taco ahrangtho ning taco , ‘ Canu le capaw tah a tua he , ’ tah ka ,
40019005	‘ Ma rawng taco capaw tah a no le a paw khah seisai a he ka , a nupui khatah a pahlawng a ka , ma tlaw pahning cawh ngaisaw pungkheh tah aa cang a , ’ tahpaw heh Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
40019006	Macawtaco aaning cawh pahning cang khawh bei he , pakheh a cang myca he . Macawtaco Khazing tei a patongpaw he cawh cawngsaw tah pachai kheh he seh , ” tatah a palei he .
40019007	“ Ma hratei a cang caco , zecawtamaw Moses taco capaw tah a nupui cawh mahnah ca pei seh la , seisah my seh lo tatah naw a peh zia ? ” tatah aa hae .
40019008	Zisu taco , “ Moses tei naa nupui leh mahnah naw a ca pehpaw he cawh naa lung a khong tunah cawtah a cang . Canghrasala a thoning taco , ma hrahei cang be .
40019009	A nupui tah capaw khatah a suasai tah tlung lypaw tah nupui mah katei , nupui hringpaw a chuipaw cawngsaw cawh a pheipaw a cang . Mah ciapaw canu a chuipaw cawngsaw zong a pheipaw a cang hrah taheh ka ca ching he . ”
40019010	A hningzuitu sahlo taco a hai letah , “ Nupui pasae kong letah ma hratei a cang caco , nupui pasae hnui lytah ung a chah vy thlang ! ” tatah aa tah .
40019011	Zisu taco , “ Ma bia heh ming maikaw tah cyhlang khy bei he . Khazing tah a bongpaw cawngsaw long tah aa cyhlang khy a .
40019012	Zecawtamaw tatah thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh aa pi ná tah aa ku a thi . A hringpaw sahlo cawh cawngsaw tah ma hraco tua he ka , ahringpaw taco vaicung painah raang rawng takhei nupui chui du bei he . Ma heh a tua khypaw tah tua he seh , ” tatah a palei he .
40019013	Nyheh sahlo khah aa cung letah a kih pahnia seh la , thlawchangpah ná he seh tatah Zisu khaco aa va chuakhui he . Canghrasala a hningzuitu sahlo takhei aa va chuakhuipaw sahlo khah aa raw he .
40019014	Zisu tah , “ Nyheh sahlo cawh Kama khatah a vong he seh , pakhang khe o , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
40019015	Aa cung letah a kih a pahnia khy taikhei ma hminghmaw taico a seihly .
40019016	Cawngsawpaw pakheh cawh Zisu kha a vong ka , “ Cawngpahtu , chaizaw hringnah hmuh rua pawtah zehming chawpaw maw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae .
40019017	Zisu taco , “ Hming chawpaw kong cawh zecawtamaw na pa hae ? Khazing suipaw a chawpaw a cang . Hringnah letah a nae na du caco , biapeh sahlo khah nge thlang , ” tatah a palei .
40019018	“ Zehapaw khah maw ? ” tatah cawngsawpaw taco a hae cakhia . Zisu taco , “ Lenong kheh , a phei kheh , ru kheh , a hmang lypaw hnikhuitu cang kheh ,
40019019	na no le na paw cizaw la , nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw va do my lo , ” tahpaw a cang tatah a palei .
40019020	Satlepaw taco , “ Ma vytei heh cawh ka zui thlu thah , zemaw ka bah vy ? ” tatah a tah .
40019021	Zisu taco , “ A tlingpaw cang na du caco , va sei la , na hnuipaw sahlo khah va zua la , mehsisah va pei la , vaicung letah chosung na hnui a . Mataico a vong la , va pa zui , ” tatah a tah .
40019022	Satlepaw tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a ngechia hmo tah a sei hly . Zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a cang .
40019023	Mataico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , mehrung caw taco vaicung painah raang letah a nae heh a ru caimang .
40019024	Ka ca ching vy he , mehrung tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co , ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a , ” tatah a tah he .
40019025	Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa thui tihtah aa khuarawha ngetei ka , “ A cang caco ahomaw pachah a cang khy a ? ” tatah aa hae .
40019026	Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh ming he ka , “ Ma heh cawngsaw khaco cang khy be , canghrasala Khazing caw taco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be , ” tatah a tah .
40019027	Piter tah Zisu cawh , “ Kaaning taco zezongpui seisai tah kaa ca zui hi ! Mataico kaa cawtah ze rawhchai ruapaw ung maw ? ” tatah a tah .
40019028	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , zezongpui patha kaw a cang tih tei , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a rungnawnah dyching letah a ty tih taco , naaning kama a pa zuipaw sahlo cawh abui dyching sanghrawhluihning letah a ty he ceh ka , Israel phinghraw hluihning khah bia naa ce he a .
40019029	Taico kama ka rawng tah a ing maw , a uny sahlo maw , a satei sahlo maw , no le paw maw , a sawtei sahlo maw , a ly maw a seisaipaw sahlo taco a leh zakheh tah aa hmuh kaw hlui tah chaizaw hringnah ry aa cy a .
40019030	Canghrasala hme a sahpaw mehlupui cawh hningkha he ka , hning a khapaw mehlupui cawh hme aa sah tae a .
40020001	Zecawtamaw tatah vaicung painah raang cawh a misur buichung letah rai a hre ruapaw kuli pakhia rua pawtah mongdi tei a piathlahpaw ly a hnuitupaw khatah a lo .
40020002	Aaning sahlo cawh ningkheh tah ngung tangka phae kheh pae pawtah a nawtlah ka , a misur buichung lang cawh a taw he .
40020003	Monglang suimehlang pakua hrawng lekhei a khia ka , zehmai tua ly tei chodo tlang letah a daw thlangpaw ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a hmuh he .
40020004	Aaning sahlo cawh , ‘ Naaning zong va sei la , ka misur buichung letah rai va hre la , a tlahpaw naning tah nihlo ka ca pae he a , ’ tatah a tah he .
40020005	Macawtaco aaning sahlo cawh aa va sei . Ningching hrawng tah a va khia ka zailang suimehlang pathung hrawng lekhei a va khia vy hui ka , ma hraco a va tah vy he .
40020006	Zailang suimehlang papangaw hrawng lekhei a va khia ka , a daw pahmo thlang thly pawhe ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a hmuh he . Aaning sahlo cawh , ‘ Zehmai tua lytah zecawtamaw ma lehei chahningtlaw na daw thlang he ceh ? ’ tatah a hae he .
40020007	‘ Ahohmai rai a ma peipaw ung be ca he ka , ’ tatah aa chai . Aa hai leco , ‘ Naaning zong va sei la , ka misur buichung letah rai va hre hra o , ’ tatah a tah he .
40020008	Zailang a va phah tihtah misur buichung a hnuitupaw taco buichung a mingkaitu khah , ‘ Raihretu sahlo khah y la , aa hre mai cawh pei o , a hning cai tei siapaw sahlo taikhei patho la , a hmasaw teipaw taikhah pei o , ’ tatah a tah .
40020009	Zailang suimehlang papangaw hrawng letei hlangpaw raihretu sahlo cawh a vong he ka , ngung tangka cawh a lah cy he .
40020010	A hmasaw tei hlangpaw sahlo cawh aa va chua tihtah a hlu vy kaa hmuh thly a , tatah a rawhchai he . Canghrasala aaning sahlo zong cawh ngung tangka phaekheh aa hmuh cy hrah .
40020011	Ma tih taco ly a hnuitupaw khah aa phingso .
40020012	‘ Ahning cai tei hlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo taco suimehlang pakheh suitei hre he ka , chahningtlaw ningling le raisah kha aa catingpaw kaaning sahlo khahei a khingpaw tah na tua he , ’ tatah aa tah .
40020013	Canghrasala aaning letei pakhehpaw cawh , ‘ Ka dua , na cung letah hmingchahly ka tuapaw cang be . Ngung tangka phaekheh tah hre rua pawtah na naw a tlah cang bei maw ?
40020014	Na nihlo khah law la , sei . Nama ka ca pehpaw hratah a hning tei ka hlangpaw cawngsaw zong peh ka du he .
40020015	Ka tangka cung leco ka dudú tah tuanah naw hnui bei neh maw ? A cang ly leh ka he a chah cawtah hei na hei a tlia tah ? ’ tatah a tah .
40020016	Ma hraco a hning a khapaw cawh a hmesah tae he ka , a hme a sahpaw cawh a hning aa khapaw a cang tae he a , ” tatah a tah he .
40020017	Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang a seichy ning takhei a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah a cakih lang seikhui he ka , aa hai letah ,
40020018	“ Jerusalem lang va sei he peh ka , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khatah luithae a cang tae a . Aaning sahlo taco thaw pawtah thaily cangsah a he ka ,
40020019	pasipasa a he ka , chei a he ka , khraws letah khaipai ruapaw tah Gental cawngsaw khatah peh pachaw a cang a . Ningthungnah letah hringnah letah patho kaw a cang a ! ” a tah he .
40020020	Mataico , Zebedi a sawcapaw sahlo aa no cawh a sawcapaw sahlo khaco Zisu kha a vong he ka , a khuh panai ka ningdo a hae .
40020021	Zisu taco , “ Zemaw na du ? ” tatah a hae . Canuno taco , “ Na painah letah ka sawcapaw leh pahning heh pakheh na cacang lang , pakheh na cavui lang na tysah ky he tah ka du , ” tatah a tah .
40020022	“ Naa haepaw heh hnih bei he ceh . Ka ding lepaw tai-ingnah ny heh naa ding khy a maw ? ” tatah a tah he . “ Kaa ding khy a , ” tatah aa chai .
40020023	Zisu taco aaning cawh , “ Ka ny taihei naa ding ceingei a . Canghrasala ka cacang lang le ka cavui lang tah a tynah naw cawh kama ka rei cang be . Ma hming sahlo heh cawh ka Paw tei a pa chia pahpaw sahlo aa cawtah a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
40020024	Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu ahringpaw pahrawpaw tah aa thui tihtah ma tlaw uny pahning cung leco aa thing a ae .
40020025	Zisu tah hmingkheh tah y he ka , “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo he taco aa rai leteipaw sahlo cung letah a bui tah a bui so he ka , bui lai sahlo cawh aa cung letah naw aa hnui ngetei tahpaw khah naa hni .
40020026	Naaning cawh ma hraco naa cang ruapaw cang be . Ma navy co naa hrong lehei mehlai cang a dupaw taco naa raihretu tah a tua seh la ,
40020027	a pakhehnah cang a dupaw taco naa sae tah a tuapaw a cang .
40020028	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a rai hrepá pawtah cang lytah male rai hre rua pawtah le mehlupui tlang ruapaw cawtah a hringnah peh rua pawtah a vongpaw hrahei , ” a tah he .
40020029	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Jeriko khua taitah aa piathlah taikhei cawngsaw rungpui tah aa zui he .
40020030	Mehcopaw pahning cawh langpui kae lekhei a ty thlang he ka , Zisu a va sei lai tahpaw khah aa thui tihtah , “ David Pathlah , Abuipaw , ning ma do ky law ! ” tatah a y he .
40020031	Cawngsaw rungpui taco a hrangso he ka , “ De teitah ung o , ” aa tah he . Canghrasala , “ David Pathlah , Abuipaw , ning ma do ky law ! ” tatah a thang vy tah aa y he .
40020032	Zisu cawh a daw ka , a y he . “ Naa cawtah ze tuapah maw naa du ? ” tatah a hae he .
40020033	“ Abuipaw , khua hmuh khy kaa du , ” tatah aa palei .
40020034	Zisu taco ningdo he ka , aa meh cawh a tongpah he . Ma cangkaw leco , khua cawh hmuh khy he ka , Ama cawh aa zui .
40021001	Jerusalem lang a va nae myca he ka , Oliv tlaang letah a ungpaw Bethfes khua aa phah tihtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahning khah seisah hlang he ka ,
40021002	aa hai letah , “ Naa hme khua lekhei va sei la , a sawtei khatah a cangpaw , la aa hrai thlangpaw naa hmuh palang a . A rui khah thlang he ceh ka , naa va hrui lai a .
40021003	Pakheh kheh tah zekhatah aa ca tah zong he tah Abuipaw tah a hia naa tah a , taico ama tah a va thlaw palang thlang a , ” a tah he .
40021004	Ma heh Khazing khuavang hmang tei reipaw ,
40021005	“ Zion sawcanu khah ching my lo , ‘ Na siangpahrang cawh nama kha a vongpaw khah mingtua , mehningnai cang ka , la a va ci lai , la teitei ceingei khah a cang , ’ ” tahpaw bia a tlingnah khah a cang .
40021006	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh va sei he ka , Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei aa va tua .
40021007	La puino le la teitei cawh va chuakhui he ka , aa pai sahlo cawh aa kai leco dae he ka , Zisu taco a ke .
40021008	Cawngsaw rungpui takhei aa pai sahlo cawh langpui letah phaw he ka , ma chung taco , ahringpaw cawh chingbu khah va chaw he ka , langpui leco aa phaw .
40021009	Mataico , a hmelang a seipaw le a zuilaipaw cawngsaw rungpui taco , “ David pathlah cawh Hosana cang ky seh ! Abuipaw ming tei a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh ! A sangcaipaw vaicung lekhei Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh ! ” tatah a y he .
40021010	Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui a nae tihtah khua pungpui co chuh he ka , “ Ahomaw a cang ? ” tatah aa hae he .
40021011	Cawngsaw rungpui taco , “ Galili raang , Nazaret khuapaw , Khazing khuavang Zisu a cang khi , ” tatah aa chai he .
40021012	Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka , ma letei hming a zuapaw sahlo le a copaw sahlo khah a tingchua thlu he . Tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa cabuai le lelai a zuapaw sahlo aa dyching sahlo khah a palehly thlu he .
40021013	Aa hai leco , “ Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Ka ing cawh thlawchangnah ing tah a cang a , ’ canghrasala naaning taco , ‘ Mehru kua , ’ tah naa tua , ” tatah a tah he .
40021014	Taico a mehcopaw le a songbepaw sahlo cawh Zisu khaco behnah ing letah a vong he ka , a dangsah he .
40021015	Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah a tuapaw khuarawha hming le behnah ingdung chung letei , “ David Pathlah cawh Hosana , cang ky seh , ” tatah nyheh sahlo tah aa ypaw khah aa hmuh tihtah ceh bingbi bei he .
40021016	Aaning taco , “ Ma nyheh sahlo tei aa reipaw cawh na thui maw ? ” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae . Zisu taco , “ Ka thui thlang . ‘ Nyheh sahlo le hasaitei sahlo hmokaw taitah , Nama reithainah khah palang chua pawtah na cawngpah thah he , ’ tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw , ” tatah a palei he .
40021017	Taico aaning sahlo cawh piasai he ka , Bethani khua lang khah sei ka , ma leco ma zai cawh a va ria .
40021018	Mongdi tei khuapui lang tah a va kaw kaw ning takhei a ngai a di ngetei .
40021019	Langpui kae lekhei thuiku kung hmuh ka , a va seihno . Canghrasala a hnaw tah cy ly co zehmai hmuh be . Mataico thuiku kung cawh , “ Zening tahmai thui khaw bei ceh , ” tatah a tah . Ma cangkaw leco , thuiku kung cawh a ro .
40021020	A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ning a ang . “ Zecawtamaw ma thuiku kung heh rairang pui tah a ro thlang , ” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae .
40021021	Zisu taco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , lung langlo lytah zingnah naa hnui caco , ma thuiku kung letei tuapaw heh naa tua khy long cang lytah ma tlaang hmai heh , ‘ Sei la , rili chunglang va tlah thlah , ’ tah khy he ceh ka , a hnei ka , a tlah thlang a .
40021022	Naa zing caco , Khazing letah thlawchang tei naa haepaw maikaw khah naa hmuh thlang a , ” a tah he .
40021023	Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka , a cawngpah chung he takhei tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh Ama kha a vong he . “ Ze nawhnuiná tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua ? Ma nawhnuinah heh ahomaw a ca pei ? ” tatah Zisu cawh aa hae .
40021024	Zisu taco , “ Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a . Naa pa palei khy caco , ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ka ca ching he a .
40021025	Johan tah baptisma pehnah naw a hnuipaw khah ze taitah maw a va chua ? Khazing taitah maw , cawngsaw taitah maw ? ” tatah a tah he . Reisia he ka , “ ‘ Khazing taitah , ’ tah my peh seh la , ‘ A cang caco zecawtamaw Johan cawh naa zing be ? ’ a ma tah a .
40021026	Canghrasala , ‘ Cawngsaw taitah , ’ tah my peh seh la , mingzawpui cawh kaa ci tlung he , zecawtamaw tatah aaning vytei taco Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang aa tah tlung , ” tatah aa tah .
40021027	Macawtaco Zisu cawh , “ Hnih bei peh , ” tatah aa chai . Taico , Zisu tah , “ Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hrá bei neh , ” a tah he .
40021028	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Ma heh zekhatamaw naa rawh ? Cawngsawpaw pakheh ung ka , sawcapaw pahning a hnui he . A uthuipaw kha a vaw ka , ‘ Ka sawtei , atoning cawh misur buichung lang va sei la , rai va hre , ’ tatah a tah .
40021029	‘ Sei bei neh , ’ tatah a chai , canghrasala a hning taco , sei ly co chah be tah ka , a va sei .
40021030	Mataico aa paw cawh a sawcapaw pakhehpaw khaco a vaw ka , ma hraco a va tah . A sawcapaw taco , ‘ Apaw , ka sei ly camaw , ’ tatah tah ka , canghrasala sei be .
40021031	Ma pahning lehei he ahomaw a paw a dunah a tuapaw cawh a cang tatah naa rawh ? ” a tah he . “ A pakhehnah , ” tatah aa chai . Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le hlohlangno sahlo cawh Khazing painah raang letah naa hmelang tah a ca nae khai leimei he .
40021032	Baptisma peitu Johan cawh dingnah langpui khah hmuh sá pawtah naaning khatah a vong ka , zing bei he ceh , canghrasala ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le hlohlangno sahlo taco aa zing . Taico ma heh naa hmuh khy taihei hmai a ngepachih tah zing hlui bei ceh .
40021033	Tawchingnah bia ahringpaw nge vy tua o . Misur buichung a tuapaw ly a hnuipaw pakheh a ung . A buichung cawh ruahy sah khai ka , misur so nápaw kho zong co ka , a haw nápaw siasang zong a do thah . Mataico misur buichung cawh thaikhehpaw ly a tuapaw sahlo khah hlei he ka , khuatlongnah lang a sei .
40021034	Hre cai a ne tihtah a sae sahlo khah ama a ting hangpaw pakhong pawtah khei ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw he .
40021035	Ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco sae sahlo cawh tle he ka , pakheh cawh dai he ka , pakhehpaw cawh aa thaw . A pathungnahpaw cawh alung tah aa cung .
40021036	Mataico , ahringpaw sae sahlo khah a hlu vy tah aaning sahlo khaco taw he ka , ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco ma thlythly hraco aa tua hui he .
40021037	A changnah leco a sawcapaw khah aaning sahlo khaco a va taw . ‘ Ka sawcapaw cawh aa cizaw thlang a , ’ tatah a tah .
40021038	Canghrasala , ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco a sawcapaw cawh aa hmuh tihtah pakheh le pakheh cawh , ‘ Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang . A vong o , thé he peh ka , a ry a lah ná he peh seh , ’ aa tah he .
40021039	Macawtaco ama cawh tle he ka , misur buichung alailang khah piakhui he ka , aa thaw .
40021040	Macawtaco misur buichung a hnuitupaw a va chua tihtah ma ly a hlangpaw sahlo cawh zekhatamaw a tua he a ? ” a tah he .
40021041	Taico aaning sahlo taco , “ Ma mehchawly sahlo cawh cichui pawtah thé he ka , a misur buichung khah hre a zaw tihtah a tinghangpaw a pei khypaw ly a hlangpaw ahringpaw khah a hlei he a , ” tatah aa palei .
40021042	Zisu taco , “ Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw ? ‘ Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang . Abuipaw tah ma heh tua ka , kaa mehmuh letah khuarawha a chuipaw a cang , ’ tahpaw heh .
40021043	Macawtaco , Khazing painah raang cawh naaning taitah lahly cang ka , a thui a thui sápaw cawngsaw khah peh a cang he a , tah heh ka ca ching he .
40021044	Ma alung cung letei a tlahpaw cawngsaw cawh kuichy thlu he ka , ma alung tei a tlahsopaw cawngsaw he cawh a mang cici he a , ” tatah a tah he .
40021045	Tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo tah Zisu a reipaw tawchingnah bia cawh aa thui tihtah kaaning a ma tahnang tahpaw khah aa hni .
40021046	Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui , canghrasala zawpuipaw khah aa ci he , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawngsaw sahlo takhei Zisu cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tatah aa tah cawtah a cang .
40022001	Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh tawchingnah bia a ching vy hui he .
40022002	“ Vaicung painah raang cawh a sawcapaw nupui chui kongchuanah a tuatupaw abui khatah a lo .
40022003	Ama taco a sae sahlo khah taw he ka , kongchuanah letei aa hruipaw sahlo he khah va chuh myca he seh tatah a va tahsah he . Canghrasala va chuh du tlang bei he .
40022004	Taico a sae sahlo cawh a hlu vy tah taw he ka , ‘ Aa caw tei zaibatui kaa pa chia pahpaw he hruipaw sahlo khah va ching o , ka cotungpaw sahlo le ka sahring a thypaw sahlo cawh theh thah he peh ka , zezongpui a tlang a tling thlu myca . Nupui chui kongchuanah lang cawh va chuh myca law , va tah o , ’ tatah a tah he .
40022005	Canghrasala a bia cawh naw tah sah be ca he ka , pakhehpaw cawh a ly lang , pakhehpaw cawh cho palehnah lang a sei hly thlang he .
40022006	A hringpaw sahlo taco a sae sahlo khah tle he ka , hrai he ka , aa thaw he .
40022007	A buipaw cawh a thing a ae . A raekeh sahlo khah taw he ka , ma lenongpaw sahlo cawh va thawsah he ka , aa khuapui cawh me tah a va rosah he .
40022008	Mataico a sae sahlo khah , ‘ Nupui chui kongchuanah cawh a tlang a tling thlu myca , canghrasala ka hruipaw cawngsaw sahlo heh va chuh tlang bei he .
40022009	Langpui a tongnah sahlo lekhei va sei la , cawngsaw naa hmuhpaw maikaw he khah kongchuanah leco va hrui o , ’ a tah he .
40022010	Macawtaco , sae sahlo cawh langpui sahlo lang khah va sei he ka , cawngsaw aa hmuhpaw maikaw he khah mehchaw kha , mehchia khakhei va pahmo he ka , nupuichuinah ing cawh cawngsaw a chih thlang he .
40022011	Canghrasala , abuipaw cawh a va chuhpaw cawngsaw ming rua pawtah khei a vong tihtah nupuichuinah chaichi a hrei lytah a vongpaw cawngsawpaw khah a va hmuh .
40022012	‘ Ka dua , zecawtamaw nupuichuinah chaichi a hrei lytah na va chua lalei ? ’ tatah abuipaw taco a hae . Cawngsawpaw cawh a rei thlaw be .
40022013	Mataico abuipaw taco a raitaw sahlo khah , ‘ Ma cawngsawpaw heh a kih le a phe tongchai la , alailang amuinah caw le hawrianah hminghmaw a cangpaw lang khah vathlang o . ’
40022014	Zecawtamaw tatah hruipaw cawh a hlu he , canghrasala thingpaw cawh a cawngtei he , ” tatah a tah he .
40022015	Mataico Farasi sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , Zisu cawh Ama a bia khei o khy nápawtah khua aa khang .
40022016	Taico , aa hningzuitu sahlo khah Herod a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei Zisu khatah aa va taw he . Aaning sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu , nama cawh mehding cang ceh ka , Khazing langpui kong heh biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah he tah cawh kaa hni . Cawngsaw tah miamang khypaw cang bei ceh , zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw hme ming bei ceh ,
40022017	Zekhatamaw na rawh ? Siangpahrang Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly ? Ma ching tua , ” tatah aa tah .
40022018	Canghrasala Zisu taco , aa rawhnah a chah lypaw khah hnih ka , “ Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , zecawtamaw o na pa pachia he ceh ?
40022019	Ngungkhui tho rua tei naa hmangpaw tangka phaesai cawh pa hmuhsah tua o , ” tatah a tah he . Tangka cawh va tle he ka ,
40022020	aa hai leco , “ Aho a lingthlaw maw a cawng ? Taico aho a cakhai maw a cia ? ” tatah a hae he .
40022021	Aaning tah , “ Sizar , ” tatah aa palei . Mataico aa hai letah , “ Sizar a tei cawh Sizar pei la , Khazing tei cawh Khazing pei my lo , ” a tah he .
40022022	Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa ning a ang thlang . Macawtaco piasai he ka , a seihly he .
40022023	Ma ningcai leco thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , bia aa hae hri .
40022024	“ Cawngpahtu , Moses tei a ma chingpaw cawh cawngsawpaw cawh sawteisah lytah a thih caco , a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la , a thipaw caw takhei sawtei a sah pápaw a cang a ma tah .
40022025	A cang caco kaa hrong letah uny pasarih a ung he . A uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka , a thi . Sawtei sah be ca ka , a nupui cawh a nyteipaw khah a ry si .
40022026	Ma thly hraco a pahningnah le a pathungnah taikhei a pasarihnah tai a cang he .
40022027	A hning cai taco , ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah .
40022028	Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma no cawh aa pasarih hrong letah aho a nupui maw a cang a ? Aa zongmingtei tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung , ” tatah aa tah .
40022029	Zisu taco , “ Naa rawh sua ngetei , Capathai a cang ly leh Khazing hmingtuakhynah naa hni lynah cawtah a cang .
40022030	Thokawnah leco a chuihae cawh ung khawh a be . Vaicung letei vaiming hratah aa cang tae a .
40022031	Canghrasala thihnah taitei thokawnah kong letah Khazing tei naaning kha a reipaw cawh ,
40022032	‘ Kama cawh Abraham Khazing , Isak Khazing le Jakob Khazing ka cang , ’ a tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw ? Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be , canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang hri , ” tatah a palei he .
40022033	Cawngsaw zawpui tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah a cawngpahnah khah aa ning a ang ngetei .
40022034	Zisu tah Sadusi sahlo cawh de ky tah a tua he tahpaw khah Farasi sahlo tah aa thui tihtah hmingkheh tah a pahmo he .
40022035	Aa hrong letei phungbia a thai ngeteipaw pakheh tah Zisu pase du takhei ma bia heh a hae .
40022036	“ Cawngpahtu , biapeh hrong lehei zehapaw maw a biapui cai ? ” tatah a tah .
40022037	Zisu taco , “ ‘ Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei , na hringnah vytei , na khuarawnah vytei khakhei do my lo , ’ tahpaw heh a cang .
40022038	Ma heh a sangkhehnah le alaicaipaw biapeh a cang .
40022039	Taico a sanghningnah cawh ma khahei a lo thlang , ‘ Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo , ’ tahpaw heh a cang .
40022040	Phungbia vytei le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa bia vytei cawh ma biapeh sanghning lehei a pakhung thlu he , ” tatah a palei .
40022041	Farasi sahlo cawh hmingkheh tah aa pahmo chung he takhei Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh ,
40022042	“ Khri kong lehei zekhatamaw naa rawh ? Aho pathlah maw a cang ? ” tatah a hae he . Aaning sahlo taco , “ David a pathlah , ” tatah aa palei .
40022043	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Ma hratei a cang caco , David tah Thlawpaw Pathai tah Khri khah , ‘ Abuipaw , ’ tatah a ypaw khah zekhatamaw a cang a ? Zecawtamaw tatah David tah ,
40022044	‘ Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh na carae sahlo khah na pherai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo , a tah , ’ tatah a tah .
40022045	David tah Khri cawh , ‘ Abuipaw , ’ a tah tlung , zekhatamaw David pathlah cawh a cang thai a ? ” tatah a tah he .
40022046	Palehnah bia kaw kheh hmai a rei khypaw ung be ca he ka , ma ning ri taico ahotahmai bia hae ngang khawh bei he .
40023001	Mataico Zisu tah zawpuipaw le a hningzuitu sahlo aa hai leco ,
40023002	“ Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh Moses a naw hnuinah a tlepaw a cang he .
40023003	Macawtaco aa bia nge la , aa ca chingpaw he hming maikaw khah tua my lo . Canghrasala aa tuapaw hratah tua khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah aa ca chingpaw he khah aaning tah zui bei he .
40023004	Hming a rih pawpui khah tongchai he ka , cawngsaw aa saitlang letah aa khing lai he , canghrasala aaning taco , ma hming sahlo hneihnang nápawtah aa kihdong hmai calia du bei he .
40023005	Hming aa tuapaw maikaw heh cawngsaw hmuh ruapaw tah aa tuapaw a cang . Capathai khungnah bawng a tongpaipaw he khah a kypui tah tua he ka , aa angki pasuapaw letei aa pathlepaw a cong cawh zetlua tamaw a pasua .
40023006	Kongchuanah letah a chawpaw hminghmaw khah du he ka , synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty aa du .
40023007	Chodo tlang letah cizaw hmo tah bia a ching khah du he ka , cawngsaw tah , ‘ Cawngpahtu , ’ tatah y khah aa du hrah .
40023008	Canghrasala naaning sahlo cawh , ‘ Cawngpahtu , ’ tatah a ysah khe o , zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh , Cawngpahtu pakheh suitei hnui he ceh ka , naaning vytei cawh uny na cang he ceh .
40023009	Taico aluicung lehei ahohmai , ‘ Apaw , ’ tatah va y khe o , zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh Paw pakheh suitei hnui he ceh ka , Ama cawh vaicung letei a ungpaw khah a cang .
40023010	‘ Cawngpahtu , ’ tatah pakheh hmai a ysah khe o , zecawtamaw tatah cawngpahtu pakheh hnui he ceh ka , Ama cawh Khri khah a cang .
40023011	Naa hrong letei alaicaipaw cawh naa raihretu a cang tae a .
40023012	Taico ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh pany cang tae a ka , ama le ama a panypaw cawh pasang a cang tae a .
40023013	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Cawngsaw hmekaw letah vaicung painah raang cawh naa kha . Naaning zong a nae bei he ceh , a nae dupaw sahlo zong a naesah hrah bei he ceh .
40023014	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Lahme ing sahlo khah chu lai he ceh ka , ma hmuh ná he seh tatah thlaw a sypui tah naa chang . Macawtaco a sah pui tah dangtah na cang tae he ceh .
40023015	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Cawngsaw pakheh naa behnah lang a paleh sá pawtah tlang le tui tah khua tlawng he ceh ka , a va paleh tih he tah naaning hratah hraihming sawcapaw sahlo tah a lehning tah naa tua he .
40023016	Mehco langchuitu sahlo , naa cing a ping ! ‘ Pakheh kheh tah behnah ing tah chia a sah caco , ma cawh zehmai pui be . Canghrasala pakheh kheh tah behnah ing sui tah chia a sah caco , ama cawh chia a sahpaw hrakhei a zui a , ’ naa tah .
40023017	Naaning mehco mehruh sahlo ! Zehapaw maw a lai vy ? Sui maw , sui a pathai sahpaw behnah ing maw ?
40023018	‘ Pakheh kheh tah dangnah siasang tah chia a sah caco , ma cawh zehmai pui be , canghrasala pakheh kheh tah a cung letei a ungpaw lahsong khei chia a sah caco , chia a sahpaw hrakhei a zui a , ’ tatah naa tah .
40023019	Naaning mehco sahlo ! Zehapaw maw a lai vy ? Lahsong maw , lahsong a pathaisahpaw dangnah siasang maw ?
40023020	Macawtaco dangnah siasang tah chia a sahpaw taco dangnah siasang le a cung letei hming a ungpaw maikaw khatah chia a sahpaw a cang .
40023021	Taico behnah ing tah chia a sahpaw taco behnah ing le a chung letei a ungpaw Khazing khakhei chia a sahpaw a cang .
40023022	Mataico , vaicung tei chia a sahpaw taco Khazing abui dyching le a cung letei a typaw Khazing khei chia a sahpaw a cang .
40023023	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Ringthopaw hanghui , maho , esing sahlo taikhah chyhraw chykheh naa peh . Canghrasala phungbia letei a biapui caipaw dingnah , zawngenah le zingchuipaw cangnah sahlo lekhei dethlang tah naa ung . A hmetaw teipaw heh dethlang lytah a hning teipaw zong heh naa tua ruapaw a cang .
40023024	Naaning langchuitu mehco sahlo ! Sisaw dingpai sua le peh tatah tui cawh thlih he ceh ka , canghrasala sahisy cawh naa langpai .
40023025	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Ny le pakang sahlo cawh alailang tah pathaisah he ceh ka , canghrasala a chunglang cawh dusawnah le ma zawng long rawhnah chitah a chih thlang .
40023026	Farasi mehco sahlo ! Ny le pakang cawh a chunglang pathaisah taw la , mataico alailang zong khah a pathai a .
40023027	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Naaning cawh si araangpaw thupaw thlai , a cung lang tah a nge ngetei tlung katei , a chunglang cawh mehthi ru le a pialuipaw hming maikaw tah a chihpaw hratah na cang he ceh .
40023028	Ma hraco a cung lang co mehding ky lo he ceh ka , canghrasala a chunglang co ziatainah le chiahrunah khatah na chih he ceh .
40023029	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo , naaning cungmai raipha sahlo , naa cing a ping ! Khazing khuavang sahlo aa cawtah thlailung bing he ceh ka , mehding sahlo aa thlai cawh naa pasang .
40023030	Mataico , ‘ Kaa mapaw sahlo aa chai lekhei za ung hrah peh seh la , Khazing khuavang sahlo aa thawnahpaw he letah aaning sahlo khaco a pahlawh bei peh , ’ tatah naa tah .
40023031	Macawtaco Khazing khuavang sahlo a za theh pawhe pathlah sahlo naa cangpaw khah naaning teitah na phy he ceh .
40023032	Macawtaco naa mapaw sahlo aa pathopaw suanah cawh patlungpatlia thlang ca o !
40023033	Naaning pari sahlo ! Naaning pari a pathlah sahlo ! Hraihming lang tlah khah zekhatamaw naa cahri thai a ?
40023034	Macawtaco Khazing khuavang sahlo le mehsing sahlo le cawngpahtu sahlo khah naaning kha ka va taw he . Aaning letei thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh theh a he ceh ka , khraws letah naa khaipai he a , ahringpaw sahlo cawh naa synagog sahlo letah saving rui tah chei he ceh ka , khua kheh khy khua khé tah naa cadai lai he ceh .
40023035	Ma hraco mehdingpaw Abel thisai taitah behnah ing le dangnah siasang kaa letei naa thawpaw Berekia a sawcapaw Zakaria thisai tai , aluicung letei lai sahpaw mehding aa thisai vytei cawtah sua phosah tah thaily a cangpaw na cang he ceh .
40023036	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma sahlo vytei heh atochai saw aa cung lehei a tlung a .
40023037	Vy Jerusalem , Jerusalem , Khazing khuavang sahlo khah za theh he ceh ka , Khazing tah naaning khatah a tawpaw he a cawngsaw sahlo khah alung tah na va seh tei he . Aa puino tah a sawtei sahlo a mathlaw rai letah a bakhupaw he hratah , na cawngsaw sahlo cawh ui khazeh uilui maw pakhong du he neh ka , canghrasala du bei he ceh .
40023038	Mingtua hmai o , naa ing cawh a ching myca .
40023039	Ka ca ching he , ‘ Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song cang ky seh , ’ tatah naa tah hlai vytei cawh pa hmuh kaw khaw bei ceh , ” tatah a tah .
40024001	Zisu cawh behnah ing taitah piathlah ka , a khiakaly lai tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo tah behnah ingpui cawh hmuhsah ruapaw takhei Ama khatah a vong he .
40024002	Zisu taco , “ Ma hming vytei heh naa hmuh maw ? Biahmuisui ka ca ching he . Ma letei alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw ung a be , aa zongmingtei tah palehly thlu a cang tae he a , ” tatah a tah .
40024003	Zisu cawh Oliv tlaang letah a ty thlang ning takhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning teitah Ama khaco a vong he ka , “ Ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a ? Ma ching tua ! Na vong nápaw caichangnah paching pakhanah cawh zemaw a cang tae a ? ” tatah aa hae .
40024004	Zisu taco , “ Ahotahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo .
40024005	Zecawtamaw tatah ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka , ‘ Kama heh Khri cawh ka cang , ’ tah a he ka , cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a .
40024006	Rae a dypaw he le rae thongpang khah naa thui a , canghrasala a pahly khe lo . Ma hming sahlo cawh a ung hrahringpaw a cang he , canghrasala a changnah cang balang be .
40024007	Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka , painah le painah a dy he a . Hming hlupui letah cakaang tlung ka , aling a hrui a .
40024008	Ma vytei heh canu ny ung risaw hrang a pathonah hratah a cang .
40024009	Mataico , naaning sahlo cawh hreh ruapaw tah male kih letah peh cang he ceh ka , thaw na cang he ceh , taico kama ka rawng tahei mingphing maikaw tah aa ca hua he a .
40024010	Ma cai leco ming hlupui cawh aa zingnah taitah a paleh a he ka , a luithe a he ka , pakheh le pakheh a hua he a ,
40024011	taico khuavang pakheipaw hlupui chuh a he ka , cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a .
40024012	Chahlynah a pungchy navai tah cawngsaw hlupui donah cawh a zochuh longmang a .
40024013	Canghrasala , a changnah tai cyky tah a dawpaw cawngsaw cawh pachah a cang a .
40024014	Taico , mingphing vytei khatah hnikhuitu cang ruapaw tah painah raang thawngchawbia cawh rei cang tae a ka , mataico caichangnah cawh a va chuh a .
40024015	Khazing khuavang Daniel tah a reipaw , ‘ Rorangnah a chua khuipaw pasih padawh chuipaw , ’ cawh hming pathai letah a daw thlangpaw khah naa hmuh tihtah a reitu tah a silang hnih he seh .
40024016	Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh .
40024017	A ing cung letei a ungpaw cawngsaw cawh hmingbo lá pawtah ing rai lang cung kheh seh .
40024018	Ly letei a ungpaw cawh a angkilai lá pawtah ing lang tlung hrah kheh seh .
40024019	Ma ningcai cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a !
40024020	Naa sai nápaw cai heh thlasih le Sabat ning tah a cang ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo .
40024021	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah khazaw a tua tho ning taitah ato ning tai lehei a ung bang lypaw ningping vaisangnah alaipaw pui tlung tae a ka , ma tluhpaw cawh ung bang khawh a be .
40024022	Ma cai cawh pachingsah lypaw takhei cang my seh la , a hringpaw pakheh hmai ung a bei he , canghrasala Khazing tei a thingpaw sahlo rawng takhei pachingsah a cang tae a .
40024023	Ma tih taco pakheh kheh tah , ‘ Mingtua , ma lehei Khri a ung , ’ a cang ly leh , ‘ ma lekhei a ung , ’ tatah a ca tah caco he zing khe lo .
40024024	Zemaw tahpaw co Khri pakheipaw sahlo le khuavang pakheipaw sahlo chuh a he ka , a cang khy caco Khazing thingpaw cawngsaw sahlo hmai dungkhei pawtah arungnawpaw paching pakhanah sahlo le ningang chuipaw hming sahlo khah aa tua a .
40024025	A cai a phah hlai tah ka ca ching pacia he .
40024026	Macawtaco pakheh kheh tah , ‘ Ma raangcaa lekhei a ung , ’ a ca tah caco he va sei khe lo , a cang ly leh ‘ Ing chung letah a ung , ’ a ca tah caco he va zing khe lo .
40024027	Zecawtamaw tatah lailaw cawh nichualang taitah nitlah lang tai a kypaw hratah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongkawnah cawh a cang tae a .
40024028	Sarawh a ungnah hminghmaw leco langtaw pavaw cawh a pahmo tei he .
40024029	Ma ningcai sahlo letei ningping vaisangnah a cang khy cangkaw tei leh , ‘ Ning cawh muisah cang a ka , thlawpaw zong khai khawh a be . Esi sahlo cawh avai taitah tlah a he ka , avai letei hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh a cang he a . ’
40024030	Ma cai leco , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a paching pakhanah cawh avai letah a paly a ka , aluicung letei mingphing vytei sahlo cawh a cah tae he a . Hmingtuakhynah le a rungnawpaw laisuinah khatah avai meding cung letah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongpaw khah aa hmuh a .
40024031	Mataico , a vaiming sahlo khah hmoka a thangpui tah tung hmotah taw a he ka , aaning sahlo taco thingpaw sahlo khah alui ki pali taitah avai a changnah a rakheh taikhei a rahkheh a changnah tai aa pahmo he a .
40024032	Thuiku kung tai hei cawngpahnah bia heh a ngia my lo . Achawng ka chawng katei a hnaw pany a ka chuapaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tatah naa hni .
40024033	Ma hraco ma hming vytei a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah a vong kaw nápaw cai a ne myca , ingkaw hrang a va phah myca tahpaw khah hnih my lo .
40024034	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang a bei he .
40024035	Alui le avai cawh a rawh a , canghrasala ka bia cawh a rawh by a be .
40024036	A ning le a cai cawh Paw tah cy ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he , vaicung leteipaw vaiming sahlo tahmai hnih bei he , Sawcapaw zong tah hnih hrah be .
40024037	Noah a chaining leteipaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah cawh a cang tae a .
40024038	Zecawtamaw tatah tuipa-ia a tlung hlai tai khei Noah tuilawng chunglang a naenah tai lekhei cawngsaw cawh e he ka , ding he ka , a chui a hae he ka , a hnui he .
40024039	Taico tuipa-ia tlung katei , aaning vytei a seikhui thlu hlai tai lekhei co zehming maw a tlung a tahpaw zehmai hnih bei he . Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah ning leco ma hraco a cang a .
40024040	Ly letah a ungpaw cawngsaw pahning chung taikhei pakheh cawh lah cang ka , pakheh cawh seisai a cang a .
40024041	Canu pahning tah saangsuh leimei a he ka , pakheh cawh lah cang a ka , pakheh cawh seisai a cang tae a .
40024042	Macawtaco a raering my lo , zecawtamaw tatah zening tamaw naa Buipaw cawh a vong a takhah hnih bei he ceh kho .
40024043	Canghrasala , ma heh hnih my lo , ing hnuitu tah mehru cawh zai zetih cai letah maw a va chua a takhah hnih thah my seh la , achaw teitah vai a ka , a ing cawh hrawh sá a be .
40024044	Macawtaco a mai pacia tah ung my lo , zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh naa rawh lypaw cai lekhei a vong a .
40024045	Aho khah maw zing a chuipaw le a singpaw sae , a buipaw tah a ingchungkho sae sahlo khah a cai naning teitah batui peh rua pawtah rai a pehpaw cawh a cang ?
40024046	A buipaw a va tlung kaw tihtah a reipaw hratei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw sae cawh meh vaichaw a cang a .
40024047	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , mapaw cawh a hnuichia vytei a mingkaitu takhei a tua a .
40024048	Canghrasala , ma saecapaw cawh mehchawly cang tah ama le ama khah , ‘ Ka buipaw cawh a ry cong thlang a , ’ tah seh la ,
40024049	a vesaw sae sahlo khah daiphong he seh la , zu a ruipaw sahlo khatah ding le e tah ung thlang seh la ,
40024050	ma saecapaw a buipaw cawh a rawh lypaw ning le pacang lypaw cai letah va tlung seh la ,
40024051	a buipaw tah a saecapaw cawh caiping caimang taichung a ka , caw le hawrianah hminghmaw , cungmai raipha sahlo ungnah lekhei a ungsah hrah a .
40025001	Ma cai leco vaicung painah raang cawh aa me-ing a tle he katei , nupui a chuipaw satlepaw va dai rua pawtah a seipaw he laisaw pathai pahraw khatah a lo a .
40025002	Aaning chung taico papangawpaw cawh a hruhpaw cang he ka , a tangpaw papangawpaw cawh a singpaw a cang he .
40025003	A hruhpaw papangawpaw taco aa me-ing cawh a tle thlang he ka , canghrasala metui cawh a cakai bei he .
40025004	Canghrasala a singpaw papangawpaw cawh me-ing a tle he ka , tuithei khei metui a cakai pai he .
40025005	Nupui chui satlepaw cawh va chuh haa ngetei ka , aa zongmingtei co aa mehku ka , a ihning thlu he .
40025006	Zaicing taco , ‘ Nupui chui satlepaw a va chuh myca khi ! Dai tei law ! ’ tatah a ysang he .
40025007	Mataico laisaw pathai pahraw cawh ka tho he ka , aa me-ing cawh aa vang .
40025008	Mehruh sahlo taco mehsing sahlo cawh , ‘ Na metui ma rai bang tua law , kaa metui a chang thah , ’ tatah aa tah he .
40025009	‘ Cang thai be , a ungpaw heh naaning kha , kaaning khaco a ma zaw a be . Metui a zuapaw khatah va sei la , naaning teitah va co hri thlang o , ’ tatah aa palei he .
40025010	Canghrasala metui caw pawtah aa va sei chung taco nupui chui satlepaw cawh a va chuh . A mai pacia thah tei a ungpaw laisaw pathai sahlo cawh ama khaco nupui chui kongchuanah lang cawh aa va sei . Taico ingkaw cawh aa kha .
40025011	A hning taco , ahringpaw sahlo cawh va chuh he ka , ‘ Abuipaw , abuipaw , ingkaw ma hong tua law , ’ tatah aa tah .
40025012	Canghrasala , ‘ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ca hnih bei neh , ’ tatah a palei he .
40025013	Macawtaco a raering my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ka vong kaw nápaw a ning le suimehlang a cai naa hni ly cawtah hei .
40025014	Taico , vaicung painah raang cawh a sae sahlo y he katei , a hnuicho a chiaso sipaw he khuatlong a thopaw cawngsawpaw khatah a lo vy hui .
40025015	Aaning leh tuakhynah aa hnuipaw naning khei pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thong pangaw , pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thonghning , pakhehpaw cawh ngung tangka thongkheh a peh he . Mataico khuatlongnah lang cawh a sei .
40025016	Ngung tangka thong pangaw a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh va sei palang ka , a ngung tangka cawh rai va hre naw ka , thong pangaw a miasah .
40025017	Ma hraco ngung tangka thonghning a lawpaw taco thonghning a miasah hrah .
40025018	Canghrasala , ngung tangka thongkheh a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh va sei ka , alui letah a kho va co ka , a buipaw a ngung tangka cawh a va no .
40025019	Khua sypui khy takhei ma sae sahlo aa buipaw cawh va tlung ka , aa ngung tangka cawh a mingpah he .
40025020	Ngung tangka thong pangaw a lawpaw taco , ahringpaw thong pangaw khah a va tle lai . ‘ Abuipaw , ngung tangka thong pangaw na pa chiasosipaw khah mingtua , thong pangaw ka miasah hi , ’ tatah a tah .
40025021	Abuipaw taco , ‘ Na tua thai caimang , mehchaw le zingchuipaw sae ! Nama cawh hming a cawng pawtei letah zingchuipaw na cangnah cawtah hming a hlupaw pui a mingkaitu tah ka ca tua a . A vong la , na buipaw a lunglawngnah heh a va hrong hrah , ’ tatah a palei .
40025022	Ngung tangka thonghning a lawpaw cawngsawpaw zong cawh a vong hrah . ‘ Abuipaw , ngung tangka thonghning na pa chiasosipaw khah mingtua , thonghning ka miasah hi , ’ tatah a tah .
40025023	A buipaw taco , ‘ Na tua thai caimang , mehchaw le zingchuipaw sae ! Nama cawh hming a chiapaw tei letah zingchuipaw na cang cawtah hming a hlupaw pui a mingkaitu tah ka ca tua a . A vong la , na buipaw a lunglawngnah heh a va hrong hrah , ’ tatah a palei .
40025024	Mataico ngung tangka thongkheh a lawpaw cawngsawpaw cawh a vong ka , ‘ Abuipaw , nama cawh mehcicia cang ceh ka , thleci na cing lynah hming letah hre lai ceh ka , na vapaw a cang lypaw saze khah na pahmo lai tahpaw ka hni .
40025025	Macawtaco ka thlawzawng ka , va sei neh ka , na tangka khah alui letah ka va no . Mingtua , ma heh na tei cawh a cang hi , ’ tatah a tah .
40025026	A buipaw taco , ‘ Nama mehchawly , sae thawthi ! Thleci ka va lynah hming letah ka hrepaw le ka vapaw a cang lypaw saze ka pahmo laipaw cawh na hni tah law ?
40025027	Ma hratei na hni thlang tlung pawtah ka tangka khah tangkachianah letah za chia la , ka va tlung tihtah a hrang kha a mia kha hmuh a bei neh maw ? ’
40025028	‘ Ma cawngsawpaw letei tangka heh law la , tangka thonghraw a hnuipaw cawngsawpaw khah pei o .
40025029	Zecawtamaw tatah a hnuipaw maikaw cawh peh chi vy cang a ka , a hlupui a hnui a . A hnui lypaw cawngsaw cawh a hnuitlakang pawtei hmai khah lah pah a cang a .
40025030	Taico ma chahnainah a hnui lypaw sae heh alailang muinah chunglang caw le hawrianah hminghmaw lang khah vathlang o , ’ tatah a tah he .
40025031	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a vaiming vytei khatah a rungnawnah khatah a vong tihtah a rungnawnah abui dyching letah a ty a .
40025032	Mingphing vytei cawh a hme letah a pahmo tae he ka , tuukingpaw tah mei le tuu a chaichy pawhe hratah cawngsaw khah pakheh le pakheh khah a pachai he a .
40025033	Tuu sahlo khah a cacang lang letah chiá he ka , mei sahlo khah a cavui lang letah a chia he a .
40025034	Mataico , Siangpahrang tah a cacang lang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh , ‘ A vong tua o , naaning ka Paw tei bonghnang a songpaw sahlo , naa cy ruapaw a cangpaw vaicung painah raang , khazaw papining taitei naa cawtah pachiapaning ciapaw heh a lah tua o .
40025035	Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaidi ka , e ruapaw naa pa peh , ka tuihrae ka , ding ruapaw naa pa peh , khuachai cang neh ka , naa ing letah naa pa tlungsah ,
40025036	chaichi a phahlah neh ka , chaichi naa pa tuapah , a sah neh ka , naa pa mingkai , thongtlah neh ka , pa vai he ceh ka , naa pa baw , ’ a tah he a .
40025037	Mataico , mehding sahlo taco , ‘ Abuipaw , zening tamaw na ngaidipaw ca hmuh peh ka , batui kaa ca peh bang , a cang ly leh na tuihrae ka , ding ruapaw kaa ca peh bang ?
40025038	Zening tamaw khuachai na cangpaw ca hmuh peh ka , kaa ing letah kaa ca tlungsah bang , a cang ly leh chaichi a phahlah ceh ka , chaichi kaa ca tua pah bang ?
40025039	Zening tamaw na sawpaw kaa ca hmuh bang , a cang ly leh thongtlah ceh ka , kaa ca vai bang ? ’ tatah aa chai a .
40025040	Siangpahrang taco , ‘ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ka uny sahlo letei a chia caipaw cung letah naa tuapaw khah kama letah naa tuapaw a cang , ’ tatah a palei he a .
40025041	Mataico a cavui lang teipaw sahlo khah , ‘ Naaning chiasahpaw sahlo , Setan le a vaiming sahlo cawtah pachia ciapaw chaizaw me chunglang khah seihly o .
40025042	Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaidi ka , e ruapaw zehmai pa pei bang bei he ceh , ka tuihrae ka , ding ruapaw zehmai pa pei bang bei he ceh ,
40025043	khuachai cang neh ka , naa ing letah pa tlungsah bang bei he ceh , chaichi a phahlah neh ka , chaichi pa va so bang bei he ceh , ka saw hmotah thongtlah neh ka , pa vai tah pa baw bang bei he ceh , ’ a tah he a .
40025044	Aaning sahlo taco , ‘ Abuipaw zening tamaw na ngaidipaw ca hmuh peh ka , a cang ly leh na tuihraepaw khah ca hmuh peh ka , a cang ly leh khuachai cang ceh ka , a cang ly leh chaichi a phahlah ceh ka , a cang ly leh a sah ceh ka , a cang ly leh thongtlah ceh ka , ca baw lytah kaa ung ? ’ tatah aa tah a .
40025045	Ama taco , ‘ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he . Ma cawngsaw sahlo letei a chia caipaw cung letei naa tua lypaw cawh kama ka cung letah naa tua lypaw a cang , ’ tatah a palei he a .
40025046	Mataico aaning sahlo cawh chaizaw dangtahnah lang aa sei a . Canghrasala mehding sahlo cawh chaizaw hringnah lang aa sei a , ” tatah a tah .
40026001	Zisu cawh ma bia sahlo vytei heh a reithlu khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo khah ,
40026002	“ Naa hni thlangpaw hratah Khungsai Panawnah heh ninghning a du ka , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh khraws letah khaipai rua pawtah male kih letah peh a cang tae a , ” tatah a tah he .
40026003	Mataico , tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh tlangbui alaicaipaw a ming Kaiafa a cangpaw a ing lekhei a pahmo he ka ,
40026004	Zisu cawh aparuh teitah tlé tah thaw ruapaw takhei khua aa khang .
40026005	“ Canghrasala Khungsaipanaw chung leco cang kheh seh , cawngsaw hrong letah hnahnawhnah maw chuh sua le , ” tatah aa tah .
40026006	Zisu cawh Bethani khuapaw Simon mehthinghmui ing letei a ung chung takhei ,
40026007	canu pakheh a vong ka , lungrang tuithei khei sathy ringthopaw , a mai a ru ngeteipaw khah va tle lai ka , Zisu cawh cabuai letah a ty thlangning takhei a lu taico a za bia .
40026008	A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa thingae ka , “ Zecawtamaw ma tluh amai a rupaw sathy heh a patlawh a papang ?
40026009	Ma ringthopaw heh a mai sangpui tah zua tah tangka cawh mehsisah peh khypaw pui a cang caw , ” tatah aa tah .
40026010	Zisu tah ma cawh hnih ka , “ Zecawtamaw ma cawngsawno heh hna naa hnawh ? Ka cung letah a tuapaw heh hmingchaw a cang hi .
40026011	Mehsisah cawh naaning khatah a ung paria thlang he , canghrasala kama cawh ung paria bei neh .
40026012	Ma ringthopaw heh ka pung letah a pa bia tih tahei phung ka cang nápaw cawtah a pachia a paningpaw a cang .
40026013	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , khazaw letah thawngchawbia aa reinah maikaw letah ma cawngsawno tei a tuapaw heh ama monghly lynah tah rei a cang tae hrá a , ” tatah a tah he .
40026014	Mataico , a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas Iskariot aa tahpaw cawh tlangbui macang sahlo khatah va sei ka ,
40026015	“ Zisu cawh naa kih letah ca pei my he neh seh la , zemaw naa pa pae a ? ” tatah a va hae he . Ngung tangka songthung khah rei he ka , aa peh .
40026016	Ma khy taikhei Judas cawh aaning khatah Zisu a peh khy nápaw he cai chaw khah a bo thlang .
40026017	Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning hmetawpaw lekhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , “ Zeletamaw Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh na cawtah pachia he peh seh la , na du ? ” tatah aa hae .
40026018	Zisu taco , “ Khuapui chung letei cawngsawpaw pakheh khatah va sei la , ‘ Cawngpahtu tah ka ning le ka cai a ne myca . Ka hningzuitu sahlo khahei na ing letah Khungsai Panawnah heh ka tua theh be , a tah , ’ tatah va ching my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
40026019	Macawtaco Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh va sei he ka , Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia .
40026020	Zailang leco Zisu cawh a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khaco cabuai letah a ty thlang hrah .
40026021	Taico , very aa e chung taco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , naaning taihei pakheh tah naa pa lui a , ” tatah a tah he .
40026022	Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa ngechia ngetei ka , pakheh khy pakheh tah , “ Abuipaw , kama cang hrahring bei neh , cang maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
40026023	Zisu taco , “ Kama khatei bakang letah a pohruipaw cawngsawpaw tahei a pa lui a .
40026024	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Capathai tah a kong a ciapaw hratah a cung letah a tlung a . Canghrasala Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping ! Za pi lytah ung seh la , a cawtah a chah vy hripaw , ” tatah a palei he .
40026025	Mataico , Ama a luipaw cawngsawpaw Judas taco , “ Cawngpahtu , kama cang hrahring bei neh , cang maw ? ” tatah a tah . Zisu taco , “ Aw , nama na cang , ” tatah a chai .
40026026	Aa e chung taco Zisu tah very cawh law ka , lawngbia hlai ka , kychy ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh pei he ka , “ Law la , e my lo , ma heh ka pungsaw a cang , ” a tah he .
40026027	Mataico ny cawh law ka , lawngbia a hlai khy taikhei a hlai he . “ Naa zongmingtei khei ma ny taihei ding tua hmai o .
40026028	Ma heh ming hlupui sua ngethai nápaw cawtah a laipaw ka thisai , biahrai thapaw cawh a cang .
40026029	Ka ca ching he , atoning taihei ka Paw a painah raang letah naaning khatah a thapaw ka ding ning tai ma misur hang heh ding khaw bei neh , ” a tah he .
40026030	Reithainah hlaw sungkheh aa sah khy taitah Oliv tlaang lang cawh aa ke .
40026031	Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh , “ Ato zai lalei lehei na pa paisai thlu he ceh , zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei Capathai letah , ‘ Tuukingtu khah chei a neh ka , tuu vytei cawh a paipatlaw thlu he a . ’ tatah cia a cang .
40026032	Canghrasala ka tho kaw khy taitah naaning naa hmelang tah Galili raang lang ka seihlang a , ” tatah a ching he .
40026033	Canghrasala Piter taco , “ Nama na kong lehei aa zongmingtei tah a ca paisai thlu hmai he tah kama cawh ca seisai by bei neh , ” tatah a palei .
40026034	Zisu tah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , ato zai lalei lehei aa a khawng hlai tah uithung tai na pa paphahsai a , ” tatah a chai .
40026035	Canghrasala Piter taco , “ Nama khatah thih hrápaw a cang zong tah ca paphah sai by a bei neh , ” tatah zawpui thui tah a tah . Taico ahringpaw a hningzuitu vytei zong tah ma hraco aa tah hrah .
40026036	Mataico , Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah Gethsemani aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang khah va sei he ka , aa hai letah , “ Va sei vy neh ka , thlaw ka chang chung cawh ma lehei a ty thlang my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
40026037	Piter le Zebedi a sawcapaw pahning khah Ama khatah a chui he ka , lung reithui le vaisang y tah a ung .
40026038	Taico aa hai letah , “ Ka hringnah heh thih khui khypaw ngechianah khatah a chih . Ma lehei kama khatah ung thlang la , a raering my lo , ” a tah he .
40026039	Mataico a cawngpe va sei ka , alui letah a bawh ka , “ Ka Paw a cang khy pawtei a cang caco , ma tai-ingnah ny heh pa lah pah hly thlang . Canghrasala kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh , ” tatah thlaw a chang .
40026040	Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong ka , aa ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh . “ Suimehlang pakheh hmai kama khatah a raering teitah ung khy bei he ceh maw ? ” tatah Piter khah a hae .
40026041	“ Tuhsonah chunglang naa tlah ly nápawtah a raering la , thlawchang my lo . Thlawpaw taco a du thlang , canghrasala pungsaw tah ceh be , ” a tah he .
40026042	A uihningnah va sei kaw ka , “ Ka Paw , ma tai-ingnah ny heh ka ding ly nápawtah lahly a cang khy ly pawtei a cang caco , na dunahpaw hratah cang ky seh , ” tatah thlaw cawh a va chang .
40026043	A va kaw kaw tihtah aa ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh , zecawtamaw tatah aa meh ku tu ka , ceh bei he .
40026044	Macawtaco seisai he ka , va sei vy ka , thlaw a chang teipaw hraco a uithungnah a va chang vy .
40026045	Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong kaw ka , aa hai letah , “ Ato tingtai heh maw a ih he ceh ka , na hia thlang he ceh ? Mingtua o , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah hlai nápaw cai a ne myca hi .
40026046	Tho la sei he peh ! A pa ruiphiapaw sahlo a va chuh myca he khi ! ” a tah he .
40026047	Bia a rei leimei chung taco ahningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas a va chuh . Ama khatah tlangbui macang le macang sahlo tei aa tawpaw he tungby le zyzi a tlepaw cawngsaw rungpui a va chui he .
40026048	A luitupaw taco aaning cawh , “ Ka hnangpaw khah Ama cawh a cang a , tle my lo , ” tatah paching pakhanah a peh pacia thah he .
40026049	Zisu khaco a vaw palang ka , Judas tah , “ Cawngpahtu , ” tatah y ka , a hnang .
40026050	Zisu taco , “ Ka dua , na vonghno changpaw cawh tua thlang , ” tatah a palei . Mataico cawngsaw sahlo cawh va cakang he ka , Zisu cawh aa tle .
40026051	Zisu khatah ma letei a ungpaw pakhehpaw taco a zyzi cawh pazah ka , a phe ka , tlangbui alaicaipaw a saecapaw a naw khah tuh ka , a pathai thlah .
40026052	Zisu taco , “ Na zyzi khah a kong lang tei kaw , zecawtamaw tatah zyzi a lahpaw vytei cawh zyzi tah aa thih a .
40026053	Ka Paw y neh seh la , sungkheh tah a vaiming raekeh phuhraw hluihning a za pa thlawpah khy thlang he tahpaw hnih bei ceh maw ?
40026054	Canghrasala , ma hraco cang tua my seh la , zekhatamaw ma hrahei a cang a tatei aa reipaw Capathai bia cawh a tling khy thai a ? ” tatah a tah .
40026055	Ma cai leco Zisu tah ming zawpui hai leco , “ Rae a thopaw sahlo hotu ka cangnah caw tamaw tle rua pawtah zyzi le thingtai tah naa pa seihno ? Ning tating tah behnah ingdung chung letah a ty neh ka , ka cawngpah he , pa tle tlung bei he ceh .
40026056	Canghrasala , Khazing khuavang sahlo ciasipaw a tling nápaw cawtah ma hming sahlo heh a va ungpaw a cang hi , ” tatah a tah he . Mataico a hningzuitu vytei taco hningchai he ka , aa saisai thlu .
40026057	Zisu a tlepaw cawngsaw sahlo takhei , phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo a pahmonah pawhe tlangbui alaicaipaw Kaiafa a ungnah lang khah aa seikhui .
40026058	Canghrasala Piter tah langhlaw pui khei tlangbui alaicaipaw a ingdung taikhah a zuilai . Zekhatamaw hming a chuacang a , tahpaw hni du takhei a chunglang a nae thlah ka , raevai sahlo khakhei a va ty .
40026059	Tlangbui macang sahlo le Sanhedrin khongsil vytei taco Zisu thaw khy nápawtah khei bia hnihtu pakheipaw sahlo khah aa hui he .
40026060	Canghrasala zehmai hmuh bei he . Hnikhuitu pakheipaw hlupui aa va chua thlang naná teitah zehmai hmuh hlui bei he . Ahning cai letah cawngsaw pahning a hmelang va chuh he ka ,
40026061	“ Ma cawngsawpaw tahei , ‘ Ma Khazing behnah ing heh chehthlah a neh ka , ningthung tah ka sah khy kaw thlu a , ’ a tah , ” tatah aa tah .
40026062	Mataico , tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a ka daw ka Zisu cawh , “ Aa bia heh palei bei he ceh maw ? Ma cawngsaw sahlo tei sua aa ca pupaw heh zemaw a cang ? ” tatah a tah .
40026063	Canghrasala Zisu cawh de teitah a ung thlang . Tlangbui alaicaipaw taco , “ Khazing hring ming tah ka ca hae . Khazing Sawcapaw Khri cawh na cang maw , ma ching tua , ” tatah a tah .
40026064	Zisu taco , “ Aw , na reipaw hraco a cang . Canghrasala naa zongmingtei hai letah ka rei , hmelang leco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing cacang lang letah a typaw le avai meding cung letah a vongpaw khah naa hmuh a , ” tatah a palei .
40026065	Mataico , tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a chaichi khah hriachy ka , “ Khazing pui a reipachia myca he ! Hnikhuitu hringpaw kaa hia khawh chang maw ? Khazing a reipachianah cawh ato khah naa thui thlang myca kho .
40026066	Zekhatamaw naa rawh ? ” tatah a tah . “ Ama cawh thih tlang a tlahpaw a cang , ” tatah aa chai .
40026067	Mataico , aa ci tah a hme letah chawh he ka , aa kia tah aa cabai . Ahringpaw sahlo takhei cabai he ka ,
40026068	“ Khri , ma ching tua , ahomaw a ca cabai ? ” tatah aa tah .
40026069	Piter cawh ingdung chung lekhei a ty thlang ka , saecanu pakheh cawh Ama lang khah a vong . Canuno taco , “ Nama zong heh Galili Zisu khatei a ung teipaw na cang hrah , ” tatah a tah .
40026070	Canghrasala aa zongmingtei hme leco a paphah , “ Zemaw na rei tahpaw hnih bei neh , ” tatah a tah .
40026071	Mataico , hawkaw lai lang piathlah ka , ma leco ahringpaw canuno takhei hmuh ka , ma leteipaw cawngsaw sahlo hai leco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh Nazaret Zisu khatah a ung teipaw a cang , ” tatah a tah .
40026072	“ Ma cawngsawpaw cawh hnih bei neh ! ” tatah chia a sá tah a paphah .
40026073	Ma khy taico , a cawngpe lekhei a kae letei a dawpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh Piter khaco va sei he ka , “ Nama heh aa hrong leteipaw na cang hrahring , zemaw tahpaw co na reikaw tah a bi thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
40026074	Mataico Piter tah , “ Ma paw cawh hnih hrahring bei neh ! ” tatah chia a sah ka , bia a kaang . Ma cangkaw leco , aa cawh a khawng .
40026075	Taico Piter cawh Zisu tei a hai letei bia a reipaw , “ Aa a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphahsai a , ” a tahpaw bia khah a ka thui kaw . Taico alailang piahly ka , o tlili tah a cah .
40027001	Mataico mongdi taco tlangbui macang vytei le macang sahlo cawh a tong he ka , Zisu thaw pawtah bia aa pathluh .
40027002	Zisu cawh tongchai he ka , rang uhbui Pilat khatah aa hlai .
40027003	Ma hratei Zisu aa tuapaw khah a luitupaw Judas takhei a hmuh tihtah a ngepachih caimang tei ka , ngung tangka songthung khah law ka , tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo cawh a pakaw kaw he .
40027004	“ Suanah a hnui lypaw cawngsaw ka luinah cawtah hei ka sua tu thlang , ” tatah a tah . “ Kaa cawtah zemaw a pui ? Ma cawh nama na rai a cang , ” tatah aa palei .
40027005	Macawtaco , Judas tah ngung tangka cawh behnah ing leco vathlang si ka , a sei . Mataico seihly ka , ama teitah thingrui tah a pathleseh .
40027006	Tlangbui macang sahlo taco ngung tangka cawh law he ka , “ Ma heh tangkabawng letah sang ruapaw taco a phung cang be , lenong mai tah pehpaw tangka cang tlung ka , ” tatah aa tah .
40027007	Macawtaco , ma tangka cawh raang hringpaw cawngsaw sahlo phung nápawtah bei a tuatupaw alyraang cawhnah tah hmang pawtah bia aa chaw .
40027008	Ma rawng taco ma lyraang cawh atoning tai thisai lyraang tatah aa ynahpaw a cang .
40027009	Mataico Khazing khuavang Jeremai tah a reipaw , “ Israel cawngsaw sahlo tah ama amai aa thliapaw ngung tangka songthung khah law he ka ,
40027010	Abuipaw tah naw a pa pehpaw hratah bei tuatupaw alyraang cawhnah lekhei aa hmang , ” tahpaw tlingnah khah a cang .
40027011	Zisu cawh raang uhbui Pilat hme letah a daw thlangning taco , raang uhbui tah , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw ? ” tatah a hae . “ A cang , na reipaw hraco a cang , ” tatah Zisu taco a palei .
40027012	Tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo tah sua aa pu tihtah zehmai chai bei he .
40027013	Mataico Pilat taco a hai letah , “ Sua aa ca punah bia aa reipaw cawh thui bei ceh maw ? ” tatah a hae .
40027014	Canghrasala Zisu tah kawkheh hmai a palei lypaw khah raang uhbui cawh a ning a ang ngetei .
40027015	Khungsai Panawnah lehei mingzawpui tei chuasah aa dupaw thongtlah pakheh cawh raang uhbui tah a thlawpah tei he .
40027016	Ma cai leco Baraba aa tahpaw chahlynah lang tei a ming a thang ngeteipaw thongtlahpaw pakheh a ung .
40027017	Macawtaco mingzawpui a pahmoning he takhei Pilat tah , “ Baraba le Khri aa tahpaw Zisu lehei aho heh maw ma thlawpah seh tah naa du ? ” tatah a hae he .
40027018	Hnachuanah rawng tah tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh ama khatah aa va chuakhui tahpaw khah a hni thlang .
40027019	Pilat cawh biacenah dyching letah a ty thlangning takhei , a nupuino tah , “ Ma suanah a hnui lypaw cawngsawpaw khah zekhatahmai tua kheh lo . Zecawtamaw tatah ato zamong ka mang letah ama a rawng tah ka taithui ngetei , ” tatah bia a caw si .
40027020	Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le macang sahlo takhei zawpuipaw khah Baraba khah thlaw la , Zisu khah theh law naa tah a , tatah aa pasy he .
40027021	Raang uhbui taco , “ Ma tlaw pahning lehei aho heh maw thlaw seh tah naa pa du ? ” tatah a hae he . “ Baraba , ” tatah aa chai .
40027022	Pilat taco , “ Khri aa tahpaw Zisu cawh zekhatamaw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae he . “ Khraws letah khaipai ! ” tatah aa zongmingtei co aa chai .
40027023	Pilat taco , “ Zerawng tamaw ? Ze hmingsua maw a tua ? ” tatah a hae he . Canghrasala , “ Khraws letah khaipai thlang ky , ” tatah a thang vy tah a y tima he .
40027024	Pilat taco cang thai khaw be , hnahnawhnah laky a chuh sua a takhah a hmuh tihtah tui khah law ka , zawpui hme leco a kih cawh a si . “ Kama cawh ma cawngsawpaw a thisai lehei suanah hnui bei neh . Ma heh naaning naa tuapaw naa muaphonah a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
40027025	Cawngsaw vytei taco , “ A thisai taco kaaning kaa cung le kaa saw kaa ny cung letah ma zui thlang ky seh ! ” tatah aa chai .
40027026	Mataico Pilat tah Baraba khah a thlawpah he . Canghrasala Zisu cawh cheisah he ka , khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa kih leco a hlai he .
40027027	Mataico , raang uhbui a raekeh sahlo taco Zisu cawh raang uhbui ing lang seikhui he ka , ma letei raekeh sahlo takhei a pahmoso he .
40027028	A chaichi khah pahlu pah he ka , angki a pasuapaw a saidungpaw a hreisah he .
40027029	Mataico , abui lukhu cawtah ahling tah phiapaw lukhu a khusah he . A cacang lang kih lekhei basung a tlesah he ka , a hme letah aa khuh panai he ka , pasipasa he ka , “ Juda cawngsaw aa Siangpahrang cawh khua sy hring ky seh , ” tatah aa tah .
40027030	Aa ci tah chawh he ka , sungbasih khah law he ka , a lu letah ato le ato tah aa tuh .
