40027031	Aa pasipasa khy taitah pai a pasuapaw a saidungpaw cawh pahluhly pah he ka , Ama a chaichi khah a hreisah kaw he . Taico khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa seikhui .
40027032	Aa seipai khei langpui letah Sairin khuapaw Simon aa tahpaw cawngsawpaw a tong he ka , khraws khah hringhrang tah aa puhsah .
40027033	Galgotha , ( A silang cawh , “ Luru hming , ” tahnah a cang , ) aa tahpaw hminghmaw aa va phah .
40027034	Ma leco Zisu cawh si kha pahlawhpaw misur zu khah ding ruapaw tah aa peh , canghrasala pateh ka , ding du be .
40027035	Aa khaipai khy taikhei a chaichi cawh basung phe he ka , a chaichy he .
40027036	Taico a ty he ka , ma taco aa cong thlang .
40027037	A lu cung letah sua a phosahnah ca aa ciapaw cawh , “ MA HEH ZISU , JUDA CAWNGSAW SAHLO AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG , ” tah heh a cang .
40027038	Ama khaco damia pahning a cacang lang letah pakheh , a cavui lang letah pakheh aa khaipai hrah he .
40027039	A seithipaw sahlo takhei aa lu cathingso he ka , naisui hmo khei ,
40027040	“ Behnah ing chehthlah tei ningthung letah a sah kaw thlu khypaw , nama le nama a pachah tua ! Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco , khraws taikhei za cung thlah tua ca ! ” tatah aa tah .
40027041	Ma hraco tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo takhei pasipasa hrah he ka ,
40027042	“ Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka , canghrasala ama le ama cawh a pachah khy be ! Israel Siangpahrang a cang caw ! Kaa zing khy nápawtah khraws taikhei cungthlah tua !
40027043	Ama cawh Khazing a zingpaw pui a cang caw ! Khazing tah a du caco atoheh pachah tua seh ! Zecawtamaw tatah , ‘ Khazing Sawcapaw ka cang , ’ tatah a tah kha ! ” tatah aa tah .
40027044	Ma hraco Ama khatei aa khaipaipaw he damia sahlo zong taco naisuinah bia a hlupui khei aa tah hrah .
40027045	Ningching taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung .
40027046	Zailang suimehlang pathung hrawnghrang leco Zisu cawh , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabathani ? ” tatah a thangpui tah a y . A silang cawh , “ Ka Khazing , ka Khazing , zemaw na pa seisai ? ” tahnah a cang .
40027047	Ma letei a daw thlangpaw mehthaikheh tah ma cawh aa thui tihtah , “ Elija a y leimei ! ” tatah aa tah .
40027048	Ma cangkaw leco , aa hrong letei pakhehpaw cawh va sai ka , span khah a va lah . Ma cawh misur zu a thobahlapaw letah nong ka , rahtlong letah patai ka , Zisu cawh ding pawtah a hlai .
40027049	A tangpaw sahlo taco , “ Ama teitah ung cong tua seh . Ama lahthlá pawtah Elija cawh a vong maw vong ly , ming tua he peh , ” tatah aa tah .
40027050	Taico Zisu cawh a thangpui tah ysang vy hui ka , a hu a ceh chung .
40027051	Ma sungkheh kaa leco behnah ing letei pai aa pazypaw cawh a cung taitah a rai tai pehning tah a pakaichy . Aling a hrui ka , alung puino sahlo a kuichy he .
40027052	Athlai sahlo a hong he ka , mehpathai a thipaw a hlupui cawh hringnah letah patho kaw a cang he .
40027053	Athlai taico ka pia he ka , Zisu a tho kaw khy taitah Jerusalem khuapui pathai lang va sei he ka , cawngsaw hlupui khakhei a va paly he .
40027054	Raekeh zakheh buipaw le Ama khatei a ungpaw Zisu a congpaw sahlo tah aling a hruipaw le hming a chuacangnah vytei khah aa hmuh tihtah aa thlawzawng ka , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang hrahring thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
40027055	Ma letei a ungpaw canu a hlupui taco langpa tah aa cai thlang . Aaning sahlo cawh a byhia tuapah ruapaw tei Galili taitah a va zuipaw sahlo khah a cang he .
40027056	Aa hrong leco Mari Makdalin , Jeims le Josef aa no Mari le Zebedi a sawcapaw leh le aa no tahpaw a ung he .
40027057	Mataico , zailang rangsang lekhei Arimathea khuapaw Josef aa tahpaw mehrungpaw , Zisu a hning a zui hrahpaw khah a vong .
40027058	Pilat khaco a vaw ka , Zisu rawh khah va hae ka , Pilat taco raekeh sahlo khah Zisu rawh cawh pei law tatah a tah he .
40027059	Josef taco Zisu rawh cawh law ka , paithladih anaipaw a pathaipaw khei pahlong ka ,
40027060	ama tei alung kho a ruipaw athlai thapaw lekhei a i sah . Thlaikaw leco alung alaipaw pui khah kha si ka , a seisai .
40027061	Mari Makdalin le ahringpaw Mari sahlo cawh athlai hmelang khei a ty thlang he .
40027062	Ring ning a ningthlamongpaw leco tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh Pilat khatah a vaw he .
40027063	“ Abuipaw , ma dungkhei a hmangpaw takhei a hring thlangning tah , ‘ Ningthung khy tah ka tho kaw a , ’ a tahpaw kaa thui .
40027064	Macawtaco , ningthung tai cawh thlai khah achaw teitah vai law , tatah ta la , a cha a . Ma hratei a cang ly caco a hningzuitu sahlo a vong he ka , a rawh khah ru he ka , cawngsaw sahlo khah Zisu cawh thihnah taitah a tho kaw thah tatah aa tah sua he a . A changnah letei dungkheinah heh a hmetaw teipaw navy tah a paru vy sua a , ” tatah aa tah .
40027065	Pilat taco , “ Avaipaw phu khaco va sei o . Thlai cawh naa tuakhynah chung tah a bing khy nápawtah va tua o , ” tatah a tah he .
40027066	Macawtaco va sei he ka , thlai a bing khy nápawtah alung cung leco a ngianah cawh tua he ka , avaitu sahlo cawh aa chia he .
40028001	Sabat ning khy taitah zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mong khua dui lekhei Mari Makdalin le ahringpaw Mari cawh thlai vai ruapaw takhei a sei he .
40028002	Aling a rupui tah a hrui ka , Abuipaw a vaiming cawh avai taitah a za cung . Taico thlai lang cawh a vaw ka , alung cawh hneihly ka , a cung leco a ty thlang .
40028003	A hmuisang cawh lailaw lo ka , a chaichi cawh huihaw hratah a raang .
40028004	Raevai sahlo cawh aa thlawzawng tu thah ka , a cathing he ka , mehthi hratah aa cang thlu he .
40028005	Vaiming taco canu sahlo cawh , “ Naa thlawzawng kheh seh , khraws letei aa khaipaipaw Zisu khah naa hui tahpaw ka hni .
40028006	Ama cawh ma lehei ung khawh be , a ca chingsipaw he hrakhei a tho kaw thah . A vong la , aa i sahnahpaw heh va ming hmai o .
40028007	Mataico rairang tah sei la , a hningzuitu sahlo khah va ching o , ‘ Thihnah taitah tho kaw thah ka , naa hmelang khei Galili raang lang a sei thah . Ma leco naa va hmuh a . ’ Atoheh ka ca ching thah he hi , ” tatah a tah he .
40028008	Macawtaco canu sahlo cawh thlai taico a piathlah pahraw he . Ci hmotah le thawchah ngetei hmotah a hningzuitu sahlo ching rua pawtah khei a sai he .
40028009	Sungkheh kheh tah Zisu taco a tong he ka , “ A dang pawtah , ” a tah he . Ama khaco a vong he ka , a phe cawh tle he ka , Ama cawh aa beh .
40028010	Mataico Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Naa thlawzawng kheh seh . Va sei la , ka uny sahlo khah Galili raang lang za sei he seh tatah va ching o . Ma leco aa pa hmuh a , ” a tah he .
40028011	Canu sahlo aa seilai leimei chung taco athlai raevai thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh khuapui chunglang va sei he ka , tlangbui macang sahlo khah hming a chuacangnah vytei khah thong aa va thuisah he .
40028012	Tlangbui macang sahlo cawh macang sahlo khatah a tongsia tih he tah khuakhangnah sangkheh aa hnui . Raekeh sahlo khah tangka hlupui pei he ka ,
40028013	“ ‘ A hningzuitu sahlo tah zai tah a vong he ka , kaa ihning kaa letah a rawh cawh law he ka aa seikhui , ’ tah my lo .
40028014	Ma thong thuisahnah heh raang uhbui tah a thui caco , kaaning tah a chah ná tah tua a he peh ka , naaning cawh zehmai hanah ing bei ceh kaa ta he a , ” aa tah .
40028015	Macawtaco , raekeh sahlo taco tangka cawh law he ka , aa chingpaw he hrakhei aa tua . Taico ma bia heh atoning tai heh Juda cawngsaw sahlo hrong letah aa kaipaza .
40028016	Mataico , a hningzuitu hluikheh sahlo cawh Zisu tah na sei he ceh tatah a chingsipaw he tlanglang sei rua pawtah khei Galili raang lang cawh a sei he .
40028017	Zisu cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa beh . Canghrasala thaikhehpaw cawh aa lung a langlo .
40028018	Mataico Zisu cawh aaning khaco a vong ka , aa hai letah , “ Alui le vaicung letei nawhnuinah vytei cawh peh ka cang thah myca .
40028019	Macawtaco va sei la , mingphing vytei khah ka hningzuitu tah va tua my lo . Paw le Sawcapaw le Thlawpaw Pathai ming tah baptisma a va cang sá la ,
40028020	bia ka ca pehpaw he maikaw aa zui nápawtah va cawngpah my lo . Taico caichangnah tai naaning khatah ka ung paria thlang hi , ” tatah a tah he .
41001001	Khazing Sawcapaw Zisu Khri a kong thawngchawbia ahrangthonah cawh ma heh a cang .
41001002	Khazing khuavang Isaiah cabu letei ciapaw cawh , “ Ka tlang ypaw cawh na hmelang ka taw a , taico Ama taco na langpui a parai a .
41001003	Raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o taco , ‘ Abuipaw cawtah langpui cawh parai la , a cawtah langpui cawh pading pah my lo , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
41001004	Taico Johan cawh va chuh ka , sua ngethainah cawtah angepachihnah baptisma kong phungrei ka , raangcaa lekhei baptisma a cangsah he .
41001005	Taico Judia raang letei vytei le , Jerusalem khuapui letei ming vytei cawh piathlah he ka , Ama khatah sei he ka , aa suanah phy he ka , Jordan tuivaw letah baptisma a cangsah he .
41001006	Johan cawh sahisy hming tah tawpaw caise a tua ka , saving tesong a te letah a song ka , khybawh le akhui tui a e .
41001007	Taico Johan taco , “ Ka hninglang tah kama navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a va sei a . Kama cawh a bung tah a phepakong rui a thlang tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh .
41001008	Kama taco tui tah baptisma ca cangsá he neh ka , canghrasala , Ama duitei taco Thlawpaw Pathai tah baptisma a ca cangsá he a , ” tatah a tah he .
41001009	Ma ningcai leco Zisu cawh Galili raang , Nazaret khua taitah va sei ka , Jordan tuivaw letah Johan tah baptisma a cangsah .
41001010	Tui taitah a ka pia cangkawleh avai a hong ka , Thlawpaw cawh za cung ka , thury hratah a cung letah a cawngpaw khah a hmuh .
41001011	Taico , avai taitah , “ Nama cawh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw na cang . Na cung letah ka lung a lawng ngetei , ” tatah o a za ring .
41001012	Ma khy cangkawleh leco , Thlawpaw tah Ama cawh raangcaapaw lang seisah ka ,
41001013	ma raangcaapaw leco ning songli chung ung ka , Setan tah a tuhso . Ama cawh saraang sahlo khatah ung ka , vaiming sahlo tah aa mingkai .
41001014	Johan thong a tlah khy taikhei , Zisu cawh Galili raang lang sei ka , Khazing thawngchawbia cawh a y khui .
41001015	“ Cai le ning a tling myca , Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca ka , a ngepachih la , thawngchawbia heh zing myca law , ” tatah a tah .
41001016	Zisu cawh Galili rili ngaekang letah a cahrong ning takhei , ngawtletu a cangpaw he Simon le a unypaw Andru cawh aso aa va leimeipaw khah a hmuh he .
41001017	Zisu tah aaning cawh , “ A vong la , pa zui o , cawngsaw a tletu tah ka ca tua he a , ” tatah a tah he .
41001018	Ma cangkaw leco aa so sahlo cawh seisai he ka , Zisu cawh aa zui .
41001019	A cawngpe va sei he ka , aa so sahlo khah a thei leimeipaw he Zebedi sawcapaw Jeims le a unypaw Johan khah tuilawng chung letah a hmuh he .
41001020	A hmuh cangkaw he leh aaning cawh y he ka , aa paw Zebedi cawh a hlofapaw sahlo khakhei tuilawng letah seisai he ka , Zisu cawh aa zui .
41001021	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Kapernaum khua lang sei he ka , Sabat ning a va phah tihtah Zisu cawh synagog lang a nae ka , a cawngpah he .
41001022	A cawngpahnah cawh aa ning a ang ngetei , zecawtamaw tatah phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo hratah cang lytah nawhnuitu hratah a cawngpah caw he tah a cang .
41001023	Ma cai leco , synagog leco thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsaw pakheh ung ka ,
41001024	“ Nazaret Zisu , kaaning khahei zemaw na du , kaaning hlyde ruapaw tamaw na vong ? Nama cawh ahomaw na cang tahpaw ka hni . Khazing Mehpathai na cang , ” tatah a y .
41001025	Zisu tah , “ De teitah ung ! A chung taikhei ka pia ! , ” tatah a hrangso .
41001026	Thlawpaw pialuipaw tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a sah pui tah cathing ka , a ysang hmotah a piathlah .
41001027	Cawngsaw vytei cawh aa ningang ngetei ka , “ Ma heh zemaw a cang ? Nawhnuinah chitah a cangpaw cawngpahnah a thapaw heh ! Thlawpaw pialuipaw zong naw pei he ka , a bia aa nge thlang ! ” tatah pakheh le pakheh aa tah he .
41001028	Galili raang chung a kawkih letah Zisu kong thongpang cawh a thang thlu palang .
41001029	Synagog taitah aa piathlah cangkaw tei leh Jeims le Johan khatah Simon le Andru aa ing lang aa sei .
41001030	Simon a nupuino a no cawh asaw tah nang ka , lakhing letah a ih thlang ka , a konglang cawh Zisu khah aa ching .
41001031	Macawtaco ama khakhei a vaw ka , a kih khah tle ka , a patho . Taico , a sawnah taco thlaw ka , aaning sahlo cawh a tangtui he .
41001032	Zailang ning a tlah khy taico a sahpaw vytei le khachia tei a tlepaw sahlo cawh Ama khatah aa va chua khui he .
41001033	Khua pungpaluh co ingkaw letah a pahmo he ka ,
41001034	taico Zisu tah asawnah a phingphing a hnuipaw mehlupui cawh a dangsah he . Khachia a hlupui zong papia he ka , canghrasala khachia sahlo taco Ama khah ahomaw a cang tahpaw aa hni cawtah khei aa reithlawpaw khah sai bei he .
41001035	Mongdi khua hme a se hlai letah Zisu cawh tho ka , a kingdangnah lang sei ka , ma leco thlaw a chang .
41001036	Simon le a vesaw sahlo taco , Ama cawh hui pawtah sei he ka ,
41001037	Ama cawh aa va hmuh tihtah , “ Cawngsaw maikaw tah aa ca huilai leimei kho , ” tatah aa tah .
41001038	Zisu taco aaning cawh , “ Ma kaekang lehei a ungpaw khua hringpaw sahlo letah zong phung ka rei khy nápawtah ma lang cawh sei he peh . Ma rawng taco ka vongpaw a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
41001039	Mataico Galili raang chung vytei cahrong ka , synagog sahlo letah phungrei lai ka , khachia zong a papia lai he .
41001040	Zisu khatah thinghmuihri a ingpaw cawngsaw pakheh cawh a vong ka , a khuh panai ka , “ Na du caco na pa dangsah khy se , ” tatah ningdo a hae .
41001041	Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh lung a saw ngetei ka , a kia tah pazah ka , va tong ka , “ Nama na dang cawh du neh ka , dang myca , ” tatah a tah .
41001042	Sung sungkheh tah a thinghmuihri vytei cawh ly ka , a dang .
41001043	Zisu tah a sah pui tah raering pei ka , a seisah tlamang .
41001044	Zisu tah , “ Ahohmai ching khe lo , ma duitei cawh tlangbui a va mingsah la , na dang my ca cawtah khei Moses phungbia hrakhei thuihlainah va tua la , ma pawsui co dangsah na cangpaw khah ming maikaw tah aa ca hni a , ” tatah bia a patai .
41001045	Canghrasala , ma cawngsaw cawh sei ka , ma thongpang cawh reilai ka , a kaipazasah thlu . Macawtaco a seinah maikaw letah ma kong cawh reilai ka , a kaipazasah cawtah Zisu cawh langhai tah khuachung lang a nae khawh lytah a kingdangnah lekhei a ung hri . Canghrasala , kawting taiteipaw mehlupui khah Ama khatah a vong thly thly he .
41002001	Ma khy ning a cawngpe letaco , Zisu cawh Kapernaum khua lang a nae kaw tihtah zawpui takhei ing lang a va tlung kaw tahpaw khah aa thui .
41002002	Maco ingkaw hrang letah hmai ung nápaw a ung lynah tai cawngsaw cawh chuh caimang he ka , aaning sahlo cawh thawngchawbia a cawngpah he .
41002003	Mehthaikheh va chuh he ka , a songbepaw pakheh papali tah aa va puh lai .
41002004	Cawngsaw aa hlu tu cawtah Zisu kung phah khui khy lytah Zisu a ungnah dihdong ingcung lang kekhui he ka , ingcung cawh ky thlah he ka , aphia letah a ih thlangpaw meh dang lypaw cawh aa za thlah .
41002005	Zisu tah aa zingnah khah a hmuh tihtah a songbepaw cawh , “ Ka dua , na suanah vytei cawh ngethai a cang , ” tatah a tah .
41002006	Ma letei a ty thlangpaw he phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh taco aa lungchung tah ,
41002007	“ Ma cawngsaw heh zecawtamaw , ma hraco a tah thlang ? Khazing a reipachia ! Khazing tah ly co ahomaw suanah a ngethai khy ? ” tatah aa tah .
41002008	Ma cangkawleh cawh zemaw aa pacang tahpaw khah Zisu tah a lungthing tah hnih ka , “ Zecawtamaw ma hming sahlo heh naa pacang ?
41002009	Ma a songbepaw khahei , ‘ Na suanah sahlo cawh ngethai a cang , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy maw , ‘ Tho la , na iphaw a lah la , sei , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy ?
41002010	Canghrasala , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh aluicung lehei sua ngethai khynah naw a hnui taheh ka ca hmuh sá he a , ” a tah he . Taico , a songbepaw cawh ,
41002011	“ Tho la , na iphaw a lah la , ing lang a dih , ” tatah a tah .
41002012	Ma cawngsawpaw cawh tho ka , a iphaw khah a lah ka , aa zongmingtei mehmuh leco piathlah ka a sei . Ma hming taco ming maikaw aa ningangsah he ka , Khazing cawh aa reithai . “ Ma hapaw hming heh kaa hmuh bang tlung be ! ” aa tah .
41002013	Zisu cawh Galili tuiping ngaekang lang khah va sei kaw ka , ma leco cawngsaw hlupui tah va pange he ka , a cawngpah he .
41002014	A seipai tah Alfas a sawcapaw Levi cawh ngungkhui kheinah hming letah a typaw khah hmuh ka , Zisu taco , “ Va pa zui , ” tatah tah ka , taico Levi cawh tho ka , Ama cawh a zui .
41002015	Zisu cawh Levi ing letah zairia batui a e leimeining takhei , ngungkhui a kheitu mehlupui le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo cawh Ama le a hningzuitu sahlo khatah batui aa e hrui . Ama a zuipaw sahlo cawh a hlu ngetei he .
41002016	Phungbia cawngpahtu Farasi sahlo tah mehsua sahlo le , ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo khatei batui a e hruipaw khah aa hmuh tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Zecawtamaw , mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo khatah batui a e hrui ? ” tatah aa hae he .
41002017	Zisu tah ma cawh thui ka , “ A dang thlangpaw taco sibui aa hia tlung be , a dang lypaw tah pui aa hia . Mehding y rua pawtah ka vong tlung be , mehsua sahlo y rua pawtah ka vong hri hi , ” a tah he .
41002018	Baptisma peitu Johan hningzuitu sahlo le Farasi sahlo cawh batui a cahe he . Cawngsaw thaikheh a vong he ka , Zisu cawh , “ Zecawtamaw baptisma peitu Johan hningzuitu sahlo le Farasi phunglang a zuipaw sahlo cawh batui cahe he ka , canghrasala nama na hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui cahe lytah aa ung ? ” tatah bia aa hae .
41002019	Zisu taco , “ Sawngpaw sahlo cawh nupui a chuipaw satlepaw khatah aa ung chung taco batui a cahe tei he maw ? Aaning khatah a ung thlang chung cawh batui a cahe tei bei he .
41002020	Canghrasala , nupui a chuipaw satlepaw cawh aaning taitah lahnah cai a phah tae a . Ma ning taico batui aa cahe tae thlang a .
41002021	Ahotahmai tah paithang a thapaw tah chaichi a paringpaw khah a beithlah bang bei he . Ma hratei aa tua caco , paithang a thapaw khah hruipako a ka , a caipaw paithang khah a dochy tima a .
41002022	Ahotahmai tah misurhang a hringtui khah sapho tuithei a paringpaw letah rai bang bei he . Aa rai caco , misurhang ka tho a ka , sapho tuithei khah tingchy a ka , misurhang kha , sapho tuithei zong a rawh thlu he a . Ma co cang lytah misurhang a hringtui cawh sapho tuithei a thapaw letah a rai hri a , ” tatah a tah he .
41002023	Sabat ningkhehpaw letah Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah saze lui chung tah sei he ka , aa seipai khei a hningzuitu sahlo taco saangsu cawh aa pahrih pai lai .
41002024	Farasi sahlo tah Zisu cawh , “ Mingtua , zecawtamaw Sabat ning letah tua phung a cang lypaw heh aa tua ? ” tatah aa tah .
41002025	Zisu taco , “ David tei a vesaw sahlo khatah aa ngaidi ngetei ning le epaw aa hia ning tei a tuapaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
41002026	Abiatha tlangbui alaicaipaw a hrening cai lekhei Khazing behnah ing lang a nae ka , tlangbui sahlo tah ly co ahotahmai e phung a cang lypaw , Khazing aa dangnah very khah a e . Taico a chy khah a vesaw sahlo zong a peh hrah he kho , ” tatah a chai he .
41002027	Mataico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Sabat ning cawh cawngsaw chahnah cawtah tuapaw cang ka , cawngsaw heh Sabat ning cawtah tuapaw cang be .
41002028	Macawtaco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Sabat Buipaw a cang , ” a tah he .
41003001	Ning hringpaw letah Zisu cawh synagog lang khah va sei kaw ka , ma leco a kih a songpaw pakheh a za ung thlang .
41003002	Mehthaikheh taco Zisu cawh sua aa pu khy nápawtah a bo he ka , macawtaco Sabat ning tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a dangsah maw dangsah ly takhah aa ngia thlang .
41003003	Zisu tah a kih a songpaw cawh , “ Ming vytei hme lehei a daw tua , ” tatah a tah .
41003004	Mataico aaning sahlo khah , “ Sabat ning tahei chahnah tua maw a phung a cang , chahlynah maw ? Hringnah pachah heh maw a phung a cang , thaw heh maw ? ” tatah a hae hri he . Canghrasala zehmai palei bei he .
41003005	Zisu taco a thingae hmotah aaning cawh ming he ka , aa lungku a chaw tu cawtah a ngechia ka , cawngsawpaw cawh , “ Na kih pathlang , ” a tah . A kih cawh pathlang ka , a dang .
41003006	Mataico , Farasi sahlo cawh piahly he ka , Zisu cawh zekhatamaw kaa thaw khy a tahpaw khah Herod a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei aa reisia .
41003007	Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah tuiping lang sei kaw he ka , Galili taikhei cawngsaw rungpui tah aa zui .
41003008	Zisu tei a tuapaw vytei khah aa thui tihtah Judia raang , Jerusalem khuapui , Idumia raang , Jordan tuivaw rae lang raang le Tair le Sidon khua kaekang letei a ungpaw khua sahlo taikhei cawngsaw hlupui Ama khatah a vong he .
41003009	Cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah aa pa pahlong tu sua a tah ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khah a cawtah tuilawng achiapaw khah ting cia tah pa pachiapah thlang my lo a tah he .
41003010	Zecawtamaw tatah mehnung hlupui khah dangsah he ka , a sahpaw maikaw tah Ama khah tong pawtah hmelang a nang he .
41003011	Thlawpaw pialuipaw sahlo tei aa tlepaw sahlo maikaw tah Ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah a hmekaw letah pohly he ka , “ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang , ” tatah a y he .
41003012	Canghrasala aaning sahlo cawh Ama khah ahomaw a cang tahpaw khah rei ly pawtah cyky tah bia a patai he .
41003013	Zisu cawh tlaang cung lang ke ka , Ama khatah a y dupaw sahlo khah y he ka , Ama khaco a vong he .
41003014	Aaning chung taico pahrawhluihning khah thing he ka , ma sahlo cawh , “ Apostol sahlo , ” tatah ming a sah he . Aaning cawh Ama khatah ung a pawtah le , phung rei tah taw a pawtah le ,
41003015	khachia sahlo papianah naw aa hnui a pawtah a thingpaw he a cang .
41003016	A thingpaw pahrawhluihning cawh ma sahlo heh a cang he . Piter tatei ming a sahpaw Simon ,
41003017	Zebedi sawcapaw Jeims le Johan ( Boanazi a tah he , a silang cawh khalung sawtei sahlo tahnah a cang ) ,
41003018	Andru , Filip , Barthalomeo , Mathai , Thomas , Alfas a sawcapaw Jeims , Thadia , ci le phing a dawkhuipaw Simon le ,
41003019	Ama a luitupaw Judas Iskariot a cang he .
41003020	Mataico , Zisu cawh ing lang a nae ka , cawngsaw tah aa pahlong thlangnah cawtah khei Ama le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui hmai e thai bei he .
41003021	A sawny tah ma kong cawh aa thui tihtah , “ A thinglung a hmang khawh beh , ” tah he ka , ama lah a pawtah a sei he .
41003022	Phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh , Jerusalem taitah a va chuhpaw sahlo taco , “ A chung letah Belzabub a hrei ka , ma khachia sahlo buipaw thongtah khachia sahlo a papia khy he , ” tatah aa tah .
41003023	Maco Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh y he ka , tawchingnah bia tei a chingpaw he cawh , “ Zekhatamaw Setan taco Setan lilaw cawh a papia thai a ?
41003024	Painah raang raangkheh cawh ama le ama lilaw a dy caco , ma painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a bing khy a ?
41003025	Ingchungkho khokheh cawh a rai ly tei a chaichy caco , ma ingchungkho cawh a bing khy a be .
41003026	Ma hraco Setan zong ama le ama a dy tei a chaichy caco , a daw khy a be , a lydenah cai a chuh hri a .
41003027	Hmuisui tei co , meh thawtlungpaw khah tongchai taw lytah a ing chunglang a nae tah a hnuicho cawh ahomaw a lah pah khy a ? A tongchai khy taitah longlong a lah khy a .
41003028	Cawngsaw heh aa suanah vytei le Khazing aa reipachianah vytei khah cawh ngethai a cang he a tahpaw biahmuisui ka ca ching he .
41003029	Canghrasala Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw duitei cawh ahohmai ngethai cang by bei he . Ama cawh chaizaw suanah a tuapaw a cang , ” a tah he .
41003030	Ma bia heh , “ Thlawpaw pialuipaw a chung letah a hrei , ” tatei aa tah cawtah a reipaw a cang .
41003031	Mataico , Zisu a no le a uny sahlo cawh va chuh he ka , khunglai lang letah a daw thlang he ka , cawngsaw taw he ka , Zisu khah aa za ysah .
41003032	Cawngsaw hlupui tah a ty cadung thlang he ka , a hai letah , “ Na no le na uny sahlo tah nama ca hui he ka , alailang letah aa ung thlang he , ” tatah aa tah .
41003033	Zisu taco , “ Ahomaw ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a cang he ? ” tatah a hae he .
41003034	Mataico a kae letei a ty cadung thlangpaw sahlo cawh ming he ka , “ Ma lehei ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a ung thlang he hi !
41003035	Ahohmai Khazing dunah a tuapaw cawh ka uny , ka satei le ka no a cang he , ” tatah a tah .
41004001	Ma khy taico ning hringpaw leco Zisu tah Galili tuiping kae lekhei a cawngpah he . Ama a pahmo sopaw cawngsaw khah aa hlutunah cawtah tuilawng chunglang a nae ka , a ty ka , tuili lang a seisah . Ma chung vytei cawh zawpuipaw khah ngaekang letah a ung thlang he .
41004002	Hming hlupui khah tawchingnah bia tah cawngpah he ka , tawchingnah bia sangkheh a chingpaw he cawh ,
41004003	“ Ngetua hmai o ! Ly a tuapaw pakheh cawh thleci va pawtah ly lang a sei .
41004004	Thleci a va leimeining takhei a chy cawh lang kae letah tlah ka , pavaw sahlo tah a va zy he ka , aa khi thlu thah he .
41004005	A chy cawh alui apawnah lungda letah tlah he ka , alui a pawnah cawtah sungkheh teitah a ka cy he .
41004006	Canghrasala ning va tha ka , a ai tih he tah thahrang aa thlah lynah cawtah a ro palang thah he .
41004007	A chy cawh ahling hrong letah tlah he ka , ahling cawh ka chang ka , a diseh thlu caw he tah saze vui bei he .
41004008	Canghrasala a chy cawh alui a chahnah letah aa tlah . Ka cy he ka , ka chang he ka , a zaw tihtah a saze cawh a leh songthung , a leh songruh , a leh zakhé tahmai a vui , ” a tah he .
41004009	Taico , Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw taco ma bia heh thui he seh , ” tatah a tah .
41004010	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Ama teitah a ungning takhei apostol pahrawhluihning le a kaekang letei a pahmopaw ahringpaw cawngsaw sahlo takhei tawchingnah bia a silang khah aa hae .
41004011	Zisu tah , “ Naaning cawh Khazing painah raang biaparuh hni khynah khah peh na cang thah he ceh . Canghrasala , alailang tei a ungpaw sahlo duitei cawh zezong khah tawchingnah bia tah ching a cang he .
41004012	Macawtaco , ‘ A ming cawh aa ming leimei thlang a , canghrasala hmuh by a bei he . Aa naw tah aa thui leimei thlang a , canghrasala hnih thai hlui a bei he . Ma hratei a cang ly caco Khazing lang a paleh kaw sua he seh la , ngethai tah a ung pang he a , ’ tatah Capathai tah a tah , ” tatah a tah .
41004013	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Ma tawchingnah bia heh hnih thai bei he ceh maw ? Ma heh hmai naa hni ly caco zekhatamaw tawchingnah ahringpaw sahlo cawh naa hni thai a ?
41004014	Ly a tuapaw tei a vapaw thleci cawh Khazing bia heh a cang .
41004015	Meh thaikheh cawh lang letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo khatah a lo he . Bia khah aa thui cangkawleh Setan cawh a vong ka , aa chung letei vapaw bia cawh a lah pah thah he .
41004016	Ahringpaw cawh lungda cung letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo khatah a lo he . Khazing bia aa thui cangkawleh lunglawng teitah aa cyhlang .
41004017	Canghrasala , thahrang aa thlah lynah cawtah khua sy parui bei he . Khazing bia rawng tah ruhanah le hrehnah a chua tihtah a pohly palang he .
41004018	Ahringpaw meh thaikheh cawh ahling hrong letei a tlahpaw thleci khatah a lo he . Khazing bia cawh aa thui thlang ,
41004019	canghrasala , khazaw lung reithuinah le hnuirung dunah le a hringhrepaw dunah vytei tah thawngchawbia khah pazai thah ka , a thui thuisah khy be .
41004020	Canghrasala ahringpaw cawngsaw thaikheh cawh alui a chahnah letei a tlahpaw thleci khatah a lo he . Khazing bia cawh thui he ka , cyhlang he ka , thuisu cawh a leh songthung , a leh songruh a leh zakheh tai hmai a vui he , ” tatah a tah .
41004021	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Me-ing cawh tongbai rai letah cang seh , lakhing rai letah cang seh aa chia tei maw ? Me-ing tung letah chia bei he ceh maw ?
41004022	No thlangpaw hming vytei cawh palang thlu cang a he ka , bakhupaw hming vytei cawh a langhai tah chuakhui a cang he a .
41004023	Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw tah ma bia heh thui he seh , ” tatah a tah .
41004024	A rei vypaw cawh , “ Naa thuipaw khah a chaw teitah pacang my lo ! Naa hmangpaw neh ná khei neh kaw cang he ceh ka , alai vy tahmai a ca neh he a .
41004025	A hnuipaw cawh peh vy cang a ka , a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tei hmai khah lah pah a cang a , ” tatah a tah he .
41004026	Zisu tah , “ Khazing painah raang cawh cawngsaw pakheh tei a ly letah thleci a vapaw hratah a cang .
41004027	Ching le zai , a i tah cang seh , a hraw tah cang seh , thleci cawh ama teitah ka cy ka , ka chang ka , canghrasala , zekhatamaw a cang tahpaw hnih be .
41004028	Alui tah ama teitah saze a chuasah . A hmetaw tah a kung , a pazui tah a thuisu , taico achang tatah a chuasah he .
41004029	Hre a zaw cangkawleh sahaw cawh a lah ka , a aw he , ” tatah a tah .
41004030	Zisu tah a rei vypaw bia cawh , “ Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a lo ? Zekhatamaw kaa tawching a ?
41004031	Alui letei cingpaw thleci vytei letah a chia caipaw aihrang ci khatah a lopaw a cang .
41004032	Alui letah ling he ka , a ka chang tih taco buichung thleci hrong letah a kung alaicaipaw tah a ka tua . A caibai zong alaipaw pui a cangnah cawtah pavaw zong tah a ningde letah a cawng tei he , ” tatah a tah he .
41004033	Ma hapaw tawchingnah bia khah Zisu tah hmang ka , aa hnithai khynah zé tah Khazing bia khah a cawngpah he .
41004034	Tawchingnah bia hmang lytah aaning sahlo cawh cawngpah bang bei he . Canghrasala a hningzuitu sahlo khatah aaning teitah aa ungning tah zezong a chingpase kaw tei he .
41004035	Ma ning zailang leco , Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Raechai lang sei he peh , ” tatah a tah he .
41004036	Zawpui cawh seisai he ka , Ama a ungnah tuilawng khei aa seikhui . Ma leco tuilawng hringpaw zong a ung hrah he .
41004037	Thlichia cawh a hrang caimang ka , tuileh cawh tuilawng chunglang tai a nae pai leimeinah cawtah tuilawng cawh tui lang a phung daimang .
41004038	Zisu cawh tuilawng a lei lang lekhei ung ka , a tynah dyching lekhei a ihning thlang . A hningzuitu sahlo taco va patho he ka , “ Cawngpahtu tui lang kaa tlápaw heh na ze a ca pui bei maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
41004039	Zisu cawh ka tho ka , thli cawh a hrangso . Taico , tuileh cawh , “ De ! A cali ! ” a tah . Mataico , thli cawh de ka , tuileh cawh a cali he .
41004040	Taico , Ama taco a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Zecawtamaw ma reiro co naa ci ? Zingnah hnui ting bei he ceh maw ? ” tatah a tah he .
41004041	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh ci ngetei he ka , “ Ma heh zehapaw cawngsaw maw a cang ? Thli le tuileh tahmai a bia aa nge thlangpaw heh ! ” tatah aaning le aaning cawh aa tah he .
41005001	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh tuiping cawh cakah he ka , Gerasin raang khah aa va phah .
41005002	Zisu cawh tuilawng taitah a cungthlah ning takhei thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw tah ama khah a tawng pawtah thlaikung taikhei a va sei .
41005003	Ma cawngsawpaw cawh thlaikung letei a ung teipaw cang ka , ahotahmai tah hraipaking tah bahrairui tahmai tongchai khy bei he .
41005004	Zemaw tah pawco a kih le a phe khah uihlupui tongchai he ka , canghrasala bahrairui khah chehchung thlu ka , a phe letei thawrui sahlo zong khah a phongchung thlu he . Ahotahmai tah ama cawh tle pakhih khy bei he .
41005005	Ching le zai , thlaikung letah le a kaekang tlaang vytei leco a khiakaly ka , ysang ka , ama le ama cawh alung tah a aw tei .
41005006	Langhlaw pui taitah Zisu cawh a va hmuh tihtah va saihno ka , a hmekaw letaco a khuh a panai .
41005007	“ Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw , Zisu , kama khatah zemaw na dupaw a ung ? Pa hreh haitei kheh tatah Khazing ming tah ka ca naw , ” tatah a thang khy chung tah a y .
41005008	Zemaw tah pawco Zisu tah ama khah , “ Nama thlawpaw pialuipaw , ma cawngsawpaw a chung taikhei piathlah , ” tatah a tah thah cawtah a cang .
41005009	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Na ming ahomaw ? ” tatah a hae . Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Kaa hlu ngeteinah cawtah ka ming cawh Thongzakheh a cang , ” tatah a palei .
41005010	Taico , ma raang chung taico a pialuipaw thlawpaw sahlo cawh papia ly rua pawtah Zisu cawh a naw canei leimei thlang .
41005011	Aa kae tlaangpa lekhei lawh a e leimeipaw voh rungpui a ung he .
41005012	Khachia sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Voh rung lang ma seisah la , aa chunglang a ma naesah thlang , ” tatah aa naw .
41005013	Aaning cawh seinah naw pei he ka , thlawpaw pialuipaw sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , voh chunglang cawh a nae he . Thonghning hrawng a cangpaw voh rungpui cawh lungkang cung taitah tuiping lang khah a zythlah he ka , a thi thlu he .
41005014	Voh a mingkaitu sahlo cawh sai tlamang he ka , ma konglang cawh khuapui le khuatei vytei khah va thuisah he ka , ma hratei hming a cangpaw cawh ming rua pawtah ming hlupui khah a va chuh he .
41005015	Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah thlawpaw a pialuipaw sahlo bupui tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw khah chaichi a tua ka , lungsing teitah ama khatah a za tythlangpaw khah aa hmuh tihtah aa ci ngetei .
41005016	Thlawpaw a pialuipaw sahlo tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw le voh sahlo cung letei hming a tlungpaw khah a hmuhpaw sahlo taco , a cangnah kong cawh zawpui khah aa ching he .
41005017	Mataico Zisu cawh aa raang taitah piathlah a pawtah aa naw .
41005018	Zisu cawh tuilawng chunglang khah a nae ning takhei khachia tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw taco , “ Nama khatah ka seilai hrá a , ” tatah a naw .
41005019	Canghrasala Zisu tah sai be . “ Ma navy co na ing lang va sei la , Abuipaw tei ningdo a ca tah zia le na cung letei hming rungnawpaw a tuapaw khah na sawny va ching he , ” tatah a tah .
41005020	Macawtaco ma cawngsawpaw cawh sei ka , Dekapoli raang lekhei Zisu tah zetlua tamaw a cawtah hming a tuapah takhah ching longmang he ka , cawngsaw vytei cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei .
41005021	Zisu cawh tuilawng tah raechai lang cawh va sei kaw hui ka , tuili raechai lang letah a ung thlangning taco , cawngsaw hlupui tah aa pahlong thlang .
41005022	Ma ning taco , synagog a uhtu pakheh a cangpaw Jaira cawh a vong ka , Zisu kung a va phah tihtah a phe hrang letah a bawh ka ,
41005023	“ Ka sawcanu a thi daimang . Ningdo pawtei tah a vong la , a cung letah na kih pahnia la , ma tei na tua caco dang kaw a ka , a hring kaw thlang a , ” tatah a sah pui tah a naw .
41005024	Macawtaco Zisu cawh Jaira khaco sei ka , cawngsaw hlupui tah zui he ka , Ama cawh aa pahlong thlang .
41005025	Ma leco , canu pakheh kung hrawhluihning chung a thi a chuh no a ung .
41005026	Sibui a hlupui tah mingkai he ka , a taithui ngetei . A hnuicho vytei pachang thlu ka , dang vy hlui lytah a pazua vy lo leimei .
41005027	Zisu thong a thui tihtah zawpui hrong leco a hninglang tah a vong ka , a chaichi dong cawh a va tong ,
41005028	zecawtamaw tatah , “ A chaichi chang ka tong khy caco ka dang a , ” tahpaw a rawh cawtah a cang .
41005029	Ma cangkaw leco a thi cawh kih thah ka , ka sawnah taitah ka dang myca tahpaw khah a hni .
41005030	Cawngsawno tah a va tong cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah a chung taitah hmingtuakhynah a piapaw khah a hni . Zawpui lang cawh a hui ka , “ Ahomaw ka chaichi a pa tong ? ” tatah a tah he .
41005031	A hningzuitu sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Cawngsaw hlupui tah aa ca nuapaw khah na hmuh thlang heh saw , zekhatah zia tamaw , ‘ Ahomaw a pa tong ? ’ na tah thlang ! ” tatah aa tah .
41005032	Canghrasala Zisu cawh a chaichi a tongpaw khah ahomaw a cang takhah zawpui hrong lekhei a ming lai .
41005033	Taico ma cawngsawno taco , a cung letei hming a tlungpaw khah a hninah cawtah ci ka , a cathing hmotah a phehrang letah a va bawh ka , a cangnah vytei cawh a ching thlu .
41005034	Zisu taco , “ Ka sawcanu , na zingnah tah a ca dangsah . De teitah va seí la , na sawnah taco ca thlaw myca seh , ” tatah a tah .
41005035	Zisu tah bia a rei leimeining taco , synagog a uhtu Jaira ing taico meh thaikheh a vong he ka , “ Na sawcanu cawh a thih thah , cawngpahtu khah hnahnawh ruapaw cang khawh be , ” tatah aa ching .
41005036	Zisu tah aa reipaw cawh a thuisah du lytah ung ka , Jaira hai leco , “ Na thlawzawng kheh seh , na zing a hy , ” tatah a tah .
41005037	Piter le Jeims le Jeims a unypaw Johan tah cy ly co ahohmai a zuisah bei he .
41005038	Synagog a uhtu Jaira ing cawh aa va phah tihtah hnahnawh luri tah le caw le ysang tah a ungpaw sahlo khah a hmuh he .
41005039	Ing chunglang a nae ka , aa hai letah , “ Zecawtamaw hnahnawh luri tah le cawtah naa ung ? Ma nyno heh a thih tlung be , a ihning hi , ” a tah he .
41005040	Canghrasala Ama cawh aa hnuiso . Aaning vytei cawh a papia khy tai he tah nyno a no le a paw le a hningzuitu pathung khakhei nyno a ungnah lang khah a nae he .
41005041	Nyno cawh a bang tah law ka , “ Talitha Kumi , ” tatah a tah . A silang cawh , “ Nyheh no , tho ka ca tah , ” tahnah a cang .
41005042	Ma cangkawleh cawh nyno cawh tho ka , a khiathi . ( Ama cawh kung hrawhluihning a cang ) . Ma cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa ning a ang ngetei .
41005043	Ma kong cawh ahohmai thuisah ly pawtah a sah pui tah bia a patai he . Taico , “ E ruapaw sangkheh kheh pei my lo , ” a tah he .
41006001	Zisu cawh piathlah ka , a cinglainah khua lang sei ka , a hningzuitu sahlo taco aa zuilai .
41006002	Sabat ning cawh va chuh ka , synagog leco cawngpah he ka , a bia aa thuipaw vytei cawh aa ning a ang ngetei . Aaning taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh zehapaw singnah maw aa peh ? Zekhatamaw ningang chuipaw hming sahlo heh a tua khy ?
41006003	Ama heh kih zungthaipaw khah cang bei maw ? Mari sawcapaw Jeims , Josef , Judas le Simon sahlo aa unypaw khah cang bei maw ? A satei sahlo zong kaaning khatah ma lehei ung thlang hrah bei he maw ? ” tah he ka , a cung letah aa lung tling be .
41006004	Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Khazing khuavang cawh a pinah khua letah le a ruachai sahlo le a ingchungkho hrong letah tah cy ly co kawkih letah pasungpanaw a cang , ” a tah he .
41006005	A dang lypaw meh cawngtei cung letah a kih pahnia ka , a dang sahpaw he tah ly co , ma leco ningang chuipaw hming zehmai tua khy be .
41006006	Zingnah aa hnui lynah kong leco a khuarawh a haa . Mataico , ma kaekang hrawng letei a ungpaw khua sahlo cawh tlawng lai ka , a cawngpah lai he .
41006007	Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah y he ka , thlawpaw pialuipaw cung letah nawhnuinah pei he ka , pahning longmang tah a taw he .
41006008	Bia a pataipaw he cawh , “ Naa khuatlongnah cawtah cungcahrei cy ly co zehmai a pho khe la , zairia cang seh , sahre cang seh a pho khe lo . Naa angki bawng letah tangka zong a sang khe lo .
41006009	Phepakong a pakong la , canghrasala angki zing hning tah a pathai khe lo .
41006010	Ing naa tlung tih he tah ma khua naa seisai kaw hlai vytei cawh ahringpaw lang a palong khe lo .
41006011	Taico zeletahmai tah aa ca cyhlang ly caco he le a cang ly leh naa bia aa nge du ly caco , naa piathlah tihtah aaning khah raering pehnah cawtah naa phe letei luipadih khah cathing thlah si my lo , ” a tah he .
41006012	Macawtaco aaning sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , cawngsaw vytei cawh aa suanah a ngepachih rua pawtah aa cawngpah he .
41006013	Khachia a hlupui papia he ka , mehdang ly a hlupui zong sathy thu he ka , aa dangsah he .
41006014	Zisu ming cawh kawkih letah a thang cawtah Herod siangpahrang tah ma vytei cawh a thui . Thaikhehpaw tah , “ Baptisma peitu Johan khah thihnah taitah thosah kaw cang ka , macawtaco ningang chuipaw hmingtuakhynah a hnuipaw a cang hi , ” tatah aa tah .
41006015	Thaikhehpaw sahlo taco , “ Khazing khuavang Elija a cang , ” aa tah . Taico thaikhehpaw tah , “ Khuahlai tei Khazing khuavang pakheh kheh hapaw , Khazing khuavang a cang , ” aa tah .
41006016	Canghrasala Herod tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah , “ Kama tei a lu ka taipaw Johan khah thihnah taitah thosah kaw a cang ! ” tatah a tah .
41006017	Abui Herod ama ceingei tah baptisma peitu Johan khah tlesah he ka , tongchaisah he ka , thong letah a thlah . Zecawtamaw tatah a nyteipaw Filip a nupuino Herodi khah nupui tah chui ka , a lung a lawngsah du cawtah a cang .
41006018	Johan tah Herod khah , “ Na nytei nupui na chupaw heh a phung cang be , ” tatah a mochia cawtah a cang .
41006019	Ma rawng taco Herodi tah Johan khah a lungchung tah a carae ka , thaw a du .
41006020	Canghrasala , theh khy be zecawtamaw tatah Herod taco Johan cawh mehding le mehpathai a cang tahpaw khah hnih ka , cizaw ngetei ka , a vai lai . Johan bia a reipaw cawh a thui tihtah a chungsi a vang thlang naná teitah a reipaw bia nge cawh a du thlang thly thly .
41006021	A changnah letaco Herodi cawtah a raicangpaw cai cawh a va chuh . Herod tah a pinah ningcai lekhei , uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo le raekeh bui sahlo le Galili raang chung letei hruitu macang vytei khah kongchuanah a tuapah he .
41006022	Herodi a sawcanu cawh a za nae ka , a lang tihtah Herod le a khuachai sahlo cawh a lawng ngetei he . Herod taco nyno hai letah , “ Zemaw na du ? Na dupaw maikaw pa hae la , ka ca pae a , ” tatah a tah .
41006023	Taico , chia a sah hmo tei a reipaw cawh , “ Na pa haepaw maikaw cawh ka painah raang a chy hmai ka ca peh a tatah bia ka kaang , ” a tah vy .
41006024	Nyno cawh piathlah ka a no cawh , “ Zemaw ka hae a ? ” tatah a hae . A no taco , “ Baptisma peitu Johan a lu , ” tatah a tah .
41006025	Ma cangkawleh cawh nyno cawh rairang tah siangpahrang Herod khaco a za nae kaw ka , a haepaw cawh , “ Baptisma peitu Johan a lu khah ato hrahring heh daabakho tah pa pei la , ka du , ” tatah a tah .
41006026	Siangpahrang Herod cawh a lung reithui ngetei ka , canghrasala a khuachai sahlo hme letah bia a kaang thah cawtah khei nyno bia cawh ei du be .
41006027	Ma cangkawleh cawh raevaitu raekeh pakheh khah rairang tah taw ka , Johan a lu cawh na va tle a tatah a tah . Cawngsawpaw cawh va seí ka , thong-ing leco Johan a lu cawh va tai ka ,
41006028	dabakho tah a lu cawh a va tle . Nyno cawh hlai ka , nyno taco a no cawh a peh pachaw .
41006029	Ma kong cawh Johan hningzuitu sahlo tah thui he ka , a vong he ka , a rawh cawh law he ka , thlai letah aa phung .
41006030	Apostol sahlo cawh aa va kaw kaw tihtah Zisu kae leco a pahmo he ka , aa cawngpah pawhe le aa hming tuapaw vytei khah aa ching .
41006031	Mataico cawngsaw a sei chuhchypaw aa hlutunah cawtah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui e nápaw cai hmai hnui be ca he ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Kama khatah a vong la , a denah lang sei he peh , a hia cawng ná he ceh seh , ” a tah he .
41006032	Macawtaco aaning longtei tah tuilawng tah a kingdangnah lang cawh aa sei .
41006033	Canghrasala , aa seipaw a hmuhpaw mehlupui takhei , aaning aa cangpaw khah aa hninah cawtah khua ting taitah va sai he ka , aaning hlai tahmai aa sei nápaw hminghmaw cawh aa phah taw .
41006034	Zisu cawh tuilawng taitah ka piathlah ka , cawngsaw zawpui khah a hmuh tih he tah kingtu a hnui lypaw tuu sahlo hratah aa cangnah cawtah khei ning a do ngetei he . Macawtaco hming hlupui kong cawngpah khah a hrang a patho .
41006035	Ning cawh tlah daimang ca ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , “ Ma heh raang kingdang tah cang ka , ningkhua zong a tle ngetei myca .
41006036	Kaa kaekang khua sahlo lang sei sá la , ding e ruapaw a va cawh he seh , ” tatah aa tah .
41006037	Canghrasala Zisu taco , “ Naaning tah e ruapaw cawh pei o , ” a tah he . Aaning taco , “ Cawngsaw pakheh thlah reh chung nihlo pui a hia caw ! Ma vytei co very cawh co he peh ka maw aa e ruapaw cawh kaa pae he a ? ” tatah aa tah .
41006038	Zisu taco , “ Very tlang khazeh maw naa hnui , va seí la , va ming tua o , ” a tah he . Aa va ming tihtah , “ Very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning a ung , ” aa tah .
41006039	Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh cawngsaw vytei khah a phuphu tah araang cung lekhei a ty sá pawtah bia a peh he .
41006040	Ma hraco cawngsaw vytei khah zakheh phu , songngaw phu tah a tysah he .
41006041	Zisu tah very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning cawh law ka , avai lang a y ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia hlai ka , very tlang sahlo cawh a kychy . Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo khah zawpui cawh rai pawtah a peh he . Mataico ngaw sanghning zong cawh ming vytei hrong leco a rai he .
41006042	Aa zongmingtei co e he ka , aa ri a vaw thlu .
41006043	A hningzuitu sahlo taco very le ngaw a tangpaw cawh pakhong he ka , baihraw hluihning chih ky tah aa dui .
41006044	Very a epaw sahlo cawh capaw puitling 5000 a cang he .
41006045	Zawpui khah a disah chung he takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh rairang tah tuilawng chunglang a naesah he ka , Galili rili raechai Bethsaida khua lang khah a seisah hlang he .
41006046	Aa seisai khy tai he tah Ama cawh thlawchang pawtah tlaang cung lang a sei .
41006047	Zailangsang leco tuilawng cawh tuili a lecingcing lekhei ung ka , Zisu cawh Ama longtei tah tlaang lekhei a ung thlang .
41006048	Thli tah a rupui tah a nangnah rawng he tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa lawng khah zeh khy khawh bei he tahpaw Zisu tah a hmuh . Monglang suimehlang papali hrong lekhei Zisu cawh tui cung leco aaning lang va sei ka , aaning khah a khungsai daimang he .
41006049	Canghrasala , tui cung letei a va seipaw khah a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa hmuh tihtah athlaw a cang rua tah he ka , a ysang he .
41006050	Aa zongmingtei tah Ama cawh hmuh he ka , aa ci ngetei . Ma cangkawleh cawh Zisu tah , “ Naa thlawzawng kheh seh , kama ka cang , ci khe o , ” a tah he .
41006051	Mataico tuilawng lang cawh aaning khatah a nae ka , thli cawh a de . Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei .
41006052	Aa lungku khah pachawsah aa cangnah cawtah very kong khah aa lunghaa be .
41006053	Raechai lang khah va cakah he ka , Genesaret raang khah va phah he ka , aa lawng cawh ma leco aa hrai .
41006054	Tuilawng taitah aa ka pia cangkawleh cawngsaw tah Zisu a cang tahpaw khah aa hni .
41006055	Ma letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh a kawkih ná tah sai he ka , a ung tatei aa thuinah maikaw leco , a sahpaw sahlo cawh aphia tah aa va song he .
41006056	Taico , khuapui sahlo letah cang seh , khuatei sahlo letah le raang chung letah cang seh a seinah maikaw lekhei , a dang lypaw sahlo khah chodo tlaang lekhei aa chuakhui he . A pai dong tei chang tongsah rua pawtah naw he ka , Ama a tongpaw vytei cawh a dang he .
41007001	Farasi sahlo le Jerusalem taitei a vongpaw he phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh taco Zisu cawh cadung he ka ,
41007002	a hningzuitu thaikheh cawh kih si phung a cangpaw khah zui lytah kih si lytah batui aa epaw khah aa hmuh he .
41007003	Farasi sahlo le Juda cawngsaw vytei cawh aa pupaw leh cawngpahnah phungbia hrakhei kih si taw ly co , batui e bei he .
41007004	Chodo tlaang letah hming aa cawh tih zong tah kih si ly co batui e bei he . Taico ahringpaw pupaw phung sahlo aa zuipaw ung vy ka , ma sahlo cawh ny sahlo , daabei sahlo , ketli sahlo sipathai tah hapaw sahlo khah a cang .
41007005	Macawtaco , Farasi sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah , “ Zecawtamaw , na hningzuitu sahlo heh pupaw phungbia zui lytah a pathai lypaw kih tah batui aa e zia ? ” tatah Zisu cawh aa tah .
41007006	Zisu tah aaning cawh , “ Khazing khuavang Isaiah tei naaning cungmai raipha sahlo naa kong a reihlangpaw heh a hmang caimang . Isaiah tah , ‘ Ma cawngsaw sahlo tahei aa hmokaw co aa pa cizaw , canghrasala aa lungthing cawh kama taitah a hlah ngetei he .
41007007	Aa pa behpaw zong heh aa cawtah zehmai chahnai be . Aa cawngpahnah zong heh mehnung tuachawngpaw phungphe sahlo suipaw a cang he , ’ tatah a cia .
41007008	Khazing biapeh sahlo laky khah seisai he ceh ka , mehnung tuachawngpaw phungbia cawh na tle hri he ceh , ” tatah a chai he .
41007009	Taico aa hai letah , “ Naaning naa phungbia sahlo zui nápaw cawtah Khazing biapeh sahlo hneihly cawh naa thai ngetei .
41007010	Moses tah , ‘ Na no na paw cizaw my lo , ’ taico , ‘ A no cang seh , a paw cang seh chia a sahpaw cawh thaw a cang a , ’ a tah .
41007011	Canghrasala naaning tah naa tahpaw cawh cawngsaw pakheh tah a paw a cang ly leh a no khatah , ‘ Kama taitah na hmuh khy a paw bawnah cawh Korban , ( A silang cawh Khazing khatah pehlai a cang thah ) a cang a , ’ a tah caco ,
41007012	ma cawngsawpaw cawh a no a cang ly leh a paw cung letah zehmai tuasah sai khawh bei he ceh .
41007013	Naa hlai pachaw laipaw he ceh phungbia khei Khazing bia khah zelypaw tah naa cangsah . Taico , hming hringpaw sahlo zong ma hraco naa tua , ” a tah he .
41007014	Zisu tah ming zawpui khah Ama khatah y kaw he ka , “ Ming vytei , ka bia heh nawthlia la , hnih thai my lo .
41007015	Kaw taitah chunglang a naepaw taco cawngsaw khah papia palui be . Kaw taitah a ka piapaw duitei taco cawngsaw khah a papia palui .
41007016	Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw taco thui he seh , ” a tah .
41007017	Zawpui cawh seisai he ka , ing chunglang a nae khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo taco tawchingnah bia a silang khah aa hae .
41007018	Zisu taco , “ Naaning zong ma tlua co maw naa lung a co ? Kaw taitei chunglang a naepaw taco cawngsaw cawh papia palui khy be tahpaw cawh hnih bei he ceh maw ?
41007019	Zecawtamaw tatah a lungthing chunglang a nae lytah a ri lang a nae ka , alailang a pia kaw thlang , ” a tah he . Zisu tah ma hratei a reipaw heh zehapaw epaw hmai a pathai a tah dunah a cang .
41007020	Ma hrahei rei vy ka , “ Thinglung chung taitah a kapiapaw tahei cawngsaw cawh a papia a palui tei .
41007021	Zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw lungthing chung taihei a chaw lypaw khuarawnah sahlo , canu capaw suanah , ruhnah , lenongnah , a pheinah ,
41007022	duhlui hnuinah , zia hnuinah , hinghenah , hohenah , hnachuanah , male thai pachianah , a palai a patuinah le a ningcang lytah khuasahnah tahpaw sahlo a chuh he .
41007023	Ma hmingchaw ly vytei heh chunglang taitei a ka piapaw cang he ka , cawngsaw a papia a palui sahpaw a cang he , ” a tah he .
41007024	Zisu cawh ma hminghmaw cawh seisai ka , Tair khua kaekang lang a sei . Ingkheh chung letah a nae ka , ahohmai khah hnisah du bei he , canghrasala a nawh khy hlui be .
41007025	A sawcanu thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw canu pakheh cawh Zisu kong a thui cangkawleh rairang tah a vong ka , a phehrang lekhei a bawh .
41007026	Ma canuno cawh Siria pai Fonisia raang letei a pipaw , Grik cawngsaw a cang . A sawcanu chung letei khachia papia pah pawtah Zisu cawh a naw .
41007027	Zisu taco , “ Sawtei leh taco aa dupaw vytei e taw he seh . Sawtei leh aa very cawh lá tah ui sahlo peh cawh a phung cang be , ” tatah a tah .
41007028	Canuno taco , “ A cang , Abuipaw , canghrasala cabuai rai letei a ungpaw ui sahlo taco sawtei leh didang cawh aa khi thlang hrah , ” tatah a palei .
41007029	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Ma hratei na pachainah cawtah hei , ing lang na dih khy . Khachia tah na sawcanu cawh a piasai thah , ” tatah a tah .
41007030	Cawngsawno cawh ing lang cawh a dih ka , khachia tei a piasai thahpaw a sawcanu cawh lakhing letah a lia thlangpaw khah a hmuh .
41007031	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Tair khua taikhei piathlah ka , Sidon khua cahrong ka , Galili rili lang cungthlah ka , Dekapoli raang lang a sei .
41007032	Ma leco cawngsaw pakheh a nawpang katei , a rei a thlaw thai lypaw cawh Ama khatah va chua khui he ka , a cung letah a kih pahnia pawtah Zisu cawh aa naw .
41007033	Zisu tah ama cawh zawpui hrong taico piathlah khui ka , a nawkho chunglang cawh a kihdong a cahro . Mataico a ci tah chawh ka , a lui cawh a tong .
41007034	Avai lang a y ka , a sah pui tah a husua ka , cawngsawpaw khaco , “ Effatha , ” ( A silang cawh a hong tua tahnah a cang ) tatah a tah .
41007035	Ma cangkawleh cawh a naw cawh a awng ka , a lui cawh a ka catlai ka , achaw teitah bia a rei .
41007036	Zisu tah ahohmai thuisah khe lo tatah bia a patai he . Canghrasala , a hlu vy bia a patai he leh , a hlu vy tah aa reilai tima .
41007037	Cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei . Aaning taco , “ A tuapaw hming vytei heh a chah caimang . A nawpangpaw hmai khua thuisah ka , a rei a thlaw thai lypaw zong a rei a thlawsah , ” tatah aa tah .
41008001	Ma ningcai leco , cawngsaw hringpaw a hlupui a pahmo hui he . Epaw zehmai aa hnuilynah cawtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh y he ka ,
41008002	“ Ma cawngsaw sahlo heh kama khatah ningthung tai ung myca he ka , e ruapaw zehmai aa hnui khawh ly cawtah ka ning aa pa do ngetei .
41008003	Aa ngaidi hmotah tlungsah my he neh seh la , lang letah a baw he a . Zecawtamaw tatah mehthaikheh cawh langhlaw pui taitah a va chuhpaw aa cang cawtah , ” a tah he .
41008004	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , “ Ma raang kingdang lehei ma vytei mehnung dang ruapaw lawh heh ahomaw a hmuh khy a ? ” tatah aa chai .
41008005	Zisu tah , “ Very tlang khazeh maw naa hnui ? ” tatah a hae he . “ Tlangsarih , ” tatah aa chai .
41008006	Ming zawpui cawh alui letah a tysah he . Ma khy taico very tlangsarih cawh law ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah ky chy ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh zawpui khah rai rua pawtah a peh he . A hningzuitu sahlo tah zawpui cawh aa rai he .
41008007	Ngadih a cawngpe hnui pai he ka , ma caw zong taco alawngnah bia hlai ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khah raipai law a tah he .
41008008	Aa dawngkasawny co e he ka , aa ri a vaw ngetei . Taico , a hningzuitu sahlo tah ebangpaw cawh pakhong he ka , baisarih chih ky tah aa dui .
41008009	Ma letei very a epaw he cawh patling 4000 hrawng a tah he . Mataico Zisu tah zawpui cawh ing lang a disah he .
41008010	Ma khy taico a hningzuitu sahlo khatah tuilawng chunglang a nae he ka , Dalmanutha pai lang aa sei .
41008011	Farasi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , bia aa hae . Ama khah pase du tah vaicung langtei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah tua khah aa sia .
41008012	A hu a sah pui tah sua ka , “ Atochai cawngsaw tahei zecawtamaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah heh aa du tlong ? Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma hapaw hming cawh peh cang a bei he , ” tatah a tah .
41008013	Taico , aaning cawh seisai he ka , tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka , Galili tuiping raechai lang a sei .
41008014	A hningzuitu sahlo tah very a pho monghly he ka , tuilawng chung leco aaning khatah tlangkheh tei suipaw a ung .
41008015	Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh , “ Farasi sahlo le Herod raangri taikhei a vai la , a raering my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
41008016	A hningzuitu sahlo tah , “ Very kaa hnui ly cawtah a reipaw a cang , ” tatah pakheh le pakheh a tah tlungmang he .
41008017	Zisu tah aa reipaw bia khah hnih ka , aaning khah , “ Zecawtamaw very naa hnui lypaw kong naa rei leimei ? Ato tingtai hnih thai ting bei he ceh maw ? Naa lung a ku achaw caw tamaw ?
41008018	Meh hnui thlang tlung pawtah hmuh bei he ceh maw ? Naw hnui thlang tlung pawtah thui bei he ceh maw ? Taico a thui thlang bei he ceh maw ?
41008019	Mehnung 5000 caw tei very tlang pangaw ka chy ning takhei a hluipaw khah bai khazeh maw naa dui kha ? ” tatah hae he ka , “ Baihraw hluihning , ” tatah aa chai .
41008020	Taico Zisu tah , “ Taico mehnung 4000 caw tei very tlang sarih ka chy ning takhei a hluipaw bai khazeh maw naa dui vy kha ? ” tatah hae he ka , “ Bai sarih , ” tatah aa chai .
41008021	Zisu taco , “ Ma naná co hmai hnih thai ting bei he ceh maw ? ” tatah a tah he .
41008022	Bethsaida khua cawh va phah he ka , mehcopaw pakheh khah cawngsaw thaikheh tah va chua khui he ka , tongpá pawtah Zisu cawh aa naw .
41008023	Taico mehcopaw cawh a kih tah tle ka , khua lailang a piakhui . A mehkho leco a ci tah chawh ka , a cung letah a kih chia ka , “ Zehming sangkheh chang na hmuh maw ? ” tatah a hae .
41008024	Mehcopaw cawh a ka hui ka , “ Cawngsaw hmuh he neh ka , thingkungpaw sahlo aa seilaipaw ky aa lo , ” tatah a tah .
41008025	Zisu tah a meh cung leco a kih cawh a chia kaw . Taico a meh cawh ka dui ka , khuahmuh kaw ka , zezongpui khah a sepaw teitah a hmuh khy he .
41008026	Taico Zisu tah a ing lang a disah ka , “ Khua chunglang a nae kaw kheh lo , ” tatah a tah .
41008027	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Sisaria Filipi a kaekang letei khuatei sahlo lang cawh a sei he . Aa seilaining taco , a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Cawngsaw tah aho aa pa tah maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
41008028	A hningzuitu sahlo tah , “ Thaikhehpaw tah baptisma peitu Johan a cang aa ca tah , thaikhehpaw tah Elija a cang ca tah he ka , ahringpaw taco Khazing khuavang pakheh kheh cawh a cang aa ca tah , ” tatah aa tah .
41008029	Zisu tah , “ Naaning tah saw aho a cang naa pa tah maw ? ” tatah a hae he . Piter tah , “ Nama cawh Khri cawh na cang , ” tatah a chai .
41008030	Zisu tah Ama a kong khah ahohmai ching khe lo tatah raeringnah a peh he .
41008031	Taico , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah taithuinah a hlupui ing ka , macang sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah hlawh a he ka , aa thaw a . Canghrasala ningthung khy tah a tho kaw a , tatah cawngpah hrang a patho he .
41008032	Ma bia cawh a sepaw teitah Zisu tah a ching he . Taico , Piter taco a cakih lang seikhui ka , a mochia .
41008033	Canghrasala Zisu cawh a paleh ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khah ming he ka , Piter cawh a raw . “ Setan , kama tai hei seihly ! Khazing lang hming pacang ly ceh tah cawngsaw lang hming na pacang vy hri hi , ” tatah a tah .
41008034	Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu le zawpui cawh Ama khatah y he ka , “ Ahohmai zui a pa dupaw cawh ama a dunah khah seisai seh la , a khraws cawh a puh seh la , pazui seh .
41008035	Zecawtamaw tatah a hringnah pachah a dupaw taco hly a ka , canghrasala , Kama le thawngchawbia rawng tah a hringnah a hlypaw taco a pachah a .
41008036	Cawngsaw pakheh tah khazaw heh a pungpaluh tah hnui seh la , a thlawpaw a sung caco zemaw a cawtah a chahnai a ?
41008037	Cawngsaw tah a thlawpaw khah hmuh kaw pawtah zemaw a peh khypaw a ung ?
41008038	Atochai a pheinah chai le , suanah chai lehei Kama le ka bia a zawkhuipaw maikaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah a Paw rungnawnah le a vaiming pathai sahlo khatah a za cung tihtah a zawkhui hra he a , ” tatah a tah he .
41009001	Mataico , aaning cawh , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma lehei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei Khazing painah raang cawh hmingtuakhynah khatah a va tlungpaw aa hmuh hlai taco mehthaikheh cawh thi balang bei he , ” tatah a tah .
41009002	Taico , ningruh khy tah Piter le Jeims le Johan cawh Zisu tah tlaang sangpaw lang a kekhui he . Ma leco aaning teitah aa ungning tah Zisu cawh aa hmekaw leco a hmuisang cawh a thlai .
41009003	A chaichi cawh raang ngetei ka , a khaipaleh he . Cawngsaw tei aa rangsah khypaw navy tah a rang vy syly he .
41009004	Aa hmekaw leco Elija le Moses cawh a va lang he ka , Zisu khatah bia aa rei hrui leimei .
41009005	Piter taco Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu , ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei . Thlangda nama na cawtah sangkheh , Moses cawtah sangkheh , Elija cawtah sangkheh tatah sangthung sah a he peh , ” tatah a tah .
41009006	Aa ci tu cawtah zemaw ka rei a tahpaw hmai hnih be .
41009007	Taico aa cung letah meding cawh va thang ka , aaning cawh pahlong he ka , meding chung taico , “ Ma heh ka dopaw ka Sawcapaw a cang , a bia nge my lo ! ” tatah o a za ring .
41009008	Aa kaekang cawh a hui tlamang he ka , Zisu tah cy ly co ahohmai hmuh bei he .
41009009	Tlaang cung taitah aa za cungthlah ning takhei Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh thihnah taitah a tho kaw hlai vytei cawh naa hmuhpaw khah ahohmai ching khe lo , ” tatah a tah he .
41009010	Ma kong khah aa lung chung letah a cingkai thlang he ka , canghrasala aaning le aaning cawh , “ Thihnah taitah tho kaw , a tahpaw heh ze silang maw a cang ? ” takhah aa reisia .
41009011	Taico Zisu cawh , “ Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Mesiah hlai tah Elija a vong taw hrahring a , aa tah ? ” tatah aa hae .
41009012	Zisu tah , “ Elija cawh a vong taw hmuisui ka , zezongpui khah a parai pacia thlu . A cang caco , zecawtamaw Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a sah pui tah tai-ing a ka , hlawh a cang a tatah Capathai letah cia a cang ?
41009013	Canghrasala , ka ca ching he , Elija cawh a vong thah ka , Capathai letah ciapaw tei hrakhei aa dudú khei ama cawh aa tua thah , ” tatah a palei he .
41009014	A hningzuitu ahringpaw sahlo aa kung aa va phah tihtah cawngsaw hlupui tah za pahlong thlang he katei , phungbia cawngpahtu thaikhehpaw sahlo khatah bia a za ei leimeipaw he khah aa hmuh .
41009015	Zawpui takhei Zisu aa hmuh cangkawleh aa khuarawha ka , va saihno he ka , aa va dai .
41009016	Zisu tah , “ Aaning sahlo khatah ze kong maw na ei leimei he ceh ? ” tatah a hae he .
41009017	Zawpui hrong taitah pakhehpaw tah , “ Cawngpahtu , ka sawcapaw cawh khachia tah a tle cawtah a rei zong thlaw khy be ca ka , nama khatah ka va seikhui .
41009018	Khachia tah a chuahno ning maikaw leh alui letah a va chai . A ci tatabu chuh ka , a haw ria ka , a hruipaking tei . Na hningzuitu sahlo heh khachia papia pá pawtah naw he neh ka , canghrasala papia khy bei he , ” tatah a tah .
41009019	Taico Zisu tah , “ Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw cawngsaw sahlo , ze tih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a ? Ze tih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a ? Nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui tua o , ” a tah he .
41009020	Taico nyhehpaw cawh a vong khui he . Khachia tah Zisu khah a hmuh cangkawleh nyhehpaw cawh alui letah phongchai ka , ama le ama hmai a hni lytah a paleh a pathae ka , a ci tatabu zong a chuh thlu .
41009021	Zisu tah , “ Ma hratei a ungpaw heh zekhah cai maw a tah ? ” tatah nyhehpaw a paw khah hae ka , “ A nyheh teitah , ” tatah a paw taco a tah .
41009022	Taico a paw taco , “ Me chunglang bo ka , tui chunglang zong thlah ka , uihlupui a thaw daimang tei . Na tua khy caco , ning ma do la , ma baw ky law , ” tatah a tah .
41009023	Zisu taco , “ Na tua khy caco na tah maw ? Zingnah a hnuipaw caw taco zezong tua khy a cang , ” tatah a tah .
41009024	Ma cangkaw leco , a paw cawh , “ Ka zing hmuisui , ka zing vy nápaw cawtah pa baw ky law , ” tatah a tah .
41009025	Zawpui tah aaning lang a va ne vy leimeipaw he khah a hmuh tihtah Zisu tah thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh a hrangso ka , “ Nama , a naw a pangpaw le a rei a thlaw thai lypaw thlawpaw , nyhehpaw chung taikhei piathlah la , zening tahmai a nae kaw khawh kheh tatah bia ka ca peh , ” tatah a tah .
41009026	Khachia cawh ka sang ka , nyhehpaw khah a sah pui tah cathing si ka , a chung taico a piathlah . Nyhehpaw cawh mehthi rawh lo ka , macawtaco cawngsaw vytei tah , “ A thi thah , ” tatah aa tah .
41009027	Canghrasala , Zisu tah a bang tah tle ka , patho ka , a ka daw .
41009028	Taico Zisu cawh ing chunglang a nae khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo tah , “ Zecawtamaw kaaning tah kaa papia khy be ? ” tatah aparuh teitah aa hae .
41009029	Zisu taco , “ Ma hapaw hming heh cawh thlawchangnah tah cy ly co zetahmai papia khy cang be , ” tatah a palei he .
41009030	Ma hminghmaw taico Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , Galili raang cahrong pai tah aa sei . Zisu tah zeletamaw aa ung tahpaw khah ahohmai hnisah du bei he .
41009031	Zecawtamaw tatah a hningzuitu sahlo khah a cawngpah leimei ning he cawtah a cang . Aaning cawh , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a . Aaning sahlo taco aa thaw a , taico ning thung khy letah a tho kaw a , ” a tah he .
41009032	Canghrasala a rei dupaw khah aa hni ly naná teitah Ama khah hae hri ngang bei he .
41009033	Kapernaum khua khah va phah he ka , ing chunglang a nae ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Langpui lekhei zemaw na ei lai leimei he ceh ? ” tatah a hae he .
41009034	Canghrasala palei bei he . Zecawtamaw tatah langpui letei a ei laipaw he cawh kaaning hrong lehei ahomaw alai caipaw a cang a takhah a cangnah cawtah .
41009035	Zisu cawh a ty ka , a hningzuitu hluihning khah y he ka , “ Ahohmai alaicaipaw cang a dupaw cawh a nytaw caipaw tah a tua seh la , ming maikaw raihretu tah a tua seh , ” a tah he .
41009036	Nyhehpaw cawh law ka , aa hrong letah a dawsah . Pawng ka , aa hai letah ,
41009037	“ Ahohmai kama ka ming tah ma hapaw nyhehtei heh a cyhlangpaw cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw a cang . Ahotahmai kama a pa cyhlangpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang , ” a tah he .
41009038	Johan taco , “ Cawngpahtu , cawngsaw pakheh tah na ming tah khachia a papia leimeipaw hmuh he peh ka , kaa bu cawngsaw a cang lynah cawtah tua kheh law tatah kaa thly , ” tatah a tah .
41009039	Zisu taco , “ Thly khe o , ka ming tah ningang chuipaw hming a tuapaw taco , a tua khy taikhei co a ry hlai leco pa reipachia a beh .
41009040	Ahohmai a ma cakhae lypaw maikaw cawh kaa cawngsaw a cang he .
41009041	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ahohmai , Khri tei naa cangnah cawtah ka ming tah tui cakaw ny kheh tei hmai a ca peipaw he cawh aa longmai cawh hmuh lytah ung hrahring a bei he .
41009042	Taico pakheh kheh tah Kama a pa zingpaw nyhehtei pakheh khah a suasah caco a hirong letah sangrianah lung pathle tah rili chunglang thlah he seh la , a cawtah a chah vy a .
41009043	Na kih tah a ca suasah caco , taichung la , vathlang . Kih rahning tah a de thai lypaw hraihming me lang tlah navy co , kih hnui ly tei chaizaw hringnah chunglang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
41009045	Na phe tah a ca suasah caco , taichung la , vathlang . Phe rahning chi tei hraihming chunglang tlah navy co , phe lytah chaizaw hringnah chunglang a nae cawh na cawtah a chah vy .
41009047	Mataico na meh tah a ca suasah caco , khy hly thlang . Meh rahning chitah hraihming lang tlah navy co Khazing painah raang chunglang meh rakheh khatah a nae khah na cawtah a chah vy .
41009048	Hraihming chung leco , ‘ Salung zong thi be ca he ka , me zong de beh . ’
41009049	Cawngsaw maikaw cawh me khei paci hratah aesah a cang he a .
41009050	Paci cawh a chah , canghrasala a aenah a ly caco , zekhatamaw na aesah khy khaw a ? Paci hratah ae la , pakheh le pakheh a dorai teitah ung my lo , ” a tah he .
41010001	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh ma hminghmaw taico piathlah ka , Judia raang le Jordan tuivaw rae lang khah a sei . Ma leco cawngsaw hlupui cawh Ama khatah a vong hui he ka , a tua teipaw hratah aaning cawh a cawngpah he .
41010002	Ama khah pase du tah Farasi thaikheh sahlo cawh Ama khatah a vong he . A hai letah , “ Capaw tah nupui mah heh a phung a cang maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
41010003	Ama taco , “ Moses tah zekhatamaw phungbia a ca peh he ? ” tatah a palei he .
41010004	Aaning taco , “ Moses tei bia a mah pehpaw cawh capaw tah a nupui cawh mahnah ca a ciapah caco , a mah khy thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
41010005	Taico Zisu tah , “ Moses tei ma phungbia a ca cia pahpaw he cawh naa lung a khong tunah cawtah a cang .
41010006	Canghrasala , a hrangthoning taco , ‘ Khazing tah canu le capaw tatah a tua he . ’
41010007	‘ Ma rawng taco capaw tah a no le a paw khah seisai a he ka , a nupui khatah a pahlawng a ka ,
41010008	ma tlaw pahning cawh ngaisaw pungkheh tah aa cang a . ’ Macawtaco aaning cawh pahning cang khawh bei he , pakheh a cang myca he .
41010009	Macawtaco , Khazing tei a patongpaw he cawh cawngsaw tah pachai kheh he seh , ” tatah a palei he .
41010010	Ing chunglang a nae kaw khy tai he tah a hningzuitu sahlo tah ma kong khah Zisu aa hae .
41010011	Zisu tah , “ A nupui mah katei , ahringpaw canu a chuipaw cawh a nupui khah a pheisaipaw a cang .
41010012	Ma hraco canu tah a pasae khah kawsai tah capaw ahringpaw khatah a pahlawng caco , a pasae a pheisaipaw a cang hrah , ” tatah a tah he .
41010013	Taico , Zisu tah tong he seh la , bonghnang song he seh tah du tah nyhehtei sahlo khah va chua khui he ka , canghrasala , a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa raw he .
41010014	Zisu tah ma cawh a hmuh tihtah a thingae ka , aa hai letah , “ Nyheh sahlo cawh kama khatah a vong he seh , pakhang khe o . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang .
41010015	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang cawh nyheh hratei a cyhlang lypaw taco a chung lang a nae by a be , ” tatah a tah .
41010016	Taico nyhehtei sahlo cawh aa bang tah tle he ka , aa cung letah a kih pahnia ka , bonghnang a song he .
41010017	Zisu cawh khuatlong pawtah a tho ning takhei cawngsaw pakheh va sai ka , a hmekung letah a khuh a panai . “ Cawngpahtu chaw , chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae .
41010018	Zisu taco , “ Zecawtamaw a chawpaw na pa tah ? Khazing tah cy ly co ahohmai a chawpaw ung bei he .
41010019	Biapeh sahlo cawh na hni thlang . ‘ Lenong kheh , a phei kheh , ru kheh , ahmang lypaw bia hnikhuitu cang kheh , dungkhei hmang kheh , na no le na paw cizaw my lo , ’ tahpaw sahlo a cang he , ” tatah a tah .
41010020	Ma satlepaw taco , “ Cawngpahtu , ma hming vytei heh cawh ka nyheh ning taitah ka zui ciapaw longtei a cang , ” tatah a chai .
41010021	Zisu tah ama cawh ming ka , a cung letah donah a hnui . “ Hming sangkheh na by . Va sei la , na hnuipaw vytei va zua la , mehsisah khah tangka va pei la , vaicung letah chosung na hnui a , taico a vong la , pa zui , ” tatah a tah .
41010022	Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah satlepaw cawh a hme a chia . Ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a ngechia hmotah a sei hly .
41010023	Zisu tah a kaekang leco ming ka , a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah , “ Mehrung cai taco Khazing painah raang letah a nae heh a ru caimang ! ” tatah a tah .
41010024	A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah aa khuarawh a haa ngetei . Canghrasala Zisu tah , “ Ka sawtei sahlo , Khazing painah raang letei a nae heh a ru caimang !
41010025	Mehrung tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a , ” tatah a tah vy he .
41010026	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , aa ningang hmotah , “ A cang caco , ahomaw pachah a cang khy a ? ” tatah aaning le aaning a tah he .
41010027	Zisu tah aaning cawh ming he ka , “ Ma hming heh cawngsaw caw taco cang khy be , canghrasala , Khazing caw taco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be , ” a tah he .
41010028	Piter tah Zisu cawh , “ Kaaning taco zezongpui seisai tah kaa ca zui hi , ” tatah a tah .
41010029	Zisu tah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , kama ka rawng tah le , thawngchawbia rawng tah a ing maw , a uny sahlo maw , a satei sahlo maw , a no maw , a paw maw , a sawtei sahlo maw , a ly sahlo maw , a seisaipaw maikaw cawh ,
41010030	ato hringchung cai lehei a leh zakheh tah aa hmuh a . Ing sahlo , uny sahlo , satei sahlo , no sahlo , sawtei sahlo le , ly sahlo khahei hrehnah zong khah aa hmuh a . Mataico a va chuh lepaw cai letah chaizaw hringnah zong aa ting a .
41010031	Canghrasala , a hme a sahpaw mehlupui cawh hningkha he ka , a hningkhapaw cawh hme aa sah tae a , ” tatah a tah he .
41010032	Jerusalem khuapui lang cawh seichy he ka , Zisu tah langhme a chuilai he . A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning sahlo cawh aa khuarawha ka , ahringpaw a zuipaw sahlo zong taco aa ci . A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning cawh aaning teitah Zisu tah seihly khui he ka , a cung letei a va tlung lepaw khah a ching he .
41010033	Zisu tah , “ Atoheh Jerusalem khuapui lang sei he peh ka , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khatah luithae a cang a . Aaning sahlo taco thaw pawtah thaily cangsah a he ka , Gental cawngsaw sahlo kih letah peh a cang a .
41010034	Ma sahlo taco pasipasa he ka , aa ci tah chawh a he ka , basung tah chei a he ka , aa thaw a . Ningthung khy taitah a tho kaw a , ” a tah he .
41010035	Taico , Zebedi sawcapaw leh Jeims le Johan cawh Zisu khatah a vong he . A hai leco , “ Cawngpahtu , kaa ca haepaw maikaw ma tuapah law tah kaa du , ” tatah aa tah .
41010036	Zisu taco , “ Naa cawtah ze hming maw ma tuapah seh tah naa du ? ” tatah a hae he .
41010037	Aaning taco , “ Na painah a rungnawpaw letah na cacang lang pakheh , na cavui lang pakheh a ma tysah la , tah kaa du , ” tatah aa palei .
41010038	Zisu taco , “ Naa haepaw heh hnih thai bei he ceh . Ka ding lepaw tai-ingnah ny heh naa ding khy a maw ? Thihnah baptisma ka ing ruapaw zong naa ing khy a maw ? ” tatah a tah he .
41010039	Aaning taco , “ Kaa ding khy a , ” tatah aa chai . Zisu taco , “ Ka ding ruapaw tai-ingnah ny zong ding he ceh ka , ka ing ruapaw thihnah baptisma zong naa ing a .
41010040	Canghrasala , ka cacang lang le ka cavui lang tah a tynah naw cawh kama ka rei cang be . Ma hming sahlo cawh Khazing tei a pachia pahpaw sahlo aa cawtah a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
41010041	Ma bia cawh a hningzuitu ahringpaw pahraw tah aa thui tihtah Jeims le Johan aa cung leco aa thing a ae ngetei .
41010042	Taico , Zisu tah hmingkheh tah y he ka , “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo uhtu bui a cangpaw sahlo taco aa rai leteipaw sahlo cung letah abui tah a bui so he ka , builai sahlo cawh aa cung letah naw aa hnui ngetei tahpaw khah naa hni .
41010043	Naaning sahlo cawh ma hraco naa cang ruapaw cang be . Ma navy co , naaning hrong lehei mehlai cang a dupaw taco , naa raihretu tah a tua seh la ,
41010044	a pakhehnah cang a dupaw taco , cawngsaw maikaw sae tah a tuapaw a cang .
41010045	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a rai hrepá pawtah cang lytah male rai hre rua pawtah le mehlupui tlang ruapaw cawtah a hringnah peh rua pawtah a vongpaw hrahei , ” a tah he .
41010046	Mataico Jeriko khua aa va phah . Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo le ming rungpui cawh Jeriko khua taitah aa piathlah ning takhei , Timai a sawteipaw Bartimai , mehcopaw cawh kih do pawtah langpui kae letah a ty thlang .
41010047	Taico Nazaret Zisu a cang tahpaw a thui cangkawleh , “ David Pathlah , Zisu , ning pa do ky law ! ” tatah a thangpui tah a y .
41010048	Cawngsaw hlupui tah raw he ka , de teitah ung thlang aa tah . Canghrasala , “ David Pathlah , ning pa do ky law ! ” tatah a thang vy tah a y .
41010049	Zisu cawh a daw ka , “ Va y tua o , ” tatah a tah he . Taico mehcopaw cawh va y he ka , “ Na thawchah seh , a daw ! Ama tah a ca y , ” tatah aa tah .
41010050	A angkilai cawh vathlang ka , a catho ka , Zisu khaco a va sei .
41010051	Zisu taco , “ Na cawtah ze tuapah maw na du ? ” tatah a hae . Mehcopaw taco , “ Cawngpahtu , khuahmuh khy ka du , ” tatah a palei .
41010052	Zisu taco , “ Sei myca , na zingnah tah a ca dangsah thah , ” tatah a tah . Ma cangkaw leco khuahmuh ka , Zisu a seinah lang khah a zui .
41011001	Jerusalem lang a va nae myca he ka , Oliv tlaang letah a ungpaw Bethfes le Bethani khua aa phah tihtah Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahning khah a seisah hlang he .
41011002	Aa hai letah , “ Naa hme khua lekhei va seí la , khuachung naa nae cangkawleh he ceh ahotahmai aa ke bang lypaw la teitei a hrai thlangpaw khah naa hmuh a . A rui khah thlang he ceh ka , ma lang heh naa va hrui a .
41011003	Pakheh kheh tah , ‘ Ze rua tamaw ma hrakhei naa tua ? ’ aa ca tah caco he , ‘ Abuipaw tah a hia , ma lehei a va chia kaw palang a , ’ tatah tah my lo , ” a tah he .
41011004	Mataico va seí he ka , langpui kae letei ing a hawkaw tung letei aa hrai thlangpaw , la teitei cawh aa hmuh .
41011005	A rui aa thlang ning takhei aa kae letei a dawpaw sahlo tah hmuh he ka , “ Zemaw la teitei rui khah naa thlang ? ” tatah aa tah he .
41011006	Zisu tei a chingpaw he hrakhei chai he ka , cawngsaw sahlo taco seikhui thlang o , aa tah he .
41011007	La teitei cawh Zisu kung va tlung khui he ka , a cung letah aa pai sahlo dae he ka , Zisu tah a ke .
41011008	Taico cawngsaw hlupui tah langpui leco aa pai sahlo phaw he ka , mehthaikheh cawh lyraang letei chingbu khah va chaw he ka , aa phaw pah hrah .
41011009	Mataico , a hmelang tei a seipaw sahlo le , a hninglang tah a zuipaw sahlo taco , “ Hosana ! Abuipaw ming tei a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh .
41011010	Kaa mapaw , David painah raang , a va tlung leimeipaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh . Hosana ! A sangcainah vaicung lekhei Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh . ” tatah a y he .
41011011	Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang a nae ka , behnah ing lang khah a va seí . Zezongpui khah ming ka , canghrasala zailang a cang thah cawtah piathlah kaw ka , a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khakhei Bethani khua lang aa sei kaw .
41011012	A ningthlamongpaw cawh Bethani khua taitah aa piathlah ning takhei Zisu cawh a ngai a di .
41011013	Langpa tah thuiku kung a bu a chaw ngeteipaw khah va hmuh ka , a thui ung maw tahpaw ming pawtah a va seihno . Canghrasala a va phah tih taco , a thui tih cai a cang lynah cawtah a hnaw tah cy ly co zehmai hmuh be .
41011014	Mataico thuiku kung khah , “ Ahotahmai tah na thui ca e khawh kheh he seh , ” tatah a tah . Ma bia a reipaw cawh a hningzuitu sahlo zong tah aa thui .
41011015	Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui a va phah tihtah behnah ingdung chunglang khah a va nae . Behnah ing letei hming a zuapaw sahlo le a copaw sahlo khah tingchua thlu he ka , tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa cabuai le thury a zuapaw sahlo aa dyching sahlo khah a palehly thlu he .
41011016	Zua ruapaw hming khah behnah ingdung cahrong tah tlelai khah ahohmai sai bei he .
41011017	Taico aaning sahlo a cawngpah ning he tah a reipaw cawh , “ Capathai letah ma hrahei cia cang bei maw ? ‘ Ka ing cawh mingphing vytei cawtah thlawchangnah ing tatah aa tah a . ’ Canghrasala naaning taco , ‘ Mehru kua , ’ tah naa tua , ” a tah he .
41011018	Tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco ma bia cawh thui he ka , Ama khah thaw khy nápaw langpui hui hrang aa patho . A cawngpahnah takhei ming zawpui aa lung khah tong tu ka , macawtaco Ama khah aa ci .
41011019	Zailang a va chua tihtah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo cawh khuapui chung taikhei a piathlah he .
41011020	A ningthlamongpaw mongdi tah aa seipai khei thuiku kung cawh a hrang tai a ro thahpaw khah aa hmuh .
41011021	Piter tah a thui thlang cawtah Zisu hai leco , “ Cawngpahtu , mingtua , chia na sahpaw thuiku kung kheh a ro thlu thah khi , ” tatah a tah .
41011022	Zisu tah , “ Khazing khah zing my lo .
41011023	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he . Pakheh kheh tah ma tlaang heh , ‘ Sei la , rili chung lang a va thlah , ’ tah seh la , lung langlo tah ung lytah a reipaw khah a zing caco , ma hraco tuapah a cang a .
41011024	Macawtaco ka ca ching he , thlawchang tah naa haepaw khah kaa hmuh thah tatah naa zing caco , ma cawh peh na cang a he ceh .
41011025	Mataico , thlawchang tah na daw tihtah na cung letei hmingchahly aa tuapaw maikaw khah ngethai la , ma pawsui co vaicung letei a ungpaw na Paw Khazing tah na suanah vytei khah a ca ngethai hrah a .
41011026	Canghrasala , cawngsaw hringpaw suanah khah na ngethai ly caco , vaicung letei na Paw Khazing tah na suanah khah ca ngethai hrah a be , ” tatah a chai .
41011027	Jerusalem lang khah va tlung kaw he ka , Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung letei a khiakaly ning tah tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le macang sahlo khah Ama khatah a vong he .
41011028	Aaning taco , “ Ze nawhnuiná tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua ? Ahomaw ma hming sahlo heh tua pawtah nawhnuinah a ca pei ? ” tatah aa hae hri .
41011029	Zisu tah , “ Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a . Pa palei la , ma hming sahlo heh zehapaw nawhnuinah tamaw ka tua tahpaw ka ca ching hrá he a .
41011030	Johan tah baptisma cangsahnah naw a hnuipaw khah vaicung taitah maw , cawngsaw taitah maw ? Pa ching tua o , ” tatah a palei he .
41011031	Reisia he ka , “ Vaicung taitah tah my peh seh la , ‘ A cang caco zecawtamaw Johan cawh naa zing be ? ’ a ma tah a .
41011032	Canghrasala , ‘ Cawngsaw taitah , ’ kaa tah a maw ? ” tatah aa reisia . Aaning tah zawpui khah aa ci he , zemaw tah pawco cawngsaw maikaw tah Johan cawh Khazing khuavang hmuisui a cang tatah aa tah .
41011033	Macawtaco Zisu khatah , “ Hnih bei peh , ” tatah aa tah . Zisu tah , “ Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh zehapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hra bei neh , ” a tah he .
41012001	Taico Zisu tah tawchingnah bia tah a ching he . “ Cawngsawpaw pakheh tah misur buichung a tua . A buichung cawh ruahy sahkhai ka , misur so nápaw kho zong co ka , a haw nápaw siasang zong a do thah . Mataico misur buichung cawh male khah hlei he ka , khuatlongnah lang a sei .
41012002	Hre cai a cang tih taco a sae pakheh khah ama a tinghangpaw pakhong paw takhei ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw .
41012003	Canghrasala aaning taco ama cawh tle he ka , dai he ka , kih longpaw tah aa kawsah kaw .
41012004	Taico , a sae hringpaw taw kaw ka , ma cawngsawpaw cawh a lu letah phong he ka , ningzaw chuipaw tah aa tua .
41012005	A sae hringpaw taw kaw hui ka , ama zong cawh aa thaw . Ahringpaw sae sahlo khah a hlu vy tah taw he ka , thaikhehpaw cawh dai he ka , thaikhehpaw cawh aa thaw he .
41012006	Taw ruapaw pakheh suipaw a hnui myca . Ma cawh a dopaw , a sawcapaw khah a cang . ‘ Ka sawcapaw cawh aa cizaw a , ’ tah ka , a changnah leco a sawcapaw cawh a taw .
41012007	Canghrasala , ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco , ‘ Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang . A vong la , thae he peh , taico a ry heh kaa cawtah cang ná seh , ’ tatah pakheh le pakheh aa tah he .
41012008	Taico , ama cawh tle he ka , aa thaw khy taitah misur buichung alailang khah aa vathlang .
41012009	Ma tih taco misur buichung a hnuitupaw takhei zemaw a tua a ? Va seí ka , ly a hlangpaw sahlo khah thé he ka , misur buichung khah ahringpaw khah a hlei he a .
41012010	Capathai letah rei bang bei he ceh maw ? ‘ Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang .
41012011	Abuipaw tah ma heh a tuapaw cang ka , kaa mehmuh letah khuarawha a chuipaw a cang , ’ a tahpaw khasaw , ” tatah a tah he .
