41012012	Taico , Juda hotu sahlo taco Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui , zecawtamaw tatah tawchingnah bia a reipaw cawh aaning a rei hnopaw he a cang takhah aa hni . Canghrasala zawpui khah aa cinah caw he tah Ama cawh aa seisai kaw .
41012013	Ma khy taico , Ama a bia khei Zisu khah tle pawtah Farasi sahlo le Herod a hningzuitu mehthaikheh khah aa taw he .
41012014	Zisu khaco a vong he ka , “ Cawngpahtu , nama cawh zingchuipaw na cangpaw kaa hni . Cawngsaw tah miamang khypaw cang bei ceh , zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw hme ming bei ceh . Canghrasala Khazing langpui khah biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah tei he . Siangpahrang Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly ?
41012015	Kaa pé maw , pé ly ? ” tatah aa hae . Canghrasala Zisu tah cungmai raipha aa cangpaw khah a hmuh tihtah , “ Zecawtamaw o na pa pachia he ceh ? Denari tangka cawh va tle la , pa mingsah tua o , ” a tah he .
41012016	Tangka cawh va tle he ka , “ Aho lingthlaw maw a cawng ? Aho cakhai maw a cia ? ” tatah aaning sahlo cawh a hae he . Aaning tah , “ Sizar , ” tatah aa palei .
41012017	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Sizar a tei cawh Sizar khah pei la , Khazing a tei cawh Khazing pei my lo , ” tah he ka , aaning sahlo cawh aa ning aa ang ngetei .
41012018	Ma khy taico , thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi sahlo cawh Zisu khatah a vong he ka , bia aa hae hri .
41012019	“ Cawngpahtu , Moses phungbia letah cawngsawpaw cawh sawtei sah lytah a nupui khah a thih sai caco , a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la , a thipaw caw takhei sawtei sahlo a sah pápaw a cang a tah .
41012020	Uikheh cawh uny pasarih ung he ka , a uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka , sawtei sah lytah a thi .
41012021	A pahningnahpaw tah ma lahmeno cawh chui kaw ka , canghrasala sawtei sah lytah a thih sai hrah . A pathungnahpaw zong ma hraco a cang hrah .
41012022	Aa pasarih co cawngsawno cawh chui he ka , sawtei sah lytah a thi he . A hning cai tah ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah .
41012023	Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma canuno cawh aho a nupui maw a cang a ? Aa pasarih tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung , ” aa tah .
41012024	Zisu taco , “ Naa rawh sua ngetei , Capathai a cang ly le Khazing hmingtuakhynah naa hnilynah cawtah a cang .
41012025	Aa thipaw aa tho kaw tih taco , a chuihae cawh ung khawh a be . Vaicung letei vaiming hratah aa cang tae he a .
41012026	Mehthi sahlo thokawnah kong leco Moses cabu letei chingbu me tah a kangpaw kong lekhei Khazing tah , ‘ Kama cawh Abraham Khazing , Isak Khazing , Jakob Khazing ka cang , ’ tatah a tahpaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
41012027	Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be , canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang hri . Naa rawh sua caimang ! ” tatah a palei he .
41012028	Phungbia cawngpahtu pakheh a vong ka , ma hratei bia a ei leimeipaw he khah a thui . Zisu tah achaw teitah a palei he tahpaw khah a hmuh tihtah , “ Biapeh vytei hrong lehei zehapaw maw a biapui cai ? ” tatah a hae .
41012029	Zisu tah , “ Biapeh a biapui caipaw cawh ma heh a cang , ‘ Israel cawngsaw sahlo nawthlia tua o . Abuipaw suipaw heh Khazing cang ka , Khazing ahringpaw ung bei he .
41012030	Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei , na hringnah vytei , na khuarawnah vytei , na thawzaang vytei tah do my lo . ’
41012031	Taico a sanghningnah cawh , ‘ Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo , ’ tah a cang . Ma sanghning navy hei alai vypaw biapeh ung be , ” tatah a chai .
41012032	Phungbia cawngpahtu tah , “ Cawngpahtu , a chah ngetei , Abuipaw suipaw heh Khazing cang ka , Khazing ahringpaw ung bei he na tahpaw heh a hmangpaw a cang .
41012033	Khazing khah na lungthing vytei , na hnithainah vytei , na thawzaang vytei tah do la , na ingpaw khah nama na dopaw hratah do cawh mero pehlainah vytei le , thuihlainah vytei navy tah biapui vy a cang , ” tatah a palei .
41012034	Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw tei , singvang ngetei tah bia a paleipaw cawh a hmuh tihtah , “ Khazing painah raang khatah a hlah bei ceh , ” tatah a tah . Ma khy taico ahotahmai tah bia hae ngang khawh bei he .
41012035	Zisu tah behnah ingdung letei a cawngpah ning he takhei , ma bia heh a hae he . “ Zecawtamaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Khri cawh David pathlah a cang tatah aa tah ?
41012036	David tah Thlawpaw Pathai tei a reipaw cawh , ‘ Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh , na carae sahlo khah na phe rai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo a tah , ’ tatah a tah .
41012037	David ama ceingei tah , ‘ Abuipaw , ’ a tah tlung , zekhatamaw Khri cawh David sawcapaw a cang thai a ? ” tatah a tah he . Ming rungpui taco a bia cawh lungtho teitah aa nge thlang .
41012038	Ma hratei Zisu tah a cawngpah ning he takhei , “ Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a raering my lo . Aaning cawh a ngepaw angki pasuapaw a hrei tah chodo tlaang letah a khia lai le cawngsaw tah cizaw hmotah bia a ching khah aa du .
41012039	Synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ka , kawngchuanah letah achaw caipaw hminghmaw khah aa du .
41012040	Lahme sahlo ing khah chu he ka , zawpui hmuh rua tah a sypui tah thlaw aa chang . Ma sahlo cawh a sah caipaw dangtahnah aa ing tae a , ” a tah he .
41012041	Zisu cawh behnah ing lekhei tholong thingkawng lang a hui khei a ty ka , zawpui vytei tah tholong aa chia leimeipaw khah a ming thlang . A hnuirungpaw mehlupui tah tangka hlupui khah tholong kawng leco aa thlah .
41012042	Canghrasala mehsisah lahmeno pakheh cawh a vong ka , tholong kawng leco phaesai phaehning , tangka phaekheh mai tluh a cangpaw tei cawh a thlah hrah .
41012043	Taico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo khah y he ka , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma mehsisah lahmeno tahei aho navy zong tah a hlu vy tholong a thlah .
41012044	Ahringpaw cawh aa hnuipaw a hluipaipaw chung taikhei aa peh . Canghrasala ma lahmeno heh cawh a dongchia hmotah a hringnah cawtei a hnuipaw vytei a peh thlu hi , ” a tah he .
41013001	Taico Zisu cawh behnah ing taitah a piathlah ning takhei , a hningzuitu pakheh tah , “ Cawngpahtu , mingtua hmai ! Alung sahlo aa lai zia kheh ! Ing sahlo aa rungnaw zia kheh ! ” tatah a tah .
41013002	Zisu taco , “ Ma ing rungnawpaw vytei heh na hmuh maw ? Alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw ung a be , a zongmingtei tah palehly thlu a cang tae he a , ” tatah a palei .
41013003	Zisu cawh behnah ing raechai tlaang , Oliv tlaang cung letah a ty thlang ning takhei , Piter le Jeims le Johan le Andru takhei Ama khah ,
41013004	“ Ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a ? Taico , zehapaw paching pakhanah maw a ung a tahpaw ma ching tua ? ” tatah a paruh teitah aa hae hri .
41013005	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Ahotahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo .
41013006	Ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka , ‘ Kama heh Ama cawh ka cang , ’ tah a he ka , cawngsaw hlupui khah aa dungkhei he a .
41013007	Rae a dypaw he le rae thongpang naa thui tihtah a pahly khe lo . Ma hming sahlo cawh a ung hrahringpaw a cang he . Canghrasala , a changnah cang balang be .
41013008	Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka , painah le painah a dy he a . Hming hlupui letah aling a hrui a ka , cakaang a tlung a . Ma vytei heh canu ny ung risaw hrang a pathonah hratah a cang .
41013009	Achaw teitah a raering my lo . Ca tle a he ka , biacenah letah aa ca chuakhui tae he a . Synagog letah zong aa ca chei he a . Uhtu bui sahlo le siangpahrang sahlo hme letah bia hnihtu cang pawtah kama ka rawng tah na daw tae a he ceh .
41013010	Canghrasala ma hming sahlo a cang hlai tahei thawngchawbia heh mingphing vytei khatah rei taw a cang a .
41013011	Ca tle a he ka , biacenah hme letah aa ca chuakhui tih he tah ze bia maw kaa rei a tahpaw pacang tah naa thlawzawng kheh seh . A cai a phah tihtah rei ruapaw cawh peh cang tae he ceh ka , ma cawh rei thlang my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah ma bia a reipaw cawh naaning cang lytah Thlawpaw Pathai khah a cang hri a .
41013012	Uny le uny , paw le saw sahlo cawh thihnah tai a luithae he a . Sawtei leh tah no le paw khah thihnah tai aa dy he a .
41013013	Kama ka rawng tah ming vytei tah aa ca hua he a , canghrasala , a changnah tai zingnah letah cy ky tah a dawpaw cawngsaw cawh pachah a cang a .
41013014	‘ Rorangnah a chua khuipaw pasih padawh chuipaw , ’ cawh hming pathai letah a daw thlangpaw khah naa hmuh tihtah a reitu tah a silang hnih he seh . Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh .
41013015	Ing cung letei a ungpaw cawh hmingbo lá pawtah ing chunglang a nae kheh seh .
41013016	Ly letei a ungpaw cawh a angkilai lá pawtah a ing lang tlung hrah kheh seh .
41013017	Ma ningcai cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a !
41013018	Ma hming sahlo heh thlasih chung tah a cang ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo .
41013019	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah khazaw a tua thoning taitah atoning tai lehei a ung bang lypaw ningping vaisangnah cai cang tae a ka , ma tluh hapaw cawh ung bang khawh a be .
41013020	Ma ning sahlo cawh Khazing tah pachingsah lytah ung my seh la , ahringpaw pakheh hmai ung a bei he . Canghrasala a thingpaw a cawngsaw sahlo rawng tah ma ning sahlo cawh a pachingsah a .
41013021	Ma tih taco , pakheh kheh tah , ‘ Mingtua , ma lehei Khri a ung , ’ a cang ly leh , ‘ Ming tua , ma lekhei a ung khi ! ’ aa ca tah caco he zing khe lo .
41013022	Zemaw tahpaw co Khri pakheipaw sahlo le khuavang pakheipaw sahlo chuh a he ka , a cang khy caco Khazing thingpaw cawngsaw sahlo hmai dungkhei pawtah paching pakhanah sahlo le ningang chuipaw hming sahlo khah aa tua a .
41013023	Macawtaco a raering my lo , a cai a phah hlai tah zezong ka ca ching pacia he .
41013024	Canghrasala , ma hanah le reithuinah cai khy taico , ‘ Ning cawh muisah cang a ka , thlawpaw zong khai khawh a be .
41013025	Esi sahlo zong avai taitah tlah a he ka , avai letei hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh a cang he a . ’
41013026	Ma tih taco , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh hmingtuakhynah le rungnawnah khatah meding hrong letah a vongpaw khah cawngsaw tah aa hmuh tae a .
41013027	A vaiming sahlo cawh taw he ka , a thingpaw sahlo cawh alui ki kipali taitah le , alui a changnah taitah avai sahlo aa changnah tai khah aa pahmo he a .
41013028	Thuiku kung tai hei cawngpahnah bia heh a ngia my lo . A chawng ka chawng katei , a hnaw pany a ka chuapaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tah naa hni .
41013029	Ma hraco , ma hming vytei heh a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah cai a nae myca , ingkaw hrang a va phah myca tahpaw khah hnih my lo .
41013030	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang bei he .
41013031	Alui le avai cawh a rawh a , canghrasala , ka bia cawh a rawh by a be , ” tatah a tah he .
41013032	Taico a rei vypaw cawh , “ A ning le a cai cawh Paw tah cy ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he , vaicung letei vaiming sahlo tahmai hnih bei he , Sawcapaw zong tah hnih hrah be .
41013033	A raering my lo . A mai pacia my lo ! Ma cai cawh zening tamaw a cang a tahpaw hnih tlung bei he ceh .
41013034	Cawngsaw khua a tlawngpaw khatah a lo . A ing khah seisai ka , a sae sahlo khah aa hre ruapaw rai cacy khah a ching si he . Ingkaw a congtupaw khah achaw teitah za vai my lo tatah bia a patai si .
41013035	Macawtaco , a raering my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ing a hnuitu cawh zailang letah maw , zaicing letah maw , aakhawng tamaw , mongdi tamaw , zening tamaw a va kawkaw a takhah hnih tlung bei he ceh .
41013036	Rawh ly pui tah a va tlung caco na ihning thlangpaw khah ca hmuh pang le .
41013037	Naaning khatei ka reipaw heh ming vytei khatah ka reipaw a cang . A raering my lo ! ” tatah a tah he .
41014001	Khungsai Panawnah le Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah cawh ninghning suipaw a du tihtah tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco Zisu cawh aparuh teitah tle tah thaw nápaw khua khah aa khang .
41014002	“ Canghrasala , Khungsaipanaw chung leco cang kheh seh , cawngsaw tah hnahnawhnah aa tua sua a , ” tatah aa tah .
41014003	Zisu cawh Bethani khuapaw , Simon mehthinghmui ing letah batui a e leimei ning takhei canu pakheh a vong ka , lungrang tuithei khei , sathy ringthopaw , a mai a ru ngeteipaw a va tle . Ma sathy ringthopaw cawh nard thingkung taitei lahpaw nard a patahpaw taitah tuapaw a cang . Tuithei cawh khuichy ka , Zisu lu leco sathy cawh a bia .
41014004	Ma letei a ungpaw mehthaikheh cawh aa thingae ngetei ka , “ Zecawtamaw ma tluh a mai a rupaw sathy heh a patlawh a papang ?
41014005	Mehnung pakheh kung kheh hlo navy tah a hlu vy tahmai zua seh la , ma tangka cawh mehsisah pei he seh la , chah vy bei maw ? ” aa tah . Taico , canuno cawh a sah pui tah aa raw .
41014006	Zisu tah , “ Ama tua tah tua thlang seh , zecawtamaw ama cawh hna naa hnawh ? Ka cung letah a tuapaw heh hmingchaw a cang .
41014007	Mehsisah cawh naaning khatah ung paria thlang he ka , naa du caco zening tahmai naa bong khy thlang he . Canghrasala kama cawh ung paria bei neh .
41014008	Ka pung cung letei sathy a pa biapaw heh a tua khy pawtei khah a tuapaw a cang . Phung ka cang nápaw cawtah a pachia hlangpaw a cang .
41014009	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , khazaw letah thawngchawbia aa reinah maikaw letah ma cawngsawno tei a tuapaw heh ama monghly lynah tah rei a cang tae hrá a , ” a tah he .
41014010	Mataico , a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cang hrahpaw Judas Iskariot cawh tlangbui macang sahlo khatah Zisu cawh luithae pawtah a va sei .
41014011	Ma kong cawh aa thui tihtah aa thawchah ngetei ka , tangka kaa ca pae a aa tah . Macawtaco , Judas cawh aaning khatah Zisu a peh khy nápaw he cai chaw khah a bo thlang he .
41014012	Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning a hmetawpaw , Khungsai Panawnah Tuu teitei thuihlainah ning leco , a hningzuitu sahlo tah Zisu cawh , “ Zeletamaw Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh na cawtah pachia he peh seh la , tah na du ? ” tatah aa hae .
41014013	Macawtaco , a hningzuitu pahning cawh taw he ka , “ Khuapui chung a va nae la , beirai tah tui a cuilaipaw capaw pakheh langpui letah naa tong he ceh . Ama cawh zui my lo .
41014014	Ma cawngsaw a naenahpaw ing a hnuitupaw khah , ‘ Cawngpahtu tah ka hningzuitu sahlo khatah Khungsai Panawnah zairia kaa e nápaw , ka mehlai khang cawh zeletamaw a ung a tah , ’ tatah naa hae a .
41014015	Ama taco , a cung khang a kypaw pui , achaw teitah tingtua ciapaw a ca hmuh sá he a . Ma leco kaa dawngkasawny cawtah va tingtua my lo , ” a tah he .
41014016	Taico , a hningzuitu cawh va seí he ka , khuapui chunglang cawh a va nae he ka , Zisu tah a ching pawtei he hrakhei hming sahlo cawh aa va hmuh . Macawtaco Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia .
41014017	Zailang leco Zisu cawh a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khakhei a vong he .
41014018	Cabuai cawh cadung he ka , batui aa e leimeining takhei Zisu tah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , naa hrong tai hei pakheh , kama khatei batui a e hrahpaw tahei a pa lui a , ” tatah a tah .
41014019	Aa dawngkasawny co aa ngechia ngetei ka , pakheh khy pakheh tah , “ Kama cang hrahring bei neh ? ” tatah aa tah .
41014020	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Naaning hluihning chung lehei pakheh kama khatah pakang kangkheh letah very a e hrahpaw heh a cang a .
41014021	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Capathai tah a kong a ciapaw hratah a cung letah a tlung a . Canghrasala , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping ! Za pi lytah ung seh la , a cawtah a chah vy hripaw , ” tatah a palei he .
41014022	Aa e chung taco , Zisu tah very khah law ka , lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh pei he ka , “ Law la e my lo , ma heh ka pung a cang , ” tatah a tah .
41014023	Ma khy taico ny cawh law ka , lawngbia a hlai khy taikhei hlai he ka , aa zongmingtei tah ma ny taico aa ding .
41014024	Taico Zisu tah , “ Ma heh ming hlupui cawtah a laipaw ka thisai , biahrai thapaw cawh a cang .
41014025	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang letah a thapaw tah ka ding hlai vytei cawh misurhang heh ding khaw bei neh , ” a tah he .
41014026	Reithainah hlaw sungkheh aa sah khy taitah Oliv tlaang lang aa ke .
41014027	Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Naa dawngkasawny tah na pa paisai thlu he ceh , zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei Capathai letah cia a cang . ‘ Kama tah tuukingtu khah chei a neh ka , tuu vytei cawh a paipatlaw thlu he a , ’ a tahpaw hrakhei .
41014028	Canghrasala , ka thokaw taitah naaning naa hme lang tah Galili raang lang ka seihlang a , ” a tah he .
41014029	Piter taco , “ Aa zongmingtei tah ca paisai thlu hmai he seh la , kama cawh ca seisai by bei neh , ” tatah a tah .
41014030	Zisu tah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , ato zai lalei lehei aa uihning a khawng hlai letah uithung tai na pa paphahsai a , ” tatah a chai .
41014031	Taico Piter taco , “ Nama khatah ka thih hrápaw a cang zong tah ca paphah sai by a bei neh , ” tatah a tah vy . A hningzuitu vytei zong tah ma hraco aa tah hrah .
41014032	Gethsemani aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang cawh sei he ka , Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco , “ Thlaw ka chang kaa letah ma lehei a za ty thlang my lo , ” a tah he .
41014033	Piter le Jeims le Johan cawh Ama khatah a chui he ka , lung reithui le vaisang tah a ung .
41014034	Aa hai letah , “ Ka hringnah heh thih khui khypaw ngechianah khatah a chih . Ma lehei ung thlang la , a raering my lo , ” a tah he .
41014035	Aa hmelang a cawngpe va sei vy ka , alui letah a bawh ka , a cang khy caco , ma tai-ingnah cai tahei pa khungsai ky seh , tatah thlaw a chang .
41014036	Zisu tah , “ Abba , Apaw , nama na caw taco zezong a cang khy thlang . Ma tai-ingnah ny heh kama taitah lawhly thlang . Canghrasala , kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh , ” tatah thlaw a chang .
41014037	Taico , a hningzuitu sahlo khaco a vong kaw ka , aa za ihning thlangpaw khah a hmuh . Piter hai letaco , “ Simon , na ihning maw ? Suimehlang pakheh hmai a raering teitah ung khy bei ceh maw ?
41014038	Tuhsonah chung lang naa tlah ly nápawtah a raering la , thlawchang my lo . Thlawpaw taco ahmangpaw hming tua cawh a du thlang , canghrasala pungsaw duitei cawh a thaw a dia , ” tatah a tah .
41014039	Va sei kaw ka , ma thlythly hraco thlaw a chang kaw hui .
41014040	A va kaw kaw tihtah aa ihning thlu thlangpaw khah a hmuh , zecawtamaw tatah aa meh ku tu ka , ceh bei he . Zehratamaw bia kaa chai a tahpaw hmai hnih bei he .
41014041	A uithungnah letah a vong kaw hui ka , aa hai leco , “ Ato tingtai heh maw a ih he ceh ka , naa hia thlang he ceh ? A zaw myca ! A cai a phah myca ! Mingtua o , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah hlai a cang myca .
41014042	Tho tua o ! Sei he peh ! A pa luitupaw cawh a va chuh myca hi ! ” a tah he .
41014043	Ma hratei bia a rei leimei ning taco a hningzuitu hluihning chung letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas cawh a va chuh . Ama khatah tlangbui macang le phungbia cawngpahtu le macang sahlo tei aa tawpaw he cawngsaw rung cawh zyzi le thingtai a tle he ka , a va chuh hrah he .
41014044	A luitupaw taco aaning cawh , “ Ka hnangpaw khah Ama cawh a cang a , tle la , a vaitu sahlo khatah seikhui my lo , ” tatah paching pakhanah a peh pacia thah he .
41014045	Zisu khaco a vaw palang ka , Judas tah , “ Cawngpahtu , ” tatah y ka , a hnang .
41014046	Cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu cawh aa tle .
41014047	Mataico , ma letei a daw thlangpaw pakheh taco a zyzi cawh a chua ka , Tlangbui alaicaipaw a saecapaw a naw khah tuh ka , a pathai thlah .
41014048	Taico Zisu tah , “ Rae a thopaw sahlo hotu ka cangnah caw tamaw tle pawtah zyzi le thingtai tah naa pa seihno ?
41014049	Ning tating tah naaning khatah ung neh ka , behnah ingdung letah zong cawngpah he neh ka , naa pa tle tlung be . Canghrasala , ma hrahei a cangpaw cawh Capathai bia patling a hy cawtah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
41014050	Taico aa dawngkasawny tah Ama cawh hningchai he ka , aa saisai thlu .
41014051	Taico satle pakheh paithladih sui a buhpaw takhei Zisu cawh a zuilai . Ama cawh aa tle tihtah ,
41014052	a pai cawh thlethlah si ka , a tahlong teitah a sai .
41014053	Zisu cawh tlangbui alaicaipaw ing lang khah seikhui he ka , ma leco tlangbui macang vytei le macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a va chuh hrui he .
41014054	Piter tah langhlaw pui tah Ama cawh zuilai ka , tlangbui alaicaipaw ingdung chung taikhah a zuilai . Ma leco raevai sahlo khakhei me a ai ka , a palung .
41014055	Tlangbui macang sahlo le Sanhedrin khongsil vytei taco , Zisu aa thaw khy nápawtah a suanah khah hui he ka , canghrasala zehmai hmuh bei he .
41014056	Cawngsaw hlupui tah hing le he tah Zisu reipachianah khah rei he ka , canghrasala pakheh le pakheh aa reipaw khah a lo tlang be .
41014057	Taico thaikhehpaw cawh a daw he ka , Zisu kong letah ma hingbia heh rei he ka ,
41014058	“ A reipaw kaa thuipaw cawh , ‘ Ma behnah ing cawngsaw tei sahpaw heh chehthlah a neh ka , ningthung chung letah cawngsaw tah sah lypaw ka padaw kaw a , ’ a tah , ” tatah hing bia cawh aa rei .
41014059	Canghrasala , pakheh le pakheh aa bia cawh a lo tlang hlui be .
41014060	Mataico , tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh aa hme letah a daw ka , Zisu hai letah , “ Aa bia heh palei bei he ceh maw ? Ma cawngsaw sahlo tei sua aa ca pupaw heh zemaw a cang ? ” tatah a hae .
41014061	Canghrasala Zisu cawh de teitah a ung thlang . Tlangbui alaicaipaw taco , “ A laisuipaw Khazing Sawcapaw Khri cawh na cang maw ? ” tatah a hae vy .
41014062	Zisu taco , “ Ka cang , taico Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing cacang lang letah a ty ka , avai meding cung letah a vongpaw khah na hmuh a , ” tatah a tah .
41014063	Tlangbui alaicaipaw cawh a chaichi khah hriachy ka , “ Hnikhuitu ahringpaw kaa hia khawh maw ?
41014064	Khazing a reipachianah cawh naa thui thlang myca kho . Zekhatamaw naa rawh ? ” a tah he . Aa dawngkasawny co thaw tlang a tlah aa tah .
41014065	Ma khy taico , mehthaikheh tah Zisu cawh aa ci tah chawh he ka , a meh pamai he ka , aa kia tah aa cabai . “ Ahomaw a ca cabai , ma ching tua ! ” tatah aa tah . Taico raevai sahlo taco Zisu cawh seikhui he ka , aa tuh .
41014066	Piter cawh ingdung chung letah a ung thlang ning taco , tlangbui alaicaipaw ing letei rai a hrepaw sae canu cawh a kae lang a vong .
41014067	Piter cawh me a ai thlangpaw khah a hmuh tihtah va mingchai ka , “ Nama zong heh Nazaret Zisu khatei a ungteipaw na cang hrah , ” tatah a tah .
41014068	Canghrasala Piter tah a paphah ka , “ Zemaw na rei tahpaw hnih bei neh , thuithai hrah bei neh , ” tatah tah ka , hawkaw lang khah a sei .
41014069	Ma sae canu taco va hmuh kaw hui ka , a kaekang letei a daw thlangpaw he sahlo aa hai leco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh aa hrong leteipaw pakheh a cang hrah hi , ” tatah a tah .
41014070	Piter cawh a paphah vy hui . A cawngpe khy lekhei ma letei a dawpaw sahlo takhei Piter cawh , “ Nama heh aa hrong leteipaw na cang ceingei . Zemaw tah pawco Galili cawngsaw na cangnah cawtah , ” tatah aa tah .
41014071	Taico Piter tah chia a sah ka , “ Ma cawngsaw naa reipaw heh ka hnipaw cang hrahring be , ” tah ka , bia a kang .
41014072	Ma cangkawleh leco aa cawh a uihningnah a khawng . Taico Piter cawh Zisu tah a hai letei bia a reipaw , “ Aa uihning a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphahsai a , ” a tahpaw khah a thui kaw . Taico a ngechia ka , otlili tah a cah .
41015001	Mongdi taco , tlangbui macang sahlo le , macang sahlo le , phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le , Sanhedrin khongsil vytei cawh bia cawh aa pathluh . Zisu cawh tongchai he ka , raang uhbui Pilat khatah aa hlai .
41015002	Pilat taco , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw ? ” tatah a hae . Zisu tah , “ A cang , na reipaw hraco a cang , ” tatah a palei .
41015003	Tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh a phingphing tah sua aa pu .
41015004	Pilat taco a hai letah , “ Aaning khah bia paleh a bei he ceh maw ? Aa ca pupaw vytei heh ming tua hmai ! ” tatah a hae vy .
41015005	Canghrasala Zisu taco kaw kheh hmai palei be . Pilat cawh a khuarawh a haa ngetei .
41015006	Khungsai Panawnah lehei ming zawpui tei chuasah aa dupaw thongtlah pakheh cawh raang uhbui tah a thlaw pah tei he .
41015007	Cawngsaw pakheh Baraba aa tahpaw , rae a tho ning tah lee a nongpaw sahlo khatah a pahlawh hrahpaw cawh thong-ing chung letah a ung .
41015008	Zawpui sahlo cawh a vong he ka , tuateipaw phung hratah tua pá pawtah Pilat khah aa hae .
41015009	Pilat taco , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang heh ma thlawpah seh tah naa du maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
41015010	Hnachuanah rawng tah tlangbui macang sahlo taco Zisu cawh ama khatah aa va chuakhui tahpaw khah a hni thlang .
41015011	Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo taco zawpui sahlo cawh Baraba ma chuapah hri tatah rei pawtah aa pasy he .
41015012	Taico Pilat taco , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang naa tahpaw heh saw zekhatamaw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae he .
41015013	Zawpui vytei taco , “ Khraws letah khaipai thlang ! ” tatah a y he .
41015014	Pilat taco , “ Ze rawng tamaw ? Ze hmingsua maw a tua ? ” tatah a hae he . Canghrasala zawpui taco , “ Khraws letah khaipai thlang ky , ” tatah a thang vy tah a y vy he .
41015015	Zawpuipaw lungtlingsah a dunah cawtah Baraba cawh thlawpah he ka , Zisu cawh chei sah he ka , khraws letah khaipai pawtah Zisu khah raekeh sahlo khatah a hlai he .
41015016	Zisu cawh raekeh sahlo tah abui ing Praetoriam aa tahpaw ingdung chunglang seikhui he ka , raekeh sahlo cawh aa dawngkasawny tah aa pahmo he .
41015017	Taico Zisu cawh pai a saidungpaw a buh sah he ka , abui lukhu cawtah ahling tei phiapaw lukhu khah a lu letah a khusah he .
41015018	Taico , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh palawngpali tah ung seh , ” tatah a y he .
41015019	A lu letah sungbasih tah ato le ato tah tuh he ka , aa ci tah chawh he ka , aa khuh panai he ka , aa beh pakhei .
41015020	Taico aa pasi aa pasa khy taitah pai a pasuapaw a saidungpaw cawh pahlu pah he ka , Ama a chaichi khah aa hrei sah kaw he . Taico khraws letah khaipai pawtah aa sei khui .
41015021	Taico , khuatei lang tah khua a va tlawngpaw Sairin khuapaw , Alekzandar le Rufa aa paw Simon cawh langpui letah tle he ka , khraws khah hringhrang tah aa puh sah .
41015022	Zisu cawh Galgotha , ( A silang cawh luru hming tahnah a cang , ) aa tahpaw hminghmaw lang aa seikhui .
41015023	Taico , mura sii khatah pahlawhpaw misur zu khah pei he ka , canghrasala Zisu tah ding du be .
41015024	Taico , khraws leco aa khaipai . A chaichi cawh a chaichy he ka , pakheh cy tah ze heh maw kaa ting a tah hni du tah basung aa phe .
41015025	Aa khaipainah cai cawh mong suimehlang pakua a cang .
41015026	Sua aa phosahnah bia , ca tei aa ciapaw cawh , “ JUDA CAWNGSAW AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG , ” tah heh a cang .
41015027	Ama khatah damia pahning , a cacang lang letah pakheh , a cavui lang letah pakheh aa khaipai hrah he .
41015028	Capathai tah , “ Ama cawh mehsua sahlo khatah reipai a cang hrah , ” a tahpaw bia cawh a tling .
41015029	A seithipaw sahlo takhei aa lu cathingso he ka , naisui hmo khei , “ Behnah ing chehthlah tah ningthung letah a sah kaw khypaw cang bei ceh maw ?
41015030	Khraws taikhei za cung thlah la , nama le nama a pachah ca ! ” tatah aa pasi aa pasa .
41015031	Ma hraco tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco , pasipasa hrah he ka , “ Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka , canghrasala ama le ama cawh a pachah khy beh !
41015032	Israel Siangpahrang Khri cawh atoheh kaa mehmuh lehei khraws taikhei cungthlah tua , maco ca hmuh a peh ka , kaa ca zing a , ” tatah aa tah . Ama khatei aa khaipai hrahpaw he takhei naisuinah bia a hlupui khei aa tah hrah .
41015033	Ningching suimehlang hluihning hrong taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung .
41015034	Zailang suimehlang pathung leco Zisu cawh , “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabathani ? ” tatah a thangpui tah a y . A silang cawh , “ Ka Khazing , ka Khazing , zecawtamaw na pa seisai ? ” tahnah a cang .
41015035	Ma letei a daw thlangpaw mehthaikheh tah ma cawh aa thui tihtah , “ Nawthlia tua , Elija a y ! ” tatah aa tah .
41015036	Taico cawngsaw pakheh va sai ka , span cawh misur zu a thobahlapaw letah nong ka , rahtlong letah patai ka , Zisu cawh ding pawtah a hlai . “ Ama teitah ung cong tua seh , Ama lahthlah pawtah Elija cawh a vong maw , vong ly mingtua he peh , ” tatah a tah .
41015037	Taico Zisu cawh a thangpui tah y ka , a thi .
41015038	Behnah ing letei pai aa pazypaw cawh a dong taitah a hrang tai pehning tah a hriachy .
41015039	A hme letei a daw thlangpaw raekeh zakheh buipaw tah Zisu a ypaw le zekhatamaw a thih tahpaw khah a hmuh tihtah , “ Ma cawngsaw heh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang hrahring thlang , ” tatah a tah .
41015040	Canu thaikhehpaw tah langpá tah aa cai thlang . Aa hrong leco , Mari Makdalin , a sui vypaw Jeims le Josef aa no Mari le Salomi a ung hrah he .
41015041	Ma canu sahlo cawh Zisu , Galili raang letah a ungning tei a zuilaipaw le , a byhiapaw a tuapahpaw sahlo khah a cang he . Ama khatah Jerusalem lang a vong hrahpaw canu a hlupui zong a ung hrah he .
41015042	Ma ning cawh Pachiapaningnah Ning , Sabat ning hlai teipaw ning khah a cang . Zailang a va phah tihtah ,
41015043	Arimathea khuapaw , khongsil chung letah aa cizaw ngeteipaw Josef cawh Khazing painah raang a va tlung lepaw hnabeisuinah a hnui ngeteipaw cang ka , ama cawh Pilat khatah raechah ngetei tah a vaw ka , Zisu rawh cawh a va hae .
41015044	Zisu cawh a thi thah tahpaw Pilat tah a thui tihtah a ning a ang ngetei . Raekeh zakheh buipaw khah y ka , “ A thi thah maw ? ” tatah a hae .
41015045	“ Zisu cawh a thi thah , ” tatah raekeh buipaw tei a reipaw khah a thui tihtah Zisu rawh cawh Josef khah a peh .
41015046	Taico Josef tah paithladih a naipaw co ka , a rawh cawh lawthlah ka , paithladih co pahlong ka , alung kho aa ruipaw thlai leco a isah . Taico alung a laipaw pui khah thlai kaw lekhei a palia .
41015047	Mari Makdalin le Josef a no Mari tah Zisu aa phungnahpaw hming cawh aa hmuh .
41016001	Sabat ning a chang tihtah Mari Makdalin le , Jeims a no Mari le , Salomi taco Zisu rawh thu ruapaw sathy ringthopaw khah aa cawh .
41016002	Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mong lang ning a chua khy taitah thlai lang cawh a vaw he .
41016003	Langpui leco , pakheh le pakheh khah , “ Ahomaw thlaikha a ma hongpah a ? ” tatah a tah he .
41016004	Canghrasala thlai cawh ming he ka , thlaikha alung alaipaw pui cawh a hneihly thah .
41016005	Thlai chunglang cawh a nae he ka , satlepaw pakheh cawh angkilai arangpaw a hrei ka , cacang lang chang letah a ty thlangpaw khah hmuh he ka , a pahly ngetei he .
41016006	Ma satlepaw taco , “ Naa thlawzawng kheh seh , khraws letei aa khaipaipaw Nazaret Zisu khah naa hui tahpaw ka hni . A tho kaw thah ! Ma lehei ung khawh be . Aa i sahnahpaw heh mingtua o .
41016007	Canghrasala va sei la , a hningzuitu sahlo le Piter khah , ‘ Ama tah a ca chingpaw he hrakhei naa hme lang khei Galili raang lang sei ka , ma leco naa hmuh tae a , ’ a tah tatah va ching o , ” tatah a tah .
41016008	Canu sahlo cawh thlawzawng hmotah le ci hmotah thlai taico rairang teitah chuhthlah he ka , a sai he . Aa ci tu rawng tah khei ahohmai bia a ching bei he .
41016009	Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw , a thokaw ning mongdi tah Zisu cawh a chung taitei khachia sangsarih a papiapah no Mari Makdalin khakhei a paly taw .
41016010	Mari Makdalin taco Zisu khatei a za ungpaw sahlo , mangchia sá tei , a cah leimeipaw sahlo khaco va seí ka , a thuisah he .
41016011	“ Zisu cawh hring thlang ka , ka hmuh , ” tatah a chingpaw he khah aa thui tihtah zing bei he .
41016012	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh a hningzuitu taitah pahning khatah khuatei lang aa tlawngnah lekhei a hmuisang a macangpaw tah a paly .
41016013	Ma tlaw cawh va kawkaw he ka , a tangpaw aa vesaw sahlo khah aa ching he , canghrasala zing hlui hrah bei he .
41016014	Ahning cai letah Zisu cawh a hningzuitu hluikheh sahlo batui aa e leimeining takhei a va paly . Zingnah aa hnuilynah cawtah le a tho kaw khy taitei a hmuhpaw sahlo tei aa chingpaw he zing pawtah aa lung a khong tu cawtah khei a chinghring he .
41016015	Aa hai letah , “ Khazaw pungpaluh letah sei la , tuapaw hming vytei khatah thawngchawbia heh va rei my lo .
41016016	Aho aa cang zong tah zing katei , baptisma a cangpaw maikaw cawh pachah a cang he a . Canghrasala a zing lypaw maikaw cawh sua phosah a cang he a .
41016017	Ma ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah tahei a zingpaw sahlo cawh a zui longmang he a . Kama ka ming tah khachia aa papia a , reithapaw zong tah aa rei a .
41016018	Pari zong aa kia tah tle he ka , thihnah si zong aa ding hrah hmai tah zekhatahmai a tua a bei he . A dang lypaw cung letah aa kih zong pahnia a he ka , a dang he a , ” a tah he .
41016019	Taico Abuipaw Zisu cawh aaning khatah bia a rei khy taitah vaicung lang lahchy cang ka , Khazing cacang lang letah a ty .
41016020	Taico , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh sei he ka , kawkehnah letah thawngchawbia cawh aa reilai . Abuipaw tah aaning cawh hrekhui he ka , aaning a zuilaipaw he ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah takhei aa bia sahlo cawh a pacysah .
42001001	Mehchaw cai a cangpaw Theofila , mehlupui tah kaa hrawng letei hming a va tlung ciapaw kong khah cia a pachia cy he ka ,
42001002	cia a pachiapaw he cawh mehkho ceingei tei a hmuh tawpaw sahlo le phung a reilaipaw sahlo he tei aa ma chingpaw hrakhei a cang .
42001003	Macawtaco kama zong tah a hrangthonah taitah zezong a raering teitah ka khiahle khy taitah a pazui naning tei hratah na cawtah ciapah heh a chah thly a tatah ka rawh .
42001004	Aa ca cawngpah pawhe vytei khah biahmuisui a cang tahpaw na hni khy nápawtah .
42001005	Herod cawh Judia raang letah siangpahrang a cangning takhei Zakaria aa tahpaw tlangbui pakheh ung ka , ama cawh tlangbui Abija phu leteipaw a cang . A nupui Elizabet zong cawh tlangbui Aron hring a cang .
42001006	Aa pahning tah Khazing hme letah a dingkong teitah khua a sahpaw cang he ka , suise a kawh ly tei Abuipaw biapeh le a phung le lang vytei khah a zuipaw a cang he .
42001007	Canghrasala Elizabet cawh cing ka , sawteisah bei he . Aa pahning co , aa kung a macang ngetei myca he .
42001008	Uikhehpaw cawh Zakaria phu khah aa raihre nápaw cai cawh va chuh ka , Zakaria cawh Khazing hmekaw leco tlangbui rai cawh hre ka ,
42001009	tlangbui cangnah rai a rainah phung tei hratah basung phe he ka , ama cawh Abuipaw behnah ing chung letei ringthopaw me tei ropaw rai khah a ting .
42001010	Ringthopaw me ronah cai a va chua tihtah Khazing beh rua pawtei a pahmopaw zawpui sahlo cawh khungthing lang lekhei thlaw aa chang .
42001011	Mataico , Abuipaw vaiming cawh ama khatah a va paly ka , ringthopaw ronah siasang cacang lang lekhei a daw thlang .
42001012	Zakaria tah ama cawh a hmuh tihtah a pahly ka , a ci ngetei .
42001013	Canghrasala vaiming taco , “ Zakaria ci kheh , Khazing tah na thlawchangnah khah a ca thui pah . Na nupui Elizabet tah sawcapaw a ca sah pah a . A ming cawh Johan na sá a .
42001014	Na thawchahnah le na lung a tlingnah ngetei a cang a . A pinah cawtah ming hlupui khah aa lung a lawng a .
42001015	Abuipaw mehmuh letah mehlai a cang a . Zu le ahringpaw rui khy a cangpaw zong khah ding hrahring a be . A no chung taitah Thlawpaw Pathai tah a chih ciapaw a cang a .
42001016	Israel cawngsaw mehlupui khah Abuipaw aa Khazing khatah a va chui kaw he a .
42001017	Taico , Elija a hmingtuakhynah le a thlawpaw tah Abuipaw hmelang tah a sei a . Paw sahlo lungthing cawh aa sawtei sahlo lang letah le bia a nge lypaw sahlo cawh singnah a cangpaw dingnah lang letah a hui sá he a . Cawngsaw vytei khah Abuipaw cawtah a maipacia rua pawtah a pachia a paning he a , ” tatah a tah .
42001018	Zakaria tah vaiming hai letaco , “ Ma cawh zehratamaw a cang khy a ? Kama zong mehtaa cang myca neh ka , ka nupui zong kung macang pui a cang myca ? ” a tah .
42001019	Vaiming taco , “ Kama Gabriel cawh , Khazing hmekaw letah a dawpaw ka cang . Ma kong thawngchawbia heh nama ching rua tah tawpaw ka cang .
42001020	Mataico nama cawh ma hming vytei heh a va tlung thlu hlai vytei na rei thlaw khy khaw bei ceh . Zecawtamaw tatah ma cai a tling tih tei , a va tlung lepaw ka reipaw bia khah na zing lynah cawtah , ” a tah .
42001021	Ma chung cawh zawpui vytei tah ama cawh heh thlang he ka , zecawtamaw behnah ing chung letah ma tlua co a ry zia tatah aa khuarawh a haa thlu .
42001022	A ka piathlah tihtah aaning sahlo khah bia a ching khy khawh bei he . Behnah ing chung lekhei apalynah a hmuh tahpaw khah aa hni . Zemaw tahpaw co , a kihtua khei bia khah a ching he ka , a rei cawh thlaw khy hlui be .
42001023	Mataico a raihrenah cai cawh a chang tihtah ing lang khah a dih .
42001024	Ma khy taico a nupui Elizabet cawh sawtei pho ka , thlah pangaw chung a nawh .
42001025	Elizabet taco , “ Ma heh Abuipaw tah ka cawtah a tuapaw a cang , atoning cai lehei a dukhuinah cawh palangsah ka , ming vytei hrong letei ka ningzawnah khah a pa lahpah hly myca , ” tatah a tah .
42001026	Taico , a thlahruhnah leco , Khazing tah vaiming Gabriel cawh Galili raang Nazaret khua lang khah taw ka ,
42001027	David teisaw a cangpaw Josef tah chui ruapaw tei a pahapaw laisaw pathai khakhei a taw . Ma laisaw pathai a ming cawh Mari a cang .
42001028	Vaiming cawh ama khaco va sei ka , “ Na kih ka ca tle , nama cawh dukhuinah a sangpui a cypaw na cang . Abuipaw cawh nama khatah a ung , ” a tah .
42001029	Mari cawh ma bia rawng taco a lung hna a hnawh ngetei ka , ma heh zehapaw kihtlenah maw a cang sialia , tatah a khuarawh a haa thlang .
42001030	Canghrasala vaiming taco a hai letah , “ Mari , ci kheh , Khazing dukhuinah na hmuh myca .
42001031	Sawtei pho ceh ka , sawcapaw na sá a . A ming tah Zisu tatah na tah a .
42001032	Ama cawh mehlai cang a ka , Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw tatah y a cang a . Abuipaw Khazing tah a pathlahtu paw David abui dyching khah a pae a .
42001033	Jakob mingphing sahlo cung letah bia a hnui paria a . A painah raang cawh changnah hnui be , ” a tah .
42001034	Mari taco , “ Zekhatamaw ma hming heh a cang thai a ? Kama cawh laisaw pathai pui ka cang caw ! ” tah ka ,
42001035	vaiming taco , “ Thlawpaw Pathai cawh na cung letah tlung ka , Cungnungcai Khazing hmingtuakhynah tah a ca bakhu a . Macawtaco , mehpathai a va pi lepaw cawh Khazing Sawcapaw tatah y a cang a .
42001036	Na sawny no Elizabet tahmai a tá khy tah sawtei a sá a . A cing tatei aa tah teipaw khah atoheh cawh a thlahruhnah a cang myca .
42001037	Khazing khaco a cang khy lypaw zehmai ung be , ” tatah a palei .
42001038	Mari taco , “ Kama cawh Abuipaw a saecanu ka cang , na reipaw hratah ka cung letah tlung ky seh , ” tatah a tah . Mataico , vaiming tah ama cawh a seisai .
42001039	Ma ningcai leco Mari cawh a pachia ka , Judia raang tlaang cung letei a ungpaw khua lang khah rairang tah a sei .
42001040	Zakaria ing leco a nae ka , Elizabet cawh a kih a tle .
42001041	Mari tei bia a chingpaw khah Elizabet tah a thui tihtah a chung letei a ungpaw ny cawh a pathlo ka , Elizabet cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah a chih .
42001042	A thangpui tah y ka , “ Canu vytei letah bonghnang a ting cai no cang ceh ka , na sah lepaw ny zong bonghnang a tingpaw a cang !
42001043	Canghrasala zecawtamaw ma tlua hei dukhuinah ka ting tu tlong ! Ka Buipaw a no , kama khatah na vong thlangpaw heh !
42001044	Na kih tlenah o khah ka naw tah a thui cangkaw tei leh ka chi chung letei a ungpaw ny cawh a lawng ka , a pathlo .
42001045	Abuipaw tah ama khatei bia a reipaw , a va tlung ceingei a , tatei a zing no cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh , ” tatah a tah .
42001046	Taico Mari taco , “ Ka hringnah tahei Abuipaw cawh reithai ka ,
42001047	ka thlawpaw cawh Khazing , a pa Pachahtu cung letah a lawng .
42001048	A saecanu a ny pahnai zia cawh monghly be ca ka , atoning ri taihei co , chai a va chuh lepaw letei cawngsaw vytei tah bonghnang a ting no aa pa tah a .
42001049	Meh thawtlungpaw taco , ka cawtah hming rungnawpaw a tua myca , a ming cawh a pathai .
42001050	Chaikheh hning chaikheh Ama a cizawpaw sahlo he cung letah a ningdonah a palang .
42001051	A kiá tah hming rungnawpaw sahlo cawh tua ka , aa lungchung tei a palai a patuinah a hnuipaw sahlo khah a papaipatlaw thlu he .
42001052	Uhtu bui sahlo khah aa buidyching taitah dawh thlah he ka , canghrasala nytawpaw sahlo cawh a cuicaling he .
42001053	A ngaidipaw sahlo cawh hming chawpaw tah aa rivawsah he ka , canghrasala mehrung sahlo cawh aa kih longpaw tah a kawsah he .
42001054	A sae Israel cawh bawkhang ka , Abraham le a pathlah sahlo
42001055	letei a zaangsawnah cawh chaizaw tah a thui paria thlang ka , kaa mapaw sahlo letei a reipaw zong tai khah , ” a tah .
42001056	Mari cawh Elizabet khaco thlah thung hrawng a ung khy taitah ing lang a tlung kaw .
42001057	Elizabet cawh ny a hnuinah ning le thlaw cawh va tling ka , sawcapaw a sah .
42001058	A ingpaw le a sawny sahlo tah Abuipaw tah a cung letah a zaangsawnah alaipui tah a langsah tahpaw aa thui tihtah a lawng khui ngetei he .
42001059	Ningreh ning taco nysai cawh a cingpatai rua pawtah va sei he ka , a ming cawh a paw ming Zakaria sah kaw pawtah aa tah .
42001060	Canghrasala a no tei a tahpaw cawh , “ Cang be , Johan tatah ypaw a cang , ” a tah .
42001061	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Naa sawny hrong letah ma hapaw ming a phopaw cawh aa ung tlung be , ” aa tah .
42001062	Taico a paw cawh kihtua tah nypaw ming heh aho tah paseh la maw na du tatah aa hae .
42001063	Ama taco , “ Ca cianah calung pa pei law , ” tatah a kih tuapah he ka , “ A ming cawh Johan a cang , ” tatah cia ka , cawngsaw vytei cawh aa khuarawh a haa thlang .
42001064	Ma khy cangkaw leco , a lui cawh a catlai ka , a hmo a ka caw ka , bia ka reichua ka , Khazing khah a reithai .
42001065	Ingpaw sahlo vytei cawh ningang tah ung he ka , tlaang raang a cangpaw Judia raang cawngsaw vytei taco , ma kong longtei khah aa rei .
42001066	Ma aa thuipaw maikaw cawh aa khuarawh haa ka , “ Ma nypaw heh zemaw a ka lo tae tu a ? ” tatah aa tah tlungmang . Abuipaw hmingtuakhynah kih cawh a cung letah a ungnah cawtah a cang .
42001067	A paw Zakaria cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah chih ka , bia phy ka ,
42001068	“ Abuipaw , Israel Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh . Zemaw tah pawco , Ama cawh a vong ka , a cawngsaw sahlo cawh a tlang myca he .
42001069	A sae David pathlah taikhei pachahnah ki cawh kaa cawtah a patung myca .
42001070	Abuipaw tah khuahlai ning taitei Khazing khuavang mehpathai sahlo hmang tei bia a ma taipaw cawh ,
42001071	kaa carae sahlo le a ma huapaw sahlo taitah pachah rua pawtah a cang .
42001072	Khazing tah kaa mapaw sahlo cung letah zawnge a neh ka , ka biahrai pathaipaw cawh ka cingkai a , a tah .
42001073	Kaa mapaw Abraham khatah ma biatainah a tuapaw cawh
42001074	kaaning khah kaa carae kih chung taitah pachah chua pawtah le ciphang lytah le pathainah le ding ná tah ,
42001075	kaa hring chung vytei a hmekung letah a rai kaa hre khy nápaw cawtah a cang .
42001076	Ka sawtei , nama cawh Cungnungcai Khazing khuavang tatah y na cang a ; zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw langpui parai pawtah a hme letah na sei lai a .
42001077	A cawngsaw sahlo khah naa suanah ngethai a cangnah thongtah pachahnah naa hmuh a , tatah na ching he a .
42001078	Zecawtamaw tatah kaa Khazing cawh ningdo a thaipaw le a ningnaipaw a cang , pachahnah khainah cawh avai taitah kaa cung letah khaisah ka ,
42001079	thihnah ningpahli le muinah chung letah a ungpaw sahlo cung letah khai sá pawtah le kaaning khah denah langpui lang chuithlah rua pawtah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
42001080	Taico nysai cawh ka changchy ka , thlawpaw lang letah thawzaang ka hnui longmang ka , Israel mingphing sahlo letei a va phyhlang hlai vytei cawh raangcaa lekhei khua a sah .
42002001	Ma ningcai leco Sizar Augusta tah Rom painah raang chung letei a ungpaw vytei mehlu rei rua pawtah bia a chua .
42002002	Ma hming heh Kuirinia cawh Siria raang letah raang uhbui a hrening letei mehlu reinah a ung taw caipaw a cang .
42002003	Cawngsaw vytei cawh aaning aa thokehnah khua cacy lang khah ming cia rua pawtah a sei he .
42002004	Josef zong Galili raang Nazaret khua taitah Judia raang David khua Bethlehem lang cawh sei rua pawtah a tho . Ama cawh David hring le a pathlah taitei a chuhpaw a cangnah cawtah .
42002005	Chui ruapaw tei a pahapaw Mari , ny a chai daimangpaw khaco ming cia rua pawtah a sei .
42002006	Ma letei aa ungning taco ny a hnui nápaw ning le thlaw cawh va tling ka ,
42002007	taico sa-uthui cawh sah ka , sawcapaw a cang . Pai tah pahlong he ka , sahring lawhkong letah aa isah , zecawtamaw tatah khuabuh letah aa tlung nápaw hminghmaw ung khawh be .
42002008	Taico ma kaekang phong leco tuukingtu sahlo ung he ka , zai tah aa tuu sahlo cawh aa mingkai he .
42002009	Abuipaw a vaiming cawh a za paly ka , Abuipaw rungnawnah taco aa kaekang vytei cawh khaisah thlu ka , tuuking sahlo cawh aa ci ngetei .
42002010	Canghrasala Abuipaw a vaiming taco , “ Ci khe o , cawngsaw vytei caw pawtah thawngchawbia a lawng a chuipaw ka va ca tlungkhui pah he hi .
42002011	Atoning heh naa cawtah David khua letah Pachahtu a pi , Ama cawh Khri le Abuipaw a cang .
42002012	Ma heh naa cawtah paching pakhanah a cang a . Nysai pai tei pahlongpaw , sahring lawhkong letei aa isah thlangpaw cawh naa hmuh a , ” a tah he .
42002013	Ma cangkawleh cawh sung sungkheh tah vaiming rungpui cawh Khazing reithai hmo khei vaiming khaco a za paly he ka ,
42002014	“ Cungnungcai Khazing cawh reithai tah ung ky seh , a dukhuinah aa cung letah a ungpaw aluicung cawngsaw sahlo khaco denah ung paria thlang seh , ” aa tah .
42002015	Vaiming sahlo vaicung lang aa sei kaw taico , tuuking sahlo taco , “ Atoheh a tho he peh seh la , Bethlehem khua lang cawh sei he peh . Abuipaw tei a ma chingpaw hming a va tlungpaw cawh ming rua pawtah sei he peh , ” aa tah he .
42002016	Taico rairang tah sei he ka , Mari le Josef le sahring lawhkong letei aa isah thlangpaw nysai khah aa va hmuh .
42002017	Aa va hmuh khy taico , ma nysai konglang vytei , vaiming tei a chingpaw he hratah aa va hmuhpaw kong khah aa reilai longmang .
42002018	A thuipaw vytei sahlo taco , tuukingtu sahlo tei bia aa reipaw khah aa khuarawh a haa ngetei thlu .
42002019	Canghrasala Mari duitei taco ma hming vytei cawh a lungthing tah pacang ka , a cingkai .
42002020	Aa thuipaw hming vytei le aa hmuhpaw maikaw cawh aa chingpaw he hratah a cangnah cawtah tuukingtu sahlo tah Khazing cawh rungnawnah le reithainah hlai he ka aa ungnah lang a kaw kaw he .
42002021	Ningreh a va tling ning leco , a cingpa cawh tai he ka , a ming tah Zisu aa sah . Ma ming cawh sawtei a pho hlai tah vaiming tei a peh si ciapaw ming khah a cang .
42002022	Moses phungbia hratah a pathaisahnah cai cawh a tling tihtah Josef le Mari taco Abuipaw letah hlai rua pawtah Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang aa seikhui .
42002023	Abuipaw phungbia letah , “ Capaw sa-uthui maikaw cawh Abuipaw cawtah patliapaw a cang he , ” tatah ciapaw hratah .
42002024	Taico Abuipaw phungbia tei a reipaw zui nápaw athuihlainah caw pawtah thury bokheh a cang ly leh lelai a nypaw tei punghning tah aa hlai pawtah aa va seipaw a cang hrah .
42002025	Ma ningcai leco Jerusalem letah cawngsaw pakheh Simeon aa tahpaw , mehding le mehse ngeteipaw a ung . Israel mingphing cung letei thlaw palungtu a va tlung lepaw cawh heh thlang ka , Thlawpaw Pathai cawh a cung letah a ung .
42002026	Thlawpaw Pathai tah Abuipaw Khri a hmuh hlai vytei cawh thi balang bei ceh tatah a thuisah ciapaw a cang .
42002027	Thlawpaw chuithlah ná tah behnah ingdung chunglang cawh a nae ka . Moses phungbia naning tei hratah a cung letah tua ruapaw cawtah nysai Zisu cawh a no le a paw tah aa va chuakhui .
42002028	Simeon taco nysai cawh pawng ka , Khazing cawh ma hrahei a reithai ,
42002029	“ Vy , Cungnungcai Abuipaw nama tei bia na pa pataipaw hrakhei atoheh na sae cawh thlawlung teitah na pa thihsah myca a .
42002030	Ka mehkho tah na pachahnah cawh a hmuh myca ,
42002031	ming vytei mehmuh letei na pachia ciapaw khah le ,
42002032	Gental cawngsaw sahlo cawtah khainah cawh palangsah pawtah le na cawngsaw Israel cawngsaw sahlo rungnawnah ruapaw cawtah , ” a tah .
42002033	A no le a paw cawh nysai konglang a reipaw bia cawh aa khuarawh a haa ngetei .
42002034	Taico Simeon taco aaning cawh bonghnang song he ka , a no Mari khah ma hrahei a tah , “ Ma nysai heh Israel cawngsaw mehlupui a posahly rua pawtah le mehlupui a padawchy tu cawtah rawhpaw a cang . Ama cawh Khazing taitah a va chuhpaw paching pakhanah cawngsaw hlupui tei aa cakhae lepaw cawh a cang a .
42002035	Ma taikhei cawngsaw hlupui aa khuarawnah khah palang a cang tae a . Taico nama na thinglung zong zyzi tah a ca thipahleh tae a , ” a tah .
42002036	Khazing khuavangno pakheh , Asher phing leteipaw , Fanuel a sawcanu Ana ung hrah ka , ama cawh a taa ngetei myca . Ama cawh dongcang ka , a pasae khatah kung sarih ung hrui he ka ,
42002037	ma khy taico kung songreh le kung pali tai lahmeno a cang . Behnah ing seisai bang lytah ching le zai batui cahe hmotah thlawchang katei Khazing a beh teipaw a cang .
42002038	Ma ningcing taco aaning lang a vong ka , Khazing khatah alawngnah bia a hlai . Jerusalem pachahnah a heh paw sahlo maikaw hai leco ma nysai kong heh a ching he .
42002039	Josef le Mari tah Abuipaw phungbia tei a hia a tahpaw maikaw aa tua panging thlu khy taikhei Galili raang aa ungnah khua Nazaret lang cawh aa paleh kaw .
42002040	Taico nysai cawh ka lai vy longmang , a thaw ka tlung vy longmang ka , singná tah chih ka , Khazing dukhuinah cawh a cung letah a ung .
42002041	Kung tating tah Zisu a no le a paw cawh Khungsai Panawnah hmang rua pawtah Jerusalem lang a sei tei he .
42002042	Zisu cawh kung hrawhluihning va tling ka , a phunglang tei hratah Panawnah lang cawh aa sei .
42002043	Panawnah a chang khy taico a no le a paw cawh ing lang aa va kaw kaw ning tah nyhehpaw Zisu cawh Jerusalem lekhei ung patle ka , canghrasala aaning taco hnih bei he .
42002044	Aa hrong letah a ung thlang rua tah he ka , ning kheh chung a sei he . Mataico a vesaw sahlo le a sawny hrong letah aa huilai .
42002045	Ama cawh aa hmuh khawh ly tih taco , Jerusalem khuapui lang khah hui rua pawtah aa paleh kaw he .
42002046	Ningthung a tling khy tah behnah ingdung chung lekhei , aa va hmuh kaw . Cawngpahtu macang sahlo khakhei a za ty thlang ka , aa bia khah nge he , hae hri he , a za tah leimei .
42002047	A chaipaw he bia le a hnithai zia , aa thuipaw maikaw cawh aa ning a ang ngetei .
42002048	A no le a paw tah Ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah aa khuarawh a haa thlang . A no taco , “ Ka sawcapaw , zecawtamaw ma hrahei na ma tua ? Na paw khatah thlawzawng hmotah pui kaa ca huilai leimei kata caw ! ” tatah a tah .
42002049	Zisu taco , “ Zecawtamaw naa pa hui ? Ka Paw ing letah ka ung ruapaw a cang tahpaw heh hnih bei he ceh maw ? ” a tah he .
42002050	Canghrasala , aa hai letei bia a reipaw cawh a silang hnih bei he .
42002051	Mataico , aaning khatah Nazaret khua lang cawh sei ka , aa reingé tah a ung . Canghrasala a no taco ma hming vytei heh a lungchung letah a pacung thlang .
42002052	Taico Zisu cawh kachang vy lai , ka sing vy lai longmang ka , Khazing le cawngsaw dukhuinah a tong .
42003001	Tiberias Sizar abuinah kung hrawhluipangaw a tling kung , Pontia Pilat cawh Judia raang uhtu a cangning takhei Herod cawh Galili raang uhbui cang ka , a unypaw Filip cawh Ituria le Trakoniti raang uhbui cang ka , Lusinia cawh Abilen raang uhbui cang ka ,
42003002	Anas le Kaiafa tlangbui alaicaipaw aa cangning takhei , raangcaa letei a ungpaw Zakaria a sawcapaw Johan cung lekhei Khazing bia cawh a va tlung .
42003003	Jordan tuivaw kaekang raang vytei lang cawh seilai ka , sua ngethainah cawtah angepachihnah baptisma kong phung a rei lai .
42003004	Khazing khuavang Isaiah cabu letei , “ Raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o taco , ‘ Abuipaw a cawtah langpui parai la , a cawtah langpui pading pah my lo .
42003005	Saiho maikaw cawh nai la , tlaang le tlangby maikaw cawh panai my lo . Lang a kuikalehpaw cawh pading la , a bykhi a bylypaw cawh pamai my lo .
42003006	Taico , cawngsaw maikaw tah Khazing a pachahnah cawh aa hmuh a , ’ tatah a tah , ” tatah ciapaw hrakhei .
42003007	Johan tah ama khatah baptisma cang ruapaw tei a va chuhpaw zawpui sahlo he cawh , “ Naaning pari cangmai pathlah sahlo , Khazing thingaenah a va chuh leimeipaw heh saisai rua pawtah aho tamaw a ca ching he ?
42003008	Na ngepachihnah he ceh cawh a thuipa tah palang my lo . ‘ Abraham pathlah sahlo kaa cang peh , ’ tatah tah leimei khe o . Ka ca ching he hi , Khazing taco ma alung sahlo heh Abraham sawtei sahlo tah a tua khy thlang he hi .
42003009	Thinghrang maikaw letah ahrui aa chia thlu thah . Thui chaw a thui lypaw thingkung maikaw cawh hyhly tah me lang bo a cang he a , ” a tah he .
42003010	Zawpuipaw tah , “ A cang caco zemaw kaa tua a ? ” tatah aa hae .
42003011	Johan taco , “ Angki zing hning a hnuipaw tah a hnui lypaw khah chaichy seh la , e ruapaw a hnuipaw tah a hnui lypaw cawh pei hrah seh , ” tatah a chai he .
42003012	Ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo zong cawh baptisma cang hrá pawtah a vong he ka , “ Cawngpahtu , zemaw kaa tua a ? ” tatah aa hae .
42003013	“ Khei ruapaw navy tah a hlu vy tah va khei lai khe o , ” a tah he .
42003014	Mataico raekeh thaikhehpaw sahlo tah , “ Kaaning saw zemaw kaa tua a ? ” tatah aa hae . “ Male tangka chu lai khe la , ahmang lypaw tah cawngsaw luithae lai khe o , naa hlo letah naa lungtling thlang seh , ” tatah a tah he .
42003015	Zawpui taco a ngete ly ngetei tah heh thlang he ka , aa dawngkasawny co , Johan heh Khri a cang thlang thly a , tatah aa rawh .
42003016	Johan tah aa dawngkasawny hai leco , “ Kama taco tui tah baptisma ka ca cangsah he . Canghrasala kama navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a va chuh a . Kama cawh a phepakong rui a thlang tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh . Ama taco Thlawpaw Pathai le me tah baptisma a ca cangsá he a .
42003017	Saze zeinah cawh a kiá tah tle ka , phuhri letah saze cawh a zei a , achang khah apaang letah rai a ka , asi khah a thi thai lypaw me lang a bo a , ” tatah a tah he .
42003018	Taico Johan tah zawpui vytei cawh a phingphing tah pasynah bia ching he ka , aaning cawh thawngchawbia a cawngpah he .
42003019	Canghrasala , Johan tah abui Herod cawh a nytei nupui Herodi a chunah kong letah le ahringpaw chahlynah hming a tuapaw vytei kong letah a mochia tihtah ,
42003020	Herod tah ma vytei cung letah a chahchipaw cawh Johan khah thong-ing chung letah a hrai .
42003021	Ming vytei baptisma aa cang tlungmang ning takhei , Zisu zong cawh baptisma a cang hrah . Taico thlaw a chang leimei ning taco avai cawh a hong .
42003022	Thlawpaw Pathai cawh thury hratah a cung letah a za cung . Taico avai taitah o za ring ka , “ Nama cawh ka dopaw Ka Sawcapaw na cang , na cung letah ka lung a lawng ngetei , ” tatah a tah .
42003023	Zisu cawh phungrei a patho ning tahei kung songthung hrawng a tah . Ama cawh Josef sawtei aa tah . Josef cawh Heli a sawtei ,
42003024	Heli cawh Mathat a sawtei , Mathat cawh Levi a sawtei , Levi cawh Melkhi a sawtei , Melkhi cawh Janai a sawtei , Janai cawh Josef a sawtei ,
42003025	Josef cawh Matathia a sawtei , Mathathia cawh Amos a sawtei , Amos cawh Nahum a sawtei , Nahum cawh Esli a sawtei , Esli cawh Nakai a sawtei ,
42003026	Nakai cawh Matha a sawtei , Matha cawh Matathia a sawtei , Matathia cawh Semein a sawtei , Semein cawh Josek a sawtei , Josek cawh Joda a sawtei ,
42003027	Joda cawh Joanan a sawtei , Joanan cawh Rhesa a sawtei , Rhesa cawh Zerubabel a sawtei , Zerubabel cawh Shealtia a sawtei , Shealtia cawh Neri a sawtei ,
42003028	Neri cawh Melkhi a sawtei , Melkhi cawh Adi a sawtei , Adi cawh Kosam a sawtei , Kosam cawh Elmadam a sawtei , Elmadam cawh Er a sawtei ,
42003029	Er cawh Josua a sawtei , Josua cawh Eliezer a sawtei , Eliezer cawh Jorim a sawtei , Jorim cawh Mathat a sawtei , Mathat cawh Levi a sawtei ,
42003030	Levi cawh Simeon a sawtei , Simeon cawh Judah a sawtei , Judah cawh Josef a sawtei , Josef cawh Jonam a sawtei , Jonam cawh Eliakim a sawtei ,
42003031	Eliakim cawh Melea a sawtei , Melea cawh Mena a sawtei , Mena cawh Matatha a sawtei , Matatha cawh Nathan a sawtei , Nathan cawh David a sawtei ,
42003032	David cawh Jesi a sawtei , Jesi cawh Obed a sawtei , Obed cawh Boaz a sawtei , Boaz cawh Salmon a sawtei , Salmon cawh Nashon a sawtei ,
42003033	Nashon cawh Aminada a sawtei , Aminada cawh Ram a sawtei , Ram cawh Hezron a sawtei , Hezron cawh Perez a sawtei , Perez cawh Judah a sawtei ,
42003034	Judah cawh Jakob a sawtei , Jakob cawh Isak a sawtei , Isak cawh Abraham a sawtei , Abraham cawh Tera a sawtei , Tera cawh Nahor a sawtei ,
42003035	Nahor cawh Seruk a sawtei , Seruk cawh Reu a sawtei , Reu cawh Pelek a sawtei , Pelek cawh Eba a sawtei , Eba cawh Shelah a sawtei ,
42003036	Shelah cawh Kainan a sawtei , Kainan cawh Arpaksa a sawtei , Arpaksa cawh Shem a sawtei , Shem cawh Noah a sawtei , Noah cawh Lamek a sawtei ,
42003037	Lamek cawh Methusela a sawtei , Methusela cawh Enok a sawtei , Enok cawh Jared a sawtei , Jared cawh Mahalale a sawtei , Mahalale cawh Kenan a sawtei ,
42003038	Kenan cawh Eno a sawtei , Eno cawh Seth a sawtei , Seth cawh Adam a sawtei , Adam cawh Khazing a sawtei a cang .
42004001	Zisu cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah chih ka , Jordan tuivaw taitah va kaw kaw ka , Thlawpaw taco raangcaa lang a seikhui .
42004002	Ma leco Setan tah ning songli chung tuhso ka , ma chung vytei cawh zehmai a e lynah cawtah a hning taco a ngai a di .
42004003	Setan taco , “ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco , ma alung heh very tah cang law tah ca ! ” tatah a tah .
42004004	Zisu taco , “ Khazing bia letah ma hrahei ciapaw a cang , ‘ Cawngsaw heh very suipaw tah aa hring tlung be ! ’ ” tatah a chai .
42004005	Setan taco Zisu cawh tlaang sangpaw lang kekhui ka , khazaw painah raang vytei khah sungkheh tah hmuhsah ka ,
42004006	taico a hai letah , “ Ma vytei nawhnuinah le a rungnawnah heh ka ca pae a , zecawtamaw tatah ma heh kama letah pehpaw cang thah he ka , ka dupaw maikaw cawh ka peh khy he .
42004007	Macawtaco , na pa beh caco , ma vytei heh na tei a cang a , ” a tah .
42004008	Zisu taco , “ Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Abuipaw na Khazing khah beh la , Ama a rai suipaw hre my lo , ’ tah a cang , ” tatah a palei .
42004009	Setan tah Zisu cawh Jerusalem khuapui lang seikhui ka , behnah ing a sangcainah ing cung lekhei a dawsah ka , “ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang caco , ma taihei a zythlah tua .
42004010	Zecawtamaw tatah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Nama na kong lehei Khazing tah a vaiming sahlo khah naw pei a he ka ,
42004011	na phe cawh alung letah na khong ly nápawtah aa kiá tah aa ca caling a , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
42004012	Zisu tah , “ Abuipaw na Khazing cawh hnehsah kheh , tahpaw a cang , ” tatah a chai .
42004013	Setan tah Zisu cawh ma vytei hrahei a tuhso khy taitah hmelang cai a raicangpaw cawtah a seisai .
42004014	Thlawpaw Pathai thawtlungnah khatah Zisu cawh Galili raang lang a paleh kaw ka , a konglang cawh khuapui kaekang vytei letah a thang .
42004015	Aa synagog sahlo letah cawngpah he ka , ming vytei tah Ama cawh aa reithai .
42004016	A changchynah khua Nazaret khua lang cawh sei ka , Sabat ning taco a tua teipaw phung hratah synagog lang kha a nae . Taico capathai rei pawtah a daw .
42004017	Khazing khuavang Isaiah bia , sapho lingpaw cabu cawh a kih letah aa hlai . Ma cabu cawh pathlang ka , ma hratei ciapaw khah a hmuh ,
42004018	“ Abuipaw Thlawpaw cawh ka cung letah a ung , zecawtamaw tatah mehsisah sahlo hai letah thawngchawbia rei rua pawtah kama cawh sathy thu tah a pa thing . Thong letei a tangpaw sahlo he piachuanah ruapaw tlang y pawtah pa taw ka , a mehcopaw sahlo mehvang sápaw le tlaihnawh a cangpaw sahlo thochua rua pawtah le ,
42004019	Abuipaw dukhuipaw kung kong y khui rua pawtah , ” tahpaw heh .
42004020	Mataico sapho lingpaw cabu cawh ling kaw ka , a kaitu khah pei ka , a ty . Synagog chung letei ming vytei taco a cung letah aa meh aa chia thlu thlang .
42004021	Aa hai leco , “ Atoning letah ma Capathai heh naa thuipaw tei hrahei a tling myca , ” a tah he .
42004022	Ming maikaw tah a kong chaw rei he ka , a kaw taitei ningdonah bia a chuhpaw cung leco aa ningang ngetei thlu ka , “ Ma heh Josef a sawcapaw khah cang bei maw ? ” aa tah .
42004023	Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Ma phungthluh bia heh naa pa reiso hrahring tae hi , ‘ Sibuipaw , nama le nama a dangsah tua , Kapernaum khua letei na tuapaw kaa thuipaw khah ma na changchynah khua lehei tua hrah ! ’ tahpaw heh .
42004024	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing khuavang cawh ama a pinah khua leco cyhlang bei he .
42004025	Khazing khuavang Elija chai lekhei , Israel raang chung letah lahme hlupui a ung he . Kung thung le a chy khua kaang ka , raang pungpaluh letah cakaang a thaw tah a tlung .
42004026	Canghrasala Elija cawh Israel raang lahme maikaw khatah taw cang hlui be . Sidon raang , Zarefat khua letei a ungpaw lahme khatah suipaw taw a cang .
42004027	Mataico , Khazing khuavang Elisha chaining zong takhei , Israel raang chung letah mehthinghmui hlupui a ung he . Canghrasala Siria cawngsaw Naaman tah cy ly co ahohmai a dangsah tlung bei he , ” tatah a tah he .
42004028	Synagog letei a ungpaw ming vytei tah aa thui tihtah aa thing aa ae ngetei .
42004029	Tho he ka , Ama cawh khua lailang papia he ka , aa khuathui tlaang , lungkang lang nang thlah pawtah aa seikhui .
42004030	Canghrasala zawpui hrong taikhei a zuh thlah ka , a seihly .
42004031	Ma khy taico Galili raang , Kapernaum khua lang cawh cungthlah ka , Sabat ning tah zawpui khah a cawngpah he .
42004032	A bia cawh nawhnuinah chi tah a cangnah cawtah a cawngpahnah cawh aa khuarawh a haa thlang .
42004033	Synagog leco , thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw cawngsaw pakheh ung ka , a thangpui tah y ka ,
42004034	“ Vy , Nazaret Zisu , kaaning khahei zemaw na du ? Kaaning hlyde ruapaw tamaw na vong ? Nama cawh ahomaw na cang tahpaw ka hni , Khazing Mehpathai na cang , ” tatah a tah .
42004035	Zisu tah , “ De teitah ung ! A chung taikhei ka pia , ” tatah a hrangso . Ma khy taico thlawpaw pialuipaw tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh ming vytei mehmuh leco phongchai ka , hmaw phosah lytah a piathlah .
42004036	Cawngsaw vytei cawh aa ningang thlang ka , pakheh le pakheh khah , “ Zehapaw cawngpahnah maw a cang he ? Naw hnuinah le hmingtuakhynah khatah thlawpaw pialuipaw zong naw pei he katei , aa pia thlangpaw heh ! ” tatah aa tah he .
42004037	Taico Zisu kong thongpang cawh ma raang kaekang vytei cawh a thang thlu .
42004038	Zisu cawh synagog taitah piathlah ka , Simon ing lang a nae . Simon a nupuino a no cawh asaw tah a sahpui tah nang ka , Zisu cawh bawnah aa haepah .
42004039	Zisu tah a bung hno ka , a sawnah khah raw ka , a sawnah taco a thlaw . Sungkheh tah ka tho ka , aaning sahlo cawh a tangtui he .
42004040	Ning a va tlah lang leco asawnah phingphing a hnuipaw vytei khah Zisu khatah va chua khui he ka , aa cung letah a kih pahnia cy ka , aaning sahlo cawh a dangsah he .
42004041	Ma hlui co , mehlupui chung taitah khachia sahlo khah pia he ka , “ Nama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw na cang , ” tatah a y he . Canghrasala aaning cawh Zisu tah raw he ka , Khri a cang tahpaw aa hni cawtah khei aa rei thlawpaw khah sai bei he .
42004042	Mong khua va dui ka , Zisu cawh a kingdangnah lang khah sei ka , zawpui tah Ama khah aa hui . Taico a ungnah aa va phah tihtah aaning khah seisai khawh ly rua pawtah tle a pachia he .
42004043	Canghrasala Zisu tah , “ Khua hring lang zong letah Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia ka rei hrah ruapaw a cang , ma ruapaw taco tawpaw cang tlung neh ka , ” a tah he .
42004044	Taico Judia raang synagog sahlo letah a cawngpah lai longmang he .
42005001	Ningkhehpaw cawh Zisu cawh Genesaret tuiping ngaekang leco a daw thlang . Cawngsaw zawpui taco a pungso thlang he ka , Khazing bia cawh aa nge .
42005002	Ngaw a tlepaw sahlo tei aa so aa suh kaa letei aa seisaipaw tuilawng sanghning khah ngaekang letah a hmuh .
42005003	Simon a tei a cangpaw tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka , “ Ngaekang taitah tui le chung vy lang hrui vy bang law , ” tatah Simon cawh a tah . Taico a ty ka , zawpui cawh tuilawng taico a cawngpah he .
42005004	Bia a reipaw a pachang taico Simon hai letah , “ Tui a thunah vypaw lang pange la , ma leco na so khah va tua , ” tatah a tah .
42005005	Simon taco , “ Hruitupaw , zaikhuadui reithui ngetei tah va he peh ka , sangkheh hmai tle bei peh . Canghrasala , nama na bia tei hratah ka va thlang tua a , ” tatah a palei .
42005006	Ma hraco tua he ka , ngaw a hlupui a o cawtah aa so sahlo zong a kychy pai thlu .
42005007	Mataico , tuilawng ahringpaw letei a ungpaw sahlo khah va ma baw law tatah aa kiá tah aa kui he . Mataico a vong he ka , tuilawng sanghning tah ngaw cawh dui he ka , a chi tu cawtah tuilawng cawh tui lang a phungpai daimang he .
42005008	Simon Piter tah ma hming vytei cawh a hmuh tihtah Zisu phehrang letah a bawh ka , a hai leco , “ Mehsua ka cang , Abuipaw , pa seisai thlang law , ” a tah .
42005009	Ama le a vesaw sahlo cawh ngaw hlupui aa tlenah cawtah khei aa khuarawh haa ngetei ka ,
42005010	Simon a vesaw sahlo a cangpaw Zebedi sawcapaw leh Jeims le Johan cawh aa khuarawh aa haa ngetei hrah . Mataico Zisu tah Simon hai letah , “ Ci kheh , atohei co cawngsaw na tle myca he a , ” tatah a tah .
42005011	Macawtaco tuilawng sahlo khah ngaekang lang piakhui he ka , zezongpui seisai tah Zisu cawh aa zui .
42005012	Zisu cawh khuapui hrawng letei khua kheh letah a ungning taco , thinghmuihri tei a pahlong thlangpaw cawngsawpaw pakheh Ama khatah a vong ka , Zisu a hmuh cangkawleh alui letah a khuh panai ka , ma hrahei naw ka , “ Abuipaw na du caco na pa dangsah khy , ” tatah a tah .
42005013	Zisu taco a kiá tah va pazah ka , ama cawh va tong ka , “ Na dang cawh du neh ka , dang myca , ” tatah a tah . Ma cangkaw leco , a thinghmuihri vytei cawh a pathai .
42005014	Taico , Zisu tah ma hrahei bia patai ka , “ Ahohmai ching khe lo , ma duitei cawh va sei la , tlangbui a va ming sah la , Moses phungbia hrakhei thuihlainah va tua , mapaw suico dangsah na cangpaw khah ming maikaw tah aa ca hni a , ” a tah .
42005015	Canghmaisala , Zisu a konglang cawh a thang vy lo leimei ka , mehlupui tah a bia nge pawtah le aa sawnah pawhe dangsah rua pawtah Ama cawh aa va pange .
42005016	Canghrasala Zisu cawh a kingdangnah lang sei tah thlawchang pawtah a piathlah tei .
42005017	Ningkheh cawh Zisu tah a cawngpah leimeining he tah Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo , Galili raang khua ting taitah le Judia raang khua ting taitah le Jerusalem khuapui taitei a va chuhpaw sahlo cawh a ty thlang hrah he ka , a sahpaw sahlo he dangsah rua pawtah Abuipaw thawtlungnah cawh a cung letah a ung .
42005018	Mehthaikheh tah a songbepaw pakheh a iphaw khatah a ka song lai he ka , ing chunglang a nae khui tah Zisu kung tlungkhui pawtah a pachia he .
42005019	Cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah a kung phahkhuinah lang hmuh be ca he ka , ingcung lang aa kekhui . Ing aa daepaw lungphae khah hneihly he ka , cawngsawpaw cawh iphaw chitah zawpui hrawng lekhei Zisu hme lalei leco aa za thlah .
42005020	Zisu tah aa zingnah khah a hmuh tihtah a songbepaw hai leco , “ Ka dua , na suanah vytei cawh ngethai a cang , ” tatah a tah .
42005021	Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco , “ Ma cawngsaw heh ahomaw a cang ? Khazing reipachianah bia a rei hi ! Khazing tah ly co ahomaw suanah a ngethai khy ? ” tatah aa lungchung tah aa pacang .
42005022	Zisu tah aa lungchung rawhnah cawh hnih ka , “ Zecawtamaw ma hrahei naa lungchung tah naa pacang ?
42005023	‘ Na suanah sahlo cawh ngethai a cang , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy maw ? ‘ Tho la , sei , ’ tahpaw maw a neh vy ?
42005024	Canghrasala , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh aluicung lehei sua ngethai khynah naw a hnui taheh ka ca hmuh sá he a , ” tah ka , a songbepaw hai letaco , “ Tho la , na iphaw a lah la , ing lang a dih , ” tatah a tah .
42005025	Sung sungkheh tah aa hmekaw leco a daw ka , a iphaw cawh law ka , Khazing reithai hmotah ing lang cawh a dih .
42005026	Ming maikaw cawh aa ningang ngetei ka , Khazing khah reithai he ka , “ Atoning heh hming khuarawha chuipaw kaa hmuh hi , ” aa tah tlungmang .
42005027	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh piathlah ka , ngungkhui a kheipaw Levi aa tahpaw cawh ngungkhui kheinah hming letah a tythlangpaw khah hmuh ka , “ Va pa zui , ” tatah a tah .
42005028	Taico Levi cawh tho ka , zezongpui seisai tah Zisu cawh a zui .
42005029	Mataico Levi tah Zisu cawtah a ing letah lawhdangnah rungnaw ngeteipaw a tuapah . Ngungkhui a kheipaw mehlupui le ahringpaw mehlupui khah aaning khatah batui aa e hrah .
42005030	Canghrasala Farasi le aa phu a cangpaw phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco , Zisu hningzuitu sahlo hai leco , “ Zecawtamaw ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo khatah naa e naa ding lai ? ” tatah aa mochia he .
42005031	Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ A dang thlangpaw tah sibui aa hia tlung be , a dang lypaw tah pui aa hia !
42005032	Mehding y rua pawtah ka vong tlung be , mehsua sahlo khah aa suanah a ngepachihsah rua pawtah ka vong hri hi , ” tatah a chai he .
42005033	Aaning sahlo taco Zisu hai letah , “ Baptisma peitu Johan a hningzuitu sahlo cawh batui cahe tah thlawchang tei he ka , Farasi phunglang aa zuipaw sahlo zong tah ma hraco aa tua tei hrah . Canghrasala nama na hningzuitu sahlo heh e le ding tah aa ung thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
42005034	Zisu taco , “ Songpaw sahlo cawh nupui a chuipaw satlepaw khatah aa ung chung taco batui a cahe tei he maw ?
42005035	Canghrasala nupui a chuipaw khah aa hrong taitei aa seikhuinah cai khah a phah tae a . Ma taico aa cahe tae thlang a , ” tatah a palei he .
42005036	Ma tawchingnah bia zong heh Zisu taco a ching he , “ Ahotahmai paithang a thapaw khah hriachy tah chaichi a paringpaw khah a beithlah bang bei he . Ma hratei aa tua caco a thapaw khah a rawhrang a ka , a paringpaw letei a thapaw aa baipaw zong khah a tlah hrá be .
42005037	Mataico ahotahmai misurhang a hringtui khah sapho tuithei a paringpaw letah rai bang bei he . Aa rai caco , misurhang a hring taco sapho tuithei cawh tingchy a ka , taico misurhang khah zuh thlu a ka , sapho tuithei zong a rawh thlu a .
42005038	Ma navy co , misurhang a hringtui cawh sapho tuithei a thapaw letah rai hripaw a cang .
42005039	Cawngsaw maikaw tah misurhang ahlungpaw aa ding khy taitah a thapaw ding du khawh bei he . ‘ A hlungpaw a chah vy , ’ aa tah , ” tatah aa tah .
42006001	Zisu tah Sabat ningkhehpaw cawh saze lui cahrong ka , a hningzuitu sahlo taco saangsu cawh pahrih he ka , aa kih letah rua he ka , aa e lai .
42006002	Farasi cawngsaw thaikheh tah Zisu cawh , “ Sabat ning letah tua phung a cang lypaw zecawtamaw naa tua ? ” tatah aa tah he .
42006003	Zisu taco , “ David tei a vesaw sahlo khatah aa ngaidi ning tei a tuapaw khah rei bang bei he ceh maw ?
42006004	Khazing behnah ing lang a nae ka , tlangbui sahlo tah ly co ahotahmai e phung a cang lypaw , Khazing aa dangnah very khah a e ! Taico a chy khah a vesaw sahlo zong a peh hrah he kho ! ” tatah a palei he .
42006005	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Sabat Buipaw a cang , ” a tah he .
42006006	Sabat ning vypaw leco Zisu cawh synagog lang a nae ka , a cawngpah he . Ma leco cawngsawpaw pakheh a cacang lang kih a songpaw a ung .
42006007	Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco Zisu cawh sua aa pu khy nápawtah a bo he ka , Sabat ning tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh a dangsah maw dangsah ly takhah aa ngia thlang .
42006008	Canghrasala , Zisu tah aa lungchung tei aa pacangpaw khah hnih thlang ka , a kih a songpaw hai leco , “ Ming vytei hme lehei tho la , a daw , ” tatah a tah . Taico tho ka , a daw .
42006009	Ma khy taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Sabat ning tahei chahnah tua maw a phung a cang , chahlynah maw ? Hringnah pachah heh maw a phung a cang , thaw heh maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
42006010	A kaekang leteipaw sahlo cawh ming he ka , ma cawngsawpaw hai leco , “ Na kih pathlang , ” tatah a tah . Taico a kih cawh pathlang ka , a dang .
42006011	Canghrasala , Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh aa thingae ngetei ka , Zisu cawh zekhatamaw tua he peh seh la , a cha a , tahpaw khah pakheh le pakheh aa reisia .
42006012	Ma cai leco Zisu cawh thlawchang rua pawtah tlaang cung lang ke ka , a zing zaikhuadui Khazing khatah thlaw a chang .
42006013	Mong khua va dui ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh y he ka , pahrawhluihning khah thing he ka , aaning sahlo cawh apostol rai a khing he .
42006014	Simon ( Piter tatei ming sahpaw ) a unypaw Andru , Jeims , Johan , Filip , Barthalomeo ,
42006015	Mathai , Thomas , Alfas sawcapaw Jeims , ci le phing a dawkhuipaw Simon ,
42006016	Jeims a sawcapaw Juda le Zisu a luitu paw Judas Iskariot a cang he .
42006017	Zisu cawh aaning sahlo khaco seithlah ka , bai arainah letah a ung . Ama a hning a zuipaw he mehlupui le Judia raang le Jerusalem khuapui , Tair le Sidon khua rili ngaekang raang sahlo taitah mehlupui a va chuh he .
42006018	A bia khah nawthlia rua pawtah le a sawnah pawhe zong dangsah rua pawtah aa va chua . Thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw sahlo zong he tah dangnah aa hmuh .
42006019	Mehlupui tah Ama khah tong khy cy a zong he . Zecawtamaw tatah Ama taikhei hmingtuakhynah khah pia ka , aaning vytei cawh a dangsah he .
42006020	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh ming he ka , “ Naaning sisahpaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting , Khazing painah raang cawh naa cawtah a cang .
42006021	Ato letei a ngai a dipaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting , naa ri a vaw tae a . Ato letei a cah leimeipaw sahlo bonghnang naa ting , na hnui tae he ceh .
42006022	Cawngsaw sahlo tah aa ca hua tih he tah bonghnang naa ting , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a cawngsaw naa cangnah rawng tah ca patlia a he ka , naa zy ca lang a he ka , naa ming aa ca pachia tih he tah bonghnang naa ting .
42006023	Ma ning taco naa thawchah seh la , lunglawng thawchah tah a pathlo my lo , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letah naa longmai rungnaw ngeteipaw a ung . Ma hrahei aaning aa pathlahtu sahlo he takhei Khazing khuavang sahlo khah aa za tua tei he .
42006024	Canghrasala naaning mehrung sahlo naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah a nawngnah cawh naa hmuh thlu thah .
42006025	Ato letei naaning a ri a vawpaw sahlo naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah naa ngai a di tae a . Naaning ato letei a hnui leimeipaw sahlo naa cing a ping , naa ngechia a ka , na cah tae he ceh .
42006026	Cawngsaw maikaw tah aa ca pachaw tih he tah naa cing a ping . Ma hrahei aaning a pathlahtu sahlo tah khuavang pakheipaw sahlo khah aa za tua tei he .
42006027	Canghrasala , ka bia naw a thliapaw sahlo , ka ca ching he hi , naa carae sahlo cawh va do la , a ca huapaw sahlo cung leco chahnah va tua my lo .
42006028	Chia a ca reipahpaw he sahlo cawh bonghnang song my lo , a ca zongtepaw sahlo cawh thlawchangpah my lo .
42006029	Pakheh kheh tah na bai rakheh lang a ca cabai caco , a rakheh lang zong khah cong pah vy thlang . Pakheh kheh tah na pai a ca lah pah caco , na angkilai lah zong ei kheh .
42006030	A ca haepaw maikaw cawh pei la , na hnuipaw a ca lah pahpaw he cawh hae kaw khawh khe lo .
42006031	Na cung letah tua he seh tah na dupaw hrakhei male cung letah va tua my lo .
42006032	Naaning a ca dopaw suipaw naa do caco he zemaw amia naa hmuh a ? Mehsua zong tah ma hapaw cawh aa tua thlang hrah .
42006033	Naa cung letah a chahpaw cawngsaw cung letah naa chahpaw takhei zemaw amia naa hmuh ? Mehsua zong tah ma hapaw cawh aa tua thlang hrah .
42006034	A ca pei kaw khypaw he hming naa hleipaw he takhei zemaw amia naa hmuh ? Mehsua sahlo zong tahmai a ialia tah hmuh kaw rua taco aaning le aaning a hlei thlang hrah he .
42006035	Canghrasala naa carae sahlo khah va do la , aa cung letah chahnah va tua my lo . Hmuh kaw hrah du tah male hming va hlei khe lo . Mataico longmai rungnawpaw hmuh a he ceh ka , Cungnungcai Khazing sawtei sahlo naa cang a he ceh . Zecawtamaw tatah Ama cawh mehsua le mehchawly cung letah a vei a sy .
42006036	Naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah zaangsawnah a ca hnuipaw he hratah zaang a saw cy my lo .
42006037	Male bia cepah khe la , naaning zong biace pah cang hrá bei ceh . Ahohmai thaily va cangsah khe o , naaning zong thaily ca cangsah hrá bei he . Ngethai la , naaning zong ngethai na cang hrá he ceh .
42006038	Pei la , peh na cang hrá he ceh . Achaw teitah neh pá tah , baichai tah , carawh pai tah a chihluinah tai peh naa cang he ceh . Na hmangpaw nehnah pawtei khei aa ca neh pah kaw hrá a , ” a tah he .
42006039	Ma tawchingnah bia zong heh a chingpai he , “ Mehco tah mehco cawh lang a chui khy a maw ? Aa pahning tah khobatlung lang tla bei he maw ?
42006040	A cawngpaw cawh a cawngpahtu cung letah ung be . Canghrasala , a tlungtlianah tai a cawng khy taitah a cawngpahtu hratah a cang hrah a .
42006041	Nama na mehkho letei thingphae khah pacang taw lytah na unypaw mehkho letei thingpatlaw khah zecawtamaw na mingpah ?
42006042	Nama na mehkho chung letei thingphae khah a hmuh tlung lytah zekhatamaw na unypaw cawh , ‘ Na mehbang khah ca tho pá neh , ’ na tah khy ? Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo naaning naa mehkho letei thingphae khah thohly taw la , taico naa unypaw a mehkho letei mehbang cawh tho pá pawtah a se pawtah na hmuh khy a .
42006043	Thingkung cawh a kung a chah caco , a thui a chah , a kung a chiahru caco thui chia a thui .
42006044	Thingkung maikaw cawh aa thui tah hni a cang he . Thuiku cawh ahling kung taitah lo bang bei he . A cang ly leh misur thui cawh ahling kung taitah lo bang hrah bei he .
42006045	Mehchaw taco a lungchung letei a pacungpaw a chawpaw taikhei hmingchaw chuasah ka , mehchawly taco a lungchung letei achaw lypaw a pacungpaw taikhei hming chahly a chuasah . A kaw taitei a reichuapaw cawh a lungchung letei a chihluipaw khah a cang .
42006046	Ka reipaw tua tlung lytah zecawtamaw , ‘ Abuipaw , Abuipaw , ’ tatah naa pa y ?
42006047	Kama kha a vong katei , ka bia khah thui tah a zuipaw cawh zekhamaw a lo tahpaw ka ca ming sá he a .
42006048	Ma hapaw cawngsaw cawh ing a sahpaw , a thuh pui tah atung kho co katei , alung puino cung letei a bingpaw khatah a lo he . Khua a rupui tah va so ka , tuisai tah ing cawh nang ka , canghrasala a calawh be , achaw teitah sahpaw a cangnah cawtah .
42006049	Canghrasala , kama khatah a vong katei , ka bia khah thuí tah a zui tlung lypaw cawh alui cakhawngpaw letei a tung padawpaw a cy lypaw ing khatah a lo . Khua a rupui tah va so ka , ing cawh a nang tihtah pohly palang ka , a dawngkasawny tah a rawh cehceh , ” a tah he .
42007001	Taico Zisu tah ma bia vytei cawh zawpui thuí tah a rei khy taitah Kapernaum khua lang a sei .
42007002	Ma leco raebuipaw a saecapaw , a buipaw tei a do ngeteipaw cawh a sah ka , a thi daimang tei .
42007003	Ma raebuipaw taco Zisu kong cawh a thui tihtah Juda macang thaikheh cawh taw he ka , Zisu cawh a vong seh la , a saecapaw heh va dangsah ky seh tatah va naw law a tah he .
42007004	Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah hmuisui teitah naw he ka , “ Ma cawngsaw heh bong tlang a tlahpaw a cang .
42007005	Kaa mingphing a dopaw cang ka , kaa synagog zong heh Ama tah a sahpaw a cang , ” tatah aa tah .
42007006	Macawtaco Zisu cawh aaning khaco a sei . Ing a va phah daimang letah raebuipaw taco a vesaw sahlo cawh taw he ka , ma hrahei a va chingsah he . “ Abuipaw , reithui a lah du kheh , ka ing heh nama na naenah tlangpaw cang be .
42007007	Macawtaco kama zong nama kha a vong tlangpaw tah a rawh hrah bei neh . Canghrasala bia kaw kheh teitah na rei caco , ka saecapaw cawh a dang thlang a .
42007008	Kama zong nawhnuinah rai letah a ungpaw cang neh ka , ka rai letah raekeh sahlo a ung hrah he . Pakheh cawh , ‘ Sei , ’ tah neh ka , sei ka , pakheh cawh , ‘ A vong , ’ tah neh ka , a vong . Ka saecapaw cawh , ‘ Ma heh tua , ’ tah neh ka , a tua thlang , ” tatah a chingsah he .
42007009	Zisu tah ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a ningang ngetei ka , a va zuipaw he zawpui lang cawh a hui ka , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Israel mingphing chung letah hmai ma tluh zingnah heh hmuh bang bei neh , ” a tah he .
42007010	Mataico raebuipaw tei a tawpaw sahlo he khah ing aa va phah kaw tihtah a saecapaw khah a dang thahpaw khah aa hmuh .
42007011	Ma khy cangkaw tei leco , Zisu cawh Nain aa tahpaw khua lang khah a sei . A hningzuitu sahlo le zawpuipaw cawh Ama khatah a sei hrah he .
42007012	Khuapui a naenah hawkaw aa phah daimang ning taco mehthi rawh a ka songlai he ka , mehthi cawh lahmeno a hnuitlakangpaw sawcapaw a cang . Khuachung cawngsaw zawpui zong a no khatah a ka seilai hrah he .
42007013	Abuipaw tah lahmeno cawh a hmuh tihtah ningdo ngetei ka , “ Cah kheh , ” tatah a tah .
42007014	Taico ka ke thlah ka , rawh kong cawh va tong ka , rawh kong a pupaw sahlo cawh a daw thlang he . “ Satle , tho law , ka ca tah , ” tatah a tah .
42007015	Mehthi cawh a ty ka , bia a ka rei . Taico Zisu tah a no cawh a peh kaw .
