42007016	Aa dawngkasawny tah ci he ka , aa ningang pai tah ka , Khazing khah aa reithai . “ Kaa hrawng letah Khazing khuavang rungnawpaw a va paly hi , Khazing cawh a cawngsaw sahlo bong rua pawtah a vong myca hi ! ” aa tah .
42007017	Ma Zisu kong heh Judia raang pungpaluh le a kaekang raang lekhei a thang thlu .
42007018	Johan hningzuitu sahlo taco ma konglang vytei khah Johan cawh aa ching . Johan tah a hningzuitu pahning khah y he ka ,
42007019	Abuipaw khatah ma bia heh hae rua pawtah a taw he . “ Nama heh a vong lepaw cawh na cang maw ? A cang ly leh ahringpaw maw kaa haw a ? ” tatah a va tahsah he .
42007020	Ma cawngsaw sahlo cawh Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah a hai leco , “ Baptisma peitu Johan tah , ‘ Nama heh a vong lepaw cawh na cang maw ? A cang ly leh ahringpaw maw kaa haw a ? ’ tatah nama hae rua pawtah a ma sia , ” tatah aa tah .
42007021	Ma ningcai ceingei leco Zisu tah a sahpaw le a dang lypaw mehlupui le thlawpaw pialuipaw tei a tlepaw sahlo he cawh dangsah he ka , a mehcopaw zong khah khua a hmuhsah kaw he .
42007022	Zisu tah Johan tei a va tawpaw he sahlo hai leco , “ Va sei kaw la , naa hmuhpaw le naa thuipaw heh Johan cawh va ching my lo . Mehco sahlo tah khua aa hmuh , a songbepaw zong lang a sei he , thinghmuihri a ingpaw sahlo zong dang he ka , a naw a pangpaw sahlo tah khua aa thui . A thipaw zong tho kaw he ka , mehsisah zong tah thawngchawbia aa thui myca .
42007023	Kama ka kong letei lung langlo tah a ung lypaw cawngsaw cawh bonghnang a ting , ” tatah a palei he .
42007024	Johan tei a tawpaw sahlo aa sei khy taico Zisu tah zawpui sahlo hai leco Johan konglang khah a ching he . “ Ze ming ruapaw tamaw raangcaa lang naa sei ? Thli tei a taikalypaw tuiphi kung ming ruapaw tamaw ?
42007025	Ma hratei a cang ly caco , ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei ? Chaichi chaw a tuapaw cawngsaw ming ruapaw tamaw ? Cang tlung be , chaichi amai a rupaw a tua katei , hmingchaw sangsaw a hnuipaw he cawh siangpahrang ing letah pui aa ung ky caw !
42007026	A cang caco , ze ming ruapaw tamaw naa sei ? Khazing khuavang ming ruapaw tamaw ? A cang , Khazing khuavang navy tah a lai vypaw kong ka ca ching he .
42007027	Ma heh Khazing bia letei ciapaw Ama a kong cawh a cang , ‘ Ka tlang ypaw cawh na hmelang ka taw a , na hme letei na langpui a parai ruapaw tah ! ’
42007028	Ka ca ching he hi , canu tei sahpaw saw leco Johan navy tah alai vypaw ahohmai ung bei he , canghrasala Khazing painah raang letei a chia caipaw hmai heh Johan navy tah alai vy , ” a tah .
42007029	Cawngsaw vytei ngungkhui a kheipaw sahlo takhei hmai , Zisu bia cawh aa thui tihtah Khazing langpui a ding tahpaw khah aa lung a tling . Zemaw tah pawco , aaning sahlo cawh Johan tei baptisma a peh ciapaw sahlo aa cangnah cawtah a cang .
42007030	Canghrasala , Farasi le phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo he taco Khazing tei aa cawtah khua a khang pahpaw he khah aa ei . Zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh Johan baptisma hmai a cang balang bei he .
42007031	Zisu tah , “ Atochai cawngsaw heh zekhatamaw ka tawching he a ? Zekhamaw a lo he ?
42007032	Aaning sahlo cawh chodo tlang letei a ty thlangpaw nyheh sahlo khatah a lo he . ‘ Phipahli ca tungpah he peh ka , naa lang tlung be . Mehthi hlawsah he peh ka , naa caw tlung be , ’ tatah aaning leh aaning a tahpaw nyheh sahlo khatah a lo he .
42007033	Zecawtamaw tatah baptisma peitu Johan cawh va chuh ka , very e lytah le misurhang ding lytah ung ka , ‘ Khachia tah a pahrang , ’ tatah naa tah .
42007034	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong ka , e ka , ding ka , ‘ Ding le e suipaw a pacang , mehsua sahlo le ngungkhui a kheitu sahlo vesaw , ’ naa tah .
42007035	Canghrasala , singnah cawh a hming tuapaw sahlo takhei ahmang takhah a palang , ” tatah a tah .
42007036	Farasipaw a cangpaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh zaibatui e pawtah a hrui . Macawtaco , Farasipaw ing lang cawh a vaw ka , e pawtah a ty .
42007037	Canu pakheh mehsua ngetei no , ma khua letei a ung hrahpaw taco Zisu cawh Farasipaw ing letah zaibatui a e leimei tahpaw khah a thui . Sathy ringthopaw cawh lungrang tuithei khei a va tle .
42007038	Taico a hninglang tah a phe hrang leco a daw ka , cah ka , a phe cawh a mehthli tah pacingsah thlu ka , ma khy taico a sang tah hruh ka , a phepazaw cawh hnang ka , ringthopaw cawh a bia .
42007039	Zisu zaibatui e a hruipaw Farasipaw taco , ma cawh a hmuh tihtah a lungchung tah , “ Ma cawngsaw heh Khazing khuavang a cang caco , a phe a hre leimeipaw heh ahomaw a cang , zehapaw canu maw a cang tahpaw heh a hni ruapaw a cang , mehsua no cang tlung ka , ” tatah a pacang .
42007040	Zisu taco , “ Simon , bia ka ca ching dupaw a ung , ” a tah . Farasipaw Simon taco , “ Cawngpahtu , pa ching tua , ” tatah a tah .
42007041	Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw pahning tah khalui hnui he ka , pakhehpaw tah ngung tangka 500 , pakhehpaw tah ngung tangka songngaw tatah lui aa bah he .
42007042	Aa pahning taco aa khalui cawh chang khy va vei lytah aa ung . Macawtaco tangka a hnuitupaw taco a ngethai va vei he . A cang caco , aaning pahning lekhei aho tamaw a do vy a , tatah na rawh ? ” a tah .
42007043	Simon taco , “ A hlu vy a ngethaipaw khah a cang thly a , tatah ka rawh , ” tatah a chai . Zisu tah , “ Na rawhpaw a hmang ngetei , ” tatah a tah .
42007044	Mataico Zisu cawh cawngsawno lang cawh a hui ka , Simon hai leco , “ Ma no heh na hmuh maw ? Na ing chunglang ka za naening tah phe sinah ruapaw tui pa pei bei ceh . Canghrasala ma cawngsawno tahei co ka phe heh a mehthli tah si ka , a sang tah a hru .
42007045	Nama taco pa hnang bei ceh , canghrasala ma no tahei co ka za naenah taikhei ka phe hnang khah tai be .
42007046	Nama taco ka lu letah zong sathy pa thu bei ceh , canghrasala ma no tahei co ka phe letah ringthopaw a bia .
42007047	Ma rawng tahei ka ca ching , a suanah a hlu ngeteipaw cawh ngethai a cang myca , macawtaco cawngsawno takhei a do ngetei . Canghrasala , a cawngtei ngethai a cangpaw taco a cawngtei tah a do hrah , ” tatah a tah .
42007048	Mataico Zisu tah cawngsawno cawh , “ Na suanah cawh ngethai a cang thah , ” tatah a tah .
42007049	Aa hrong letei a ung hrahpaw khuachai sahlo taco , “ Suanah hmai a ngethaipaw heh ahomaw a cang ? ” tatah aaning le aaning khah aa tah he .
42007050	Zisu tah cawngsawno cawh , “ Na zingnah tah a ca pachah thah , thlawlung teitah va sei my lo , ” tatah a tah .
42008001	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh khuapui le khuatei tlawnglai longmang ka , Khazing painah raang kong thawngchawbia cawh a y khui lai . A hningzuitu pahrawhluihning khah Ama khatah a sei hrah he .
42008002	Canu thaikheh , a sawnah taitah a dangsahpaw sahlo le thlawpaw pialuipaw a papia pahpaw he sahlo zong Ama khatah a ung he . Ma canu sahlo hrong leco thlawpaw pialuipaw sangsarih a papia pahpaw Mari ( Makdalin aa tahpaw ) le ,
42008003	Herod cho a mingkaitu Kuza a nupuino Joana le Susana le ahringpaw sahlo a cang he . Ma sahlo cawh aaning aa hnuicho teitah Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo a bawkhangpaw a cang he .
42008004	Khua keh ná tah mehnung hlupui Zisu khatah a vong he ka , a pahmo ning he takhei ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he .
42008005	“ Ly a tuapaw pakheh cawh thleci va pawtah ly lang a sei . Thleci a va leimeining takhei a chy cawh lang kae letah tlah ka , cawngsaw tah aa phe tah ci he ka , pavaw sahlo tah aa khi thlu thah he .
42008006	A chy cawh lungda letah tlah he ka , aa ka cy tihtah aa thahrang aa thlah nápaw alui a pacingpaw a ung lynah cawtah a ro kaw palang thah he .
42008007	A chy cawh ahling hrong letah tlah he ka , ahling khaco cyhrui he ka , ahling taco a diseh thah he .
42008008	A chy cawh alui chahnah letah tlah ka , ka cy ka , a thuisu tua ka , a vapaw navy tah a leh zakheh tah a hlu vy a chuh . ” Ma bia heh a thangpui tah rei ka , “ Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw taco ma bia heh thui he seh , ” tatah a tah .
42008009	A hningzuitu sahlo taco ma tawchingnah bia silang cawh aa hae hri .
42008010	Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Khazing painah raang biaparuh hni khynah cawh peh na cang thah he ceh . Canghrasala , ming hringpaw hai leco tawchingnah bia tah ka rei . Macawtaco , ‘ Ming thlang he ka , hmuh a bei he , thui thlang he ka , hnih thai a bei he . ’
42008011	Tawchingnah bia silang cawh ma heh a cang . Thleci cawh Khazing bia heh a cang .
42008012	Langpui letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh bia cawh thui he ka , Setan khah a vong ka , zing tah pachah aa cang ly nápawtah bia cawh aa lungchung taitah a lah pah he .
42008013	Lungda cung letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh Khazing bia cawh thui he ka , lunglawng teitah aa cyhlang . Canghrasala , thahrang hnui bei he . Aa zingnah cawh sungkheh tei cai caw longlong cang ka , ruhanah a chua tihtah a pohly palang he .
42008014	Ahling hrong letei a tlahpaw thleci sahlo asilang cawh Khazing bia cawh thui he ka , canghrasala tungtuh khuasahnah lungreithuinah le rungnah le anawngnah tah diseh kaw thlu he katei , aa pui a tling thai lypaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a cang he .
42008015	Canghrasala , alui a chahnah letei a tlahpaw sahlo cawh lung hmuisui teitah Khazing bia cawh thui he ka , a tle he ka , a thuisu a tuanah tai teria teitah aa zuipaw cawngsaw sahlo khah a cang he , ” a tah .
42008016	Zisu taco , “ Ahotahmai tah me-ing a vang tihtah lakhing rai letah maw abai rai letah maw chia bang be . Ing chung lang a naepaw maikaw tah a khaipaw aa hmuh khy nápawtah me-ing tung letah aa chia tei .
42008017	Palang ly rua pawtah nopaw hming zehmai ung be . Taico hni ly rua pawtah paphipaw zehmai ung be , palangsah thlu a cang a .
42008018	Macawtaco naa nawthliapaw khah achaw teitah pacang my lo . A hnuipaw cawh peh vy cang a he ka , a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tatei a rawhpaw hmai khah lah pah a cang a , ” tatah a tah .
42008019	Taico , Zisu a no le a uny sahlo cawh Ama khah a tong rua pawtah a vong he . Canghrasala , cawngsaw aa hlutunah cawtah a va nae khy bei he .
42008020	Cawngsaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh , “ Na no le na uny sahlo tah a tong ca du he ka , khunglai letah a daw thlang he , ” tatah a ching .
42008021	Zisu taco , “ Khazing bia thui ka , a zuipaw sahlo heh ka no le ka uny sahlo cawh a cang he , ” tatah a palei .
42008022	Ningkheh cawh Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Galili tuiping raechai lang sei he pei , ” a tah he . Macawtaco tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae he ka , aa sei .
42008023	Tuilawng tah aa seilai leimeining taco Zisu cawh a ihning . Tuiping leco thlichia a va hrang ka , aa lawng cawh tui lang a nong thlu daimangnah cawtah ciphang ngetei tah a ung he .
42008024	A hningzuitu sahlo tah Ama cawh va patho he ka , “ Hruitupaw , Hruitupaw , tui lang kaa tlah thlu he peh hi , ” tatah aa tah . Zisu cawh ka tho ka , thli le tuileh cawh a hrangso he ka , thli cawh de ka , tui cawh a cali he .
42008025	“ Naa zingnah cawh zeletamaw a ung thlu ? ” tatah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh a tah he . Ci le ningang hmotah , “ Ma heh zehapaw cawngsaw maw a cang ? Thli le tuileh zong tah a bia aa nge thlangpaw heh , ” tatah pakheh le pakheh a tah tlungmang he .
42008026	Galili tuiping raechai lang letei a ungpaw he Gerasin raang cawngsaw sahlo aa ungnah cawh aa va phah .
42008027	Zisu cawh ngaekang lang a cungthlah cangkawleh ma khua letei a ungpaw khachia tei a tlepaw cawngsawpaw taco a va tong . Ma cawngsawpaw heh a thlekalong tei a ungpaw , ing letah zong a ung lypaw , thlaikung letah a ungteipaw a cang .
42008028	Zisu a hmuh cangkawleh sang ka , a phehrang leco a bawh ka , a thangpui tah a y . “ Cungnungcai Khazing Sawcapaw , Zisu , kama khatah zemaw na dupaw a ung ? Pa hreh haitei kheh tatah ka ca naw , ” a tah .
42008029	A chung letei thlawpaw pialuipaw khah ka pia tatah Zisu tah bia a peh cawtah khei a cang . Ma paw cawh uihlupui khachia taco , a hraipakingnah cawtah a kih le a phe letah bahrairui tah khi he ka , aa vai . Bahrairui tah aa hrai naná teitah chehchung thlu ka , khachia taco lyraangpaw lang a tingchua tei .
42008030	Zisu tah , “ Na ming ahomaw ? ” tatah a hae . “ Ka ming cawh Thongzakheh a cang , ” tatah a palei . Khachia a hlupui tah aa pahrangnah cawtah .
42008031	Taico khachia sahlo taco , Zisu cawh a ping thai lypaw khobatlung lang ma thlah haitei kheh tatah aa naw canei leimei thlang .
42008032	Aa kae tlangpa lekhei lawh a e leimeipaw voh rungpui ung he ka , khachia sahlo taco Zisu cawh ma voh rung sahlo aa chunglang kheh a ma naesah thlang , tatah naw he ka , Zisu tah a naesah he .
42008033	Khachia sahlo cawh ma cawngsawpaw chung taico piathlah he ka , voh chunglang cawh a nae he . Voh rungpui sahlo cawh tuiping lang a zythlah he ka , a thi thlu he .
42008034	Voh rungpui a mingkaitu sahlo taco ma hming vytei cawh aa hmuh tihtah sai tlamang he ka , khuapui chung le khuatei lekhei aa rei lai .
42008035	Taico zawpui sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , zehratamaw a cang tahpaw khah ming rua pawtah a sei he . Zisu kung aa va tlung tihtah khachia sahlo tei , aa piasaipaw cawngsawpaw khah aa va hmuh . Lungsing teitah caise a tua katei , Zisu kae letah a za tythlangpaw khah aa hmuh . Macawtaco aa ci ngetei .
42008036	A hmuhpaw cawngsaw sahlo taco , khachia sahlo tei aa tlepaw cawngsawpaw a dangnah kong khah cawngsaw hringpaw aa ching lai he .
42008037	Mataico Gerasin raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw vytei taco aa ci tunah cawtah Zisu khah aa raang taitah piathlah a pawtah aa naw . Macawtaco tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae ka , a sei .
42008038	Khachia sahlo tei aa piasaipaw cawngsawpaw taco , “ Nama khatah ka seilai hrá a , ” tatah naw ka , canghrasala , Zisu taco kawsah kaw ka , a hai leco ,
42008039	“ Ing lang a dih la , Khazing tah zetlua tamaw na cawtah hming a ca tuapah tahpaw khah va ching hri law , ” a tah . Mataico cawngsawpaw cawh piathlah ka , Zisu tah zetlua tamaw a cawtah hming a tuapah tahpaw khah khua cawngsaw vytei cawh a ching he .
42008040	Zisu cawh a va kaw kaw tihtah cawngsaw hlupui tah dai he ka , aaning sahlo cawh a va tlungpaw a heh thlangpaw a cang he .
42008041	Taico Jaira aa tahpaw synagog a uhtu cawh a vong . Zisu a phehrang leco a bawh ka , a ing lang a vong rua pawtah a naw .
42008042	A sawcanu hnuitlakangpaw , kung hrawhluihning a tah no cawh a thih daimangnah cawtah a cang . Zisu a seilai ning taco zawpui tah buh thlang he ka , aa nanghly pai lai leimei he .
42008043	Ma leco canu pakheh kung hrawhluihning chung a thi a chuh no ung ka , a hnuicho vytei sibui letah pachang thlu thah ka , ahotahmai dangsah khy bei he .
42008044	Zisu a hninglang tah a vong ka , a pai dong cawh tong ka , ma cangkaw leco , a thi cawh a kih .
42008045	“ Ahomaw a pa tong ? ” tatah Zisu tah hae he ka , aa dawngkasawny teitah ca tong bei peh aa tah . Piter taco , “ Hruitupaw , zawpui tah ca buh thlang he ka , aa ca nangpaipaw a cang , ” a tah .
42008046	Canghrasala , Zisu tah , “ Pakheh kheh tah a pa tong , ka chung taitah hmingtuakhynah a pia , ma rawng taco ka hni , ” a tah .
42008047	Mataico canuno taco Zisu tah a pa hni myca tahpaw a hni tihtah a thlawzawng ka , a phehrang leco a bawh ka , zawpui hme leco a cangnah silang le sung sungkheh tah a dangnah kong khah a ching .
42008048	Mataico Zisu tah a hai leco , “ Ka sawcanu , na zingnah tah a ca dangsah , de teitah va seí my lo , ” a tah .
42008049	Zisu tah bia a rei leimei ning taco , synagog a uhtu Jaira ing taico cawngsaw pakheh a vong ka , “ Na sawcanu cawh a thi thah , cawngpahtu heh hnahnawh du khawh kheh , ” a tah .
42008050	Ma bia cawh Zisu tah thui ka , Jaira hai letaco , “ Na thlawzawng kheh seh , zing la , na sawcanu cawh a dang a , ” tatah a tah .
42008051	Jaira ing cawh a va phah tihtah Piter le Johan le Jeims le nyno a no le a paw tah cy ly co ahohmai ing chunglang a naesah bei he .
42008052	Ma chung vytei cawh cawngsaw hringpaw taco nyno cawh ngechia tah aa cawkhui leimei . Zisu tah , “ Cah tua khe o , nyno heh a thih tlung be , a ihning hi ! ” tatah a tah he .
42008053	A thi tahpaw aa hni thlangnah cawtah khei Zisu cawh aa hnuiso .
42008054	Canghrasala , Zisu tah nyno cawh a kiá tah tle ka , “ Ka sawcanu , tho law , ” a tah .
42008055	A thlawpaw cawh va kaw kaw ka , ma cangkaw leco , nyno cawh a ka dawchua . Taico Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh nyno heh e ruapaw sangkheh kheh pei my lo , tatah a ching he .
42008056	A no le a paw cawh aa khuarawha thlang ka , canghrasala , Zisu tah aaning cawh hming ungzia khah ahohmai ching khe lo , tatah a tah he .
42009001	Zisu tah apostol hluihning cawh Ama khatah a y he . Khachia vytei papia lai pawtah le asawnah vytei zong dangsah lai pawtah nawhnuinah le hmingtuakhynah pei he ka ,
42009002	aaning cawh Khazing painah raang kong reilai rua pawtah le a dang lypaw sahlo zong dangsah lai rua pawtah a taw he .
42009003	Aa hai leco , “ Khua tlawngnah caw pawtah cungcahrei , sahre , chingco , tangka le cai le se a hluipaw zehmai a cakai khe o .
42009004	Naa naenah pawhe ceh ing leco ma khua taitei naa seithlah kaw hlai vytei cawh ung thlang my lo .
42009005	Ma khua cawngsaw taco aa ca cyhlang du ly caco he aaning sahlo raering pehnah tah ma khua taico naa piathlah tihtah naa phe letei luipadih khah cathingthlah si my lo , ” a tah he .
42009006	Taico aaning sahlo cawh piathlah he ka , khua kheh hning khua khé co sei lai he ka , aa seilainah maikaw leco , thawngchawbia rei lai he ka , a dang lypaw sahlo zong aa dangsah lai he .
42009007	Abui Herod taco hming ungzia vytei cawh a thui tihtah a lung hna a hnawh ngetei . Zecawtamaw tatah baptisma peitu Johan khah thihnah taitah a tho kaw tatah mehthaikheh tah aa tah .
42009008	Thaikhehpaw sahlo taco Elija a paly tatah aa tah . Mehthaikheh huipaw taco khuahlaining tei Khazing khuavang letei pakhehkheh khah a hring kaw aa tah .
42009009	Canghrasala Herod taco , “ Johan cawh a lu ka tai thah tlung , ma hratei a kong ka thuipaw heh ahomaw a cang ! ” a tah . Ma cawngsaw cawh hmuh a pachia .
42009010	Apostol sahlo cawh aa va tlung kaw tihtah aa tuapaw hming kong khah Zisu cawh aa ching . Taico aaning sahlo cawh a chui he ka , Bethsaida aa tahpaw khua lang cawh aaning teitah aa sei .
42009011	Canghrasala zawpui taco ma cawh hnih he ka , Ama cawh aa zuilai . Zisu tah zawpui vytei cawh achaw teitah mingkai he ka , Khazing painah raang kong khah ching he ka , dangnah a hiapaw sahlo khah a dangsah he .
42009012	Zailang ning a tlah cai letah apostol hluihning cawh Ama khatah a vong he ka , “ Ma lehei ung nápaw le e ruapaw zong ung be . Macawtaco zawpui vytei heh na disah pawhe a cang . Kaa kaekang khua le ly sahlo lehei ungnah le e ruapaw a va hui he seh , zecawtamaw tatah kaa ungnah heh raang kingdang cang tlung ka , ” aa tah .
42009013	Zisu taco , “ Naaning tah e ruapaw cawh pei o , ” a tah he . Aaning taco , “ Ma vytei cawngsaw e ruapaw tahei kaa va cawh seh tah lypaw co , kaaning khaco very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning long kaa hnui ! ” aa tah .
42009014	Capaw puitling longtei tah 5000 hrawng a tah he . Canghrasala Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Zawpui khah songngaw phu longmang tah a tysah o , ” a tah he .
42009015	A reipaw hratah hningzuitu sahlo taco tua he ka , ming vytei cawh a ty he .
42009016	Very tlangpangaw le ngaw sanghning cawh law ka , avai lang a y ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia hlai ka , very tlang sahlo cawh a kychy . Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh zawpui cawh rai pawtah a peh he .
42009017	Aa zongmingtei co e he ka , aa ri a vaw thlu . Taico a hningzuitu sahlo taco aa ebangpaw cawh pakhong he ka , baihraw hluihning chih ky tah aa dui .
42009018	Uikheh cawh Zisu cawh Ama teitah thlaw a chang leimeining takhei a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Ama khatah a ung thlang he . Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Zawpuipaw tah aho aa pa tah maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
42009019	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Thaikhehpaw tah baptisma peitu Johan aa ca tah , thaikhehpaw tah Elija a cang ca tah he ka , ahringpaw taco khuahlai tei Khazing khuavang sahlo letah pakheh kheh khah a va hring kaw aa ca tah , ” tatah aa palei .
42009020	Zisu tah , “ Naaning tah saw aho a cang naa pa tah maw ? ” tatah hae he ka , Piter tah , “ Nama cawh Khazing taitei a vongpaw Khri na cang , ” tatah a chai .
42009021	Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh ma kong heh ahohmai ching ly rua pawtah araeringnah a peh he .
42009022	Taico Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh taithuinah a hlupui ing ka , macang sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah hlawh a he ka , aa thaw a . Canghrasala , a ningthungnah letah hringnah letah thosah kaw a cang a , ” tatah a tah he .
42009023	Mataico aa zongmingtei hai leco , “ Ahohmai zui a pa dupaw cawh ama a dunah khah seisai seh la , a khraws cawh ning tating tah a puh seh la , pazui seh .
42009024	A hringnah pachah a dupaw taco sung a ka , canghrasala Kama ka cawtah a hringnah a sungpaw taco a hringnah a pachah a .
42009025	Cawngsaw pakheh tah khazaw heh a pungpaluh tah hnui seh la , a hringnah a hly caco a cawtah zemaw a chahnai a ?
42009026	Ahohmai Kama le ka cawngpahnah bia a zawkhuipaw maikaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh vaicung letei vaiming pathai sahlo khatah a rungnawnah le Paw rungnawnah kha a za cung tihtah ma cawngsaw cawh a zawkhui hrá a .
42009027	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma lehei a daw thlangpaw sahlo hrong lehei mehthaikheh cawh Khazing painah raang aa hmuh hlai taco thi balang bei he , ” a tah .
42009028	Zisu tah ma bia a rei khy taitah ningreh hrawng lekhei Piter , Johan le Jeims cawh Ama kha a chui he ka , thlawchang rua pawtah tlaang cung lang a kekhui he .
42009029	Thlaw a chang leimeining tah a mehme pho zia cawh a thlai ka , a caise sahlo cawh lailaw a ky ning tei , akhaipaw tluá khei a khai .
42009030	Cawngsaw pahning Moses le Elija cawh ,
42009031	vaicung rungnawnah khatah a za lang he ka , Zisu khatah bia aa rei . Jerusalem khuapui letah a thihnah thongtah Khazing a tingaipaw a patling nápaw kong khah aa rei .
42009032	Piter le a vesaw sahlo cawh a ihning he ka , canghrasala a ka hraw tih he tah a rungnawnah le cawngsaw pahning Ama khatah a daw thlangpaw he khah aa hmuh .
42009033	Cawngsaw tlaw tah Zisu cawh aa seisai leimeining tah Piter taco a hai letah , “ Hruitupaw , ma lehei ung heh kaa cawtah a chah ngetei . Thlangda nama na cawtah sangkheh , Moses a cawtah sangkheh , Elija a cawtah sangkheh tatah sangthung sah a he peh , ” a tah . ( Piter cawh zemaw ka rei tahpaw hmai hnih be . )
42009034	A rei leimeining taco meding va thang ka , aaning cawh pahlong he ka , meding chung letah aa ungnah cawtah aa ci ngetei .
42009035	Meding chung taico o va ring ka , “ Ma heh ka Sawtei , ka thingpaw cawh a cang . Ama a bia cawh nge my lo , ” tatah o a za ring .
42009036	O tah ma hratei a rei khy taico Zisu cawh Ama longtei a cangpaw khah aa hmuh . A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma cawh aa chung letah a cingkai thlang he ka , aa hmuhpaw kong khah ma ning taco ahohmai ching bei he .
42009037	A ningthlamongpaw tlaang cung taitah aa za cung chuh ning takhei cawngsaw rungpui taco Zisu cawh a va tong he .
42009038	Zawpui chung taico pakhehpaw cawh ka ychua ka , “ Cawngpahtu , ka sawtei pa mingpah tua tatah ka ca naw , Ama heh ka sawtei hnuitlakangpaw a cang .
42009039	Thlawpaw pialuipaw tah tua ka , sung sungkheh tah sangsah ka , hruipakingsah ka , a ci tatabu zong a pia thlu tei . Cai cuitei suipaw piasai ka , a hlyde daimang tei .
42009040	Ma cawh papia rua pawtah na hningzuitu sahlo naw he neh ka , canghrasala papia khy bei he , ” a tah .
42009041	Zisu taco , “ Vy zingnah a hnui lypaw le meh paleh meh pathae sahlo , zetih tai maw naaning khatah ka ung a ? Zetih tai maw ka lung ka ca pasua pá he a ? Na sawtei cawh ma lehei a vong khui tua , ” tatah a palei .
42009042	Nyhehpaw cawh a va sei leimeining takhei hmai khachia taco alui letah paliahly ka , a hruipakingsah . Canghrasala Zisu tah thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh a hrangso ka , nyhehpaw cawh dangsah ka , a paw khakhei a peh kaw .
42009043	Taico aaning vytei cawh Khazing a rungnaw zia khah aa khuarawh a haa . Ming vytei cawh Zisu a tuapaw hming kong letah khuarawha tah aa ung thlang ning taco Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh ,
42009044	“ Naaning ka ca ching lepaw he bia heh achaw teitah nawthlia tua o . Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh cawngsaw sahlo kih letah luithae a cang myca a , ” a tah he .
42009045	Canghrasala , a hningzuitu sahlo taco a rei dupaw khah hnih thai bei he . A silang khah nokhai aa cangnah cawtah khei tle khy be ca he ka , hae hri ngang bei he .
42009046	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa hrong letah ahomaw alai caipaw a cang a tahpaw bia khah a ei hrang aa patho .
42009047	Aa rawhnah cawh Zisu tah hnih ka , nyhehpaw tei khah law ka , a kae letah a dawsah .
42009048	Mataico aa hai letah , “ Ahohmai Kama ka ming tah ma hapaw nyhehtei heh a cyhlangpaw cawh Kama a pa cyhlangpaw cang ka , Kama a pa cyhlangpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang . Naa hrong letei a chia caipaw heh alaicaipaw cawh a cang a , ” a tah he .
42009049	Johan taco , “ Hruitupaw , cawngsaw pakheh tah na ming tah khachia a papia leimeipaw hmuh he peh ka , kaa bu cawngsaw a cang lynah cawtah kaa thly , ” a tah .
42009050	Zisu tah , “ Thly khe o , a ma cakhae lypaw maikaw cawh naa cawngsaw a cang he , ” a tah .
42009051	Vaicung lang lahchy a cang nápaw cai khah a nenah cawtah khei , Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang sei pawtah a pachia .
42009052	Mataico zuaky sahlo khah hmelang a seisah hlang he . Aaning cawh a cawtah hming pachiapaning hlang rua pawtah Samaria cawngsaw aa khua lang khah a nae he .
42009053	Canghrasala Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang sei a tingnah cawtah khei ma khua letei cawngsaw sahlo taco pasungpanaw bei he .
42009054	Ma cawh a hningzuitu Johan le Jeims tah aa hmuh tihtah a hai letah , “ Abuipaw aaning sahlo a kangseh ruapaw he tahei avai taitah me za tlahsah peh seh la , tahpaw na ma dukhui maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
42009055	Canghrasala Zisu cawh a hui ka , aaning sahlo cawh a raw he .
42009056	Taico aaning sahlo cawh khua hring lang aa sei .
42009057	Langpui letah aa seilai leimeining taco cawngsaw pakheh tah , “ Na seinah maikaw lang ka ca zui a , ” a tah .
42009058	Zisu tah , “ Sihatei sahlo tah kua hnui he ka , pavaw sahlo zong tah bu aa hnui . Canghrasala Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lu pahnia nápaw hminghmaw hmai hnui be , ” tatah a palei .
42009059	Cawngsaw hringpaw pakheh cawh , “ Va pa zui law , ” a tah . Canghrasala ma cawngsaw taco , “ Abuipaw , va seí neh ka , ka paw ka va phung taw a , ” tatah a palei .
42009060	Zisu tah a hai letah , “ A thipaw cawh mehthi tah phung thlang he seh , nama duitei cawh sei la , Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia va rei my lo , ” tatah a tah .
42009061	Cawngsaw pakheh a vong vy hui ka , “ Abuipaw , na seinah maikaw letah ka ca zui a . Canghrasala , kaw kaw taw neh ka , ka sawny aa kih ka tlesi taw he a , ” a tah .
42009062	Zisu tah , “ Ahohmai alui paleh patho tlung katei , a hninglang a hui kaw leimeipaw cawh Khazing painah raang letah rai a hre tlangpaw cang bei he , ” tatah a palei .
42010001	Ma khy taico Abuipaw tah a hningzuitu ahringpaw songsarih le pahning khah thing he ka , pahning longmang tah Ama a sei nápaw khua maikaw le hminghmaw maikaw lang khah hmelang a thlaw hlang he .
42010002	Aa hai leco , “ Saze hre ruapaw hlu ngetei ka , canghrasala a hretu cawh a cawngtei he . Macawtaco saze lui a hnuitu Abuipaw cawh raihretu sahlo khah saze lui lang taw rua pawtah hae my lo .
42010003	Sei tua o , naaning sahlo cawh chahnia hrong letei tuu teitei sahlo hratah ka ca taw he .
42010004	Tangkabawng cang seh , sahre cang seh , phepakong cang seh a cakai khe la , lang letah ahohmai aa kih tle khe lo .
42010005	Ing na nae tih he ceh tah ahmasaw cai tah , ‘ Ma ing lehei denah ung ky seh , ’ tah my lo .
42010006	Ma cawngsaw cawh denah sawtei a cang caco , naa reipaw denah cawh a cung letah a tlung a , ma hratei a cang ly caco naaning naa cung lang a va kaw kaw a .
42010007	Ma ing leco ung la , aa ca pehpaw he maikaw khah e la , ding thlang my lo . Raihretu cawh a raihrenah mai hmuh rua tah a tlah . Ingkheh hning ingkheh a palong lai khe lo .
42010008	Khuachung lang a nae he ceh ka , ingtlung aa ca pa-awng tih he tah aa ca pehpaw he maikaw khah e thlang my lo .
42010009	A dang lypaw sahlo khah dang sá la , Khazing painah raang tah a ca ne my ca he , tatah ching my lo .
42010010	Canghrasala , khuachung a nae he ceh ka , ingtlung aa ca pa-awng ly caco he , langlaipui sahlo lekhei sei la , ma hrahei tah my lo ,
42010011	‘ Naa khua luipadih kaa phe letei a kapaw hmai kaa cathingthlah hi , ma duitei cawh ma heh hnih my lo . Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca , ’ tatah tah my lo .
42010012	Ma heh ka ca ching he , biacenah ning taco ma khua navy co Sodom khua tai-ingnah hmai khah a zia a ung vy a .
42010013	Vy Korazin khua na cing a ping ! Vy Bethsaida khua na cing a ping ! Naaning letei tuapaw ningang chuipaw hming khah Tair le Sidon khua letah tuapaw cang he seh la , buri pai a buh a tah mecang letah a ty a he ka , a ngepachih syly tha he a .
42010014	Canghrasala , biacenah ning leco Tair le Sidon khua tei aa ingpaw cawh naaning navy tah a zia a ung vy tae a .
42010015	Taico , nama Kapernaum khua , avai tai kheh calia na cang maw ? Cang bei ceh . Hraihming lang na tlahthlah a .
42010016	Naa rei a ca ngepaw maikaw he cawh kama ka rei a pa ngepaw a cang he . Naaning a ca hlawhpaw maikaw he cawh kama a pa hlawh paw a cang he . Canghrasala kama a pa hlawhpaw maikaw he cawh a pa tawtu a hlawhpaw a cang he , ” a tah he .
42010017	Songsarih le pahning tlaw he khah lunglawng teitah va tlung kaw he ka , “ Abuipaw , khachia vanghru sahlo zong tahmai na ming tah kaa rei aa ma nge , ” tatah aa ching .
42010018	Zisu tah , “ Setan khah lailaw hratah vaicung taitei a za tlahthlahpaw ka hmuh .
42010019	Pari sahlo le tlangcekawng sahlo zong tlaipabainah naw le naa caraepaw te khynah naw ca pei he neh ka , zetahmai a ca sawsah khy bei he .
42010020	Ma duitei cawh thlawpaw pialuipaw zong tah naa rei aa ca nge caw he tah a lawng khe o . Canghrasala vaicung letah naa ming cia a cangnah cawtah a lawng hri my lo , ” tatah a palei he .
42010021	Ma ningcai leco Zisu cawh Thlawpaw Pathai thongtah a lawng ngetei ka , “ Ka Paw , alui le avai Buipaw , ka ca reithai , mehthai mehsing sahlo caw taco , ma hming sahlo heh nawh ceh ka , nyheh hapaw sahlo khatah na palang . A cang , ka Paw , ma cawh nama na lawngnah cawh a cang , ” a tah .
42010022	Zisu cawh ma hratei thlaw a chang khy taico zawpui sahlo lang cawh ma hrahei bia rei ka , “ Hming vytei heh ka Paw tah a pa peh thlu thah he . Paw tah ly co Sawcapaw heh ahomaw a cang tahpaw ahotahmai hnih bei he . Taico , Sawcapaw le Sawcapaw tei hnisah rua pawtah a thingpaw he tah ly co Paw cawh ahomaw a cang tahpaw ahotahmai hnih bei he , ” a tah .
42010023	Mataico , a hningzuitu sahlo lang khah a hui ka , aaning ei teitah ching he ka , “ Naa hmuhpaw hming a hmuhpaw mehkho sahlo cawh bonghnang aa ting .
42010024	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing khuavang le abui sahlo mehlupui tah naa hmuhpaw heh hmuh aa du ngetei cy hrah naná teitah hmuh bei he . Naa thuipaw heh thui aa du ngetei hrah naná teitah za thui bei he , ” tatah a tah he .
42010025	Uikheh cawh phungbia a thai ngeteipaw pakheh cawh Zisu pase du tah a daw ka , “ Cawngpahtu , chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae .
42010026	Zisu tah , “ Khazing phungbia letah zemaw a cia ? Zekhatamaw na hni ? ” tatah a hae hri kaw .
42010027	Phungbia a thai ngeteipaw taco , “ ‘ Abuipaw na Khazing khah na lungthing vytei , na hringnah vytei , na thawzaang vytei le na khuarawnah vytei tah do my lo . ’ Mataico , ‘ Nama na dopaw hratah na ingpaw khah do my lo , ’ tahpaw he a cang , ” tatah a chai .
42010028	Zisu tah , “ Na pachaipaw ahmang ngetei , ma hraco va tua la , na hring a , ” a tah .
42010029	Canghrasala , ama teitah thai a cangsah khah a dunah cawtah , “ Ka ingpaw cawh ahomaw a cang ? ” tatah a hae kaw .
42010030	Zisu tah palei ka , “ Cawngsaw pakheh Jerusalem khua taitah Jeriko khua lang a seithlah . Ma langpui leco damia sahlo tah hrawh he ka , a caise vytei pahlu pah thlu he ka , thi daimang tah aa dai khy taitah aa seisai .
42010031	Tlangbui pakheh cawh ma lang a za sei hrah ning khatah a tong ka , damia sahlo tah aa daipaw cawngsaw khah a hmuh tihtah khungsai ka , lang kang rakheh lang tah a cahri .
42010032	Ma paw hraco Levi mingphing pakhehpaw tah ma hminghmaw cawh va phah hrah ka , a hmuh tihtah khungsai ka , langkae lang co a cahri sai thlang hrah .
42010033	Canghrasala , Samaria cawngsawpaw pakheh cawh khua tlawng hrah ka , damia sahlo tei aa daipaw cawngsawpaw ungnah khah va phah hrah ka , a hmuh cangkawleh ning a do ngetei .
42010034	A vawhno ka , a hmaw vytei khah sathy le misurhang thupah ka , a tongchai pah khy taitah ama a kelaipaw , la cung lang cawh khing ka , khuabuh lang seikhui ka , ma leco a mingkai .
42010035	A ningthlamongpaw leco , ngung tangka phaehning cawh chua ka , khuabuh a hnuitupaw cawh pei ka , ‘ Ma cawngsaw heh achaw teitah mingkai la , ka va kaw kaw tihtah a hluipaw tei na changpaw maikaw cawh ka ca chang kaw thlu tae a , ’ a tah .
42010036	Ma tlaw pathung hrong lehei ahomaw damia sahlo tei aa hrawhpaw cawngsaw a ingpaw cawh a cang tatah na rawh ? ” tatah a hae .
42010037	Phungbia a thaipaw taco , “ A cung letei ningdonah a hnuipaw khah a cang a , tah ka rawh , ” tatah a chai . Zisu tah , “ Sei la , ma hraco va tua hrah , ” tatah a tah .
42010038	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo khah khua aa tlawnglai ning tah khua khuakheh va phah he ka , ma leco canuno pakheh Martha aa tahpaw tah a ing letah a tlungsah he .
42010039	Martha cawh Mari aa tahpaw chuahruino pakheh a hnui . Ama cawh Abuipaw phehrang letah a ty ka , a bia reipaw khah a nawthlia .
42010040	Canghrasala , Martha cawh raihrepaw ahlunah cawtah a rai a hnawh ngetei . Zisu khatah a vong ka , “ Abuipaw , ka nyteino tei rai kama longtei a pa váso thlangpaw heh a pui tah bei ceh maw ? Kama baw rua pawtah pa chingpah law , ” a tah .
42010041	Abuipaw taco , “ Martha , Martha , hming hlupui cawtah lung reithui tah na ung ,
42010042	canghrasala hming sangkheh suipaw a hia . Mari tah achaw vypaw a thingpaw heh ama taitah lah pápaw cang be , ” a tah .
42011001	Ningkheh cawh Zisu cawh hminghmaw sangkheh letah thlaw a chang leimei . Thlaw a chang khy taico a hningzuitu pakheh tah a hai letah , “ Abuipaw , Johan tah a hningzuitu sahlo a cawngpah pawhe hrakhei thlawchang ma cawngpah hrah , ” tatah a tah .
42011002	Zisu tah , “ Thlaw naa chang tihtah ma hrahei chang my lo . ‘ Vy kaa Paw , na ming cawh cizaw tah ung seh . Na painah tlung ky seh .
42011003	Ning ting kaa hiapaw batui ma pei my lo .
42011004	Kaa cung letei suanah a tuapaw kaa ngethai pawhe hrakhei kaa suanah ma ngethai hrah my lo . Tuhsonah lang a ma chui kheh lo , ’ ” tatah a tah .
42011005	Taico Zisu tah ma hrahei a tah he , “ A bianapaw tah naa hrong letah pakheh cawh vesaw pakheh hnui ka , ama khaco zaicing tah a vaw ka , ‘ Ka dua , very tlangthung tah pa cui theh ,
42011006	zecawtamaw tatah khua a tlawngpaw ka vesawpaw va tlung ka , zehmai peh ruapaw hnui bei neh , ’ tatah a va tah .
42011007	Taico ing chung letei a ungpaw taco , ‘ Hna pa hnawh tua kheh , ingkaw zong ka hrai thlu thah , ka sawtei leh zong kama khatah a ih thlu myca he , tho tah zehmai ca pei khy bei neh , ’ tatah a chai .
42011008	Ka ca ching he a , vesaw chaw a cangnah cawtah tho lytah le very khah peh lytah ung hmai seh la , a hae lawnglia caco tho ka , a dunah zé tah a peh thlang a .
42011009	Macawtaco ka ca ching he a , hae la , peh na cang a he ceh , hui la , naa hmuh a , khong la , ingkaw hong pah na cang a he ceh .
42011010	Ahohmai a haepaw cawh peh a cang he a , a huipaw taco hmuh a ka , ingkaw a khawngpaw cawh hongpah a cang a .
42011011	Naaning paw a cangpaw sahlo , naa sawtei leh tah ngaw ca hae my he seh la , pari naa pae he maw ?
42011012	Aatui ca hae he seh la , tlangcekawng naa pae he maw ?
42011013	Naaning mehchahly tahmai naa sawtei leh hmingchaw peh zia naa hni caco , vaicung letei naa Paw taco Thlawpaw Pathai a haepaw sahlo khah ze tlua tamaw a peh vy chichi he a ! ” a tah he .
42011014	Zisu tah a rei a thlaw thai lypaw chung taikhei khachia khah a tingchua . Khachia a piathlah tihtah a rei a thlaw thai lypaw cawngsaw cawh a rei ka thlaw ka , mingzawpui khah aa ning a ang thlang .
42011015	Canghrasala aaning chung taitah thaikhehpaw taco , “ Khachia sahlo buipaw Belzabub thongtah khachia sahlo a papia khy he , ” tatah aa tah .
42011016	Ahringpaw sahlo taco , Ama khah pase du tah vaicung lang tei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah ma tuapah law , tatah aa tah .
42011017	Zisu tah aa rawhnah khah hnih ka , aa hai letah , “ Ze painah raang hmai , aaning le aaning aa dy caco he a rawh thlu he a . Taico ingchungkho khokheh zong a rai ly tei a chaichy caco he a rawh hrá he a .
42011018	Setan zong ama le ama a dy caco , zekhatamaw a painah raang cawh a daw khy a ? Ma bia heh Belzabub thongtah khachia sahlo a papia he naa tah cawtah ka reipaw a cang hi .
42011019	Atoheh kama tah Belzabub thongtah khachia khah ka papia pawtei a cang caco , naaning a ca zuipaw sahlo he takhei saw aho thong tamaw aa papia ? Macawtaco aaning cawh naaning bia a ca cepahtu a cang he a .
42011020	Canghrasala , khachia sahlo khah Khazing hmingtuakhynah thongtah ka papia pawtei he a cang caco , Khazing painah raang cawh naaning khatah a tlung thah tahnah a cang .
42011021	Mehthawtlung pakheh tah hrainang a hlupui khatah a ing khah a vai thlang chung taco a hnuichia vytei a bing .
42011022	Canghrasala ama navy tah a thawtlung vypaw tah dy katei , a pahneh tih taco , a paichaipaw hrainang vytei khah lah pah ka , a hringpaw a lahpaw hming vytei khah a rai thlu he .
42011023	Ahohmai kama lang a bai lypaw cawh a pa caraepaw a cang , kama a pa pahmo khui lypaw cawh a papaipaw a cang .
42011024	Thlawpaw pialuipaw cawh cawngsawpaw chung taitah a ka piathlah tihtah raangcaa raangro lekhei a hianah hminghmaw hui tah a khiakaly ka , hmuh be . Mataico , ‘ Ka piasaipaw ing lang khah ka pange kaw thlang a , ’ tatah a tah .
42011025	Ing cawh a va phah tihtah longkarong tah ung ka , pathai pahling teitah chiapaw a cangpaw khah a hmuh .
42011026	Taico sei ka , ama navy tah a sua vypaw he ahringpaw thlawpaw pialuipaw pasarih a va chui he ka , ma ing cawh aa pahrang . Taico ma cawngsawpaw cawh athoning tei navy khei , a hning tei a dawhming cawh a pazua vy syly , ” tatah a tah .
42011027	Zisu tah ma hming vytei heh a rei leimeining taco , zawpui hrong taikhei canu pakheh cawh ka y chua ka , “ Nama a ca sahtu le hnabae tui tei a ca cawngtu cawh bonghnang a ting caimang , ” a tah .
42011028	Zisu taco , “ Canghrasala , Khazing bia khah thui tei , a bia a zuipaw he cawh bonghnang aa ting vypaw a cang he , ” tatah a chai .
42011029	Cawngsaw rungpui aa va hlu vy leimeining takhei Zisu taco , “ Atochai cawngsaw heh a chah ly caimang he . Ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah aa hae , canghrasala Khazing khuavang Jonah paching pakhanah khah tah cy ly co zehmai peh cang a bei he .
42011030	Nineve khua cawngsaw cawtah Jonah cawh paching pakhanah a cangpaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw zong heh atochai cawngsaw cawtah paching pakhanah a cang hrah .
42011031	Biacenah ning leco thuilang Abuino Shiba cawh a daw a ka , ato chai cawngsaw sahlo heh thaily a cang sá he a . Zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh Solomon a singnah bia nge rua pawtah alui a changnah taitah va sei ka , canghrasala atoheh Solomon navy tah a lai vypaw ma lehei a ung thlang .
42011032	Biacenah ning leco Nineve khua cawngsaw sahlo cawh atochai cawngsaw khahei a daw hrui he ka , sua aa phosah tae he a , zecawtamaw tatah ma tlaw taco Jonah a bia reipaw rawng tah angepachihnah aa hnui , taico atoheh ma lehei Jonah navy tah a rungnaw vypaw a ung thlang .
42011033	Ahotahmai me-ing aa vang tihtah a langlynah hminghmaw letah maw , tongbai rai letah maw chia bang bei he . Ing chunglang a naepaw tah a khaipaw aa hmuh khy nápawtah me-ing tung letah me-ing khah a chia tei .
42011034	Na meh heh na pung cawtah me-ing a cang . Na meh a chah caco , na pungpaluh zong khah khainá tah a chih . Canghrasala na meh a chah ly caco , na pung zong muiná tah a chih .
42011035	A raering my lo , naa chung letei a ungpaw khainah cawh muinah cang be kho .
42011036	Macawtaco na pungpaluh cawh khai ná tah a chi tei , na pungsaw a zehapaw letah hmai muinah a ung ly caco , me-ing a khainah tei a ca khaisopaw hrakhei na pung cawh a khai a , ” a tah .
42011037	Bia a rei khy taico Zisu cawh Farasi pakheh tah batui e hrui pawtah a hrui . Macawtaco va sei ka , a ty ka , cabuai khah a hia thlang .
42011038	Canghrasala , Zisu cawh Farasi phung a cangpaw e hlai tah kih si khah tua be ca ka , Farasipaw tah a kih a si lypaw khah a hmuh tihtah a khuarawh a haa .
42011039	Mataico Abuipaw tah a hai leco , “ Naaning Farasi cawngsaw taco ny le pakang sahlo alailang khah pathaisah he ceh ka , canghrasala , naa chunglang cawh chahlynah le dusawnah long teitah a chih .
42011040	Naaning mehruh sahlo , alailang a tuatu Khazing takhei a chunglang zong tua hrah bei maw ?
42011041	Canghrasala naa pakang le naa ny chung letei a ungpaw khah mehsisah va pei la , naa cawtah zezongpui a pathai thlang a .
42011042	Naaning Farasi sahlo , naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah naa buichung taitei a chuhpaw hmekhuh , hanghui le aihnaw sihnaw taikhah chyhraw chykheh khah Khazing naa peh naná teitah dingnah le Khazing do khah naa thlawdaw . A hmetaw teipaw heh dethlang lytah ahning teipaw zong heh naa tua ruapaw a cang .
42011043	Farasi sahlo , naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah synagog letah achaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ceh ka , chodo tlaang letah cizaw hmo tah bia a ching khah naa du .
42011044	Naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah naaning cawh ngianah a ung lypaw athlai , ahotahmai hni ly tei aa tlaichai teipaw hratah na cang he ceh , ” tatah a tah .
42011045	Phungbia a thai ngeteipaw hrong letei pakheh tah , “ Cawngpahtu , ma vytei hming na rei tih lehei kaaning zong na ma zongte hrah , ” tatah a chai .
42011046	Zisu tah , “ Naaning phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw khah aa pho khy lypaw behnah phung hmingrih khing he ceh ka , naa vuhsah he . Naaning duiteisai cawh aaning baw rua pawtah naa kihdong hmai calia du bei he ceh .
42011047	Naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah naa pupaw sahlo tei aa za nongpaw he Khazing khuavang sahlo caw takhei thlailung sahlo naa bing he .
42011048	Macawtaco naa pupaw sahlo aa tuasanah khah naa naw a tlah khui hrah he tahnah a cang , aaning tah Khazing khuavang sahlo khah aa nong he , naaning tah aa thlailung naa bing .
42011049	Macawtaco Khazing singnah tei a reipaw cawh , ‘ Khazing khuavang le apostol sahlo khah aaning khatah thlaw he neh ka , thaikheh khah theh a he ka , thaikhehpaw khah aa hrae he a , ’ a tah .
42011050	Macawtaco atochai cawngsaw sahlo cung lehei khazaw hrangthonah taitei aa thawpaw he Khazing khuavang vytei aa thisai rawng tah dangtahnah a tlung tae a .
42011051	Abel thisai taitah dangnah siasang le behnah ing pathai kaa letah aa thawpaw Zakaria thisai tai a cang a . A cang , ka ca ching he , ma vytei cawtah hei atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh dangtah a cang tae he a .
42011052	Naaning phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo , naa cing a ping , zecawtamaw tatah hninah ingkaw cabi khah law he ceh ka , naa seikhui . Naaning duiteisai cawh a nae bei he ceh , taico a nae dupaw khah naa pakhang tlung he , ” tatah a tah .
42011053	Ma hminghmaw taico Zisu cawh a piathlah tihtah Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah thaw tah cakhae he ka , hming a hlupui kong khah hae cakhia he ka ,
42011054	ma pawsui co a reichiapaw bia khei aa tle khy a .
42012001	Ma cai leco cawngsaw thonghlupui a pahmo caw he tah pakheh le pakheh a tlaichai pai leimei he ka , Zisu tah ahmasaw cai tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah ma hrahei a rei . “ Cungmai raipha a cangpaw Farasi sahlo raangri khah a raering my lo .
42012002	No thlangpaw hming maikaw palang cang a he ka , biaparuh zong phy a cang he a .
42012003	A muinah letah naa reipaw zong a khainah letah thui cang a ka , inah khang letei naa reipaw biaparuh zong khah ing tlungkhu taitah phy a cang he a .
42012004	Ka huivesaw sahlo , ka ca ching he , pungsaw a theh khypaw sahlo khah ahohmai ci khe lo . Aa thaw khy taikhei zehmai tua khy khawh bei he .
42012005	Canghrasala ahomaw naa ci ruapaw a cang takhah ka ca hmuh sá he a . Pungsaw zong thaw khy taitei hraihming lang zong thlah khynah naw a hnuipaw Khazing khah ci hri my lo . A cang , ka ca ching he , Ama cawh ci my lo .
42012006	Baibaw pavaw sangpangaw khah tangka phaesai phaehning tah zua bei he maw ? Canghrasala , sangkheh tei hmai khah Khazing tah monghly be .
42012007	Ahmangpaw tei co , naa lu letei sangbu sahlo hmai rei thlu a cang he . Zehmai ci khe o . Naaning cawh baibaw pavaw sahlo navy tah na sungnaw vy he ceh .
42012008	Cawngsaw hmekung letei Kama a pacang khuipaw cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tah Khazing vaiming sahlo hme letah ka cangkhui hrá a .
42012009	Canghrasala , ahohmai cawngsaw hrong letah Kama a pa paphahsaipaw cawh Khazing vaiming sahlo hme letah ka paphah sai hrá a .
42012010	Taico ahohmai Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a reipachiapaw maikaw cawh ngethai khy cang thlang he ka , Thlawpaw Pathai a reipachiapaw maikaw cawh ngethai khy cang a bei he .
42012011	Synagog sahlo le uhtu bui sahlo le nawhnuitu sahlo aa hme letah chuakhui naa cang tihtah zekhatamaw a reicakai neh ka , zemaw ka rei a tahpaw khah naa thlawzawng kheh seh .
42012012	Zecawtamaw tatah ma cai letei naa rei ruapaw khah Thlawpaw Pathai tah a ca ching tae he a , ” tatah a tah .
42012013	Zawpui hrong taitah cawngsaw pakheh tah Zisu hai letah , “ Cawngpahtu , ka unypaw khah ry chaichy pawtah pa chingpah law , ” a tah .
42012014	Zisu taco , “ Cawngsawpaw , naa pahning kaa letah biacetu le ry chytu tah ahomaw naw hnuinah a pa pei ? ” tatah a chai .
42012015	Mataico aa zongmingtei hai letah , “ A raering teitah ung my lo ! Du hlui hnuinah a phingphing khah a raering my lo . Cawngsaw hringnah heh a hnuipaw rungnah letah a pahnia be , ” a tah .
42012016	Mataico aa hai letah ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he , “ Mehrungpaw pakheh a ly cawh kungvui a chah ngetei .
42012017	Ama le ama cawh , ‘ Zekhatamaw tua neh seh la , a chah a ? Ka saze chia nápaw hminghmaw hmai a ung khawh tlung be , ’ a tah .
42012018	Taico a reipaw cawh , ‘ Ma hrahei ka tua a . Ka sachai heh chehthlah a neh ka , alai vypaw ka sá a , ma leco ka saze vytei le ka hmingbo sahlo ka chia a .
42012019	Taico kama le kama khah , “ Kung hlupui cawtah hmingchaw a hlupui hnui ceh ka , a nawng teitah ung la , e la , ding la , a nawng my lo , ” tatah ka tah a , ’ tatah a tah .
42012020	Canghrasala Khazing tah , ‘ Mehruhpaw ! Ato zai hrahring lehei na thi a . Macawtaco na cawtah na pacungpaw hming vytei cawh aho tamaw a lah a ? ’ tatah a tah .
42012021	Ama a caw suipaw tah hming pacung katei , Khazing letah a rung lypaw cawngsaw maikaw cawh ma hraco a cang a , ” tatah a tah .
42012022	Mataico Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai letah , “ Macawtaco ka ca ching he , naa hringnah cawtah zemaw kaa e a , a cang ly leh naa pung cawtah a buh a sai ruapaw kong letah naa lung reithui kheh seh .
42012023	Hringnah heh e le ba navy tah sungnaw vy ka , pung heh chaichi navy tah a sungnaw vy .
42012024	Ra-aw khah pacang tua hmai , thleci cing be ca he ka saze zong hre bei he , sachai zong hnui bei he , a cang naná teitah Khazing tah a cong thlang he . Naaning cawh pavaw navy tah a sungnaw vypaw cang bei he ceh maw !
42012025	Naa hrong letah ahomaw a lungreithuinah rawng tah a hringnah cai suimehlang pakheh chang a chahchi khy ?
42012026	Ma hratei hming a chia pawtei hmai naa tua khy tlung lypaw tah zecawtamaw a hringpaw hming cawtah lungreithui tah naa ung ?
42012027	Lili pangpa sahlo khah zekhatamaw aa ka cy tahpaw pacang tua o . Rai hre bei he , chaichi a taw bei he . Canghrasala ma heh ka ca ching he , siangpahrang Solomon hmai khah ma tlua khei a laisui thlang naná teitah ma pangpa sahlo letei kung kheh tlua khei hmai pasang cang be .
42012028	Vy naaning zingnah a cawngpaw sahlo , alui letah atoning ka cy katei , ningthlamong me lang aa bo thlangpaw araang hmai a pasangpaw Khazing taco naaning cawh a ca pasang vy chichi he a .
42012029	Macawtaco , naa ding naa e ruapaw kong pacang tah lung reithui tah ung khe lo .
42012030	Zecawtamaw tatah ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh lawki cawngsaw sahlo zong tah aa hui teipaw cang hrah ka , naa Paw vaicung leteipaw tah naa hiapaw khah a hni thlang .
42012031	Canghrasala a painah raang khah hui la , ma hming vytei zong heh peh na cang thlang a he ceh .
42012032	Phu cawngtei sahlo , ci khe lo . Zecawtamaw tatah naa Paw tah a painah raang a ca pehpaw he khah a lung a lawngpaw a cang .
42012033	Naa hnuichia sahlo khah zua la , mehsisah sahlo khah pei my lo . A cai thai lypaw tangkabawng khah a zaa la , mehru tei aa ruh khylynah le luichaw tei aa e khylynah hming , vaicung letah aa chang khaw lypaw chosung sahlo cawh pacung my lo .
42012034	Zecawtamaw tatah naa chosung a ungnah letah naa lungthing cawh a ung hrá a .
42012035	Rai hre pawtah caise a tua pacia tah ung la , me-ing vang cia tah chia my lo .
42012036	Nupui chui kongchuanah hming taitah a va tlung kawpaw aa buipaw cawh a va chua cangkawleh ingkaw a khong tihtah rairang teitah hongpah rua pawtah a heh thlangpaw a saecapaw sahlo hratah ung my lo .
42012037	Aa buipaw tah a hraw hmotei a heh thlangpaw he sae sahlo , a va chuahnopaw sahlo he cawh meh vaichaw a cang he . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ama cawh raihrenah caise a tua ka , cabuai cadung sá he ka , ama hrahring tah a tuitang he a .
42012038	Zaicing tamaw a cang ly leh ma navy co a haa vy tah a va tlung tih letah hmai a mai pacia teitah aa za haw thlangpaw khah aa buipaw tah a hmuh caco he , ma sae sahlo cawh meh vaichaw a cang he a .
42012039	Canghrasala ma heh hnih my lo . Ing hnuitu tah mehru cawh ze cai letah maw a va chua a takhah hnih thah my seh la , a ing cawh hrawh sá a be .
42012040	Macawtaco a mai pacia tah ung my lo , zecawtamaw tatah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh naa rawh lypaw cai lekhei a vong a , ” tatah a tah .
42012041	Piter taco , “ Abuipaw , ma tawchingnah bia heh kaaning longtei maw na ma ching , a cang ly leh ming vytei caw tamaw ? ” tatah a hae .
42012042	Abuipaw taco , “ Aho khah maw zing a chuipaw le a singpaw , a ingchungkho sae sahlo khah a cai naning teitah batui peh rua pawtah a buipaw tah rai a pehpaw mingkaitu cawh a cang ?
42012043	Aa buipaw a va tlung kaw tihtah ma hratei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw sae cawh meh vaichaw a cang .
42012044	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma paw cawh a hnuichia vytei a mingkaitu takhei a tua a .
42012045	Canghrasala a bianapaw tah a saecapaw taco ama le ama khah , ‘ Ka buipaw cawh a va tlung nápaw a ne be , ’ tatah tah ka , zuding saw e tah ung ka , ahringpaw sae canu le sae capaw sahlo khah a dai he .
42012046	Ma saecapaw a buipaw cawh a rawh lypaw ning le a pacang lypaw cai letah va tlung a ka , a buipaw tah ma sae capaw cawh caiping caimang tah taichung a ka , a zing lypaw sahlo ungnah lekhei a ungsah hrah a .
42012047	A buipaw dunah hni thlang tei , rai hre pawtah a mai pacia tei a ung lypaw le a buipaw dupaw a tua lypaw sae cawh ui hlupui tah chei a cang a .
42012048	Canghrasala , a buipaw dunah hni ly hmotei dangtah tlang a cangpaw suanah a tuapaw cawh a cawng vy tah chei a cang a . A hlupui peh a cangpaw cawh a hlupui hae kaw a cang a . A hlupui kai sahpaw cawh a hlu vy tah hae kaw a cang he a , ” a tah .
42012049	Ma hrahei a rei vy , “ Alui heh me tah ro rua pawtah pui ka vong . Kang myca seh la , tah ka du caimang !
42012050	Canghrasala baptisma cang nátah tai-ingpaw hnui neh ka , ma ka patlung ka patlia hlai cawh ka lung rei a thui caimang .
42012051	Aluicung lehei denah chuasah rua pawtah a vong tatah maw naa parawh ? Cang be , pachai pawtah a cang hri .
42012052	Atotei ri hei co ingchungkho ingkheh letah a ungpaw cawngsaw papangaw hrong letah a pachai he ka , pathungpaw tah pahningpaw khah dy he ka , pahningpaw tah pathungpaw khah aa dy tae he a .
42012053	Paw leh tah aa sawtei leh khah dy a he ka , sawtei leh tah aa paw leh khah aa dy he a . No leh tah aa sawcanu leh khah dy a he ka , sawcanu letah aa no leh khah aa dy he a . Sawcapaw no leh tah myno leh khah dy a he ka , myno leh tah aa pasaepaw no leh khah aa dy tae he a , ” tatah a tah .
42012054	Zisu taco mingzawpui hai letah , “ Nitlah lang tah meding a ka chuhpaw naa hmuh tihtah sungkheh tah , ‘ Khua a so a ! ’ tah he ceh ka , ma hraco a so tahtah .
42012055	Thuilang tah thli a hrang tihtah , ‘ Ning a paling tae a ! ’ tah he ceh ka , a paling tahtah .
42012056	Cungmai raipha sahlo ! Alui le avai ming he ceh ka , ningkhua zemaw a lo a tah cawh naa hni . Zekhatah zia tamaw atochai hming ung zia a silang heh naa ching pase thai be ?
42012057	Zecawtamaw naaning teitah zemaw ahmang tah cawh naa pacang thai be ?
42012058	Naa caraepaw khatah biacetu hme letah chua pawtah naa sei tihtah langpui letah a rai khy nápaw khah a zawng my lo . Ma hratei na tua ly caco biacetu hme letah ca chuakhui ka , biacetu tah nawhnuitu kih letah ca hlai sua a ka , taico thong letah thlah na cang sua a .
42012059	Ka ca ching , tangka lia ruapaw na lia thlu hlai vytei cawh thong taitah chuh khy khaw bei ceh , ” tatah a tah .
42013001	Ma ningcai taco ma letei a ungpaw cawngsaw thaikheh taco Zisu hai letah raang uhbui Pilat tei Galili cawngsaw thuihlainah aa tua leimei ning tah a thaw sahpaw he kong khah aa ching .
42013002	Zisu tah , “ Ma hratei thihnah a ingpaw Galili cawngsaw sahlo he khah ahringpaw Galili cawngsaw sahlo navy tah aa sua vy rawng tah a cang tatah maw naa rawh ?
42013003	Cang be tah ka ca ching he ! Naaning zong na ngepachih ly caco he ceh na lyde hra he ceh .
42013004	A cang ly leh Siloam ing a sangpaw a cing ning tah a naiseh pawhe cawngsaw pahrawhluireh khah Jerusalem khuapui chung letei a ungpaw a hringpaw cawngsaw sahlo navy tah aa sua vy cawtah a cang naa tah maw ?
42013005	Cang be tah ka ca ching he ! Naaning zong na ngepachih ly caco he ceh na lyde hra he ceh , ” a tah he .
42013006	Taico Zisu tah ma tawchingnah bia heh ching he ka , “ Cawngsawpaw tah a buichung letah thuiku kung kung kheh cing ka , a thui maw thui ly tatah a va ming tihtah zehmai hmuh be .
42013007	Macawtaco buichung a mingkaipaw hai letah , ‘ Ma thuiku kung heh a thui maw , thui ly tatah kung thung chung mingkai neh ka , zehmai hmuh bei neh . Hyhly ! Cholui chang a pahry , ’ tatah a tah .
42013008	Buichung a mingkaipaw taco , ‘ Abuipaw , ato kung kung kheh chung tei heh cawh ming cawng tua , a kaekang heh thlo pá neh ka , alui achawpaw ka bia a .
42013009	Hangkung lang a thui caco chah thlang ka , ma hratah cang ly tei a thui ly caco , hyhly thlang lepui ceh , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
42013010	Sabat ning tah Zisu tah synagog sangkheh letah a cawngpah leimeining he takhei ,
42013011	kung hrawhluireh chung khachia tah a tlepaw canuno a za ung . A kai a king thlu thah ka , a pathlang khy bingbi lytah a ung myca .
42013012	Zisu tah ma no cawh a hmuh tihtah a hmelang va chuh law tatah y ka , “ Cawngsawno , nama cawh na ciacung lynah taco a ca thlaw myca , ” a tah .
42013013	Taico a cung letah a kih pahnia ka , sungkheh teitah canuno cawh a ka pathlang khy ka , Khazing khah a reithai .
42013014	Sabat ning tah Zisu tah cawngsaw a dangsah cawtah synagog a uhtu cawh a thingae ka , zawpuipaw khah , “ Raihrenah ning ningruh a ung , Sabat ning rei lytah ma ningruh chung leco a vong tah na dangsah bei he ceh , ” tatah a tah he .
42013015	Abuipaw tah a hai letah , “ Naaning cungmai raipha sahlo ! Ahotahmai Sabat ning tah a co cang seh , a la cang seh , naa ing taitah thlaw he ceh ka , tui ding sá pawtah seikhui thlang bei he ceh maw ?
42013016	A cang caco Abraham pathlah a cangpaw , Setan tei kung hrawhluireh chung hrai katei a sahpaw heh Sabat ning zong tah dangsah pápaw cang bei maw ? ” a tah he .
42013017	Ma hratei bia a palei tih he taco Ama a caraepaw vytei khah aaning a zeh . Canghrasala zawpuipaw taco a tuapaw hming ningang chuipaw vytei cawtah khei aa thaw a chah ngetei .
42013018	Zisu tah , “ Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw a lo ? Zekhatamaw kaa tawching a ?
42013019	Cawngsawpaw pakheh tah a ly chung letah a lingpaw aihrang ci khatah a lo . Aihrang ci cawh ka chang ka , thingkung tah a ka tua ka , pavaw sahlo tah a cai sahlo letah a cawng tei he , ” a tah .
42013020	Taico Zisu tah a tah vypaw cawh , “ Khazing painah raang cawh zekhatamaw kaa tawching a ?
42013021	Canuno tah vedi hongkheh lekhei raangri pahlawh ka , a nong chi . Ma raangri taco vedi cawh a tho sahpaw hratah a cang , ” a tah .
42013022	Taico Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a seinah langpui letah khuapui zong khuatei zong pae pai lai ka , a cawngpah lai he .
42013023	Cawngsaw thaikheh tah , “ Abuipaw , meh cawngtei long maw pachah a cang he a ? ” tatah aa hae .
42013024	Zisu taco , ma hrahei a tah he , “ Ingkaw a bawpaw lang tah a nae pawtah thaw tah a zong my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ka ca ching he , cawngsaw a hlupui tah a nae zaa he ka , a nae khy bei he .
42013025	Ing hnuitu khah tho ka , a ingkaw khah a kha tae a . Taico naaning cawh ingkaw khungthing lang tah ingkaw khah khong he ceh ka , ‘ Abuipaw ingkaw ma hong ky law , ’ tatah naa ta a . Canghrasala ama taco , ‘ Ze taitah maw naa va chua ? Naaning cawh ca hnih bei he neh , ’ tatah a ca tah tae he a .
42013026	Mataico naaning tah , ‘ Nama khatah kaa e hrui , kaa ding hrui tei kha , kaa khuatlang letah na ma cawngpah tei kha saw , ’ naa tah a .
42013027	Canghrasala ama taco , ‘ Naaning zong ca hnih bei he neh , zelang tamaw naa va chua tahpaw hnih bei neh . Naaning hming chahly a tuapaw vytei ka kae taitah seihly o ! ’ a ca tah tae he a .
42013028	Naaning vytei cawh alailang letah vathlang cang he ceh ka , Abraham le Isak le Jakob le Khazing khuavang vytei cawh Khazing painah raang chung lekhei naa hmuh tae he a . Ma tih taco cá he ceh ka , naa haw naa ria tae a .
42013029	Cawngsaw cawh nichua , nitlah , thuilang , tlanglang tah a vong a he ka , Khazing painah raang lawhdangnah hming lekhei a ty he a .
42013030	Ma tih taco ato letei a hningcaipaw zong heh a hme a sahpaw cang he ka , ato letei a hme a sahpaw zong heh a hningcaipaw a cang tae he a , ” tatah a tah .
42013031	Ma ning taco Farasi thaikhehpaw tah Zisu kha a vong he ka a hai letah , “ Ma hminghmaw taihei piathlah la , hmingkheh kheh lang sei . Herod tah thaw a ca du , ” tatah aa ching .
42013032	Zisu tah , “ Va sei la , ma sihatei khah va ching o , ‘ Atoning zong , ningthlamong zong , khachia sahlo tingchua he neh ka , a dang lypaw ka dang sá he a . A ningthung ning tah ka rai cawh ka paling a . ’
42013033	Zekhatah a cang zong tah atoning , ningthlaw le hazaining tai cawh ka sei longmang thlang a . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing khuavang cawh Jerusalem khuapui khungthing lang letah thih phung cang be !
42013034	Vy Jerusalem ! Jerusalem ! Khazing khuavang sahlo khah za theh he ceh ka , Khazing tah naaning khatah a tawpaw he a cawngsaw sahlo khah alung tah naa vaseh tei he . Aa puino tah a sawtei leh a mathlaw rai letah a bakhupaw he hratah naa cawngsaw cawh uikhazeh uilui maw pakhawng du he neh ka , canghrasala du bei he ceh !
42013035	Mingtua hmai o , naa ing cawh a ching myca . Ka ca ching he , ‘ Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song cang ky seh , ’ tatah naa tah hlai vytei cawh pa hmuh kaw khaw bei ceh , ” tatah a tah .
42014001	Sabat ning leco Zisu cawh Farasi sahlo letei hruitu pakheh ing lang khah batui hrong pawtah a sei tihtah Ama cawh achaw teitah aa ngia lai .
42014002	Ma leco a hmekaw letah cawngsawpaw pakheh thlingnah hri a ingpaw a ung .
42014003	Zisu tah Farasi sahlo le phungbia a thai ngeteipaw sahlo cawh , “ Sabat ning letah dangsah heh a phung a cang maw cang ly ? ” tatah a tah he .
42014004	Canghrasala a cali thlang he . Macawtaco cawngsawpaw cawh va hre ka , dangsah ka , a seisah .
42014005	Mataico aa hai letah , “ Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah Sabat ning letah a sawtei pakheh a cang ly leh a co tungpaw sangkheh khobatlung lang tlah my seh la , rairang tah chuahly a bei maw ? ” tatah a tah he .
42014006	Maco , a rei nápaw hnih bei he .
42014007	Hruipaw cawngsaw sahlo tah cabuai letah a tynah achawpaw a thingpaw he khah Zisu tah a hmuh tihtah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he .
42014008	“ Pakheh kheh tah nupui chuinah letah a ca hrui tih he tah a tynah achawpaw lekhei a ty khe lo . Nama navy tah a puimaw vypaw cawngsaw pakheh zong a hrui mai a .
42014009	Ma hratei a cang caco , naa pahning tah a ca hruipaw he kong a chuatupaw a vong ka , ‘ Na tynah khah ama heh tlui , ’ a ca tah a . Mataico ningzaw tah a chawly caipaw hming lekhei na ty a .
42014010	Canghrasala aa ca hrui tih he tah a nai caipaw hming lekhei a ty o . Maco a ca hruitupaw he a vong tihtah ama taco , ‘ Ka dua , achaw vypaw hming lang a palong , ’ a ca tah a . Ma tih taco male hme letah upanah na hmuh a .
42014011	Ahohmai ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh nytaw tah ung ka , ama le ama a panaipaw cawh pasang a cang a , ” a tah he .
42014012	Mataico , Zisu tah kong a chuatupaw cawh , “ Ching batui a cang ly leh zairia na tua tihtah na vesaw sahlo , na uny sahlo , naa sawny sahlo , a cang ly leh naa ingpaw mehrung sahlo khah hrui khe lo . Na hrui caco he aaning tah nama khah ca hrui kaw hrá he ka , chang kaw na cang tha a .
42014013	Canghrasala lawhdangnah na tua tihtah dawngchiapaw , ciacung lypaw , a phe a cabepaw le a mehcopaw khah hrui hri la , bonghnang song na cang a .
42014014	Aaning tah aa ca chang khy ly tahmai mehding thokawnah letah chang kaw na cang a , ” tatah a tah .
42014015	Aaning hrong letei pakheh ama kha cabuai a cadung hruipaw taco a thui tihtah Zisu cawh , “ Khazing painah raang letei lawhdangnah letah batui a epaw cawngsaw cawh meh vaichaw a cang a , ” tatah a tah .
42014016	Zisu taco , “ Pakhehpaw cawh kongchuanah rungnawpaw pachia ka , cawngsaw hlupui a hrui he .
42014017	Kongchuanah cai a zaw tihtah aa hruipaw he khah , ‘ A vong myca o , zezong a tlang a tling thlu myca , ’ tatah ching pawtah a sae khah a taw .
42014018	Canghrasala aa zongmingtei khei biasi aa phe thlu . A pakhehnahpaw taco , ‘ Atotei khah alui co neh ka , va ming pawtah sei ka du . Pa ngethai ky , ’ a tah .
42014019	Ahringpaw taco , ‘ Atotei khah co tungpaw ching pangaw co neh ka , aaning khah hnehsá pawtah seipaw ka cang . Pa ngethai ky , ’ a tah .
42014020	Ahringpaw vy taco , ‘ Atotei khah nupui chui neh ka , macawtaco a vong thai bei neh , ’ a tah .
42014021	A sae cawh a vong kaw ka , ma bia cawh a buipaw khah a ching . Mataico ing a hnuitupaw cawh a thingae ka a sae cawh , ‘ Khuapui letei langpui sahlo le ing kaa leh ing kaa letei lang sahlo lang rairang tah va sei la , a dawngchiapaw , a ciacung lypaw , a mehcopaw le a phesongpaw khah va chuakhui o , ’ a tah .
42014022	A sae taco , ‘ Abuipaw , na pa chingpaw hrakhei tua neh ka , canghrasala ing chung letah chih balang bei he , ’ tatah a tah .
42014023	Taico , a buipaw tah a sae cawh , ‘ Langpui sahlo lang le arangchung lang va sei la , ka ing chih ky tah cawngsaw chuasah my lo .
42014024	Ka ca ching , ka hruipaw sahlo he takhei co , ka lawhdangnah batui heh pateh khy bei he , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
42014025	Zawpuipaw cawh Zisu khatah khua tlawnglai he ka , Zisu tah aaning lang cawh a hui ka ,
42014026	“ Ahohmai kama kha a vong katei a no le a paw , a nupui le a saw sahlo , a uny sahlo le a satei sahlo le ama a hringnah hmai khah kama navy tah a do vypaw cawh ka hningzuitu cang khy be .
42014027	Taico , ma leh khraws a puá tah a pa zui lypaw cawh ka hningzuitu cang khy be .
42014028	Naaning hrong letah aho tamaw ingsang sah du seh la , a hnuipaw tangka tah a palingnah tai a zy maw tahpaw hni rua tah patih patong taw a bei maw ?
42014029	A hrang patho thah katei , a paling khy lypaw tei a cang caco , aa hmuhpaw maikaw tah ama cawh aa hnuiso a .
42014030	‘ Ma cawngsawpaw tahei ingsah patho ka , paling khy khawh be , ’ aa tah a .
42014031	A cang ly leh abui pakheh cawh abui hringpaw dy rua pawtah sei seh la , ama dy rua pawtah mehnung thongki khatah a va seipaw pakheh khah mehnung thonghraw khatah a te khy a maw tahpaw cawh pacang taw a bei maw ?
42014032	Te khy bei neh takhah a hni caco , a caraepaw langhlaw letah a ung chung takhei ai-awhtu sahlo thlaw tah arainah a hae a .
42014033	Ma hraco naaning zong naa hnuipaw maikaw naa seisai ly caco , ka hningzuitu cang khy bei he ceh .
42014034	Paci cawh a chah , canghrasala a aenah a ly caco zekhatamaw aa aesah kaw khy a ?
42014035	Alui a chah sápaw cawtah chah be ca ka , ingding tah tua rua tah zong chah be , vathlang ruapaw suipaw a cang thlang a . Thuinah nawkho a hnuipaw maikaw taco , ma bia heh thui he seh , ” tatah a tah .
42015001	Taico ngungkhui kheitu sahlo le ahringpaw mehsua sahlo cawh Zisu a bia nge rua pawtah aa dawngkasawny teitah a pahmo he .
42015002	Canghrasala Farasi le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw tahei mehsua sahlo achaw teitah chai he ka , aaning khatah batui a e thlang dei e , ” tatah a phing he .
42015003	Mataico Zisu tah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he .
42015004	“ Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah a hnuipaw tuu zakheh lekhei sangkheh ly seh la , songkua sangkuapaw khah arangchung letah seisai tah a lypaw tuu khah seihno tah a hmuh kaw hlai vytei hui bei maw ?
42015005	Taico , a lypaw tuu khah a hmuh kaw tihtah lunglawng teitah a saitlang letah khing ka , ing lang a tlung .
42015006	Mataico a vesaw sahlo le a ingpaw sahlo khah y he ka , ‘ A pa lawng khui law , ka tuu a lypaw ka hmuh kaw thah e , ’ a tah he .
42015007	Ka ca ching he , ma hraco mehding a ngepachih a hia lypaw songkua pakua navy co , a ngepachihpaw mehsua pakheh cung lekhei vaicung letah alawngnah a hlu vy .
42015008	A cang ly leh canuno pakheh tah ngung tangka phaehraw hnui seh la , phaekheh hly tua seh . Ma no taco me-ing vang tah ing phih a ka , a hmuh hlai tai achaw teitah hui a bei maw ?
42015009	Ma no taco ma tangka cawh a hmuh tihtah a vesaw sahlo le a ingpaw sahlo khah y pakhong he ka , ‘ A pa lawng khui law , a lypaw tangka khah ka hmuh thah e , ’ tatah a tah he .
42015010	Ma hraco ka ca ching he , angepachihpaw mehsua pakheh cung lehei Khazing a vaiming sahlo hme letah alawngnah a ung , ” tatah a tah .
42015011	Zisu tah a bia cawh reipazo ka , “ Cawngsawpaw pakheh ung ka , sawcapaw pahning a hnui .
42015012	A nyheh vypaw tah a paw cawh , ‘ Apaw , ka ting vypaw ry pa pei law , ’ tah ka , macawtaco a paw tah a hnuipaw khah aaning cawh a chaichy he .
42015013	Khua sy a ry hlai tah a sawcapaw a nyheh vypaw taco a hnuipaw vytei cawh pakhong ka , langhlaw pui raang lang seihly ka , ma leco a tangka vytei cawh a nawngnangnah letah a hmang thlu .
42015014	A hnuipaw vytei a hmang thlu khy taikhei ma raang chung vytei leco cakaang a thaw tah tlung ka , ama cawh a phahlah pawngchang tah a ung myca .
42015015	Mataico ma raang letei cawngsawpaw pakheh khatah a vaw ka , a hlofa . Ma cawngsawpaw taco voh lawh a pei ruapaw tah ly lang a taw .
42015016	A ngai a di tu cawtah voh lawh khah hmai e du ngetei ka , canghrasala e ruapaw ahohmai a peipaw ung bei he .
42015017	A lung ka sing ka , ama tei co , ‘ Ka paw ing letei a hlofapaw sahlo tahmai e ruapaw a hlupui hnui he ka , kama cawh ma lehei ngaidi tah ka thi daimang myca !
42015018	Tho a neh ka , ka paw kha ka sei a . Taico , “ Ka paw , Khazing hme le na hme letah ka sua myca .
42015019	Na sawtei tah tlang hmai a tlah khawh bei neh , canghrasala , na raihrepaw sahlo letei pakheh hratah pa tua ky law , ” tatah ka tah a , ’ a tah .
42015020	Macawtaco tho ka , a paw khaco a sei . Canghrasala langhlaw pui letah a va sei leimeining takhei a paw taco va hmuh ka , ning a do ngetei . Va saihno ka , a pongchai ka , a hnang .
42015021	A sawcapaw taco , ‘ Apaw , Khazing hme le na hme letah ka sua myca . Kama cawh na sawcapaw tah tlang hmai a tlah khawh bei neh , ’ tatah a tah .
42015022	Canghrasala a paw taco a sae sahlo cawh , ‘ Pai achaw caipaw khah rairang tah va tle la , a buh sá o . A kihdong lekhei kihsapadi a hro sá la , a phe lekhei phepakong a pakong sá o .
42015023	A thy caipaw co tungnypaw khah va hrui la , theh my lo . Kongchuanah tuá tah a nawng he peh .
42015024	Ma ka sawcapaw heh thi ka , a kahring kaw , ama cawh ly ka , ka hmuh kawpaw a cang , ’ tatah a tah . Mataico lawhdangnah cawh aa tua .
42015025	Ma chung cawh a sawcapaw uthuipaw cawh ly letah a ung thlang . Ing lang ka tlung ka , ing kae a va phah tihtah hlaw o le aa langpaw py khah a thui .
42015026	Macawtaco sae pakheh khah y ka , ‘ Zemaw naa tua ? ’ tatah a hae .
42015027	Ma saecapaw taco , ‘ Na nyteipaw va kaw kaw ka , a bing teitah a va kaw kaw cawtah na paw tah a thy caipaw co tungnypaw khah a thaw , ’ tatah a tah .
42015028	Uthuipaw cawh a thingae ka , ing chunglang a nae du khawh be . Macawtaco a paw cawh piathlah ka , a va naw .
42015029	Canghrasala a paw hai leco , ‘ Rawh tua hmai ! Kung ma vytei heh sae hratah ca hrepah neh ka , na reipaw zong nge lytah ung bang bei neh . Ma naná co hmai ka vesaw sahlo kha a nawng nápaw cawtah mei teitei hmai pa pei bang bei ceh .
42015030	Canghrasala ma na sawcapaw tahei na tangka vytei khah hlohlang no khatah hly thlu ka , ing lang a va kaw kaw tihtah a caw taco a thy caipaw co na thawpah ! ’ tatah a tah .
42015031	A paw taco , ‘ Ka sawcapaw , nama cawh kama khatah ung leimei thlang ceh ka , ka hnuipaw vytei heh na tei a cang .
42015032	Canghrasala a lawngnah dy tua tah kaa lawngpaw he peh a cang , zemaw tah pawco ma na nyteipaw heh thi ka , a ka hring kaw , ama cawh ly ka , hmuh kawpaw a cang , ’ tatah a palei , ” tatah Zisu tah a tah .
42016001	Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Mehrung pakheh ung ka , hming a mingkaitu pakheh a hnui . Hming a mingkaitu taco mehrungpaw a cho le pe sahlo cawh a longdepaw tah a tua tatah pu a cang .
42016002	Macawtaco ama cawh mehrungpaw tah y ka , ‘ Na kong ka thuipaw heh zekhatamaw a cang ? Rai na hrepaw cazing papei , zecawtamaw tatah ka hming mingkaitu cang khy khawh bei ceh , ’ a tah .
42016003	Hming a mingkaitu taco ama le ama cawh , ‘ Zemaw ka tua a ? Ka buipaw tah ka rai a pa lah pah thah . Alui che pawtah thawzaang hnui tlung be ca neh ka , kih do pawtah ka ning a zeh tlung .
42016004	A cang caco , zemaw ka tua a tahpaw ka hni myca ! Ma hratei ka tua caco , ka rai a chang tihtah cawngsaw tah aa ing letah aa pa tlungsah du a , ’ tatah a tah .
42016005	Maco a buipaw khatei luibah a hnuipaw sahlo khah pakheh cy tah y he ka , a pakhehnah khah , ‘ Ka buipaw cawh khazeh maw na bah ? ’ tatah a hae .
42016006	‘ Oliv sathy galon pung zareh , ’ tatah a palei . Hming a mingkaitu taco , ‘ Na cazing law la , rairang tah a ty la , galon pung zapali tatah cia , ’ tatah a ching .
42016007	Mataico a pahningnah cawh , ‘ Nama saw khazeh maw na bah ? ’ tatah a hae . ‘ Changvuh bai thongkheh , ’ tatah a palei . Ma cawngsawpaw zong cawh , ‘ Na cazing law la , zareh tatah cia , ’ tatah a tah .
42016008	Ma hming a mingkaitu mehdih lypaw tei singthai tei hming a tuapaw cawh a buipaw tah a pachaw ngetei . A hmang , khazaw cawngsaw heh aaning aa mehnung hui khatei aa cawtah aa tuanah kong leco Khazing a khainah letei a ungpaw cawngsaw navy tah a sing vy he .
42016009	Ka ca ching he , khazaw cho le pe heh vesaw hnui nápawtah hmang o . Ma hratei naa tua caco , naa cho a chang tihtah chaizaw ing letah naa ung he ceh .
42016010	Ahohmai a chia pawtei letah zingchui pawtah a ungpaw cawh alaipaw zong letah zingchuipaw cang tei ka , ahohmai a chia pawtei letah zing a chui lypaw cawh alaipaw zong letah zing chui hrah be .
42016011	Macawtaco , khazaw hnuirungnah letah zingchuipaw naa cang ly caco , rungnah hmuisuipaw letah ahomaw a ca zing he a ?
42016012	Taico , cawngsaw hringpaw hnuicho letah zingchuipaw naa cang ly caco ahomaw naa tei rua pawtah hming a ca pei he a ?
42016013	Aho sae tahmai abui pahning aa rai hre khy be . Pakheh a hua ka , pakheh a do a , a cang ly leh pakheh cung letah zingchuipaw tah ung a ka , pakheh khah ze tah rei a be . Khazing rai kha , tangka rai kha hre pakong khy bei ceh , ” tatah a ching he .
42016014	Tangka a dupaw Farasi sahlo tah ma bia cawh thui he ka , Zisu cawh aa hmo aa miaso .
42016015	Zisu tah aaning cawh , “ Cawngsaw mehmuh letah thai a cangsah he ceh ka , canghrasala naa lungthing cawh Khazing tah a hni . Cawngsaw tah a sungsah ngeteipaw heh Khazing mehmuh leco pasih a chuipaw a cang .
42016016	Moses phungbia le Khazing khuavang bia sahlo cawh baptisma peitu Johan chai tai khah a cang he . Ma cai ri taico Khazing painah raang thawngchawbia cawh rei leimei tah cang ka , ming hlupui cawh ma langpui chunglang khah a chuchei tah a nae he .
42016017	Khazing phungbia cabu chung letei a chia caipaw , casung tei deipaw tei hmai heh lahly navy co , alui le avai a lypaw hmai heh a neh vy syly a .
42016018	A nupui mah katei ahringpaw canu a chuipaw cawh a pheipaw a cang . Mah ciapaw canu a chuipaw capaw cawh a pheipaw a cang , ” tatah a tah .
42016019	A rei vypaw cawh , “ Mehrungpaw pakheh , saidungpaw paithladih anaipaw a tua katei , ning tating tei a nawng teitah khua a sahpaw a ung .
42016020	Kih dopaw , a ming Lazaru aa tahpaw , hmawchia tei a pahlong thlangpaw khah a hawkaw letah chia he ka ,
42016021	mehrungpaw a cabuai taitah didang a tlahpaw khah e rua pawtah a du ngetei . Ui sahlo taco a vong he ka , a hmaw khah aa liapah tei .
42016022	Kih dopaw cawh a thihnah cai a va phah tihtah vaiming tah ama cawh Abraham kae letah aa seikhui . Mehrungpaw zong cawh thi hrah ka , aa phung .
42016023	Vaisang ngetei tei a ungnah hraihming taikhei , a cung lang cawh a kahui ka , langhlaw pui lekhei Abraham le a kae letei Lazaru khah a hmuh he .
42016024	Taico Abraham cawh y ka , ‘ Ka paw Abraham , ning pa do la , Lazaru khah taw la , a kih dong khah tui letah nong seh la , ka lui a cakaw nápawtah za pa thlah so ky seh , zecawtamaw tatah ma me lehei ka tai tu myca , ’ tatah a tah .
42016025	Canghrasala Abraham taco , ‘ Ka sawtei , na hring chung tei hming chawpaw na cypaw vytei khah a thui thlang bei ceh maw ? Ma ning lekhei Lazaru taco hmingchahly a cy kho . Canghrasala , atoheh cawh ama cawh ma lehei a hnaw pangang he ka , nama cawh taisai na tai myca .
42016026	Ma hlui co , na kaa le kaa kaa lehei khobatlung a thuh ngeteipaw ung ka , macawtaco ma taihei nama kha a va sei dupaw sahlo aa va sei khy lypaw hratah ma taikhei kaaning khatah ahohmai va cakang khy hrá bei he , ’ tatah a palei .
42016027	Mataico mehrungpaw taco , ‘ Ka ca naw , ka paw ! Lazaru khah ka paw ing lang taw la ,
42016028	uny papangaw hnui he neh ka , aaning cawh a raeringnah va pei he seh la , ma tai-ingnah hming lang heh aa va sei ly nápawtah , ’ tatah a tah .
42016029	Abraham taco , ‘ Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo hnui thlang he ka , aaning aa bia cawh nge thlang he seh , ’ tatah a palei .
42016030	Mehrungpaw taco , ‘ Cang be , ka paw Abraham , a thi ciapaw tah aaning kha aa va sei caco , aa ngepachih thlang he a , ’ tatah a tah .
42016031	Canghrasala Abraham taco , ‘ Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa bia aa nge ly caco , thihnah taitah a thokawpaw aa ung tahmai tah aa bia zong nge hlui a bei he , ’ tatah a palei , ” tatah Zisu tah a tah .
42017001	Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco , “ Cawngsaw a suasahpaw hming sahlo a ung paria thlang he a . Canghrasala suanah a chuakhuipaw mehnung cawh a cing a ping .
42017002	Ma nyhehtei sahlo lehei pakheh hmai heh a suasahpaw cawh a hirong letah saangrianah lung pathle tah rili lang thlah he seh la , a cawtah a chah vy a .
42017003	Macawtaco a singkang my lo . Na unypaw tah suanah a tua caco , chinghring la , a ngepachih caco ngethai my lo .
42017004	Ning kheh tah uisarih na cung letah sua katei , uisarih nama kha a vong tah , ‘ Ka ngepachih , ’ a ca tah caco ngethai my lo , ” a tah he .
42017005	Apostol sahlo tah Abuipaw cawh , “ Kaa zingnah heh changchysah vy law ! ” tatah aa tah .
42017006	Zisu taco , “ Aihrang hmu tia tei chang zingnah naa hnui caco , ma siasahming kung heh , ‘ A phehly la , rili letah va cy law , ’ tah khy he ceh ka , naa bia a ca nge thlang he a .
42017007	Naaning hrong letah pakheh tah alui a paleh ruapaw tamaw , tuu a king ruapaw tamaw sae pakheh hnui seh la , arangchung lang tah a va tlung tihtah , ‘ A vong la , a ty la batui e , ’ naa tah a maw ?
42017008	Ma hraco tah lytah , ‘ Batui pa tuapah , a pachia la , ka ding ka e chung vytei heh pa ungpai thlang , ma khy taico na ding na e tae hra a , ’ tah hri bei maw ?
42017009	Ma a saecapaw tah a chingpaw hratah a tua cawtah a buipaw tah a cung letah a lawng hlui be .
42017010	Ma hraco naaning khatah chingpaw vytei heh naa tua thlu khy taitah hmai , ‘ A chahnai lypaw sae kaa cang he peh , kaa hre ruapaw rai pui kaa hre hi , ’ tah my lo , ” a tah he .
42017011	Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a seining takhei , Samaria le Galili raangri khei a sei lai .
42017012	Khua khuakheh chunglang a nae ka , thinghmuihri a ingpaw pahraw cawh Ama khatah a tong he . Langhlaw pui khei a daw he ka ,
42017013	a thangpui tah , “ Zisu , Abuipaw , ning ma do ky law ! ” tatah a y he .
42017014	Aaning cawh a hmuh tih he tah Zisu taco , “ Sei la , tlangbui sahlo khah a va hmuhsah my lo , ” a tah he . Taico , aa seining tah langpui letah a dang he .
42017015	Aaning chung taitah pakhehpaw cawh ka dang tahpaw khah a hni tihtah Khazing khah a thangpui tah reithai hmo khei a va kaw kaw .
42017016	Zisu a phehrang lekhei a bawh ka , alawngnah bia a rei . Ma cawngsaw cawh Samaria mingphing a cang .
42017017	Zisu tah , “ Dang sahpaw khah pahraw cang bei he maw ? Pakuapaw saw zeletamaw aa ung ?
42017018	Ma mingphing hringpaw rei ly hei a vong tah Khazing reithainah a hlaipaw pakheh chang ung be dei he ? ” tatah a tah .
42017019	Mataico Samaria cawngsawpaw hai leco , “ Tho la sei , na zingnah tah a ca dangsah , ” tatah a tah .
42017020	Uikheh cawh , Farasi sahlo tah zening tamaw Khazing painah raang cawh a va tlung a tatah aa haepaw khah , Zisu tah , “ Khazing painah raang cawh naa hmuh khy pawtah va tlung a be .
42017021	Cawngsaw tah , ‘ Ma lehei a ung , a cang ly leh ma lekhei a ung , ’ tah khy bei he , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh naa chung letah a ungnah cawtah a cang , ” tatah a palei he .
42017022	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo hai leco , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh ningkheh tachang hmuh naa du ngetei nápaw ning le cai khah a va tlung tae a , canghrasala hmuh khy a bei ceh .
42017023	Cawngsaw hlupui tah , ‘ Ama cawh ma lekhei a ung khi , a cang ly leh ma lehei a ung hi , ’ tatah aa ca tah he a . Ama cawh hui pawtah piahly khe lo .
42017024	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah ning leco lailaw ky katei , avai a ki rakheh taitah a ki rakheh lang a khaipalehpaw hratah a cang tae a .
42017025	Canghrasala a hmasaw letaco hming a hlupui khah tai-ing taw a ka , atochai cawngsaw tahei aa hlawh tae a .
42017026	Noah a chai ning leteipaw hrakhei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongnah cawh a cang tae a .
42017027	Cawngsaw sahlo cawh Noah tuilawng chunglang a naenah ning tai lekhei e he ka , ding he ka , a chuihae he ka , a hnui he . Mataico tuipa-ia cawh tlung ka , aaning vytei cawh aa dawngkasawny tah a hlyde thlu he .
42017028	Ma heh Lot a chai ning teipaw khakhei a lo . Cawngsaw sahlo cawh e he ka , ding he ka , co he ka , zua he ka , cing he ka , ing aa sah .
42017029	Canghrasala Lot tah Sodom khua a piasaining tah me le me a epaw kaa cawh avai taitah za so ka , aaning cawh aa dawngkasawny tah a ro cehceh he .
42017030	Ma tei hraco Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vong kaw ning taco a cang hra a .
42017031	Ma ning leco ing cung letei a ungpaw cawh ing chung letei a hmingbo lá pawtah a nae kheh seh . Ma hraco ly letah a ungpaw ahohmai hming sangkheh kheh lá pawtah ing lang kawkaw kheh seh .
42017032	Lot a nupuino khah a thui thlang my lo .
42017033	A hringnah pachah a pachiapaw taco sung a ka , a hringnah a sungpaw taco a pachah a .
42017034	Ka ca ching he , ma zai leco lakhing sangkheh letah a ih hruipaw cawngsaw pahning chung taikhei pakheh cawh lah cang ka , pakheh cawh seisai a cang a .
42017035	Canu pahning tah saang suh hrui a he ka , pakheh cawh lah cang a ka , pakheh cawh seisai a cang a .
42017036	Cawngsaw pahning ly chung letah ung he ka , pakheh cawh lah cang a ka , pakheh cawh seisai a cang a , ” tatah a tah .
42017037	“ Abuipaw , zeletamaw ma hming cawh a tlung a ? ” tatah aa hae . Zisu taco , “ Sarawh a ungnah hming leco langtaw pavaw cawh a pahmo tei he , ” tatah a palei he .
42018001	Mataico Zisu tah lungdong lytah thlaw aa chang paria nápawtah cawngpahnah cawtah tawchingnah bia khah a hningzuitu sahlo a ching he .
42018002	Aa hai letaco , “ Khuapui khua kheh letah Khazing a ci lypaw le cawngsaw zetah a rei lypaw biacetu pakheh a ung .
