42018003	Taico ma khuapui letei a ungpaw lahme no pakheh taco ama khatah a vaw ka , ‘ Ka caraepaw cung letah a dihpaw teitah bia pa cepah ky law , ’ tatah a naw cakhawng leimei thlang .
42018004	Ma biacetupaw taco uihlupui a bia cawh a ei . Canghrasala , a changnah leco ama le ama cawh , ‘ Khazing ci ly le cawngsaw zetah rei lytah ung hmai my neh seh la ,
42018005	ma lahmeno heh cawh hna a pa hnawh leimeinah cawtah a bia cawh ka cepah thlang a . Ma pawsui co , a vong khaw be ca ka , ka rei pa pathui khaw be , ’ a tah , ” tatah a tah .
42018006	Taico Abuipaw taco , “ Mehding lypaw biacetu tei a reipaw heh nawthlia tua o !
42018007	Khazing tah Ama a thingpaw cawngsaw , ching le zai tei ama khatah a y leimeipaw sahlo aa cai tah a dingpaw biacenah cawh tuapah lytah a ung a maw ? Aaning bawkhang paw taco a hongsang a beh .
42018008	Ka ca ching he , a dingpaw biacenah cawh rairang tah a tuapah he a . Ma duitei cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a vongkaw tihtah alui lehei zingnah a hnuipaw he hmuh siama he maw ? ” tatah a tah .
42018009	Thaikheh aaning le aaning mehding a tah ngetei he katei , cawngsaw maikaw a minghnawh pawhe sahlo khah Zisu tah ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he .
42018010	“ Cawngsaw pahning cawh behnah ing lang thlawchang rua pawtah sei he ka , pakheh cawh Farasi cang ka , pakhehpaw cawh ngungkhui kheitu a cang .
42018011	Farasipaw cawh a daw ka , ama a kong thlaw a changpaw cawh , ‘ Vy Khazing , cawngsaw hringpaw , damia sahlo , chahlynah a tuapaw sahlo , a pheilaipaw sahlo , a cang ly leh ma ngungkhui kheitu hrahei ka cang lynah cawtah ka ca long .
42018012	Zaa kheh letah ning hning batui cahe tei neh ka , ka hmuhpaw vytei taitah chyhraw chykheh ka peh tei , ’ tatah a tah .
42018013	Canghrasala ngungkhui kheitu cawh langhlaw pui lekhei a daw ka , avai lang hmai a y ngang lytah a cacanghnaw khah a cung ka , ‘ Vy Khazing , mehsuapaw kama heh ning pa do ky law , ’ a tah .
42018014	Ka ca ching he , Farasipaw khah cang lytah ma ngungkhui a kheitupaw khah Khazing hme letah thaicangsah cang tah ing lang a dihpaw cawh a cang . Ahohmai ama le ama a pasangpaw cawh panai cang ka , ama le ama a panaipaw cawh pasang a cang a , ” a tah .
42018015	Zisu tah tong he seh la , bonghnang song he seh tah du tah hasaitei sahlo khah aa va chua khui he . Ma cawh a hningzuitu sahlo tah hmuh he ka , aa raw he .
42018016	Canghrasala Zisu tah nyheh sahlo cawh Ama kha y he ka , “ Nyheh sahlo cawh Kama khatah a vong he seh , pakhang khe o ! Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh ma hapaw sahlo aa tei khah a cang .
42018017	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang cawh nyheh hratei a cyhlang lypaw taco a chunglang a nae by a bei he , ” a tah .
42018018	Uhtu a cangpaw pakheh tah Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu chaw , chaizaw hringnah ka hmuh khy nápawtah zemaw ka tua a ? ” tatah a hae .
42018019	“ Zecawtamaw a chawpaw na pa tah ? Khazing tah cy ly co ahohmai achawpaw ung bei he .
42018020	Biapeh sahlo cawh na hni thlang , ‘ A phei kheh , lenong kheh , ru kheh , ahmang lypaw bia hnikhuitu cang kheh , na no le na paw cizaw my lo , ’ tahpaw khah , ” tatah Zisu tah a chai .
42018021	Uhtu paw tah , “ Ma vytei heh cawh ka nyheh ning taitah ka zui ciapaw long tei a cang , ” a tah .
42018022	Ma cawh Zisu tah a thui tihtah a hai leco , “ Hming sangkheh naa by ning thlang . Na hnuipaw vytei zua la , mehsisah khah tangka va pei la , vaicung letah chosung na hnui a . Mataico a vong la , pa zui , ” tatah a tah .
42018023	Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah a nge a chia ngetei , zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh mehrung a cangnah cawtah a cang .
42018024	Zisu tah ama cawh ming ka , a hai leco , “ Mehrung cai taco Khazing painah raang letah a nae heh cawh a ru caimang !
42018025	Hmuisui tei co , mehrungpaw tei Khazing painah raang letah a nae navy co , ceiphing kho letah sahisy a nae heh a neh vy a , ” tatah a tah .
42018026	Ma bia a thuipaw sahlo taco , “ Ma hratei a cang caco ahomaw pachah a cang khy a ? ” tatah aa hae .
42018027	Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw caw tei a cang khy lypaw heh Khazing caw taco a cang khy , ” tatah a palei he .
42018028	Piter tah a hai leco , “ Kaa hnuipaw vytei seisai tah kaa ca zui hi , ” a tah .
42018029	Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang cawtah a ing cang seh , a nupui cang seh , a uny sahlo cang he seh , a no le a paw cang he seh , a sawtei leh cang he seh a seisaipaw taco ,
42018030	ato cai letei hmuh ruapaw a leh hlupui aa hmuh hlui tah a va chuh lepaw cai letah chaizaw hringnah zong aa hmuh a , ” a tah he .
42018031	Zisu tah a hningzuitu hluihning cawh thokhui he ka , ma hrahei a ching he . “ Jerusalem khuapui lang seichy he peh ka , Khazing khuavang sahlo tei Cawngsaw Sawcapaw kong aa ciapaw vytei khah a tling a .
42018032	Ama cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo kih letah peh a cang a . Aaning taco hnuiso he ka , pasipasa he ka , aa ci tah chawh he ka , basung tah chei a he ka , aa thaw a .
42018033	Ningthung ning letah a thokaw a , ” tatah a tah he .
42018034	A hningzuitu sahlo tah ma bia cawh thuithai bingbi bei he . A silang khah nokhai aa cangnah cawtah a reipaw kong cawh zemaw a cang tah hnih bei he .
42018035	Zisu cawh Jeriko khua a nae cai lekhei , mehcopaw pakheh cawh kih do pawtah langpui kae letah a ty thlang .
42018036	Cawngsaw rungpui aa seipaw khah a thui tihtah zehming maw a tlung , tatah a hae he .
42018037	“ Nazaret Zisu a va sei ! ” tatah aa ching .
42018038	Mehcopaw taco , “ David Pathlah , Zisu , ning pa do ky law ! ” tatah a y .
42018039	Langhme a chuipaw sahlo taco raw he ka , de law aa tah . Canghrasala ma cawngsawpaw cawh , “ David Pathlah , ning pa do ky law ! ” tatah a y tima .
42018040	Zisu cawh a daw ka , ma cawngsawpaw cawh kama khatah a vong khui law , a tah he . A kae a va phah tihtah Zisu taco ma cawngsawpaw cawh ,
42018041	“ Na cawtah ze tuapah maw na du ? ” tatah a hae . “ Abuipaw , khuahmuh khy ka du , ” tatah a palei .
42018042	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Khuahmuh myca , na zingnah tah a ca dangsah thah , ” tatah a tah .
42018043	Ma cangkaw leco , khuahmuh khy ka , Khazing khah reithai ka , Zisu cawh a zui lai . Ma cawh cawngsaw vytei tah aa hmuh tihtah Khazing khah aa reithai hrah .
42019001	Zisu cawh Jeriko khua lang a nae ka , khua chung cawh a cahrong .
42019002	Ma khua leco cawngsaw pakheh a ming Zakia aa tahpaw ung ka , ngungkhui kheitu bui pakheh cang ka , a dong a chah ngetei .
42019003	Ama taco Zisu cawh ahomaw a cang tahpaw khah hmuh du ngetei ka , canghrasala a ding a nai tunah cawtah cawngsaw rungpui tah pakhang he ka , hmuh khy be .
42019004	Macawtaco a hmelang va sai ka , Zisu hmuh du taco a va sei nápaw langpui letei saikamur thuiku kung cawh a ke .
42019005	Zisu tah ma hminghmaw cawh va phah ka , a kahui ka , a hai leco , “ Zakia , rairang tah za cung . Atoning heh na ing letah ka tlung a , ” tatah a tah .
42019006	Mataico rairang tah za cung ka , Zisu cawh a lawng ngetei tah a cyhlang .
42019007	Cawngsaw vytei tah ma cawh hmuh he ka , “ Mehsuapaw khuatlung cang rua pawtah a sei thlang , ” tatah a phing tlungmang he .
42019008	Canghrasala , Zakia cawh a daw ka , Abuipaw hai leco , “ Mingtua ! Abuipaw , ato hrahring heh ka cho a chy cawh mehsisah pei he neh ka , ahohmai ka dungkhei pawhe aa ung caco , a leh pali tah ka chang kaw he a , ” tatah a tah .
42019009	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Atoning heh ma ing lehei pachahnah a va tlung myca , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawngsaw zong heh Abraham pathlah a cang hrah .
42019010	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh a lydepaw sahlo hui rua pawtah le pachá pawtah a vongpaw a cang , ” a tah .
42019011	Ma bia aa nge leimeining taco tawchingnah bia sangkheh khah a ching vy he . Zecawtamaw tatah Jerusalem khua khah phah daimang tei ca ka , cawngsaw vytei tah Khazing painah raang cawh a va lang palang a tatah aa rawh .
42019012	Zisu taco , “ Abui hring a cangpaw pakheh cawh siangpahrang cangnah lah rua pawtah le va kaw kaw rua pawtah raang langhlaw pui lang a sei .
42019013	A sei hlai tah a sae pahraw khah y he ka , mina tangka phaehraw khah a peh he . ‘ Ka va tlung hlai vytei ma tangka hei cho paleh naw my lo , ’ a tah he .
42019014	Canghrasala , a khuasaw tah aa huanah cawtah a hninglang tah cawngsaw khah taw he ka , ‘ Ma cawngsaw heh kaa siangpahrang rua tah du bei peh , ’ tatah aa va chingsah he .
42019015	Canghrasala ama cawh siangpahrang tah tua thah he ka , ing lang cawh a va tlung kaw . Mataico tangka a peh sipaw a sae sahlo khah khazeh cy maw a miasah he tah hni du takhei a ysah he .
42019016	A pakhehnah cawh a vong ka a hai leco , ‘ Abuipaw , na mina tangka khah phaehraw ka miasah , ’ tatah a tah .
42019017	A buipaw tah , ‘ Na tua thai caimang , ka sae chaw ! Hming a chia pawtei letah zingchui pawtah na ungnah cawtah hei khuapui khua hraw a uhtu na cang a , ’ tatah a palei .
42019018	A pahningnah cawh a vong ka , ‘ Abuipaw , mina tangka khah phaepangaw ka miasah , ’ a tah .
42019019	A buipaw taco , ‘ Nama zong khuapui khua pangaw a uhtu na cang a , ’ a tah .
42019020	Mataico , a sae hringpaw a vong ka , ‘ Abuipaw , na mina tangka phaekheh cawh ma heh a cang , pai tah pahlong neh ka , achaw teitah ka chia thlang .
42019021	Nama cawh mehcicia cang ceh ka , ka ca ci . Na chiapaw a cang lypaw zong law ceh ka , na cingpaw a cang lypaw zong na hre tei , ’ tatah a tah .
42019022	A buipaw taco , ‘ Sae chah ly , nama na bia tei hratah bia ka ca cepah a . Kama cawh mehcicia , ka chia lypaw zong law neh ka , ka cing lypaw zong ka hrepaw cawh na hni , cang maw ?
42019023	A cang caco , zecawtamaw ka tangka cawh amia a ungnah letah na chia be ? Chia la caw , ka va tlung tihtah a mia ka hmuh a , ’ tatah a palei .
42019024	Mataico a kae letei a dawpaw sahlo khah , ‘ Ma cawngsawpaw a mina tangka heh chu la , mina tangka phaehraw a hnuipaw khah pei o , ’ a tah he .
42019025	Aaning taco , ‘ Abuipaw , ama cawh mina tangka phaehraw a hnui thah ! ’ aa tah .
42019026	Aa hai leco , ‘ Ka ca ching he , ahohmai a hnuipaw cawh peh chi vy a cang a . Canghrasala , zehmai a hnui lypaw cawh a hnuitlakangpaw tei hmai khah lah pah a cang a .
42019027	Macawtaco , aa siangpahrang caw tei a pa du lypaw he le ka carae a cangpaw sahlo khah ma lehei va chua khui la , ka hmekaw lehei thae o , ’ tatah a palei he , ” tatah a tah .
42019028	Zisu cawh ma bia a rei khy taico Jerusalem lang sei pawtah hme lang a sei .
42019029	Oliv tlaang aa tahpaw letei a ungpaw Bethfes le Bethani khua khah aa phah daimang ning tah a hningzuitu pahning khah a seisah hlang he .
42019030	“ Naa hme khua lekhei va sei la , khuachung naa nae tih he ceh tah ahotahmai aa ke bang lypaw la teitei a hrai thlangpaw naa hmuh a . A rui khah thlang he ceh ka , ma lang heh naa va hrui a .
42019031	Pakheh kheh tah , ‘ Zecawtamaw ma a rui khah naa thlang ? ’ tatah ca tah my he seh la , ‘ Abuipaw tah a hia , ’ tah my lo , ” a tah he .
42019032	A taw hlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh va sei he ka , Zisu tei a ching pawtei he hrakhei aa va hmuh .
42019033	La teitei cawh a rui aa thlang leimeining tah a hnuitupaw sahlo takhei aaning cawh , “ Zecawtamaw naa thlang ? ” tatah aa hae he .
42019034	Aaning taco , “ Abuipaw tah a hia , ” tatah aa palei he .
42019035	La teitei cawh Zisu khatah va chuakhui he ka , a kai letah aa pai sahlo dae he ka , Zisu cawh aa kesah .
42019036	A sei nápaw langpui lekhei cawngsaw taco aa pai sahlo cawh aa phaw .
42019037	Oliv tlaang lang tah a za cung chuhpaw langpui kae a va phah tihtah a hninglang tah aa zuipaw ming rungpui cawh aa hmuhpaw ningang chuipaw vytei rawng takhei a lawng ngetei he ka , o thangpui khei Khazing cawh aa reithai .
42019038	“ Abuipaw ming tah a vongpaw siangpahrang cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh ! Vaicung letah denah ung seh la , Cungnungcai lekhei rungnawnah ung ky seh , ” aa tah .
42019039	Zawpui hrong letah a ungpaw Farasi thaikheh taco Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu , na hningzuitu sahlo heh raw tua o , ” tatah aa tah .
42019040	Zisu taco , “ Ka ca ching he , aaning heh aa de tahmai tah alung sahlo heh a y chua he a , ” tatah a palei he .
42019041	Jerusalem cawh phah daimang myca he ka , khuapui cawh hmuh ka , a cawkhui .
42019042	“ Ze tamaw denah heh nama khatah a chuakhui a taheh atoning heh hnih tua la , taheh ka du caimang , canghrasala atoheh cawh na hmuh ly rua pawtah nokhai na cang myca .
42019043	Na carae sahlo tah nama tuh nápawtah raetuhnah ing ca sahso he ka , ca cadung he ka , a kawkih tah a ca dawkhai he ka , khunglai hmai na piathlah khylynah cai a phah tae a .
42019044	Nama le na hawkaw chung letei a ungpaw sahlo cawh alui letah aa ca nangpabai thlu he a . Khazing nama khatei a vongnah cai khah a hnih lypaw hratah na tuanah cawtah na chung letei alung sangkheh tei hmai palehly lytah aa seisaipaw ung a be , ” tatah a tah .
42019045	Mataico Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang a nae ka , hming a zua leimeipaw sahlo khah a tingchua he .
42019046	Aa hai leco , “ Capathai letah ma hrahei cia a cang , ‘ Ka ing cawh thlawchangnah ing tah a cang a , ’ canghrasala naaning taco , ‘ Mehru kua , ’ tah naa tua , ” a tah he .
42019047	Ning tating tah behnah ing leco cawngpah he ka , canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le zawpui hrong letei hruitu sahlo taco , Ama cawh thaw pawtah khua aa khang leimei thlang .
42019048	Cawngsaw vytei cawh a bia reipaw khah aa lung a cang tu thah cawtah zekhatamaw kaa tua a , tahpaw khah hnih khy bei he .
42020001	Ning kheh cawh Zisu tah zawpui khah behnah ingdung chung letah cawngpah he ka , thawngchawbia a ching leimeining he takhei , tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh macang sahlo khakhei Ama khatah a vong he ka ,
42020002	“ Ze nawhnuinah tamaw ma hming sahlo heh na tua ? Ma nawhnuinah heh ahomaw a ca pei ? Ma ching tua , ” tatah aa tah .
42020003	Zisu taco , “ Bia sangkheh ka ca hae tua hrá he a .
42020004	Johan tah baptisma pehnah naw a hnuipaw khah vaicung taitah maw , cawngsaw taitah maw ? ” tatah a palei he .
42020005	Reisia he ka , “ ‘ Khazing taitah , ’ tah my peh seh la , ‘ Zemaw Johan cawh naa zing be ? ’ a ma tah a .
42020006	Canghrasala , ‘ Cawngsaw taitah , ’ tah my peh seh la , zawpuipaw tahei alung tah aa ma vaseh a , zecawtamaw tatah aaning tahei Johan cawh Khazing khuavang a cang tah tlung he ka , ” aa tah .
42020007	Macawtaco , “ Ze taitah maw tahpaw hnih bei peh , ” tatah aa chai .
42020008	Zisu taco , “ Kama zong tah ma hming sahlo heh ze hapaw nawhnuiná tamaw ka tua tahpaw ca ching hrá bei neh , ” tatah a tah he .
42020009	Zisu taco ma tawchingnah bia heh zawpuipaw khah a ching he . “ Cawngsawpaw tah misur buichung tua ka , male khah hlei he ka , a sypui ry pawtah khua a tlong .
42020010	Hre cai a cang tihtah a sae pakheh khah ama a ting hangpaw pakhong pawtah ly a hlangpaw sahlo khaco a taw . Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco a sae cawh dai he ka , kih longpaw tah aa kawsah kaw .
42020011	A sae hringpaw khah taw kaw ka , canghrasala ma paw zong cawh dai he ka , ningzaw chuipaw tah tua he ka , zehmai peh lytah aa kawsah hrah .
42020012	A pathungnah a va taw vy tihtah ma paw zong cawh hmaw phosah he ka , khungthing lang aa vathlang .
42020013	Mataico misur buichung a hnuitupaw taco , ‘ Zekhatamaw ka tua a ? Ka dopaw ka sawcapaw heh ka taw a . Ama heh cawh aa cizaw phung thlang pui ta , ’ a tah .
42020014	Canghrasala ly a hlangpaw sahlo taco ama cawh aa hmuh tihtah , ‘ Ma cawngsaw heh ry cytu a cang , thé he peh ka , a ry a lah ná peh seh , ’ aa tah .
42020015	Macawtaco ama cawh misur buichung alailang khah piakhui he ka , aa thaw . Ma tih taco misur buichung a hnuitupaw takhei aaning sahlo cawh zekhatamaw a tua he a ?
42020016	Va seí ka , ly a hlangpaw sahlo khah thé he ka , misur buichung khah ahringpaw khah a hlei he a , ” a tah he . Ma bia cawh zawpui tah aa thui tihtah , “ Ma hraco cang thai by be ! ” aa tah .
42020017	Zisu tah aaning cawh mingpai he ka , “ A cang caco , Capathai letei aa ciapaw heh zemaw a silang a cang ? ‘ Ing a sahtu sahlo tei aa hlawhpaw alung cawh , a biapui caipaw alung tah a cang , ’ tahpaw heh .
42020018	Ahohmai ma alung cung letei a tlahpaw cawngsaw cawh kuichy thlu he ka , ma alung tei a tlahsopaw cawngsaw heh cawh a mang cici he a , ” a tah he .
42020019	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le tlangbui macang sahlo tah ma tawchingnah bia a reipaw cawh aaning a rei hnopaw he a cang takhah hnih he ka , Ama tle nápaw langpui khah aa hui . Canghrasala zawpui khah aa ci he .
42020020	Zisu cawh tai lytah ngia thlang he ka , mehding hratah a tua pakheipaw he cawngsaw a ngiatu sahlo khah aa taw he . Rom raang uhtu bui a hmingtuakhynah le a nawhnuinah chung letah Zisu khah aa hlai khy nápaw cawtah a reipaw bia khei Zisu khah tle pawtah a pachia he .
42020021	Macawtaco male a ngialaipaw sahlo tah Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu na reipaw le na cawngpahnah heh ahmangpaw cang ka , aho hme hmai ming lytah Khazing langpui khah biahmuisui a cang naning teitah na cawngpah he tahpaw kaa hni .
42020022	Macawtaco kaa cawtah Sizar letah ngungkhui peh heh ahmang maw hmang ly ? ” tatah aa tah .
42020023	Zisu tah a zia aa thaipaw khah hnih ka , aa hai leco ,
42020024	“ Denari tangka phae pa hmusah tua o . Aho lingthlaw le cakhai maw a cia ? ” tatah a tah .
42020025	Aaning taco , “ Sizar a lingthlaw le cakhai , ” tatah aa palei . Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Sizar a tei cawh Sizar pei la , Khazing a tei cawh Khazing pei my lo , ” a tah he .
42020026	Ma zawpui hme letei a reipaw bia lekhei a suanah cawh tle khy bei he . Taico a biachainah khah aa ningang ka , a de thlang he .
42020027	Mehthi thokawnah ung be a tahpaw Sadusi thaikheh cawh Zisu kha a vong he ka bia aa hae .
42020028	“ Cawngpahtu , Moses phungbia letah cawngsawpaw cawh sawtei sah lytah a nupui a thih sai caco , a unypaw takhei lahmeno cawh nupui tah chui kaw seh la , a thipaw caw takhei sawtei sah pápaw a cang , a tah .
42020029	Uikheh cawh uny pasarih a ung he . A uthui caipaw tah nupui chui ka , sawtei sah lytah a thi .
42020030	Mataico , a pahningnahpaw tah lahmeno cawh chui kaw ka , a thih sai hui .
42020031	A uny a pathungnah a cangpaw taco chui vy ka , a thih sai hrah . Aa pasarih co , ma canuno cawh chui cy he ka , sawteisah lytah a thi thlu he .
42020032	A hning cai tah ma canuno zong cawh a thi hrah .
42020033	Macawtaco thokawnah letah ma canuno cawh aho a nupui maw a cang a ? Aa pasarih tah ma canuno khah aa chui tlung , ” aa tah .
42020034	Zisu taco , “ Khazaw cawngsaw heh aa chui aa hae he .
42020035	Canghrasala , mehthi sahlo patho kaw a cang tihtah ma cai letei a ung tlang pawtei rawhpaw cawngsaw sahlo aa cai leco a chuihae cawh ung khaw a be .
42020036	Vaiming hratah cang he ka , thi khy khaw bei he . A thokawpaw sawtei sahlo aa cangnah cawtah aaning cawh Khazing sawtei a cang myca he .
42020037	Canghrasala chingbu me tei a kangpaw phungpaw lekhei Moses tahmai tah mehthi sahlo aa thokawpaw khah palang ka , Abuipaw cawh ‘ Abraham Khazing , Isak Khazing , Jakob Khazing ’ a cang a tah .
42020038	Ama cawh mehthi aa Khazing cang be , canghrasala mehring aa Khazing a cang . Zemaw tah pawco ma cawngsaw vytei cawh Khazing mehmuh letaco a hring he , ” tatah a palei he .
42020039	Phungbia cawngpahtu thaikheh tah , “ Cawngpahtu , bia na paleipaw he a chah caimang , ” tatah aa chai .
42020040	Taico ahotahmai bia hringpaw hae ngang khawh bei he .
42020041	Taico , Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Ze silang tamaw Khri cawh David pathlah aa tah ?
42020042	David ama ceingei tei a reipaw cawh , ‘ Abuipaw tah ka Buipaw cawh , na carae sahlo khah na phe rai letah ka chia hlai vytei he cawh , ka cacang lang letah a ty my lo a tah , ’ tatah a tahpaw khah Reithainah Hlaw cabu letah a cia .
42020043	
42020044	David tah Khri cawh , ‘ Abuipaw , ’ a tah tlung , zekhatamaw David a sawcapaw cawh a cang thai a ? ” a tah he .
42020045	Zawpuipaw tah aa nge thlang chung takhei Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh ,
42020046	“ Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khah a raering my lo . Aaning cawh a ngepaw angki a pasuapaw a hrei tah a khia lai du he ka , chodo tlaang lekhei cizaw hmotah bia a ching khah aa du hlui tah synagog letah a chaw caipaw dyching letah a ty du he ka , kawngchuanah letah achaw caipaw hminghmaw khah aa du .
42020047	Lahme sahlo aa ing khah chu he ka , male hmuh ruapaw tah thlaw a sypui tah aa chang . Ma hapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh a sah caipaw dangtahnah aa ing tae a , ” tatah a tah he .
42021001	Zisu cawh a kahui ka , mehrung sahlo tei behnah ing tholong thingkawng chunglang aa tholong aa thlah leimeipaw khah a hmuh .
42021002	Mehsisah lahmeno tei phaesai phaehning a thlah hrahpaw zong khah a hmuh .
42021003	“ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma mehsisah lahmeno tahei aho navy zong tah a hlu cai tholong a thlah .
42021004	Ma sahlo vytei tahei co aa hnuipaw a hluipaipaw chung taikhei aa peh . Canghrasala ma lahmeno tahei co a dongchia hmo tah a hringnah caw tei a hnuipaw vytei a peh thlu hi , ” a tah he .
42021005	A hningzuitu thaikheh taco behnah ing khah a hmui a ngepaw alung sahlo tah le Khazing letei hlaipaw cho le pe sahlo tei aa pasangpaw kong cawh aa rei leimei . Canghrasala Zisu tah ,
42021006	“ Ma lehei naa hmuhpaw vytei he alung phaekheh hmai heh palehly lypaw a ung lynah cai a va chuh tae a . Aa zongmingtei hei va hly thlu a cang tae he a , ” a tah he .
42021007	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Cawngpahtu , ma hming sahlo cawh zening tamaw a cang a ? Taico ze hapaw paching pakhanah maw a ung a ? ” tatah aa hae .
42021008	Zisu taco , “ Aho tahmai aa ca dungkhei ly nápaw he tah a raering my lo . Ka ming tah cawngsaw hlupui va chua he ka , ‘ Kama heh Ama cawh ka cang , cai a ne myca , ’ aa tah tae a . Ma sahlo cawh zui khe lo .
42021009	Raetuhnah le raang chung letah rae a dynah thongpang naa thui tihtah a pahly khe lo . Ma hming sahlo heh a tlung taw ruapaw a cang , canghrasala a changnah cang balang be , ” tatah a palei he .
42021010	Mataico aa hai letah , “ Raang kheh le raang kheh a dy a he ka , painah le painah a dy he a .
42021011	Aling a sah pui tah a hrui a , hming hlupui letah cakaang le ngae-y asawnah a tlung a . Mataico , cichuipaw hming sahlo le paching pakhanah a rungnawpaw sahlo avai taitah a lang a .
42021012	Canghrasala , ma vytei hlai tahei ca tle he ka , aa ca hrai he a . Synagog sahlo lang ca seikhui he ka , thong aa ca thla he a . Siangpahrang sahlo le uhtubui sahlo hme letah ca chuakhui he ka , ma vytei heh naa pa zuinah rawng tah a cang a .
42021013	Ma heh naa cawtah ka kong reinah caichaw a cang a .
42021014	Naaning a rungvai nápaw cawtah zekhatamaw bia kaa rei a tatah lung reithui tah naa ung ly nápawtah naa thinglung a pacy pacia my lo .
42021015	Naa carae ahohmai tah aa ca te khy ly nápaw he tah le aa ca ei khy ly nápaw he tah bia sahlo le singnah ka ca pae he a .
42021016	Naa no sahlo le naa paw sahlo , naa uny sahlo , naa sawny sahlo le naa huivesaw sahlo tahmai tah ca luithae a he ka , meh thaikheh cawh aa ca thaw he a .
42021017	Kama ka rawng tah cawngsaw vytei tah aa ca hua he a .
42021018	Canghrasala , naa lu cung letei sangbu bukheh hmai lyde a be .
42021019	Cy ky tah a daw la , hringnah naa cy a .
42021020	Raekeh sahlo tah Jerusalem khuapui aa cadungpaw naa hmuh tihtah a ry hlai tah a rawh a , tah cawh naa hni a .
42021021	Mataico Judia raang letei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tlaang cung lang sai he seh la , khuapui leteipaw sahlo cawh pia he seh . Taico khuapui alailang leteipaw sahlo cawh khuapui chunglang a nae kheh he seh .
42021022	Ma heh cawh dangtah nápaw cai , Khazing bia letei a ciasipaw vytei a tling nápaw khah a cang .
42021023	Ma ning cawh sawtei a phopaw canu sahlo le nysai a tlepaw no sahlo aa caw taco zetlua tamaw ningping a chui a ! Raang chung letah rorangnah alaipaw pui tlung ka , Khazing thingaenah tah ma mingphing heh a carae he a .
42021024	Aaning cawh zyzi tah thaw cang he ka , thaikheh cawh raang ting letah sae tah seikhui a cang he a . Khazing tah Gental cawngsaw sahlo cawtah a pachiapaw cai a tlingnah tai Jerusalem cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo taco aa phe tah aa tlaichai a .
42021025	Ning , thlawpaw le esi sahlo letah paching pakhanah a ung he a . Rili tuileh a thopaw le a pyraw rawng tah aluicung raang sahlo cawh thlawzawng le ningping tah a ung he a .
42021026	Khazaw letei hming a va tlung lepaw khah aa hninah cawtah le avai hmingtuakhynah sahlo zong cahneh aa cang a cawtah mehnung cawh ci tu he ka , a cathing he a .
42021027	Ma cai leco aaning tah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw khah hmingtuakhynah le rungnawnah khatah meding hrong letah a vongpaw khah aa hmuh a .
42021028	Ma hming sahlo cang hrang a pathoning tahei a daw la , a huichy my lo , zecawtamaw tatah naaning tlang nápaw cai cawh a ne myca , ” tatah a tah he .
42021029	Ma khy taico Zisu tah aaning cawh ma tawchingnah bia heh a ching he . “ Ma thuiku kung le thingkung ahringpaw vytei sahlo heh mingtua hmai o !
42021030	A chawng a ka thopaw naa hmuh tihtah nipui ning a ne myca tahpaw naa hni .
42021031	Ma hraco ma hming sahlo heh a cang leimeipaw naa hmuh tihtah Khazing painah raang cawh a ne myca tah hnih my lo .
42021032	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ma hming vytei heh a tlung hlai vytei cawh atochai cawngsaw sahlo heh thi thlu balang bei he .
42021033	Alui le avai cawh a rawh a , canghrasala ka bia cawh a rawh by a be .
42021034	A raering my lo , ma tei a cang ly caco a nawngsenah , zu ruinah le tungtuh khuasahnah lungreithuinah takhei ca nai a he ka , ma ning takhei ahui hratah rawh ly pui tah a ca o pang he a .
42021035	Ma ning cawh aluicung pungpaluh letei a ungpaw cawngsaw vytei cung letah a tlung a .
42021036	A va chuh lepaw vytei taitah naa lua khy nápawtah le Cawngsaw Sawcapaw hme letah na daw pacy khy nápaw he ceh tah a mai pacia tah ung paria thlang la , thlawchang my lo , ” a tah he .
42021037	Ning tating tah Zisu taco behnah ing letah cawngpah he ka , zailang maikaw cawh Oliv tlaang aa tahpaw letah zai hmang rua pawtah a piathlah tei .
42021038	Taico ming vytei cawh a bia nge rua pawtah mongdi tah behnah ing leco a va chuh tei he .
42022001	Raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah le Khungsai Panawnah aa tahpaw a ne myca ka ,
42022002	tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo tah Zisu thaw khy nápaw lang le si khah aparuh teitah aa hui , zecawtamaw tatah zawpuipaw khah aa ci he .
42022003	Mataico , a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Iskariot aa tahpaw Judas chung letah Setan cawh a nae .
42022004	Taico Judas cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a mingkaitu abui sahlo khatah sei ka , zekhatamaw Zisu a luithae a tahpaw kong khah aa reisia .
42022005	Aa thawchah ngetei ka , tangka peh rua pawtah aa naw a tlah .
42022006	Judas zong cawh a lungtling ka , zawpui aa ung ly kaa tah aa kih letah Zisu hlai khy nápaw caichaw khah a haw thlang .
42022007	Mataico Khungsai Panawnah cawtah tuu teitei tah thuihlainah ning a cangpaw raangri phi lypaw Very Panawnah ning cawh a va phah .
42022008	Zisu tah Piter le Johan cawh taw he ka , “ Sei la , kaa cawtah Khungsai Panawnah zairia enah cawh va pachia tua o , ” a tah he .
42022009	Aaning taco , “ Zeletamaw va pachia he seh tah na du ? ” tatah hae he ka ,
42022010	Zisu taco , “ Khuapui chung a va nae la , beirai tah tui a cui laipaw capaw pakheh tah a ca tong he a . Ama a naenah ing lang va zui he ceh ka ,
42022011	ing a hnuitupaw khah , ‘ Cawngpahtu tah ka hningzuitu sahlo khatah Khungsai Panawnah zairia ka e nápaw mehlai khang zeletamaw a ung , a tah , ’ tatah naa hae a .
42022012	Ama taco a cung khang a kypaw pui , tingtua cia tei a cangpaw khah a ca hmuh sá he a . Ma leco va pachia my lo , ” tatah a palei he .
42022013	Piter le Johan cawh seithlah he ka , Zisu tah a chingpaw he hrakhei hming sahlo cawh aa va hmuh . Ma leco Khungsai Panawnah zairia cawh aa pachia .
42022014	A cai a va tling tihtah Zisu le Ama apostol sahlo taco cabuai cawh aa cadung .
42022015	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Kama cawh ruhanah ka ing hlai tahei naaning khatah ma Khungsai Panawnah zairia e hrui heh ka du ngetei .
42022016	Macawtaco ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang letah ma Khungsai Panawnah tlingnah cai a tlung hlai vytei ma zaibatui heh e kaw khaw bei neh , ” tatah a tah he .
42022017	Taico ny khah law ka , Khazing letah alawngnah bia hlai ka , “ Ma misurhang ny heh law la , a hlai pachaw my lo .
42022018	Ka ca ching he , Khazing painah raang a va chuanah tai ma misurhang heh ding kaw khaw bei neh , ” tatah a tah he .
42022019	Taico very cawh law ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka , aaning cawh pei he ka , “ Ma heh naa cawtah ka pehpaw ka pung cawh a cang hi . Kama monghly ly nápawtah tua tei my lo , ” a tah he .
42022020	Ma hraco zairia aa e khy taitah ny cawh law ka , “ Ma ny heh naa caw tei a laipaw , ka thisai tei tuapaw biahrai thapaw cawh a cang .
42022021	Kama a pa lui a paw cawngsawpaw cawh ma lehei kama khatah cabuai letah a ung .
42022022	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh Khazing bia thlia ciapaw hratah a thi a . Ma duitei cawh Ama a luipaw cawngsaw cawh a cing a ping , ” tatah a tah he .
42022023	Aaning le aaning cawh ahomaw ma hming heh a tua a , tatah aa hae he .
42022024	Aaning hrong letah ahomaw alaicai a , tahpaw bia a einah zong khah aa hrong letah a chuh .
42022025	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo cung letei abui sahlo cawh a buisah ngetei he ka , aa nawhnuinah aa hmangpaw cawh , ‘ A ca bawngtu ka cang he peh , ’ tatah aaning le aaning a tah he .
42022026	Canghrasala naaning cawh aaning hratah ung khe lo ! Naa hrong letei alaicaipaw cawh a chia caipaw hratah ung hri seh la , uhtu a cangpaw taco sae hratah ung hri seh .
42022027	Ahomaw alai vy ? Cabuai letei a typaw maw batui a peitu maw ? Cabuai letei a typaw cawh lai vy bei maw ? Canghrasala kama cawh male rai hrepah tu pakheh hratah naa hrong letah ka ung hi .
42022028	Naaning cawh hanah ka ingpaw vytei letah a pa dawkhuitu na cang he ceh .
42022029	Taico ka paw tah painah raang a pa pehpaw hratah naaning khah ca pei hrá he neh ka ,
42022030	macawtaco ka painah raang letei ka cabuai letah e he ceh ka , naa ding a . Abui dyching letah a ty he ceh ka , Israel phinghraw hluihning khah bia naa ce he a .
42022031	Simon , Simon , lythlopaw tah sacang a vangpaw hratah Setan tah naaning khah hnehsah a pawtah nawhnuinah hmuh a du my ca .
42022032	Canghrasala Simon , na zingnah cawh a po ly nápawtah na cawtah thlaw ka chang thah . Taico kama lang na va hui kaw tihtah na uny sahlo khah thawzaang pei my lo , ” a tah .
42022033	Canghrasala Piter taco , “ Abuipaw , nama khatah thongtlá tah thihnah tai ka mai thlang , ” tatah a palei .
42022034	Zisu taco , “ Ka ca ching , Piter , atoning aa a khawng hlai tahei na pa hninah lehei uithung tai na pa paphahsai a , ” tatah a chai .
42022035	Mataico , Zisu tah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Tangka ly , sahre lytah le phepakong lytah ka ca taw tih he tah ze na phahlahnah he ceh a ung maw ? ” tatah a hae he . Aaning sahlo taco , “ Ung be , ” tatah aa tah .
42022036	Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Canghrasala atoheh cawh tangka naa hnui caco a kai la , sahre zong a kai la , taico zyzi naa hnui ly caco naa angki pasuapaw khah zua la , co my lo .
42022037	Ma hrahei Capathai letah ciapaw a cang , ‘ Taico ama cawh hmingsua a tuapaw sahlo khatah reipai a cang a . ’ Ma heh kama letah a tling ruapaw a cang tah ka ca ching he . A cang , ka kong a ciapaw heh a tlingnah cai a phah leimei myca , ” a tah he .
42022038	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , “ Abuipaw , mingtua , zyzi sanghning a ung thlang hi , ” tatah aa tah . Zisu taco , “ A zaw seh , ” tatah a palei he .
42022039	Zisu cawh a tua teipaw hrakhei Oliv tlaang lang cawh sei ka , a hningzuitu sahlo tah Ama cawh aa zui .
42022040	A hminghmaw cawh aa phah tihtah aa hai leco , “ Tuhsonah chung lang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo , ” a tah he .
42022041	Ama cawh aaning khah a cawngpe va long he ka , a khuh panai ka , thlaw a chang .
42022042	“ Vy Ka paw , na naw a tlah pawtei a cang caco ma tai-ingnah ny heh kama taitah law hly thlang . Canghrasala kama ka dunah hratah cang lytah nama na dunah hratah cang ky seh , ” a tah .
42022043	Vaicung taitah vaiming pakheh cawh ama kha a za paly ka , thawzaang a peh .
42022044	Taico a lung rei a thui tunah cawtah khei lungsaw chingching tah thlawchang vy hui ka , a mathlai cawh thi di hratah alui letah a tlah .
42022045	A thlawchangnah taitah tho ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei a vaw kaw tihtah aa ihningpaw khah hmuh ka , ngechia tah aa ung cawtah aa thaw a chang .
42022046	“ Zemaw naa ihning thlang ? Tho la , tuhsonah chunglang naa tlah ly nápawtah thlawchang my lo , ” tatah aaning cawh a tah he .
42022047	Ma hratei a rei leimeining taco cawngsaw rungpui va chuh he ka , aaning sahlo cawh a hningzuitu hluihning letei pakheh a cangpaw Judas aa tahpaw takhei a va seikhui he . Zisu cawh hnang rua pawtah khei a va ne .
42022048	Canghrasala Zisu tah ama cawh , “ Judas , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh hnang ceh ka maw , na luithae a ? ” tatah a tah .
42022049	Zisu a hningzuitu sahlo tah , hming a cang leimeipaw khah aa hmuh tihtah , “ Abuipaw , kaa zyzi hei kaa tuh a he maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
42022050	Taico aa hrong letei pakhehpaw tah tlangbui alaicaipaw a sae capaw khah tuh ka , a cacang lang tei a naw khah a pathai thlah .
42022051	Canghrasala Zisu tah , “ Ma khah a zaw myca , ” tatah a tah . Taico cawngsawpaw a naw khah tong ka , a dangsah .
42022052	Mataico Zisu tah Ama a va seihnopaw tlangbui macang sahlo le behnah ing a congpaw sahlo aa bui sahlo le macang sahlo he khah , “ Zyzi le thingtai kha naa va seipaw heh kama cawh rae a thopaw he hotu tamaw ka cang ?
42022053	Ning tating tah naaning kha behnah ing letah ung tei neh ka , ka cung letah naa kih naa thlah tlung be . Canghrasala ato cai heh cawh muinah tei a uhpaw naaning naa cai a cang , ” a tah he .
42022054	Mataico Zisu cawh tle he ka , seikhui longmang he ka , tlangbui alaicaipaw a ing chunglang taikhah a naekhui he . Piter tah langhlaw pui khei a zuilai .
42022055	Canghrasala inghme a le lekhei me tua he ka , me a ai tah a ty cadungnah pawhe lekhei Piter cawh aaning sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a ty hrah .
42022056	Saecanu pakheh tah Piter ma letei a typaw khah a hmuh . Ma no taco ama cawh va mingchai ka , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang , ” a tah .
42022057	Canghrasala ma cawh a paphah ka , “ Cawngsawno , Ama heh hnih bei neh , ” tatah a tah .
42022058	A cawngpe ung ka pakhehpaw tah Ama cawh hmuh ka , “ Nama zong aa hrong letei pakheh na cang , ” a tah . Piter taco , “ Cang bei neh , ” tatah a palei .
42022059	Suimehlang pakheh tluh lekhei ahringpaw pakheh tah , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh Galili cawngsaw a cangnah cawtah hei Zisu kha a ungpaw a cang hrahring , ” a tah .
42022060	Piter taco , “ Na rei leimeipaw kong heh hnih bei neh , ” tatah a palei . Ma hratei a tah leimeining taco aa cawh a khawng .
42022061	Abuipaw cawh Piter lang cawh a hui ka , a va ming . Taico Piter cawh Abuipaw tei a hai letei a reipaw , “ Atoning heh aa a khawng hlai tah uithung na pa paphah sai a , ” a tahpaw khah a thui kaw .
42022062	Taico alailang piathlah ka , o tlili tah a cah .
42022063	Zisu cawh a congpaw raevai sahlo takhei pasipasa he ka , aa cabai .
42022064	Aaning sahlo taco a meh pamai he ka , “ Ma ching tua , nama Khazing khuavang ! Ahomaw a ca tuh ? ” aa tah .
42022065	Taico ma sahlo taco Ama cawh aisainah bia a hlupui tah aa tah .
42022066	Khua hme a se cangkawleh biacetu macang a cangpaw sahlo cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo khakhei hmingkheh tah a tong he ka , Zisu cawh aa hme lekhei aa va chuakhui .
42022067	“ Khri cawh na cang maw ? Ma ching tua , ” aa tah . Zisu tah , “ Ka ca ching zong he tah pa zing bei ceh .
42022068	Ka ca hae zong he tah pachai bei ceh .
42022069	Canghrasala ma taihei co , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh Cungnungcai Khazing a cacang lang letah a ty myca a , ” tatah a chai he .
42022070	Aa zongmingtei co , “ Khazing Sawcapaw cawh na cang maw ? ” tatah aa hae . Zisu taco , “ Khazing Sawcapaw na cang tatei naa reipaw cawh ahmang , ” tatah a palei he .
42022071	Mataico aaning taco , “ Ze hringpaw biahninah maw kaa hia khawh ? Ama a hmo taitah ma bia kaa thui thah taico , ” tatah aa tah .
42023001	Mataico a pahmopaw vytei cawh tho he ka , Zisu cawh raang uhbui Pilat khatah aa seikhui .
42023002	Taico , Ama cawh sua pu he ka , “ Ma paw tahei kaa mingphing a pingpaly tah a hruipaw he kaa hmuh . Ama tahei Sizar khatah ngungkhui pei khe law tah ka , Khri a cangpaw siangpahrang ka cang a tah , ” tatah aa tah .
42023003	Macawtaco Pilat tah Zisu cawh , “ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang cawh na cang maw ? ” tatah a hae . “ A cang , na reipaw hraco a cang , ” tatah Zisu tah a palei .
42023004	Mataico , Pilat tah tlangbui macang sahlo le zawpuipaw cawh , “ Ma paw sua pho rua pawtah hei a chahlynah zehmai hmuh bei neh , ” tatah a thang he .
42023005	Canghrasala aaning sahlo taco , “ Ama tahei Judia raang pungpaluh letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh a cawngpah ná tah hnahnawhnah a chuasah . Galili taitah a patho ka , ma tai heh a va phahpaw a cang , ” tatah thaw tah aa rei .
42023006	Ma cawh a thui tihtah Pilat taco , “ Ma paw heh Galili cawngsaw maw a cang ? ” a tah he .
42023007	Zisu cawh Herod a uhnah rai letei a ungpaw Galili raang cawngsaw a cang tahpaw khah Pilat tah a hni tihtah ma ningcai letei Jerusalem letah a ung thlangpaw Herod khakhei a seisah khui he .
42023008	Herod tah Zisu a hmuh tihtah a lung a lawng ngetei , zecawtamaw tatah cai sypui hmuh a za du ngetei cawtah a cang . Zisu a thong khah a za thui teinah cawtah ningang chuipaw hming sahlo a tuapaw khah ka hmuh myca a , tatah a hnabei a sui .
42023009	Bia a hlupui hae cakhia ka , canghrasala Zisu tah zehmai chai be .
42023010	Tlangbui macang le phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo cawh ma leco a daw thlang hrah he ka , Zisu cawh a sah pui tah sua aa pu leimei .
42023011	Mataico , Herod le a raekeh sahlo tah Zisu cawh hnuiso he ka , aa pasi aa pasa . Pai achaw ngeteipaw a buhsah he ka , Pilat khatah aa seisah kaw .
42023012	Ma ning taico Pilat le Herod cawh huivesaw a cang he . Ma hlai taco a za carae tei he .
42023013	Pilat tah tlangbui macang sahlo le uhtu sahlo le zawpuipaw khah y pahmo he ka ,
42023014	aa hai letah , “ Ma paw heh zawpui khah carae tah a thosah he tatei kama kha naa va chuakhuipaw khah a cang . Ama heh naa hmekaw letah haecakhia neh ka , reipachia tei sua naa pupaw heh a dongkhang be tatah ka hmuh .
42023015	Herod zong tah , a suanah hmuh be ca ka , kaaning kha a va ma kua kawpaw a cang . Naa hmuh thlangpaw hratah thih tlang a tlahpaw hming zehmai tua be .
42023016	Macawtaco chei sá he neh ka , mataico ka thlaw a , ” tatah a tah he .
42023017	Khungsai Panawnah ning maikaw letah Pilat tah thong a tlahpaw chung taitah pakheh khah a thlaw hrahring ruapaw a cang .
42023018	Zawpui sahlo cawh hmokheh tah y hrui he ka , “ Ama cawh theh thlang la , Baraba khah ma thlawpah hri , ” tatah aa tah .
42023019	Baraba cawh khuapui chung letah rae a tho sahpaw a cang rawng tah le lee a nongpaw rawng tah thong a tlahpaw a cang .
42023020	Pilat tah Zisu cawh thlaw a dunah cawtah khei aaning cawh a hae hry he .
42023021	Canghrasala aaning taco , “ Khraws letah khaipai ! Khraws letah khaipai ! ” tatah a y vy tima he .
42023022	A uithungnah leco aaning cawh , “ Ze rawng tamaw ? Ma paw tahei ze suanah ky maw a tua ? Thihnah tai dangtá pawtah a panah zehmai hmuh bei neh . Macawtaco chei sá he neh ka , ka thlaw a , ” tatah a tah he .
42023023	Canghrasala , Ama cawh khraws letah khaipai tatah tai lytah a thangpui tah y he ka , aa ypaw takhei Pilat khah a pahnei .
42023024	Macawtaco Pilat tah aa haepaw khah peh a pawtah bia a chaw .
42023025	Pilat taco hnahnawhnah le lenongnah rawng tei thong a tlahpaw , aa haepaw Baraba khah thlaw ka , aa dunah hrakhei tua rua pawtah Zisu cawh a hlai he .
42023026	Zisu cawh raekeh sahlo tah seikhui he ka , langpui letah khuatei lang tah khua a va tlongpaw Sairin khuapaw Simon khah tle he ka , khraws cawh a cung lekhei khing he ka , Zisu hninglang khei aa puhsah lai .
42023027	Cawngsaw a rungpui takhei pazui he ka , a cawtah a ngechia katei , a cahpaw canu sahlo zong a ung hrah he .
42023028	Zisu tah a paleh ka aa hai leco , “ Jerusalem sawcanu sahlo pa cawkhui khe o , naaning naa cawtah le naa sawtei leh cawtah cah hri my lo ,
42023029	zemaw tah pawco , ‘ A cingpaw canu sahlo , sawtei a pho bang lypaw chi le meimei zai bang lypaw hnabae sahlo cawh bonghnang a tingpaw a cang he , ’ tatah naa tah nápaw cai a va chuh a !
42023030	Mataico , ‘ aaning sahlo tah tlaang sahlo cawh , “ Ma tlahso law , ” tah he ka , tlangby sahlo khah , “ Ma vuh law , ” aa tah he a . ’
42023031	Ma hming sahlo heh cawngsaw tah thingkung a hring thlang ningtah hmai aa tua caco , thingkung a ro tihtah co zemaw aa tua chichi a ? ” a tah he .
42023032	Ahringpaw cawngsaw pahning , mehsua va vei khah Zisu khatah thaw hrui rua pawtah aa seikhui hrah he .
42023033	Luru hming aa tahpaw hminghmaw aa va phah tih taco , ma leco Ama cawh damia sahlo khakhei pakheh khah a cacang lang letah pakheh khah a cavui lang letah aa khaipai he .
42023034	Zisu taco , “ Apaw , ngethai my lo , aa tua leimeipaw heh aa hnilynah cawtah hei , ” tatah a tah . Taico raekeh sahlo taco basung phe he ka , a chaichi cawh a chaichy he .
42023035	Zawpuipaw cawh ma lekhei a daw he ka , ming thlang he ka , uhtu sahlo tahmai tah aa hnuiso . “ Cawngsaw ahringpaw cawh pachah he ka , Khazing a thingpaw , Khri a cang hmuisui caco , ato heh ama le ama cawh a pachah seh , ” tatah aa tah .
42023036	Raekeh sahlo zong taco a vong he ka , Ama cawh pasipasa he ka , misur zu a thobahlapaw khah aa hlai .
42023037	“ Juda cawngsaw aa siangpahrang na cang caco nama le nama a pachah ca , ” tatah aa tah .
42023038	A lu cung letei ca a ciapaw cawh , “ MA HEH JUDA CAWNGSAW AA SIANGPAHRANG A CANG , ” tah heh a cang .
42023039	Ma letei aa pathle hrahpaw suanah a tuapaw pakhehpaw taco Ama cawh naisui hmo khei , “ Khri cawh cang bei ceh maw ? Nama a pachah la , kaaning zong ma pachah hrah tua ! ” tatah a tah .
42023040	Canghrasala , mehsua ahringpaw pakheh taco raw ka , “ Khazing hmai heh ci bei ceh maw ? Ama khatah a lopaw tah hreh na cangpaw heh !
42023041	Kaaning cawh hreh tlang ka cang peh , kaa tuasanah khatah a tlahpaw kaa hmuh hi . Canghrasala ma cawngsaw heh cawh suanah zehmai tua be hi , ” tatah a tah .
42023042	Mataico ama taco , “ Zisu , na painah raang na phah tihtah a pa thui thlang my lo , ” tatah a tah .
42023043	Zisu taco ma cawngsawpaw cawh , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , kama khatah Paradis letah atoning na ung hra a , ” tatah a chai .
42023044	Ningching suimehlang hluihning hrong taitah zailang suimehlang pathung tai raang pungpaluh letah muinah a tlung ,
42023045	zecawtamaw tatah ning a khainah khah a calinah cawtah a cang . Taico , behnah ing letei pai pazypaw cawh pehning tah a hria chy .
42023046	Zisu tah a thangpui tah , “ Apaw , nama khatah ka thlawpaw ka chia , ” tatah a y . Ma hraco a rei khy cangkawleh cawh a hu a ceh chung .
42023047	Ma cawh raekeh zakheh buipaw tah a hmuh tihtah Khazing cawh reithai ka , “ Ma cawngsaw heh mehding a cang hrahring thlang , ” tatah a tah .
42023048	Ma hming ungzia hnikhui rua pawtei a pahmopaw cawngsaw vytei tah ma hming khah aa hmuh tihtah ngechia tah aa cacanghnaw a cung he ka , a seihly thlu he .
42023049	Canghrasala , Galili raang tai tei a va zuipaw canu sahlo reipai tah Ama a hnihpaw vytei taco a langpa khei a daw he ka , ma hming sahlo cawh aa cai thlang .
42023050	Ma leco Juda khongsil chung letah a taepaw mehchaw mehding a cangpaw Josef aa tahpaw ung ka ,
42023051	bia aa thliapaw le rai aa hrepaw cung letah a nawtlah beh . Ama cawh Judia raang , Arimathea khua taitah a vongpaw cang ka , Khazing painah raang a va tlungpaw a heh thlangpaw a cang .
42023052	Pilat khaco va sei ka , Zisu a rawh cawh a va hae .
42023053	Mataico a rawh cawh khraws taitah lawthlah ka , paithladih anaipaw tah pahlong ka , alung kho aa ruipaw thlai thapaw ahohmai aa phung bang lynah pawhe lekhei a isah .
42023054	Ma cawh ningpangaw ning Sabat ning cawtah pachianah ning cang ka , Sabat ning cawh a patho daimang tei .
42023055	Galili taitah Zisu khatei a va seipaw he canu sahlo takhei Josef cawh zui he ka , athlai le a chung letei rawh cawh zekhatamaw aa isah tahpaw khah aa hmuh .
42023056	Mataico aaning cawh ing lang a dih he ka , a rawh cawtah ringthopaw sahlo le zihmui ringthopaw aa pachia . Canghrasala phungbia aa zuinah cawtah khei Sabat ning leco a hia he .
42024001	Zaa kheh letei ning hmetaw caipaw mongdi letaco canu sahlo cawh aa pachiapaw sathy ringthopaw sahlo khah a tle he ka , thlai lang cawh aa va sei .
42024002	Aaning sahlo taco thlai taitah alung a hneihlypaw cawh aa hmuh ,
42024003	canghrasala a chunglang a nae tih he tah Abuipaw Zisu a rawh cawh hmuh bei he .
42024004	Ma leco lunghnahnawh tah aa ung thlang ning takhei , sungkheh teitah cawngsaw pahning , aa caise lailaw hratei a khai thai ngetei pawhe khah aa kae letah a va daw he .
42024005	Canu sahlo cawh aa ci cawtah khei alui lang a bung he ka , canghrasala capaw pahning taco , “ Zecawtamaw mehthi hrong letah mehring cawh naa hui ?
42024006	Ama cawh ma lehei ung khawh be , a thokaw thah ! Galili raang letah naaning khatah a ungning tei a ca chingpaw he khah a thui thlang bei he ceh maw ?
42024007	‘ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh mehsua sahlo kih letah peh a cang a , khraws letah khaipai he ka , ningthung ning letah a thokaw a , ’ a tahpaw khah , ” aa tah he .
42024008	Mataico canu sahlo taco Zisu a bia khah a thui kaw he .
42024009	Thlai lang tah a va dih kaw he ka , ma hming vytei khah a hningzuitu hluikhehpaw le ahringpaw sahlo cawh aa ching he .
42024010	Aaning sahlo cawh Mari Makdalin , Joana , Jeims a no Mari le aaning khatei a ungpaw ahringpaw , ma kong apostol sahlo a chingpaw he khah a cang he .
42024011	Canghrasala , aaning sahlo taco canu sahlo tei aa reipaw cawh bia tah sah be ca he ka , zing bei he .
42024012	Ma duitei cawh Piter suipaw cawh tho ka , thlai lang khah a va sai . A bung ka , ming ka , thlai chung letei Zisu aa pahlongnahpaw paithladih cy khah a hmuh . Taico seithlah ka , hming a cangnah silang kong cawh a khuarawh a haa ngetei .
42024013	Ma ning lilaw leco Zisu a hningzuitu letah pahning cawh Jerusalem taitah khang sarih tluh a hlahpaw Emau khua lang cawh a sei he .
42024014	Aaning cawh pakheh le pakheh khah a cangpaw hming vytei kong khah aa reihrui lai .
42024015	Ma hming sahlo kong cawh reilai he katei , bia a rawh laining he takhei , Zisu cawh va chuh ka , aaning khaco a sei hrah ,
42024016	canghrasala aa bi khy nápawtah pakhang a cang he .
42024017	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Naa seipai tah ze bia maw na rawh lai he ceh ? ” tatah a tah he . Aaning cawh a daw he ka , aa hme a chia thlang .
42024018	Aa hrong letei pakhehpaw Kleopa aa tahpaw taco Zisu cawh , “ Jerusalem khuapui a va tlongpaw letah nama cy heh ato cai letei hming a cangpaw sahlo heh a hnih lypaw cang ceh maw ? ” tatah a tah .
42024019	Zisu taco , “ Zehming maw ? ” tatah a hae . “ Nazaret Zisu kong samaw , ” tatah a palei . “ Ama cawh Khazing khuavang pakheh cang ka , ming hme le Khazing hme lekhei bia le tuanah letah hming tuakhynah a hnui .
42024020	Tlangbui macang sahlo le a ma uhtu sahlo tah thaw rua pawtah nawhnuitu sahlo khatah bia pei he ka , khraws letah aa khaipai .
42024021	Canghrasala Ama cawh Israel mingphing a tlang ruapaw he pakheh a cang , tatah kaa hnabei a suipaw khah a cang . Ma hlui co ma hratei hming a cangnah heh atoheh a ningthungnah a cang myca .
42024022	Ma hlui co , kaa phu chung taitah canu thaikheh sahlo tah kaa ning aa ma angsah . Ato zamong mongdi khei thlai lang va sei he ka ,
42024023	canghrasala a rawh hmuh bei he . Kaaning khatah a vong he ka , Zisu cawh a hring thlang tatah a reipaw he vaiming sahlo a palypaw he khah kaa hmuh tatah aa ma ching .
42024024	Mataico kaa vesaw thaikhehpaw tah thlai lang va sei he ka , canu sahlo tei aa reipaw hrakhei aa va hmuh , canghrasala ama cawh hmuh bei he , ” aa tah .
42024025	Zisu taco aaning cawh , “ Na hruh caimang he ceh , Khazing khuavang sahlo tei aa za rei ciapaw vytei zing nápawtah naa lungthing a ku a chaw caimang !
42024026	Khri tah ma hming sahlo heh a tai-ing ceingeipaw cang ka , taico a rungnawnah lang a naepaw cang bei maw ? ” a tah he .
42024027	Aaning cawh Moses le Khazing khuavang sahlo vytei tei Ama a kong Capathai letei aa reipaw naning tei hrakhei a chingpase he .
42024028	Aa va sei nápaw khua khah aa va phah daimang tihtah Zisu cawh langhlaw vy lang a sei ruapaw hrakhei a tua .
42024029	Canghrasala aaning taco , “ Kaaning kha a reh thlang . Zailang cang ca ka , ning a tlah daimang myca hi ! ” tatah hmuisui teitah aa thly . Macawtaco aaning khaco ria rua pawtah a sei .
42024030	Aaning sahlo kha cabuai letah a ty thlangning tah very cawh law ka , alawngnah bia a hlai khy taitah kychy ka , aaning cawh a peh he .
42024031	Taico Zisu hni khynah cawh peh cang he ka , ama cawh aa bi . Taico , ama cawh aa mehmuhnah taitah a ly thah .
42024032	Pakheh le pakheh cawh , “ Langpui letei kaaning kha bia reilai katei , Capathai a ma ching pase laining takhei kaa chung letah kaa lungthing khah me kangpaw hratah cang bei maw kha ? ” a tah he .
42024033	Sungkheh tah tho he ka , Jerusalem lang cawh aa kawkaw . Ma leco a hningzuitu hluikheh le aaning khatah a ungpaw sahlo he a za pahmo thlang he katei ,
42024034	“ Ma heh ahmangpaw a cang ! Abuipaw cawh thokaw ka , Simon khatah a paly , ” tatah a za rei leimeipaw he khah aa hmuh he .
42024035	Mataico , ma tlaw pahning taco langpui letei hming a cangpaw le very a kychy ning tei Zisu aa binah kong khah aa ching he .
42024036	Ma bia aa rei chung vytei cawh Zisu cawh aa hrong letah a daw thlang ka , aaning sahlo cawh , “ Naaning khatah thlawlungnah ung ky seh , ” a tah he .
42024037	Aaning sahlo cawh a pahly he ka , aa ci ngetei . Athlaw kaa hmuh tatah aa rawh .
42024038	Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh , “ Zecawtamaw naa lung reithui ka , lung langlo tah naa ung ?
42024039	Ka kih le ka phe heh mingtua hmai o , kama pui ka cang caw ! Pa tong la , naa hni thlang a . Athlaw taco ka hnuipaw , naa hmuhpaw hapaw ru le ngaisaw cawh a hnui tlung be ! ” tatah a tah he .
42024040	Ma bia a rei khy taikhei a kih le a phe cawh a hmuhsah he .
42024041	Aa khuarawh a haa tu cawtah le aa lung a lawng tu cawtah khei zing khy thly be ca he ka , “ Ma lehei epaw naa hnuipaw a ung maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
42024042	Aaning taco ama cawh aa pakang ciapaw ngawsaw vy kheh khah pei he ka ,
42024043	ma ngaw cawh law ka , aa hmekaw leco a e .
42024044	Aa hai leco , “ Naaning khatah ka ung ning takhei ma heh ka ca chingpaw he khah a cang . Moses phungbia cabu le Khazing khuavang sahlo aa cabu le Reithainah Hlaw cabu chung letei Kama ka kong ciapaw vytei cawh patling a cang tae he a , ” tatah a tah he .
42024045	Mataico Khazing Capathai sahlo aa thui khy nápawtah aa thinglung ning a pavang he .
42024046	Aa hai leco , “ Ma heh Capathai letah ciapaw cawh a cang . Khri cawh reithui sisaw ing ka , ningthung ning tah thihnah taitah a tho kaw a ,
42024047	taico , Ama a ming tah angepachihnah le sua ngethainah kong cawh Jerusalem taitah patho he ka , mingphing vytei khatah rei a cang tae a .
42024048	Naaning sahlo cawh ma hming sahlo heh a hnikhuitu na cang he ceh .
42024049	Ka paw tei bia a kang ciapaw khah naaning khatah ka za taw a , canghrasala hmingtuakhynah vaicung taitah naa hmuh hlai vytei cawh Jerusalem khuapui chung lekhei ung thlang my lo , ” a tah he .
42024050	Aaning sahlo cawh Zisu tah piathlah khui he ka , Bethani khua kae aa phah tihtah a kih pazy ka , bonghnang a song he .
42024051	Bonghnang a song leimei ning he taco , aaning sahlo cawh seisai he ka , vaicung lang lah chy tah a cang .
42024052	Mataico aaning sahlo taco Ama cawh beh he ka , a lawng ngetei tah Jerusalem lang cawh aa kawkaw .
42024053	Taico , Khazing reithai hmo khei behnah ing leco aa ung thlang tei .
43001001	Ahrangthonah letah bia a ung . Ma bia cawh Khazing khatah a ung ; Bia cawh Khazing a cang .
43001002	Ahrangthonah taitah Khazing khatah a ung .
43001003	Ama taco zezong vytei heh a tua , tuapaw hming vytei heh Ama tah a tua lypaw zehmai ung be .
43001004	Ama letaco hringnah a ung . Ma hringnah cawh cawngsaw vytei khainah a cang .
43001005	Akhaipaw cawh a muinah hrong letah va khai ka , muinah taco ma cawh pahnei be .
43001006	Cawngsaw pakheh Khazing tei a tawpaw ung ka , a ming cawh Johan a cang .
43001007	Khainah kong khah hni sá pawtah le reilai rua pawtah a va chua , ming vytei tah Ama a thongtah aa zing khy nápawtah .
43001008	Ama cawh akhaipaw cawh cang be , akhaipaw kong khah a hnikhuitu ruapaw tah a va chuhpaw a cang .
43001009	Akhaipaw hmuisuipaw , ming vytei a khai sahpaw cawh a ung , khazaw lehei a vong leimei .
43001010	Ama cawh khazaw lehei a ung , khazaw heh Ama tah a tuapaw a cang naná teitah khazaw tah Ama cawh hnih be .
43001011	Ama a mehnung a cangpaw sahlo khatah a vong ka , a mehnung sahlo tah Ama cawh cyhlang bei he .
43001012	Canghrasala Ama a cyhlangpaw vytei , Ama a ming a zingpaw vytei cawh Khazing sawtei cangnah naw a peh he .
43001013	Ma sahlo cawh cawngsaw phunglang tah sahpaw cang bei he . Taico cawngsaw biachawnah le pasaepaw dunah hratah sahpaw zong cang lytah Khazing taitah sahpaw a cang he .
43001014	Bia cawh pungsaw tah a va lang ka , kaa hrong letah a cing lai . Paw tei a hnuitlakangpaw Sawcapaw hratah a rungnawnah zia kaa hmuh ; ningdonah le biahmuisui tah a chih .
43001015	Johan tah a konglang reilai ka , ma hrahei tlang a y , “ Ma cawngsaw heh a konglang ka reipaw , ‘ ka hninglang tah a va chuh lepaw cawngsawpaw cawh kama navy tah alai vypaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah kama hlai tah a ung ciapaw a cang , ’ tahpaw khah , ” tatah a tah .
43001016	A ningdonah a tlangtlingnah taitah a bonghnang cawh sangkheh khy sangkheh tah kaa ting cy .
43001017	Phungbia cawh Moses letah peh cang ka , ningdonah le biahmuisui cawh Zisu Khri thongtah a va ung .
43001018	Ahotahmai tah Khazing cawh hmuh bang bei he . Canghrasala Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw , Paw khatei a ungpaw taco Khazing cawh a palang .
43001019	Jerusalem letei a ungpaw Juda cawngsaw sahlo tah tlangbui sahlo le Levi mingphing cawngsaw sahlo cawh Johan khaco taw he ka , “ Ahomaw na cang ? ” tatah aa haesah tih he tah , Johan tah ma hrahei a bia a phy .
43001020	Ma sahlo hai letaco a paphah ly teitah , “ Kama cawh Khri cang bei neh , ” tatah a palei he .
43001021	Aaning sahlo taco , “ A cang caco ahomaw na cang ? Elija na cang maw ? ” tatah aa tah . Johan taco , “ Cang bei neh , ” a tah he . “ Khazing khuavang kaa haw thlangpaw cang cei ? ” tatah aa tah vy . “ Cang bei neh , ” tatah a palei vy he .
43001022	A changnah letaco , “ Ahomaw na cang tahpaw achaw teitah ma ching tua . Aa ma siapaw sahlo hai letah zehratamaw kaa ta he a . Na konglang heh achaw teitah ma ching , ahomaw na cang ? ” tatah aa tah .
43001023	Mataico Johan taco Khazing khuavang Isaiah a bia khah hmang ka , “ Kama cawh , ‘ Abuipaw cawtah langpui pading pah my lo , ’ tatei raangcaa letei a y leimeipaw o cawh ka cang , ” tatah a tah he .
43001024	Taico aa tawpaw he Farasi thaikhehpaw sahlo taco Johan cawh ma hrahei bia aa hae hri ,
43001025	“ Zecawtamaw Khri na cang tlung lypaw le Elija maw , Khazing khuavang maw na cang tlung lypaw tah baptisma na cangsah he ? ” tatah aa tah .
43001026	Johan taco , ma hrahei a palei he , “ Kama taco tui tah baptisma ka ca cangsah he . Canghrasala naa hrong letei a ung thlangpaw , naa hni lypaw a ung .
43001027	Ama cawh ka hninglang tah a va chua a , kama cawh a phepakong rui a thlangpah tlangpaw hmai cang bei neh , ” a tah he .
43001028	Ma sahlo heh Jordan tuivaw raechai lang letei a ungpaw Bethani khua , Johan tei baptisma a cangsahnah pawhe letah a cang .
43001029	Ningthlamongpaw letaco Johan tah Zisu cawh ama khatah a vong lai leimeipaw khah hmuh ka , “ Mingtua o , Khazing tuu teitei , khazaw suanah a photu ruapaw kheh .
43001030	Ama heh , ‘ Ka hninglang tah a va chuh lepaw cawngsawpaw cawh kama navy tah a lai vypaw a cang zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh kama hlai tah a ung ciapaw a cang , ’ tatei a kong ka reipaw cawngsaw khah a cang .
43001031	Kama tah ama a cang tahpaw khah hnih bei neh . Canghrasala Israel cawngsaw sahlo khatah a va paly khy nápawtah tui tah baptisma ka cangsah he , ” tatah a tah .
43001032	Taico Johan tah ma hrahei a tah , “ Thlawpaw Pathai cawh avai taitah thury hratah a cung letah a za cawng thlangpaw khah ka hmuh .
43001033	Baptisma cangsah lai rua pawtei a pa tawpaw tah , ‘ Thlawpaw cawh a cung letah a za cungpaw le , a cung letah a cawng thlangpaw na hmuh caco , ama cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tei baptisma a cang sahtu ruapaw a cang a , ’ tatah pa ching lytah ung my seh la , ama cawh hnih a bei neh .
43001034	Atoheh cawh hmuh myca neh ka , ama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw a cang ceingei tahpaw khah ka rei ngang , ” tatah a tah .
43001035	A monglangpaw letah Johan cawh a hningzuitu pahning khatah ung he ka ,
43001036	Zisu a khiakaly leimeipaw khah hmuh ka , a hningzuitu sahlo hai letaco , “ Mingtua o , Khazing Tuu teitei khi , ” tatah a tah .
43001037	A hningzuitu pahning taco ma hratei bia a reipaw khah thui he ka , Zisu khah aa zui .
43001038	Taico a hninglang a hui ka , Zisu tah aa hai leco , “ Zemaw naa hui ? ” tatah a tah he . Aaning taco , “ Rabbi , ( Cawngpahtu tahnah a cang ) zeletamaw na ung ? ” tatah aa tah .
43001039	“ A vong la , naa hmuh thlang a , ” tatah a palei he . Taico aaning cawh a ungnah lang a vaw he . Chahningtlaw zailang suimehlang papali hrawng tai khah Ama khaco a ung he .
43001040	Simon Piter a unypaw Andru cawh Johan bia a reipaw a thuipaw pahning hrong letei Zisu a zuipaw khah a cang .
43001041	Andru taco a hmetawcai letah a unypaw Simon cawh huilai ka , a hai letaco , “ Mesiah ( ma cawh Khri tahnah a cang ) cawh kaa hmuh thah , ” tatah a tah .
43001042	Taico Simon cawh Zisu khatah a va seikhui . Zisu taco ming ka , a hai letaco , “ Johan sawcapaw Simon , nama cawh Sifas ( ma cawh Piter tahnah a cang ) aa ca tah myca a , ” tatah a tah .
43001043	A ningthlamongpaw letaco Zisu cawh Galili raang lang sei pawtah a pachia . Taico Filip cawh hmuh ka , “ Va pa zui , ” tatah a tah .
43001044	Filip cawh Andru le Piter sahlo khatei khuakheh letah a ung hruipaw a cang . Ma cawh Bethsaida khua a cang .
43001045	Filip tah Nathaniel cawh hmuh ka , a hai letah , “ Moses tei phungbia letei a konglang a ciapaw , Khazing khuavang sahlo zong tei a kong aa reipaw , Nazaret Zisu , Josef a sawcapaw cawh kaa hmuh myca , ” tatah a tah .
43001046	Nathaniel taco , “ Nazaret taitah hmingchaw a piathai thlang maw ? ” a tah . Filip taco , “ A vong la , mingtua , ” tatah a tah .
43001047	Zisu tah Nathaniel cawh Ama lang a va pange lai leimeipaw khah hmuh ka , “ Mingtua o , Israel cawngsaw hmuisuipaw , Ama letah dinglynah a ung lypaw hi , ” a tah .
43001048	Nathaniel taco , “ Zekhatamaw na pa hni ? ” a tah . Zisu tah a hai letah , “ Filip tei a ca y hlai letei thuiku kung rai letah na ung thlangning takhei , ka ca hmuh , ” tatah a tah .
43001049	Nathaniel taco , “ Rabbi , nama cawh Khazing Sawcapaw , Israel Siangpahrang na cang , ” tatah a tah .
43001050	Zisu tah , “ Thuiku kung a rai letah ka ca hmuh , ka tah cawtah na zingpaw cang ka , ma navy hei a rungnaw vypaw a hlupui na hmuh tae a , ” tatah a tah .
43001051	“ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , avai ingkaw a hong a ka , Khazing a vaiming sahlo cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cung letah aa cungchuh , aa kechypaw khah na hmuh tae a , ” tatah a tah vy hui .
43002001	A ningthungnah letah Galili raang , Kana khua letah nupui chuinah a ung . Zisu a no cawh ma leco ung ka ,
43002002	Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo zong cawh ma nupui chuinah leco aa hrui hrah he .
43002003	Misurhang a chang tihtah , a no tah Zisu hai letaco , “ Misurhang a chang thah , ” tatah a ching .
43002004	Zisu tah a hai letah , “ Dopaw canu , nama tah zemaw na pa ching rua a ung ? Ka cai phah balang be hi , ” tatah a tah .
43002005	Taico a no taco cungtlahtu sahlo hai letaco , “ A ca chingpaw longmang hratah tua my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
43002006	Aa kaepang tei letaco alung beirai sangruh , Juda cawngsaw sahlo tei a sipathainah aa tahpaw cai letei aa hmang teipaw cawh ung ka , ma alung beirai sangkheh cawh tui kalan songthung hrawng a tlungpaw a cang .
43002007	Zisu tah cungtlahtu sahlo hai letaco , “ Beirai sahlo lekhei tui chi sah my lo , ” a tah he . Taico alung beirai cawh a tlang tai long tah tui aa chisah he .
43002008	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Atoheh alung beirai letei tui cawh thai la , cung a tlahpaw sahlo hruitupaw khah va pei o , ” tatah a tah . Taico thai he ka , aa va peh .
43002009	Cungtlah hruitupaw taco misurhang tah a cang thah ciapaw tui cawh a pateh . Canghrasala zehratamaw ma hraco a cang tahpaw khah hnih be , tui a thaipaw he cungtlahtu long takhei aa hni . Taico nupui a chuipaw khah y ka , a hai letaco ,
43002010	“ Cawngsaw maikaw tah misurhang a hring khah va tle taw he ka , khuachai vytei tah dutaw tah aa ding khy taitah a hning tah a tesi aa va tle tei . Nama duitei cawh athoning tei navy tah achaw vypaw khah ato tingtai na pakhei thlang , ” tatah a tah .
43002011	Galili raang , Kana khua letei Zisu tah a tuapaw , ma ningang chuipaw heh a tuapaw letah a hmetaw caipaw a cang . A rungnawnah cawh palang lai ka , a hningzuitu sahlo taco Ama letah aa zingnah khah aa pahnia .
43002012	Ma khy taico a no le a uny sahlo le a hningzuitu sahlo khaco Kapernaum khua lang cawh cungthlah he ka , ma leco ning cuitei a cang he .
43002013	Taico Juda cawngsaw aa Khungsai Panawnah cai cawh phah daimang ka , Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang a sei .
43002014	Jerusalem letei behnah ingdung chung letei a ungpaw sahlo , sahring a zuapaw le tuu le thury sahlo a zualaipaw le cabuai letei tangka a thlaipaw sahlo khah a hmuh he .
43002015	Mataico khyhrui cawh thingrui tah tua ka , behnah ingdung chung letei a ungpaw tuu le sahring vytei cawh zeipatlaw he ka , a papia thlu he . Tangka a thlaipaw sahlo aa tangkasaw vytei khah thehly pah thlu he ka , aa cabuai sahlo vytei khah a palehly thlu he .
43002016	Thury aa zualaipaw sahlo aa hai letaco , “ Piathlah thlu tua o , zekhatamaw ka Paw a ing cawh cho donah tlang tah naa tua ngang zia ? ” a tah he .
43002017	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Na ing caw tei ka chahnai ngenah taco a pa e seh thlu myca , ” tatei aa ciapaw bia khah a thui he .
43002018	Taico Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Ma hming vytei tua rua pawtah hei naw na hnui tahnah tah zehapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah maw na ma pae a ? ” tatah aa tah .
43002019	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Ma behnah ing heh chehthlah la , ningthung chung tah ka padaw kaw thlu cehceh a , ” a tah he .
43002020	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Ma behnah ing heh kung songli le kung ruh sahpaw tah cang ka , ma cawh ningthung chung tah na paling khy maw ? ” aa tah .
43002021	Canghrasala a rei dunah silang cawh Ama a pungsaw kong khah a cang hri .
43002022	Thihnah taitah a tho kaw khy taitah ma hratei bia a reipaw khah a hningzuitu sahlo tah a thui kaw he . Capathai letei a ungpaw le Zisu hmokaw bia sahlo khah aa zing .
43002023	Jerusalem letei Khungsai Panawnah chung letaco , Zisu tah ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a hlupui a tuapaw sahlo khah ming hlupui tah hmuh he ka , a ming cawh aa zing .
43002024	Canghrasala Zisu cawh aaning sahlo letaco a ngengang be , zecawtamaw tatah ming vytei khah a hmuh pahleh thlu he .
43002025	Cawngsaw kong cawngsaw tah chingpase khah Zisu cawh hia be , zecawtamaw tatah Ama tah cawngsaw chung letei a ungpaw khah a hni thlu .
43003001	Farasi hrong letah pakheh , a ming Nikodema aa tahpaw cawh ung ka , ama cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo a uhtu khongsil macang hrong leteipaw a cang .
43003002	Zaicing tah Zisu khaco a vong ka , a hai leco , “ Rabbi , nama cawh Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw cawngpahtu na cang tahpaw kaa hni . Khazing tah a ungkhui ly caco he na tuapaw hming hapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah heh ahotahmai tah tua khy bei he , ” a tah .
43003003	Zisu tah ma hrahei a palei , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , ahohmai aa pitha ly caco , Khazing painah raang hmuh khy bei he , ” tatah a tah .
43003004	Nikodema taco , “ Cawngsaw cawh a macang khy taitah zekhatamaw a pitha thai khaw a ? A no a chi chunglang a nae kaw tah a pi kaw thai khawh tlung be , ” tatah a tah .
43003005	Zisu tah ma hrahei a chai , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching , ahohmai tui le Thlawpaw tah a pi ly caco , Khazing painah raang a nae bei he .
43003006	Ngaisaw taco ngaisaw a sah kaw , Thlawpaw taco thlawpaw a sah hrah .
43003007	‘ Na pitha ruapaw a cang , ’ tatei ka ca tahpaw heh na ningang kheh seh .
43003008	Thli cawh a dudú tah a hrang , a pyraw na thui . Zelang tamaw a va chua , zelang maw a sei a tahpaw na hni tlung be . Thlawpaw tah a pipaw cawh ma hraco aa cang , ” tatah a tah .
43003009	“ Ma hapaw cawh zekhatamaw a cang thai a ? ” tatah Nikodema taco a hae hri kaw .
43003010	Zisu taco , “ Israel cawngsaw sahlo cawngpahtu a cangpaw tah ma hapaw hming sahlo cawh hnih thai bei ceh maw ?
43003011	Biahmuisui ka ca ching , hnih peh ka , kaa rei , kaa hmuhpaw kong khah kaa rei lai , canghrasala kaa reipaw khah naaning tah zing tlung bei he ceh .
43003012	Aluicung hming kong ka reipaw hmai naa zing tlung be , vaicung lang kong sahlo cawh ca ching my he neh seh la , zekhatamaw naa zing khy thai a ?
43003013	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw , vaicung taitei a vongpaw cy tah ly co ahohmai tah vaicung lang aa ke bang tlung be .
43003014	Moses tei raangcaa letah daa pari a caliapaw hratah Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh calia a cang hrá a .
43003015	Macawtaco Ama a zingpaw maikaw cawh chaizaw tah a hring he a .
43003016	Khazing tah khazaw heh a do ngeteinah cawtah a Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw khah a peh . Ahohmai a zingpaw maikaw cawh lyde lytah chaizaw hringnah aa hnui a .
43003017	Khazaw heh thaily cang sá pawtah Khazing tah a Sawcapaw cawh a tawpaw cang be , Ama a thongtah pachah aa cang khy nápawtah a tawpaw khah a cang hri .
43003018	Ama a zingpaw maikaw cawh thaily cangsah cang a bei he . Canghrasala a zing lypaw maikaw cawh ato lalei hei thaily a cang thah he , Khazing Sawcapaw hnuitlakangpaw ming aa zing lynah cawtah a cang .
43003019	Ma heh thaily cangnah cawh a cang . Akhaipaw cawh khazaw lehei a vong ka , canghrasala cawngsaw tah a khaipaw navy tah a muipaw aa tlechai vy , zecawtamaw tatah aa hming tuapaw sahlo khah a chahlynah cawtah a cang .
43003020	Ahohmai hmingchaw ly a tuapaw maikaw taco akhaipaw a hua he , taico akhaipaw lang zong a vong du bei he , hmingchaw ly aa tuapaw khah akhaipaw letah a langpang le tahpaw aa cinah cawtah a cang .
43003021	Canghrasala biahmuisui letei a hringpaw taco akhaipaw lang cawh a vong he . Aa tuapaw hming vytei khah Khazing thongtah aa tuapaw a cang tahpaw khah a lang pase khy nápawtah , ” tatah a tah .
43003022	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khatah Judia raang khuatei lang khah sei he ka , ma letaco zemaw cai hrawng ung ka , baptisma zong a cangsah he .
43003023	Mataico , Johan zong tah Salim khua kae Ainon aa tahpaw letaco baptisma cangsah he ka , cawngsaw hlupui tah ama khatah baptisma cang rua pawtah aa pange . Zecawtamaw tatah ma leco tui ahlunah cawtah a cang .
43003024	Ma heh Johan cawh thong letah a tlah hlai tah a cang .
43003025	Johan hning a zuipaw sahlo thaikhehpaw le Juda cawngsaw pakheh cawh a sipathainah phung le lang kong letah bia a ei he .
43003026	Johan khaco a vong he ka , a hai leco , “ Cawngpahtu , Jordan tuivaw rae lang letei nama khatah a ungpaw , a konglang na reilaipaw takhei baptisma cangsah he ka , cawngsaw hlupui tah aa pange , ” tatah aa ching .
43003027	Johan taco , ma hrahei a palei he , “ Vaicung taitah pehpaw suipaw khah cawngsaw taco a hnui khypaw a cang .
43003028	Kama cawh , ‘ Khri cang bei neh , zua a ky ruapaw tei a hmelang a seilai ruapaw tah tawpaw ka cang , ’ ka tahpaw khah naaning sahlo ceingei tah naa hni .
43003029	Myno cawh my a hnuitupaw cawtah a cang . My a hnuitupaw a vesaw a cangpaw taco ama cawh heh thlang ka , a naw thlia paria thlang . My hnuitu o cawh a thui tih letaco a thaw a chah ngetei . Ma a lawngnah cawh kama ka cawtah cang ka , atoheh a va tlung thah hi .
43003030	Ama cawh a laisui ruapaw a cang , kama cawh a zochuh ruapaw ka cang .
43003031	Cung lang taitah a va chuhpaw cawh ming vytei cung letei a ungpaw a cang , aluicung taitei a chuhpaw cawh alui cawngsaw cang ka , aluicung kong khah a rei . Avai taitei a va chuhpaw cawh ming vytei cung letei a ungpaw cawh a cang .
43003032	A hmuhpaw le a thuipaw khah a thuisah he , canghrasala a thui sahpaw he bia cawh ahotahmai nge bei he .
43003033	A bia a ngepaw taco Khazing cawh a ding hmuisui tahpaw khah a pacysah .
43003034	Khazing tawpaw a cangpaw taco Khazing bia khah a rei . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing taco ama cawh a Thlawpaw khah ri tai ung lytah a peh .
43003035	Paw tah Sawcapaw khah a do , zezong vytei khah a kih letah a chia .
43003036	Sawcapaw a zingpaw maikaw taco chaizaw hringnah aa hnui . Sawcapaw a pawng lypaw maikaw taco hringnah hnui bei he , Khazing thingaenah khah aa cung letah a ung hri a , ” tatah a tah .
43004001	Farasi sahlo taco Zisu tah Johan navy tah hningzuitu hlu vy a hnuipaw le ming hlu vy baptisma a cangsah paw he khah aa thui .
43004002	Zisu ceingei tah baptisma cawh a cangsah bei he , a hningzuitu sahlo tah aa cangsah he .
43004003	Ma kong cawh Abuipaw tah thui ka , Judia raang cawh piasai ka , Galili raang lang khah a sei kaw .
43004004	Samaria raang cahrong tah sei pawtah cang ka ,
43004005	Samaria raang khua , Saikar aa tahpaw cawh va phah ka , ma cawh Jakob tei a sawcapaw Josef a pehpaw hminghmaw kae leteipaw khah a cang .
43004006	Ma leco Jakob tei tuikho a copaw cawh a ung . Zisu cawh khuatlongnah langpui letei a va sei lainah letaco a thaw bang ka , ma tuikho kae letaco a ty ka , a hia . Ma cawh ningching hrawng letah a cang .
43004007	Taico Samaria cawngsawno pakheh cawh ma tuikho letei tui cawh thai rua pawtah va chuh ka , Zisu tah a hai leco , “ Tui ding ruapaw pa pei khy ceh maw ? ” tatah a tah .
43004008	A hningzuitu sahlo khah khuachung lang e ruapaw cawh tah a sei thah he .
43004009	Samaria cawngsawno taco , “ Nama cawh Juda mingphing cang ceh ka , kama cawh Samaria mingphing cang neh ka , zekhatah zia tamaw tui ding ruapaw na pa hae thlang ? ” a tah . Juda mingphing sahlo cawh Samaria mingphing khatah a pahlawh bei he .
43004010	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Khazing lahsong le nama khatei tui ding ruapaw a ca haepaw heh cawh hnih tua la , nama tah ama khatah tui ding ruapaw na hae hri ruapaw a cang ; taico ama tah hringnah tui cawh a ca pae a , ” tatah a tah .
43004011	Canuno taco , “ Ka pu , ma tuikho heh a thuh ngeteipaw tah cang ka , tuithai nápaw zehmai na hnui tlung be . Zekhatamaw hringnah tui cawh na hmuh khy thai zia a ?
43004012	Kaa mapaw Jakob navy tah na rungnaw vy maw ? Ama taco ma tuikho heh ama le a sawtei leh vytei le , aa sahring zuapaw vytei , ding ruapaw tah a ma pehpaw a cang hi , ” a tah .
43004013	Zisu tah ma hrahei a chai , “ Ma tui a dingpaw maikaw heh cawh aa tui a hrae kaw a .
43004014	Canghrasala kama tei ka pehpaw tui a dingpaw maikaw he cawh aa tui hrae khaw be . Ka pehpaw he tui cawh aa chung taitah tuihnaw hratah a laichua a , chaizaw hringnah tai a lai a , ” tatah a tah .
43004015	Canuno taco , “ Ka pu , ma tui cawh pa pei tua , ka tui a hrae khawh ly nápawtah le ma tuikho lehei tui ka va thai khawh ly nápawtah , ” a tah .
43004016	Canuno cawh , “ Va sei la , na pasae va y la , a vong kaw my lo , ” tatah a tah .
43004017	Canuno taco , “ Pasae ka hnui tlung be ” tatah a palei . Zisu tah a hai letah , “ Pasae hnui bei neh , na tahpaw heh biahmuisui a cang .
43004018	Hmuisui teico , pasae papangaw na hnui thah , atotei na ung hruipaw cawngsaw zong heh na pasae hmuisui cawh cang hlui be , na reipaw heh biadih a cang , ” tatah a tah .
43004019	Canuno taco , “ Ka pu , nama heh Khazing khuavang na cang tahpaw ka hni ,
43004020	aa ma pathlahtu sahlo tah ma tlaang lehei Khazing aa beh tei . Canghrasala naaning Juda mingphing sahlo taco Jerusalem letah Khazing cawh beh rua a cang tatah naa tah , ” a tah .
43004021	Taico Zisu tah a hai letah , “ Canuno , ka bia heh zing tua , a cai le ning a va tlung leimei , ma tlaang lehei a cang ly leh Jerusalem letah cang lytah Paw Khazing aa behnah cai khah a tlung a .
43004022	Naaning Samaria mingphing taco naa hni lypaw khah naa beh tei , pachahnah cawh Juda mingphing taitah a va chuhpaw a cangnah cawtah kaaning taco kaa behpaw khah kaa hni .
43004023	Paw cawh a beh hmuisuipaw sahlo tah Thlawpaw le biahmuisui tei aa beh nápaw cai cawh a va chuh myca , atoheh a va phah thah . Ma hapaw cawngsaw cawh Paw tah a huipaw a cang he .
43004024	Khazing cawh Thlawpaw cang ka ama a behpaw sahlo taco thlawpaw le biahmuisui tah aa beh hrahring ruapaw a cang , ” tatah a tah .
43004025	Canuno taco a hai letah , “ Mesiah ( ma cawh , ‘ Khri , ’ tahnah a cang ) a va chuh tae a tahpaw ka hni . Ama cawh a va chua tihtah hming silang vytei khah a ma chingpase tae a , ” tatah a tah .
43004026	Zisu tah a hai letaco , “ Nama kha bia a rei leimeipaw heh Ama cawh ka cang , ” tatah a tah .
43004027	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa va tlung kaw tihtah Zisu cawh canuno khatei bia aa reihrui leimeipaw khah hmuh he ka , aa ning a ang thlang . Canghrasala ahotahmai tah , “ Zemaw ma canuno khakhei na hiapaw a ung ? Ze kong maw naa reihrui leimei ? ” tatah hae hri bei he .
43004028	Taico canuno cawh a tuibei khah seisai ka , khuachung lang khah va sei ka , khuasaw sahlo hai letaco ,
43004029	“ A vong la , va ming tua o , ka tuasenah maikaw a pa ching thlu khypaw cawngsaw pakheh a ung , Khri a cang khy mai ! ” a tah he .
43004030	Khuachung letei cawngsaw sahlo cawh ka piathlah he ka , Zisu ungnah lang aa va pange .
43004031	Ma chung taco a hningzuitu sahlo tah , “ Cawngpahtu , sangkheh kheh e taw , ” tatah aa tah .
43004032	Canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ A kong naa hni lypaw e ruapaw batui ka hnui , ” tatah a tah he .
43004033	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aaning le aaning khah , “ Batui a va peipaw ung ta he maw ! ” tatah a tah he .
43004034	Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Ka batui cawh a pa tawtu a dunah tua le a rai patlung patlia khah a cang .
43004035	‘ Thlah pali khy taico saze hre a cang a , ’ tah tei bei he ceh maw ? Ka ca ching he hi , naa meh duichy la , saze ly khah mingtua o ! Hre rua pawtah a zaw thlu myca he khi .
43004036	Saze a hrepaw tah a hrenah mai cawh a hmuh tei . Chaizaw hringnah caw pawtah aa hre myca . Ma pawsui co , saze a lingpaw le a hrepaw cawh a lawng hrui khy he a .
43004037	Ma tih taco , ‘ Pakhehpaw tah ling ka , pakhehpaw tah a hre , ’ tahpaw cawh ahmang a .
43004038	Naa ling lypaw saze hre rua pawtah ka ca taw he hi . Ming hringpaw sahlo tah raisah cawh hre he ka , aa raihrenah a thuipa cawh naaning tah naa hria , ” a tah he .
43004039	Saikar khuachung letei a ungpaw Samaria cawngsaw a hlupui tah canuno tei , “ Ka hming tua ciapaw vytei a pa ching khy thlu , ” a tahpaw rawng takhei Ama cawh aa zing .
43004040	Macawtaco , Samaria cawngsaw sahlo cawh Ama khaco a vong he ka , kaaning kha caang cong thlang tatah thly he ka , ninghning aaning khatah a caang .
43004041	Taico , a cawngpahnah bia thong khei , mehlupui tah Ama cawh aa zing .
43004042	Canuno hai letaco , “ Nama tei na reinah thongtah kaa zingpaw cang lytah kaaning ceingei tah thui peh ka , ma paw cawngsaw heh khazaw Pachahtu hmuisui a cang tahpaw kaa hninah cawtah a cang , ” tatah aa tah .
43004043	Ninghning khy tah ma khua taico piathlah ka , Galili raang lang a sei .
43004044	Zisu tah , “ Khazing khuavang cawh ama a khua le raang letaco pasung panawnah a tong be , ” tahpaw bia khah a rei .
43004045	Canghrasala Galili raang cawh a va phah tihtah Galili cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu cawh aa cyhlang . Khungsai Panawnah ning tei Jerusalem khua letah a tuapaw vytei khah aa hmuh , zecawtamaw tatah ma lekhei a ung thlang hrah he .
43004046	Zisu cawh tui misurhang tei a cangsahnah hminghmaw , Galili raang letei Kana khua lang khah a va sei kaw . Ma leco abui pakheh a cangpaw a sawcapaw , Kapernaum khua letah a ungpaw cawh dang be .
43004047	Ma cawngsawpaw taco Zisu cawh Judia raang taitah Galili raang a va phah tahpaw khah a thui tihtah ama khaco a vaw ka , a thi daimangpaw a sawcapaw cawh dang sá pawtah a vong theh ky law tatah a va naw .
43004048	Zisu tah ma cawngsawpaw hai letah , “ Naaning sahlo taco ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah le khuarawha a chuipaw naa hmuh tah lypaw co zing by bei ceh , ” tatah a tah .
43004049	Ma abuipaw taco , “ Abuipaw , ka sawcapaw a thih hlai lehei a vong theh ky , ” tatah a tah .
43004050	Zisu taco , “ Va sei thlang , na sawcapaw cawh a hring a , ” tatah a palei . Ma cawngsaw taco Zisu tei a hai letah bia a reipaw cawh zing ka , a sei hly .
43004051	Lang letah a seilai leimeining taco , a sae sahlo tah va dai he ka , na sawcapaw a dang thah tahpaw aa thuisah .
43004052	A sawcapaw cawh zening cai hrawng taikhei maw a chah vy longmang tahpaw khah a hae tih he tah a hai leco , “ Ziachaning , zailang suimehlang pakheh hrong taikhei a thlasih taco a thlaw , ” tatah aa tah .
43004053	Mataico a paw taco , ma cawh Zisu tei , “ Na sawcapaw cawh a hring a , ” tatei a chingpaw cai a cang hrahring takhah a hni . Macawtaco ama le a ingchungkho vytei tah aa zing .
43004054	Ma heh Judia raang taitah Galili raang a va phah khy taitei Zisu tah a tuapaw a uihningnah ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a cang .
43005001	Cai a cawngpe khy tai khei Juda cawngsaw sahlo Panawnah letah a hlo hra pawtah Zisu cawh Jerusalem lang khah a kechy .
43005002	Jerusalem khuapui letei Tuu Hawkaw aa tahpaw kae letaco , tuiching , Aramaik rei tah Bethesda aa tahpaw ung ka , dungkalung sangpangaw a hnui .
43005003	Ma letaco mehdang ly hlupui , mehco le a songbepaw , a kih le phe a ngawpaw sahlo vytei taco , tui a calawh lepaw khah aa haw thlang .
43005004	Ma tuiching cawh vaiming sahlo tah a calawhsah tei he ka , ma tui a calawh ning tei a chunglang a zythlah tawpaw he cawh zehapaw a sawnah a cangpaw hmai tah dangnah aa hmuh tei .
43005005	Ma leco cawngsaw pakheh a dang lypaw kung songthung leh kung reh a sah ciapaw a ung .
43005006	Zisu tah ma cawngsaw cawh hmuh ka , ma leco khua sypui dang lytah a ung myca tahpaw khah hnih ka , a hai letah “ Dang na du maw ? ” tatah a tah .
43005007	Mehdang ly taco , “ Abuipaw , ma tui heh a calawh cangkawleh tui chunglang a pa nong ruapaw ahohmai ung bei he . A nawng pawtah ka seining maikaw tah cawngsaw ahringpaw tah aa pa chokhai thah leimei thlang , ” tatah a palei .
43005008	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Tho la , na iphaw a lah la , sei , ” tatah a tah .
43005009	Sung sungkheh tah ma cawngsaw cawh dang ka , a iphaw cawh law ka , a sei . Ma ning cawh Sabat ning a cang .
43005010	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Atoning heh Sabat ning cang ka , na iphaw law khy bei ceh , a phung cang be , ” tatah aa tah .
43005011	Ama taco aa hai letah , “ A pa dangsah tupaw tah , ‘ Na iphaw law la , sei law , ’ a pa tah , ” tatah a tah he .
43005012	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Na iphaw law la , sei a ca tahpaw cawh ahomaw ? ” tatah aa hae .
43005013	Dangsah a cangpaw cawngsawpaw taco a dangsah tupaw khah hnih pase be , zecawtamaw tatah Zisu cawh ma leteipaw zawpui hrong taico a seihly .
43005014	A hning khy tah ma cawngsawpaw khah Zisu tah behnah ing letah hmuh ka , “ Na dang myca hi , atohei co suanah va tua khawh kheh , na tua vy caco a sah vy tah maw na cung letah tlung pang le , ” tatah a tah .
43005015	Cawngsawpaw cawh seihly ka , a dangsahtu khah Zisu a cang tahpaw cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo khah a ching he .
43005016	Macawtaco Zisu tah ma hming sahlo cawh Sabat ning tah a tuanah cawtah Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco Ama cawh ruhanah aa peh .
43005017	Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Ka Paw tah atoning tai a rai hre ka , kama zong ka hre hrápaw a cang , ” a tah he .
43005018	Ma rawng tahei Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco thaw rua pawtah khei a zawng tima he ; Sabat ning a ronah caw tahei long cang lytah Khazing khah Ama a Paw tatah a y cawtah le Khazing kha a khing pawtah a tuanah cawtah a cang .
43005019	Taico Zisu tah aa hai letah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Sawcapaw tahei ama teitah zehmai tua khy be , Paw tei a tuapaw a hmuhpaw longlong khah a tua khy , zecawtamaw tatah Paw tei a tuapaw maikaw khah Sawcapaw zong tah a tua hrah .
43005020	Zecawtamaw tatah Paw taco Sawcapaw khah do ka , a tuapaw vytei khah a hmuhsah . Naa ningangnah rua pawtah ma sahlo navy hei a rungnaw vypaw hming sahlo a hmuh sá a .
43005021	Zecawtamaw tatah Paw tah mehthi patho he ka , hringnah a pehpaw he hratah Sawcapaw zong tah peh a dupaw khah hringnah cawh a peh hrah he .
