43005022	Ma hlui co , Paw tah ahohmai biacepah bei he , canghrasala biacenah vytei khah Sawcapaw letah a peh thah ,
43005023	ma cawh Paw aa cizawpaw hratah Sawcapaw aa cizaw khy nápaw cawtah a cang . Sawcapaw a cizaw lypaw taco ama a za tawpaw Paw khah cizaw hrah be .
43005024	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Ka bia thui katei , a pa tawtupaw a zingpaw cawngsaw cawh chaizaw hringnah hnui ka , sua phosah cang a be . Ama cawh thihnah taitah hringnah lang khah a palang thah .
43005025	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , mehthi tah Khazing Sawcapaw a o thui he ka , a thuipaw sahlo taco hringnah aa hmuh nápaw cai cawh va chuh leimei ka , atoheh a va phah myca .
43005026	Zecawtamaw tatah Paw cawh Ama teitah hringnah a hnuipaw hratah , a Sawcapaw khah Ama teitah hringnah hnuinah naw a peh .
43005027	Taico Ama cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a cangnah cawtah biacenah nawhnuinah zong khah a peh .
43005028	Ma heh naa ningang kheh seh , zecawtamaw tatah athlai letei a ungpaw vytei tah a o thui a he ka ,
43005029	aa tho nápaw cai cawh a va chuh leimei myca . Chahnah a tuapaw sahlo cawh hringnah letah tho a he ka , chianah a tuapaw sahlo cawh thaily cang rua pawtah a tho he a .
43005030	Kama cawh ka naw tah zehmai tua khy bei neh . Ka thuipaw hratah biace neh ka , ka biacepaw cawh a ding , zecawtamaw tatah kama ka dunah zui lytah a pa tawtupaw a dunah ka zuinah cawtah a cang .
43005031	Kama ka kong kama tah ka reilai caco , ka reipaw cawh zingchui be .
43005032	Kama ka kong a reipaw pakheh ung ka , ama tei ka kong a reipaw cawh zing a chui tah khah ka hni .
43005033	Naaning tah Johan khakhei cawngsaw taw he ceh ka , ama taco biahmuisui khah a rei .
43005034	Mehnung tei ka kong aa reipaw cawh zetah sah bei neh . Canghrasala ma bia ka reipaw heh pachah naa cang khy nápawtah a cang .
43005035	Johan cawh a khai ngeteipaw me-ing cang ka , naaning taco ama a khainah cawh caikheh tei anawngnah takhei naa du .
43005036	Johan a reipaw navy tah a rungnaw vypaw khah kama cawh ka reipaw a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah atotei rai heh paling rua pawtah hei Paw tah pa pei ka , taico ma ka hre leimeipaw rai tahei kama cawh Paw tah a pa taw tahpaw khah a langsah .
43005037	Taico a pa tawtupaw Paw ceingei tah ka cangnah konglang cawh a langsah . Naaning taco a o thui bang be ca he ceh ka , a hmui zong hmuh bang bei he ceh .
43005038	A bia zong naaning letah a cingkai bei he ceh , zecawtamaw tatah a tawpaw khah naa zing lynah cawtah .
43005039	Khazing Capathai khah khiahle he ceh ka naa rei , zecawtamaw tatah ma sahlo taikhei chaizaw hringnah kaa hmuh khy a tah naa rawh cawtah a cang . Ma Capathai sahlo heh kama ka kong a langsahpaw a cang he .
43005040	Canghrasala hringnah hnui rua pawtah kama kha a vong cawh du hlui bei he ceh .
43005041	Cawngsaw tei pachaw palaw cawh du bei neh ,
43005042	canghrasala ka ca hni thlang he . Naa thinglung letah Khazing donah hnui bei he ceh tah cawh ka hni .
43005043	Kama cawh ka Paw a ming tah a vong neh ka , naaning tah pa cyhlang bei he ceh , canghrasala pakheh kheh cawh Ama a ming tah a vong tua my seh la , ama cawh naa cyhlang thlang a .
43005044	Pakheh le pakheh na reithainah pawhe ceh cawh a cyhlang he ceh ka , Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw reithainah zetah a rei lypaw naaning sahlo tahei zekhatamaw naa zing khy a ?
43005045	Canghrasala Paw hmekaw letah sua a ma phosá a tatah parawh khe o , naaning sua a ca pho sápaw he cawh na paichai pawhe ceh Moses khah a cang .
43005046	Moses naa zing caco , kama naa pa zing rua a cang , zecawtamaw tatah ama taco kama ka kong a ciapaw a cang .
43005047	Canghrasala a ciapaw naa zing lynah cawtah khei ka reipaw cawh zekhatamaw naa zing khy thai a ? ” tatah a tah .
43006001	Ma khy taico , Zisu cawh Galili rili ( ma heh Tiberia rili a cang ) ngaekang lang khah a vaw ka ,
43006002	cawngsaw rungpui takhei Ama cawh aa zui , zecawtamaw tatah a sahpaw sahlo cung letei a tuapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah khah aa hmuh cawtah a cang .
43006003	Mataico Zisu cawh tlanglang ke ka , a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei a ty .
43006004	Juda cawngsaw aa Khungsai Panawnah cawh a ne myca .
43006005	Zisu cawh a hui ka , Ama lang cawngsaw rungpui a vongpaw he khah a hmuh tihtah Filip hai leco , “ Ma cawngsaw sahlo aa e rua tahei zeletamaw very kaa va caw a ? ” tatah a tah .
43006006	Ama hnehsah nápawtah ma bia heh a haepaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah zemaw ka tua a tahpaw khah a lung letah a hni pacia thah .
43006007	Filip taco a hai letah , “ Pakheh tah sangkheh cy ting rua pawtah a zawpaw very cawh thlah reh nihlo tah a cawh khy tlung be ! ” tatah a chai .
43006008	Ahringpaw a hningzuitu , Simon Piter a unypaw Andru taco ,
43006009	“ Ma lehei hrangsang very tlangpangaw le ngadih punghning a hnuipaw nyhehpaw a ung , canghrasala ma reiropaw cawngsaw hrong lehei zetlang maw a cang a ? ” tatah a tah .
43006010	Zisu taco , “ Cawngsaw khah a tysah tua o , ” tatah a tah he . Ma hminghmaw cawh araang hrong tah cang ka , capaw puitling 5000 hrong a cangpaw he cawh a ty he .
43006011	Mataico Zisu tah very tlang sahlo cawh law ka , Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai ka , a ty thlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa dunah zé khei rai law a tah he . Ngaw zong cawh ma hraco a tua .
43006012	Aa rivaw pawtah aa e thlu khy taitah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh , “ Ebangpaw very sahlo pahmo la , thlaw thlang khe lo , ” a tah he .
43006013	Ma sahlo tei aa ebangpaw very tlang pangaw taitei a hluipaw sahlo cawh pakhong he ka , baihraw hluihning a chih .
43006014	Cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu tei a tuapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah khah aa hmuh tihtah , “ Ma paw heh khazaw letah a vongpaw Khazing khuavang a cang hrahring , ” tatah aa tah .
43006015	Ma sahlo tahei a vong he ka , hranghrang tah siangpahrang tah aa pa tua a tahpaw khah a hninah cawtah tlanglang khah aparuh teitah a seihly kaw .
43006016	Zailang a va phah tihtah a hningzuitu sahlo cawh Galili tuiping lang khah cung thlah he ka ,
43006017	tuilawng chunglang cawh a nae he ka , Kapernaum khua lang sei rua pawtah khei tuiping cawh aa cakah . Khua cawh mui ca ka , Zisu cawh aaning sahlo khah a hlawng balang bei he .
43006018	Thli a rupaw pui a hrang ka , tuileh cawh a cahrah ngetei .
43006019	Khangthung a cang ly leh khangpali hrawng tuilawng cawh aa zei taitah tui cung letah Zisu va sei katei , tuilawng a va pangepaw khah hmuh he ka , aa ci a tho .
43006020	Canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Kama ka cang hi , ci khe o , ” tatah a tah he .
43006021	Mataico tuilawng chunglang cawh a naesah he ka , ma cangkawleh cawh tuilawng cawh aa tingnahpaw ngaekang khah a va phah .
43006022	Ningthlamongpaw cawh a hningzuitu sahlo aa ungnahpaw dihdong tuiping raechai ngaekang letei a ungpaw zawpui sahlo tah ma lekhei a hningzuitu sahlo aa kepaw tuilawng sangkheh suitei ung ka , Zisu cawh a hningzuitu sahlo khakhei tuilawng chunglang a nae be , aaning teitah aa seihly tahpaw khah aa hni .
43006023	Mataico , Tiberia khuapui taitah a va chuhpaw tuilawng sahlo cawh cawngsaw rungpui tah Abuipaw tei lawngbia a hlai khy taitah very aa enah hminghmaw lekhei aa chung he .
43006024	Ma hminghmaw leco Zisu le a hningzuitu sahlo ung bei he tahpaw khah zawpuipaw tah aa hni tihtah tuilawng cawh ke he ka , Zisu hui rua pawtah khei Kapernaum khua lang cawh aa sei .
43006025	Tuiping raechai lang lekhei aa va hmuh tihtah a hai leco , “ Cawngpahtu , zening tamaw ma lang heh na va sei ? ” tatah aa hae .
43006026	Zisu taco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Kama naa pa hui lai leimeipaw heh ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah naa hmuh cawtah cang lytah naa ri vaw ky tah very tlang sahlo khah naa e rawng tah a cang .
43006027	A lyde khypaw ding le e caw suipaw tah rai hre khe o , chaizaw hringnah khatei a peitlepaw batui , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw tei a ca pehpaw he cawtah khei naa hre hri be . Ama cawh Paw Khazing tah a nawtlahnah ca a khai ciapaw a cang ! ” tatah a chai he .
43006028	Mataico Zisu cawh , “ Khazing a dupaw rai kaa hre khy nápawtah zemaw kaa tua ruapaw a cang ? ” tatah aa hae .
43006029	Zisu taco , “ Khazing rai cawh ma heh a cang hi , Ama tei a za tawpaw zing khah a cang , ” tatah a chai he .
43006030	Macawtaco Zisu cawh , “ Hmuh a tei kaa ca zing nápawtah ze ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah maw na ma pae a ? Zemaw na tua a ?
43006031	‘ Aaning sahlo aa e ruapaw takhei very khah avai taitah a thlah he , ’ tatah ciapaw hratah kaa mapaw sahlo taco raangcaa lekhei manna very khah aa e tatah , ” tatah aa tah .
43006032	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , vaicung taitei very a thlah pahpaw he khah Moses cang be , vaicung taitah very hmuisuipaw a ca thlah pawhe cawh ka Paw a cang hri .
43006033	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing very cawh vaicung taitah za cung katei , khazaw caw tei hringnah a peipaw cawngsawpaw heh a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
43006034	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Abuipaw , ma very cawh atohei co ma pei tei my lo , ” tatah aa tah .
43006035	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Kama heh hringnah very cawh ka cang hi . Kama khatei a vongpaw cawngsaw cawh a ngaidi by be , taico kama a pa zingpaw cawngsaw cawh zening tahmai a tui hrae by be .
43006036	Canghrasala ka rei ciapaw hratah , naa pa hmuh thlang naná teitah pa zing hlui bei he ceh .
43006037	Paw tei a pa pehpaw vytei sahlo cawh kama khatah a vong he ka , kama khatah a vongpaw maikaw cawh ahohmai daichua bei neh .
43006038	Zecawtamaw tatah kama ka dunah tua rua pawtah vaicung taitah za cung be ca neh ka , a pa tawpaw a dunah tua rua pawtah a cang hri .
43006039	Taico a pa tawpaw a dunah cawh kama a pa pehpaw vytei sahlo khah pakheh hmai hly lytah caichangnah ning letah tho sápaw he khah a cang .
43006040	Zecawtamaw tatah ka Paw a dunah cawh Sawcapaw khah hmuh katei , a zingpaw taco chaizaw hringnah hnui ka , caidongnah ning letah kama tah ka patho a , ” tahpaw heh a cang .
43006041	“ Kama heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw very cawh ka cang , ” a tah cawtah Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei a kong phingze hrang khah patho he ka ,
43006042	“ Ma paw heh Zisu , Josef a sawcapaw khah cang bei maw , a no le a paw kaa hni thlangpaw he khah ? Zecawtamaw , ‘ Vaicung taitah ka za cung tatah a tah lalei ? ’ ” tatah aa tah .
43006043	Zisu taco , “ Naaning le naaning teitah phingze leimei khawh khe o .
43006044	A pa tawpaw Paw tah a va chui he tah ly co kama kha a vong khypaw ahohmai ung bei he , a vongpaw cawh caichangnah ning letah ka patho a .
43006045	Khazing khuavang sahlo cabu letah , ‘ Aaning vytei cawh Khazing tah a cawngpah he a , ’ tatah ciapaw a cang . Paw bia nge katei a cawngpaw maikaw he cawh kama kha a vong tae he a .
43006046	Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw seh tah ly co Paw a hmuhpaw ung bei he , Ama suitei heh Paw a hmuhpaw cawh a cang .
43006047	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ahohmai a zingpaw maikaw taco chaizaw hringnah a hnui thah .
43006048	Kama heh hringnah very cawh ka cang .
43006049	Naa mapaw sahlo taco raangcaa letah manna very khah e he ka , a thi thlang he .
43006050	Canghrasala vaicung taitah a za cungpaw very ung ka , ma a epaw cawngsaw cawh thi a bei he .
43006051	Kama heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw hringnah very cawh ka cang . Cawngsaw ahotahmai ma very heh a e caco , ama cawh chaizaw tah a hring a . Ma very cawh khazaw hring ná pawtei ka paepaw ka ngaisaw heh a cang , ” tatah a chai he .
43006052	Mataico , “ Ma cawngsaw tahei zekhatamaw kaa e ruapaw tah a ngaisaw cawh a ma peh thai a ? ” tatah Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh lesahtei tah a eichae he .
43006053	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Cawngsaw Sawcapaw a ngaisaw naa e ly le a thisai naa ding ly caco , hringnah hnui bei ceh .
43006054	Ka ngaisaw e katei , ka thisai a dingpaw taco chaizaw hringnah hnui a ka , caichangnah ning letah ka patho a .
43006055	Zecawtamaw tatah ka ngaisaw cawh batui hmuisui cang ka , ka thisai cawh ding hmuisui ruapaw a cang .
43006056	Ka ngaisaw e katei , ka thisai a dingpaw cawh kama letah ung ka , ama letah kama zong ka ung hrah .
43006057	A hring thlangpaw Paw tah pa taw ka , Paw thongtah ka hringpaw hratah Ka ngaisaw e katei ka thisai a dingpaw cawh kama ka thongtah ama zong a hring a .
43006058	Ma heh vaicung taitei a za cungpaw very cawh a cang . Kaa mapaw sahlo cawh manna very khah e he ka , a thi he , canghrasala ma very a epaw heh cawh chaizaw tah a hring a , ” tatah a tah .
43006059	Ma bia heh Kapernaum khua synagog letah a cawngpah ning he tah a reipaw a cang .
43006060	Ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah a hningzuitu mehlupui takhei , “ A cawngpahnah a ru ngetei . Ahomaw a cyhlang khy a ? ” tatah aa tah .
43006061	Ma kong a reipaw rawng tei a hningzuitu sahlo aa phingzepaw khah Zisu tah hnih ka , aa hai leco , “ Ma bia takhei naa lung ca cangsah bei he i ?
43006062	Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh a ungnah tawpaw lang a ke kawpaw khah hmuh my la , zekhatamaw naa ta a !
43006063	Hringnah a peipaw cawh Thlawpaw heh a cang , ngaisawpaw cawh zehmai cang be . Naaning khatei ka reipaw bia sahlo heh thlawpaw cawh cang ka , hringnah a cang he .
43006064	Canghrasala , naaning thaikhehpaw sahlo taco zing bei he ceh , ” tatah a tah he . Zecawtamaw tatah ahomaw a zing lypaw tahpaw le ahomaw a pa luithae a tahpaw khah a thoning taitah Zisu tah a hni thah cawtah a cang .
43006065	A bia reipaw cawh pazo ka , “ Ma cawtah hei Paw tah a baw ly caco he kama kha a vong khypaw ung bei he tatah ka tahpaw khah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
43006066	Ma khy cangkaw leco , a hningzuitu mehlupui khah a paleh kaw he ka , Ama khah zui khawh bei he .
43006067	Macawtaco Zisu tah a hningzuitu pahrawhluihning sahlo khah , “ Naaning saw , seihly cawh naa du hrah maw , du hrah ly ? ” tatah a hae he .
43006068	Simon Piter tah , “ Abuipaw , aho kha maw kaa sei a ? Chaizaw hringnah bia a hnuipaw cawh nama na cang .
43006069	Nama cawh Khazing a Mehpathai na cang tahpaw hnih peh ka , kaa zing myca , ” tatah a chai .
43006070	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Naaning hluihningpaw heh kama tah ka ca thingpaw cang bei he ceh maw ? Canghrasala naaning hrong lehei pakheh cawh khachia a cang ! ” tatah a palei .
43006071	Ma cawh hluihning letei reipaipaw , a hning tah Ama a luithepaw Simon Iskariot a sawcapaw Judas Iskariot khah a tah hnangpaw a cang .
43007001	Ma khy taico Zisu cawh Galili pai chung khah a tlawng lai , Judia raang taitah a nocareipaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei kaa thaw a tatah aa tah .
43007002	Canghrasala Juda cawngsaw sahlo Thlangda Panaw khah a ne tihtah ,
43007003	a uny sahlo takhei Zisu cawh , “ Na hningzuitu sahlo tah ningang chuipaw na tuapaw sahlo khah hmuh na he seh tatah ma taihei piathlah la , Judia raang lang na sei be .
43007004	Cawngsaw tah pa hnih he seh tah a dupaw taco aparuh teitah zehmai tua bang bei he . Ma hming sahlo na tuapaw hei khazaw cawh a hnisah ca , ” tatah aa tah .
43007005	Zecawtamaw tatah a chuahrui uny sahlo takhei hmai tah Ama cawh zing bei he .
43007006	Macawtaco Zisu tah aaning sahlo cawh , “ Ka cawtah cai rawhpaw tlung balang be ; naaning naa caw taco ze cai hmai heh a rai cang thlang .
43007007	Khazaw tahei naaning cawh a ca hua bei he , canghrasala kama cawh a pa hua , zecawtamaw tatah a tuapaw khah hmingchahly a cang tatah ka tah cawtah a cang .
43007008	Panawnah lang cawh va sei la , kama cawh va sei balang bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah ka cawtah cai tlung balang be , ” tatah a ching he .
43007009	Ma bia a rei khy taico , Galili pai chung lekhei a ung thlang .
43007010	Canghrasala a uny sahlo cawh Panawnah zo pawtah aa seithlah khy taikhei Ama zong cawh langhai tah cang lytah aparuh teitah a sei hrah .
43007011	Panawnah leco Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei hui he ka , “ Ma cawngsawpaw khah zeletamaw a ung ? ” tatah aa hae lai he .
43007012	Zawpuipaw taco a konglang cawh a cekanawh tlungmang he . Thaikhehpaw tah , “ Mehchaw a cang , ” tatah aa tah . Ahringpaw tah , “ Cang be , cawngsaw a dungkhei laipaw a cang , ” tatah aa palei he .
43007013	Canghrasala Juda cawngsaw khah aa cinah caw he tah ahotahmai a kong khah langhai tah zehmai rei bei he .
43007014	Panawnah cawh a cing chy tluh aa pachang hrawnghrang lekhei Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chunglang khah va sei ka , a cawngpah he .
43007015	Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa khuarawh haa ka , “ Ma cawngsawpaw tahei cawngnah hnui lytah zekhatamaw ma hrahei a hni thlang ? ” tatah aa tah .
43007016	Zisu taco , “ Ka cawngpahnah heh kama taiteipaw cang be . A pa taw tupaw taitei a va chuhpaw a cang .
43007017	Khazing dunah tua a pachiapaw cawngsaw taco ka cawngpahnah heh Khazing taitei a va chuhpaw maw a cang , a cang ly leh kama taiteipaw maw a cang tah cawh a hni thlang a .
43007018	Ama dunah hratah male a cawngpahpaw cawh ama ming chahnah a huipaw a cang . Canghrasala ama a taw tupaw ming chah nápaw caw tei a hrepaw cawngsaw cawh zingchuipaw cawngsaw a cang ; a chung letah hinghenah hnui be .
43007019	Phungbia khah Moses tah ca pei bei he maw ? Pakheh tahmai tah naa zui tlung be . Zecawtamaw thaw na pa pachia he ceh ? ” tatah a tah he .
43007020	Cawngsaw zawpui taco , “ Nama cawh khachia tah a pahrangpaw na cang . Ahomaw thaw a ca pachia ? ” tatah aa chai .
43007021	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Ningang chuipaw sangkheh ka tuapaw khah naa zongmingtei tah naa khuarawh a haa .
43007022	Moses tah cingpatainah phung a ca peh caw he tah Sabat ning tahmai nyheh khah aa cingpa naa tai he kho . A ngetei tahpaw co , ma cawh Moses taitah a chuhpaw cang lytah naa pu naa paw sahlo taitah a chuhpaw a cang kho .
43007023	Moses phungbia khah ro tlung lytah nyheh khah Sabat ning tah aa cingpa naa tai he a cang caco , zecawtamaw Sabat ning tah cawngsaw pakheh ka dangsahnah rawng letah ka cung letah naa thing a ae ?
43007024	A cungphai a langná tah biacepah khe la , a dingpaw teitah biace my lo , ” tatah a tah he .
43007025	Ma bia rawng taco Jerusalem khuapui letei a ungpaw cawngsaw thaikhehpaw sahlo tah , “ Ma paw heh thaw a pachiapaw he khah cang bei maw ?
43007026	Ma lehei a langhai tah bia rei ka , zekhatahmai aa tah tlung be . Nawhnuitu sahlo tahei Khri cawh ama heh a cang tahpaw hnih pase ta he maw ?
43007027	Canghrasala kaaning sahlo taco ma cawngsawpaw heh zelang tah a va chuhpaw maw a cang tah hnih thlang tlung peh ka , canghrasala Khri a va chua tih taco zelang tamaw a va chua a tahpaw ahotahmai aa hni tlung be , ” tatah aa tah .
43007028	Mataico , Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung letei a cawngpahnah pawhe leco a thangpui tah y ka , “ A cang , pa hnih he ceh ka , zelang tah a va chuhpaw maw ka cang tahpaw zong naa hni . Kama ka rei tah ma lehei a vong bei neh , canghrasala a pa tawtupaw cawh ahmangpaw a cang . Naaning taco Ama cawh hnih bei he ceh ,
43007029	canghrasala kama taco Ama cawh ka hni , zecawtamaw tatah Kama cawh Ama taiteipaw cang neh ka , Ama tah a pa taw , ” tatah a tah .
43007030	Ma leco tle a pachia he , canghrasala ahotahmai a cung letah aa kih thlah bei he , zecawtamaw tatah a cai khah tlung balang be .
43007031	Cawngsaw zawpui chung letei mehlupui takhei Ama cawh aa zing . “ Khri a va chua tihtah ma cawngsawpaw navy hei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a hlu vy a tua hlui maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
43007032	Cawngsaw zawpui tah ma hratei a kong aa reipatlaw tlungmangpaw khah Farasi sahlo tah aa thui . Mataico , tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo takhei Zisu cawh tle pawtah behnah ing raevai sahlo khah aa taw he .
43007033	Zisu taco , “ Naaning khatah cai cuitei ung neh ka , mataico a pa tawtupaw khatah ka sei a .
43007034	Pa hui he ceh ka , pa hmuh a bei ceh ; ka ungnahpaw lang zong va sei khy bei ceh , ” tatah a tah .
43007035	Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh pakheh le pakheh khah , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh kaa hmuh khy ly nápawtah zelang maw sei a pachia ? Grik cawngsaw sahlo hrong letei a kaipaza pawhe Juda cawngsaw aa ungnah lang sei ka maw , Grik cawngsaw sahlo a va cawngpah he a ?
43007036	‘ Pa hui he ceh ka pa hmuh a bei ceh , ka ungnah lang zong va sei khy bei ceh , ’ a tahpaw heh zemaw a rei du ? ” tatah aa tah tlungmang .
43007037	Panawnah a changnah le a rungnaw caipaw ning leco Zisu cawh a daw ka , a thangpui tah , “ A tui a hraepaw cawngsaw cawh Kama kha a vong seh la , va ding seh .
43007038	A pa zingpaw cawngsaw cawh Capathai tei a reipaw hratah hringnah tuihnaw a chung taitah a laichua a , ” tatah a tah .
43007039	A reidupaw cawh Ama a zingpaw sahlo tei aa cy lepaw Thlawpaw khah a cang . Ma cai tai leco Zisu cawh parungnaw a cang balang ly cawtah Thlawpaw khah peh cang balang bei he .
43007040	A bia aa thuinah cawtah khei cawngsaw thaikhehpaw sahlo tah , “ Ma cawngsaw heh kaa haw thlangpaw Khazing khuavang a cang hrahring thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
43007041	Ahringpaw takhei , “ Ama heh Khri cawh a cang , ” tatah aa tah . Ahringpaw vy taco , “ Zekhatamaw Khri cawh Galili raang taitah a chua thai a ?
43007042	Capathai tah Khri cawh David pathlah taitah le David a ungnahpaw khua , Bethlehem taitah a chua a tah bei maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
43007043	Taico Zisu rawng taco zawpui cawh a chaichy he .
43007044	Thaikhehpaw tah tle du he ka , canghrasala ahotahmai tah a cung letah aa kih thlah bei he .
43007045	A changnah leco behnah ing raevai sahlo cawh tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo khakhei a vaw kaw he ka , “ Zecawtamaw naa va chuakhui be ? ” tatah aa hae he .
43007046	Behnah ing raevai sahlo taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw tei a reipaw hrahei a reipaw ahohmai ung balang bei he , ” tatah aa tah he .
43007047	Farasi sahlo taco , “ Naaning zong ca dungkhei thah hrah ta he maw ? ” tatah aa tah he .
43007048	“ Hruitu sahlo le Farasi sahlo hrong letah ama a zingpaw a ung he maw ?
43007049	Aa ung tlung be . Canghrasala , ma zawpuipaw tahei co phungbia zehmai aa hni tlung be , macawtaco pui aa cung letah chiasahnah a tlung he , ” tatah aa tah .
43007050	Aa hrong letei cawngsaw pakheh Nikodema , zai tah Zisu khah a vawpaw takhei ,
43007051	“ Kaa phungbia tahei cawngsawpaw zemaw a tua tahpaw hlehlang taw lytah thaily a cangsah maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
43007052	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Nama zong Galili raang taiteipaw cang hrah ta ceh maw ? Khazing bia letah mingtua , Khazing khuavang cawh Galili raang taitah chuh a be , tahpaw cawh na hmuh thlang a , ” tatah aa palei .
43007053	Mataico aa ing cacy khei a dih he .
43008001	Canghrasala Zisu cawh Oliv tlaang lang khah a sei .
43008002	Mongdi takhei behnah ingdung chunglang khah a nae kaw ka , zawpui cawh ama khatah a vong he ka , taico a ty ka , aaning cawh a cawngpah he .
43008003	Phungbia cawngpahtu sahlo le Farasi sahlo takhei capaw kha a phei leimeinah letah aa tlepaw canu pakheh khah aa va chuakhui . A hme leco a dawsah he ka ,
43008004	Zisu hai leco , “ Cawngpahtu , ma canuno heh capaw kha a phei leimeinah letah tlepaw a cang .
43008005	Phungbia leco Moses tah , ‘ Ma hapaw canu cawh alung tah naa vaseh he a , ’ tatah bia a ma peh . Nama saw zekhatamaw na rawh ? ” tatah aa tah .
43008006	Ma biahaenah heh , Ama sua aa pu khy nápawtah ahui hratah aa thlahkhaipaw a cang . Canghrasala , Zisu taco alui lang a bung ka , a kihdong tah alui leco ca a cia .
43008007	Bia cawh aa haechai leimei tihtah a ka y ka , aa hai leco , “ Naaning hrong lehei a sua bang lypaw takhei ma canuno heh alung co va taw seh , ” tatah a tah he .
43008008	Taico a khuh ka , alui leco ca cawh a cia kaw .
43008009	Ma bia a thuipaw sahlo cawh a macang caipaw taitah a nyheh caipaw tai pakheh khy pakheh tah seihly thlu he ka , Zisu longtei khah aa patang si , canuno cawh ma leco a daw thlang hrah .
43008010	Zisu cawh a ka daw ka , canuno cawh , “ Cawngsawno , zelang maw aa ung thlu ? Ahotahmai thaily ca cangsah bei he maw ? ” tatah a hae .
43008011	Canuno taco , “ Cawngpahtu , ahotahmai tah thaily pa cangsah bei he , ” tatah a tah . Mataico Zisu tah , “ Kama zong tah sua ca phosah hrah bei neh . Va sei la , va sua khawh kheh lo , ” tatah a tah .
43008012	Zisu taco zawpui sahlo khakhei bia cawh a reikaw , “ Kama cawh khazaw khainah ka cang . A pa zuipaw cawh a muinah letah sei by be , khainah tei a pehpaw hringnah khah a hnui hri a , ” tatah a tah .
43008013	Farasi sahlo taco , “ Nama tah nama na kong lilaw na rei hi . Macawtaco na reipaw heh zehmai cang be , ” tatah aa tah .
43008014	Zisu taco , “ Kama teitah ka cangnah ka rei tahmai tah ka reipaw cawh ahmangpaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah kama taco zelang tamaw va chuh neh ka , zelang maw ka sei a , tahpaw ka hni . Canghrasala naaning taco zelang tamaw va chuh neh ka , zelang maw ka sei a , takhah hnih bei ceh .
43008015	Naaning taco mehnung phung tah bia naa ce tei ; Kama cawh ahohmai biacepah bei neh .
43008016	Canghrasala bia ka cepah he tahmai tah ka cepahnah cawh ahmang a , zecawtamaw tatah Kama teitah cang bei neh . A pa tawtupaw Paw khatah ka daw peh .
43008017	Naaning naa phungbia letah mehnung pahning tah biaparua tei aa reipaw cawh a hmang tatah a cia hrah bei maw !
43008018	Kama cawh Kama teitah ka cangnah a reipaw ka cang ; a pa hnikhuitu ahringpaw cawh a pa tawtupaw , Paw khah a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
43008019	Mataico Zisu cawh , “ Na paw cawh zeletamaw a ung ? ” tatah aa hae . Zisu taco , “ Naaning cawh kama zong pa hnih bei ceh , ka Paw zong hnih bei ceh . Kama naa pa hni caco , ka Paw zong naa hni thlang hrá a , ” tatah a palei he .
43008020	Ma bia heh behnah ing chung tholong aa chianahpaw kae letei a cawngpah ning he tah a reipaw a cang . Ahotahmai tle hrah bei he , zecawtamaw tatah a cai a tlung balang lynah cawtah a cang .
43008021	Aa hai letah Zisu tei a rei vypaw cawh , “ Kama cawh sei neh ka , pa hui he ceh ka , naa suanah letah na thi he ceh . Ka seinahpaw lang zong a vong khy bei ceh , ” a tah he .
43008022	Macawtaco Juda cawngsaw sahlo tah , “ Ka seinahpaw lang va sei khy bei ceh a tahpaw heh , ‘ Kama le kama ka thae a , ’ a tah dunah maw a cang a ? ” tatah aa tah .
43008023	Canghrasala aa hai leco , “ Naaning sahlo cawh a rai lang taiteipaw na cang he ceh . Kama cawh cung lang taiteipaw ka cang . Naaning cawh khazaw leteipaw cang he ceh ka , Kama cawh khazaw leteipaw cang bei neh .
43008024	Naa suanah letah na thi he ceh tatah ka ca ching thah he ; Kama cawh ka reipaw ama khah ka cang ka tahpaw naa zing ly caco , naa suanah letah na thi hrahring thlang he ceh , ” tatah a tah vy .
43008025	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Ahomaw na cang ? ” tatah aa hae . Zisu taco , “ Athoning taitah pui ka ca ching thah he kha , ” tatah a palei he .
43008026	“ Naaning naa kong letah bia rei ruapaw a hlupui ka hnui . Canghrasala a pa tawtupaw cawh a paichai tlang cang ka , ama taitei ka thuipaw khah khazaw heh ka chingpaw a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
43008027	Aaning sahlo taco , a Paw kong a ma ching tahpaw khah thui thai bei he .
43008028	Macawtaco Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw naa calia tih taco ahomaw ka cang tahpaw le , kama ka rei tah zehmai ka tua lypaw le , Paw tei a pa cawngpahpaw khah ka rei takhah naa hni tae a .
43008029	A pa tawtupaw cawh Kama khatah a ung . Kama long teitah pa seisai be , zecawtamaw tatah Ama a lung a lawng nápaw khah ka tuateinah cawtah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
43008030	A reipaw bia a thuipaw mehlupui tah Ama khah aa zing .
43008031	Zisu tah Ama a zingpaw Juda cawngsaw sahlo hai letah , “ Ka cawngpahnah letah naa ung paria thlang caco , ka hningzuitu hmuisui na cang he ceh .
43008032	Mataico biahmuisui hnih a he ceh ka , ma biahmuisui taco a ca lua sá he a , ” tatah a tah he .
43008033	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Kaaning cawh Abraham pathlah cang peh ka , aho sae hmai cang bang bei peh , zecawtamaw luasah na cang he ceh , tatah na ma tah ? ” tatah aa chai .
43008034	Zisu taco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , a suapaw maikaw cawh suanah sae a cang he .
43008035	Sae cawh ingchungkho letah reipai ruapaw cang be , canghrasala Sawcapaw cawh chaizaw cawtah ingchungkho letah a ungpaw a cang .
43008036	Macawtaco Sawcapaw tah a ca luasah caco he , na lua hmuisui he ceh .
43008037	Abraham pathlah na cang he ceh tah cawh ka hni . Canghrasala Kama cawh thaw na pa pachia he ceh , zecawtamaw tatah ka bia tah naa chung letah hminghmaw hnui be .
43008038	Paw a hmekaw letei ka hmuhpaw khah ca ching he neh ka , canghrasala naa paw taitei naa thuipaw khah naa tua laky thlang , ” tatah a palei he .
43008039	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Abraham cawh a ma pathlahtu a cang , ” tatah aa chai . Zisu taco , “ Abraham pathlah naa cang caco , Abraham a tuapaw khah pui naa tuá caw !
43008040	Khazing taitei ka thuipaw biahmuisui a ca chingpaw he Kama heh thaw na pa pachia he ceh . Abraham taco ma hapaw cawh a tua bang tlung be .
43008041	Naaning sahlo cawh naa paw tei a tuapaw hming sahlo khah naa tua leimei thlang tei , ” tatah a tah he . Aaning sahlo taco , “ Kaaning cawh zisaw kaa cang tlung be . Paw ka hnuipaw cawh Khazing suipaw a cang , ” tatah aa tah .
43008042	Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Khazing khah naa Paw a cang caco , naa pa do ruapaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing taitah a vong neh ka , atoheh ma lehei ka ungpaw a cang . Kama ka rei tah a vong bei neh . Ama tah a pa tawpaw a cang hri .
43008043	Zecawtamaw ka biareipaw heh naa hni pase thai be ? Zecawtamaw tatah ka reipaw naa thui thaily navai tah a cang .
43008044	Naaning cawh Setan khah naa paw cang ka , naa paw a dupaw khah tua lai naa du . Ama cawh athoning taitah lenongpaw cang ka , biahmuisui khah a tle be , zecawtamaw tatah ama letah biahmuisui a ung lynah cawtah a cang . A hing tihtah ama a chuakhuipaw khah a reipaw a cang thlang , zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh mehing le hingnah paw a cang .
43008045	Biahmuisui ka rei thlang naná teitah pa zing bei he ceh hi !
43008046	Suanah a tua tatah a pa tah khypaw na ung he ceh maw ? Biahmuisui ka ca ching tei he a cang caco , zecawtamaw naa pa zing be ?
43008047	Khazing tei a cangpaw cawngsaw taco Khazing rei khah a nge . Khazing a rei naa nge lynah chang cawh Khazing tei naa cang lynah cawtah a cang hi , ” tatah a tah he .
43008048	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Nama cawh Samaria cawngsaw cang ceh ka , na chung letah khachia a hrei kaa ca tahpaw khah ahmang thlang bei maw ? ” tatah aa chai .
43008049	Zisu taco , “ Ka chung letah khachia a hrei be , ka Paw khah cizaw neh ka , canghrasala naaning taco pa cizaw bei ceh .
43008050	Kama cawh Kama ka rungnawnah a huipaw cang bei neh ; canghrasala a pa huipahtu pakheh ung ka , Ama cawh biacetu a cang .
43008051	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ka bia a zuipaw cawngsaw cawh thi hrahring a be , ” tatah a tah .
43008052	Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei , “ Na chung letah khachia a hrei hrahring thlang tahpaw atoheh a se pawtah kaa hni myca . Abraham cawh thi ka , ma hraco Khazing khuavang sahlo zong a thi hrah he , canghrasala nama taco ka bia a zuipaw cawngsaw cawh thihnah pateh hrahring a be , tatah na tah .
43008053	Nama cawh kaa mapaw Abraham navy tah na lai vy maw ? Ama cawh thi ka , ma hraco Khazing khuavang sahlo zong a thi hrah he . Aho tamaw na rei ? ” tatah aa tah .
43008054	Zisu taco , “ Kama le kama ka parungnaw caco , ka parungnawnah cawh zehmai cang be . Kaa Khazing naa tahpaw ka Paw heh a pa cuicaling tu cawh a cang .
43008055	Ama cawh naa hni ly tahmai tah Kama taco Ama cawh ka hni . Hnih bei neh ka tah caco , naaning hratah mehing ka cang hrá a , canghrasala Ama cawh hnih neh ka , a bia khah ka zui .
43008056	Naa mapaw Abraham cawh ka va chua nápaw ning hmuh ruapaw heh a ngete be ca ka , ka ning cawh hmuh ka , a lawng ngetei , ” tatah a palei he .
43008057	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Nama cawh kung songngaw hmai na tah balang tlung be , Abraham cawh na hmuh thah tah law ! ” tatah aa tah .
43008058	Zisu taco , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Abraham a pi hlai tah a ung thahpaw ka cang ! ” tatah a chai he .
43008059	Ma tih taco Ama va nápawtah alung cawh haw he ka , canghrasala Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung taikhei piathlah ka , a nawh .
43009001	Lang letah a seipai khei a no chungpi taitei a mehcopaw cawngsaw pakheh khah a hmuh .
43009002	A hningzuitu sahlo taco Zisu cawh , “ Cawngpahtu , a no chungpi tei a mehcopaw cawngsawpaw heh ama a suanah rawng tamaw a cang , a cang ly leh a no le paw aa suanah rawng tah ? ” tatah aa hae .
43009003	Zisu taco , “ Ama a suanah rawng tah cang be , a no le paw aa suanah rawng tah zong cang be , ma hratei a cangpaw heh a hringnah letah Khazing rai a langsah nápaw cawtah a cang hri .
43009004	A pa tawtupaw a rai heh ching cai a cang chung lehei kaa hre a . Ahohmai aa hre khy ly nápaw zai cai a va chuh a .
43009005	Kama heh khazaw letah ka ungchung tahei co , khazaw khainah ka cang , ” tatah a tah .
43009006	Ma bia a rei khy taico alui letah a ci chawh ka , a ci co alui cawh nawng ka , cawngsawpaw a mehkho leco a hne pah .
43009007	“ Va sei la , Siloam tuiping letah a va si , ( Siloam a silang cawh Taw tahnah a cang ) , ” tatah a tah . Macawtaco cawngsawpaw cawh sei ka , a va si ka , khua cawh hmuh kaw ka , ing lang a dih .
43009008	A ingpaw sahlo le kih dopaw a cangpaw a hmuh teipaw cawngsaw sahlo takhei , “ Ma cawngsawpaw heh a ty hmo tei kih a do teipaw khah cang thlang bei maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
43009009	Thaikhehpaw cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Ama khah a cang thlang , ” aa tah . Ahringpaw sahlo taco , “ Cang be , ma cawngsawpaw khah a lo bia a cang , ” tatah aa tah . Canghrasala ama teitah , “ Ma cawngsawpaw khah ka cang , ” tatah a tah .
43009010	A cang caco , “ Zekhatah zia tamaw na meh cawh khua a hmuh khy ? ” tatah aa hae .
43009011	Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Zisu aa tahpaw cawngsawpaw takhei alui nawng ka , ka meh letah a pa hne . Taico va sei la Siloam tuiping letah a va si tatah a pa tah . Macawtaco sei neh ka , a va si neh ka , mataico khua ka hmuh khy , ” tatah a palei he .
43009012	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw cawh zeletamaw a ung ? ” tatah aa hae . “ Hnih bei neh , ” tatah a tah he .
43009013	Aaning sahlo taco a meh a za copaw cawngsawpaw khah Farasi sahlo khakhei aa va chuakhui .
43009014	Zisu tah alui nawng katei , cawngsawpaw a meh khua a hmuhsah kawnah ning khah Sabat ning a cang .
43009015	Macawtaco zekhatah zia tamaw khua a hmuh khy kaw tahpaw khah Farasi sahlo zong taco aa hae . Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Ka meh letah catlawh pa hne ka , a si neh ka , atoheh khua ka hmuh khypaw a cang , ” tatah a palei he .
43009016	Farasi thaikhehpaw sahlo taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw cawh Khazing taiteipaw cang be , zecawtamaw tatah Sabat ning hmai a zaa lypaw , ” tatah aa tah . Canghrasala , ahringpaw sahlo takhei , “ Mehsua taco ma hapaw ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah cawh zekhatamaw a tua khy a ? ” tatah tah he ka , macawtaco a chaichy he .
43009017	A hning taco , mehcopaw lang cawh a hui kaw he ka , “ Ama a kong rei ruapaw na hnuipaw a ung maw ? Na meh cawh ama tah khua ca hmuhsah tlung ka , ” tatah aa tah . Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Khazing khuavang a cang , ” tatah a palei he .
43009018	Ma cawngsawpaw cawh athoning tah a meh za co katei , ato letah khua a hmuhpaw khah Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco zing be ca he ka , macawtaco cawngsawpaw a no le a paw cawh aa va ysah he .
43009019	“ Ma cawngsawpaw heh a no chungpi tah a meh a co naa tahpaw naa sawcapaw cawh a cang maw ? Atoheh zekhatah zia tamaw khua a hmuh khy kaw thai ? ” tatah aa hae he .
43009020	A no le paw taco , “ A hmang , kaa sawcapaw a cang . A no chungpi tah a mehcopaw a cang .
43009021	Canghrasala atoheh zekhatah zia tamaw khua a hmuh khy , aho tamaw a meh cawh khua a hmuhsah tahpaw cawh hnih bei peh . Ama khah hae thlang o . A kungkhua a zawpaw a cang myca ; Ama tah ca chai thlang he seh , ” tatah aa chai he .
43009022	A no le paw tah ma bia aa reipaw heh Juda cawngsaw sahlo khah aa cinah caw he tah a cang , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo takhei Zisu cawh Khri a cang tatah a tahpaw maikaw cawh synagog taitah papia a cang he a tatah bia aa thlia thah cawtah a cang .
43009023	Ma rawng tahei , “ A kungkhua a zaw capaw a cang , ama khah hae thlang o , ” tatah a no le a paw tah aa tahpaw khah a cang .
43009024	Aaning sahlo taco a meh a za copaw cawngsawpaw cawh a uihningnah aa va ysah kaw he . “ Khazing tukhah reithai , ma cawngsawpaw heh mehsua a cang tah kaa hni , ” tatah aa tah .
43009025	A meh a za copaw cawngsawpaw taco , “ Mehsua a cang le cang ly kama hnih bei neh . Kama cawh mehco cang neh ka , canghrasala atoheh cawh khua ka hmuh myca tah long heh ka hni , ” tatah a palei he .
43009026	Taico ma cawngsawpaw cawh , “ Nama khatah zehming maw a tua ? Zekhatamaw na meh cawh khua a hmuhsah ? ” tatah aa hae .
43009027	Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Ka ca ching thah thlang he ceh saw , naa nge du tlung be . Zecawtamaw naa pa hae hry kaw leimei ? A hningzuitu cang maw naa du hrah ? ” tatah a chai he .
43009028	Mataico aa sawsaw tah ma cawngsawpaw cawh , “ Nama khah ma cawngsawpaw a hningzuitu khah na cang kho ! Kaaning cawh Moses hningzuitu ka cang peh hi !
43009029	Khazing cawh Moses kha bia a rei tei tahpaw kaa hni , canghrasala ma cawngsawpaw kong lehei co , zelang tamaw a va chua tahpaw hmai hnih bei peh , ” tatah aa tah .
43009030	Cawngsawpaw taco , “ Ka meh cawh khua a pa hmuhsah thlang ceh samaw , zelang tamaw a va chua tah naa hni lypaw cawh khuarawha a chui caimang .
43009031	Khazing taco mehsua sahlo aa bia cawh nge be . Khazing zing ka , a dunah a tuapaw cawngsaw aa bia khah a nge tah cawh kaa hni .
43009032	A no chungpi tah a meh a copaw khua a hmuhsah he aa tahpaw ahohmai thui bang bei peh .
43009033	Ma cawngsawpaw heh Khazing taiteipaw a cang ly caco , zehming hmai tua khy a be ! ” tatah a chai he .
43009034	Aaning sahlo taco , “ Nama na pinah taitei suaná tah a chihpaw tahei maw kaaning cawh cawngpah na ma pachia hrah ! ” tatah aa palei . Taico aa tingchua .
43009035	Aa papia hly tahpaw khah Zisu tah thui ka , a tong tihtah a hai leco , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh na zing maw ? ” tatah a tah .
43009036	Ma cawngsawpaw taco , “ Cawngpahtu , ama cawh ahomaw a cang ? Ka zing khy nápawtah pa ching theh law , ” tatah a hae .
43009037	Zisu taco , “ Ama cawh na hmuh thahpaw ; atoheh nama khatei bia a rei leimeipaw cawngsawpaw heh a cang hi , ” tatah a tah .
43009038	Mataico cawngsawpaw taco , “ Abuipaw ka zing , ” tah ka , a beh .
43009039	Zisu taco , “ Mehco tah khua aa hmuh khy nápawtah le khua a hmuhpaw cawh mehco aa cang nápawtah khazaw lehei biace pawtah ka va chua , ” tatah a tah .
43009040	Ama khatei a ungpaw he Farasi thaikhehpaw sahlo tah ma bia cawh aa thui tihtah , “ Kaaning zong aa meh a co na ma tah dunah a cang maw ? ” tatah aa hae .
43009041	Zisu taco , “ Naa meh cawh co seh la , thaily na cang lypaw he ceh , canghrasala kaa meh khua a hmuh naa tah caw tahei thaily naa cang ning thlang he ceh .
43010001	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , tuu a ki chunglang a naenah ingkaw lang tah a nae ly tei ahringpaw lang tah a kepaw cawngsaw cawh mehru le damia a cang .
43010002	A naenah ingkaw lang tei a naepaw cawh a tuurung a kingpaw cawngsaw a cang .
43010003	A kingtu cawngsaw takhei a kha cawh hong pah a ka , tuu sahlo taco a o khah aa nge a . A tuu sahlo khah aa ming tah y he ka , khungthing lang a piakhui he a .
43010004	A tuu sahlo khah a papia thlu tih he tah ama tah langhmesah pá he ka , a tuu sahlo taco aa zui a , zecawtamaw tatah a o khah aa binah cawtah a cang .
43010005	Canghrasala ming hringpaw khah cawh zui by bei he , ma cawngsaw khah cawh aa saisai hrahring a , zecawtamaw tatah a o khah aa bi lynah rawng tah , ” tatah a tah .
43010006	Zisu tah a biareinah letah ma tawchingnah bia heh a hmang tihtah aaning sahlo taco zemaw a ma ching tahpaw khah thuithai bei he .
43010007	Macawtaco Zisu tah , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Kama heh tuu a naenah ingkaw cawh ka cang .
43010008	Kama hlai tei a va chuhpaw vytei cawh mehru le damia a cang he , canghrasala tuu takhei aaning sahlo aa rei cawh nge bei he .
43010009	Kama heh a naenah ingkaw cawh ka cang . Kama lang tei a naepaw maikaw cawh pachah a cang he a . A nae a , piahly a , tah a ka , lawh zong a hmuh a .
43010010	Mehru cawh ruh du tah le thaw du tah le rorang du tah a vongpaw a cang . Kama cawh hringnah aa hnui khy nápawtah le hringnah a hlupui tah aa hnui khy nápawtah ka vong hi .
43010011	Kama heh tuukingtu chaw cawh ka cang . Tuukingtu chaw taco a tuu cawtah a hringnah a peh .
43010012	A hlofapaw tuukingtu cawh tuu a hnuitupaw cang be , macawtaco chahnia a va chuapaw khah a hmuh tihtah tuu sahlo khah hningchai si he ka , a sai . Mataico chahnia taco tuurung khah ty he ka , a papaipatlaw he .
43010013	Cawngsawpaw cawh a sai , zecawtamaw tatah ama cawh a hlofapaw hlang chongpaw cang ka , tuu sahlo kong khah a pacangpaw cang be .
43010014	Tuuking chaw cawh kama heh ka cang . Ka tuu khah hnih he neh ka , ka tuu zong tah aa pa hni hrah .
43010015	Paw tah pa hnih katei , Kama tah Paw khah ka hnipaw hratah a cang . Taico tuu sahlo caw taco ka hringnah ka peh .
43010016	Ma tuurung letei a cang lypaw tuu ahringpaw ka hnui vy he . Aaning sahlo zong khah ka va chuakhui he a . Aaning sahlo zong taco ka o nge a he ka , tuurung rungkheh le tuuking pakheh suitei a cang tae a .
43010017	Ka Paw tei a pa dopaw cawh ka hringnah ka pehnah rawng takhei a cang , ma cawh hmuh kaw taepaw khah a cang .
43010018	Ka hringnah heh ahotahmai pa chu khy bei he , canghrasala kama ka rei tah ka pehpaw a cang . Peh khynah naw hnui neh ka , lah kaw khynah naw zong ka hnui . Ma nawhnuinah heh ka Paw tai tah ka hmuhpaw a cang , ” tatah a tah he .
43010019	Ma bia rawng tahei Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh a chaichy vy hui he .
43010020	Aaning letei mehlupui takhei , “ Khachia tah a hrei ka , a hruh myca , zecawtamaw a bia naa nge ? ” tatah aa tah .
43010021	Canghrasala ahringpaw takhei , “ Ma bia heh khachia tah a tlepaw cawngsaw bia cang be . Khachia taco mehcopaw khah khua a hmuhsah khy maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
43010022	Mataico behnah ing Pehlainah Panaw khah Jerusalem khuapui letah aa tua . Ma cawh thlasih chung tah cang ka ,
43010023	Zisu cawh behnah ingdung chung Solomon dungkalung aa tahpaw lekhei a khiakaly leimei .
43010024	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco cadung he ka , “ Zetih tai maw lung langlo tah na ma chia a ? Khri na cang caco , a se pawtah ma ching thlang , ” tatah aa tah .
43010025	Zisu taco , “ Ca ching thah he neh ka , canghrasala pa zing bei ceh . Ka Paw ming tei ka tuapaw ningang chuipaw sahlo tahei kama rei hy lytah aa rei thlang hi ,
43010026	canghrasala zing bei he ceh , zecawtamaw tatah ka tuu naa cang lynah cawtah a cang .
43010027	Ka tuu taco ka o aa nge , aaning sahlo cawh hnih he neh ka , aa pazui .
43010028	Chaizaw hringnah pei he neh ka , lyde khaw bei he . Ahotahmai ka kih chung taitah pa chu khy bei he .
43010029	Aaning a pa peipaw ka Paw cawh zezongpui navy tah alai vy . Aaning sahlo cawh ka Paw kih chung taitah ahotahmai chu khy a bei he .
43010030	Kama le Paw cawh pungkheh kaa cang peh , ” tatah a tah .
43010031	Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei Ama va nápawtah alung a lah kaw hui he ,
43010032	canghrasala Zisu taco aa hai letah , “ Paw taiteipaw ningang chuipaw hming rungnawpaw a hlupui khah ka ca hmuhsah thah he . Ma hrong leco zehapaw hming takhei maw alung tah va tah thaw naa pa za ? ” tatah a tah he .
43010033	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco , “ Ma sahlo rawng takhei alung tah va kaa ca zapaw cang be , cawngsaw na cang thlang naná teitah Khazing ka cang tatei na tahpaw , Khazing na reipachia navai takhei a cang , ” tatah aa palei .
43010034	Zisu taco aaning sahlo cawh , “ Naa phungbia letah , ‘ Naaning cawh khazing sahlo ka ca tah he , ’ tatah a cia bei maw ?
43010035	Khazing tah a bia a tlungnah cawngsaw sahlo khah hmai , ‘ khazing sahlo , ’ tatah a y he . Taico Capathai cawh ro khypaw cang be tah cawh naa hni .
43010036	Paw tah a tei rua pawtah patlia ka , khazaw lehei a za tawpaw kama ka kong heh zekhatamaw a cang a ? Mataico , zecawtamaw , ‘ Khazing Sawcapaw ka cang , ’ ka tahpaw heh Khazing a reipachia tatah naa pa tah ?
43010037	Ka Paw tei a tuapaw khah ka tua ly caco , pa zing khe o .
43010038	Canghrasala ma cawh ka tua caco , naa pa zing ly tahmai tah ningang chuipaw sahlo heh zing o . Ma tih taco kama ka chung letah Paw a ungpaw le Paw a chung letah ka ungpaw khah naa hnithai a , ” tatah a chai he .
43010039	Aaning sahlo taco tle a pachia kaw hui he ka , canghrasala a lysai he .
43010040	Mataico Zisu cawh Jordan tuivaw cakah kaw ka , khuahlai tei Johan tah baptisma a cangsahnah hminghmaw lang khah a sei . Ma leco va ung ka ,
43010041	cawngsaw hlupui Ama khatah a vong he . “ Johan tahei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a tua bang ly naná teitah ma cawngsawpaw kong a reipaw vytei heh cawh ahmang cehceh , ” tatah aa tah .
43010042	Taico ma hminghmaw leco mehlupui tah Zisu cawh aa zing .
43011001	Lazaru aa tahpaw cawngsawpaw cawh a sah . Ama cawh Bethani khuapaw cang ka , Bethani cawh Mari le a chuahruino Martha aa khua a cang .
43011002	Mari heh Abuipaw cung letah ringthopaw bia katei , a sang tah a phe a hrupah no khah a cang . A sahpaw Lazaru heh a cawtei a cang .
43011003	Macawtaco a satei leh takhei Zisu cawh , “ Abuipaw , na dopaw cawngsawpaw khah a sah ngetei , ” tatah bia aa caw .
43011004	Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah Zisu taco , “ Ma asawnah heh thih nápaw cang be . Ma asawnah cawh Khazing rungnawnah cawtah cang ka , ma thong khei , Khazing Sawcapaw zong tah rungnawnah a hmuh a , ” tatah a tah .
43011005	Zisu taco Martha le a chuahruino le Lazaru cawh a do ngetei he .
43011006	Lazaru a sah tahpaw khah a thui naná teitah a ungnah leco ninghning a caang vy .
43011007	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo khah , “ Judia raang lang sei kaw he peh , ” tatah a tah he .
43011008	Canghrasala aaning sahlo taco , “ Cawngpahtu , kaa hninglang tei lekhei pui Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei alung tah va aa ca za kha , ma lang cawh sei na pachia kaw thlangpaw cawh ? ” tatah aa tah .
43011009	Zisu taco , “ Ching cai letah suimehlang hluihning ung bei maw ? Ching tah a khiapaw cawngsaw cawh a pachih a be , zecawtamaw tatah khazaw khainá khei khua a hmuh cawtah .
43011010	Zai tah a khiapaw cawngsaw cawh a pachih a , zecawtamaw tatah khainah a hnuilynah cawtah , ” tatah a palei he .
43011011	Ma bia a rei khy taitah a ching vypaw he cawh , “ Kaa vesawpaw Lazaru cawh a ihning thah , canghrasala ama pahrá pawtah ka sei a , ” tatah a chai he .
43011012	A hningzuitu sahlo taco , “ Abuipaw a ihning caco , a dang vy thlang a , ” tatah aa tah .
43011013	Lazaru a thi tahpaw khah Zisu tah a rei leimei naná teitah a hningzuitu sahlo taco ihning cakhawngpaw a rei rua tatah aa rawh .
43011014	Macawtaco Zisu taco a sepaw tah , “ Lazaru a thi thah ,
43011015	canghrasala naa zing khy nápawtah naa cawtah ma letei ka ung lypaw cawh ka thaw a chah caimang . Ama khatah va sei tua he peh , ” tatah a ching he .
43011016	Mataico Thomas ( Didama aa tahpaw ) takhei a tangpaw a hningzuitu sahlo hai le co , “ Ama kha thih hrá pawtah sei hrá he peh , ” tatah a tah he .
43011017	A va phah ning taco Lazaru cawh athlai letah aa phungnah taitah ningpali a tah thah takhah Zisu tah a hmuh .
43011018	Bethani khua cawh Jerusalem khuapui taitah khanghning tluh a hlah ka ,
43011019	aa cawtei a thih cawtah khei Mari le Martha khah a ty khui pawtah Juda cawngsaw ahlupui a va chuh he .
43011020	Zisu a va sei leimei tahpaw khah Martha tah a thui tihtah va dai pawtah piathlah ka , Mari tu cawh ing letah a ung thlang .
43011021	Martha taco Zisu hai letah , “ Abuipaw , ma lehei ung thlang lacaw , ka cawtei cawh a thih tlung be .
43011022	Canghrasala ato lehei zong na haepaw maikaw cawh Khazing tah a ca peh thlang a tah cawh ka hni , ” tatah a tah .
43011023	Zisu tah Martha hai leco , “ Na cawtei cawh a tho kaw a , ” tatah a tah .
43011024	Martha taco , “ Caichangnah letei thokawnah leco a tho kaw a tah cawh ka hni thlang , ” tatah a chai .
43011025	Zisu taco a hai letah , “ Kama heh thokawnah le hringnah cawh ka cang . A pa zingpaw cawngsaw cawh a thih tahmai tah a hring a ,
43011026	taico kama zing hmotah a hringpaw maikaw cawh thi by bei he . Ma bia cawh na zing maw ? ” tatah a tah .
43011027	“ A cang , Abuipaw , nama cawh khazaw letah a vong lepaw Khazing Sawcapaw Khri na cang tah ka zing , ” tatah a tah .
43011028	Taico Martha cawh ma bia a rei khy taico va sei kaw ka , a chuahruino Mari khah aparuh teitah a va y , “ Cawngpahtu ma lehei ung ka , a ca ding leimei kho ! ” tatah a tah .
43011029	Ma bia cawh a thui tihtah Mari cawh rairang tah tho ka , Zisu a tong rua pawtah khei a sei .
43011030	Zisu cawh khuachung lang khah a va nae thlah balang be , Martha tei a va dainah hminghmaw lekhei a ung thlang .
43011031	Mari a tykhuipaw khatah ing letah a ungpaw he Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei he Mari rairang tah tho katei , a piathlahpaw khah hnih he ka , thlai lang caw rua pawtah a sei rua tah he ka , aa zui .
43011032	Mari taco Zisu a ungnah hminghmaw khah va phah ka , a hmuh tihtah a phehrang leco a khuh panai ka , “ Abuipaw , ma lehei ung thlang la caw , ka cawtei cawh a thi tlung be , ” tatah a tah .
43011033	Zisu cawh Mari a cawpaw le ama khatei aa ka seipaw Juda cawngsaw sahlo zong aa caw hrahpaw khah a hmuh tihtah a hnahru cai ka , a lung a ny .
43011034	“ Zeletamaw naa phung ? ” tatah a hae he . “ Abuipaw , a vong la , va ming tua , ” tatah aa palei .
43011035	Zisu cawh a cah .
43011036	Mataico Juda cawngsaw sahlo takhei , “ Zetlua tamaw a do tahpaw mingtua hmai o ! ” tatah aa tah .
43011037	Canghrasala aaning letei thaikhehpaw sahlo takhei , “ Mehcopaw a meh khua a hmuhsah khypaw cawngsaw taco ma cawngsawpaw heh thih lytah ungsah khy rua bei maw ? ” tatah aa tah .
43011038	Zisu cawh a ngechia ngetei hmo khei thlai lang khah a vaw . Ma thlai cawh lungkua , a kaw khah alung tah aa khapaw a cang .
43011039	“ Alung heh lawhly tua o , ” tatah a tah . Canghrasala a thipaw cawngsaw a sateino Martha takhei , “ Abuipaw , kaa phung ná tah ningpali cang myca ka , a hnang ngetei tha a , ” tatah a tah .
43011040	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Na zing caco , Khazing rungnawnah na hmuh a takhah ca ching thah bei neh maw ? ” tatah a tah .
43011041	Macawtaco alung cawh aa lahly . Mataico Zisu cawh avai lang a y ka , “ Ka Paw , na pa thuipah cawtah ka ca lawng .
43011042	Ka bia na pa thuipah tei takhah ka hni , canghrasala ma heh cawh ma letei a daw thlangpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawtah ka reipaw a cang , aaning sahlo tahei kama cawh nama tah na tawpaw a cang tahpaw aa zing khy nápawtah , ” tatah a tah .
43011043	Ma bia a rei khy leco , Zisu cawh a thangpui tah , “ Lazaru , ka pia ! ” tatah a y .
43011044	A thipaw cawngsaw cawh pai anaipaw tei a kih le a phe tongchai hmo le a hme pailu bakhu hmo khei a ka pia . Zisu taco aaning sahlo cawh , “ Rawh pai sahlo heh pahlu pá la , sei sá law , ” tatah a tah he .
43011045	Macawtaco Mari a ty khui rua tah va chuh he katei , Zisu a hming tuapaw a hmuhpaw Juda cawngsaw mehlupui taco , Zisu khah aa zing .
43011046	Canghrasala aaning letei thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh Farasi sahlo khakhei a vaw he ka , Zisu a hming tuapaw khah aa va ching he .
43011047	Mataico , tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo taco biacetu Sanhedrin phu khah a pahmosah he ka , “ Zekhatamaw kaa tua a ? Ma cawngsawpaw tahei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a hlupui a tua leimei tlung .
43011048	Ma hrahei kaa seisah thlang tei a cang caco , ming maikaw tah ama cawh zing a he ka , mataico Rom cawngsaw va chua he ka , kaa behnah ing le kaa raang khah aa ma lah pah a , ” tatah aa tah .
43011049	Mataico aa hrong letei pakhehpaw Kaiafa aa tahpaw ma kung letei tlangbui alaicaipaw a cangpaw taco , “ Zehmai hnih bei ceh .
43011050	Raang pungpaluh a ro navy tah cawngsaw zawpui cawtah pakheh thih cawh a chah vy tahpaw heh hnih bei ceh maw ? ” tatah a tah he .
43011051	Ma bia heh ama lungthó tah a reipaw cang be , ma kung lekhei tlangbui alaicaipaw a cangpaw hrakhei Juda mingphing cawtah Zisu a thi a tah le ,
43011052	Juda mingphing caw long tah cang lytah Khazing sawtei a papaipatlawpaw sahlo khah hmingkheh tah va chuakhui tei , sangkheh tah tua ruapaw he tah a thi a tatah bia a phyhlangpaw a cang .
43011053	Macawtaco ma ning taico Zisu cawh thaw rua pawtah khei khua aa khang .
43011054	Macawtaco , Zisu cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo hrong lekhei langhai tah a khialai khawh be . Ma taikhei piathlah ka , raangcaa kae letei a ungpaw Efraim aa tahpaw khua lang khah sei ka , ma leco a hningzuitu sahlo khatah aa va ung .
43011055	Ma cai heh Juda cawngsaw sahlo Khungsai Panawnah cai khah a cang daimang tei myca . Ming hlupui cawh aa ungnah khua cacy taikhei Jerusalem khuapui lang khah panawnah cawtah phungbia hratah a pathai a pahling rua pawtah khei a sei tlungmang myca he .
43011056	Zisu cawh huilai he ka , behnah ingdung chung letah a daw thlang he ka , pakheh le pakheh cawh , “ Zekhatamaw na rawh ? Panawnah lang heh a va chuh thly a na tah maw ? ” tatah aa hae he .
43011057	Canghrasala tlangbui macang sahlo le Farasi sahlo tah Zisu khah tle aa du cawtah a ungnah aa hnihpaw maikaw tah naa ma ching a , tatah naw aa peh he .
43012001	Khungsai Panawnah hlai ningruh lekhei Zisu cawh thihnah taitei a pathopaw Lazaru a ungnah khua Bethani khah a va phah .
43012002	Ma leco Zisu pasungpanaw nápaw cawtah zairia dung hruinah tuapah he ka , Martha cawh batui peitu cang ka , cabuai cadung tei a ty thlangpaw he hrong lekhei Lazaru cawh Zisu khaco a ty hrah .
43012003	Mataico Mari tah nard thingkungpaw taitah lahpaw , a patahpaw , a mai a ru ngeteipaw , sathy ringthopaw kia songthung tluh khah law ka , Zisu a phe leco bia ka , a sang tah a hrupah . Taico ing chung cawh ringthopaw a ring takhei a rung thlu .
43012004	Canghrasala a hningzuitu pakheh a cangpaw Judas Iskariot , a hning tah ama a luitupaw takhei ,
43012005	“ Ma ringthopaw khah zua tah a mai cawh mehsisah khah peh hri ruapaw he cang bei maw ? Ma khah kung kheh nihlo mai pui a cang caw ! ” tatah a tah .
43012006	Ma bia a reipaw heh mehsisah kong a pacang cawtah cang lytah mehru cang ka , a kaipaw tangkabawng chung taikhei a za lah leimei tei cawtah a cang .
43012007	Zisu taco , “ Ama khah hna hnawh khe o . Ka rawh phung ning cawtah ma ringthopaw cawh pacung thlang ky seh .
43012008	Mehsisah cawh naa hrong letah a ung paria thlang he , canghrasala Kama cawh ung paria bei neh , ” tatah a palei .
43012009	Ma letei Zisu a ungpaw khah Juda cawngsaw rungpui takhei hnih he ka , a vong he . Ma cawh Zisu a ung caw long takhei cang lytah thihnah taitah a pathopaw Lazaru hmuh du takhei zong a cang .
43012010	Macawtaco tlangbui macang sahlo takhei Lazaru khah thaw pai hrápaw tah khua aa khang ,
43012011	zecawtamaw tatah ama a rawng tah Juda cawngsaw ahlupui cawh Zisu khatah a vaw he ka , aa zingnah cawtah a cang .
43012012	Ningthlamongpaw cawh Khungsai Panawnah a va zopaw cawngsaw rungpui takhei Jerusalem khuapui lang Zisu a va sei a tahpaw khah aa thui .
43012013	Aaning sahlo taco atung kung a cai khah thlia he ka , va dai rua pawtah aa sei . “ Hosana ! Abuipaw ming tei a vongpaw cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh . Israel Siangpahrang cawh bonghnang song tah ung ky seh , ” tatah aa y lai .
43012014	Zisu tah la teitei khah hmuh ka , a cung leco a ke , Capathai letei ciapaw hratah ,
43012015	“ Zion sawcanu , na thlawzawng kheh seh . Mingtua , na Siangpahrang cawh la teitei va ke lai ka , a vong leimei . ” tah heh a cang .
43012016	Athoning taco a hningzuitu sahlo cawh ma heh thuithai bei he . Zisu parungnaw a cang khy taitah longlong , ma hming sahlo heh ama a kong aa ciapaw hratah a cung letah aa tua ky he , takhah aa hni thai .
43012017	Ama khatah a ungpaw cawngsaw rungpui takhei Zisu tah Lazaru khah athlai chung lekhei y ka , thihnah taitah a patho tahpaw bia khah aa reipachaw lai .
43012018	Zisu tah ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah a tua tahpaw cawh aa thuinah cawtah cawngsaw hlupui cawh ama a tong rua paw takhei a sei he .
43012019	Macawtaco Farasi sahlo cawh pakheh le pakheh khah , “ Mingtua hmai la , zekhatah tah khy khawh bei peh hi . Khazaw pungpaluh tah pui aa zui myca he ! ” tatah a tah he .
43012020	Khungsai Panawnah zo tei a seipaw he sahlo hrong lekhei Grik cawngsaw thaikheh a ung hrah he .
43012021	Aaning sahlo cawh Galili raang , Bethsaida khua letah a ungpaw Filip khakhei a vong he ka , “ Abuipaw , Zisu hmuh kaa du , ” tatah aa tah .
43012022	Filip taco Andru khah a va ching ; aa pahning co va sei he ka , Zisu cawh aa va ching .
43012023	Zisu tah , “ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw parungnawnah cai cawh a va chuh myca .
43012024	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , alui letah a tlahpaw sacaang hmu cawh a thih lypaw co sangkheh teitah a cang paria thlang . Canghrasala , a thih taikhei longlong sacaang hmu a hlupui a chuasah .
43012025	A hringnah a dopaw cawngsaw taco sung a ka , ma khazaw letei a hringnah a huapaw cawngsaw taco chaizaw hringnah letah a chia a .
43012026	Ka rai a hrepaw taco pazui ka , ka ungnah letah ka raihretu cawh a ung hrá a . Ka rai a hrepaw cawngsaw cawh ka Paw tah a cuicaling a .
43012027	Atoheh cawh ka lung reithui ka , zemaw ka rei a ? ‘ Ka Paw , ma suimehlang cai taihei pa pachah tua , ’ ka tah a maw ? Cang be , ma cawpaw hrahring tahei ma suimehlang cai lehei ka vongpaw cang tlung ka .
43012028	Ka Paw , na ming a rungnawnah palang my lo ! ” tatah a tah . Mataico avai taitah , “ Ka parungnaw thah , taico ka parungnaw vy a , ” tatah o a za ring .
43012029	Ma leco ung katei , ma o a thuipaw cawngsaw rungpui taco khalung a thih tah he ka , ahringpaw sahlo takhei , “ Vaiming tah bia a ching , ” tatah aa tah .
43012030	Zisu taco , “ Ma o heh Kama ka cawtah cang be , naaning naa chahnah cawtah a cang hri .
43012031	Khazaw biacenah cai cawh atoheh a cang , ato lehei khazaw uhtu bui cawh tingchua a cang tae a .
43012032	Canghrasala alui taihei calingchy ka cang tihtah Kama hrahring tah ming vytei khah Kama kha ka kui he a , ” tatah a tah .
43012033	Zekhatamaw a thih a tahpaw hmuhsahnah takhei ma bia heh a reipaw a cang .
43012034	Cawngsaw zawpui taco , “ Phungbia leco Khri cawh chaizaw tah a hming a tatah kaa thui . Zecawtamaw , ‘ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw cawh khraws chung letah caling tah khaipai a cang a , ’ tatah na tah ? ‘ Cawngsaw Sawcapaw , ’ cawh ahomaw a cang ? ” tatah aa tah .
43012035	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Cai a cawngpe chung cy khainah naa hnui a . Khainah naa hnui chung tahei a khia o , muinah tah a ca phah hlai he tahei . A muinah letah a khiapaw cawngsaw taco zelang maw a sei tahpaw hnih be .
43012036	Khainah naa hnui chung tei lehei khainah leco naa zingnah cawh chia my lo , ma pawsui co khainah sawtei tah naa cang khy a , ” tatah a ching he . Bia a reipaw a pachang tihtah Zisu cawh piathlah ka , aaning sahlo cawh a nosai he .
43012037	Zisu tah aa hmekaw letei ma vytei ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah sahlo a tua khy taihei hmai aaning sahlo taco zing hlui bei he .
43012038	Ma heh Khazing khuavang Isaiah tei a reipaw : “ Abuipaw , aho tamaw kaa bia zing ka , aho kha tamaw Khazing tah a kih thawtlungnah cawh a langsah ? ” tahpaw a tlingnah khah a cang .
43012039	Ma rawng tahei zing khy bei he , zecawtamaw tatah Isaiah tei a rei vypaw cawh ,
43012040	“ Ama tah aa meh co sah he ka , aa lungthing a mosah he , macawtaco aa me tah hmuh khy be ca he ka , aa lung tah hnih thai bei he , ma hratei a cang ly caco , a paleh kaw he ka , ka dangsah thá he a , ” tatah a tah .
43012041	Isaiah tei ma bia a reipaw heh Zisu rungnawnah khah hmuh ka , a kong khah a reipaw a cang .
43012042	Ma naná co hruitu sahlo letei mehlupui takhei hmai Zisu cawh aa zing thlang . Canghrasala Farasi sahlo rawng takhei kaa zing tah ngang bei he , zecawtamaw tatah synagog taitah aa ma papia sua a , takhah aa phang cawtah a cang ;
43012043	zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh Khazing taitei pachawnah navy khei cawngsaw taitei pachawnah khah aa tlechai vy cawtah a cang .
43012044	Mataico Zisu cawh , “ Kama a pa zingpaw cawngsaw cawh kama longtei a pa zing cang lytah a pa tawtupaw zong khah a zing hrah .
43012045	Kama a pa ming tihtah a pa tawtupaw zong khah a hmuh pai .
43012046	Kama cawh khazaw lehei khainah hratah a vong neh ka , a pa zingpaw maikaw cawh a muinah letah ung thlang bei he .
43012047	Ka bia thui thlang katei , a zui lypaw cawngsaw cawh Kama tah biace pá bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah khazaw bia ce pá pawtah a vongpaw cang be ca neh ka , pachah a pawtah a vawngpaw ka cang hri .
43012048	Kama pahlawh katei , ka bia a cyhlang lypaw cawngsaw caw taco biacetupaw a ung thlang . Ka reipaw bia ceingei tahei ama cawh caichangnah letah thaily a cang sá a .
43012049	Zecawtamaw tatah Kama ka tua chawngpaw tah ka reipaw cang lytah Paw , a pa tawtupaw tei zemaw reipaw , zekhatamaw reipaw tah bia a pa pehpaw tukhah ka reipaw a cang hri .
43012050	A biapeh cawh chaizaw hringnah a phahkhuitu a cang takhah Kama cawh ka hni . Macawtaco ka reipaw maikaw cawh Paw tei rei ruapaw a pa tahpaw longtei khah a cang , ” tatah o thang puitah a y .
43013001	Ma heh Khungsai Panawnah hlai tah a cang . Zisu taco khazaw piasai tei Paw khatah a sei nápaw cai khah a va chuh myca takhah a hni . Khazaw letei a ungpaw , a tei a cangpaw sahlo khah a do tunah caw he tah zetlua tamaw a do he takhah a hmuhsah he .
43013002	Zai batui aa cadung ning takhei Setan tah Simon a sawcapaw Judas Iskariot lungchung leco Zisu lui nápaw rawhnah khah a khung thah .
43013003	Zisu taco Paw tah ka hmingtuakhynah rai letah zezongpui a chia tah le kama cawh Khazing taitah a vongpaw cang neh ka , Khazing kha ka sei kaw a tahpaw khah a hni .
43013004	Taico batui cadungnah taico tho ka , a angki a cung lang teipaw khah pahlu ka , a te letah pavuapai a pangia .
43013005	Ma khy taico cawtaw letah tui cawh tlai ka , a hningzuitu sahlo cawh aa phe khah si he ka , a te letei a pangiapaw pavuapai co a hrupah he .
43013006	Simon Piter kha a vaw ka , Piter taco a hai letah , “ Abuipaw , nama pui tamaw ka phe na pa si a ? ” tatah a tah .
43013007	Zisu taco , “ Zemaw ka tua tahpaw hnih bei ceh , canghrasala , a hning tah na hni tae thlang a , ” tatah a palei .
43013008	Piter taco , “ Cang be , ka phe cawh pa si by bei ceh , ” tatah a tah . Zisu taco , “ Ka ca si ly caco , kama a pa zuitu cang khy khaw bei ceh , ” tatah a chai .
43013009	Simon Piter taco , “ Abuipaw , catei a cang caco , ka phe long cang lytah ka kih le ka lu zong pa si pai thlang , ” tatah a palei .
43013010	Zisu taco , “ A ngai a si thahpaw cawngsaw cawh a phe suipaw heh si a hia . A pungpaluh cawh a pathai thlang . Taico naaning cawh na pathai thlang he ceh , canghrasala naa zongmingtei co cang bei he ceh , ” tatah a chai .
43013011	Zecawtamaw tatah ahomaw a pa lui a takhah a hni cawtah cang ka , macawtaco naa zongmingtei co pathai bei he ceh a tahpaw khah a cang .
43013012	Aa phe a si khy tai he co a angki cawh a hrei kaw ka , a ungnah lang khah a vaw ka , “ Naa caw tei ka tuapaw khah naa hnithai maw ? ” tatah a hae he .
43013013	Naaning taco , “ ‘ Cawngpahtu , ’ le ‘ Abuipaw , ’ tatah pa y he ceh ka , a hmang ngetei , zecawtamaw tatah ma cawh ka cang hmuisui .
43013014	Ato lehei kama , naa Buipaw le cawngpahtu tahei hmai naa phe ka ca si caco he naaning zong pakheh le pakheh naa phe a sipah cy my lo .
43013015	Kama heh a pa mingpai na he ceh seh tatah naa phe ka ca sipaw he khah a cang .
43013016	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , sae cawh a buipaw navy tah lai vy be ca ka , siapaw zong a siatu navy tah lai vy hrah be .
43013017	Atoheh cawh ma hming sahlo heh naa hni myca , ma sahlo cawh naa tua caco , bonghnang song na cang he ceh .
43013018	Naa zongmingtei khei ka ca tahpaw he cang be ; ka thingpaw sahlo cawh ka bi thlang he . Canghrasala ma heh Capathai letei , ‘ Ka very a e hrahpaw takhei a phengavang hmo a pa paleh so , ’ tahpaw tlingnah khah a cang .
43013019	Hming a va cang tihtah kama cawh ama khah ka cang tahpaw naa zing khy nápawtah ato a cang hlai tahei ka ca chingpaw he a cang .
43013020	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ka tawpaw cawngsaw a cyhlangpaw he cawh kama a pa cyhlangpaw cang he ka , kama a pa cyhlangpaw he cawh a pa tawtupaw a cyhlangpaw a cang he , ” tatah a tah .
43013021	Ma bia a rei khy taico , Zisu cawh a lung reithui ka , “ Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , naaning letah pakheh tah naa pa lui a , ” tatah a tah he .
43013022	A hningzuitu sahlo cawh pakheh le pakheh khah a ming he ka , “ Ahomaw a ma tahnang tu he ? ” aa tah he .
43013023	Aaning letei pakheh , Zisu tei a dopaw a hningzuitu cawh ama a kae lekhei a ty thlang .
43013024	Simon Piter takhei ma a hningzuitu cawh a mehnaw tuapah ka , “ Ahomaw na tahnang ? ” tatah hae law a tah .
43013025	Ma cawngsawpaw taco Zisu khah a va ne ka , “ Abuipaw , ma paw cawh ahomaw a cang ? ” tatah a hae .
43013026	Zisu taco , “ Ma cawngsawpaw cawh bakang letah very heh ka nong khy taitah ka pehpaw cawngsaw khah a cang a , ” tatah a chai . Mataico very cawh nong ka , Simon a sawcapaw Judas Iskariot khah a peh .
43013027	Judas tah very khah a hlang cangkaw tei leh a chunglang khah Setan cawh a nae . Zisu taco , “ Na tua ruapaw cawh tua tlamang thlang , ” tatah a tah .
43013028	Canghrasala Zisu tah ma hratei a tahpaw khah batui a dungpaw ahotahmai tah thuithai bei he .
43013029	Judas cawh tangka a kaipaw a cangnah cawtah , “ Zisu tahei Panawnah cawtah a hiapaw cawh rua pawtah a ching rua , a cang ly leh mehsisah khah hming sangkheh kheh pei bang law a tah rua , ” tatah cawngsaw thaikhehpaw tah aa rawh .
43013030	Judas cawh very khah a hlang cangkaw tei leh a piahly . Taico ma cawh zai tah a cang .
43013031	A sei khy taico Zisu tah , “ Atoheh cawh Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh parungnaw cang myca ka , Ama leco Khazing zong parungnaw a cang myca .
43013032	Ama letah Khazing cawh parungnaw a cang caco , Khazing taco Ama ceingei letah Sawcapaw cawh parungnaw a ka , ry lytah a parungnaw palang a .
43013033	Ka sawtei sahlo , naaning khatah cai a cuitei suipaw ka ung a . Pa hui he ceh ka , Juda cawngsaw ka chingsipaw he hrakhei atoheh ka ca ching hrah he . Ka seinah lang cawh va sei khy bei ceh .
43013034	Biapeh thapaw ka ca peh he : Pakheh le pakheh a do cy my lo . Ka ca dopaw he hrakhei pakheh le pakheh a do cy my lo .
43013035	Pakheh le pakheh na do cy caco he ceh ma leco ming vytei tah ka hningzuitu naa cangpaw khah aa ca hni he a , ” tatah a tah he .
43013036	Simon Piter taco Zisu cawh , “ Abuipaw , zelang maw na sei a ? ” tatah a hae . Zisu taco , “ Ka seinahpaw lang cawh ato lehei co pazui khy bei ceh , canghrasala , a hning tah na pazui tae a , ” tatah a palei .
43013037	Piter taco , “ Abuipaw , zecawtamaw ato lehei ka ca zui khy be ? Na caw taco ka hringnah ka pae hi , ” tatah a tah .
43013038	Mataico Zisu tah , “ Ka cawtah na hringnah na peh hmuisui maw ? Biahmuisui ka ca ching , aa a khawng hlai tah uithung tai na pa paphahsai a !
43014001	Naa lung rei a thuisah khe lo . Khazing zing la , kama zong pa zing hrah my lo .
43014002	Ka Paw a ing letah ungnah a khang hlupui a ung . Ma cawh cang lytah ung my seh la , ka ca ching tha he a . Naa cawtah ungnah hminghmaw tingtua rua pawtah ma lang cawh ka sei a .
43014003	Taico va sei neh ka , naa cawtah hminghmaw ka va tingtua a , ka ungnah letah naaning zong naa ung khy hrah nápawtah naaning lá pawtah ka vong kaw a .
43014004	Ka sei nápaw langpui cawh naa hni thlang kho , ” tatah a tah he .
43014005	Thomas taco a hai letah , “ Abuipaw , zelang maw na sei a tah hmai kaa hni lypaw tah zekhatamaw langpui cawh kaa hni thai a ? ” tatah a tah .
43014006	Zisu taco , “ Kama heh langpui le biahmuisui le hringnah cawh ka cang hi . Kama lang tah aa va sei lypaw co ahohmai Paw kung tlung khy a bei he .
43014007	Naa pa hni hmuisui caco ka Paw naa hni hra a . Atoning taihei Ama cawh hnih he ceh ka , naa hmuh thah myca , ” tatah a chai .
43014008	Filip taco , “ Abuipaw , Paw cawh ma hmuhsah la , ma cawh kaa cawtah a zaw thlang a , ” tatah a tah .
43014009	Zisu taco , “ Filip , ma vytei naaning khatah ka ung khy tai lehei hmai pa hnih ting bei ceh maw ? Kama a pa hmuhpaw taco Paw khah a hmuh myca , zecawtamaw , ‘ Paw cawh ma hmuhsah tua , ’ na tah thlang ?
43014010	Kama cawh Paw letah ung neh ka , Paw cawh Kama letah a ung tahpaw heh zing bei ceh maw ? Naaning khatei bia ka reipaw heh Kama taiteipaw a cang tlung be . Paw , Kama letei a ungpaw tah ma rai heh a hre .
43014011	Kama cawh Paw chung letah ung neh ka , Paw cawh ka chung letah a ungpaw khah zing thlang . Ma cawh na zing khy ly tahmai ningang chuipaw ka tuapaw rawng chang tahei zing thlang .
43014012	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Kama letah zingnah a hnuipaw taco ka tuapaw khah aa tua hrah a . Zecawtamaw tatah Paw kha ka sei a navai tahei , ma sahlo navy tei a rungnaw vypaw hming sahlo hmai khah aa tua a .
43014013	Taico , ka ming tei naa haepaw maikaw khah ka tua a . Ma cawh Paw rungnawnah khah Sawcapaw letah a lang nápawtah a cang .
43014014	Ka ming tah zezongpui hae la , ka tua a .
43014015	Naa pa do caco , ka biapeh heh naa nge a .
43014016	Taico Paw khah hae a neh ka , Ama taco naaning khatah chaizaw ung a pawtah ahringpaw Singchingtu , biahmuisui a kaitu Thlawpaw khah a ca pae he a .
43014017	Khazaw tahei Ama cawh cyhlang khy be , zecawtamaw tatah Ama cawh hmuh be ca ka , hnih hrah be . Canghrasala naaning taco naa hni , zecawtamaw tatah Ama cawh naaning khatah ung ka , naa chung letah a ungparianah cawtah a cang .
43014018	Haraw kingry hratah ca seisai bei neh , naaning kha ka vong kaw a .
43014019	A cawngpe khy leco khazaw tahei pa hmuh khaw be , canghrasala naning taco naa pa hmuh a . Zecawtamaw tatah ka hringnah cawtah hei na hring hrá he ceh .
43014020	Ma ning leco kama cawh ka Paw chung letah ka ungpaw le naaning cawh Kama letah naa ungpaw le Kama cawh naaning letah ka ungpaw khah naa hnithai a .
43014021	Ka biapeh thui katei a ngepaw maikaw cawh a pa dopaw cawngsaw a cang he . Kama a pa dopaw cawngsaw cawh ka Paw tah do he ka , Kama zong tah do he neh ka , ama leco Kama ceingei ka hmuh sá he a , ” tatah a chai .
43014022	Mataico Judas ( Judas Iskariot khah cang be ) takhei , “ Abuipaw , zecawtamaw kaaning a hmuh sápaw taco a pachia ceh ka , khazaw a hmuh sápaw taco na pachia be ? ” tatah a tah .
43014023	Zisu taco , “ Kama a pa dopaw taco ka cawngpahnah khah a nge a . Ama cawh ka Paw tah do ka , ama khaco , a vong peh ka , ama khatah ka cinglai a peh .
43014024	Kama a pa do lypaw cawngsaw taco ka cawngpahnah khah nge be . Ma naa thuipaw bia sahlo heh kama ka bia cang bei he . Kama a pa tawtupaw Paw a bia a cang .
43014025	Naaning kha ka ungchung tahei ma vytei heh ka ca ching thah he .
43014026	Canghrasala , Singchingtu a cangpaw Thlawpaw Pathai , Paw tei ka ming tah a za taw lepaw takhei zezongpui ca ching a he ka , ka rei ciapaw bia vytei khah a ca hnisah hry he a .
43014027	Thlawlungnah ka ca chiapah si he , Kama ka thlawlungnah khah ka ca peh he . Khazaw tei a ca pehpaw he hratah ca pei bei neh . Naa lung rei a thuisah khe la , ci khe lo .
43014028	‘ Sei neh ka , naaning kha ka vong kaw a , ’ ka tahpaw naa thui thlang kho . Naa pa do caco , Paw kha ka sei a ka tahpaw heh naa thaw a cha a , zecawtamaw tatah , Paw cawh Kama navy tah a rungnaw vy .
43014029	Hming a va cang tihtah naa zing khy nápawtah ato a cang hlai lehei ka ca ching pacia thlu thah he hi .
43014030	Naaning khatah bia sypui rei hmai khaw bei nei , zecawtamaw tatah khazaw uhtu bui a vong leimei myca . Ama cawh ka cung letah hmingtuakhynah hnui be .
43014031	Canghrasala Paw ka dopaw le ka Paw tei bia a pehpaw khah achaw teitah ka tua tahpaw cawh khazaw tahei a hni hrahring a . A vong la , sei he peh , ” tatah a tah he .
43015001	“ Kama heh misurzung hmuisui cawh cang neh ka , ka Paw cawh buichung hnuitu a cang .
43015002	Ama taco kama letei a cai a thui a thui lypaw maikaw cawh chawhly a ka , a cai a thuipaw maikaw khah thui vy lo leimei seh tatah pathai pahling teitah a tua a .
43015003	Naaning cawh ka ca ching thahpaw he bia khei pathaipahlingsah ciapaw na cang he ceh .
43015004	Kama lehei ung la , naaning letah ka ung hrá a . Zehapaw a cai hmai ama tei co thui khy be , a zung letah a pazo ceingeipaw a cang . Ka chung letah naa ung ly caco thui khy bei ceh .
43015005	Kama heh a zung cawh ka cang , naaning cawh a cai na cang he ceh . Ahohmai kama letah ung ka , ama letah ka ung hrah caco , thui hlupui a thui a . Kama kha na pazo ly caco he ceh zehmai tua khy a bei ceh .
43015006	Kama letei a ung lypaw cawh vathlang he katei , a uipaw cai hratah a cang a . Ma hapaw a cai cawh pakhong he ka , me lang bo he ka , a kang thlu tei .
43015007	Kama letah naa ung le naaning letah ka bia a ung caco , naa dupaw maikaw khah hae la , peh na cang he ceh .
43015008	Thui a hlupui naa thui caco , ma cawh ka Paw rungnawnah cang ka , ka hningzuitu na cang he ceh tah na langsahnah pawhe ceh a cang .
43015009	Paw tah a pa dopaw hratah ka ca do hrah he . Ka donah chung lehei ung paria thlang my lo .
43015010	Paw a biapeh nge neh ka , a donah letah ka ung paria thlangpaw hratah ka biapeh naa nge caco , ka donah letah na ung paria a he ceh .
43015011	Ma bia ka ca chingpaw he heh naa chung letah ka lawngnah a ung tei , na lawngnah pawhe ceh a chihlui khy nápaw cawtah a cang .
43015012	Ka biapeh cawh , ‘ Ka ca dopaw he hratah pakheh le pakheh a do cy my lo , ’ tahpaw heh a cang .
43015013	Huivesaw cawtah hringnah pehnah tai donah navy tah alai vypaw donah ung be .
43015014	Bia ka ca pehpaw he khah naa tua caco , ka vesaw na cang he ceh .
43015015	Sae tatah ca tah khawh bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah sae taco a buipaw a tuapaw khah hnih be . Huivesaw tatah ka ca tah hri myca he , zecawtamaw tatah ka Paw taitei ka thuipaw vytei khah ka ca hnisah thlu thah he .
43015016	Naaning tah pa thing bei ceh , va sei tah a thui thui pawtah le a paruipaw thui thui rua pawtah kama tah ka ca thing he . Mataico ka ming tei naa haepaw maikaw khah Paw tah a ca pae he a .
43015017	Ka biapeh cawh , ‘ Pakheh le pakheh a do cy my lo , ’ tahpaw heh a cang .
43015018	Khazaw tah a ca hua caco he kama a pa hua taw thah tahpaw khah naa thinglung letah chia thlang my lo .
43015019	Khazaw a tei naa cang caco , a tei hratah a ca do he a . Canghrasala naaning cawh khazaw a tei cang bei ceh , kama tah khazaw taihei ka ca thing thah myca he . Ma rawng tahei khazaw tah a ca hua he hi .
43015020	Ka ca chingpaw he bia , ‘ Sae cawh a buipaw navy tah lai vy be , ’ tahpaw khah a thui paria thlang my lo . Aa pa hreh caco , naaning zong aa ca hreh hrá he a . Ka cawngpahnah aa nge caco , naaning zong aa ca nge hrá he a .
43015021	Ka ming navai tah aa ca pasi aa ca pasa he a , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo cawh a pa tawtupaw khah hnih bei he .
43015022	A vong lytah le bia ching lytah ung my he neh seh la , suanah cawh hnui a bei he . Ma duitei cawh atoheh cawh aa suanah khah a paphah khy bei he .
43015023	Kama a pa huapaw taco ka Paw zong khah a hua hrah .
43015024	Ahotahmai tah aa za tua bang lypaw khah aa hrong letah za tua lytah ung my neh seh la , suanah cawh hnui a bei he . Canghrasala ato lehei ma ningang chuipaw sahlo khah hmuh thlang he ka , ka Paw kha , Kama kha , kaa pahning tah aa ma hua he .
43015025	Canghrasala , ma heh aa phungbia letei ciapaw , ‘ A silang ly pui tah aa pa hua thlang he , ’ tahpaw a tlingnah khah a cang .
43015026	Paw taitah a chuhpaw biahmuisui a kaitu Thlawpaw , ka Paw tei a va taw lepaw Singchingtu a va chua tih taco , kama ka kong khah a ca ching he a .
43015027	Naaning zong tah naa ching lai hra he a , zecawtamaw tatah athoning taitah Kama kha a ungpaw naa cang cawtah .
43016001	Langpui naa pave ly nápawtah ma vytei heh ka ca chingpaw he a cang .
43016002	Aaning sahlo taco synagog alailang aa ca papia he a . Naaning a ca theh pawhe sahlo tah Khazing rai kaa hrepaw a cang tatah aa rawh nápaw he cai a va chuh leimei myca .
43016003	Aaning sahlo taco ma hapaw hming cawh aa tua a , zecawtamaw tatah Paw zong Kama zong ma hnih bei he .
43016004	A cai a va chua tihtah a za ma ching thah tatah naa tah rua pawtah ma heh ka ca chingpaw he a cang . Athoning takhei co za ca ching bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah naaning kha ka ung thlang cawtah a cang .
43016005	Atoheh cawh a pa tawtupaw kha ka sei myca a . Canghrasala , ‘ Zelang maw na sei a ? ’ tatah aho tahmai tah pa hae tua hrah bei ceh ,
43016006	zecawtamaw tatah ma hming sahlo heh ka ca chingnah caw he tahei naa nge a ca chia he .
43016007	Canghrasala biahmuisui ka ca ching he , Ka seipaw heh naa cawtah chah nápaw a cang . Sei lytah ung my neh seh la , Singchingtu cawh naaning kha a vong a be . Canghrasala ka sei caco , Ama cawh naaning kha ka va taw a .
43016008	A va chua tihtah khazaw cawngsaw sahlo khah suanah kong le dingnah kong le biacenah kong letah biahmuisui khah a hnisah he a .
43016009	Suanah kong letah thaily a cang he a , zecawtamaw tatah kama aa pa zinglynah cawtah ,
43016010	dingnah kong letah thaily a cang he a , zecawtamaw tatah Paw khatah sei a neh ka pa hmuh khy khaw a bei ceh .
43016011	Taico biacenah kong letah thaily a cang he a , zecawtamaw tatah khazaw uhtu bui cawh thaily cangsah a cang thah cawtah .
43016012	Naaning kha rei ruapaw a hlupui ka hnui thlang naná teitah ato lehei co a cingkai khy bei ceh .
43016013	Canghrasala biahmuisui a kaitu Thlawpaw a va chua tih taco biahmuisui chunglang khah a ca nae khui he a . Ama a lungchuá tah rei a be , a thuipaw khah rei ka , a va chuh lepaw kong khah a ca ching he a .
43016014	Kama ka tei a cangpaw khah law ka , a ca hnisahnahpaw he takhei Kama rungnawnah khah a va chuakhui a .
43016015	Paw tei a hnuipaw vytei cawh ka tei a cang . Thlawpaw taco ka tei a cangpaw tai khei law a ka , naaning khah a ca hnisá he , tatah ka za ca tahpaw he khah ma cawtah hei a cang .
43016016	Cai acawngpe cawh pa hmuh khaw bei he ceh , mataico cai cawngpe letah naa pa hmuh kaw a . ” tatah a tah .
43016017	A hningzuitu thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh pakheh le pakheh khah , “ ‘ Cai acawngpe cawh pa hmuh khaw bei he ceh , mataico cai cawngpe letah naa pa hmuh kaw a , ’ a tahpaw le , ‘ Zecawtamaw tatah Paw kha ka sei a cawtah , ’ a tahpaw heh zemaw a rei dupaw a cang ? ” tatah aa tah .
43016018	“ Cai acawngpe letah a tahpaw heh zemaw a rei du ? A reipaw heh kaa thuithai tlung be , ” tatah aa tah leimei .
43016019	Zisu tah ma kong heh hae aa pa du takhah a hni . Macawtaco aa hai letah , “ Cai acawngpe cawh pa hmuh khaw bei he ceh , mataico cai cawngpe letah naa pa hmuh kaw a ka tahpaw ka reidupaw khah maw pakheh le pakheh na hae leimei he ceh ?
43016020	Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , khazaw a lawng chung tahei co , naaning cawh caw le sang tah naa ung he ceh , naa lungsi a sá a . Canghrasala naa lungsisawnah cawh lunglawngnah tah a cang tae a .
43016021	Ny a chaipaw canu cawh taithuinah a ing , zecawtamaw tatah ny a chai cai a phah cawtah . Canghrasala ny a chua khy taico a sawtei khazaw letei a za pipaw lunglawngnah thong khei , a taithuinah khah a monghly thlu .
43016022	Ma hraco na cang hrá he ceh : Atoheh cawh naa lungsisawnah cai a cang , canghrasala ca hmuh kaw he neh ka , na lawng he ceh , taico na lawngnah pawhe ceh cawh ahotahmai ca chu khy a bei he .
43016023	Ma ning leco zehmai pa hae khawh bei ceh . Biahmuisui ka ca ching he , ka Paw tah ka ming tah naa haepaw maikaw khah a ca pae he a .
43016024	Ato tingtai lehei co ka ming tah zehmai hae bang bei he ceh . Hae la , hmuh a he ceh ka , na lawngnah pawhe ceh cawh a tling a .
43016025	Tawchingnah bia tah ka za rei tei naná teitah ma hapaw bia cawh ka hmang khawh ly nápaw cai khah a va chuh myca a , ma tih taco ka Paw kong cawh a se pawtah ka ca ching he a .
43016026	Ma ning leco ka ming tah naa hae a . Paw khah naa vypaw tah ka hae a ka tahnah cang be .
43016027	Paw Khazing hrahring tahei a ca do he , zecawtamaw tatah pa do he ceh ka , Khazing taitah ka vongpaw khah naa zing cawtah a cang .
43016028	Kama cawh Paw taitah khazaw lehei a vongpaw ka cang . Atoheh cawh khazaw heh piasai neh ka , Paw kha ka sei kaw myca a , ” tatah a tah he .
43016029	Mataico a hningzuitu sahlo takhei Zisu hai letah , “ Atoheh cawh tawchingnah hmang lytah a sepaw tah na rei myca hi .
43016030	Nama tah zezongpui khah hnih ceh ka , haecakhia leimei a hy khawh bei ceh tah cawh atoheh kaa hni myca , ma tahei Khazing taitah na vong tahpaw khah a ma zingsah , ” tatah aa tah .
43016031	“ Atoheh cawh naa zing myca ! ” tatah Zisu tah a chai he .
43016032	“ Canghrasala naa ing lang cacy papaipatlaw naa cang nápaw cai va chuh a ka , a va phah myca . Kama longtei tah naa pa hua si a . Canghrasala kama longtei cang bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah ka Paw cawh kama kha a ung cawtah a cang .
43016033	Kama letah thlawlungnah naa hnui khy nápawtah ma hming sahlo heh ka ca chingpaw he a cang . Ma khazaw lehei co , lung reithuinah naa hnui thlang a . Canghrasala , naa lung pacy my seh lo ! Khazaw heh ka te thah hi , ” tatah a tah he .
43017001	Zisu cawh ma bia a rei khy taico , avai lang a y ka , “ Ka Paw , a cai a tling myca . Na Sawcapaw tahei ka ca parungnaw khy nápawtah na Sawcapaw heh parungnaw tua .
43017002	Zecawtamaw tatah kama na pa pehpaw sahlo he khah chaizaw hringnah ka peh khy nápaw he tah ming vytei cung letah nawhnuinah khah na pa peh myca .
