45008018	Ato letei kaa tai-ingnah heh cawh hmelang kaaning kha a va lang lepaw rungnawnah khaco rei pakhing tlangpaw tah rei bei neh .
45008019	Tuapaw hming vytei tah Khazing sawtei sahlo palang aa cang lepaw khah a ngete ly hmotah aa haw thlang he .
45008020	Tuapaw hming vytei cawh aaning aa dunah cawtah cang lytah Khazing tah cang seh a tahnah thongtah ze lypaw hratah a cang thlu he . Canghrasala hnabeisuinah cawh a ung paria thlang .
45008021	Ma hnabeisuinah cawh zemaw a cang kaa tah caco , ningkheh kheh cawh tuapaw hming vytei heh a thu a mangpaw sae cangnah taikhei luasah cang tae he ka , Khazing sawtei leh aa luanah a rungnawpaw khah a hrong tae hra he a .
45008022	Atoning tai lehei co tuapaw hming vytei cawh canu ny ung risaw a hrungpaw he hratah a hrungning he tahpaw kaa hni .
45008023	Ma hratei a hrung leimeipaw he cawh tuapaw hming suipaw cang bei he , Khazing lahsong a hmetaw caipaw Thlawpaw a hmuhpaw kaaning sahlo zong Khazing tah a sawtei leh tah tua tah kaa pungpaw heh tlang nápaw cai kaa haw thlangning tah kaa lungthing tah ka rungthe he peh .
45008024	Zecawtamaw tatah ma hnabeisuinah chung lehei pachah kaa cangpaw a cang , canghrasala kaa hnabeisuinah cawh mehkho tah kaa hmuh caco , ma cawh hnabeisuinah hmuisui cang be . Ahomaw a hnui ciapaw letah a hnabei a sui bang ?
45008025	Canghrasala kaa meh tei a hmuh khy lypaw khah kaa hnabei a sui caco , ma cawh lungsy teitah kaa haw takhah a langnah a cang .
45008026	Ma thly thly hraco , Thlawpaw tah ka phahlahnah pawhe peh lekhei a ma bawkhang . Zekhatamaw thlaw kaa chang a tah kaa hni ly ning tahmai tah bia tei reichua khy lypaw , a rungthená tah Thlawpaw tah Khazing khah a ma naw pah .
45008027	Cawngsaw kaa lungthing a hnihtu Khazing taco Thlawpaw thinglung cawh a hni , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing dunah hratah Thlawpaw tah mehpathai sahlo cawtah nawpawnah a tua cawtah .
45008028	Taico Khazing tah Ama a dopaw le Ama a tingpaw naning tah a ypaw sahlo aa cawtah zezongpui khah a chah nápaw lang tah a tuapah he takhah kaa hni .
45008029	Khazing tei a thing ciapaw sahlo cawh a Sawcapaw hratah aa cang nápaw khah a macang teitah a patlia pacia hlang thah he , zecawtamaw tatah uny hlupui hrong letah a Sawcapaw cawh uthuicai a cang nápawtah .
45008030	Taico a patlia paciapaw sahlo cawh Khazing tah y he ka , a ypaw he cawh Ama tah thaicangsah he ka , thai a cang sahpaw he cawh rungnawnah zong khah a peh he .
45008031	Ma hratei a cang caco , zemaw kaa rei khaw a ? Khazing cawh kaaning lang tah a ung caco , ahomaw a ma dy khy a ?
45008032	A Sawcapaw hrahring hmai khah a ma peh caco , hming vytei zong heh a saipaw tah ma pei bei maw ?
45008033	Khazing tei a thingpaw he cawh aho tamaw sua a phosah khy he a ? Ama Khazing hrahring tah pui thai a cysah he caw !
45008034	Macawtaco naaning cawh aho tei chang tah sua aa ca phosah he maw ? A thipaw khah Khri Zisu khah pui a cang caw ! Ma hlui co hmai thihnah taitah patho tah Khazing cacang lang tei a typaw khah a cang vy lalo . Ama tah pui Khazing cawh a ma naw pah kata !
45008035	Macawtaco ahomaw Khri donah khaco a ma pachai khy a ? Hanah tamaw , hrehnah tamaw , cakaangnah tamaw , thlekalong tah ungnah tamaw , hming cichuipaw tamaw , thihnah tamaw , zetei chang tah a ma pachai khy maw ?
45008036	Capathai letah , “ Nama na rawng tah chahningtlaw thaw pahrih leimei tah kaa ung , thaw rua pawtei seikhuipaw tuu hratah aa ma tua , ” tatah ciapaw hrakhei a cang .
45008037	Zetahmai tah ma pachai khy bei he , ma hming vytei chung lehei a ma dotupaw thongtah kaaning cawh tetu hmuisui ka cang he peh .
45008038	Zecawtamaw tatah a ma donah taitah zetahmai tah ma pachai khy be , takhah a sepaw teitah kaa hni . Thihnah cang seh , hringnah cang seh , avai letah a ungpaw vaiming sahlo cang he seh , khachia cang he seh , ato cai cang seh , hmelang cai cang seh , uhtu le hmingtuakhynah cang seh ,
45008039	cung lang alui cang seh , a rai lang alui cang seh , ma pachai khy bei he . Kaa Buipaw Khri Zisu a thongtah kaa tei a cangpaw Khazing donah khatah a ma pachai khy ruapaw cawh tuapaw vytei hrong lehei zehmai ung bei he .
45009001	Ka reipaw bia heh ahmangpaw bia a cang . Khri a tei cang neh ka , hingbia rei bei neh . Thlawpaw Pathai tei a uhpaw ka chiachaw thluidangnah lungthing zong tah hingbia ka rei lypaw khah a pa hni khui .
45009002	Ka uny sahlo le ka mingphing cawtah ka nge pachia hringhrai thlang ka , ka lungthing a sah ngetei .
45009003	Aaning aa cawtah a chahnah ruapaw a cang caco , Khazing chiasah ná tah kama hmai heh Khri khatah a chai hmai heh ka du vy .
45009004	Aaning cawh Israel mingphing Khazing thingpaw sawteileh khah cang he ka , Khazing rungnawnah khah a hmuhsah he . Aaning khatah biahrainah sahlo khah tua ka , phungbia khah a peh he . Behnah hmuisui cawh aaning takhei aa hnui . Khazing biakangnah khah aa hmuh .
45009005	Aaning sahlo cawh pathlahtu mehpuimaw sahlo pathlah a cang he . Taico Khri zong khah mehnung lang co aa mingphing a cang . Ama cawh zezong vytei a uhtu , chaizaw tah reithai tlang Khazing a cang ! Amen .
45009006	Israel pathlah khah aa zongmingtei tah Khazing thingpaw cang hlui bei he , Khazing biakangnah cawh zehmai cang be ka tah dunah cang be .
45009007	Abraham teiching sawpa zong aa zongmingtei tah Abraham sawtei leh cang hlui bei he . Khazing tah Abraham cawh , “ Isak teiching sawpa sahlo cawh nama na teiching sawpa tah rei a cang he a , ” tatah a tah .
45009008	Bia hringpaw tei ka reipaw a cang caco , mehnung phung cakhawngpaw hratah sahpaw sawtei cawh Khazing sawtei cang hlui bei he . Khazing biakangnah hratei sahpaw sawtei suipaw Abraham teiching sawpa tah rawhpaw a cang he tahnah a cang .
45009009	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing biakang cawh ma hrahei a cang : “ A cai a zaw tihtah va kaw kaw neh ka , Sarah tah sawcapaw a sá a . ”
45009010	Ma longtei cawh cang be . Rebeka a sawcapaw leh pahning zong takhei paw pakheh longtei hnui he ka , kaa mapaw Isak khah aa paw cawh a cang .
45009011	A cang naná teitah mehphia tlaw aa chua hlai tah le achawpaw cang seh , achiapaw cang seh , zehmai aa tua hlai taikhei Khazing tah a thingpaw pakheh khah a pacy khy nápawtah ,
45009012	aaning tah aa hrenah thongtah cang lytah Ama tei a ynah caw he tah cang hri ka , Rebeka hai leco Khazing tah , “ Uthui tah a suipaw a rai a hre tae a , ” tatah a tah .
45009013	Capathai tah , “ Jakob cawh ka do , Esau cawh ka hua , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang .
45009014	A cang caco saw Khazing cawh ding be kaa tah khy maw ? Tah khy bei peh .
45009015	Zecawtamaw tatah Moses hai letah pui , “ Ningdo ka dupaw cawh ning ka do thlang he , aa zawngrawh ka dupaw cawh aa zawng ka rawh thlang he , ” a tah kha !
45009016	Macawtaco cawngsaw tah aa du cawtah le aa tuanah thongtah cang lytah Khazing ningdonah thong tutah a cang hri .
45009017	Zecawtamaw tatah Capathai leco Khazing tah Faraoh hai lekhei , “ Nama siangpahrang tah ka ca tuapaw cawh ka thawtlungnah a lang nápaw le ka ming cawh aluicung pungpaluh letah a thang khy nápaw caw hrahring tah a cang , ” tatah a tah .
45009018	Macawtaco Khazing taco ning a do dupaw he khah ningdo thlang he ka , lunglaisah a dupaw he khah aa lung a laisah thlang he .
45009019	Naa hrong letah pakheh kheh tah a tho he ceh ka , “ Ma hratei a cang caco , Khazing tah zecawtamaw sua a ma phosah thly thly thlang ? Khazing dunah cawh ahomaw a pakhang khy ? ” naa tah .
45009020	Canghrasala nama cawngsawpaw , Khazing khah ei leimei ruapaw tah aho ky maw na cang ? Alui bei tah a tuatupaw khah , “ Zecawtamaw ma hrahei na pa tua ? ” tah be .
45009021	A ngetei ka tah caco , bei a tuatu tah luitlang tlangkheh taikhei bei sanghning a tua khy thlang . Sangkheh khah a sungnawpaw tah le sangkheh khah hmang cakhawng rua pawtah tuanah naw a hnui .
45009022	Khazing tah a thingaenah le a hmingtuakhynah khah a langsah a du . Canghrasala , dangtah ruatah a tlahpaw cawngsaw sahlo cung letah a lung a sy .
45009023	Mahratei a lung a sypaw cawh Ama arungnawnah a hrong pawtah a pachiapaw he , a dopaw he cawngsaw sahlo khatah a rungnawpaw alaisuinah khah a langsah a du cawtah a cang .
45009024	Kaaning heh a ypaw cawh cang he peh ka , Juda cawngsaw chung long taitah cang lytah Gental cawngsaw chung zong taitah ypaw ka cang he peh .
45009025	Ma cawh Hosea Cabu chung letei , “ Ka cawngsaw a cang lypaw khah , ‘ Ka cawngsaw , ’ tah he neh ka , ka za do lypaw mingphing khah , ‘ Ka dopaw , ’ tatah ka tah he a , ” tatah a tah .
45009026	Taico , “ ‘ Naaning cawh ka cawngsaw cang bei ceh , ’ tatah a za tahnah pawhe hminghmaw lekhei , ‘ Aaning cawh Khazing hring sawtei leh , ’ tah a cang he a , ” tatah a tah .
45009027	Taico Khazing khuavang Isaiah tah Israel mingphing kong lekhei , “ Israel cawngsaw cawh rili ngaekang letei sadi zeh hmai cang he seh la , a cawngtei longlong pachah a cang he a .
45009028	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah khazaw heh a catleipaw tah a changnah tai bia a ce a , ” a za tah .
45009029	Isaiah thly thly tah , “ Cungnungcai Abuipaw tah teiching sawpa a cawngpe tei ma huapah lytah ung my seh la caw , Sodom khuapui hratah cang thah he peh ka , Gomora khuapui hrakhei ka cang thah he peh , ” a za tahpaw hrakhei a cang .
45009030	A cang caco , zekhatamaw kaa tah a ? Khazing dingnah hnui a za pachia bang lypaw Gental cawngsaw sahlo tah aa zingnah thongtah Khazing dingnah cawh aa hmuh myca .
45009031	Canghrasala , Khazing dingnah hmuh a pawtah phungbia a huipaw Israel cawngsaw sahlo taco , ma cawh hmuh bei he .
45009032	Zecawtamaw aa hmuh be ? Zingnah khah a paichai lytah tuasanah tukhah a paichainah caw he tah a cang . A pachihnah alung leco a pachih he ka , a liahly thlu he .
45009033	Capathai tah , “ Mingtua , Zion letah mehnung a pachihlysah rua pawtah alung sangkheh ka chia . Ma alung taco a pohlysah tae he a . Canghrasala Ama a zingpaw cawngsaw cawh ningzaw tah ung by bei he , ” a tah .
45010001	Ka uny sahlo , ka lungthing a dunah le Khazing khatah ka thlawchangnah cawh Israel mingphing vytei pachah aa cang khy nápaw heh a cang .
45010002	Khazing cawtah chahnai aa nge ngetei tahpaw aa kong aa lang a se pawtah ka hni , canghrasala chahnai aa ngenahpaw cawh Khazing langpui hratah cang beh .
45010003	Khazing taitah a va chuhpaw dingnah cawh zekhatamaw a cang takhah aa hnilynah cawtah aaning aa dunahpaw dingnah cung lekhei a pahnia he ka , Khazing dingnah khah cyhlang du bei he .
45010004	Khri cawh phungbia a changnah a cangnah cawtah Ama a zingpaw maikaw tah Khazing dingnah khah aa hmuh .
45010005	Moses tah phungbia zuinah thongtah Khazing dingnah hmuh a cangnah kong khah ma hrahei a rei , “ Phungbia tei tua law a tahpaw hratah a tuapaw cawh a tuapaw thongtah a hring a , ” a tah .
45010006	Canghrasala , zingnah thongtah Khazing dingnah kong leco ma hrahei a cang , “ Nama le nama cawh , ‘ Ahomaw vaicung lang kheh a ke a ? ’ a tah kheh . ” A silang cawh Khri khah za cungkhui paw a cang tahnah a cang .
45010007	A cang ly leh , “ ‘ Ahomaw mehthi khua lang a sei a ? ’ tah hrah kheh . ” A silang cawh Khri khah mehthi sahlo chung taikhei ka kekhui paw a cang tahnah a cang .
45010008	A cang caco zekhatamaw a tah ? Zingnah cawh ma heh a cang tatah ka rei leimeipaw , “ Khazing bia cawh na kae tei letah ung thlang ka , na kaw chung letah le na lungchung letah a ung thlang , ” tahpaw kong khah a cang .
45010009	Na kaw tah , “ Zisu cawh Abuipaw a cang , ” tatah tah ceh ka , Khazing tah mehthi sahlo taitah a patho tatah na lungchung tah na zing caco , pachah na cang a .
45010010	Zecawtamaw tatah kaa lungchung tah zing peh ka , thai cangsah kaa cang he peh , kaa kaw tah rei peh ka , pachah ka cang he peh .
45010011	Capathai tah , “ Ahohmai Ama a zingpaw maikaw cawh muaphy tah ung by bei he , ” a tahpaw hrakhei .
45010012	Zecawtamaw tatah Juda cawngsaw , Gental cawngsaw tatah patlianah zehmai ung lytah Khazing cawh kaa zongmingtei kaa Buipaw cang ka , Ama a ypaw maikaw cawh bonghnang a hlupui a peh tei he .
45010013	Capathai tah , “ Abuipaw ming a ypaw maikaw cawh pachah a cang he a , ” a tahpaw hrakhei .
45010014	Ma hratei a cang caco , zekhatamaw a zing lypaw taco a ming cawh aa y khy a ? Taico bia khah aa thui ly caco , zekhatamaw Ama cawh aa zing khy a ? Taico phungreitu aa ung ly caco , zekhatamaw a konglang cawh aa thui khy a ?
45010015	Taico phung aa rei ruapaw khah thlaw aa cang ly caco , zekhatamaw aa rei khy a ? Capathai letah , “ Thawngchawbia aa reipaw aa phe cawh a nge caimang ! ” a tahpaw hrakhei .
45010016	Canghrasala Juda cawngsaw aa zongmingtei khei thawngchawbia cawh pawng hlui bei he . Mahraco Isaiah tah , “ Abuipaw , ahomaw kaa bia cawh a zing ? ” tatah a tah .
45010017	Macawtaco zingnah cawh Khazing bia thuinah thongtah cang ka , Khazing bia cawh Khri kong reinah thong khei , thui a cang .
45010018	Canghrasala biahaenah tua ka dupaw cawh , “ Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco bia cawh thui bang hrahring bei he maw ? ” taheh a cang . A thui cawh aa thui thlang . Capathai tei a reipaw , “ Aa ynah o cawh aluicung pungpaluh letah a thang , aa bia cawh khazaw changnah tai a phah , ” tatah a tahpaw hratah a cang .
45010019	Biahaenah tua ka du vypaw cawh , “ Israel mingphing taco hnih thai bei he maw ? ” tah heh a cang . Aa bia a paleh taw ruapaw he cawh Moses khah a cang . Zekhatamaw a rei tah pawco , “ Naaning cawh mingphing hmuisui a cang lypaw sahlo khah ca iavaw sá he neh ka , naaning cawh mehruh mingphing khei naa thing ka ca ae sá he a , ” a tah .
45010020	Taico Isaiah tah raechah teitah a reipaw cawh , “ A pa hui lypaw sahlo tah aa pa hmuh . A pa hy lypaw sahlo lekhei ka lang , ” a tah .
45010021	Canghrasala Israel mingphing kong leco , “ Rei a nge lypaw le aa lungku aa chawpaw cawngsaw sahlo khatah chahningtlaw ka kih ka hlai tei he , ” a tah .
45011001	A cang caco , Khazing tah a cawngsaw sahlo cawh a hlawh he maw ? Cang hrahring be , kama zong heh Israel cawngsaw , Abraham teisaw , Benjamin hring taiteipaw ka cang .
45011002	Khazing tah athoning taitei a thingpaw he cawh hlawh bei he . Capathai tah Elija kong a reipaw khah hnih bei he ceh maw ? Israel mingphing kawng letah Khazing khatah phing katei ,
45011003	“ Abuipaw , na khuavang sahlo khah theh ry he ka , na dangnah siasang khah aa rorang thlu . Kama longlong heh a tangpaw cang neh ka , ma cawh hmai thaw aa pa za , ” tatah a tahpaw khah .
45011004	Khazing tah zekhatamaw a chai ? “ Kama ka cawtah Baal khazing hme letah a khuh a panai bang lypaw mehnung 7000 ka chia thlang he , ” tatah a tah .
45011005	Ma thly thly hraco ato zong heh a cang . Khazing tah ning a donah caw he tah a thingpaw a cawngpe a ung thlang hrah he .
45011006	A thingpaw he cawh ning a donah caw he tah a cang caco , aaning aa hming tuanah rawng tah cang be . Ma hratei a cang caco ningdonah cawh ningdonah tling cang be .
45011007	A cang caco zekhatamaw ? Israel mingphing tei a ngete ly tei aa za huipaw khah aa hmuh tlung be , canghrasala a thingpaw sahlo taco aa hmuh . Ahringpaw sahlo cawh aa lungku chawsah cang he ka Khazing bia khah nge bei he .
45011008	Capathai tah , “ Khazing tah aa lungthing pamori he ka , atoning tai hmai aa mehkho tah hmuh khy be , aa nawkho tah zong thui khy bei he , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang hmuisui .
45011009	Taico David zong tah , “ Aa lawhdangnah cawh aaning aa cawtah sarui cang seh la , aaning a pachihlynah he le dangtahnah cang hri seh .
45011010	Khua aa hmuh khy ly nápawtah aa meh cawh co seh la , hanah aa ingpaw hmingrih rai lekhei aa kai a king paria thlang seh , ” tatah a tah .
45011011	Taico Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa pachihly tih he tah tho khy khawh lytah ung heh maw a cang ? Cang hrahring be . Aa suanah cawtah khei pachahnah khah Gental cawngsaw sahlo lang tukhah phah ka , Juda cawngsaw sahlo tah aa iavaw nápaw caw he takhei .
45011012	Juda cawngsaw sahlo suanah tahei khazaw letah bonghnang a hlupui tlungsah ka , Thlawpaw lang tah aa phahlahnah pawhe tah Gental cawngsaw sahlo khah bonghnang a hlupui a pho he . Macawtaco Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh a tling teitah a paleh kaw tih he taco , bonghnang cawh zetlua tamaw alai vy chichi a !
45011013	Naaning Gental cawngsaw sahlo ka ca ching he . Gental mingphing khatah apostol ka cang chung vytei cawh ka rai heh ka palaikhui thlang .
45011014	Ka mingphing sahlo khah heitliasah a zawng neh ka , ma hratei ka tua caco , a cawngpe tei chang ka pachah khy phung he maw tah ka rawhchai .
45011015	Zecawtamaw tatah aaning tei Khazing aa hlawhpaw cawh khazaw le Khazing kaa letah arainah a cang caco , cyhlang aa cang tih taco thihnah taitah hringnah cang bei maw ?
45011016	Very hlungkheh chung taitah tlangkhehnah khah Khazing khatah a pathaipaw tah hlai a cang caco , very a hlung ning pui khei a pathai . A kung a pathai caco a cai zong a pathai hrah .
45011017	Aa cingpaw Oliv kung a cai thaikheh khah thleh he ka , lyraangpaw letei a cypaw oliv kung a cai khah cingpaw Oliv kung letah pei a cang myca . Ma lyraangpaw letei a cypaw oliv kung hraco naaning Gental cawngsaw cawh na cang he ceh . Atoheh cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo chongnah le hringnah khah na hrong myca he ceh .
45011018	Macawtaco thliapaw a cai hratei a cangpaw he khah naa zongte ruapaw he cang be . Zecawtamaw na palai he ceh ? A cai pui naa cang caw , a hrang cawh naa cang tlung be . A hrang tah pui a ca cawng he caw !
45011019	Taico a tho he ceh ka , “ Kaa ungnah tuapah ruapaw taco pui a cai cawh thlia a cang kata , ” naa ta a .
45011020	Ma cawh ahmang thlang . Aaning cawh aa zing lynah cawtah thlia cang he ka , naaning cawh naa zingnah cawtah naa ungnah hming letah naa ung . Canghrasala ma kong leco naa lung pia kheh seh . A ci tah ci hri my lo .
45011021	Thingcai hmuisui a cangpaw he Juda mingphing sahlo hmai Khazing tah a hua ly caco he , naaning zong ca hua hrá bei he .
45011022	Macawtaco Khazing a chah zia le ci a chui zia heh pacang tua hmai o . A pohlypaw sahlo cawtah co ci a chui caimang , canghrasala Khazing a chahnah chung letah naa ung paria thlang caco a ningdonah naa ting a . Mahratei a cang ly caco , naaning zong chawthlah na cang hrá he ceh .
45011023	Taico Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh aa zing lynah khah aa seisai caco , khuahlai tei aa za ungnah hming lekhei a chia kaw khy thlang he a , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing taco a chia kaw khy thlang he .
45011024	Naaning Gental cawngsaw cawh lyraangpaw letei oliv cai chawthlah ciapaw na cang he ceh . Mataico naaning cawh lingpaw oliv kung letah a phung lypaw pui tah pazopaw na cang he ceh . Naaning hmai tah lingpaw oliv letah pei naa cang caco , aaning Juda cawngsaw cawh aaning aa kung letah pei kaw cawh zetlua tamaw a neh vy a ?
45011025	Uny sahlo , ma biaparuh heh hni lytah naa ungpaw du bei neh , catei a cang ly caco naa pachaw sua he ceh . Ma biaparuh cawh Israel mingphing heh aa lungkhong paria thlang be . Gental cawngsaw vytei Khazing khatah a vong ruapaw he a vongnah cai tai longlong khah a cang a .
45011026	Taico Israel mingphing vytei pachah aa cang he a . Capathai tah , “ Zion taitah pachahtu khah a vong ka , Jakob teisaw chung taitah Ama tah aa suanah khah a hlyde a .
45011027	Aa suanah vytei khah ka lah hly pah tih he tah ma biahrainah heh aaning kha ka tua a , ” tatah a ciapaw hrakhei .
45011028	Thawngchawbia konglang co , naaning rawng tah Khazing carae a cang he . Canghrasala thingpaw konglang co , aa mapaw sahlo rawng takhei Khazing dopaw a cang he .
45011029	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah a ynah pawhe le lahsong a pehpaw he kong lekhei a lung a paleh bang be .
45011030	Naaning Gental mingphing cawh khuahlai taco , Khazing a rei khah za nge bei ceh . Canghrasala Juda mingphing tah a rei aa nge lynah cawtah naaning tutah a zawngenah khah naa cy .
45011031	Ma hraco naaning tei naa cypaw Khazing zawngenah thong khei aaning zong tah zawngenah aa cy khy hrah ná pawtah atoheh a rei khah nge lytah aa ungpaw a cang .
45011032	Khazing tah ming vytei khah reinge lynah chung letah a hraipaking pawhe cawh aa zongmingtei cung letah zawngenah hnui a dunah caw he tah a cang .
45011033	Khazing a rungnah le singnah le hnikhynah vytei heh a thuh caimang dei e ! A biacenah cawh ahomaw a silang a thui pase thai ! A hming tuanah ningcang heh ahomaw a hnih khy a !
45011034	“ Ahomaw Abuipaw thinglung cawh a hnih khy a ? Ahomaw sing a ching khypaw a ung ? ”
45011035	“ Khazing tah chang kaw rua pawtah ahomaw Khazing kha a pei khypaw a ung ? ”
45011036	Zecawtamaw tatah zezong vytei heh Ama taitah le , Ama a thongtah le , Ama a cawtah a cang he . Ama khatah rungnawnah cawh chaizaw tah ung ky seh ! Amen .
45012001	Macawtaco uny sahlo , Khazing a zawngenah rawng tahei , naa pung khah a pathaipaw le Khazing lung a lawngsahpaw ahringpaw athuihlainah hratah pae pawtah ka ca sia he . Ma cawh thlawpaw lang tah Khazing beh hmuisui cawh a cang .
45012002	Ma khazaw hringzia naning hei hring leimei hrah khe o , canghrasala naa thinglung pathasah nátah naa hringzia cawh a thlai thlu seh . Taico Khazing dunah a cangpaw , achawpaw le lung a lawngsahpaw le a tlingpaw a dunah cawh pase khy he ceh ka naa hni khy a .
45012003	Ka hmuhpaw Khazing ningdonah thongtah ma bia heh naa zongmingtei hai letah ka rei . Naaning le naaning khah a pasangtu khe o . Naa cangnah tukhah a hnih hri la , Khazing tah a ca pehpaw he zingnah cacy teikhei naaning le naaning a rawh my lo .
45012004	Kaa pung cung lehei pung caibai hlupui hnui he peh ka , ma a caibai vytei tahei rai cacangpaw aa hnui cy .
45012005	Ma hraco kaaning zong mehlupui kaa cang naná tah Khri kha ka peitlenah pawhe peh thongtah pungkheh cang peh ka , pung caibai cacy cawh sangkheh le sangkheh a tle thlupaw he hratah kaaning zong pakheh le pakheh ka peitle thlu peh .
45012006	Macawtaco lahsong phingcang kaa hmuhpaw cacy khah Khazing tei a ma pehpaw ningdonah cacy naning khei hmang he peh seh . Lahsong kaa hmuhpaw cawh Khazing bia phykhynah a cang caco , zingnah kaa hnuipaw hrakhei kaa hmang ruapaw a cang .
45012007	Male cawtah raihre ruapaw a cang caco , ma hraco hre he peh . Cawngpah ruapaw a cang caco , cawngpah he peh .
45012008	Male thawzaang peh rua a cang caco , thawzaang pei he peh . Kaa hnuipaw hming khah male a hrawng hrápaw a cang caco , hechia lytah a hrawngsah hrápaw he a cang . Hruitu cangnah a cang caco , teria teitah hre ruapaw a cang , male ningdo khah a cang caco , lunglawng teitah ning kaa do ruapaw he a cang .
45012009	A donah cawh lungthing hmuisui tah a cangpaw a cang . Hming chah ly khah a hua la , hming chawpaw khah a tle paria thlang my lo .
45012010	Pakheh le pakheh khah Khri letah uny hratah a do la , ming hringpaw khah nama navy tah pasungpanaw vy my lo .
45012011	Raihrenah kong letah naa thaw thi kheh seh la , Thlawpaw lang kong letah chahnai nge la , Abuipaw rai cawh hre my lo .
45012012	Naa hnabeisuinah lekhei naa thawchah seh la , hanah letah lungsy teitah ung la , thlawchangnah kong letah zingchui pawtah ung my lo .
45012013	Naa hnuipaw khah Khazing cawngsaw a phahlahpaw sahlo khah chaichy hrah my lo . Khuachai khah achaw teitah mingkhai my lo .
45012014	Naaning a ca hreh pawhe khah Khazing khatah bonghnang song la , chiasah khe lo .
45012015	A lawngpaw sahlo khakhei a lawng hrá la , a cahpaw khakhei cah hrah my lo .
45012016	Pakheh le pakheh lungrua teitah ung my lo . A palai a patui khe la , cawngsaw cakhawngpaw khatah a huikongnah hnui khah du mylo . Ming hringpaw navy tah ka singvang vy tatah a pacang khe lo .
45012017	Naa cung letah hmingchahly a tuapaw khah chah ly ná tah veri thing khe lo . Ming vytei tei a chah tatah aa rawhpaw khah tua a zawng my lo .
45012018	A cang khy caco , naaning chang tah cawngsaw maikaw kha a dorai teitah ung khah a zawng my lo .
45012019	Naa phu a hlang khe lo , uny sahlo , Khazing thingaenah cawh langtlui hri my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah Capathai letah , “ Phuhlang cawh kama ka rai a cang , kama tah veri ka thing tae a , ” tatah Abuipaw tah a tah .
45012020	Macawtaco Capathai tah , “ Na caraepaw cawh a ngai a di caco , batui va pei la , a tui a hrae caco tui va pei , ma hratei na tua caco , a lu cung letah a ae leimeipaw mehei chia hratah a cang a , ” a tahpaw hrakhei va tua hri my lo .
45012021	Chahlynah khah a tesah khe la , chahnah tuaná khei chahlynah te hri my lo .
45013001	Ming maikaw tah nawhnuitu sahlo aa rei khah aa nge ruapaw a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing nawtlahnah ly co ahohmai nawhnuitu ung bei he , nawhnuitu sahlo cawh Khazing tah a chiapaw a cang he .
45013002	Macawtaco , nawhnuitu sahlo a dytu cawh Khazing tah cang seh a tahpaw khah a dytu cang ka , ma hratei a tuapaw taco aa cung letah dangtahnah aa tlung sá a .
45013003	Uhtu sahlo heh chahnah a tuapaw taco cipaw cang lytah chahlynah a tuapaw long tah ci vy a cang . Nawhnuitu ci lytah ung na du caco , chahnah tua la , a ca reithai thlang a .
45013004	Zecawtamaw tatah na cawtah chahnah a tuatu ruapaw tah Khazing sae a cang . Canghrasala chahlynah na tua caco , ama cawh ci ky , zecawtamaw tatah dangtahnah naw a hnuipaw cawh a cakhawngpaw cang be . Ama cawh Khazing sae cang ka , chahlynah a tuatu cung lekhei dangtahnah a peitu ruapaw tah tawpaw a cang .
45013005	Macawtaco nawhnuitu sahlo aa rei cawh va nge my lo . Dangtahnah a ungpaw rawng long tah cang lytah naa chiachaw thluidangnah lungthing rawng zong takhei aa rei cawh va nge my lo .
45013006	Ngungkhui naa thopaw cawh ma rawng zong tahei a cang . Nawhnuitu sahlo cawh uhnah rai a hrepaw , Khazing sae a cang he .
45013007	Macawtaco naa bah pawhe ceh khah pei la , ngungkhui na bah caco he ceh pei my lo , naa hnuicho ngungkhui peh ruapaw cawh pei my lo , hmezaw ruapaw khah hmezaw la , upah a tlahpaw khah upah my lo .
45013008	Ahohmai lui a bah khe lo , na bah pawhe ceh cawh pakheh le pakheh a dorai long khah cang ky seh . A uny a dopaw maikaw taco phungbia khah a patling .
45013009	Biapeh taco , “ A phei kheh , lenong kheh , ru kheh , male hming iavaw kheh , ” a tah . Ma sahlo hlui taihei a ung vypaw biapeh cawh , “ Na ingpaw khah nama na dopaw hratah va do hrah , ” tahpaw bia tahei a pakawng thlu .
45013010	Donah a hnuipaw taco a ingpaw cung letah chahlynah tua be . Macawtaco donah cawh phungbia a tlingnah a cang .
45013011	Ato cai heh ze cai maw a cang takhah naa hni thlangnah cawtah ma heh naa tua ruapaw a cang . Ahrawnah cai a chuh myca , zecawtamaw tatah pachah kaa cang le nápaw cai cawh kaa za zing thoning tei navy khei co , a ne vy lo leimei myca .
45013012	Zai cawh a chang daimang myca , khua a dui daimang . Macawtaco muinah letei tuasanah khah bang myca he peh seh la , khainah rae dynah chaichi khah a hrei hri he peh .
45013013	Ningching letei a ungpaw hratah a ngecang teitah ung he peh . Zu rui tah khalungpathih tah ung kheh he peh seh . Canu capaw suanah tua kheh he peh seh . Zawkhui chuipaw tah ung kheh he peh seh . A hrychae kheh he peh seh la , zia a hnui kheh he peh seh .
45013014	Abuipaw Zisu Khri a ziaza tukhah a lah hri la , naa pungsaw dunah tua khah pacang hrahring khe lo .
45014001	Zingnah kong letah thawzaang a diapaw khah cyhlang my lo . Rawhnah alo lypaw sahlo kong lekhei bia a ei khe lo .
45014002	Pakhehpaw cawh zingnah takhei zehapaw e hmai a sai thlang a , canghrasala zingnah lang letah thawzaang a diapaw taco , aihnaw sihnaw longsui tukhah a e .
45014003	Zehapaw hmai a epaw takhei ma hratei a e lypaw khah a zongte ruapaw cang be . Taico aihnaw sihnaw suipaw a epaw takhei zehmai a e thlangpaw khah suisepaw cang be . Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing taco a cyhlang va vei thlang he .
45014004	Pakhehpaw a sae khah bia pacepah kheh lo . A chaw teitah rai a hre le hre ly cawh ama abuipaw suipaw tah bia a chawpaw a cang . Taico a chaw teitah a tua thlang a zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw tah a chaw teitah a tuasah khy thlang .
45014005	Pakhehpaw tah ningkhehpaw khah ning hringpaw navy tah a pathai vy tatah a rawh , taico ahringpaw pakheh tah ning cawh a maekheh thlu thlang he tatah a pacang . Pakheh cy aa rawhnah cacy lekhei a pase he seh .
45014006	Ningkhehpaw khah ning hringpaw navy tah a pathai dang tatah a pacangpaw taco Abuipaw a upahnah cawtah a rawhpaw cang ka , saw a epaw tah a epaw cawh Abuipaw a hmezaw cawtah cang ka Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai . Taico zezong maikaw a e lypaw tah a e lypaw cawh Abuipaw a hmezaw cawtah cang ka Khazing khatah lawngbia a hlai .
45014007	Ahohmai ma leh caw longtei tah hring bei peh , ahohmai ma leh caw longtei tah thi bei peh .
45014008	Kaa hring caco , Abuipaw cawtah hring peh ka , kaa thih caco Abuipaw cawtah ka thi peh . Macawtaco kaa hring tah cang seh , kaa thih tah cang seh Abuipaw tei ka cang he peh .
45014009	Zecawtamaw tatah Khri thi katei a thokawpaw cawh a thipaw le a hringpaw aa Bui cang rua pawtah a cang .
45014010	A cang caco , nama zecawtamaw na unypaw cawh bia na pace ? A cang ly leh na unypaw cawh zecawtamaw na ming chuh ? Kaa zongmingtei tah Khazing biacenah dyching hme letah ka chuh cy thlang he peh .
45014011	Capathai tah , “ Ka hringpaw hrahei , ‘ Ming maikaw tah ka hme letah aa khuh panai a he ka , ming maikaw tah Khazing a cang tatah aa pa tah a , ’ tatah Abuipaw tah a tah , ” tatah a tah .
45014012	Macawtaco kaa zongmingtei hei Khazing hme letah kaaning leh kaa kong kaa rei cy tae a .
45014013	Macawtaco pakheh le pakheh a suinang khah bang myca he peh . Naa uny sahlo khah suanah chunglang a tlah sahpaw a cang ly leh a pachih sahly sápaw rua pawtah zehmai tua ly pawtah a zawng hri my lo .
45014014	Abuipaw Zisu kha ka peitlenah pawhe peh tahei a sepaw tah a ma hni sahpaw cawh zehapaw hming hmai heh ama teitah a pathai lypaw ung be , canghrasala pakheh kheh tah hming sangkheh cawh pathai be tatah a pacang caco , ama a caw taco a pathai ly hmuisui thlang tah heh a cang .
45014015	Na epaw rawng tah na uny khah a lung na sawsah caco , na tuapaw cawh donah chung taitah a chuhpaw tuasanah cang be . Na epaw batui cawh Khri tei a thih hnopaw na unypaw a ronah cawtah cangsah kheh .
45014016	Na caw tei a chah tatei na rawhpaw khah chahlynah a chuakhuitu tah cangsah kheh .
45014017	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh e le ding kong cang be , dingnah le denah le Thlawpaw Pathai letah alawngnah kong tu a cang hri .
45014018	Ma hratei Khri a rai a hrepaw maikaw taco Khazing khah a lawngsah he ka , cawngsaw tah aa reithai he .
45014019	Macawtaco denah a chua sahpaw hming le pakheh le pakheh thawzaang a pehnah hming tua khah a ting cy he peh .
45014020	Lawh rawng tah Khazing tah hming a tuapaw khah rawhrang khe lo . Lawh maikaw cawh a pathai , canghrasala minghringpaw khah a pachihly sahpaw lawh e cawh sua a cang .
45014021	Macawtaco saw e cang seh , misurhang ding cang seh , zehapaw hming hmai naa uny pohlynah a cang caco , e ly , ding ly , tua ly khah a chah .
45014022	Ma hapaw kong leco nama tei na zingpaw khah Khazing le nama suipaw tah va hni thlang o . Tua ruapaw a cang tatei a rawhpaw hming a tua tihtah a lung chung letah sua a phosahnah a hnui lypaw cawh bonghnang a ting .
45014023	Canghrasala lung langlo hmotah a e caco , sua a phosah a cang , zecawtamaw tatah a epaw cawh zingnah thongtah cang be . Taico zehming hmai zingnah taitah a chuh lypaw maikaw cawh sua a cang .
45015001	Zingnah lang letah thawzaang a chongpaw kaaning sahlo tahei thawzaang a diapaw sahlo aa hmingrih khah phokhui he peh seh . Kaaning kaa zawng longtei a rawh kheh he peh seh .
45015002	Zingnah letah kaa uny sahlo aa changchyná pawtah ming maikaw tah aa chah nápaw khah tua he peh .
45015003	Khri zong tahei Ama zawng longtei a rawh be , Capathai letah , “ Nama a ca minghnawh paw sahlo aa ca minghnawhnah cawh ka cung letah a tlah , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang hri .
45015004	A khung ciapaw cai letah za ciapaw maikaw cawh kaaning cawngpahnah cawtah a cang . Ingkhynah thongtah le Capathai thawzaang pehnah thongtah hnabeisuinah kaa hnui nápaw cawtah a cang .
45015005	Khri Zisu a zuipaw naa cangpaw hratah ingkhynah le pasynah a ca peitu he Khazing taco a pungkhehnah ca pei ky he seh .
45015006	Ma pawsui co , lungkheh teitah le hmokaw sangkheh tah kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri a Paw le a Khazing cawh naa reithai khy a .
45015007	Khri tei a ca cyhlangpaw he hrakhei Khazing tah reithainah a hmuh nápawtah pakheh le pakheh a cyhlang my lo .
45015008	Ka reidupaw cawh ma heh a cang . Khri cawh Juda cawngsaw sae tah a za cangpaw cawh Khazing tei Juda cawngsaw pathlahtu sahlo khatei biakangnah a za tuapaw sahlo cawh a hmangpaw bia a cang tah khah palang a du cawtah a cang .
45015009	Ma pawsui co , Gental cawngsaw sahlo tah Khazing khah a zawngenah rawng tah aa parungnaw a . Capathai letah , “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo hrong letah ca reithai neh ka , na ming cawh hlaw tah ka sá a , ” a tahpaw hrakhei le ,
45015010	Capathai tei a tah vypaw cawh , “ Gental cawngsaw sahlo , Khazing thingpaw mingphing khaco a lawng my lo , ” a tahpaw hratah le ,
45015011	Capathai tei a tah vypaw cawh , “ Gental cawngsaw vytei , Abuipaw cawh reithai la , ming vytei sahlo Abuipaw cawh hlaw tah reithai my lo , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang .
45015012	Isaiah tei a rei vypaw cawh , “ Jesi a teisaw taitah pakheh a vong ka , Gental cawngsaw sahlo uhtu tah tua a cang tae a . Taico ama a cung letah aa hnabei aa sui a , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang .
45015013	Hnabeisuinah Khazing taco , Ama letah zingnah naa hnuipaw hratah naaning khatah alawngnah vytei le dená tah ca chisah ky he seh . Ma pawco , Thlawpaw Pathai hmingtuakhynah thongtah hnabeisuiná tah na chihlui he ceh .
45015014	Ka uny sahlo , chahnah le hniná tah chih he ceh ka , pakheh le pakheh na cawngpah khy thlang he ceh , takhah kama hrahring tah a sepaw teitah ka hni thlang .
45015015	Canghrasala Gental hrong letah Khri Zisu raihretu ka cang khy nápaw tah Khazing tei apah pehpaw ningdonah thong hei naaning hnisah kaw ruapaw tah raechah teitah ka ciapaw a cang .
45015016	Ka pehlaipaw Gental sahlo cawh Thlawpaw Pathai tah pathai sá pawtah le cyhlang tlang aa cangná pawtah Khazing thawngchawbia kong lehei tlangbui rai ka hre .
45015017	Macawtaco Khri Zisu kha ka peitlenah thongtah Khazing rai ka hrepaw cawh ka hme a kai .
45015018	Gental cawngsaw sahlo khah Khazing nawngenah lang seikhui pawtah bia tah cang seh , tuasaná tah cang seh , paching pakhanah le ningang chuipaw tah cang seh ,
45015019	Thlawpaw Pathai hmingtuakhynah thongtah Khri tei kama hmang tei a tuapaw longlong khah ka rei thlang a . Macawtaco Jerusalem taitah Illirikom raang tai khua ka za tlong tei ning takhei Khri kong thawngchaw khah tlangtling teitah ka rei .
45015020	Ka sadu thawpaw cawh Khri aa thui bang lynah hminghmaw letei thawngchawbia rei khah a cang paria thlang . Zecawtamaw tatah male tei a hrang aa za pathonah ciapaw letei sah cawh du bei neh .
45015021	Capathai letah , “ Ama a kong aa ching lypaw sahlo he takhei hmuh a he ka , a thui lypaw sahlo takhei aa hni thlu tae a , ” tatah ciapaw hrakhei a cang .
45015022	Ma rai tahei naaning kha va tlongpaw khah a pa pakhang teipaw cawh a cang .
45015023	Canghrasala atoheh cawh ma kuakaa hrong raang lehei ka rai cawh hre ruapaw a ung khawh lynah cawtah le naa hmui hmuh ka dunahpaw khah kung hlupui a cang thahnah cawtah ,
45015024	ka ca tlong khy myca thly he a tah hnabeisuinah ka hnui . Spain raang lang ka seipai hei ca hmuh he neh seh la , tah heh du neh ka , naaning kha cai cuitei ka cang khy tah ma lang sei cawh pa baw tae la tah ka du .
45015025	Canghrasala atoheh cawh Jerusalem khua lang va sei taw neh ka , ma letei a ungpaw he mehpathai sahlo rai ka va hrepah taw he a .
45015026	Zemaw tahpaw co Masidonia raang le Grik raang letei a ungpaw khrisawbu sahlo tah Jerusalem khuapui letei a ungpaw he mehpathai sahlo hrong letei a sisahpaw sahlo bongnah rua pawtah aaning lungtho teitah aa thopaw tholong a ung .
45015027	Ma cawh aaning hrahring tah kaa tua a , aa tahpaw a cang . A ngetei tahpaw co , ma mehsisah bong cawh aa rai zong a cang thlang hrah . Juda cawngsaw tah Thlawpaw lang tei aa hmuhpaw bonghnang cawh Gental cawngsaw sahlo a hrong sahpaw he hratah Gental cawngsaw zong tah Juda cawngsaw cawh hmingbo lang tei bonghnang aa hmuhpaw khah aa hrongsah hrápaw he a cang .
45015028	Ma rai cawh pachang tah mehsisah caw tei aa thopaw tholong cawh a zongmingtei tah aaning khah ka peh thlu khy tai he tah Spain raang lang sei cawh a tho neh ka , ka ca tlong pai tae he a .
45015029	Naaning kha ka vong tihtah Khri bonghnang khah tlangtling teitah ka ca pho tae he a , takhah ka hni .
45015030	Uny sahlo , kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri le Thlawpaw Pathai pehpaw doná tah ca naw he neh ka , rai cawtah hei Khazing khatah thlawchang tah pa baw my lo .
45015031	Judia raang letei a ungpaw Khri a zing lypaw sahlo kih chung taitah ka bing nápawtah le Jerusalem khua letei a ungpaw caw tei tholong ka phopaw rai heh mehpathai sahlo cawtah cyhlang awh tlang a cang nápawtah thlawchang my lo .
45015032	Taico Khazing dunah a cang caco , alawngnah kha naa kung va tlung neh ka , naaning tlong cawh kaa dawngkasawny cawtah thawzaang tha lahnah a cang a .
45015033	Denah Khazing cawh naa zongmingtei cung letah ung ky seh . Amen .
45016001	Kenkhria khua khrisawbu chung letei rai a hrepaw ka sateino Foibi heh naaning kha a hnithuisah heh ka du .
45016002	Khazing cawngsaw khatah a tlahpaw hratah naaning tah ama cawh Abuipaw ming tah za cyhlang la , bong a hianah maikaw lekhei za bong my lo , zecawtamaw tatah cawngsaw ahlupui khah bawkhang he ka , kama zong a pa bawkhang hrah .
45016003	Prisila le Akuila khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Aaning cawh Khri Zisu rai letah ka raihrehui cang he ka ,
45016004	ka cawtah thih hmai a ngangpaw a cang he . Aa cung letah ka lung a lawng . Kama long cang lytah Gental khrisawbu vytei zong a lawng hrah he .
45016005	Aa ing letei a pungpaw khrisawbu zong khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Ka vesaw dopaw Epinita zong a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Ama cawh Asia raang letah Khri a zing taw caipaw a cang .
45016006	Naa cawtah raihrang a hrepaw Mari khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016007	Andrinika le Junia khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Aaning cawh ka Juda mingphing hui , kama kha thong a tlah hruipaw a cang he . Aaning cawh apostol sahlo hrong letah hmezawpaw cang he ka , kama hlai tah khrisaw a cang ciapaw a cang he .
45016008	Abuipaw letei ka dopaw Ampliata khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016009	Khri rai ka hrehruipaw Urbana le ka dopaw vesaw Stakhi khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016010	Khri zingnah letah a se ngeteipaw Apele khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Aristobula ingchungkho khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016011	Ka mingphing hui Herodion le Narsisa ingchungkho letei khrisaw ka uny sahlo khah , a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016012	Abuipaw rai a hrepaw Traifena le Traifosa khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Abuipaw cawtah raisah a hrepaw ka dopaw vesaw Persi khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016013	Abuipaw thingpaw Rufa le a no , sawtei hratah a pa mingkai pariapaw he khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016014	Asinkrita , Flekon , Hermi , Patroba , Herma le aaning kha a ungpaw khrisaw uny vytei khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016015	Filoloka le Julia , taico Nereus le a sateino le Olimpa le aaning kha a ungpaw mehpathai vytei khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
45016016	Naaning cawh pakheh le pakheh a pathaipaw a doná tah bia a ching cy my lo . Khri tei a cangpaw khrisawbu vytei tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah he .
45016017	Uny sahlo , a pachainah a chuasah tu le naa zingnah hna a hnawh sahtu , naaning tei naa hmuh ciapaw cawngpahnah khatei a cakahpaw sahlo khah a raering la , tah ka ca pasy he . Aaning cawh cahri my lo .
45016018	Zecawtamaw tatah ma hapaw rai a hrepaw he cawh kaa Buipaw Khri rai aa hrepaw khah cang lytah aaning aa dunah cawtah aa tuapaw a cang hri . Aa hmokaw chaw le male hluihlang thai ná tah ningkheh teitah a ungpaw thaikhehpaw sahlo khah aa lung pamo he ka , aa dungkhei he .
45016019	Abuipaw a bia naa ngepaw khah ming maikaw tah thui he ka , ma kong lehei ka lung a lawng . Chahnah lang leco mehsing cang la , tah heh ka du , canghrasala chianah lang leco nyheh hasaitei hratah cang my lo , tah heh ka du .
45016020	Denah Khazing taco Setan khah naa pherai letah a ria pating a . Kaa Buipaw Zisu ningdonah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh .
45016021	Ka raihrehui Timote tah a dang pawtah a ca tah he . Taico ka sawny a cangpaw he Lusia , Jason le Sosipater zong tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah he .
45016022	Ma cakua a ciapaw kama Tertia tah Abuipaw ming tah a dang pawtah ka ca tah he .
45016023	Ka tlungingpaw Kaia , khrisawbu a pungnah pawhe ing a hnuitu tah a dang pawtah a ca tah he . Ma khua tangka a kaitu Erasta le kaa unypaw Kuarta tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah he .
45016024	Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri ningdonah cawh naa zongmingtei cung letah ung ky seh . Amen .
45016025	Ka reipaw Zisu Khri kong thawngchaw le khuahlai chai hlupui chung a nawhpaw biaparuh khah reichua a cangpaw hratah Khazing taco naa zingnah lekhei cy teitah a ca dawsah khy he a .
45016026	Atoheh cawh ma biahmuisui khah Khazing khuavang sahlo tei aa za ciapaw hrakhei reichua cang ca ka , chaizaw Khazing biapeh hratah ming vytei tah zing tah aa nge khy nápawtah mingphing vytei hai letah rei a cang myca .
45016027	Ama suipaw Khazing cang ka , Ama suipaw a sing hmuisuipaw a cang . Zisu Khri thongtah Khazing cawh chaizaw tah chaizaw tai reithai tah ung ky seh . Amen .
46001001	Khazing a rei tei Khri Zisu a apostol cang rua pawtei ypaw kama Paul le kaa unypaw Sosthen tah ,
46001002	Korin khuapui letei Khazing khrisawbu , Khri Zisu letei pathaisah a cangpaw le pathai rua pawtei ypaw vytei le aa Buipaw le kaa Buipaw a cangpaw Abuipaw Zisu Khri ming a ypaw , kawting letah a ungpaw vytei khatah ca kaa cakua he .
46001003	Khazing kaa Paw le Abuipaw Zisu Khri taitei ningdonah le thlawlungnah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh .
46001004	Khri Zisu thongtah , Khazing tah a ningdonah a ca pehpaw he rawng takhei Ama khaco lawngbia ka rei tei .
46001005	Ama a thongtah naaning cawh zezongpui letah chahchi na cang he ceh , naa biarei kaw-ang letah le hming naa hnithainah vytei letah zong ,
46001006	zecawtamaw tatah Khri kong kaa dawkhuipaw peh khah naaning letah a pacy .
46001007	Macawtaco kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri a va lang nápaw lungsy tah naa haw thlangnah lehei thlawpaw lang lahsong a hringhrepaw a by khawh bei he ceh .
46001008	Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri a ning letah suise naa cang ly ná pawtah Ama tah a changnah tai a ca chawngsá he a .
46001009	A Sawcapaw Zisu Khri , kaa Buipaw kha a huikongnah chunglang a ca ypaw he Khazing cawh zingchuipaw a cang .
46001010	Taico , uny sahlo pakheh le pakheh lungtlah teitah ung my lo , tatah kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri ming tah naa zongmingtei tah ka ca naw he , ma pawsui co naa hrong letah a pachainah ung be ca ka , thinglung le rawhnah letah tlangtling teitah na pakong khy he ceh .
46001011	Ka uny sahlo , naa hrong letah a hrychaenah a ung tahpaw khah Khaloi ingchungkho thaikhehpaw taitah aa pa thuisah .
46001012	Ka rei dupaw cawh ma heh a cang . Naaning naa hrong letah pakheh tah , “ Kama cawh Paul a zuipaw ka cang , ” tah ka , ahringpaw tah , “ Kama cawh Apolo a zuipaw ka cang , ” a tah , ahringpaw vy hui tah , “ Kama cawh Piter a zuipaw ka cang , ” tah ka , ming hringpaw taco , “ Kama cawh Khri a zuipaw ka cang , ” a tah .
46001013	Khri cawh a chaichy maw ? Paul cawh naa cawtah khaipai a cang maw ? Paul a ming letah maw baptisma cangsah naa cang ?
46001014	Khripa le Kaia tah cy ly co ahohmai baptisma ka cangsah lynah caw he tah ka lawng ngetei .
46001015	Macawtaco ka ming letah baptisma ka cang tatah ahotahmai tah khy bei he .
46001016	A cang , Stefena ingchungkho khah baptisma ka cangsah hrah he . Ma khy taihei ahringpaw ka cang sahpaw he aa ung caco , a thui khawh bei neh .
46001017	Kama cawh Khri tah baptisma cang sá pawtah pa thlaw be , thawngchawbia rei rua pawtah a thlaw hripaw ka cang . Mehnung singnah bia hmang tah rei bei neh , ma hratei a cang caco , Khri thihnah khraws a hmingtuakhynah khah a longpaw tah a cang a .
46001018	Zecawtamaw tatah a ly leimeipaw cawngsaw sahlo caw taco khraws kong bia cawh hrunah a cang , canghrasala pachah a cang leimeipaw cawngsaw sahlo kaa caw taco Khazing hmingtuakhynah a cang .
46001019	Zecawtamaw tatah Capathai letah , “ Mehsingpaw a singnah cawh ka ro a , mehthaipaw a thainah cawh a longpaw tah ka cangsah a , ” tatah ciapaw a cang .
46001020	Mehsingpaw cawh zeletamaw a ung ? Phungbia a thaipaw cawh zeletamaw a ung ? Atochai mehsing mehthai cawh zeletamaw aa ung ? Khazaw singnah heh Khazing tah hruchuipaw tah tua thah bei maw ?
46001021	Khazing singnah leco khazaw tah a singnah hmang tah Khazing khah a hni khy khawh lynah cawtah hrunah bia aa tahpaw phungreiná tah a zingpaw sahlo pachah khah Khazing a lawngpaw a cang .
46001022	Juda cawngsaw sahlo taco ningang chuipaw paching pakhanah khah hmuh du he ka , Grik cawngsaw sahlo taco singnah khah aa hui ,
46001023	canghrasala kaaning cawh Juda cawngsaw sahlo a pachihlynah a cangpaw le Gental cawngsaw sahlo hrunah a cangpaw , Khri aa khaipainah kong kaa rei .
46001024	Canghrasala , Khazing tei a ypaw , Juda cawngsaw sahlo le Grik cawngsaw sahlo aa caw taco Khri cawh Khazing hmingtuakhynah le Khazing singnah a cang .
46001025	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing hrunah cawh mehnung singnah navy tah sing vy ka , Khazing sangtlelynah cawh mehnung chongnah navy tah a chong vy .
46001026	Uny sahlo , y naa za cang ning takhei zehapaw cawngsaw maw naa cang tahpaw khah rawh tua o . Cawngsaw mehmuh letah mehsing tahpaw le huhang a hnuipaw le mehlai mehsui tahpaw ahlupui ung bei he ceh .
46001027	Canghrasala , Khazing taco a singpaw ningzaw sá pawtah khazaw tah hrunah aa tahpaw hming sahlo khah a thing he , a thawchongpaw ningzaw sá pawtah khazaw tei sangtle lypaw aa tahpaw hming sahlo khah a thing he .
46001028	Khazing taco khazaw tei biapui tah a rawhpaw hming sahlo cawh zehmai cang bei he tahnah takhei khazaw letei a nai caipaw le zetah sah lypaw hming sahlo , biapui tei rawh lypaw hming sahlo khah a thing he .
46001029	Macawtaco Khazing hme letah ahohmai a pachaw khy bei he .
46001030	Ma Khazing thong hei , kaa cawtah Khazing singnah a cangpaw Khri Zisu letah naa ungpaw a cang , ma cawh kaa dingnah , pathainah le tlangnah a cang .
46001031	Macawtaco Capathai letei ciapaw hratah , “ A pachawpaw maikaw taco , Abuipaw khah a pachaw he seh . ” tatah cia a cang .
46002001	Uny sahlo , Khazing hnikhuinah kong y khui pawtah naaning kha ka vongning takhei hmokaw thainah le singnah bia khatah a vong bei neh kho .
46002002	Zecawtamaw tatah naaning kha ka ungchung vytei khah Zisu Khri kong le aa khaipainah kong tah ly co zehmai hni a pachia bei neh .
46002003	Sangtle ly hmo le ci hmo le a cathing hmotah ka vong kho .
46002004	Ka bia le ka phungreipaw cawh singnah le laipasong bia cang bei he kho , canghrasala Thlawpaw hmingtuakhynah a langsahnah khatah a cang hri kho .
46002005	Ma pawsui co naa zingnah cawh mehnung singnah letah a pahniapaw cang lytah Khazing hmingtuakhynah letah a pahniapaw a cang vy hri a .
46002006	Ma duitei cawh mehpuitling khaco singnah bia hmang tah kaa rei hmuisui . Canghrasala , atocai ma khazaw singnah a cang ly leh a lyde kaw palang pawhe atocai khazaw uhtu aa singnah heh cang be .
46002007	Biaparuh a cangpaw Khazing singnah , kaa rungnaw nápaw caw tei cai a patho hlai taitah a za khykhi ciapaw , a nawh thlangpaw singnah kong khah kaa rei hripaw a cang .
46002008	Atocai khazaw uhtu a cangpaw sahlo ahotahmai tah ma cawh hnih thai bei he , za hnih thai my he seh la , rungnawnah Buipaw khah khraws letah aa za khaipai tlung be !
46002009	Ma duitei cawh Capathai letei , “ Meh tei a hmuh bang lypaw , naw tei a thui bang lypaw , thinglung tei a rawh bang lypaw khah Khazing taco Ama a dopaw sahlo cawtah a pachia , ” a tahpaw hrakhei a cang hmuisui .
46002010	Canghrasala , Khazing tah a Thlawpaw tah ma cawh kaaning khatah a langsah myca . Thlawpaw taco zezongpui , Khazing rawhnah a thuh pawpui sahlo hmai khah a hni pahleh khy thlu .
46002011	Zecawtamaw tatah cawngsawpaw a rawhnah cawh a chung leteipaw a thlawpaw tah cy ly co aho tamaw a hni pah ? Ma hraco Khazing rawhnah cawh Khazing Thlawpaw tah cy ly co ahotahmai hnih bei he .
46002012	Kaaning kaa cypaw Thlawpaw cawh khazaw taiteipaw thlawpaw heh cang be , Khazing taiteipaw Thlawpaw a cang hri , ma cawh Khazing tah a mai lytah a ma pehpaw vytei khah kaa hni khy nápaw cawtah a cang .
46002013	Ma heh kaa reipaw cawh a cang , mehnung sing ná tah aa ma cawngpahpaw bia khah cang lytah Thlawpaw tei a ma cawngpahpaw bia , Thlawpaw lang biahmuisui khah Thlawpaw lang hmokaw tah a palangnah khah a cang hri .
46002014	Thlawpaw a hnui lypaw cawngsaw taco Khazing Thlawpaw taitah a va chuhpaw hming sahlo cawh cyhlang be , zecawtamaw tatah ma sahlo cawh a cawtah hrunah cang he ka , hnih thai khy bei he , zecawtamaw tatah ma sahlo cawh Thlawpaw suipaw tah hni khy a cangnah cawtah .
46002015	Thlawpaw cawngsaw taco zezongpui khah patlia patla ka , canghrasala Ama cawh ming hringpaw patlia patla rua tah a tua be .
46002016	Zecawtamaw tatah , “ Abuipaw cawh rawhnah pae pawtah ahomaw a thinglung a hnih khy ? ” tahpaw hratah a cang hmuisui . Canghrasala kaaning cawh Khri thinglung khah kaa hnui .
46003001	Uny sahlo naaning khaco Thlawpaw sawtei sahlo letei hratah bia rei khy ly neh tah khazaw sawtei sahlo letei hratah ka rei hri kho . Khri lekhei nysai naa cangning thlang cawtah a cang .
46003002	Batui hmuisui e naa zaw balang lynah cawtah bu cang lytah meimeitui ka ca peh he kho . Ahmang tei co , ato tai heh hmai zaw balang bei he ceh .
46003003	Naaning cawh ato tingtai heh khazaw sawtei hratah naa cangning thlang . Zecawtamaw tatah naa hrong letah hnachuanah le a hrychaenah a ungchung cawh khazaw sawtei cang thlang bei he ceh maw ? Khazaw cawngsaw sahlo hratah tua se thlang hrah bei he ceh maw ?
46003004	Zecawtamaw tatah pakheh tah , “ Kama cawh Paul phu ka cang , ” tah ka , ahringpaw tah , “ Kama cawh Apolo phu ka cang , ” a tah tihtah hei khazaw cawngsaw hratah cang thlang bei he ceh maw ?
46003005	Ma vytei khy taihei Apolo cawh zemaw a cang ? Taico Paul zawng cawh zemaw a cang ? Sae pui kaa cang ky caw , naaning Khazing a ca zing sahpaw he Abuipaw tei a rai a ma thiapaw cacy hratah .
46003006	Kama tah thleci ka tu , Apolo tah tui a bia , canghrasala a chang sahtu cawh Khazing a cang .
46003007	Macawtaco thleci a tupaw le tui a biapaw cawh zehmai aa cang tlung be , canghrasala a chang sahtu Khazing cypaw heh a biapuipaw cawh a cang .
46003008	Thleci a tupaw le tui a biatupaw cawh tingchipaw sangkheh hnui he ka , aa hrepaw rai naning hrakhei lahsong peh a cang tae he a .
46003009	Zecawtamaw tatah kaaning cawh Khazing a rai a hrehruipaw ka cang peh , naaning cawh Khazing a ly , Khazing a ing na cang he ceh .
46003010	Khazing tei a pa pehpaw a ningdonah thongtah zung a thai ngeteipaw ingsahtu hratah a hrang bing neh ka , pakheh kheh takhei a cung letah a sah . Canghrasala a sahpaw maikaw takhei a raering a hy .
46003011	Zecawtamaw tatah bing ciapaw a hrang , Zisu Khri hlui taikhei co , a hrang hringpaw cawh ahotahmai bing khy bei he .
46003012	Cawngsaw pakheh kheh tah ma bing ciapaw a hrang leco sui , ngung , lungmaisung , thing le ngedi a cang ly leh sapae hmang tah a sah caco ,
46003013	a raihrepaw zemaw a lo tah cawh a lang tae thlang a , zecawtamaw tatah ning tah ma cawh a palang tae a . Me tah pase cang ka , pakheh cy aa rai zemaw a lo takhah me taco a langsah tae a .
46003014	A sahpaw ing cawh a bing thlang caco , a sahtu taco a longmai khah a hmuh tae a .
46003015	A kang caco , a sahtu cawh a sung thlang a , canghrasala me chung taitah a ka saichuapaw hratah ama cawh pachah a cang thlang a .
46003016	Khazing behnah ing naa cangpaw le naa chung letah Khazing Thlawpaw a ungpaw khah hnih thlang bei he ceh maw ?
46003017	Pakheh kheh tah Khazing behnah ing cawh a rorang caco , Khazing tah ama cawh a rorang hra a ; zecawtamaw tatah Khazing behnah ing cawh a pathaipaw cang ka , ma behnah ing cawh naaning heh na cang he ceh .
46003018	Naaning le naaning a dungkhei khe o . Naaning lehei pakheh kheh tah atocai singnah phung tah kama cawh ka sing bang thlang tatah a rawh caco , a hruhpaw tah a tua seh la , ma pawsui co mehsing tah a cang khy a .
46003019	Zecawtamaw tatah ma khazaw singnah heh cawh Khazing mehmuh leco hrunah a cang . Capathai letei , “ Khazing taco mehsing sahlo khah , aa ziathainá khei a tle he , ” tatah ciapaw hratah le ,
46003020	“ Abuipaw taco mehsing aa khuarawnah cawh a longpaw a cang takhah a hni , ” tatei a ciapaw vytei hratah a cang hmuisui .
46003021	Macawtaco ahotahmai tah cawngsaw pachaw khawh khe o . Hming vytei heh naaning naa tei a cang he .
46003022	Apolo a cang zong , Paul a cang zong , Piter a cang zong , khazaw a cang zong , thih zong , hring zong , ato cai zong , hmelang cai zong aa zongmingtei hei naa tei cang he ka ,
46003023	naaning cawh Khri a tei na cang he ceh , Khri cawh Khazing a tei a cang .
46004001	Macawtaco cawngsaw tahei Khri a raihretu le Khazing biaparuh a kaipaw sahlo hratah ma rawh he seh .
46004002	Biaparuh a kaipaw sahlo taco zingchui pawtah aa ung a hy .
46004003	Kama cawh sang a tle , tle be tatah naaning tah maw , ming hringpaw tah maw naa pa tah zong tah ka zehmai a pui be , a ngetei tah pawco , kama teitah hmai a pase bang bei neh .
46004004	Ka chiachaw hninah thinglung a pathai , canghrasala ka ding ka tahnah cang be , a pa ce pahpaw cawh Abuipaw a cang .
46004005	Macawtaco a cai thliapaw a tling hlai taco zehmai biacepah khe o . Abuipaw a vongnah taikhah heh thlang my lo . Ama taco muinah letei a nawhpaw khah khainah lang va chuakhui ka , cawngsaw lungthing ungzia khah a palang a . Ma cai leco aaning khatah a tlah pawtei Khazing tah a reithainah pawhe khah aa hmuh cy tae a .
46004006	Uny sahlo , naaning naa chah nápaw cawtah ma hming sahlo heh kama le Apolo kaa kong tah ka reipaw a cang , ma pawsui co , “ Capathai letei ciapaw a khunglang sei kheh , ” tahpaw a silang khah kaaning taihei naa hni thai a . Mataico cawngsaw pakheh reipachia tah pakhehpaw pachaw khe o .
46004007	Zecawtamaw tatah ming hringpaw khatah a lo lypaw tah a hluipaw tah ahomaw a ca tua he ? Naa cyhlang lypaw zemaw naa hnuipaw a ung ? Taico naa cyhlang thlang pawtah cyhlang bei peh tahpaw hratah zecawtamaw na pachaw lalei he ceh ?
46004008	Naa dupaw vytei khah naa hnui thlu thah myca ! Na rung thlu thah myca he ceh ! Abui na cang thlu thah he ceh , kaaning tah ly co ! Abui cang hmuisui tua la , tah ka du caimang , ma pawsui co kaaning zong naa bui cangnah khah ka hrong khy hrá he peh .
46004009	Macawtaco , Khazing tah kaaning apostol sahlo heh caehming letah thaw rua pawtei rawh ciapaw cawngsaw sahlo hratah a hningcai letah patlang tah ma chia seh la khatah ka ngesah . Kaaning sahlo cawh alui le avai pungpaluh letei cawngsaw kha , vaiming kha cai lai rua pawtah tua kaa cang thlang hi .
46004010	Kaaning sahlo cawh Khri cawtah mehruh ka cang he peh , canghrasala naaning sahlo cawh Khri letah na sing ngetei he ceh ! Kaaning sahlo cawh kaa thawdia ka , naaning cawh na chong he ceh ! Naaning cawh cizawpaw cang he ceh ka , kaaning cawh nytaw ka cang he peh .
46004011	Ato tai lehei , kaaning cawh ngaidi tuihrae , hni ly , pai ly le , phong le dai tah le ing ly , ly lytah kaa ung .
46004012	Kaaning kaa kih ceingei tah raisah kaa hre , chiasah kaa cang tihtah bonghnang kaa song he , hreh kaa cang tihtah kaa ing thlang .
46004013	Ningzawthle kaa cang tihtah reinai teitah kaa chai he . Atotei lehei co alui hnaihnong , khazaw letei a pialuipaw hratah ka cang thlang he peh hi .
46004014	Ma ca heh naa ningzaw nápaw cawtah cang lytah ka dopaw ka sawtei sahlo hratah a raering na he seh ka ca tah caw he tah ka va ciapaw a cang hri .
46004015	Khri letah cawngpahtu thonghraw naa hnui thlang hmai he tah paw hrangpaw a hlupui hnui bei he ceh , thawngchawbia thongtah kama heh Khri letah naa Paw hrangpaw cawh ka cang hi .
46004016	Macawtaco ka ha a pa lah my lo , tatah ka ca naw he .
46004017	Ma rawng tahei Abuipaw letah zingchuipaw ka dopaw ka sawcapaw Timote khah naaning kha ka va thlawpaw a cang kho . Ama taco Khri Zisu letei ka zuipaw hringnah langpui , hmingting letei a ungpaw khrisawbu maikaw khatei ka chingpaw he khah a ca ching hry he a .
46004018	Ma tlawng lali be pa tah he ceh ka , naaning thaikhehpaw cawh a palai a patui tah naa ung .
46004019	Canghrasala , Abuipaw tah a rai a tah caco , a pating khynah chung tah ca tlong he neh ka , mataico ma a palai a patuipaw sahlo heh aa reikaw longtei khah cang lytah ze hmingtuakhynah aa hnui maw tah cawh kama hrahring tah ka va ming a .
46004020	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing painah raang cawh hmokaw longtei heh cang lytah hmingtuakhynah a cang hri .
46004021	Zemaw naa du vy ? Sungbasih kha maw ka vong a , a cang ly leh donah le nainah lungthing khatah ?
46005001	Naa hrong letah hmingchahly a cangpaw canu capaw suanah , lawki cawngsaw sahlo tahmai tah aa tua bang lypaw phing a ung tah aa reipaw ka thui . Pakhehpaw tah a paw a nupuino a suakhui aa tah .
46005002	Ma hming cawh na palaikhui thlang he ceh ! Lung reithui tah chi tah , ma hming a tuapaw cawngsaw khah naa hrong taitah papia ly tamaw naa ung thlang ?
46005003	Ka pung tah naaning kha ung lytah ung hmai neh seh la , ka thinglung co naaning kha ka ung leimei thlang . Macawtaco ma hming a tuapaw cawngsaw cung lehei naaning kha a ung hrahpaw hratah kama cawh biachawnah ka tua thah myca .
46005004	Kaa Buipaw Zisu ming tah na pahmo tih he ceh tah ka thinglung tah naaning kha ung hrah neh ka , kaa Buipaw Zisu a hmingtuakhynah zong a ung hrah .
46005005	Ma cawngsawpaw cawh Setan khah pei thlang o , ma pawsui co a ngaisaw phung khah ro cang ka , a thlawpaw cawh Abuipaw ning letah pachah a cang khy a .
46005006	Na pachawpaw he ceh heh chah be . Raangri a cawngtei tah vedi nong ciapaw a hlungpui khah a thosah tahpaw hnih thlang bei he ceh maw ?
46005007	Raangri a paringpaw khah singsi thlu la , raangri lypaw vedi a thapaw tah naa cang khy a , naa cang rua hrahringpaw zong a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah Khri , kaa Khungsai Panawnah tuu teitei cawh a thuihlainah letah hlai a cang thah cawtah .
46005008	Macawtaco ma panawnah cawh raangri a paringpaw a cangpaw a rai lynah le chahlynah raangri khei cang lytah raangri lypaw very , a huikongnah le biahmuisui very khei tua hri he peh .
46005009	Ca ka ca kuapaw he lekhei a pheila a hmangpaw mehchawly cawngsaw khatah a kong ly rua pawtah cia neh ka ,
46005010	mehchawly a cangpaw khazaw cawngsaw sahlo le a du a sahpaw mehing mehru sahlo le nono a behpaw sahlo kha a pahlawh khe o tahnah cang be . Aaning sahlo khahei a pahlawh naa du ly caco , ma alui raang taihei naa seihly a hy a .
46005011	Canghrasala atoheh cawh ahohmai uny ka cang tah tlung katei , a pheila a hmangpaw mehchawly , a du a sahpaw , nono a behpaw , kongchia rei a hmangpaw , zurui a hmangpaw , mehing mehru khatah na huikong ruapaw he ceh cang be . Ma hapaw cawngsaw khaco batui hmai e hrui khe o .
46005012	Khrisawbu alailang cawngsaw a cangpaw sahlo aa kong cepah heh ka rai a cang maw ? Canghrasala a chung leteipaw sahlo aa kong cawh a cepah ruapaw cang thlang bei he ceh maw ?
46005013	Khrisawbu alailang teipaw cawh Khazing tah a ce tae thlang he . Capathai letah , “ Mehchaw ly cawh naa hrong taitah papia my lo , ” a tah kho !
46006001	Naaning pakheh le pakheh na hry tih he ceh tah mehpathai sahlo hme letah a chuakhui lytah zecawtamaw lawki biacetu sahlo hme letah na chuakhui zia he ceh ?
46006002	Mehpathai sahlo tah Khazaw cawngsaw heh bia aa ce he a tah hnih thlang bei he ceh maw ? Khazaw hmai heh bia a cepah ruapaw naa cang tlung pawtah a teituipaw bia cawh cepah khy bei he ceh maw ?
46006003	Vaiming sahlo hmai bia kaa cepah he tah hnih bei he ceh maw ? Ma kaa hringchung hming sahlo chichipaw heh cawh kaa cepah ruapaw pui a cang caw !
46006004	Macawtaco , ma hapaw a hrychaenah kong a ung caco , khrisawbu chung letei cawngsaw cakhawngpaw naa tahpaw he sahlo tei hmai khah biacetu tah naa thia bei he !
46006005	Naa ningzeh seh ka tah cawtah ma heh ka reipaw a cang . Zingtu pakheh le pakheh kaa letei a hrychaenah cepá pawtah naa hrong letah mehsing ung ly tamaw naa ung ?
46006006	Canghrasala , ma hraco cang lytah uny pakheh tah pakhehpaw khah a zing lypaw sahlo hme leco taza a va cui laky thlang !
46006007	Naa hrong letei tazacui naa hmangpaw hrahring tahei naa pá caimang tah a langsah . Na pá tahmai tah naa cawtah chah vy bei maw ? Naa hming aa ca chu tahmai he tah naa cawtah chah vy bei maw ?
46006008	Naaning lilaw a dungkhei he ceh ka , ahmang lypaw hming khah naa tua , taico ma cawh naa uny sahlo cung lekhei naa tua .
46006009	Mehchaw ly cawh Khazing painah raang ry cy bei he tahpaw hnih thlang bei he ceh maw ? Naaning le naaning a dungkhei khe o . Canu capaw suaná tei chahlynah a tuapaw , nono a behpaw sahlo , a pheilaipaw sahlo , capaw hlohlangpaw sahlo , capaw leihopaw sahlo ,
46006010	mehru sahlo , a du a sahpaw sahlo , zurui a hmangpaw sahlo , kongchia rei a hmangpaw sahlo , mehing mehru sahlo taco Khazing painah raang letah a nae khy bei he .
46006011	Taico , ma cawh naaning thaikhehpaw naa cangning a cang . A cang naná tah Abuipaw Zisu Khri ming tah le kaa Khazing Thlawpaw tah sipathai ciapaw le pathaisah ciapaw le thaicangsah ciapaw na cang he ceh .
46006012	“ Kama ka caw taco hming maikaw tua heh sai ka cang thlang , ” canghrasala hming maikaw heh ka cawtah chah thlu be . “ Kama cawh hming maikaw tua heh sai ka cang thlang , ” canghrasala ze sae tahmai tah a tua bei neh .
46006013	“ Batui cawh pori cawtah cang ka , ri cawh batui cawtah a cang . ” Canghrasala Khazing tah a sanghning co , a ro va vei he a . Pung cawh canu capaw a pheilanah suanah tua rua pawtah tuapaw cang be , Abuipaw a cawtah tuapaw cang ka , Abuipaw cawh pung cawtah a cang .
46006014	Khazing tah a hmingtuakhyná khei Abuipaw Zisu cawh thihnah taitah patho ka , Ama taco kaaning zong a ma patho hrá a .
46006015	Naa pung cawh Khri pung a caibai a cang tahpaw hnih bei he ceh maw ? Ma Khri pung a caibai a cangpaw cawh maw law neh ka , a leizuano khaco ka va pahlawng a ? Nese !
46006016	A leizuano khatei a ung hruipaw cawh ama khaco pungkheh a cang he tah hnih bei he ceh maw ? Capathai leco , “ Aa pahning tah ngaisaw pungkheh a cang he , ” tatah a cia hi .
46006017	Canghrasala , Abuipaw khatei a pakongpaw cawngsaw cawh Ama khaco Thlawpaw letah pungkheh a cang he .
46006018	Canu capaw a pheilanah khah saisai my lo . Cawngsawpaw tei a tuapaw ahringpaw suanah sahlo cawh ama a pung a lai lang letah a tuapaw cang ka , canghrasala canu capaw a pheilanah a tuapaw duitei taco , ama a pung chung letah a tuapaw a cang .
46006019	Naa pung cawh Khazing taitah naa hmuhpaw , naa chung letah a ungpaw Thlawpaw Pathai behnah ing a cangpaw khah hnih bei he ceh maw ? Naaning naa tei cang bei he ceh ,
46006020	amai a rupui tah cawh ciapaw na cang he ceh . Macawtaco naa pung khei Khazing khah pasungpanaw my lo .
46007001	Atoheh cawh kama khatei ca naa va ciapaw kong sahlo khah a cang : nupui chui lytah ung heh capaw cawtah a chah thlang .
46007002	Canghrasala a pheilanah a hlutunah cawtah hei nupui hnui cy thlang he seh la , pasae hnui cy thlang he seh .
46007003	Capaw taco a capaw rai khah a nupui khaco patling thlang seh la , canu taco a canu rai khah a pasae khaco patling thlang hrah seh .
46007004	Nupuino a cangpaw cawh ama a pung cawh ama a tei longtei cang be ca ka , a pasae tei a cang hrah . Ma hraco pasae a cangpaw tah a pung cawh ama a tei longtei cang hrah be ca ka , a nupui tei a cang hrah .
46007005	Naa pahning nawtlah ná tah cai cuitei cawtah tah cy ly co , pakheh le pakheh naa dunah khah a ei khe lo . Ma pawsui co , thlawchangnah letah na pei khy he ceh . Mataico unghrui kaw la , ma pawsui co ma le ma a hraipaking khylynah rawng tah Setan tah ca tuhso khy bei he .
46007006	Ma heh ka ca dukhuinah pawhe a cang , biapeh hratah tu cawh cang be .
46007007	Kama taco capaw vytei heh kama hrahei cang thlu thlang la , tah ka du . Canghrasala , pakheh cy heh Khazing taitah hmuhpaw lahsong kaa hnui cy ; cawngsaw pakheh tah lahsong phingkheh hnui ka , ahringpaw pakheh tah a phingcangpaw a hnui .
46007008	Nupui pasae a hnui lypaw le lahmeno lahmepaw kong letah ka rei dupaw cawh kama hrahei nupui pasae hnui lytah ung thlang he seh la , aa cawtah a chah vy a .
46007009	Canghrasala , aa sung khy ly caco he a hnui thlang he seh , zecawtamaw tatah sihrong tei hohe navy co , nupui pasae hnui cawh a chah vy .
46007010	A chuihaepaw cawh ma bia heh ka ca patai he , kama taitah cang lytah Abuipaw Zisu taitah a cang . Nupui a cangpaw tah a pasae kaw sai kheh seh .
46007011	Canghrasala , a kaw sai caco , dongcang khawh kheh seh , a cang ly leh a pasae khatah a pahlawng kaw he seh . Taico pasae a cangpaw tah a nupui cawh mah kheh seh .
46007012	A tangpaw khatah ma heh ka rei du , Abuipaw Zisu taitah cang lytah kama taitah a cang . Khrisaw pakheh tah zingtu a cang lypaw canu khah nupui tah chui ka , canuno zong tah ama kha ung hrui cawh a du thlang caco , vathlang kheh seh .
46007013	Taico canu tah zingtu a cang lypaw capaw khah pasae tah hnui ka , capaw zong tah ama kha ung hrui cawh a du thlang caco , kaw sai kheh seh .
46007014	Zecawtamaw tatah zingtu a cang lypaw pasae zong a nupui thongtah Khazing cyhlang tlang pawtah tua cang ka , zingtu a cang lypaw nupui zong a zingtu a cangpaw a pasae thongtah Khazing cyhlang tlang pawtah tua a cang myca . Ma hratei a cang ly caco , naa sawtei leh cawh pathai be ca he ka , canghrasala atoheh cawh a pathai myca he .
46007015	Canghrasala , zingtu a cang lypaw taco kaw sai , a cang ly leh piasai a du caco , a dunahpaw hraco cang thlang seh . Ma hapaw hming leco zingtu a cangpaw canu zong , capaw zong zetahmai pakhang bei he . De teitah ung rua pawtah Khazing tah a ma ypaw a cang .
46007016	Nama nupui a cangpaw , na pasae cawh ka pachah khy a , pachah khy bei nei tahpaw zekhatamaw na hni ? Ma hraco nama pasae a cangpaw zong tah na nupui cawh ka pachah khy a , pachah khy bei neh tahpaw zekhatamaw na hni hrah ?
46007017	A cang ly leh mingting heh Abuipaw tei a hringnah chung letei tua ruapaw tei a pehpaw le Khazing tah a za y ning teipaw hrakhei a ung thlang ruapaw a cang . Ma heh khrisawbu vytei khatah ka cawngpah lai teipaw he phungbia cawh a cang hi .
46007018	Cawngsawpaw cawh y a cangning takhei a cingpa a za tai thah maw ? Ma paw taco cingpa a tai lypaw hratah ung kheh seh . Cawngsawpaw cawh y a cangning takhei a cingpa a tai lypaw a cang maw ? Cingpa a tai hrah kheh seh .
46007019	Cingpa a tai cawh zehmai cang be ca ka , cingpa a tai ly zong zehmai cang hlui be . A biapui cawh Khazing biapeh a cingkai thlang heh a cang .
46007020	Pakheh cy heh Khazing tah a y ning teipaw he dawhming lekhei a daw cy thlang heh seh .
46007021	Y na cangning takhei sae na cang maw ? Na ze a pui kheh seh , ma duitei cawh zalong khynah a raicangpaw na hmuh caco zalong a pachia .
46007022	Zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw tei a y ning tah sae a cangpaw cawh Abuipaw letah a zalongpaw cang ka , y a cangning tei a zalongpaw cawh Khri a sae a cang .
46007023	Naaning cawh Khazing tei amai a rupui tah a cawh ciapaw na cang he ceh , cawngsaw sae tah a tua khe lo .
46007024	Uny sahlo , naaning pakheh cacy khah Khazing tah a ca y ning teipaw he naa cangning tei hrakhei Khazing kha a huikongnah chung leco ung thlang my lo .
46007025	Atoheh cawh nupui pasae a hnui balang lypaw sahlo aa kong ka rei a . Abuipaw taitah thuisahpaw bia hnui bei neh , canghrasala Abuipaw a zawngenah thongtah zingchuipaw ka cang cawtah ka rawhnah ka rei .
46007026	Atochai ruhanah heh pacang pawco , nupui pasae a hnui balang lypaw sahlo cawh ma tatei co ung thlang he seh la a chah a ka tah .
46007027	Nupui a hnuipaw na cang maw ? Nupui vathlang a pachia kheh . Nupui a hnui balang lypaw na cang maw ? Nupui hnui a pachia kheh .
46007028	Canghrasala , nupui naa hnui hmai tah sua bei he ceh , pasae naa hnui hmai tah sua bei he ceh . Canghrasala nupui pasae a hnuipaw sahlo taco ma alui hringchung lehei lung reithuinah a hlupui a tong he ka , ma cawh a tong kheh he seh tah ka ca dukhuinah rawng he tah a cang .
46007029	Uny sahlo , ka rei dupaw cawh kaa cai heh sy khawh be . Macawtaco atoning ri taihei co , nupui a hnuipaw sahlo tah a hnui lypaw hratah ung myca he seh la ,
46007030	ngechia mehthli thlá tei a ungpaw sahlo tah a ngechia lypaw hratah ung myca he seh , alung a lawngpaw sahlo tah a lawng lypaw hratah ung myca he seh la , hming a copaw sahlo tah ma heh kaa tei cang be tahpaw hratah ung he seh .
46007031	Khazaw hming a tonghrepaw sahlo tah ma sahlo leco aa lung ung thlang kheh seh , zecawtamaw tatah ma khazaw heh atotei a cang naning hei a ry hlai tah a ly a .
46007032	Lung reithui lytah ung la , tah ka du . Nupui a hnui lypaw capaw cawh Abuipaw a rai kong suipaw letah a lung reithui ka , Abuipaw lung khah zekhatamaw ka patlang khy a tahpaw a zawng .
46007033	Canghrasala , nupui a hnuipaw cawngsaw cawh khazaw hming tungtuh khuasahnah kong letah a lung reithui ka , a nupui lung khah zekhatamaw ka patlang khy a tah a zawng .
46007034	Macawtaco , ama cawh a lung kang rahning tah a ung . Pasae a hnui lypaw , a cang ly leh dawng a cang balang lypaw canu cawh Abuipaw a rai kong letah a lung rei a thui . A pachiapaw cawh a pung kha a thlawpaw khatah Abuipaw letah a peh khah a cang . Canghrasala pasae a hnuipaw canu cawh tungtuh khuasahnah kong letah a lung rei a thui . A pasae lung khah zekhatamaw ka patlang khy a tahpaw a zawng .
46007035	Ma heh naa chah nápawtah ka reipaw a cang , ka ca thlypaw he cang lytah a dingpaw tah naa hring tei , Abuipaw letah lung hmuisui tah naa hlai khy nápaw he ceh cawtah a cang .
46007036	Pakheh kheh tah laisawtha a hangpaw khah a ling zosah myca neh ka , a laikhung myca cawtah ka chui hrahring a hy tatah a pacang caco , a dupaw hraco tua thlang seh , suanah a tuapaw cang be . A pahlawng thlang he seh .
46007037	Canghrasala , cawngsaw tah reipah rawng tah cang lytah ama a lung dunah khah te ka , ma laisawtha cawh chui bei neh tatah a tah caco , ma cawngsawpaw zong cawh hmingchaw a tuapaw a cang thlang .
46007038	Macawtaco laisawtha a chuipaw taco hming chawpaw a tua , canghrasala ma canuno cawh a chui ly caco , hmingchaw vypaw a tua .
46007039	Canu cawh a pasae a hring chung cawh ama khaco a pahlawng thlang seh , canghrasala a pasae a thih caco , meh zalong cang ka , a dupaw capaw khatah dawng a cang khy thlang , ma duitei cawh ma capaw cawh Abuipaw a zingpaw a cang a .
46007040	Kama ka rawhnah pawco , dongcang khawh lytah ung thlang seh la , a cawtah a chah vy a ka tah . Taico kama zong Khazing Thlawpaw ka hnui tatah ka rawh thlang .
46008001	Atoheh cawh nono dangnah batui kong ka cia a . Kaa zongmingtei tah hninah kaa hnui thlu tah cawh kaa hni . Hninah taco cawngsaw a palai a patuisah ka , canghrasala donah taco cawngsaw a tua hry .
46008002	Zehmai ka hni thlu thlang tatei a rawhpaw cawngsaw cawh a hni ruapaw a hnih balang lypaw a cang .
46008003	Canghrasala Khazing a dopaw cawngsaw cawh Khazing tah ama khah a hni .
46008004	Mataico atoheh cawh nono dangnah batui enah kong a cang . Khazaw lehei nono cawh zehmai cang be ca ka , Khazing pakheh tah ly co a hringpaw khazing ung be tah cawh kaa hni .
46008005	Alui letah le vaicung letah khazing tatei aa tahpaw a hlupui le abui a hlupui ung he ka , khazing a hlupui le abui a hlupui aa ung tahmai tah ,
46008006	kaaning kaa caw taco Khazing pakheh suipaw ung ka , Ama cawh Paw khah a cang . Ama taitah hming vytei va chuh he ka , Ama a caw taco kaa hringpaw a cang . Taico Abui pakheh suipaw ung ka , Ama cawh Zisu Khri cang ka , Ama a thong co , hming vytei va chuh he ka , Ama a thong co , kaa hringpaw a cang .
46008007	Canghrasala ma heh ming maikaw tah hnih bei he . Cawngsaw thaikhehpaw cawh ato tingtai heh nono kha a pahlawh thlang rawng he tahei , ma hapaw batui cawh aa e tihtah dangnah batui a cang tatah rawh he ka , aa chiachaw thluidangnah lungthing khah a padia a padanah cawtah aa ma papia palui tatah a rawh he .
46008008	Canghrasala batui taco Khazing kha a ma nesah be , kaa e ly zong tah chia vy hlui bei peh , kaa e zong tah chah vy hlui bei peh .
46008009	Ma duitei cawh zalong teitah naa ungnahpaw cawh a zingnah a padia a padapaw sahlo aa pohlynah a cang ly nápawtah a raering my lo .
46008010	Zecawtamaw tatah naaning hninah a hnuipaw sahlo tah nono behnah ing letei batui naa epaw khah a chiachaw thluidangnah lungthing a padia a padapaw tah a ca hmuh caco he , ma taco dangnah batui e ruapaw taco a raechah sá bei maw ?
46008011	Macawtaco ma a zingnah a padia a padapaw , Khri tei a thih hnopaw unypaw cawh naaning naa hninah tah a ro .
46008012	Ma hrahei naa uny sahlo cung letah naa sua tihtah a hmang lypaw tatah aa zingpaw khah a tua sahpaw naa cang cawtah Khri cung letah a suapaw na cang he ceh .
46008013	Macawtaco , ka epaw tahei ka unypaw khah suanah lang a tlahsah caco , ma saw cawh e khaw bei neh , ma pawsui co , pakheh tei hmai suanah lang a tlahsah tupaw cang bei neh .
46009001	Zalongpaw cang bei neh maw ? Apostol cang bei neh maw ? Kaa Buipaw Zisu a hmuhpaw cang bei neh maw ? Naaning sahlo heh Abuipaw a rai ka hrepaw letei a thuisu cawh cang bei he ceh maw ?
46009002	Ming hringpaw khatah apostol ka cang ly zong tahmai naaning khaco ka cang hrahring kho ! Zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw letei apostol ka cangnahpaw cakhai cawh naaning sahlo heh na cang he ceh hi .
46009003	Ka kong a pacepaw sahlo letei ka reicakainahpaw cawh ma heh a cang .
46009004	Khrisawbu taitah ding le e hmuhnah naw hnui bei peh maw ?
46009005	Ahringpaw apostol sahlo le Abuipaw a uny sahlo le , Piter tei a chuilai pawhe hratah zingtu nupui a chuilainah naw hnui hrah bei he peh maw ?
46009006	A cang ly leh Barnaba le kama suipaw heh maw kaa hringnah cawtah rai a hrepai ruapaw cawh ka cang peh ?
46009007	Ama a hnuichia hmang tah ahohmai raekeh rai hre bang bei he . Misur lui tua ka , misur thui e lytah ahohmai ung bang bei he . Tuurung king ka , a hnabaetui ding lytah ahohmai ung bang bei he .
46009008	Cawngsaw phung longtei tah ma heh rei bei neh . Phungbia tah ma hraco a tah hrah .
46009009	Zecawtamaw tatah Moses phungbia letah ma hrahei a cia hi , “ Co tungpaw cawh sacaang a ci chung taco , a hmo tongchai khe o , ” tatah Khazing tei a rei dupaw cawh co tungpaw cawh maw a cang ?
46009010	Ma heh kaaning kaa cawtah a reipaw a cang hi , cang thlang bei maw ? A cang , ma heh kaaning kaa cawtah za ciapaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah alui a thawngpaw tah a thawng tihtah le saze a cipaw tah a ci tihtah kaa tingvy a ung hrah tatah hnabeisuinah khatah aa tuapaw a cang .
46009011	Kaaning cawh naa hrong letah Thlawpaw thleci va peh ka , naaning taitah aluicung hming a thuisu kaa hre tihtah ma cawh a hlu tu maw ?
46009012	Ming hringpaw tahmai naaning taitah pehlainah hmuhnah naw aa hnui caco , kaaning cawh ka hmuh chichi ruapaw cang bei maw ? Canghrasala , kaaning cawh ma naw hnuinah cawh hmang bei peh . Khri thawngchawbia heh a pakhang a paduipaw a ung ly nápawtah zezong lungsy tah kaa ing hri .
46009013	Behnah ing letei rai a hrepaw sahlo tah aa e ruapaw cawh behnah ing taitah hmuh he ka , dangnah siasang letei raihretu sahlo takhei dangnah siasang letei aa hlaipaw lekhei tingvy aa hnui hrah takhah naa hni .
46009014	Ma hraco thawngchawbia a reipaw sahlo taco thawngchawbia reinah thongtah aa pori congnah aa hmuh ruapaw a cang tah heh Abuipaw biapeh a cang hi .
46009015	Canghrasala , kama cawh ma nawhnuinah sahlo heh sangkheh hmai hmang bang bei neh . Taico , ma hapaw hming cawh pa tuapah na he seh tah rawhchainá tah ma ca heh ka va ciapaw zong cang be . Ma ka pachawnah lehei pakheh kheh tah a pa pahnong a pa pakha navy co , thih hmai tah ka du vy hri hi .
46009016	Thawngchawbia ka reilaipaw rawng tahei co a pachaw khy bei neh , zecawtamaw tatah rei law tatah hranghrang tah siapaw ka cang . Thawngchawbia ka rei ly caco , ka cing a ping hi !
46009017	Ma lungthó tah ka rei caco , longmai ka hmuh a . Ma taco cang lytah Khazing tei a pa khingpaw rai khah ka hrepaw a cang .
46009018	Mataico zemaw ka longmai cawh a cang ? Thawngchawbia reinah lehei amai lytah ching he neh ka , ma thawngchawbia reinah lehei ka nawhnuinah ka hmang lypaw heh a cang .
46009019	Kama cawh zalongpaw cang neh ka , aho a sae hmai ka cang ly naná teitah cawngsaw a hlu vy maw ka tle khy bo he tah neh ka , ming maikaw aa sae tah ka tua lai .
46009020	Juda cawngsaw sahlo tle rua pawtah Juda cawngsaw sahlo khatah ka ungning taco , Juda cawngsaw hratah ka tua . Kama cawh phungbia rai letah a ungpaw ka cang ly naná teitah phungbia rai letei a ungpaw sahlo khatah ka ungning taco , phungbia rai letei a ungpaw sahlo hratah ka tua . Phungbia rai letei a ungpaw sahlo tle rua pawtah ma hrahei ka tua .
46009021	A hmuisui teico , Khazing phungbia taitah lua bei neh . Khri phungbia rai letah ka ung thlang naná teitah phungbia a hnui lypaw sahlo khatah ka ungning taco , phungbia a hnui lypaw hratah ka tua . Ma cawh phungbia a hnui lypaw sahlo he tle rua pawtah a cang .
46009022	A thaw a padiapaw sahlo tle rua pawtah a thaw a padiapaw sahlo khatah ka ungning taco , a thaw a padiapaw hratah ka tua . A cawngpe chang maw sangkheh khé hei ka pachah khy bo he , ka tah cawtah ming maikaw khatah aaning hratah ka tua lai hrah .
46009023	Ma ka tuapaw heh thawngchawbia cawtah cang ka , ma pawsui co a bonghnang ka hrong khy a .
46009024	A saipasinah letah a zawngpaw vytei cawh sai he ka , canghrasala pakheh long tah longmai a hmuh tah cawh hnih thlang bei he ceh maw ? Ma hraco longmai hmuh a pawtah sai hrah my lo .
46009025	A tuapasinah letei a zawngpaw maikaw taco cawngnah khah hmuisui teitah aa tua tei . Ma cawh a hming lypaw longmai hmuh ruapaw cawtah a cang , canghrasala kaaning tei kaa tuapaw cawh chaizaw a hmingpaw longmai hmuh rua pawtah a cang hi .
46009026	Macawtaco kama cawh tingchipaw a hnui lypaw cawngsaw a saipaw hratah sai bei neh , ka thong tihtah a longpaw a thongpaw cawngsaw hratah a thong bei neh .
46009027	Ming hringpaw a cawngpah pawhe cang tlung neh ka , kama tamaw longmai hmuh a tlah lypaw cang kaw leneh tatah ka pung cawh hreh neh ka , achaw teitah ka hraipaking .
46010001	Uny sahlo , Moses a zuipaw he aa ma pathlahtu sahlo cawh aa zongmingtei tah ma meding rai lekhei ung he ka , rili a lecingcing alui a rypaw lekhei aa seichua tahpaw bia heh a cingkai thlang la , tah ka du .
46010002	Aaning sahlo cawh Moses zui pawtah ma meding le rili lekhei baptisma a cang he .
46010003	Aa zongmingtei tah a lopaw thlawpaw lang batui khah e he ka ,
46010004	a lopaw thlawpaw lang tui khah aa ding , aaning khatei a seilai hrahpaw thlawpaw lang alung puino taiteipaw tui khah ding he ka , ma alung puino cawh Khri khah a cang .
46010005	A cang naná teitah aaning letei mehlu vy sahlo khakhei Khazing cawh a lung tling be , macawtaco sadi raang lekhei a thi he .
46010006	Aaning sahlo tei aa tuapaw hratah chahlynah hming letei kaa thinglung kaa chia ly nápawtah ma hming sahlo heh a mingpai rua tah a ungpaw a cang .
46010007	Capathai letei , “ Aaning sahlo cawh ding e rua pawtah khei a ty he ka , a nawngse rua pawtah khei a daw he , ” tatah ciapaw hratah aaning sahlo letei thaikhehpaw sahlo tah nono a behpaw hratah naa cang ruapaw cang be .
46010008	Aaning sahlo letei thaikhehpaw sahlo tah canu capaw suanah tua he ka , ningkheh letah 23000 aa thihpaw hratah canu capaw suanah kaa tua ruapaw cang be .
46010009	Aaning sahlo letei thaikhehpaw sahlo tah Abuipaw khah hnehsah he ka , pari tah a cuh sehpaw he hratah Abuipaw cawh kaa hnehsápaw cang be .
46010010	Taico aaning sahlo letei thaikhehpaw sahlo cawh phingze he ka , rawhrangtu vaiming tah a thawpaw he hratah phingze khe lo .
46010011	Aaning sahlo khatah ma hming sahlo a tlungpaw heh caichangnah letei a ungpaw kaaning sahlo kaa cawtah a mingpai rua pawtah le a raering nápaw cawtah ciapaw a cang he .
46010012	Macawtaco zingnah letah cyky tah ka daw thlang tatah a rawhpaw taco , suanah letah a po sua ly nápawtah khei a raering seh .
46010013	Tuhsonah naa cung letei a tlungpaw heh ming hringpaw zong tah aa ing cypaw khah a cang . Taico , Khazing cawh zingchuipaw a cang , naa ing khypaw a khunglang tah tuhso ruapaw takhei co ca sai bei he . Canghrasala tuhso naa ing tihtah naa ing khy nápawtah thawzaang ca pei he ka , chuathlahnah langpui zong a ca tua pá he .
46010014	Macawtaco ka dopaw vesaw sahlo , nono behnah khah saisai my lo .
46010015	A lungsingpaw cawngsaw biaching hratah ka ca ching he hi , ka reipaw heh achaw teitah pacang my lo .
46010016	A lawngbia a hlai hmotah bonghnang ny tei kaa dingpaw heh Khri thisai kaa hrongpaw he peh cang bei maw ? Taico , very khah kychy peh ka , kaa epaw khah Khri a pung kaa hrongpaw he peh cang bei maw ?
