51003017	Taico bia tamaw , raihrená tamaw , hming naa tuapaw maikaw cawh Abuipaw Zisu ming tah tua thlu la , Ama a thong co Paw Khazing kha lawngbia a hlai paria my lo .
51003018	Naaning nupui a cangpaw sahlo , naa pasae leh aa bia khah nge my lo , ma heh Abuipaw a zuipaw cawngsaw tei tua rua pawtah a tlahpaw cawh a cang hi .
51003019	Naaning pasae a cangpaw sahlo , naa nupui leh khah do la , hrehro simi khe lo .
51003020	Naaning sawtei a cangpaw sahlo , zezongpui kong lekhei naa no naa paw rei khah nge my lo . Ma taco Abuipaw cawh a lawngsah kho .
51003021	Naaning Paw a cangpaw sahlo , naa sawtei leh khah a hnasah khe lo , aa lungdong sua le .
51003022	Naaning sae a cangpaw sahlo , hming maikaw letah alui letei naa bui leh aa rei khah nge my lo . Ma cawh aa mehmuh letah aa lung tong du caw longlong tah cang lytah lungtho teitah le Abuipaw naa cizawnah cawtah cang hri my seh lo .
51003023	Zehming naa tua hmai tah mehnung cawtah tua bei peh , Abuipaw a cawtah kaa tua tahpaw lung hnui la , naa lung hmuisui tah tua my lo .
51003024	Zemaw tah pawco , Abuipaw taitah longmai hratah ry cypaw kaa hmuh a tah naa hni thlang kho . Abuipaw Khri a rai naa hrepah leimeipaw cawh Ama heh a cang hi .
51003025	Ahohmai hmingchahly a tuapaw cawh hmingchahly a tuapaw hrakhei hreh a cang a . Abuipaw tah patlia patlanah ung lytah bia a ce a .
51004001	Naaning abui a cangpaw sahlo , naa sae sahlo khah a ding teitah le a phutaw teitah peihlai my lo , zecawtamaw tatah vaicung letah Abui kaa hnui hrah tahpaw khah naa hni thlang kho .
51004002	Thlawchangnah letah a pei la , a raering teitah ung la , alawngnah bia hlai paria my lo .
51004003	Taico Khazing tah a thawngchawbia rei pawtah caichaw a ma peh nápawtah kaa cawtah thlaw ma changpah hrah my lo . Ma pawsui co , bahrairui ka khi hnohnangpaw Khri biaparuh cawh kaa y khui khy hi .
51004004	Ka rei dingpaw hratah thawngchawbia khah a sepaw tah ka rei khy nápawtah thlawchang pa baw my lo .
51004005	A zing lypaw sahlo khatah lungsing teitah ung la , caichaw maikaw khah chahnainge tah hmang my lo .
51004006	Naa bia reipaw cawh ningdonah khatah chih seh la , thlung-ae my seh lo , ma pawsui co ming maikaw khah zehratamaw kaa chai he takhah naa hni a .
51004007	Taikhika tah ka konglang vytei cawh a ca ching he a . Ama heh uny dopaw , zingchuipaw raihretu le Abuipaw letei rai ka hrehruipaw cawh a cang hi .
51004008	Naaning khatah ka va thlaw hno hnangpaw cawh kaa chuacangnah naa hni nápawtah le naa lungthing thaw ca patlungsah he seh , ka tah cawtah a cang .
51004009	Ama cawh zingchuipaw le kaa dopaw kaa uny , naaning naa cawngsaw a cangpaw Onesima khakhei a vong he a . Aaning tahei ma letei hming a cangpaw vytei heh aa ca ching he a .
51004010	Thong ka tlah hruipaw Aristarka tah a dang pawtah a ca tah he . Barnaba a unypaw Marka zong tah a ca tah hrah he . Marka a kong ka cachingpaw he khah naa thui thah kho , naaning khatah a vong caco , achaw teitah mingkai my lo .
51004011	Zisu , Justa tatei aa ypaw zong takhei a dang pawtah a ca tah he . Khazing painah raang caw tei rai ka hrehruipaw hrong letah a taepaw Juda cawngsaw cawh aaning suipaw heh cang he ka , ka hnaw a pangang sahpaw a cang he .
51004012	Naaning naa cawngsaw a cangpaw , Khri Zisu a sae a cangpaw Epafra takhei a dang pawtah a ca tah he . Naa cawtah teria teitah thlaw a chang tei . Khazing a dupaw vytei letah naa pacy nápawtah le puitling naa cang khy nápaw cawtah a cang .
51004013	Ama heh naa cawtah le Laodisia le Heirapoli khua cawngsaw sahlo cawtah a thaw tah rai a hrepaw a cang tah cawh kama hrahring tah ka hnipaw a cang .
51004014	Kaa vesaw dopaw sibuipaw Luka le Dema tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah he .
51004015	Laodisia khua letei a ungpaw uny sahlo le Nimfa le a ing letei a pung teipaw khrisawbu sahlo khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
51004016	Ma ca heh naaning khatah rei a cang khy taitah Laodisia khua khrisawbu hai letah rei pawtah pei la , Laodisia khua cawngsaw tah aa ca peh pawhe khah rei hrah my lo .
51004017	Arkhipa khah , “ Abuipaw rai hre pawtei pehpaw rai khah paling hrahring my seh lo , tatah bia a ca caw , ” tatah ching my lo .
51004018	Ma kihtlenah bia heh kama Paul tah ka kih teitah ka ciapaw a cang hi . Thong ka tlahpaw heh a thui thlang my lo . Khazing ningdonah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh . Amen .
52001001	Paul , Sailas le Timote tah Paw Khazing le Abuipaw Zisu Khri tei a cangpaw , Thesalonika khua khrisawbu khatah ca kaa ca kua he . Ningdonah le thlawlungnah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh .
52001002	Naaning vytei naa cawtah Khazing khatah lawngbia kaa hlai tei peh . Kaa thlawchangnah letah kaa ca patae leimei thlang he .
52001003	Naa raihrenah tah naa zingnah a langsah zia le donah naa hnuipaw tah rai teria tah a ca hresah zia he le kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri letei hnabeisuinah naa hnuipaw takhei naa lung a ca pacysah zia he khah kaa Paw le kaa Khazing hmekaw letah ka thui paria thlang he peh .
52001004	Khazing tah a dopaw uny sahlo , Ama tah a ca thing he tahpaw kaa hni .
52001005	Zecawtamaw tatah kaa thawngchawbia cawh naaning khatah a va tlung tihtah bia longtei tah cang lytah hmingtuakhynah le Thlawpaw Pathai le hmuisui teitah a hnichuanah khatei a cangpaw khah naa hni . Naa cawtah naa hrong letah zehratamaw khua kaa sah tei tahpaw khah naa hni thlang kho .
52001006	Kaaning le Abuipaw khah a ma mingpai he ceh ka , ruhanah a sah ngeteipaw naa ing thlang naná teitah Thlawpaw Pathai tei a ca pehpaw he bia khah lunglawng teitah naa cyhlang .
52001007	Taico macawtaco Masidonia raang le Akhaia raang letei a ungpaw he zingtu vytei a mingpai rua takhei na cang he ceh .
52001008	Abuipaw bia naa reipaw cawh Masidonia raang le Akhaia raang letah a thang paw long cang lytah , Khazing letei naa zingnah zong kawting letah a thang thlu myca . Macawtaco naa kong heh kaaning kaa rei leimei hia khawh be .
52001009	Zecawtamaw tatah naaning sahlo tah zehratamaw naa ma hluihlang tahpaw khah aa rei thlang . Nono behnah taitah Khazing hring lang khah zehratamaw na paleh he ceh tahpaw le Khazing hring le a hmuisuipaw a cangpaw a rai hre ruapaw tah le ,
52001010	a va chuh lepaw Khazing thingaenah taitei a ma thochua ruapaw , thihnah taitei a pathopaw a Sawcapaw avai taitei a vongnah khah haw thlang pawtah a cang tahpaw bia naa reipaw khah aa ma ching .
52002001	Uny sahlo , kaa va ca tlongpaw he khah a chahnai lypaw cang be tahpaw khah naa hni thlang kho .
52002002	Filipi khua letah tai-ing thah peh ka , aisai zongtenah khah kaa ing hui tahpaw khah na hni thlang , canghrasala a sah pui tah aa ma dynah cung tah thawngchawbia cawh kaa Khazing bongnah thongtah kaa ca ching ngang thlang he kho .
52002003	Zecawtamaw tatah pasypalinah bia kaa reipaw khah ahmang lypaw , a cang ly leh a pathai lypaw , lungthing taitah a chuhpaw cang be ; naaning dungkhei ka pachia pawhe peh zong cang hrah be .
52002004	Ma hraco aa cang ly hlui tah Khazing tah a tlah tah katei thawngchawbia rei rai a khingsopaw kaa cangpaw hratah kaa reipaw a cang . Kaaning cawh mehnung lungtong a pachia bei peh , kaa lungthing a ma pasetu Khazing lungtong khah ka zawng hri peh .
52002005	Male pachaw zong hmang bei peh . Duhlui zong hnui bei ca peh ka , duhlui dunah bakhu zong a pachia bang bei peh takhah naa hni thlang . Khazing cawh a ma hnikhuitu a cang .
52002006	Kaaning cawh naaning taitah cang seh , ming hringpaw taitah cang seh , cawngsaw taitei pachawnah khah kaa huipaw cang be .
52002007	Khri apostol kaa cangnah cawtah hei naa cung letah hmingrih khingnah naw cawh kaa hnui thlang . Canghrasala a no tah a sawtei leh khah a mingkaipaw he hratah , naa hrong letah ningnai teitah kaa ung hri .
52002008	Kaa ca do tunah rawng he tah Khazing thawngchawbia thuisah long hmai heh kaa lung a ui be ca ka , kaa hringnah tai zong peh kaa ca du he . Zecawtamaw tatah kaa do ngeteipaw na cang myca he ceh .
52002009	Uny sahlo , naaning khatei Khazing thawngchawbia kaa rei chung vytei lekhei aho a caw tahmai tah hmingrih cang ly rua pawtah sisaw ing tah ching kha zai kha rai kaa hrepaw khah na thui thlang he ceh .
52002010	Naaning zingtu sahlo hrong letah zetluh a pathaipaw , a dingpaw le panah a hnui lypaw maw kaa cang tahpaw khah naaning heh a ma hnikhuitu cang he ceh ka , ma hraco Khazing zong a cang hrah .
52002011	Zecawtamaw tatah a paw tah a sawtei leh a tuitangpaw hra he tah naaning pakheh cacy khah kaa ca tuitang he .
52002012	A rungnawnah le a painah raang chung lang a ca ytu he Khazing hringzia kha a tlah pawtah hring rua pawtah ca pasy he peh , hnawngangnah bia ca ching he peh , thawzaang ca pei he peh kaa ca tahpaw he khah naa hni thlang kho .
52002013	Taico Khazing khatah zong alawngnah bia kaa rei tei , zecawtamaw tatah kaaning taitei naa thuipaw Khazing bia khah naa cyhlang tihtah mehnung bia hratah cyhlang lytah Khazing taitei a chuhpaw bia hratah cyhlang he ceh ka , a hmuisuipaw zong cang hahai ka , zingtu sahlo naa chung letei rai a hre leimeipaw cawh a cang .
52002014	Zecawtamaw tatah uny sahlo , naaning cawh Khri Zisu letei a ungpaw , Judia raang chung letei Khazing a khrisawbu sahlo khakhei a lopaw na cang myca he ceh . Naa raang cawngsaw taitei hanah naa ingpaw hrakhei ma khrisawbu sahlo tahei Juda cawngsaw sahlo taitah aa ing hrah .
52002015	Juda cawngsaw sahlo cawh Abuipaw Zisu le Khazing khuavang sahlo a thehpaw le kaaning zong a ma tingchuapaw a cang he . Aaning cawh Khazing lung a pachiapaw le , ming vytei khah a caraepaw a cang he .
52002016	Gental cawngsaw sahlo pachah aa cang khy nápawtah aaning kha bia kaa reipaw khah pakhang a ma zawng he ka , ma hrahei aa suanah cawh a chahchi vy leimei he . A changnah letaco Khazing thingaenah tah a tlahso chi he .
52002017	Canghrasala uny sahlo , kaa lungthing lang tah cang lytah pungsaw tah naaning khatah cai cuitei kaa chai tih he peh tah ca vang ngetei he peh ka , naaning kha a tong kaw rua pawtah ka zawng tei he peh .
52002018	Zecawtamaw tatah naaning kha va sei khah du ngetei peh ka , kama Paul lehbang cawh ato le ato tah ka pachia tei , canghrasala Setan tah a ma pakhang .
52002019	Zecawtamaw tatah , kaa hnabeisuipaw , kaa lunglawngnah cai , a cang ly leh kaa Buipaw Zisu a vong tihtah a hmekaw letah kaa sungnaw nápaw a cangpaw abui lukhu cawh zemaw a cang a ? Naaning sahlo khah cang bei he ceh maw ?
52002020	Kaa rungnawnah le kaa lunglawngnah hmuisui cawh naaning heh naa cang he ceh .
52003001	Macawtaco kaa ceh khawh ly tihtah Athen khuapui letah seisai tah ung peh seh la , a chah cai a tatah kaa rawh .
52003002	Angepainah letah thawzaang a ca pei ruapaw he tah le naa thaw a ca thosah ruapaw he tah Khri thawngchawbia pakaipaza sahnah letah kaa uny le Khazing rai kaa hrehruipaw a cangpaw Timote khah kaa va thlaw .
52003003	Ma cawh naa tai-ingpaw sisawnah rawng tahei pakheh hmai hninglang naa sai ly nápaw cawtah a cang . Kaaning vytei cawh sisawnah ing rua pawtah rawhpaw ka cang peh tahpaw khah a sepaw tah naa hni thlangpaw a cang .
52003004	A ngetei tahpaw co naaning khatei kaa ungning takhei hrehnah kaa ing a tahpaw khah kaa ca ching thah he . Taico naa hni ciapaw hratah a va cang hmuisui .
52003005	Ma rawng tahei ka ceh khawh ly tihtah , naa zingnah khah zemaw a lo tahpaw hni du tah Timote cawh ka va thlawpaw a cang . A rakheh lang tei ka phangpaw cawh tuhsotu tah a ca tuhso tih he tah thaw tah rai kaa hrepaw vytei khah ze lypaw tamaw cang pang le tahpaw heh a cang .
52003006	Canghrasala Timote cawh atoheh naaning a ca tlongnah pawhe taitah va tlung kaw myca ka , naa zingnah le donah naa hnuinah kong thawngchaw khah a va ma pho . Naa hmui hmuh kaa ca vangpaw he hratah kaa hmui hmuh vang hrah he ceh ka , naa ma thui paria thlang he ceh tahpaw khah a ma ching .
52003007	Macawtaco uny sahlo kaa lung reithuinah vytei le hrehnah kaa ingnah vytei lehei naaning naa zingnah tahei thawzaang a ma peh .
52003008	Ato cawh kaa Buipaw letah cyky tah na daw thlang he ceh tahpaw kaa thuinah cawtah kaaning cawh ka hring hmuisui myca peh .
52003009	Naaning naa thong tei kaa Khazing hme letah alawngnah kaa hnuipaw heh zetlua tamaw Khazing letah alawngnah bia kaa hlai tei tú a ?
52003010	Ching kha , zai kha , a hmuisui teitah thlaw kaa changpaw cawh naa hmui hmuh kaw khy pawtah le naa zingnah letei naa phahlahnah pawhe ceh khah bawkhangnah peh rua pawtah a cang .
52003011	Kaa Khazing le Paw Ama ceingei le kaa Buipaw Zisu taco naaning kha kaa va sei khy nápawtah langpui cawh ma pa-awng ky my seh lo .
52003012	Abuipaw tah pakheh le pakheh naa dopaw he ceh le ming vytei naa dopaw he khah a ka sah seh la kaaning tah kaa ca dopaw he tlua tah changchysah ky seh .
52003013	Kaa Buipaw Zisu cawh a mehpathai vytei khatah a vong tihtah kaa Khazing le kaa Paw hme letah a pathaipaw le panah a hnui lypaw naa cang khy nápawtah Ama taco naa lungthing thaw ca patlung ky he seh .
52004001	Uny sahlo , a changnah letaco Khazing a lawngsah rua pawtah zehratamaw naa ung a hia tahpaw khah ca ching thah he peh ka , atotei naa hringzia heh a cang . Atoheh ma cawh a hlu vy tah na tua vy leimei nápawtah kaa Buipaw Zisu letah a ca hy he peh ka , ca sia he peh ka , kaa ca ching vypaw he a cang .
52004002	Chingreinah kaa ca pehpaw vytei he khah kaa Buipaw Zisu tei nawhnuinah a ma pehpaw hratah kaa ca peh he tahpaw khah naa hni thlang kho .
52004003	A pathai teitah ung la , canu le capaw suanah kha cahri la , ma cawh Khazing dupaw a cang .
52004004	Naaning pakheh cacy khah ma le pung khah a hraipaking pawtah le a pathai teitah le zawchui pawtah ungpaw khah cong a pachia cy my lo .
52004005	Khazing a hnih lypaw lawki cawngsaw sahlo hratah hohenah khah hmang khe la ,
52004006	ma hapaw kong lehei ahotahmai tah a unypaw cung letah chahlynah tua khe seh la , zecawtamaw tatah ma hapaw suanah cawh Abuipaw tah veri a thing he tahpaw khah kaa ca ching pacia thah he kho .
52004007	Khazing tah a pialui rua pawtah a ypaw cang be ca peh ka , a pathaipaw hringzia tah hring rua pawtah a ypaw kaa cang hri he peh .
52004008	Macawtaco ma bia a eipaw he cawngsaw sahlo he cawh mehnung bia a eipaw cang ly he tah a Thlawpaw Pathai a ca peipaw he Khazing bia a eipaw a cang he .
52004009	Atoheh cawh uny sahlo hratah a donah kong cawh ciapah hia khawh bei he ceh . Naaning ceingei khah Khazing tah pakheh le pakheh a donah kong khah a ca cawngpah thah he .
52004010	A ngetei tahpaw co Masidonia raang letei uny vytei a dopaw na cang he ceh . A cang naná tah ma hming cawh tua vy lo leimei thlang pawtah kaa ca sia he .
52004011	Kaa ca ching ciapaw he hrakhei , de teitah ung a pachia la , naaning naa rai khah hre thlang la , naaning naa kih ceingei khei raihre cy my lo .
52004012	Ma tih taco ningting naa hringzia taikhei alailang teipaw cawngsaw tah ca ming chy he ka , naa byhianah lekhei minghringpaw a paichai khaw bei he ceh .
52004013	Uny sahlo , a thi thah paw sahlo aa kong letah zehmai hni lytah naa ungpaw le hnabeisuinah a hnui lypaw sahlo hratah naa nge achiapaw du bei peh .
52004014	Zisu cawh thi ka , a tho kaw tahpaw zing peh ka , macawtaco Ama letei a thipaw sahlo he cawh Khazing tah Zisu khaco a va chui kaw he tahpaw kaa zing .
52004015	Ma heh Abuipaw bia ningtei hratah a cang , kaaning a hringning thlangpaw le Abuipaw a vongkawnah tai a tangning thlangpaw sahlo tahei , a thipaw sahlo aa hmelang tah sei hrahring bei he peh tah heh ka ca ching he .
52004016	Zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw Ama ceingei tah o thangpui tah nawpehnah le , vaiming alaicaipaw o khatah le , Khazing hmoka khatah vaicung taitah za cung ka , Khri letei a thipaw sahlo khah a tho taw he a .
52004017	Ma khy taico kaaning a hringning thlangpaw le , a tangning thlangpaw sahlo heh aaning khatah avai letah Abuipaw a tong rua pawtah khei meding hrong letah hmokheh tah lahchy ka cang he peh . Taico Abuipaw khatah chaizaw tah kaa ung a .
52004018	Macawtaco ma bia hei pakheh le pakheh thawzaang a pei my lo .
52005001	Uny sahlo , ma vytei hming a va cang nápaw a cai le a ning kong letah ca ciapah a hy bei he ceh .
52005002	Zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw ning cawh zai tah , mehru hratah a vong a tahpaw khah a se pawtah naa hni thlang .
52005003	Cawngsaw tah , “ Denah le a bingnah cai , ” aa tah chung takhei sung sungkheh tah rorangnah cawh , canu ny a zeipaw hratah aa cung letah tlung a ka , ahohmai lua khy a bei he .
52005004	Canghrasala uny sahlo , naaning cawh muinah letah a ungpaw naa cang lynah cawtah ma ning cawh mehru hratah rawh ly pui tah va tlung a be .
52005005	Naaning cawh khainah sawtei le ching sawtei na cang he ceh . Kaaning cawh zai le muinah tei cang bei peh .
52005006	Macawtaco kaaning cawh a ihningpaw sahlo hrakhei cang kheh he peh seh . A hrahpaw le ma le pung a hraipaking khypaw cang hri he peh .
52005007	Zecawtamaw tatah a ihpaw sahlo cawh zai tah aa ih tei , zu a ruipaw zong zai tah aa rui tei .
52005008	Canghrasala kaaning cawh ningching cawngsaw kaa cang cawtah ma le pung a hraipaking khypaw ka cang he peh . Zingnah le donah khah cacanghnaw letah a pachawng tah pachahnah hnabeisuinah khah lukhu tah hmang he peh .
52005009	Zecawtamaw tatah Khazing tah a thingaenah ing pawtah a ma thingpaw cang lytah kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri thongtah pachahnah hmuh a pawtah a ma thingpaw a cang .
52005010	Kaa cawtah a thihnah rawng tah kaa thih zong tah cang seh , kaa hring zong tah cang seh , Ama khatah hmingkheh tah ka ung he peh .
52005011	Macawtaco pakheh le pakheh thawzaang a pei la , naa tua teipaw hrakhei a pasy leimei my lo .
52005012	Uny sahlo , naa hrong letei raitung a hrepaw sahlo le Abuipaw letei naa cung lang tei a ungpaw sahlo le a ca chinghring pawhe sahlo khah cizaw my lo .
52005013	Aa raihrepaw rawng takhei donah le cizawnah a sangpui tah pei my lo . Pakheh le pakheh a dorai teitah ung my lo .
52005014	Taico uny sahlo , a thawthipaw sahlo khah a raeringnah pei la , a raechiapaw sahlo khah thawzaang pei la , a thaw a diapaw sahlo khah bong la , ming vytei cung letah naa lungsy seh tatah kaa ca sia he .
52005015	Chahlynah khah chah ly ná tah verithing khe la , pakheh le pakheh cung letah cang seh , ming vytei cung letah cang seh , chahnah tua tukhah a zawng paria thlang my lo .
52005016	A lawng paria thlang my lo ;
52005017	Thlawchang leimei thlang my lo ;
52005018	Zezong kong ting letah alawngnah bia rei my lo . Khri Zisu letah ma heh naa cawtah Khazing dupaw cawh a cang .
52005019	Thlawpaw me khah thihsah khe lo ;
52005020	Chinghlangnah bia khah zerei lytah ung khe lo .
52005021	Zezong pasepaning la , a chawpaw khah a lah my lo .
52005022	Chahlynah a cangpaw maikaw khah cahri my lo .
52005023	Denah Khazing , Ama Khazing hrahring taco naa pungpaluh tah ca pathaisah my he seh lo . Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri a vong kaw tihtah a hme letah suise a kawh lypaw naa cang nápawtah naa thlawpaw le naa lungthing le naa pungsaw khah ca chia he seh .
52005024	Naaning a ca ypaw he cawh zingchuipaw cang ka , ma cawh Ama tah a tua a .
52005025	Uny sahlo , thlaw ma changpah my lo .
52005026	Uny vytei khah a hmuhpatang teitah naa kih a tle cy my lo .
52005027	Ma ca heh uny sahlo vytei reipah my lo , tatah Abuipaw hme letah bia ka ca caw he .
52005028	Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri ningdonah cawh naaning khatah ung seh .
53001001	Paul , Sailas le Timote tah kaa Paw Khazing le Abuipaw Zisu Khri letei a ungpaw Thesalonika khua khrisawbu khatah ca kaa ca kua he .
53001002	Paw Khazing le Abuipaw Zisu Khri taiteipaw ningdonah le thlawlungnah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh .
53001003	Uny sahlo naaning rawng tah Khazing letah a lawng paria ruapaw ka cang peh . Ma cawh tua ruapaw hrahring a cang , zecawtamaw tatah naa zingnah cawh changchy vy lo leimei ka , pakheh le pakheh na donah pawhe ceh zong a pung vy leimei cawtah a cang .
53001004	Macawtaco hrehnah le hnehsahnah naa ing thlang naná teitah temahnah le zingnah naa hnuipaw kong khah Khazing khrisawbu sahlo letah kaa pachaw peh .
53001005	Ma vytei tahei Khazing biacenah a ding zia cawh a langsah . Macawtaco naa tai-ing hnochangpaw Khazing painah khatah aa tlahpaw cawngsaw tah rei na cang a he ceh .
53001006	Khazing cawh a dingpaw a cang . Naaning hanah a ca peipaw sahlo he khah hanah a peh kaw hra he .
53001007	Hanah a ingpaw sahlo he ceh khah , naa thaw ca padang he ka , kaaning zong a ma padang hrá a . Ma hming heh Abuipaw Zisu cawh melui a ae leimeipaw le a thawtlungpaw vaiming sahlo khatah vaicung taitah a vong tihtah a cang tae a .
53001008	Khazing a hnih lypaw he le kaa Buipaw Zisu Thawngchawbia a nge lypaw sahlo khah dang a tah he a .
53001009	Aaning sahlo cawh Abuipaw hmekaw le a hmingtuakhynah rungnawnah taitah khakhai cang he ka , chaizaw rorangnah khatah dang tah a cang he a .
53001010	Ma cawh a mehpathai sahlo tah pasungpanaw pawtah le zingtu a cangpaw vytei tah reithai pawtah a vongnah ning letah a cang tae a . Kaa reipaw bia khah naa zingnah cawtah ma lehei naaning zong na tae hrá he ceh .
53001011	Ma cawh a thui thlang peh ka , naa cawtah tai lytah thlaw kaa chang tei . Kaa Khazing tah a ca ynah pawhe khatah a tlahpaw hringzia tah naa hring nápaw tah le hmingchaw naa tingaipaw vytei le zingnah tah naa tuapaw vytei khah a hmingtuakhynah tah Ama tah a patling a tatah thlaw kaa chang tei .
53001012	Taico kaa Buipaw Zisu ming cawh naaning letah pasungpanaw cang a ka , kaa Khazing le Abuipaw Zisu Khri ningdonah thongtah naaning cawh Ama letah pasungpanaw na cang he ceh .
53002001	Kaa Buipaw Zisu a vongkawnah le Ama khatah pahmo kaa cang nápaw kong letah uny sahlo ,
53002002	“ Abuipaw ning cawh a tlung thah , ” tahpaw bia aa phynah rawng tamaw , phung aa reinah rawng tamaw , kaaning taitah cakuapaw hratah aa reipaw sahlo kong lehei a neh teitah a calawh khe la , a pahly khe o tatah kaa ca caw he .
53002003	Zekhatah lang tahmai tah ahohmai a dungkheisah khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah Khazing a caraenah cawh va chuh taw a ka , mehchawly cawngsaw , rorang ceingei ruapaw cawngsawpaw palang a cang hlai vytei cawh ma ning cawh tlung balang be .
53002004	Ma cawngsaw taco Khazing tatei aa behpaw maikaw le behnah maikaw khah a dy a , aa cung lang ung a pachia ka , ama le ama a cuicaling a . Mataico Khazing behnah ing letah a ty ka , ama cawh Khazing ka cang , tatah a tá a .
53002005	Naaning kha ka ungning tah ma bia ka ca ching teipaw he khah a thui thlang bei he ceh maw ?
53002006	Taico a cai a zaw tihtah a va lang khy nápawtah atoheh ze tamaw a pakhang thlang tahpaw khah naa hni .
53002007	Zecawtamaw tatah phungbia a hnui lypaw a hmingtuakhynah biaparuh taco rai a hre leimei thah . Canghrasala ama cawh lahly a cang hlai vytei cawh ama a tlepakhihpaw takhei a tlepakhih leimei thlang a .
53002008	Taico mehchawly cawngsaw cawh palang cang a ka , ama cawh Abuipaw Zisu tah a kaw taitei a piapaw a husuanah takhei thehly ka , a vongkawnah rungnawnah takhei a hlyde a .
53002009	Mehchawly cawngsawpaw a vong nápaw cawh Setan a raihrenah hratah cang ka , a pakheipaw ningang chuipaw sahlo , paching pakhanah sahlo le khuarawha chuipaw sahlo khah a phingphing tah a palang a .
53002010	A lyde leimeipaw sahlo cawh chahlynah phingting takhei a dungkhei he a . Aa lydepaw cawh pachah aa cang nápaw biahmuisui khah aa dulynah cawtah a cang .
53002011	Ma rawng tahei Khazing tah hingbia aa zing nápawtah a thawtlungpaw dungkheinah khah thlawso he ka ,
53002012	macawtaco biahmuisui khah zing ly tei chahlynah letah a nawngnangpaw vytei cawh thaily cangsah a cang he a .
53002013	Canghrasala Abuipaw dopaw uny sahlo , naa cawtah Khazing letah alawngnah bia a hlai pariapaw ka cang he peh , zecawtamaw tatah pachah rua pawtah athoning taitah Khazing tah a ca thing thah he . Ma cawh pathaisahnah rai Thlawpaw tei a hrepaw thongtah le biahmuisui zingnah thongtah a cang .
53002014	Macawtaco kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri rungnawnah a hrong hrah rua pawtah kaa thawngchawbia thongtah ma leco a ca y he .
53002015	Macawtaco uny sahlo , hmokaw tah cang seh , ca tah cang seh , ka ca thui sahpaw he cawngpahnah khah a tle la , cyky tah a daw thlang my lo .
53002016	Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri Ama ceingei le kaa Paw Khazing , a ma dotu le a ningdonah thong tei chaizaw thlawlungnah le hnabeisuinah chawpaw a ma peitu taco ,
53002017	naa lungthing thaw ca thosah he seh la , bia le hmingchaw tuapaw maikaw letah naa thaw ca patlung my he seh lo .
53003001	A changnah letaco uny sahlo , naaning khatah a cangpaw hrakhei Khazing bia cawh a kaipaza tlamang khy nápawtah le pasungpanaw a cang khy nápawtah kaa cawtah thlaw ma changpah my lo .
53003002	Taico mehchawly le mehrahry sahlo hrong taitah a bingsah kaa cang khy nápaw caw zong tah thlawchang my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ming maikaw tah zingnah hnui bei he .
53003003	Canghrasala Abuipaw cawh zingchuipaw cang ka , Ama taco naa thaw tlung sá ka , mehchaw lypaw Setan taitah a ca bingsá he .
53003004	Kaa ca chingpaw he khah tua he ceh ka , naa tua pazo longmang a taheh Abuipaw letah zingnah kaa hnui .
53003005	Abuipaw tah naa lungthing cawh Khazing donah le Khri mua ing khynah lang khah langhme chui ky seh .
53003006	Uny sahlo , a thawthipaw zingtu le kaaning taitei naa cyhlangpaw cawngpahnah hratei a ung lypaw he khah a huikong khe lo , tatah Abuipaw Zisu Khri ming tah bia kaa ca peh he .
53003007	Zehratamaw naa ma mingpai he ceh tahpaw khah naaning ceingei tah naa hnipaw a cang . Naaning khatei kaa ungning takhei kaa thaw thi be kho .
53003008	Amai peh lytah aho batui hmai e bei peh . A cang ly hlui tah aho naa caw tahmai phorih cang ly rua pawtah reithui sisaw ing tah , ching kha , zai kha rai kaa hre kho .
53003009	Ma hratei kaa tuapaw khah naaning taitah bongnah hmuhnah naw kaa hnuilynah cawtah cang lytah a ma mingpai he seh la , kaa haa a ma lah he seh , kaa tah cawtah a cang .
53003010	Zecawtamaw tatah naaning khatei kaa ungning takhei , “ Rai a hre lypaw cawngsaw cawh e kheh seh , ” tahpaw phung khah , kaa ca peh he kho .
53003011	Naa hrong letah mehthaikheh cawh aa thaw a thi tahpaw kaa thui . Aaning sahlo cawh raihre lytah male a pahnong a pakha laipaw a cang he .
53003012	Ma hapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh a ningcang teitah ung pawtah le , aaning pori congnah rai hre pawtah , Abuipaw Zisu Khri ming tah bia pei he peh ka , kaa sia he .
53003013	Taico uny sahlo , naaning cawh a dingpaw hming tua tah ca ning kheh he seh .
53003014	Ma ca letei kaa ca chingpaw he a nge du lypaw cawngsaw cawh achaw teitah a ngia thlang my lo . A ningzeh seh tatah ma cawngsaw cawh a kong khe lo .
53003015	A cang naná tah caraepaw hraco rawh khe la , unypaw hratah raeringnah pei hri my lo .
53003016	Denah Buipaw , Ama hrahring tah denah cawh ching lytah zezong hmingting letah ca pei ky he seh . Abuipaw cawh naa zongmingtei khatah ung ky seh .
53003017	Kama Paul tah ma a changnah kih tlenah ca heh kama ka kih ceingei tah ka ciapaw a cang tahpaw cawh ka cakua vytei letah a bi thlang . Ma hrahei ka cia ningcang a cang .
53003018	Kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri ningdonah cawh naa zongmingtei khatah ung ky seh .
54001001	A ma Pachahtu Khazing le kaa hnabeisuinah a cangpaw Khri Zisu a biapehnah thong tei Khri Zisu apostol a cangpaw kama Paul tah ,
54001002	zingnah letei ka sawtei hmuisui a cangpaw Timote khatah ca ka ca kua . Khazing kaa Paw le Khri Zisu kaa Buipaw taiteipaw ningdonah le zawngenah le thlawlungnah cawh na cung letah ung ky seh .
54001003	Masidonia raang lang ka naening tei ka ca siapaw hrakhei Efesa khuapui lekhei ung thlang la , maco meh thaikheh sahlo khah cawngpahnah ahmang lypaw khah cawngpah khawh ly rua pawtah le ,
54001004	phungpaw hlawpaw le a chang thai lypaw thokehnah kong letah cai hly cakhawng ly pawtah naw na pae he a . Ma hapaw tahei zingnah thongtah a chuhpaw Khazing rai navy tah a eichonah tukhah a chuasah .
54001005	Ma biapehnah heh lungthing pathaipaw le chiachaw thluidangnah chawpaw le zingnah hmuisui taitei a chuhpaw donah khah aa hnui khy nápawtah ka tingpaw a cang .
54001006	Mehthaikheh tah ma cawh pavesai he ka , a silang a hnui lypaw bialy biade khah naw aa thlia hri .
54001007	Phungbia cawngpahtu cang khah du he ka , canghrasala zemaw aa rei tahpaw le lungcang ngetei tah a pacysah pawhe khah zemaw a cang tahpaw hnih bei heh .
54001008	Canghrasala phungbia cawh a ningcang teitah a hmangpaw caw taco a chah tahpaw kaa hni .
54001009	Phungbia cawh mehding cawtah tuapaw cang lytah phungbia zetah a rei lypaw le mehpiathy sahlo , Khazing tlechainah a hnui lypaw le mehsua sahlo le , a pathai lypaw le behnah zetah a rei lypaw sahlo le , lenongpaw sahlo le , a no le paw a thehpaw sahlo le ,
54001010	a phei a hmangpaw le , a leihopaw le , sae a zua laipaw le , a hinghepaw le , biacenah letei biadih a rei lypaw sahlo aa cawtah tuapaw a cang .
54001011	Taico kama letei khingpaw , a laisuipaw Khazing thawngchawbia rungnawpaw a zuipaw adingpaw congpahnah khatei a rae cakahpaw maikaw aa caw zong tah tuapaw a cang .
54001012	Thawzaang a pa peitu Khri Zisu kaa Buipaw letah alawngnah bia ka rei . Ama tah zingchuipaw pa tah ka , a rai hre ruapaw tah a pa thing .
54001013	Khuahlai ning taco Khazing a reipachiatu le cawngsaw a hrehlai tu le mehpiathy ka za cang naná teitah ka hni ly cawtah le ka zing ly cawtah ka za tuapaw a cangnah cawtah ka cung letah a zawngenah a langsahpaw a cang .
54001014	Kaa Buipaw ningdonah cawh Khri Zisu letei a ungpaw zingnah le donah khatah ka cung letah a hlupui tah a pa luiso .
54001015	Khri Zisu cawh mehsua sahlo pachah rua pawtah ma khazaw lehei a vong tahpaw heh zingchuipaw le pong tlang ngeteipaw a cang . Mehsua sahlo hrong letah kama heh a sua caipaw ka cang .
54001016	Canghrasala , ma rawng tahei mehsua sahlo letah a suacaipaw ka cung letah a zawngenah a langsahpaw cang ka , ma cawh a zing lepaw sahlo tah chaizaw hringnah aa hmuh nápawtah Khri Zisu tah a changthai lypaw a lungsynah khah a langsá a tah khah kama letah a mingpaipaw cawtah a cang .
54001017	Chaizaw Siangpahrang , a hming paria thlangpaw , hmuh khy lypaw , Ama suipaw Khazing a cangpaw khatah rungnawnah le upahnah vytei cawh chaizaw tah chaizaw tai ung ky seh . Amen .
54001018	Ka sawcapaw Timote , na konglang reihlang ciapaw hrakhei ma chinghringnah heh ca pei neh ka , ma sahlo cawh zui la , raedynah a chawpaw khah na dy khy a .
54001019	Chiachaw thluidangnah achawpaw le zingnah cawh a tle my lo . Meh thaikheh tah ma cawh du be ca he ka , aa zingnah cawh apaleh apahnaw tah aa tua thlu .
54001020	Ma sahlo hrong letaco Humenai le Alekzandar a tae hrah he . Khazing reipachia aa hmang khawh ly nápawtah aaning cawh Setan kih letah ka hlai thah he .
54002001	Macawtaco , a hmasaw letah ka ca siapaw cawh ming vytei cawtah haepahnah tua le thlawchangnah hnui le thlawchangpahnah le alawngnah bia hlainah tuapaw heh a cang .
54002002	Abui sahlo le naw a hnuitu vytei aa cawtah zong de teitah le arai teitah kaa ung khy nápaw tah le Khazing tlechainah hmotah le a pathai teitah khua kaa sah khy nápawtah a cang .
54002003	Ma heh achawpaw cang ka , kaa Khazing le Pachahtu a lawng sahpaw cang ka ,
54002004	Ama tah ming vytei tah pachahnah hmuh he seh la , biahmuisui hninah lang a va ne thlu he seh tah a du cawtah a cang .
54002005	Khazing pakheh sui ung ka , Khazing le mehnung aa kaa letah aly lang a seipaw pakheh a ung , Ama cawh mehnung Khri Zisu heh a cang .
54002006	Ming vytei tlang nápawtah Ama teitah a peipaw cang ka , Ama cawh a tlahpaw a cai naning letah palangpaw a cang .
54002007	Mataico , ma cawpaw tahei tlang y lai rua pawtah le apostol cang rua pawtah thingpaw cang neh ka , biahmuisui ka rei , hing bei neh . Gental cawngsaw sahlo khah zingnah ahmangpaw a cawngpahtu he ka cang .
54002008	Macawtaco zeletahmai tah capaw sahlo taco aa kih pathaipaw khah pazy he seh la , thingaenah le a eichonah ung lytah thlawchang he seh tahpaw ka du .
54002009	Ma hraco canu sahlo zong duchuipaw teitah le a tlahpaw chaichi a tua he seh la , sang phia le sui le lungnaw le a mai a rupaw chaichi tah a pasang kheh he seh .
54002010	Canghrasala Khazing a behpaw canu cawtah a tlahpaw tuasanah achawpaw tukhei a pasang hri he seh .
54002011	Canu taco de teitah le raidawnah khatah cawng ruapaw a cang .
54002012	Canu tei capaw cung letah cawngpah le nawhnui cawh sai bei neh , canghrasala de teitah bia aa nge ruapaw a cang .
54002013	Zecawtamaw tatah Adam cawh tua hmasawpaw cang ka , mataico Evi cawh tua a cang .
54002014	Mataico Adam cawh dungkheipaw cang be ca ka , canu tukhah dungkheipaw cang ka , mehsua tah a cang .
54002015	Canghrasala canu cawh zingnah letah a ung paria thlang tah donah le a pathai teitah le duchui teitah a ung longmang thlang caco , sawtei a sahpaw aa cangnah cawtah khei pachah aa cang he a .
54003001	Ma heh zingchuipaw bia a cang . Ahohmai a lungchung tah hotu raihre dunah a hnui caco , raichaw hre a du tahnah a cang .
54003002	Hotu rai a hrepaw cawh reipachianah a ung lypaw , canu pakheh pasae a cangpaw , a lung a sypaw , a hraipaking khypaw , zawchuipaw , hluihlang a thaipaw , cawngpah a thaipaw ,
54003003	zu rui ahmang lypaw , a thing a paching lypaw le a ningnaipaw , a hrychae ahmang lypaw , tangka cho tlechainah a hnui lypaw a cang a .
54003004	Ama a ingchungkho khah achaw teitah mingkai tei , a sawtei leh zong tah a bia aa ngepaw le aa cizawpaw a cang a .
54003005	Canghrasala , ama a ingchungkho hmai a mingkai khy lypaw tah zekhatamaw Khazing khrisawbu cawh a mingkai khy a ?
54003006	Ama cawh zingtu thapaw cang a be , ma tah ly co a palai a patui tah ung ka , Setan biacenah hratah a ing sua a .
54003007	Ama cawh alailang teipaw cawngsaw zong tah aa reithaipaw mehnung a cang ruapaw a cang , ma tah ly co reipachianah letah tlah tlamy ka , Setan sahrui letah a awh pang a .
54003008	Khrisaw hruitu sahlo zong , ma thly thly hraco , zawchuipaw mehnung , zing a chuipaw , zu a raang lypaw , ahmang lypaw a mia sangnah a hui lypaw a cang he a .
54003009	Canghrasala chiachaw thluidangnah lungthing a pathaipaw khatah zingnah biahmuisui khah a tlepaw a cang a .
54003010	A hmetaw letah pase taw cang he seh la , ma khy taico aa cung letah suisenah zehmai a ung ly caco khrisaw hruitu rai cawh hre he seh .
54003011	Ma hraco aa nupui sahlo zong cawh cizaw tlang a tlahpaw , bia a du lypaw , zezongpui letah zingchuipaw le a sungnah a hnui khypaw cang he seh .
54003012	Khrisaw hruitu cawh nupui pakheh sui a hnuipaw cang a ka , a ingchungkho le a sawtei leh zong achaw teitah a uh khypaw a cang a .
54003013	Rai achaw teitah a hrepaw sahlo taco ming chahnah hmuh a he ka , Khri Zisu zingnah letah raechahnah khah aa hnui a .
54003014	Nama kha a vong pating pawtah ka hnabei a sui ky thlang naná teitah ma biataipaw heh nama khatah ka va ciapaw cang ka ,
54003015	ma pawco ka va haa sua pawtei a cang caco , biahmuisui thahrang le asuh tung a cangpaw Khazing hring khrisawbu , Khazing ingchungkho lekhei ming vytei tah zehratamaw khua aa sah a tahpaw khah na hni khy a .
54003016	Zekhatahmai ei khy a cang lypaw Khazing kaa behnah letei a lemari biaparuh a cangpaw cawh a rungnaw , Ama cawh pungsaw tah a lang ka , Thlawpaw tah mehding a cang tahpaw a palang . Vaiming sahlo tah aa hmuh , phingting hrong letah a kong rei a cang , khazaw cawngsaw mehnung tah aa zing , rungnaw pawtah avai lang lahchy a cang .
54004001	Canghrasala Thlawpaw tei a sepaw teitah a reipaw cawh ningchangnah cai letaco mehthaikheh sahlo tah zingnah heh hningchai he ka , dungkhei a hmangpaw thlawpaw le khachia tei a cawngpahpaw hming sahlo khah aa zui a .
54004002	Ma hapaw cawngpahnah sahlo cawh cungmai raipha mehing mehru , aa chiachaw thluidangnah khah thaw a palingpaw tei a kangseh ciapaw cawngsaw taitah a chuhpaw a cang .
54004003	Aaning sahlo taco zawpui cawh nupui pasae hnui khah thly he ka , Khazing a tuapaw , Ama a zingtu sahlo le biahmuisui a hnihpaw sahlo tah alawngnah bia a hlainah cung tei epaw batui thaikheh khah e aa thly he .
54004004	Macawtaco Khazing tei a tuapaw maikaw cawh chah ka , alawngnah biahlainah cung tah cyhlangpaw a cang caco zehmai du ly ruapaw ung be .
54004005	Khazing bia le thlawchangná tah pathaisah ciapaw a cangnah cawtah .
54004006	Ma hming sahlo heh uny sahlo khah na thuisah caco he , nama cawh nama tei na zui teipaw , achawpaw cawngpahnah le zingnah hmuisui letei a changchypaw Khri Zisu raihretu chaw na cang a .
54004007	Canghrasala Khazing a hnih lypaw aa phunghlaw le macang no sahlo phungpaw aa reipaw lekhei a pahlawh kheh la , Khazing tlechainah letah changchy rua pawtah na thaw chua hri my lo .
54004008	Zecawtamaw tatah pungsaw a zongnah cawh mai a hnui bang thlang hrah , canghrasala Khazing tlechainah cawh zezongpui cawtah mai hnui ka , ato hring chung le a va chuh lepaw cai cawpaw tah a chahnaipaw a cang .
54004009	Ma heh zing tlang a cangpaw le cyhlang hmuisui tlang a tlahpaw , aa rei teipaw cawh a cang .
54004010	Ma cawpaw tahei raihre peh katei , ka zongpaw peh cawh cang ka , kaa hnabeisuinah cawh Khazing hring , Ama cawh ming vytei a Pachahtu , a zingpaw sahlo a pachah pa-ei dangpaw he cung lekhei kaa chia .
54004011	Ma sahlo heh cawngpah la , bia pei my lo .
54004012	Mehny na cang rawng tah ahohmai a minghnawhsah khe lo , canghrasala , a zingpaw sahlo aa cawtah biareinah kong letah cang seh , hringzia kong letah cang seh , donah kong letah cang seh , zingnah kong letah cang seh , pathainah kong letah cang seh a mingpai rua pawtah cang hri my lo .
54004013	Ka vong hlai vytei , zawpui sahlo Capathai reipah le phungrei le cawngpah lekhei a pei my lo .
54004014	Khrisaw macang sahlo tei na cung letah aa kih pahnia tei , phyhlangnah bia aa reipaw thong tei na hmuhpaw lahsong khah zerei lytah ung kheh lo .
54004015	Ma hapaw kong lehei a biatah la , na pungpaluh tah a pei my lo , ma pawsui co na changchynah zia khah mingting tah aa hmuh a .
54004016	Na hringzia le na cawngpahnah khah achaw teitah a raering la , ma hraco tua paria thlang my lo . Ma hratei na tua caco nama le na bia aa ngetu vytei khah na pachah khy he a .
54005001	Capaw macang sahlo khah a tangpui tah raw khe lo , canghrasala na paw hratah rawh he la , pasy hri my lo . Capaw mehny vy sahlo khah uny hratah le
54005002	canu macang sahlo khah no sahlo hratah le canu nyheh vypaw sahlo khah satei leh hratah lungthing pathai ngetei hmotah mingkai my lo .
54005003	Phahlah pongchang ngetei tah khua a sahpaw lahme sahlo khah achaw teitah mingkai my lo .
54005004	Canghrasala ma lahmeno cawh sawtei leh maw , saming sahlo maw a hnui caco he , ma sahlo taco aa ingchungkho mingkainá khei Khazing aa tlechainah cawh a langsah taw he seh . Ma cawh aaning aa sahtu no le paw le aa mano mapaw sahlo khah donah luibah chang tah cang ka , Khazing dupaw zong a cang .
54005005	Bongnah a hia hmuisuipaw lahme taco a hnabeisuinah khah Khazing letah chia ka , a ching a zai tah thlawchang tei ka , Khazing khah bongnah a hae tei .
54005006	Canghrasala a nawngse tei khua a sahpaw lahme cawh a hring thlang hmotah a thipaw a cang .
54005007	Ahohmai suise tah aa ung ly nápawtah , ma cawngpahnah heh zawpui khah thuisah hrah my lo .
54005008	Canghrasala ahohmai a sawny ruachai a bawkhang lypaw le a ingchungkho byhianah khah a biapui cai tah a chia lypaw mehnung cawh zingnah a seisaipaw cang ka , a zing lypaw sahlo navy tahmai a pazua vypaw a cang .
54005009	Kung songruh a tling lypaw lahme cawh lahme cazing letah khung kheh la , a pasae cung letah zingchui teitah a za ungpaw ,
54005010	hmingchaw tuanah kong letei hnithuipaw a cangpaw , a sawtei leh achaw teitah a mingkaipaw , khuachai a dopaw , a pany tei mehpathai sahlo phe a sipaw , a ruhapaw sahlo he a bawkhangpaw , hmingchaw a cangpaw maikaw tuanah kong letah a peipaw a cang caco lahme cazing letah khung thlang my lo .
54005011	Canghrasala a kung a nypaw lahme cawh lahme cazing lekhei khung khe lo , zecawtamaw tatah Khri letei a pehnah pawhe khah canu capaw cang dunah tah a te tih he tah pasae hnui kaw aa du a .
54005012	Ma tih taco aaning le aaning bia a ky he a , zecawtamaw tatah athoning tei bia a kangnah pawhe khah aa rorang cawtah a cang .
54005013	Ma hlui co raihre hawng khawh beh ca he ka , ing ting letah a khiakaly lai he . Mataico rai aa hre hawng lypaw long khah cang lytah bia du tah male kongchia reilai hmang he ka , rei ly ruapaw zong aa rei lai .
54005014	Macawtaco a kung a nypaw lahme sahlo cawh pasae hnui kaw thlang he seh la , sawtei zong sah he seh . Aa ing zong mingkai he seh . Aa caraepaw tei reipachia khynah caichaw pei kheh he seh .
54005015	Zemaw ka tah caco , ato zong heh thaikhehpaw cawh Setan zui rua pawtah khei hninglang a paleh thah he .
54005016	Zingtu a cangpaw canu pakheh tah a ingchungkho letah lahme sahlo a hnui caco he baw he seh la , khrisawbu cawtah phorih cang kheh he seh . Ma pawsui co , lahme hmuisui a cangpaw , baw a hia tahtah pawhe khah khrisawbu tah aa baw khy he a .
54005017	Khrisawbu rai letei achaw teitah tlangtlah a thaipaw khrisaw macang sahlo cawh a lehning tah cizaw tlang cang he ka , a biapui cai tah phungrei le cawngpahnah kong letei aa peipaw khah a cang he .
54005018	Macawtaco Capathai tah , “ Co tungpaw cawh sacaang a cining taco a hmo tongchai khe o , ” tah ka , “ Rai a hretu cawh hlo a hmuh tlang a cang , ” tatah a tah .
54005019	Khrisaw macang reipachianah cawh biahnihtu pahning maw , pathung maw aa ung ly caco biapui tah lah ruapaw cang be .
54005020	Hmingsua a tuapaw khrisaw macang sahlo cawh zawpui hme letah chingrei la , ma pawsui co cawngsaw hringpaw zong a raering khy he a .
54005021	Khazing le Khri Zisu le thingpaw vaiming sahlo aa mehmuh letah ma cawngpahnah bia heh patliapatlanah le dukhui dangpaw ung lytah zui pawtah ka ca sia .
54005022	Macang thingnah kong lekhei , zening tahmai na lung carang kheh seh la , cawngsaw hringpaw suanah lekhei a pahlawh hrah kheh . A pathai teitah ung a pachia paria thlang my lo .
54005023	Na saw paria thlangnah cawtah le na pavai a saw leimeinah cawtah khei tui longtei ding lytah misurhang a cawngtei tah ding chi my lo .
54005024	Cawngsaw thaikhehpaw sahlo aa suanah cawh a langhai tah cang ka , aa hme letei biacenah hminghmaw khah aa phah palang . Thaikhehpaw suanah tu cawh aa hninglang tah a zui he .
54005025	Ma hraco hmingchaw tuanah cawh a langhai ka , a lang ly tahmai tah ahotahmai no khypaw cang be .
54006001	Sae cangnah suihnang rai letei a ungpaw vytei tah aa bui leh khah zezongpui letah aa cizaw ruapaw he a cang takhah aa rawh a hia , ma pawsui co Khazing ming leh kaa cawngpahnah khah reipachia tah cang be .
54006002	Mataico zingtu a cangpaw bui aa hnuipaw sahlo tah uny kaa cang peh tatah cizawnah hnui lytah ungpaw cang be . Ma navy co , cizawnah khatah aa rai cawh achaw vy tah aa hrepaw a cang , zecawtamaw tatah aa raihre a chahnah thong tei chahnainah a hmuhpaw abui cawh zingtu uny cang ka , dopaw a cang . Ma hming sahlo heh cawngpah he ceh ka , na sia he a .
54006003	Cawngsaw pakheh tah ahmang lypaw cawngpahnah le kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri cawngpahnah le Khazing tlechainah khatei a tlah lypaw a cawngpah caco ,
54006004	ama cawh a palai a patuipaw cang ka , zehmai a hnih lypaw a cang . Bia a silang kong letah a eichonah le , a hrychae aa dupaw cang ka , aa chuakhuipaw thuipa cawh iavawnah , a hrynah , reipachianah le achaw lypaw lunghringnah a cang .
54006005	Mataico thinglung a pialuipaw cawngsaw kaa letah a eichonah ato leh ato tah a chuasah . Ma hratei a ungpaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh biahmuisui a hnui khawh lypaw , Khazing tlechainah cawh tangka cho hmuhnah cawtah a rawhpaw sahlo a cang he .
54006006	Canghrasala lungui teitah Khazing tlechainah cawh ahlupui tah amia hmuhnah a cang .
54006007	Ma khazaw lehei zehmai a naekhui be ca peh ka , zehmai zong seikhui khy hra bei peh .
54006008	Canghrasala e rua le a buhsai rua kaa hnui caco , ma leco kaa lung a tlingpaw a cang .
54006009	Canghrasala hnuirungnah a dupaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh tuhsonah lang le ahui lang le hruchuipaw le chahlynah a chuakhuipaw dunah lang tlah he ka , ma taco rorangnah le lydenah cawh a chuakhui .
54006010	Zecawtamaw tatah tangka dusawnah cawh chahlynah phing maikaw a thahrang a cang . Tangka cho letah a du a sahpaw mehthaikheh sahlo cawh zingnah taitah vezi he ka , lung reithuinah hlupui khah aaning teitah a lah he .
54006011	Canghrasala , nama , Khazing mehnung cawh , ma vytei heh saisai la , dingnah , Khazing tlechainah , zingnah , donah , ing khynah le ningnainah tah ung a zawng my lo .
54006012	Achawpaw dynah zingnah cawtah khei dy my lo . Chaizaw hringnah khah cyky tah a tle my lo . Biahnihtu ming hlupui hme letah a chawpaw biaphynah na hnui ning takhei ma hringnah heh hnui pawtah y na cang kho .
54006013	Zezong hringnah a peitu Khazing hme letah le Pontia Pilat hme letah biadih a dawkhuitu Khri Zisu hme letah ka ca siapaw cawh ,
54006014	kaa Buipaw Zisu Khri a za lang hlai vytei suisenah le pialuinah ung lytah ma biapeh heh na zuipaw a cang .
54006015	Ma cawh a cai a zaw tihtah vaicung taikhei , Khazing tah va palang tae ka , a laisuipaw Khazing a cangpaw , Ama suipaw uhtu a cangpaw , siangpahrang vytei letah Siangpahrang , abui vytei letah Abui ,
54006016	Ama suipaw cawh a thi thai lypaw , a ne khy a cang lypaw khainah letei a ungpaw , ahotahmai hmuh bang lypaw le hmuh khy a cang lypaw a cang . Ama letaco rungnawnah le hmingtuakhynah vytei cawh chaizaw tah ung ky seh . Amen .
54006017	Atocai letei mehrung sahlo heh a palai a patuipaw cang ly pawtah le a lyde palangpaw rungnah letah aa hnabeisuinah chia ly pawtah le zezongpui khah a nawng teitah hmang pawtah a hlui pui tah a ma peitu Khazing khatah aa hnabeisuinah khah chia pawtah bia na pae he a .
54006018	Hmingchaw tua pawtah le hmingchaw tuanah letah mehrung cang pawtah le mehechah cang pawtah le pehlai a dupaw cang pawtah bia pei my lo .
54006019	Ma hrahei a va chuh lepaw cai cawtah vaicung cho cawh pacung he ka , aa cawtah a cypaw thahrang a cang a . Ma pawsui co , hringnah hmuisui a cangpaw hringnah khah a la tah , aa tle khy a .
54006020	Timote , Khazing tah mingkaipaw tei a ca pehpaw khah mingkai my lo . Khazing tlechai lynah bia rei cakhawng le singnah aa tahpaw a pakheipaw singnah kong letah a eichonah sahlo khah cahri my lo .
54006021	Mehthaikheh tah ma hnithainah cawh kaa hnui tah he ka , zingnah taikhei a vezi thah he . Ningdonah cawh nama khatah ung ky seh .
55001001	Khri Zisu letei hringnah biakangpaw palanglai pawtah Khazing a rei tei Khri Zisu apostol a cangpaw kama Paul tah ,
55001002	ka dopaw ka sawtei Timote khatah ca ka ca kua . Paw Khazing le kaa Buipaw Khri Zisu taiteipaw ningdonah , zawngenah le thlawlungnah cawh nama khatah ung ky seh .
55001003	Kaa mapaw sahlo aa za tua teipaw hrakhei , a rai ka hre pahpaw Khazing khatah a lawng neh ka , chiachaw thluidangnah a pasing teitah ching kha zai kha thlaw ka changnah maikaw letah ka ca thui paria thlang .
55001004	Na mehthli thlahpaw khah a thui thlang neh ka , ka lawngnah a tling nápawtah na hmui hmuh ka vang ngetei .
55001005	Na no Eunis tei a dihpaw zingnah a hnuipaw khah ka thui thlang . Na mano Lois zong tah ma hapaw zingnah cawh hnui ka , nama zong tah na hnui hrah tahpaw a se pawtah ka hni .
55001006	Macawtaco ka kih pahnianah thongtah na hmuhpaw Khazing lahsong khah melui hratah pahla vy leimei my lo tatah ching kaw ka ca dupaw a cang .
55001007	Khazing taco raechianah Thlawpaw ma pei be ca ka , hmingtuakhynah le donah le ma leh ma a hraipaking khynah Thlawpaw khah a ma peh hri .
55001008	Macawtaco kaa Buipaw kong rei cawh na ningzeh kheh seh la , Ama rawng tah thong a tlahpaw kama zong pa zawkhui hrah kheh . Canghrasala thawngchawbia rawng tei ka ingpaw hanah heh Khazing hmingtuakhynah thongtah a pa hrong hrah my lo .
55001009	Ama taco ma pachah ka , hringzia pathaipaw lang cawh ma y ka , kaaning tah hming kaa tuapaw rawng takhei cang lytah Ama tei a pachiapaw le a ningdonah rawng tah a cang . Ma ningdonah heh cai a patho hlai taitah Zisu Khri letah peh ciapaw ka cang thah peh .
55001010	Canghrasala atoheh cawh a ma Pachahtu Khri Zisu a za langnah thong khei a langsah myca , Ama taco thihnah cawh hlyde ka , hringnah leh thih khylynah khah thawngchawbia tah khainah letah a palang thah myca .
55001011	Taico ma thawngchawbia cawh tlang y pawtah le apostol le cawngpahtu cang rua pawtah Khazing tah a thingpaw ka cang hi .
55001012	Ma rawng tahei ma hrahei sisawnah ka ingpaw a cang hi . Canghmaisala ka ningzeh be , zecawtamaw tatah ahomaw ka zing tahpaw khah hnih neh ka , ma ning caw tei Ama ka chiasopaw khah achaw teitah a kai khy a tahpaw a sepaw tah ka hni .
55001013	Kama taitei na thuipaw cawngpahnah ahmangpaw khah a mingpai rua pawtah hmang la , Khri Zisu zingnah le donah khakhei a vo thlang my lo .
55001014	Hmingchaw aa cakai sahpaw khah achaw teitah vai la , kaa chung letei a hringpaw Thlawpaw Pathai bawná khei vai my lo .
55001015	Asia raang letei a ungpaw maikaw tah a pa huisai thlu thah he takhah na hni , aa hrong letah Figela le Hermozini a tae hrah he .
55001016	Kaa Buipaw taco , Onesifora ingchungkho cung letah a zawngenah cawh palang ky seh , zecawtamaw tatah thawthonah a pa pei leimei teipaw cang ka , bahrairui ka khipaw zong heh zawkhui be .
55001017	Ma lawng cawh cang lytah , Rom khua letah a ungning tah a pa hmuh hlai vytei a pa hui lai .
55001018	Ma ning taco Abuipaw tah a zawngenah cawh hmuhsah ky seh ! Efesa khuapui letah ka ungning tah zehratamaw a pa bawkhang tahpaw khah a se pawtah na hni thlang kho .
55002001	Macawtaco nama ka sawtei , Khri Zisu letei a ungpaw ningdonah thong khei na thaw a tlungsah my lo .
55002002	Mataico , bia hnikhuitu mehlupui hme letei ka reipaw na thuipaw hming sahlo khah cawngsaw hringpaw a cawngpah khypaw he , na zingpaw cawngsaw sahlo khah kaisah my lo .
55002003	Khri Zisu a raekeh chaw hratah kaaning khahei ruhanah khah ing hrah my lo .
55002004	Raekeh rai a hre leimeipaw taco alailang rai a cangpaw lekhei a thlah lai be , abuipaw lungtong khah a zawng hri .
55002005	Ma hraco asaipasinah letei a zongpaw cawh a phunglang naning tei hratah a zong ly caco , tetu cangnah mai lukhu cawh hmuh khy be .
55002006	Raisah a hrepaw , ly a thlopaw taco ly taitei a chuhpaw saze a tinghangpaw khah a hmuh tawcai ruapaw a cang .
55002007	Ka reipaw bia heh pacang my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw taco ma vytei hnithainah heh a ca pae a .
55002008	David pathlah a cangpaw Zisu Khri thihnah taitah pa thokawpaw khah a thui paria thlang my lo . Ma heh ka thawngchawbia cawh a cang .
55002009	Ma rawng tahei mehsua hratah bahrairui tah khinah tai heh ka ingpaw a cang hi . Canghrasala , Khazing bia cawh bahrairui tah khi cang be .
55002010	Macawtaco Khazing tah a thingpaw sahlo aa cawtah zezong maikaw heh ing neh ka , ma cawh Khri Zisu letei a ungpaw pachahnah khah chaizaw rungnawnah khatah aa hmuh khy hrah nápaw cawtah a cang .
55002011	Ma heh zing tlang a tlahpaw bia cawh a cang . “ Ama khatah kaa thih caco , Ama khatah ka hring kaw he peh ,
55002012	kaa ing caco , Ama khatah kaa uh hrá a . Ama kaa paphahsai caco , Ama zong tah a ma paphahsai hrá a .
55002013	Zing tlang kaa cang ly zong tah Ama cawh zing tlang a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah Ama le Ama cawh a paphahsai khy be , ” tahpaw hratah .
55002014	Aaning sahlo khah ma hming heh thuisah leimei my lo . Bia rawng tah a hrychae ly pawtah Khazing a hme letah raering pei my lo . A mai ung be ca ka , naw aa thliapaw sahlo khah a rorang he .
55002015	Khazing tei naw a tlah khuipaw raihretu cang rua pawtah biatah teitah a hlai my lo . Biahmuisui khah a ningcang teitah ahmangpaw raihretu cawh ningzaw ruapaw zehmai a ung lypaw hratah na hlai a .
55002016	Khazing tlechai lynah bia rei cakhawngnah khah cahri my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ma hratei bia aa rei cakhawngpaw he cawh Khazing khatah a hlah vy tima he .
55002017	Mataico , aa cawngpahnah cawh hmawchia hratah kaipaza ka , ma sahlo hrong leco Humenai le Fileta a tae hrah he .
55002018	Ma sahlo he cawh biahmuisui taitei lang a pavepaw a cang he . Thokawnah cawh atoheh a cang thah tah he ka , mehthaikheh sahlo zingnah khah aa rorang .
55002019	Zekhatah a cang zong tah Khazing tei a bingpaw a thahrang cawh a cy paria thlang ka , “ Abuipaw taco , ama a tei a cangpaw khah a hni he , ” tah le , “ Abuipaw ming ka zing a tahpaw maikaw taco chahlynah khah a huisai he seh , ” tatah cakhai a cang .
55002020	Ing alaipaw chung letah a ungpaw hming le bo cawh sui le ngung tah tuapaw longtei cang lytah thing le alui tah tuapaw sahlo zong a ung hrah . Chykheh cawh pasungpanaw teitah hmang ruapaw tah cang ka , chykheh cawh hmang cakhawng thlangpaw tah a cang .
55002021	Macawtaco , cawngsaw pakheh tah ama khah a pialuipaw taikhei a pathai a pahling teitah a tua caco , pasungpanaw tlangpaw hmingbo , a pathaipaw , Khazing tei a hmang ruapaw , hmingchaw maikaw tuanah cawtah hmang a tlahpaw a cang a .
55002022	Mehny cangning tei sua dunah achaw lypaw khah saisai la , dingnah le , zingnah le , donah le , denah khah lungthing pathai hmo tei Abuipaw a y leimeipaw sahlo khakhei a cadai lai my lo .
55002023	Canghrasala , hru a chuipaw bia a eilainah letah a pahlawh kheh lo , ma hming taco a hrychaenah a chuakhui tei tahpaw na hni thlang kho .
55002024	Abuipaw sae a cangpaw cawh a hrychae be , ming maikaw cung letah donah a hnui a , cawngsaw a cawngpah khypaw cang a ka , a lung a sy a .
55002025	Ama a cakhaepaw sahlo zong khah ningnai teitah cawngpah he seh la , Khazing tah a ngepachihsah he seh la , biahmuisui hninah lang khah a chui khy he seh tahpaw hnabeisuinah khah hnuipaw a cang .
55002026	Mataico aaning sahlo cawh aa lung va haa ka , Setan tah ama a dunah tuasah rua pawtei a tlenah pawhe ahui taikhei a chuhthlah he a .
55003001	Canghrasala , ma heh a thui thlang my lo . Caichangnah cawh cisabarong a chuipaw cai a cang tae a .
55003002	Cawngsaw sahlo cawh aaning aa zong longtei a rawhpaw , tangka cho a tlechaipaw , a pachawpaw , a mingthaipaw , biachia rei a hmangpaw , no le paw bia a nge lypaw , a lawng a thai lypaw , a pathai lypaw ,
55003003	donah a hnui lypaw , ngethainah a hnui lypaw , kongchia rei a hmangpaw , a sung khynah a hnui lypaw , cisabarong a chuipaw , chahnah a du lypaw ,
55003004	luithe a hmangpaw , a hrahrypaw , a palaipaw le , Khazing do navy tah a nawngnangnah a du vypaw a cang he a .
55003005	Khazing a tlechaipaw hratah a tua he ka , canghrasala a hmingtuakhynah a zing lypaw a cang he a . Ma hapaw sahlo cawh a huisai my lo .
55003006	Ma hapaw cawngsaw sahlo cawh ing sahlo letah a nae he katei , suanah hmingrih tei a naipaw he suanah phingzakih tua dunah tei a cahneipaw he , a lung a diapaw canu sahlo khah aa lah he .
55003007	Ma canu sahlo cawh cawng leimei thlang tlung tei , biahmuisui aa hnih khy lypaw a cang he .
55003008	Janis le Jambre tei Moses aa dypaw hrakhei ma capaw sahlo tahei biahmuisui khah dy he ka , thinglung a rawhrang ciapaw mehnung , zingnah kong letah a paphahsai ciapaw a cang he .
55003009	Canghrasala khua sy ry bei he , zecawtamaw tatah aaning sahlo aa kong lehei co , ming vytei tah aa hru zia khah a sepaw teitah aa hmuh palang thah a .
55003010	Ma duitei cawh nama cawh ka cawngpahnah , ka hringzia , ka tingaipaw , ka zingnah , ka lungsynah , ka donah , ka ing khynah ,
55003011	hreh ka cangnah , ka tai-ingnah vytei le , Antiok khua le , Ikoniam khua le , Listra khua sahlo letei ka cung letei hming a tlungpaw hrehnah ka ingpaw khah na hni thlu . Canghmaisala , ma vytei taico Abuipaw tah a pa pachah .
55003012	Hmuisui teitah ka rei caco , Khri Zisu letei Khazing tlechainah khatah hring a dupaw maikaw cawh hrehnah aa ing a .
55003013	Ma ning taco , mehchawly le mehing mehru sahlo cawh aa chiahrunah pah zua vy he ka , dungkhei hmang he ka , aaning zong dungkhei aa cang hra he .
55003014	Canghrasala nama cawh na cong ciapaw le na hnipase ciapaw lekhei ung paria thlang my lo , zecawtamaw ka tah caco , aho taitah maw ka cong tahpaw khah na hni thlang kho .
55003015	Na nyheh thoning taitah Capathai bia na hnipaw takhei ca singsah khy ka , ma singnah taco Khri Zisu zingnah thongtah pachahnah hmuh a cangpaw khah a ca hnisah .
55003016	Capathai vytei heh Khazing tah hu a suasopaw cang ka , cawngpahnah , chinghringnah , zia parainah , dingnah cawngpahnah cawtah mai a hnuipaw longtei cang ka ,
55003017	macawtaco Khazing mehnung a cangpaw tah achawpaw rai maikaw cawtah tlangtling tah a pachia pa ciapaw a cang .
55004001	Khazing hme le mehthi le mehring bia a pacepaw Khri Zisu hme letah le a va langnah le a painah ming tah ma rai heh ka ca siapaw a cang hi .
55004002	Khazing Thawngchawbia khah rei la , a cai a rai zong , a rai ly zong tah a maipacia tah ung my lo . Tua hry a hiapaw cawngsaw khah tua hry la , raw a hiapaw khah raw la , pasy a hiapaw khah pasy la , lungsy ngetei pawtah le a singkang teitah cawngpah my lo .
55004003	Zecawtamaw tatah ming vytei tah cawngpahnah ahmangpaw khah aa nge du lynah cai a va tlung tae a . Ma navy co , aaning dunah khatei a tlahpaw , aa naw tah a thui dupaw bia a reipaw cawngpahtu a hlupui khah aa hrong letah aa pahmo he .
55004004	Aa naw tah biahmuisui khah thui du khawh be ca ka , phungpaw lang khah aa naw aa thlia a .
55004005	Canghrasala nama cawh zehming letah hmai na lu khah patung la , ruhanah ing la , thawngchawbia rei rai khah hre la , na hre ruapaw rai maikaw khah hre my lo .
55004006	Kama cawh dangnah siasang letei pehlaipaw tui hratah luithlang cang myca neh ka , ka piathlahnah cai cawh a phah myca .
55004007	Kama cawh a chawpaw a dynah khah ka pachang thah . A saipasinah zong patlung thah neh ka , zingnah zong ka vo thah myca .
55004008	Atoheh cawh dingnah builukhu lahsong khah ka cawtah chiapah cang myca ka , ma cawh Abuipaw a dingpaw biacetu taco , ma ning leco pa pei a ka , kama long cang lytah , a vong nápaw a vangpaw vytei zong a peh hra he a .
55004009	Kama kha a catleipaw tah a vong pawtah a zawng my lo .
55004010	Zecawtamaw tatah Dema taco , ma khazaw heh a tlechainah cawtah pa seisai ka , Thesalonika khua lang a sei thah . Kresen cawh Galatia lang a sei , taico Tita cawh Dalmatia raang lang a sei .
55004011	Luka suipaw kama khatah a ung . Marka khah a va chui my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ka raihrenah letah a pa bong ngeteipaw a cang .
55004012	Taikhika khah Efesa khuapui lang ka thlaw .
55004013	Na va sei tihtah Troas khua letei Karpa khatei ka seisaipaw ka angkilai khah va pho my lo . Ka cabu lingpakopaw sahlo , a biapui cai taco sapho cabu sahlo va pho khah monghly kheh lo .
55004014	Sysahpaw Alekzandar takhei ka cung letah hanah alaipui a pa peh . Abuipaw tah a tuasanah cung letah veri a thing tae a .
55004015	Nama zong ma cawngsaw khah a raering my lo , kaa thawngchawbia heh thaw tah a dy ngetei kho .
55004016	Biacenah letah ka chua taw ning taco ahohmai a padaw khuipaw ung ly he tah hning aa pa chai thlu . Khazing tah sua phosah haitei he khe seh .
55004017	Canghrasala Abuipaw tah a padaw cakhai ka , thawtlungnah a pa peh , zecawtamaw tatah kama thongtah thawngchawbia cawh tlangtling teitah y khui pawtah le Gental cawngsaw sahlo vytei tah aa thui khy nápaw cawtah a cang . Taico kama cawh cakebarung kaw taitah thochua ka cang .
55004018	Cawngsaw tei ka cung letah aa tuapaw chah lynah vytei taikhei Abuipaw taco pa pachah ka , a vaicung painah raang tai khah a bing teitah a paphah khui a . Ama khaco chaizaw tah chaizaw tai rungnawnah ung paria thlang seh .
55004019	Prisila le Akuila le Onesifora ingchungkho khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo .
55004020	Erasta cawh Korin khuapui letah ung ka , Trofima cawh a danglynah cawtah Mileta khua letah ka seisai .
55004021	Thlasih cai a chua hlai letah ma heh phah a va zong my lo . Zubula tah a dang pawtah a ca tah . Ma hraco Puden le Lina le Klaudia le zingtu uny vytei tah aa ca tah hrah .
55004022	Abuipaw cawh na thlawpaw khatah ung ky seh . Khazing ningdonah cawh nama khatah ung ky seh .
56001001	Khazing sae le Zisu Khri apostol a cangpaw kama Paul tah kaa hrongpaw peh zingnah chungletah ka sawtei hmuisui a cangpaw Tita khatah ca ka ca kua . Khazing tah a thingpaw sahlo khah Khazing tlechainah lang langhme a chuinah a cangpaw aa zingnah le biadih hninah letah aa changchy nápawtah kama cawh tawpaw ka cang .
56001002	Ma zingnah le hninah cawh chaizaw hringnah hnabeisuinah letah a pahnia ka , ma cawh Khazing a hing thai lypaw taco cai hrangtho hlai taitah bia a kang ciapaw a cang .
56001003	Ama tah a cai a zaw a tah tihtah a bia khah phungreiná khei palang sá pawtah kaa Pachahtu Khazing a biapehnah thong tah rai a pa khing .
56001004	Paw Khazing le a ma Pachahtu Khri Zisu taiteipaw ningdonah le thlawlungnah cawh nama khatah ung ky seh .
56001005	Krit tuiraw letei ka ca chiasipaw cawh ka ca chingsipaw hrakhei rai paling lypaw sahlo khah paling rua pawtah le khua maikaw lekhei khrisaw macang sahlo rawh pah lai rua pawtah a cang .
56001006	Khrisaw macang cawh suise a kawh lypaw , nupui pakheh suitei a hnuipaw , a sawtei leh Khazing a zingpaw he le piathynah le bia nge lynah lang letah thaichianah a hnui lypaw cang he seh .
56001007	Khrisaw hotu cawh Khazing rai a mingkaitu a cangnah cawtah suise a kawh lypaw , a palai a patui lypaw , a thing a paching lypaw , zu rui ahmang lypaw , a piathy lypaw , ahmang lypaw a miasangnah a du lypaw ,
56001008	ma hlui co pasungpanaw a thaipaw , chahnah a dupaw , pungsaw dunah a tlepakhih khypaw , mehding a cangpaw , hringzia a pathaipaw le a dih teitah a ungpaw cang seh .
56001009	Ama aa cawngpahpaw thawngchawbia , biadih khah cyky tah a zingpaw a cang a . Taico minghringpaw khah a hmangpaw cawngpahnah khei thawzaang pei khy a he ka , cawngpahnah aa cakhaepaw sahlo khah aa paanah khah a palang khy a .
56001010	Zecawtamaw tatah male dy a hmangpaw , bia rei a hawngpaw le , dungkhei a hmangpaw mehlupui a ung he . A hlu vy cawh cingpa a taipaw phu a cang cai he .
56001011	Ma sahlo cawh aa kaw pamai a hy , zecawtamaw tatah cawngpah ly ruapaw aa cawngpahnah pawhe takhei ingchungkho ialia tah hna aa hnawhsah thlu he . A miasang du tah ma hrahei aa cawngpah laipaw he a cang .
56001012	Aaning aa khuavang a cangpaw lilaw takhei hmai , “ Krit tuiraw cawngsaw sahlo cawh hing paria he ka , saraang hapaw , mehthawthi le mehzawng a cang he , ” tatah a tah kho .
56001013	A reipaw cawh ahmangpaw a cang . Macawtaco a sah pui tah raw my lo , ma pawsui co zingnah letah a biatah khy he ka ,
56001014	Juda aa phung a reilaipaw le biahmuisui a hlawhpaw cawngsaw sahlo naw aa pehpaw he bia khah nawthlia pah lytah aa ung a .
56001015	Mehpathaipaw caw taco zehmai heh a pathai thlu thlang . Canghrasala mehpialui le Khazing a zing lypaw aa caw taco aa thinglung chiachaw thluidangnah a pialuinah cawtah a pathaipaw zehmai ung be .
56001016	Khazing kaa hni tah he ka , canghrasala aa tuasaná tah aa hlawh . Aaning sahlo cawh du a chui lypaw , rei a nge lypaw , hmingchaw a tua ruapaw tei a tlah lypaw a cang he .
56002001	Nama tu taco cawngpahnah ahmangpaw khatei a tlahpaw khah cawngpah my lo .
56002002	Macangpaw sahlo cawh singvang teitah le zawchuipaw tah ung pawtah le ma leh ma a tlepakhih khypaw cang pawtah le zingnah ahmangpaw le donah le ingkhynah hnui pawtah cawngpah my lo .
56002003	Ma hraco canu macang sahlo khah aa hringzia letah Khazing a cizaw thaipaw , cawngui a thai lypaw , zu a rang lypaw , hmingchaw tua cawngpah a thaipaw naa cang ruapaw a cang tatah cawngpah my lo .
56002004	Mataico aaning taco a kung a ny vypaw canu khah aa pasae leh le aa sawtei leh a dopaw ,
56002005	ma leh ma a tlepakhih khypaw , a pathaipaw , ingchungkho tungtuh a thaipaw , mehchaw le pasae rei a ngepaw aa cang pawtah aa cawngpah khy he . Ma pawsui co ahotahmai tah Khazing bia khah reipachia khy bei he .
56002006	Ma hraco capaw mehny sahlo khah ma leh ma a tlepakhih khypaw aa cang nápawtah pasy my lo .
56002007	Zezongpui letah hmingchaw tuaná khei a mingpai tlang pawtah ung my lo . Na cawngpahnah lekhei dingnah le biatahnah le
56002008	biarei thangrei letah suise a kawh lypaw tah ung la , ma hratei na tua caco a ca dytu sahlo khah aa ning a ze a , zecawtamaw tatah kaaning letah reipachia ruapaw zehmai hmuh a bei he .
56002009	Sae sahlo khah zezongpui letah naa bui leh reinge la , aa bia ei khe la , aa lungtong a zawng my lo ,
56002010	aa hming zong ruh pah khe la , zingchui tlang naa cangnah cawh hmingchaw tuaná khei palang hri my lo , tatah cawngpah my lo . Ma pawsui co , a ma Pachahtu Khazing kong cawngpahnah khah tlechai tlang a chuipaw a cangnah zia kawting tah a lang a .
56002011	Zecawtamaw tatah pachahnah a chuakhuipaw Khazing ningdonah cawh ming vytei khatah a lang myca .
56002012	Ma ningdonah taco Khazing zetah reilynah le ngaisaw sua dunah sahlo hlawh rua pawtah a ma cawngpah . Ma leh ma a tlepakhih khypaw , mehding cang pawtah le Khazing cizaw hmo teitah atocai lehei ung rua paw takhei a ma pasy .
56002013	Alaisuipaw kaa Khazing le Pachahtu a cangpaw Zisu Khri rungnaw pawtah a paly nápaw khah hnabeisuinah alaisuipaw kaa haw thlang chung lehei ma hraco kaa ung ruapaw a cang .
56002014	Ama cawh kaaning vytei khah chahlynah vytei taitah tlang rua pawtah le Ama a tei cang rua pawtah le pathaisá pawtah le hmingchaw tua dunah hnui rua pawtah kaa cawtah a hringnah a peipaw a cang .
56002015	Ma sahlo heh na cawngpah ruapaw he cawh a cang hi . Nawhnuinah chitah aaning sahlo cawh pasy la , chinghring my lo . Ahotahmai tah ca zongte kheh he seh .
56003001	Uhtu sahlo le naw hnuitu sahlo khah cizaw la , aa bia nge la , hmingchaw tua rua pawtah a maipacia my lo ,
56003002	ahohmai reipachia khe lo , de teitah ung la , zawngrawhnah le a panynah khah , mingting cung letah a langsah my lo , tatah cawngsaw sahlo khah na cawngpah kaw he a .
56003003	Khuahlai ning taco kaaning sahlo zong heh mehruh le , reingenah a hnui lypaw le , dungkhei tah a ungpaw le a nawngsenah phingzakih sae a cang ciapaw longtei ka cang he peh . Ziahnuinah le hnachuanah khatei a za hringpaw ka cang peh . Male a hua he peh ka , kaaning zong aa ma hua hrah he .
56003004	Canghrasala kaa Khazing le Pachahtu donah le chahnah a lang tihtah ,
56003005	a ma pachah . A dingpaw hming kaa tuanah cawtah cang lytah ama zawngenah rawng tah a cang hri . Thlawpaw Pathai pathanah le sipathainah thongtah a ma pachahpaw a cang .
56003006	Ma cawh kaa Pachahtu Zisu Khri thongtah a Thlawpaw Pathai cawh a hlupui tah a ma luiso .
56003007	A ningdonah thong khei thaicangsah cang peh ka , chaizaw hringnah hnabeisuinah ry a cytu kaa cang khy hrah peh .
56003008	Ma heh zing tlang a tlahpaw bia a cang . Macawtaco ma hming sahlo heh na calia lai rua pawtah ka dupaw a cang . Ma pawsui co , Khazing letei angepainah a pahniapaw sahlo he tah hmingchaw tuanah kong letah tua ceingei pawtah a peh khynah aa hnui a . Ma hming sahlo heh ming maikaw cawtah a chawpaw le a chahnaipaw a cang .
56003009	Canghrasala hruchuipaw bia a eilainah le pathlahtu sahlo ming cadai lai tei a eichaenah le phungbia kong letei a hry a chaenah tahpaw vytei sahlo heh cahri my lo . Zecawtamaw tatah a chahnai lypaw , zehmai a cang lypaw a cang .
56003010	A chaichynah a chuakhuipaw cawh uikheh uihning raeringnah na peh khy taico , ama khaco zehmai tua khawh kheh .
56003011	Ma hapaw cawngsaw cawh a rawhnah ahmang lypaw le a suapaw , ama le ama thaily a cangsahpaw a cang takhah hnih my lo .
56003012	Artema maw a cang ly leh Taikhika maw ka va thlaw tih he tah Nekapoli lang kama kha a vong pawtah a zawng my lo , zecawtamaw tatah ma leco thlasih chung vytei ung ka pachia .
56003013	Sihni a cangpaw Zena le Apolo khah aa khuatlongnah letah baw la , zezong aa hiapaw na tua khypaw maikaw khah tuapah my lo .
56003014	Kaa cawngsaw sahlo takhei hmingchaw tuanah kong letah aa cawng hrahring rua pawtah le ung cakhawng thlang lytah ningting cawtah a hiapaw e le ba chuakhui khah a zawng cypaw a cang tahpaw khah aa hni a hia .
56003015	Kama kha a ungpaw vytei tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah he . Zingnah letei a ma dopaw sahlo he khah a dang pawtah pa tah pah my lo . Khazing ningdonah cawh naa zongmingtei cung letah ung ky seh .
57001001	Khri Zisu rai rawng tei thong a tlahpaw kama Paul le kaa unypaw Timote tah kaa dopaw vesaw le rai kaa hrehruipaw a cangpaw Filemon ,
57001002	kaa sateino Afia , Zisu Khri letah raekeh rai kaa hrehruipaw Arkhipa le na ing letei a pungpaw he khrisawbu khatah ca kaa ca kua he .
57001003	Kaa Paw Khazing le Abuipaw Zisu Khri taiteipaw ningdonah le thlawlungnah cawh naaning khatah ung ky seh .
57001004	Ka thlawchangnah letah a ca thui neh ka , ka Khazing cawh ka lawng paria thlang ,
57001005	zecawtamaw tatah Abuipaw Zisu letei angepainah na hnuipaw le mehpathai vytei na donah pawhe kong ka thui cawtah a cang .
57001006	Na zingnah khah cawngsaw hringpaw ching pachaw hrá pawtah thlaw ka chang tei , ma pawsui co , Khri letei kaa hnuipaw hming chawpaw vytei hnithainah khah na hnui khy a .
57001007	Donah na hnuinahpaw takhei lunglawngnah alaipaw pui le thawzaang a pa peh , zecawtamaw tatah nama unypaw tah mehpathai sahlo aa lungthing thaw khah na thosah he .
57001008	Khri thongtah na tua ruapaw khah tua law tatah raechá tah bia a ca pei khypaw ka cang thlang naná teitah ,
57001009	donah na hnuinah caw takhei , a naw tah ka ca naw hri hi . Mataico macang a cangpaw le ato zong heh Khri Zisu rawng tei thong a tlahpaw kama Paul tah ,
57001010	bahrairui khi ka cangning tei ka sawcapaw a cangpaw Onesima cawtah hei ka ca nawpaw a cang .
57001011	Akhung ciapaw cai leco ama cawh na cawtah sangtle bingbi be , canghrasala atoheh cawh nama le kama kaa cawtah sang a tle myca .
57001012	Kama ka lungthing vytei tei ka dopaw nama khatah ka va seisah kaw hi .
57001013	Thawngchawbia rawng tei bahrairui ka khi chung lehei nama caipaw tei rai a pa bong rua pawtah kama khatah ungsah paria ka du thlang .
57001014	Canghrasala , nama na rei ly co zehming hmai tua du bei neh , ma pawsui co ma chahnah na tuapaw cawh hneh chaipaw hratah cang lytah nama na lungtho tei tuapaw a cang a .
57001015	Cai a cawngpe a ca lysainah pawhe heh naa hnui the kaw khy nápaw a cang khy thlang thly a ;
57001016	sae hratah cang khawh lytah sae navy tah achaw vypaw , uny dopaw hratah na hnui a . Kama taco do ngetei neh ka , nama taco cawngsaw hratah le Abuipaw letei uny hratah na do vy chichi a .
57001017	Macawtaco vesaw huikong hmuisui tei na parawh caco , kama na pa cyhlangpaw hratah ama heh cyhlang hrah my lo .
57001018	Na cung letah hmingsua a tua le khahlui a hnui caco , kama ka khahlui tah rawh thlang my lo .
57001019	Kama , Paul tah ma ca heh kama ka kih ceingei tah ka cia hi . Kama tah ka ca chang tae a . Kama ka cung letah nama hrahring tah hringnah luibah na hnuipaw khah ka rei dupaw cang be .
57001020	Unypaw , sadu ka thawpaw cawh Abuipaw lehei nama taitah chahnainah hmuh neh seh tahpaw heh a cang ; Khri letah ka lungthaw pa dangsah my lo .
57001021	Rei na nge a tahpaw zing neh ka , ka reipaw navy zong tah a hlu vy tah na tua a tahpaw hni hmotah nama kha ca ka va ciapaw a cang hi .
57001022	Taico a hiapaw ahringpaw hming sangkheh cawh ka tlung nápaw za tingtua my lo , zecawtamaw tatah naa thlawchangnah hlo tling sá pawtah ka va ca tlong khy kaw he tah ka hnabei a sui .
57001023	Khri Zisu rawng tei thong ka tlah hruipaw Epafra tah a dang pawtah a ca tah he .
57001024	Taico rai ka hrehruipaw Marka , Aristarka , Dema le Luka zong tah a dang pawtah aa ca tah hrah he .
57001025	Abuipaw Zisu Khri ningdonah cawh na thlawpaw khatah ung ky seh .
58001001	Cai a sei ciapaw leco Khazing tah a khuavang sahlo khah hmang he ka , khuahlai a ma pathlahtu sahlo hai lekhei uihlupui a phingphing khei bia a za rei tei .
58001002	Canghrasala atochai cai hning caipaw lehei co , a Sawcapaw hmang tah kaaning khatah bia a rei . Ama cawh zezong vytei ry cytu ruapaw tah thingpaw a cang . Ama thongtah alui le avai le zezong vytei heh tuapaw a cang .
58001003	Sawcapaw cawh Khazing rungnawnah khainah cang ka , Khazing cangnah a palangsahtu hmuisuipaw a cang . A bia thawtlungná tah zezong vytei khah a tlechui . Suanah vytei pathaisahnah a tua khy taitah vaicung letah Cungnungcai cacang lang letah a ty .
58001004	Macawtaco Khazing Sawcapaw cawh vaiming sahlo cypaw navy tah a rungnaw vypaw ming a cytu a cangpaw hratah vaiming sahlo navy tah a rungnaw vy sylypaw a cang .
58001005	Zemaw tah pawco Khazing tah a vaiming sahlo khah ahomaw , “ Nama cawh ka Sawcapaw cang ceh ka , atoning heh na Paw ka cang myca , ” tatah a tah bang ? Taico , “ Kama cawh a Paw cang neh ka , Ama cawh ka Sawcapaw a cang a , ” tatah tah bang hrah be .
58001006	Mataico , Khazing tah a sa-uthui khah khazaw letah a za thlaw ning tah , “ Khazing vaiming vytei tah beh he seh , ” a tah .
58001007	Mataico vaiming sahlo kong leco , “ Ama taco a vaiming sahlo cawh thli tah tua he ka , a raihretu sahlo cawh melui tah a tua he , ” tatah a rei .
58001008	Canghrasala , Sawcapaw kong leco , “ Vy Khazing , na buidyching cawh chaizaw tah chaizaw tai a hming a , dingnah cawh na painah cungcahrei a cang a .
58001009	Dingnah cawh du ceh ka , chahlynah cawh na hua , macawtaco Khazing , na Khazing tah alawngnah sathy ca thu ka , na vesaw sahlo navy tah a ca pasang vy , ” tatah a tah .
58001010	Mataico , “ Vy Abuipaw , athoning tah Nama tah alui a pahnianah cawh tua ceh ka , avai kheh na kih chuh a cang .
58001011	Ma sahlo cawh a rawh thlu he ka , canghrasala Nama cawh na hming paria a , ma sahlo vytei cawh chaichi hratah a cai thlu he .
58001012	Taico angki pasuapaw hratah pabi he ceh ka , chaichi hratah a thlai thlu tae he . Canghrasala Nama cawh chaizaw tah Nama ialia cang ceh ka , na kungkhua zong chang thai beh , ” tatah a tah .
58001013	Canghrasala Khazing tah a vaiming sahlo khah ahomaw , “ Na caraepaw cawh na pherai letah ka chiahlai vytei ka cacang lang hei a ty tua , ” tatah a tah bang he ?
58001014	Canghrasala vaiming sahlo cawh Khazing a raihretu longlong a cang he . Pachahnah a tingpaw cawngsaw sahlo bawkhang pawtah Khazing taitah tawpaw thlary a cang he .
58002001	Macawtaco , a pingpaly lang kaa seisua ly nápawtah kaa thuipaw bia khah a cy vy tah kaa tle hrahring ruapaw a cang .
58002002	Taico vaiming sahlo tei aa pehpaw phungbia hmai khah pacysah cang tah a zui lypaw le a cakahpaw cawh a tlahpaw dangtahnah khah peh a cang caco ,
58002003	ma tluh pachahnah rungnawpaw heh zerei lytah ung my peh seh la , zekhatamaw hrehnah cawh kaa saisai khy a ? Ma pachahnah cawh a hmetawcai tah Abuipaw hrahring tah rei ka , a thuipaw maikaw tah a reipaw bia cawh kaa hai letah aa pacysah .
58002004	Khazing zong tah paching pakhanah le khuarawhanah le ningang chuipaw hming a phingphing tah le Ama a du pawtei hratah Thlawpaw Pathai lahsong a pehnahpaw khei thawngchawbia cawh a dih tatah a palang .
58002005	A va chuh lepaw alui , atotei a kong kaa rei leimeipaw heh vaiming sahlo tah aa uhpaw cang be .
58002006	Canghrasala zeletah tlong maw , ma hrahei a rei bang , “ Khazing , mehnung heh zeky cang ka maw na thui paria thlang ? Cawngsaw Sawcapaw heh ze cang ka maw a zawng na rawh ?
58002007	Ama cawh vaiming sahlo navy tah a nai vy thehpaw tah tua ceh ka , rungnawnah le palawngpalinah khah na khusah ,
58002008	zezong vytei khah a phe rai letah na chia , ” tatah a tah . A phe rai letah zezongpui a chia tih taco , Khazing tah a nawhnuinah rai letah a chia lypaw zehmai ung be . Canghrasala ato lehei co , nawhnuinah zezongpui a phe rai letah a ung tahpaw hmuh balang bei peh .
58002009	Canghrasala kaa hmuhpaw cawh Zisu , vaiming navy tei a nai vy theh tei tuapaw a cangpaw khah atoheh palawngpalinah le rungnawnah cawh a khusah a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah thihnah khah ing ka , Khazing ningdonah thongtah ming vytei cawtah thihnah khah a pateh pah thlu he .
58002010	Sawtei a hlupui khah rungnawnah lang phah sá pawtah Ama a cawtah le Ama a thongtah zezongpui a ungpaw Khazing tah pachahnah a tuatupaw khah tai-ingnah thongtah mehtling tah a tuapaw cawh a tlahpaw a cang .
58002011	Mehnung suanah a pathaisahtu le suanah pathaisah a cangpaw sahlo cawh ingchungkho kheh a cang he . Ma navai taco Zisu tei ka uny sahlo tatei a ypaw he khah a ningzeh be .
58002012	Ama tah , “ Ka uny sahlo hai letah na ming cawh ka palang a , a pungpaw sahlo he aa hmekaw letah nama reithai tah hlaw ka sá a , ” tatah Khazing khah a tah .
58002013	Taico , “ Ama letah ka ngepainah ka chia a , ” a tah . Mataico , “ Ma lehei Khazing tei a pa pehpaw sawtei sahlo khatah ka ung , ” tatah a tah vy .
58002014	Mataico , sawtei sahlo cawh thi le saw tei a hringpaw mehnung aa cangnah cawtah Zisu zong cawh cawngsaw cangnah khah a hrong hrah . Ma hraco a cangnah cawh thihnah cung letei , naw a hnuitu Setan khah Ama a thihnah thongtah a hlyde khy nápawtah le ,
58002015	thihnah cinah thongtah aa hring chung vytei sae hratei a ungpaw vytei khah a pachah nápaw he cawtah a cang .
58002016	Zecawtamaw tahpaw co , a bongpaw he cawh vaiming khah cang ly he tah Abraham pathlah sahlo hrahring khah a cang hri he .
58002017	Ma rawng tahei , Ama cawh a uny sahlo hratah kawngting letah tua a hypaw cang ka , Khazing raihrenah letah zingchuipaw le zawngepaw tlangbui alaicaipaw a cang khy nápawtah le cawngsaw cawtah sua ngethainah a tuapah ruapaw tah a cang .
58002018	Ama hrahring takhei tuhsonah khah a ing thahnah cawtah tuhsonah aa ingpaw sahlo he khah a bong khy he .
58003001	Macawtaco uny pathaipaw sahlo Khazing tah a mehpathai cang pawtah ca tlawng myca he ka , macawtaco apostol le tlangbui alaicaipaw kaa tahpaw Zisu kong khah rawh tua my lo .
58003002	Moses cawh Khazing ingchungkho sahlo letah zingchui teitah a ungpaw hratah Zisu cawh Ama rai a siatupaw cung letah zing a chui hrah .
58003003	Ing a sahtu cawh a sahpaw ing navy tah alai vypaw hmezawnah a hmuhpaw hratah Zisu cawh Moses navy tah a rungnaw vypaw le hmezaw a chui vypaw a cang .
58003004	Ing maikaw cawh cawngsaw tah aa sah , canghrasala zezongpui a sahtu cawh Khazing a cang .
58003005	Moses cawh Khazing ingchungkho vytei lekhei zingchuipaw raihretu cang ka , hmelang letah Khazing tah a rei ruapaw zong khah a langsah .
58003006	Canghrasala Khri cawh Khazing ingchungkho letah naw a hnuipaw Sawcapaw zingchuipaw a cang . Kaa palaikhuipaw peh hnabeisuinah le kaa raechahnah khah kaa tle thlang caco , a ingchungkho kaa cang he peh .
58003007	Macawtaco Thlawpaw Pathai tei a reipaw hrakhei , “ Atoning heh a o naa thui caco ,
58003008	raangcaa letei hnehsah aa cangning cai letei Khazing aa za dy ning tei aa lung a khongpaw hrakhei , naa lung a khongsah khe lo .
58003009	Ma lekhei naa mapaw sahlo tah kung songli chung aa cawtah ka tuapaw aa hmuh thlang naná teitah pa dy he ka , aa pa pase .
58003010	Ma rawng tahei ma pathlah sahlo cung leco ka thingae ka , ‘ Aa lungthing cawh lang pave leimei thlang ka , ka langpui khah hnih bei he , ’ tatah ka tah .
58003011	Macawtaco ka thingae hmotah chia ka sah , ‘ Ka hianah leco a nae by bei he , ’ ka tah , ” tatah a tah .
58003012	Ka uny sahlo a singkang my lo . Ma lypaw co Khazing hring cawh bangsai pawtah naa hrong letah aho chung letah maw zing lynah lungthing sua a ung pang a .
58003013	Canghrasala naaning cawh suanah dungkhei thainah tah pakheh hmai naa lung a ca khongsah ly nápaw he tah atoning tah chung vytei , ning tating tah pakheh le pakheh a pasy my lo .
58003014	Zecawtamaw tatah a hmasaw tei , kaa hnuipaw zingnah khah a changnah tai cyky tah ka tle thlang caco peh Khri letah tingvy kaa hnui cy hra a .
58003015	Capathai tei a ciapaw hrakhei , “ Atoning heh a o khah naa thui caco , Khazing aa za dy ning tei aa lung a khongpaw hrakhei , naa lung a khongsah khe o . ”
58003016	Aho sahlo maw Khazing o cawh thui he ka , Khazing a za dypaw cawh a cang he ? Moses tah Izipt raang chung taitei a piakhuipaw vytei khah a cang he .
58003017	Aho sahlo cung letah maw Khazing cawh kung songli chung a thing a ae ? Suanah a tuapaw , raangcaa letei a thipaw sahlo cung lekhei a cang .
58003018	“ Ka hianah leco a nae by bei he , ” tatah Khazing tah chia a sahpaw he khah aho sahlo maw aa cang ? Ama a naw a nge lypaw sahlo khah a cang he .
58003019	Macawtaco , aa zing lynah cawtah a za nae khy bei he , takhah kaa hni .
58004001	Macawtaco , a hianah lang a nae pawtah Khazing tah biakang a ma peh tlungpaw tah naa hrawng letah a nae khy lytah a ungpaw na ung pang he ceh taheh a raering he peh .
58004002	Aaning hratah thawngchawbia cawh cawngpah kaa cang hrah peh , a cang naná teitah aa thuipaw bia cawh mai hnui ly a cang . Zecawtamaw tatah mehnung pahning tah cy ly co , a thuipaw vytei tah zingnah khatah aa cyhlang lynah cawtah a cang .
58004003	Ato cawh kaaning a zingpaw sahlo suipaw heh ma a hianah leco kaa nae he peh . “ Macawtaco , ka thingae hmotah chia ka sahpaw cawh , ‘ Aaning cawh ka hianah lang a nae by bei he , ’ ” tatah Khazing tah a tahpaw hrakhei . Canghrasala , khazaw tua thoning taikhei a rai cawh a paling ciapaw a cang thah .
58004004	Zemaw tah pawco zeletah tlong maw ningsarihnah ning kong khah Capathai tah ma hrahei a rei , “ Ningsarihnah ning leco Khazing cawh a rai vytei taikhei a hia , ” tatah a tah .
58004005	Taico a cung lang letei a reipaw cawh , “ Aaning sahlo cawh ka hianah lang a nae by bei he , ” tatah a tah .
